Luuwe nduurataa, law ɗe timmirta.
Ɓikkoy maaji ɗon mawna, ɗon keɓa semmbe,
nden koy ngurtoto yaasi, koy ngartataa fahin.
Moy rimɗini wamnde ladde, yoofti nde?
Moye fiisti toŋngorde maare, itti nde?
Min mi hokki nde ladde bana jooɗorde,
lesdi mannda boo laatani nde wonorde.
Nde ɗon jala hoolo berniiji,
nde nanataa koo telɓuki coggoowo.
Nde ɗon wa'o kooseeje haa nde dura ton,
nde ɗon wiɗito koo toy, teema keccum ɗon.
Kadi mbana huuwante kuugal na?
Malla jemma nga waalan haa nder suudu dabbaaji ma?
Daande maaga, a haɓɓan nde bee ɓoggol,
haa nga tokko ma remugo kaatorooji na?
An a hooloto maŋngu semmbe maaga,
haa a acca nga huuwugo kuugal maaɗa na?
A ɗon hoolo nga haa nga hoorane alkamaari maaɗa,
haa nga mooɓtane ƴaamle ma haa laarre na?
Bee ceyiiɗum bileeji ndawu liilirta.
Ɗi ɗon nanndi bileeji ngaasiyoowal na
Nder mbulwuldi ngu wallinta geeraaɗe,
lesdi wulna ɗe, wurtina ɓiɓɓe boo.
Ndaa ngu yejjiti kosŋgal waawan fusgo ɗe
malla ndabbaawa ladde waran, yaaɓa ɗe.
Bana njanannoy ngu saatanta ɓiyiigu'en,
kuugal maagu, to meere, ngu faalaaka ɗum.
Min mi sooyni ngu hikma, saa'i tagmi ngu,
mi hokkaay ngu hakkiilo, koo seɗɗa.
Bee non fuu, to ngu ummake ngam doggugo,
ngu ɗon jala koo puccu e ba'iiɗo ngu.
An hokki puccu semmbe muuɗum na?
An ɓorni ngu damsali haa daande na?
Haa ngu diwa bana mbaɓɓattu, an waɗi ɗum na?
To ngu hiji bee semmbe, naa kulniiɗum na?
Ngu ɗon ficca nder waadiwol, ngu seyoto,
bee semmbe ngu nastirta nder haɓre boo.
Ngu ɗon jala kulniiɗum, ngu hulataa sam,
koo to ndaa kaafahi, puccu lorataako sam.
Haa dow puccu man ɓaaru kuri sonyata,
bana naaŋge, non labbe ceeɓɗe ɗelkirta.
Nden ngu naarja, moɗa laawol fuu,
to ɓe puufi luwal, ngu de'ataa.
Puccu jaaboto fuufre fuu bee forgo,
diga daayiiɗum ngu luuɓnata konuuji
e hoolo mawɓe honooɓe e gookaali.
Fodde sawari maaɗa ciilal fiirata,
to ngal weeɗi bileeji heedi fombina na?
An a umminan dutal bee umroore ma,
haa ngal jo'ina saɓɓo haa ɓaŋgiiɗum na?
Dow tapaaje ngal jooɗata, ngal waalo
dow yeereere maaje ngal waɗa saɓɓo maagal semmbiɗŋgo.
Diga ton ngal ɗon laara kuuje nyaamugo,
gite maagal ɗon eewa ɗe daayiiɗum.
Ɓikkoy maagal ɗon njara ƴiiƴam tan,
haa mbaraaɓe ɗon mbaali, ton ngal wonata.
Jawmiraawo wi'i Ayuba:
An peloowo, a jokkiran bee Baawɗo na?
An gaabotirɗo bee Allah, a waawan jaabaago na?
Ayuba jaabi Jawmiraawo:
Min mi he'aay koo ɗume. Ɗume mi jaaboto?
Sey mi waɗa juŋngo am dow hunnduko.
Mi wolwi nde woore, haa nde ɗiɗi.
Jonta mi wolwataa, mi jeeɗake.
Nden Jawmiraawo gonɗo nder duluuru wi'i Ayuba:
Sey a taasko, a daro bana gorko,
haa mi ƴame, an boo a jaabo yam.
A jaɓaay kiita ka mi ta'i na?
A yiɗi aybingo yam ngam haa a adilina hoore ma na?
An a laati cemmbiɗɗo bana Allah na?
An a rigga-sawtuujo bana maako na?
Bee ɓaŋgaare e tedduŋgal a jaagnoro,
non bee maŋngu e daraja a ɓornorto.
Laar mawnitiiɓe, leesnu ɓe,
a rufa tikkere dow maɓɓe fuu boo.
Laar mawnitiiɓe fuu, toskin ɓe.
do'u kalluɗo haa nokkuure mum.
Nder mbulwuldi uw mooɓgal maɓɓe fuu,
maɓɓu ɓe fuu nder joonde maayɓe.
Nden kam min boo mi maŋgtete ngam baawal ma,
ngam bee nyaamo ma a jaaloto.
Laar ngabbu ngu tagmi bana maaɗa.
Bana nagge ngu nyaamrata huɗo hecco boo.
Laar no semmbe nder keeci maagu ɗuuɗiri,
laar no kusel haa reedu maagu tekkiri.
Ngu ɗon saatina wicco bana leggal,
ɗaɗi dawɗe maagu laati bana bamaaɗi cemmbiɗɗi.
I'e maagu ɗon caati bana njamndi,
kosɗe maagu boo bana daŋraŋge njamndiije.
Kaŋgu woni kaayeefi caka tagle fuu,
sey min tagɗo ngu he'i doolugo ngu.
Haa kooseeje nyaamdu maagu iwata,
haa nokkuuje ɗe'e kuuje ladde fuu pijata.
Haa waalorde les jaaɓe ngabbu waaloto,
nder tolooje e waalowol ngu nyukkoto.
Leɗɗe jaaɓe bee ɗowdi mum'en cuddan ngu
e leɗɗe haa maayo fuu ɗon taari ngu.
Ndaa, to maayo ɗon ɓesdo, ngu diwnataa boo.
Ngu ɗon de'i to ndiyam nasti ngu hunnduko.
Moy wumnata gite maagu, naŋnga ngu?
Moy tuufanto kine maagu tuuforgol?
Ngilanŋgeewa, a dasan nga bee ngalum na?
Ɗemŋgal maaga, a haɓɓan ngal bee ɓoggol na
Kine maaga, a haɓɓan ɗe bee bamol na?
Haa nder galaŋgal mbaɗata nga jeeldu na?
Kadi kaŋga nga toroto ma enɗam na?
Nga wolwante koŋnguɗi ɗelemɗi na?
Kadi a haɓɓan alkawal bee maaga,
haa a heɓa nga huuwane haa foroy na?
Noy? A fijan bee maaga bana bee collel na?
Daande maaga, a haɓɓan nde bee ɓoggol,
ngam haa ɓikkoy ma ndehoy keɓa ko koy pijira na?
Loohotooɓe nga njahran nga haa luumo,
geɓe geɓe, nga laato huunde filu na?
Laral maaga, a waawan yuwugo ngal bee labbo na?
Hoore maaga, a waawan tufugo nde bee jaaral na?
Toonya nga bee yowugo juŋngo ma dow maaga nde woore tan!
Fakat a meetataa ɗum sam!
Anndu, to goɗɗo numi o jaaloto ngilanŋgeewa, o sargi hoore maako.
Goɗɗo hultoran, do'oto to yi'i nga tan.
Walaa yoora-ɓerndeejo tikkinanɗo nga,
walaa gorko cemmbiɗɗo dartantooɗo nga.
Moy waɗi konu bee maaga, nden o dilli jam?
Irin maako les asama fuu walaa sam
Sey mi anndine haala terɗe maaga fuu,
maŋngu maaga cemmbiɗŋgu, non boo ŋarol maaga.
Moy seekata limce maaga, ɓorta nga?
Cowol sulkewol maaga, moy nastata?
Kadi hunnduko maaga, moy maɓɓiti ko?
Moy diwnataa to yi'i nyii'e maaga?
Ɓaawo maaga, ɗum jabbi ndarganaaje
ɗe ɗon kawriti kab bana bee taari.
Gootal gootal ɗe njokkindiri,
caka maaje, foofaaŋgo saalataako sam.
Gootal gootal ɗe takkotiri caatuɗum,
ɗe ɗon njogotiri booɗɗum, ɗe ceedataa sam.
To nga isli, annoora ɗon waŋga,
gite maaga ɗon njayna bana naaŋge.
Haa nder hunnduko maaga jame ngurtoto,
pete yiite ɗon njammito diga hunnduko.
Kine maaga ɗon cuura cuurɗe tekkuɗe,
bana geene kuɓɓaaɗe haa les defrude.
Poofɗe maaga kuɓɓan ƴulɓe yiite,
ɗemŋgal yiite ɗon wurto haa nder hunnduko.
Kayto! Hoɓɓudu maaga ɓuri semmbiɗgo.
Koo moy fotti bee maaga, sey o hultora.
Kusel maaga haa buttuli hawtidi,
ngel cemmbiɗŋgel masin, ngel dimmbataako.
Bana hayre, non ɓernde maaga saatiri,
nde ɗon saati bana namrude.
To nga ummake, ɗowanteeɓe kultoran,
ƴuuge mbeela boo ndoggan yeeso kuuŋga man.
A heɓataa a naawna nga bee kaafahi
malla bee labbo e jaaral malla bee kurol boo.
Njamndi fuu, nga ɗon laara ndi bana tiitiiho,
njamndi mboɗeeri boo kal-kal bee leggal nyolŋgal.
To a fiɗi kuri, nga doggataa sam
to a fiɗi nga bee kaa'e, ɗe laatanto nga kuɗoy tan.
Nga ɗon laara wandayre bana huɗo non.
To a sakkini labbo boo, nga jalan ɗum.
Haa les reedu nga woodi kuuje bana keeɗe,
kanje ceekata loope haa nga yehi fuu.
Nga ɗon ɓulna luggeeŋga bana defugo,
mbeela waywa bana nebbam nder fayannde.
Haa nga saali, a yi'an laawol jaynuŋgol,
a ɗon nanndina nguufo man bee dandanndol.
Haa duniyaaru fuu walaa irin maaga sam,
nga tagaama nga jooɗo bilaa kulol sam.
Bee ɓaŋgaare nga laardata ɓaŋgiiɗum fuu,
nga laamiiɗo dabbaaji mawnitiiɗi fuu.
Nden Ayuba jaabi Jawmiraawo:
Jonta anndumi an a mari baawɗe fuu,
ko a annini waɗugo, a waɗan ɗum.
Ndaa, a ƴami koni mi seki hikma ma,
mi ceediiɗo faataare am bee haala ka'a.
Gooŋga maaɗa! Mi wolwi bilaa faamugo
haala kuuje ɗe calortammi anndugo
An a wi'no: “Accu mi wolwa.
Min mi ƴamete, an boo sey a jaabammi
Nanɗe noppi tan, non mi nani haala ma,
ammaa jonta, bee gite am mi yi'i ma.
Ngam daliila man cemtiranmi bolle am,
ndaa mi tuubi, mi meetataa waabaago sam.
Ɓaawo Jawmiraawo wolwani Ayuba bolle ɗe'e fuu, Jawmiraawo wi'i Elifas Temaniijo: “Mi ɗon ɓernane, an e sooba'en ma ɗiɗo. Ngam on ceedanaaki yam gooŋga bana jaggiiɗo am Ayuba seedori.

Jonta kam, koo'e ga'i kalhali joweeɗiɗi e jawɗi baali joweeɗiɗi. Njehe haa jaggiiɗo am Ayuba, lii'e ɗi guleteeɗi ngam ko'e mooɗon. Ayuba boo do'ano on. Mi jaɓan do'a maako, ngam taa mi waɗa on fodde faataare mon. Ngam on ceedanaaki yam bana no haani, bana kaŋko o seedori.”
Nden Elifas Temaniijo e Bildad Suhiijo e Cofar Na'amatiijo njehi, mbaɗi ko Jawmiraawo umri ɓe. Jawmiraawo boo jaɓi do'a Ayuba.
Ɓaawo Ayuba do'ani sooba'en mum, Jawmiraawo hesɗitini hayru maako. O hokki mo ko o marno fuu cowi ɗiɗi.

Deerɗiiko'en worɓe e rewɓe fuu ngari haa maako e annduɓe mo diga naane fuu. Ɓe nyaamdi bee maako nder saare maako. Ɓe njurmini mo, ɓe nde'itini mo dow sarru ngu Jawmiraawo ukkanno mo fuu. Koo moy maɓɓe hokki mo suleyre cardi e halagaare kaŋŋeeri.
Jawmiraawo barkiɗini Ayuba ko ɓuri naane. Ayuba heɓi dammooji ujine sappo e nayi e geelooɗi ujine joweego e ga'i cindaaɗi ɗiɗi ɗiɗi nde ujineere e bamɗe debbe ujineere.
O danyanaama ɓiɓɓe worɓe njoweeɗiɗo e ɓiɓɓe rewɓe tato.
Arano ɓiɓɓe rewɓe, o inndi mo Yemiima
Rewɓe wooɗɓe bana ɓiɓɓe Ayuba tawaaka nder lesdi fuu. Baaba maɓɓe yeɗi ɓe ndonŋgu caka deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe worɓe.
Ɓaawo maajum Ayuba wuuri duuɓi teemerre e cappanɗe nayi. O yi'i ɓiɓɓe maako e ɓiɓɓe ɓiɓɓe maako, gide nayi.
Nden Ayuba maayi, o ndottiijo, kaarɗo balɗe.
Barka laatanto goɗɗo mo jaɓataa sawari halluɓe,
mo tokkataako laawol hakke'en,
mo jooɗodottaako bee jancooɓe,
ammaa mo seyorto tawreeta Jawmiraawo,
mo numtata ka jemma e naaŋge fuu.
O nanndi bee lekki jubaaki baŋnge maayo ilanŋgo,
dimanki ɓiɓɓe mum to saa'i man waɗi,
haakooji maaki njoorataa.
Goɗɗo oo heɓan hayru nder ko o waɗata fuu
Ammaa halluɓe mba'aay bana non.
Kamɓe ɓe ɗon bana nyaande nde henndu ruuynata.
Ngam man halluɓe mbaawataa dartaago nyalaade kiita,
hakke'en ngalaa pellel nder mooɓtorde adili'en.
Ngam Jawmiraawo anndi laawol adili'en,
ammaa ngol halluɓe yahran haa halkere.
Koni ummaatooje umminta haala,
koni jama'aaje nufoto numooji meereeji?
Laamiiɓe duniyaaru ɗon taaski waɗugo fitina,
tedduɓe boo ɗon kaɓɓa dabare
dow Jawmiraawo e laamiiɗo mum mo o moyti
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Sey en ta'a kaɓɓorli maɓɓe,
en cakkina ɓoggi maɓɓe daayiiɗum!”
Ammaa jooɗiiɗo haa asama ɗon jala ɓe,
Jawmiraawo ɗon janca ɓe.
Nden o wolwanan ɓe bee tikkere,
o hulnan ɓe bee ɓernuki maako, o wi'an:
“Min mi laamini laamiiɗo am
dow Siyona, hooseere am seniinde.”
Mi wooynan ko Jawmiraawo taynori.
O wi'i yam: “An woni ɓiɗɗo am,
hannde mi danyi ma
Ƴamam,
mi hokkete ummaatooje duniyaaru haa yotto keeri maaru fuu, a rona ɗe.
A ɗiggina ɗe bee sawru njamndi,
a sampita ɗe bana payanɗe loope
Jonta kam, onon laamiiɓe, laate hikma'en!
Onon hiitooɓe duniyaaru, njaɓe feloore!
Njaggane Jawmiraawo bee kulol,
ngone nder seyo e diwŋgol!
Kebbe Ɓiɗɗo oo
Ngam nii seɗɗa o ɓernan.
Seyo laatani nyukkotooɓe haa maako.
Yimre Daawuda saa'i o ɗonno dogga ɓiyiiko Absalom
Yaa Jawmiraawo, konne'en am ɗuuɗi,
ɗuuɗɓe ɗon konammi.
Ɗuuɗɓe ɗon mbolwa dow am, ɗon mbi'a: “Allah yiidataa mo!”
Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni wawarde
haa maaɗa tedduŋgal am woni, a seynatam.
Mi ewni Jawmiraawo bee sawtu.
Kaŋko boo o jaabi yam diga hooseere maako seniinde.
Mi waalo, mi ɗaano,
mi fina jam, ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon aynammi.
Mi hulataa yimɓe ujineeje ujineeje
taariiɓe yam koo toy fuu ngam honugo yam.
Umma, yaa Jawmiraawo! Hisnam, yaa Allah am!
An a yewan galaŋge konne'en am fuu,
a yewan nyii'e halluɓe.
Haa maaɗa kisndam woni, yaa Jawmiraawo,
barka ma laatano ummaatoore ma!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime bee moolooji. Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Allah, to mi torake ma, jaabam,
gooŋɗinoowo yam!
Nder ɓillaare am, a hisni yam.
Hinnam jonta, jaɓ tornde am!
Ndey accoton meeriɗingo daraja am, onon ɓiɓɓe Aadama?
Ndey accoton yiɗugo kuuje meereeje?
Ndey accoton yiɗugo fewre?
Annde! Jawmiraawo suɓani hoore mum tokkiiɗo mo bee gooŋga.
To mi torake mo, o nanatam.
Ndiwne, acce waɗugo hakke!
Sey ɓerɗe mon numta ɗum,
saa'i on ɗon mbaali, on njeeɗo
Lii'e kirseteeɗi pottuɗi,
koole Jawmiraawo!
Ɗuuɗɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Moy hokkata en hayru?”
Woonan min, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Seyo ngo a hokki yam,
ɓuri ngo yimɓe mari yaake alkamaari e inaboojam ɗuuɗi!
Nde mi waaloto fuu, mi ɗaanoto jam,
ngam an feere ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
a hakkilantam nder hoolɗinaare.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime, bee ciide. Yimre Daawuda.
Nan bolle am, yaa Jawmiraawo,
hakkilan uumaali am!
Heɗita gookaali am,
an laamiiɗo am, Allah am,
ngam an, mi tori!
Fajiri a nanan sawtu am, yaa Jawmiraawo.
Nde weeti fuu, mi waran yeeso ma bee tornde am,
mi reenan jaawaabu ma.
Naa a Allah mo yiɗi halleende,
kalluɗo hoɗataa haa maaɗa.
A jaɓataa mawnitiiɓe mbaŋga yeeso maaɗa,
a ɗon wanya waɗooɓe zunuuba fuu.
A halkan fewooɓe.
Rufooɓe ƴiiƴam e faasiki'en,
a ɗon wanya ɓe jamum.
Ammaa min mi waawan nastugo suudu ma
ngam daliila mbooɗeeŋga ma ɗuuɗŋga.
Mi sujidan yeeso haykaliiru ma seniindu, mi teddinte.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, ɗowam nder adilaaku ma!
Ɗowam ngam daliila konne'en am!
Mo'inanam laawol ma haa mi tokko ngol!
Walaa gooŋga nder kunnduɗe maɓɓe,
ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗon keewi halleende,
kondondi maɓɓe nanndi bee genaale maɓɓitiiɗe.
Ɗemɗe maɓɓe ɗon mbolwa bolle belɗe, rikiciije
Waŋgin ɓe aybuɓe, yaa Allah!
Dabareeji maɓɓe ndo'a ɓe!
Wudin ɓe ngam aybeeji maɓɓe ɗuuɗi,
ngam ɓe tuurtani ma.
Nden nyukkotooɓe haa ma fuu ceyoto,
ɓe mbelmbeltan haa foroy, a faddoto ɓe,
yiɗɓe innde ma fuu ceyoto ngam daliila maaɗa.
Ngam an, yaa Jawmiraawo, a barkiɗinan adili'en.
Mo'ere ma ɗon faddo ɓe bana wawarde
Ngam kaliifaajo gime, bee moolooji marɗi ɓoggi joweetati.
Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, taa hiitam nder tikkere ma,
taa ɓoccam nder ɓernuki ma
Enɗam, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam mi tampuɗo!
Yamɗitinam, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam i'e am ɗon ndiwna,
nafsu am fuu ɗon diwna!
Haa ndeye, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Wartu, yaa Jawmiraawo, hisnam!
Wallam ngam daliila mbooɗeeŋga ma.
Ngam wonɓe nder joonde maayɓe ciftortaa ma,
moy maŋgtete ton?
Mi uumi haa mi somi,
jemma fuu gonɗi coofni be'itte am.
Mi ɗon waalo nder gonɗi am.
Gite am mbonni ngam bojji,
ɗe tampi ngam daliila konne'en am.
Ndaayeeɗam, onon waɗooɓe zunuuba fuu!
Ngam Jawmiraawo nani bojji am
Jawmiraawo heɗiti tornde am, Jawmiraawo jaɓi do'aare am.
Konne'en am fuu cemtan, ɓe ndiwnan, ɓe loroto ɓaawo.
Nder ma'annde yiitere ɓe cemtan.
Yimre boyki nde Daawuda yimi yeeso Jawmiraawo ngam daliila Kuusi Benyaminiijo.
Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah am,
mi nyukkake haa maaɗa,
hisnam juuɗe toonyooɓe yam fuu, rimɗinam!
To naa non ɓe ceekatam bana mbarooga,
ngam walaa kisnoowo yam feere.
Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah am,
to mi waɗi bana ni'i: To zunuuba takkake juuɗe am,
to mi waɗani soobaajo am halleende,
to mi jaɓti huunde konneejo am bilaa daliila
nden kam sey konneejo am taasnammi, jokkammi,
yaaɓammi bee kosɗe mum,
itta daraja am, wallinammi nder mbulwuldi lesdi.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, umma bee tikkere ma,
dartana ɓernuki konne'en am!
Fin, wallam, ngam a tabitini kiita ngooŋɗuka.
Sey mooɓgal ummaatooje fuu taare,
an, jooɗa haa joonde ma towtunde dow maaje.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, hiitu ummaatooje ɗe'e.
Gooŋɗinam, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam mi adiliijo,
mi walaa aybe!
Haɗ halleende halluɓe,
tabitin adili'en!
Ngam an woni Allah adiliijo,
a ɗon linya ɓerɗe e anniyaaji lugguɗi
Allah woni wawarde
Allah woni kiitoowo adiliijo,
nyalaade fuu o ɗon waŋgina caatal maako.
Kalluɗo mo tuubaay, o welnan kaafahi maako,
o tiran lagaawal maako,
o taaskan fiɗugo ɗum,
o taaskitinan balmi maako mbarooji,
o tiitinan kuri yiiteeji dow kalluɗo man.
Ndaa, kalluɗo oo reedi bee zunuuba.
Halleende hebbini reedu maako,
o danyan fewre.
O wasi ngaska, o luggini ka,
ammaa kaŋko bee hoore maako do'i nder maaka.
Halleende maako loroto dow hoore maako,
aybe maako do'an dow gumbal hoore maako.
Mi yettan Jawmiraawo ngam adilaaku maako,
mi yimanan Jawmiraawo Ɓaŋiiɗo maŋgtooje.
Yimre Daawuda, ngam kaliifaajo gime fodde daande “gittit”.
Yaa Allah Jawmiraawo amin,
innde ma nde mawnde masin dow lesdi fuu!
Maŋngu ma ɓuri asamanji.
Bee kunnduɗe ɓikkoy e musinankoy,
a tabitini semmbe ma ngam daliila wanywanyɓe maaɗa,
ngam je'ingo konne'en e waatooɓe
To mi ɗon laara asamanji, kuugal juuɗe ma,
non boo lewru e koode ɗe njo'inɗa ton
kadi, neɗɗo o moy haa ciftora mo,
moy woni ɓii-Aadama haa kakkilana mo?
A waɗi mo mawɗo, sey an ɓuri mo.
A ɓorni mo tedduŋgal e maŋngu
A laamini mo dow kuuɗe juuɗe ma,
a wallini koo ɗume fuu les kosɗe maako:
Dammooji e na'i, fuu hawtaade, non boo kuuje ladde,
colli piiranɗi e liɗɗi e ko tokkoto laabi ndiyam nder beeli fuu.
Yaa Allah Jawmiraawo amin,
innde ma nde mawnde masin dow lesdi fuu!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime, fodde daande “mut labben”
Mi yettete, yaa Jawmiraawo, bee ɓernde am fuu!
Mi limtan kaayeefiiji ɗi mbaɗɗa fuu!
Mi seyorto ma, mi welweltan,
mi yimndete, an Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo!
Konne'en am fuu loroto ɓaawo,
ɓe pergoto, ɓe kalka haa yeeso ma.
Ngam a waŋgini gooŋga am, a gooŋɗini yam,
a ɗon jooɗi dow leeso laamu ma,
a kiitoowo adiliijo.
A furkiti ummaatooje, a nattini halluɓe,
a wili inɗe maɓɓe haa abada abadin.
Konne'en njinni,
a nastini ɓe nder halkere duumiinde,
a yibbini berniiji maɓɓe,
walaa mo siftorta ɗi.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon laamo haa foroy,
o tabitini leeso laamu maako ngam kiita.
O ɗon laamano duniyaaru bee adilaaku,
o ɗon hiito ummaatooje kiita ndarnuka.
Jawmiraawo woni hisrude townde ngam toonyaaɓe,
o hisnan ɓe wakkatiiji ɓillaare.
Annduɓe innde ma ɗon koolo ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
ngam ɓadititɓe ma fuu, a wudintaa ɓe, yaa Jawmiraawo.
Jawmiraawo ɗon jooɗi haa Siyona, ngimane mo yettoore,
ngooyne kuuɗe maako mawɗe caka ummaatooje fuu.
Kaŋko woni baatoowo ƴiiƴam toonyaaɓe,
o ɗon siftora ɓe,
o yejjitittaa gookaali toskaaɓe.
Hinnam, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Laar suno ngo wanyɓe yam ukkani yam!
Mi yottake dammugal joonde maayɓe, hisnam,
ngam haa mi daro haa dammuɗe Urusaliima,
mi yecca daliila maŋgtooje am fuu,
mi ɗon bee seyo ngam a hisni yam.
Yimɓe ummaatooje heefeerɓe ngasi ngaska, ammaa ɓe ndo'i nder maaka.
Ɓe tuufni tuuforgol, ɓe nyukkini ngol, ammaa ngol naŋngi kosɗe maɓɓe.
Jawmiraawo waŋgini hoore mum, waɗi kiita,
halluɓe naŋngaama nder dabareeji muuɗum'en kalluɗi.
Sey halluɓe lorto haa joonde maayɓe,
heefeerɓe yejjitɓe Allah fuu loroto ton.
Ammaa laafuɗo yejjitittaake haa foroy,
tammunde toonyaaɓe majjataa haa foroy.
Umma, yaa Jawmiraawo! Taa neɗɗo heɓa jaalorgal!
Sey yimɓe ummaatooje kiite haa yeeso ma.
Hulnu ɓe, yaa Jawmiraawo,
haa ɓe anndita ɓe ɓiɓɓe Adaama tan.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam ɗume ndaayiiɗa?
Ngam ɗume cuuɗotooɗa nder wakkatiiji ɓillaare?
Kalluɗo mawniti, ɗon toonyo laafuɗo.
Accu dabareeji maako ndo'a mo.
Kalluɗo ɗon mantoro suunooji mum.
Cuunaaɗo riba ɗon hallina Jawmiraawo, ɗon yawo mo.
Kalluɗo mawniti, ɗon wi'a:
“Walaa mo hiitoto yam, Allah walaa!”
Bana nii numooji kalluɗo mba'i.
Ko o waɗata fuu, timman jam.
Kiitaaji ma njottataa mo,
o ɗon jala konne'en maako fuu.
O ɗon numa nder ɓernde maako:
“Walaa ko dimmbintammi, sarru heɓataa yam sam.”
Hunnduko maako heewi naalooje
e pewe e toonyaare,
ɗemŋgal maako ɗon wolwa haala halleende e sarru
O nyukkoto kommbi gure,
o waaltano yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe,
haa o mbara ɓe.
Gite maako ɗon njurno tampuɓe,
o ɗon waaltano laafuɓe nder nyukkorde bana mbarooga nder lowol maaga.
O ɗon waaltano laafuɓe,
haa o naŋnga ɓe bee tuuforgol maako.
O ɗon roŋŋino, leesna hoore maako,
tampuɓe ɗon ndo'o les baawɗe maako.
Kalluɗo ɗon numa nder ɓernde mum:
“Allah yejjiti!
O ɗon wiirna yeeso maako, o yi'ataa yam sam.”
Umma, yaa Jawmiraawo, ɓaŋgtu juŋngo ma!
Allah am, taa yejjitit toskaaɓe.
Koni kalluɗo yawoto ma?
Koni o numata a hiitataako mo?
A yi'i ɗum,
ngam a ɗon laara torra e bone yimɓe,
a taaskake wallugo ɓe.
Tampuɗo halfinan hoore mum haa juŋngo ma,
ngam an woni balloowo atiime'en fuu.
Yew juŋngo kalluɗo, baɗoowo zunuuba,
hiita halleende maako, taa ɗum meeta waŋgugo.
Jawmiraawo woni laamiiɗo haa abada abadin,
heefeerɓe timmi diga lesdi maako.
A ɗon nana tornde toskaaɓe, yaa Jawmiraawo,
a ɗon tiɗɗina ɓerɗe maɓɓe, a ɗon heɗito ɓe,
ngam gooŋɗingo atiimeejo e toonyaaɗo,
ngam taa neɗɗo mbulwuldiijo meeta hulnugo goɗɗo!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Jawmiraawo woni nyukkorde am.
Koni mbi'oton yam: “Doggu haa kooseeje bana sonndu!
Ndaa halluɓe tiri lagaaje muuɗum'en,
njo'ini kuri dow jiriiji,
cuuɗi nder nyiɓre ngam fiɗugo gooŋɗa-ɓerɗe'en.
To hoolaare e gooŋgaaku mbirgaama,
ɗume adiliijo waawata waɗugo?”
Jawmiraawo ɗon nder haykaliiru mum seniindu,
leeso laamu Jawmiraawo ɗon haa asama.
Gite maako ɗon ndaara,
ɗon linya kuuɗe ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
Jawmiraawo ɗon linya ɓerɗe adili'en e halluɓe fuu,
ɓernde maako ɗon wanya yiɗɓe toonyaare.
O rufan ƴulɓe yiite e baruudu
o neldan henndu wulndu jaw dow maɓɓe,
kanjum woni geɗal maɓɓe.
Ngam Jawmiraawo o adiliijo, o yiɗi kuuɗe adiliije,
gooŋɗa ɓerɗe'en ngi'oyan mo.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime bee moolooji marɗi ɓoggi joweetati.
Yimre Daawuda.
Hisnam, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam hoolaaɓe njinni,
gooŋga'en tawataake caka ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
Yimɓe ɗon pewindira, ɓe ɗon mbolwindira bolle rikiciije,
koo moy fuu bee ɓerɗe ɗiɗi.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, ta'u ɗemɗe maɓɓe naafikiije
e kunnduɗe maɓɓe ƴaggiiɗe.
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Min mbolwan ko min ngiɗi,
walaa mo haɗata min. Moy mari min?”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Jonta kam mi ummoto,
ngam ɓe ɗon toonyo laafuɓe, talaka'en ɗon uumo.
Yenwuɓe kisndam am, mi hisnan ɓe.”
Bolle Jawmiraawo,
ɗe laaɓɗe bana cardi laaɓndi,
ɓolinaandi nde joweeɗiɗi nder ɓolinirde.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, an a aynan laafuɓe,
a hisnan min diga yidere hallunde nde'e ngam foroy.
Halluɓe ɗon ngaanca koo toy,
halleende ɗuuɗi caka ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, haa ndey a tokkoto yejjititgo yam?
Haa ndey a tokkoto suuɗango yam yeeso ma?
Haa ndey numooji tokkoto torrugo yam,
haa ndey ɓernde am tokkoto mettugo kala nyalaade fuu?
Haa ndey konneejo am tokkoto jaalaago yam?
Laaram, jaabam, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah am!
Yaynan gite am, ngam taa mi ɗaano mi maaya,
ngam taa konneejo am wi'a o jaalake yam,
toonyooɓe yam keɓataa seyoraago do'ere am.
Min kam mi ɗon hoolo mbooɗeeŋga ma,
mi welweltan ngam a hisni yam.
Mi yimanan Jawmiraawo ngam o woonani yam.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Faataaɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Allah walaa!”
Fakat, ɓe mbonnake, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa ko nyiddi.
Walaa baɗanɗo ko wooɗi.
Diga asama, Jawmiraawo jimmiti, o ɗon laara ɓiɓɓe Aadama,
haa o yi'a to woodi marɗo hakkiilo,
ɓaditanɗo Allah.
Ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe celi laawol gooŋga, ɓe mbonnake.
Walaa baɗanɗo ko wooɗi, walaa koo gooto
Waɗooɓe zunuuba ɓe'e fuu,
ngalaa hakkiilo na?
Ɓe ɗon nyaama ummaatoore am
bana nyaamugo nyaamdu,
ammaa ɓe ewnataa innde Jawmiraawo.
Fakat, ɓe ndiwnan daliila kulol,
ngam Allah ɗon caka adili'en.
On ɗon meeriɗina nufayeeje laafuɓe,
ammaa Jawmiraawo woni hisrude maɓɓe.
Moy hokkata kisndam haa Isra'iila diga Siyona?
To Jawmiraawo wartiri ummaatoore muuɗum diga jeyaaŋgu,
nden kam danygol Yaakubu welweltan, Isra'iila seyoto.
Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, moy jaɓɓeteeɗo nder suudu laymaaru ma?
Moy jooɗoto dow hooseere ma seniinde?
Sey mo laatake timmuɗo nder yahdu mum, baɗanɗo adilaaku,
bolwanɗo gooŋga bee ɓernde woore.
O waɗataa tufle,
o waɗataa soobaajo maako kalluɗum,
o hallintaa keeddiɗɗiraawo maako.
O yawoto mo Allah wudini,
ammaa o teddinan hulɓe Jawmiraawo.
O hebbinan kunayeeje maako,
koo to ɗum waɗan mo asar.
O hokkataa nyamaande bee ndiyam,
o jaɓataa ngeenaari ngam zammbaago mo walaa aybe.
Baɗanɗo bana non dimmbataako haa foroy.
Yimre Daawuda.
Aynam, yaa Allah, ngam mi nyukkake haa maaɗa.
Mi ɗon wi'a Jawmiraawo: “An woni Jawmam,
hayru am fuu iwi haa maaɗa.”
Senaaɓe Jawmiraawo nder lesdi ndi'i, ɓe tedduɓe,
mi ɗon seyoro ɓe masin.
Ɗakkotirɓe bee ɗowanteeɓe jananɓe njaran boneeji ɗuuɗɗi,
min mi rufantaa ɓe dokke ƴiiƴam,
hunnduko am ewnataa inɗe maɓɓe sam.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni geɗal am e maral am,
a ɗon tabitina hayru am.
Maral ngal keɓmi wooɗi masin,
ngal ɗon fottanammi.
Mi ɗon maŋgta Jawmiraawo ɗowoowo yam,
jemmaaje fuu ɓernde am ɗon reentinammi
Gite am ɗon tiiti Jawmiraawo tum,
nde nii o ɗon dari haa nyaamo am, mi dimmbataako.
Ngam maajum ɓernde am ɗon seyo,
nafsu am ɗon welwelta,
ɓanndu am boo ɗon jooɗi nder de'ere.
Ngam a accataa yoŋki am haa joonde maayɓe,
a accataa kooliiɗo ma nyola nder ngaska lugguka
A sappintam laawol ngeendam,
seyo ɗuuɗŋgo ɗon haa yeeso ma,
welwelooji duumiiɗi ɗon haa juŋngo ma
Do'aare Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, nan haala am adiliiha,
heɗita gookaali am,
jaɓ tornde nde toriimi bilaa naafikaare!
Kiita maaɗa gooŋɗinammi,
gite ma ngi'a gooŋgaaku!
A linyi ɓernde am,
jemma fuu a wari haa am,
a foondi yam, a tawaay aybe.
Mi wolwataa dow kuuɗe ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
Mi ɗowtani bolle ma, mi tokkaaki laabi toonyooɓe.
Mi ɗon tabiti dow laawol ma,
kosɗe am pergataako.
Mi ɗon ewno ma, ngam a nanatam, yaa Allah am.
Waylitanam noppi ma, heɗita bolle am!
Waŋgin kuuɗe ma booɗɗe, kaayeefiije, yaa Kisnoowo!
Nyaamo ma hisnan nyukkotooɓe haa ma diga juuɗe konne'en muuɗum'en.
Aynam bana aynirta ɓiŋngel yiitere ma!
Suuɗam les bileeji ma!
Hisnam diga juuɗe halluɓe yiɗɓe halkugo yam,
e juuɗe konne'en haaŋaaɓe taariiɓe yam!
Ɓe caatini ɓerɗe maɓɓe,
kunnduɗe maɓɓe ɗon mbolwa bolle mawnitiiɗe.
Ɓe taasni yam, ɓe taari yam,
ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓa wakkatiire fottannde ngam do'ugo yam.
Ɓe nanndi bee mbarooga cuunaaŋga faɗɗugo huunde,
bana mbarooga cemmbiɗŋga mbaaltiiŋga haa lowol maaga.
Umma, yaa Jawmiraawo, dartana konne'en am, do'u ɓe!
Bee kaafahi ma, hisnam juuɗe halluɓe!
Bee juŋngo maaɗa, yaa Jawmiraawo, hisnam juuɗe yimɓe!
Kamɓe ɓe keɓi ko ɓe ngiɗi fuu
yaake ɓe ɗon haa duniyaaru.
Hebbin deeɗi maɓɓe bee boneeji
ɗi ke'i haarnugo ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe boo,
kamɓe boo ɓe accana ɓikkoy maɓɓe ko lutti.
Ammaa min mi adiliijo, mi yi'ete.
To mi fini, mi seyoto ngam a waŋgantam.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda, jaggiiɗo Jawmiraawo. O yimani Jawmiraawo yimre nde'e nyalaade nde Jawmiraawo hisni mo diga juuɗe konne'en maako fuu e diga juŋngo Sawulu. O wi'i:
Mi yiɗi ma masin, yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni semmbe am!
Yaa Jawmiraawo,
an woni tapaare suuɗirde am,
an woni suudu am semmbiɗndu,
an woni kisnoowo yam.
Yaa Allah am, an woni tapaare hisrude am haa nyukkotoomi,
an woni wawarde
an woni kisnoowo yam cemmbiɗɗo, hisrude am townde.
Mi tori Jawmiraawo, kaŋko o hisni yam.
Yettoore laatano mo!
Waade haɓɓi yam bee ɓoggi maare,
maaje halkere kulni yam.
Mi nasti tuuforli joonde maayɓe,
waade taari yam bee kaɓɓorli maare.
Nder ɓillaare am toriimi Jawmiraawo,
mi wookani Allah am.
Diga haykaliiru maako o nani sawtu am,
gookaali am njotti noppi maako.
Nden lesdi dimmbi, diwni.
Caɓɓaaje kooseeje ndiwni, ndimmbi
ngam tikkere maako.
Cuurɗe ngurti haa kine maako,
yiite nyaamooye wurti haa hunnduko maako, jamni ƴulɓe.
O wuuri asama, o jippi,
duule ɓaleeje ɗon les kosɗe maako.
O wa'i dow keruba,
o fiiri, o leeri dow henndu.
O suuɗi nder nyiɓre,
o moji duule ɓaleeje tekkuɗe, bana ndiyam lugguɗam.
Duule ɓaleeje e mallimallooje e ƴulɓe yiite
iwi haa jayŋgol ardiiŋgol mo.
Jawmiraawo telɓi haa asama, bana felmaaŋgo.
Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo towni sawtu mum.
Mallimallooje e ƴulɓe yiite ngurti.
O fiɗi kuri maako, o saŋkiti konne'en maako.
O sakkini ma'e, o hulni ɓe.
Ndiyamji beeli ceeki, les maaji waŋgi,
caɓɓaaje duniyaaru cudditaama
ngam daliila telɓuki ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
ngam poofɗe tikkere gurtiiɗe haa kine ma.
Diga dow, Jawmiraawo forti juŋngo mum,
naŋngi yam, wurtini yam ndiyam lugguɗam.
O hisni yam juuɗe konneejo am cemmbiɗɗo
e juuɗe wanyɓe yam ɓurɓe yam semmbe.
Nyalaade sarru am ɓe ukkani yam,
ammaa Jawmiraawo jogi yam, ngam taa mi do'o.
O wurtini yam ɓillaare,
o hisni yam, ngam o yerdi yam.
Jawmiraawo warji yam fodde adilaaku am,
o woonani yam ngam o anndi kuuɗe am ɗe laaɓɗe.
Ngam mi tokki laabi Jawmiraawo,
mi waɗaay aybe dow Allah am,
mi waylitanaay mo ɓaawo.
Mi ɗowtani kiitaaji maako fuu,
mi luutaay farillaaji maako.
Mi walaa aybe yeeso maako,
mi reenti taa mi waɗa hakke.
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo warji yam fodde adilaaku am,
ngam o anndi kuuɗe am ɗe laaɓɗe.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, a adiliijo haa adili'en,
a booɗɗo haa wooɗɓe,
a laaɓɗo haa laaɓɓe,
ammaa haa faasiki'en, a ɗon hollita ɓe hikma ma.
Ngam a hisnan ummaatoore leestinaande,
ammaa a leesnan mawnitiiɓe.
An Jawmiraawo yayninta pittirla am.
Allah am ɗon yayna nyiɓre haa ngonmi.
Bee ballal ma mi ukkanto mooɓre konne'en,
bee Allah am ndiwanmi mahol boo.
Laawol Allah, ngol timmuŋgol,
wolde Jawmiraawo laaɓi tal.
O wawarde suuɗotooɓe haa maako.
Jawmiraawo meeɗen feere muuɗum woni Allah,
Allah meeɗen tan woni tapaare hisrude.
Allah hokki yam semmbe,
waɗani yam laawol darnuŋgol.
O laatini kosɗe am bana ɗe lelwa,
o tabitini yam dow towndiije
O ekkitini juuɗe am haɓre,
haa mi tira koo lagaawal njamndi bee juuɗe am boo.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, kisndam ma ɗon aynammi bana wawarde
nyaamo ma walli yam,
hinnuye ma mawnini yam.
A yaajini babal am, mi ɗon waanca nder feecaare,
kolɓule am ndimmbataako.
Mi taasni konne'en am, mi jokki ɓe,
mi lorataako sey to mi nattini ɓe fuu.
Mi do'i ɓe, ɓe ummitittaako,
ɓe mbaalake les kosɗe am.
A hokki yam semmbe ngam haɓre,
haa mi jaalo konne'en am.
A lorni konne'en am ɓaawo,
mi nattini wanyɓe yam.
Ɓe ngooki,
ammaa walaa mo walli ɓe.
Ɓe ewni Jawmiraawo, ammaa o jaabaaki ɓe.
Mi ɗiggini ɓe, haa ɓe laati bana mbulwuldi
ndi henndu ruuynata.
Mi yaaɓi ɓe bana loope dow laawol.
A hisni yam jokkirli ummaatoore,
a waɗi yam laamiiɗo ummaatooje,
jama'aare nde mi anndaano huuwantam.
Nde ɓe nani habaru am, ɓe ɗowtani yam,
jananɓe tefi fottango yam bee bolle belɗe.
Jananɓe tampi,
ɓe ngurti kisruɗe maɓɓe bee diwŋgol.
Jawmiraawo o geeto!
Yettoore laatano tapaare hisrude am!
Maŋgtoore laatano Allah Kisnoowo yam!
Allah o baatoowo konne'en am,
o ɗowtinantam ummaatooje,
o kisnoowo yam diga juuɗe wanywanyɓe yam.
A dokkoowo yam jaalorgal dow konne'en am,
a kisnoowo yam diga juuɗe fitinooɓe yam.
Ngam maajum, yaa Jawmiraawo, mi yettete caka ummaatooje,
mi yiman maŋgtoore tedduŋgal innde ma
An, a hokki jaalorgal maŋngal haa laamiiɗo mo cuɓɗa,
a ɗon waɗa mbooɗeeŋga haa moytaaɗo ma,
Daawuda e danygol muuɗum haa foroy!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Asamanji ɗon anndina tedduŋgal Allah,
ɗi ɗon mbaŋgina kuugal juuɗe maako.
Nyalawmaare ɗon wooyna ɗum nyalawmaare warannde,
jemmaare boo ɗon faamtina ɗum jemmaare tokkotoonde.
Walaa koŋngol, walaa bolle,
sawtu maaje nanataake.
Ammaa habaru maaje heewi lesɗe fuu,
haala maaje yotti keeri duniyaaru.
Allah waɗani naaŋge suudu laymaaru haa asamanji
nge wurtoto ndu bana sukaajo ɓaŋɗo wurtoto suudu mum,
nge tokkoto laawol maage bee seyo bana konoowo cemmbiɗɗo.
Nge fuɗan haa keerol asama ngo'ol,
nge taaroto haa yotto ngola,
walaa ko suuɗata haa nguli maage.
Tawreeta Jawmiraawo ka timmuka,
ka hesɗitinan yoŋki.
Seedamku Jawmiraawo gooŋɗi,
ngu laatinan paataaɗo hikmaajo.
Sarɗiiji Jawmiraawo ɗi darnuɗi,
ɗi ceynan ɓernde.
Umroore Jawmiraawo laaɓi,
feernan gite.
Kulol Jawmiraawo laaɓi,
ngol duumoto haa foroy.
Kiitaaji Jawmiraawo ngooŋɗi,
ɗi fuu ɗi adiliiji.
Ɗi ɓuri kaŋŋeeri saman,
koo kaŋŋeeri cuɓaandi ɗuuɗndi boo.
Ɗi ɓuri njumri welugo,
koo njumri ɓurndi welugo boo.
Min jaggiiɗo ma boo ɗi ndeentini yam,
ɗowtanaago ɗi nafatam masin.
Moy waawata anndugo boofi mum?
Yaafanam hakkeeji am cuuɗiiɗi.
Aynu jaggiiɗo ma diga mawnitaare,
taa nde laamano yam.
Nden kam mi laatoto timmuɗo,
mi marataa aybewol maŋngol.
Yerda bolle hunnduko am
e numooji ɓernde am, yaa Jawmiraawo,
an woni tapaare hisrude am, dimɗinoowo yam.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Jawmiraawo jaabo tornde ma nder wakkati ɓillaare,
Allah mo Yaakubu ayne!
O neldane ballal diga haykaliiru maako,
o semmbiɗine diga hooseere Siyona!
O siftora dokke ma fuu,
o yerda guleteeɗi ma boo!
O hokke ko ɓernde ma yiɗi,
o hebbitina nufayeeje ma fuu!
Nden kam min ngooka daliila seyo,
ngam jaalorgal ma. Min ɓaŋgtan tuutawal innde Allah meeɗen.
Jawmiraawo jaabo torɗe ma fuu!
Jonta mi anndi Jawmiraawo woni kisnoowo laamiiɗo mo o suɓi,
o jaaboto mo diga haykaliiru maako seniindu haa asamanji,
o wallan mo bee nyaamo maako marŋgo baawɗe.
Woɗɓe ɗon koolo mootaaji pucci muuɗum'en,
woɗɓe boo ɗon koolo pucci muuɗum'en.
Ammaa enen, en ɗon koolo innde Allah Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
Kamɓe ɓe nyobboto, ɓe ndo'oto,
ammaa enen, en ndaroto, en tabitan.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, hisnu laamiiɗo.
Nyalaade min toroto ma, jaaba min!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, laamiiɗo ɗon seyo ngam daliila semmbe ma.
O ɗon seyo masin daliila kisndam ma.
A hokki mo ko ɓernde maako yiɗi, a salanaaki mo ko o tori ma.
A hokki mo barkaaji pantuɗi,
a hippi mo woronnde kaŋŋeeri laaɓndi.
O tori ma ngeendam, a hokki mo ɗam.
A juttini balɗe maako haa abada abadin.
Tedduŋgal maako mawni ngam daliila kisndam ma,
a hokki mo maŋngu e daraja.
A barkiɗini mo haa foroy,
a ɗon seyna mo ngam a ɗon wondi bee maako.
Laamiiɗo ɗon hoolo Jawmiraawo,
o dimmbataako ngam daliila mbooɗeeŋga Ɓaŋiiɗo.
Juŋngo ma naŋngan konne'en ma fuu,
nyaamo ma naŋngan wanyɓe ma.
Nyalaade nde a waŋgata, a laatinan ɓe bana yiite ɓolinirde.
Jawmiraawo moɗan ɓe nder ɓernuki muuɗum.
Yiite nyaaman ɓe.
A nattinan ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe diga lesdi,
a halkan danygol maɓɓe caka ɓiɓɓe Aadama.
Koo to ɓe nufani ma kalluɗum, koo to ɓe kaɓɓi dabare dow maaɗa,
ɓe mbaawataa wurnugo ɗum.
Ngam a lornan ɓe ɓaawo, a tiitinan kuri ma dow maɓɓe.
Umma, yaa Jawmiraawo, waŋgin semmbe ma!
Minin min ngiman, min maŋgtan baawɗe ma.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime fodde daande “Lelwa wakkati baɓɓol”.
Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Allah am, yaa Allah am, ngam ɗume a wudini yam?
Mi wooki ngam haa a hisnammi, ammaa a daayotiri bee am
Yaa Allah am, mi ɗon wookane nyalawma, a jaabataako.
Mi ɗon wooka jemma boo,
ammaa mi heɓataa siwtaare!
Alhaali boo, an woni Ceniiɗo, a ɗon jooɗi dow leeso laamu ma,
Isra'iila'en fuu ɗon ngimane maŋgtooje.
Kaakiraaɓe amin ɗonno kooli ma,
ɓe kooli ma, an boo a hisni ɓe.
Ɓe ngookani ma, a hisni ɓe ɓillaare,
ɓe kooli ma, an boo a semtinaay ɓe.
Ammaa min mi ngilŋgu, naa mi ɓii-Aadamaajo.
Yimɓe fuu ɗon kuɗammi, ɗon meeriɗinammi.
Yi'ɓe yam fuu ɗon njancammi,
ɗon njalammi, ɗon ndimmbina ko'e
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Naa o hooli Jawmiraawo!
Nden kam, o hisna mo kadi,
nde nii o yiɗi mo
An wurtini yam reedu daada am,
an ayni yam jam diga mi ɗonno musina tawon.
A ɗon jogi yam diga danyeeki am,
diga reedu daada am, an woni Allah am.
Taa daaytu bee am, ngam ɓillaare ɓadake,
walaa goɗɗo wallatammi!
Konne'en semmbiɗɓe bana ga'i kalhali taari yam,
mooɓre maɓɓe ɓiɗɗotiri dow am
bana dabbaaji lesdi Baasan cemmbiɗɗi.
Ɓe ɗon maɓɓita kunnduɗe maɓɓe bana barooɗe,
ɓe ɗon ubba, ɓe ngiɗi seekugo yam.
Semmbe am jinni,
majji bana ndiyam ndufaaɗam haa lesdi.
I'e am fuu cokkitake,
ɓernde am ɓolwi nder reedu am bana taari.
Kondondol am yoori bana fayannde loope yoornde,
ɗemŋgal am ɗon takko nder hunnduko am,
a wallini yam nder mbulwuldi bana maayɗo.
Halluɓe taari yam,
ɓe ɓiɗɗotiri dow am bana dawaaɗi.
Ɓe cumpiti juuɗe am e kosɗe am.
Mi foo'i, mi waawi limugo i'e am fuu,
konne'en am ɗon cutammi, ɗon purkitammi.
Ɓe ɗon cennda limce am hakkunde maɓɓe,
ɓe ɗon mbaɗa kur'u ngam heɓtugo
mo hoosata limce am.
Ammaa an, yaa Jawmiraawo, taa daayu bee am!
An woni semmbe am, yaawɗa wallugo yam!
Hisnam, taa kaafahi mbarammi!
Hisnu yoŋki am diga dawaaɗi ɗi'i!
Hisnam hunnduko mbarooga,
hisnam diga luwe bani!
A jaabi yam!
Mi wooynan innde ma caka deerɗiraaɓe,
mi maŋgtan innde ma nder mooɓtorde maɓɓe
Onon hulɓe Jawmiraawo, maŋgte mo!
Onon danygol Yaakubu fuu, teddine mo!
Onon danygol Isra'iila fuu, ndiwne yeeso maako!
Ngam o yawaaki laafuɗo, o yawnaay laafere mum.
O wiirnanaay mo gite,
nde o wookani mo, o jaabi mo boo.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, haa maaɗa maŋgtooje am nder mooɓtorde mawnde iwi,
yeeso hulɓe ma kebbinanmi togayeeje am.
Yaŋkiniiɓe nyaaman, kaaran.
Ɗakkotiranɓe bee Jawmiraawo maŋgtan mo,
ɓe ngeeɗa haa foroy!
Ummaatooje keeri duniyaaru fuu ciftoran Jawmiraawo,
ɓe lortoto haa maako,
le'i ummaatooje fuu cujidanan mo.
Ngam Jawmiraawo woni laamiiɗo,
o ɗon laamano ummaatooje.
Marɓe baawɗe duniyaaru fuu nyaaman, ɓe cujidanan mo boo
maayanɓe fuu tugganan mo koppi,
ɓe mbaawataa juttingo balɗe maɓɓe.
Danygol maɓɓe jagganto Jawmiraawo.
Yimɓe anndinan yidere warannde haala maako.
Ɓe anndinan ummaatoore nde siwaa danyeego
kuuɗe adilaaku ɗe o huuwi.
Yimre Daawuda.
Jawmiraawo woni gaynaako am,
mi sooyataa koo ɗume.
O ɗon siwtinammi haa durduɗe kecce,
o ɗon yahrammi haa nokkuure siwtorde baŋnge ndiyam
O ɗon semmbiɗina yoŋki am,
o ɗon ɗowammi dow laawol darnuŋgol
ngam tedduŋgal innde maako.
Koo to mi nasti waadiwol nyiɓre nyiɓɓunde,
mi hulataa sarru sam,
ngam an, yaa Jawmiraawo, a ɗon wondi bee am,
sawru ma ɗon de'itinammi.
A ɗon nyaamnammi nyaamdu woondu, welndu,
yeeso konne'en am.
A ɗon wujo hoore am bee nebbam uurɗam
a ɗon hebbina jardugel am haa ɗon rufa.
Fakat hayru e mbooɗeeŋga ɗoftatam nder ngeendam am fuu,
mi jooɗoto nder suudu Jawmiraawo haa fodde balɗe am fuu.
Yimre Daawuda.
Jawmiraawo mari lesdi e ko hebbini ndi fuu,
non boo duniyaaru e jooɗiiɓe nder maaru fuu
Ngam kaŋko jo'ini ndu dow beeli,
o tabitini ndu dow ndiyamji.
Moy heɓata wa'aago hooseere Jawmiraawo?
Moy heɓata daraago haa nokkuure maako seniinde?
Mo juuɗe mum e ɓernde mum laaɓi,
mo nufataako kuuje meereeje,
mo hunataako dow fewre
Jawmiraawo barkiɗinan mo,
Allah Kisnoowo mo adilinan mo.
Yimɓe bana maako ngoni ɓaditittooɓe Jawmiraawo,
ɗakkotiranɓe bee Allah mo Yaakubu.
Dammuɗe, ndare,
pareeje ɓooymaaje, towe,
haa laamiiɗo tedduɗo nasta!
Moy woni laamiiɗo tedduɗo oo?
Ɗum Jawmiraawo, cemmbiɗɗo, baawɗo,
Jawmiraawo baawɗo nder haɓre.
Dammuɗe, ndare,
pareeje ɓooymaaje, towe,
haa laamiiɗo tedduɗo nasta!
Moy woni laamiiɗo tedduɗo oo?
Ɗum Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama,
kaŋko woni laamiiɗo tedduɗo!
Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi halfitini ma yoŋki am.
Yaa Allah am, mi hoolake ma, taa mi tosko!
Taa konne'en am njaalo yam.
Hoolotooɓe ma fuu toskataako,
ammaa tuurtuɓe dow ma, kamɓe toskoto.
Anndinam laabi ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
ekkitinam ɗi.
Ɗowam dow laawol gooŋga ma, ekkitinam,
ngam an woni Allah Kisnoowo yam.
Mi ɗon tammore nyalɗe fuu.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, siftor enɗam ma e mbooɗeeŋga ma.
Ɗum waŋgi diga ɓooyma.
Taa siftor hakkeeji nderkaaku am e tuurtolji am.
Ammaa siftoram fodde mbooɗeeŋga ma,
ngam a booɗɗo, yaa Jawmiraawo.
Jawmiraawo o booɗɗo, gooŋgaajo,
o ɗon sappina hakke'en laawol booɗŋgol.
O ɗon ɗowa yaŋkiniiɓe nder adilaaku,
o ɗon anndina ɓe laawol maako.
Laabi Jawmiraawo fuu ɗi booɗɗi e gooŋɗuɗi
ngam ɗowtaniiɓe alkawal e seedamkuuji maako.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam daliila innde ma,
yaafanam aybeeji am, ngam ɗi ɗuuɗɗi.
Woodi kulɗo Jawmiraawo na?
Jawmiraawo sappinan mo laawol ngol o suɓata.
Hayru laatanto mo foroy,
ɓiɓɓe maako ndonan lesdi.
Jawmiraawo ɗon anndina hulɓe ɗum sirriiji muuɗum,
o faamtinan ɓe alkawal ngal o haɓɓi bee maɓɓe.
Foroy gite am ɗon tiito Jawmiraawo,
ngam kaŋko wurtinta kosɗe am diga tuuforgol.
Waylita gal am! Hinnam!
Ngam mi feere am, mi toskaaɗo.
Ɓillaare am mawni masin,
hisnam caɗeele am fuu!
Laar jurumɗum am e torraaji am,
yaafanam hakkeeji am fuu!
Laar konne'en am, ɓe ɗuuɗɓe,
ɓe ɗon nganyammi bee nganyŋgu caatuŋgu.
Aynu yoŋki am, hisnam!
Taa mi tosko, ngam haa maaɗa nyukkiimi.
Laaɓeeŋga e gooŋgaaku aynammi,
ngam mi ɗon tammoro ma.
Yaa Allah, rimɗin Isra'iila'en,
hisnu ɓe diga ɓillaaje maɓɓe fuu!
Yimre Daawuda.
Gooŋɗinam, yaa Jawmiraawo,
ngam mi laaɓɗo,
mi hooli Jawmiraawo, mi dimmbataako sam!
Linyam, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Foondu gooŋgaaku am!
Lincitu numooji am e anniyaaji ɓernde am!
Ngam tum mi ɗon siftora mbooɗeeŋga ma,
mi ɗon tokko gooŋgaaku ma.
Mi jooɗodottaako bee faasiki'en,
mi waancidittaa bee naafiki'en.
Mi ɗon wanya mooɓtorde waɗooɓe zunuuba,
mi jooɗataako caka halluɓe.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi lootan juuɗe am
ngam waŋgingo mi walaa aybe.
Mi taaroto hirsirde ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
ngam haa mi yima maŋgtoore ma bee sawtu,
mi seedo kaayeefiiji ma fuu.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi yiɗi suudu ma, haa njooɗiiɗa
e jooɗorde tedduŋgal ma.
Taa laaram bana ndaardata hakke'en,
taa laaram bana ndaardata rufooɓe ƴiiƴam.
Juuɗe maɓɓe ɗon mbaɗa zunuuba,
nyaamo koo moy maɓɓe heewi ngeenaari zammba.
Ammaa min kam, mi laaɓɗo.
Rimɗinam, mo'anam!
Kosɗe am ɗon ndari haa nokkuure tabitnde,
mi maŋgtan Jawmiraawo nder mooɓtorɗe jama'aare mum.
Yimre Daawuda.
Jawmiraawo woni annoora am e kisndam am,
moy kulanmi?
Jawmiraawo woni hisrude yoŋki am,
moy waawata hulnugo yam?
To halluɓe ukkanake yam, ngiɗi nyaamugo yam,
konne'en am e wanywanyɓe am,
kamɓe pergoto, ndo'oto.
To jama'aare konu saŋnginake yeeso am, mi hultortaa.
Koo to konu ukkanake yam,
ɓernde am ta'ataa sam.
Huunde woore toriimi Jawmiraawo:
Mi heɓa jooɗaago nder suudu maako balɗe am fuu,
mi seyoro tedduŋgal maako belŋgal,
mi yerdo haykaliiru maako.
Ngam nyalaade sarru o suuɗatam nder suudu maako,
o aynatam nder laymaaru maako,
o darnatam dow tapaare.
Jonta hoore am ɓaŋgake dow konne'en am taariiɓe yam,
mi lii'anto mo kirseteeɗi nder laymaaru maako bee gime seyo,
mi yiman, mi maŋgtan Jawmiraawo bee gime.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, nan tornde am!
Hinnam, jaabam!
Mi ɗon siftora a umri: Ɗakkotire bee am.
Ndaa mi ɗon ɗakkotira bee maaɗa, yaa Jawmiraawo
Taa wiirnam gite ma,
taa riiw jaggiiɗo ma bee tikkere!
Ngam an woni balloowo yam.
Taa accam, taa wudinam yaa Allah, Kisnoowo yam!
Koo to baaba am e daada am ngudini yam,
Jawmiraawo kam jaɓɓatam.
Anndinam laawol ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
ɗowam dow laawol booɗŋgol,
ngam daliila konne'en am.
Taa hokkam haa juuɗe konne'en am.
Ngam seedooɓe fewooɓe ɗon ndartano yam, ɗon mbaɗammi purka.
Fakat mi yi'an mbooɗeeŋga Jawmiraawo dow lesdi yeeɗɓe.
Tammora Jawmiraawo, laata cuusɗo!
Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma!
Tammora Jawmiraawo!
Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi ɗon toro ma.
An tapaare hisrude am, taa sukku noppi ma!
To a jeeɗake, mi laatoto bana gooto caka nastanɓe ngaska lugguka.
Nan torɗe am to mi wookani ma ngam tefugo ballal,
to mi ɓaŋgti juuɗe am gal nokkuure ma ɓurnde senaago!
Taa halkam hawtaade bee halluɓe e waɗooɓe zunuuba!
Ɓe ɗon mbolwana heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maɓɓe bolle belɗe,
ammaa halleende heewi ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Hiitu ɓe fodde kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe fuu!
Hiitu ɓe fodde kuuɗe ɗe juuɗe maɓɓe kuuwi!
Hokku ɓe ngeenaari kuuɗe maɓɓe
Ngam kamɓe ɓe paalataa kuuɗe Jawmiraawo
e ko juuɗe maako mbaɗi.
Ngam maajum o do'an ɓe, o ummintaa ɓe sam.
Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo,
ngam o nani torɗe am!
Jawmiraawo woni semmbe am e wawarde am,
ɓernde am ɗon hoolo mo.
O walli yam, ɓernde am ɗon seyo,
mi yettan mo bee yimre am.
Jawmiraawo woni semmbe ummaatoore mum,
kaŋko woni hisrude hisnannde laamiiɗo mo o suɓi ɗum.
Hisnu ummaatoore ma,
barkiɗin yimɓe ɓe marɗa!
Laata gaynaako maɓɓe e balloowo maɓɓe haa foroy!
Yimre Daawuda.
Onon ɗowanteeɓe, teddine Jawmiraawo!
Maŋgte tedduŋgal maako e baawɗe maako!
Teddine innde Jawmiraawo!
Cujidane mo saa'i o waŋginta senaare maako
Sawtu Jawmiraawo ɗon iida dow ndiyamji,
Allah tedduɗo ɗon telɓa bana felmaaŋgo,
o ɗon dow ndiyamji ɗuuɗɗi.
Sawtu Jawmiraawo ɗon bee baawɗe,
sawtu Jawmiraawo ɗon bee tedduŋgal.
Sawtu Jawmiraawo ɗon yewa leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe,
Jawmiraawo ɗon yewa leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe haa hooseere Libanon.
O diwnan Libanon bana nyalbel,
hooseere Hermoon boo bana mbana.
Sawtu Jawmiraawo ma'inan ma'e yiite.
Sawtu Jawmiraawo dimmbinan ladde hamaadaare,
Jawmiraawo dimmbinan ladde hamaadaare Kaades.
Sawtu Jawmiraawo rimnan lelji,
ɗoofdan leɗɗe laynde.
Koo moy nder laamorde maako fuu, ɗon hoola:
“Tedduŋgal laatano mo!”
Jawmiraawo ɗon jooɗi dow ilamji,
Jawmiraawo woni laamiiɗo duumiiɗo.
Jawmiraawo hokkan ummaatoore mum semmbe,
Jawmiraawo barkiɗinan nde, o hokkan nde salaaman.
Yimre Daawuda. Ngam cenki haykaliiru Allah.
Mi ɗon maŋgte, yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam a ummini yam,
a accaay konne'en am njalammi.
Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah am, mi wookani ma,
an a yamɗitini yam.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, a wurtini yam joonde maayɓe,
a yeeɗitini yam, a daayni yam bee nastanɓe ngaska.
Ngimane Jawmiraawo, onon hoolaaɓe maako!
Maŋgte innde maako seniinde!
Ngam tikkere maako neeɓataa sam,
ammaa mo'ere maako ɗon duura haa kaakaadi ngeendam fuu.
Maŋngariba, bojji ngaɗan,
ammaa fajiri, gookaali seyo.
Min, nde mi ɗonno jooɗi jam,
saa'i man mbi'mi: “Mi dimmbataako sam.”
Yaa Jawmiraawo, bee mo'ere ma, a tabitini hooseere am.
Ammaa saa'i a wiirni yam gite ma, mi hultori.
Mi wookani ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
yaa Allah am, mi tori ma ballal.
Mi wi'i: “Ko keɓata to mi maayi,
to mi nasti ngaska lugguka?
Laatiiɗo mbulwuldi maŋgtete na?
O waawan anndingo gooŋgaaku ma na?
Nanam, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Yurminam, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Laata balloowo yam!”
A wartiri suno am gamol seyo,
a ɓorti yam limce buhuuje,
a ɓorni yam ngapaleewol seyo.
Ngam maajum mi yimante, mi jeeɗataako!
Yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah am, mi maŋgtete haa foroy!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, haa maaɗa nyukkiimi,
taa accu mi semta sam!
Hisnam, ngam a adiliijo!
Heɗitam, yaawɗa hisnugo yam!
Laata tapaare hisnoore am,
laata suudu semmbiɗndu haa kisanmi!
Ngam an woni tapaare suuɗirde am e suudu am semmbiɗndu.
A ɗowatam, ngam daliila tedduŋgal innde ma.
A hisnatam tuuforgol ngol ɓe tuufnani yam,
ngam an woni hisrude am.
Mi ɗon halfina ruuhu am nder juŋngo ma.
A rimɗini yam, yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah gooŋgaajo
Mi ɗon wanya tokkiiɓe labbi meereeji,
ammaa mi ɗon hoolo Jawmiraawo.
Mi seyoto, mi welweltan daliila mbooɗeeŋga ma,
ngam a laari bone am,
a anndi caɗeele am.
A hokkaay yam haa juuɗe konneejo am,
a darni kosɗe am dow nokkuure feeciinde.
Hinnam, yaa Jawmiraawo! Ngam mi ɓilliiɗo,
gite am ɗon naawa ngam bojji am,
ɓanndu am e yoŋki am fuu tampi.
Suno siiɓi ngeendam am,
uumaali usti duuɓi am.
Mi tampuɗo ngam daliila aybe am,
koo i'e am boo tampi.
Konne'en am fuu ɗon njancammi,
sakkomaa heeddiɗɗiraaɓe am.
Annduɓe yam ɗon kultora daliila am.
Yi'anɓe yam dow laawol ɗon ndoggammi.
Yimɓe fuu ngejjiti yam bana maayɗo,
mi laati bana fayannde fusnde.
Mi ɗon nana ɗuuɗɓe ɗon nyo'ammi.
Kultoreeŋgol ɗon taari yam!
Ɓe ɗon carwootira dow am,
ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa dabare mbarugo yam.
Ammaa min mi hoolake ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
mi wi'i: An woni Allah am!
Balɗe am fuu ɗon haa juŋngo ma,
hisnam juuɗe konne'en am e toonyooɓe yam!
Laar jaggiiɗo ma bee yerduye!
Hisnam fodde mbooɗeeŋga ma!
Mi ɗon toro ma, yaa Jawmiraawo, taa mi tosko.
Toskin halluɓe ɓe'e, ngam haa ɓe njeeɗo, ɓe nasta joonde maayɓe!
Muukɗin fewooɓe ɓe'e,
hallinanɓe adiliijo bee elewre e meeriɗinaare!
Kay, mbooɗeeŋga ma ɗuuɗi!
A resani ɗum hulɓe ma,
a waɗani ɗum nyukkotooɓe haa maaɗa yeeso ɓiɓɓe Adaama fuu.
A suuɗan ɓe haa ngonɗa,
ngam taa dabareeji yimɓe meema ɓe.
A faddan ɓe ngam taa jokkirooɓe kuɗa ɓe.
Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo!
Ngam o waŋginani yam mbooɗeeŋga maako kaayeefiiwa,
min gonnooɗo nder berniwol kippaaŋgol.
Saa'i mi saklino, mi numno,
a riiwi yam daayiiɗum,
a yiɗaa yi'ugo yam.
Ammaa a nani tornde am,
nde mi wookani ma ngam ballal.
Ngiɗe Jawmiraawo, onon hoolaaɓe maako!
Jawmiraawo ɗon ayna gooŋga'en,
ammaa o hiitoto mawnitiiɓe bee caatal.
Cemmbiɗe, cuusɗine ɓerɗe mon,
onon tammoriiɓe Jawmiraawo fuu!
Yimre Daawuda ekkitinoore.
Seyo laatani goɗɗo mo Allah yaafake sooynde ɗowtaare mum e hakke mum fuu.
Seyo laatani goɗɗo mo Jawmiraawo limanaay ɗum aybeeji
mo naafikaare walaa haa ɓernde muuɗum.
Yaake mi waŋginaayno hakkeeji am,
i'e am ɗonno tampi daliila uumaali am nyalɗe fuu
Jemma e naaŋge fuu juŋngo ma teddani yam,
semmbe am jinni bana ndiyam nder ceeɗu.
Nden mi waŋginani ma hakke am,
mi suuɗaay aybe am.
Mi wi'i: “Sey mi waŋginana Jawmiraawo kuuɗe sooynde ɗowtaare am.”
An boo a yaafani yam aybeeji am fuu.
Ngam maajum, sey hoolaaɓe ma fuu toro ma
nder wakkatiire haandunde.
Koo to ndiyamji cemmbiɗɗi pacci,
ɗi njottataako ɓe
An woni nyukkorde am, a faddatam e ɓillaare,
a ɗon taarnammi bee gookaali seyo ngam a hisni yam.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi ekkitinte e mi sappinte laawol ngol a tokkoto,
mi ɗowete, mi aynete.
Taa laate bana puccu malla alfadariire
ɗum walaa faamu,
ɗum ɗowtantaako ma, sonaa to a dooli ɗum
bee labaŋgal e huuruure.”
Halluɓe njaran boneeji ɗuuɗɗi,
ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon woonana kooliiɗo ɗum.
Ceyore Jawmiraawo, onon adili'en,
onon laaɓa-ɓerɗe'en fuu, ngooke bee seyo!
Onon adili'en, maŋgte Jawmiraawo bee gookaali seyo,
ɗum pottuɗum gooŋga'en fuu ngimana mo gettooje.
Maŋgte Jawmiraawo bee moolooru,
ngimane mo bee hoodu marndu ɓoggi sappo.
Ngimane mo yimre hesre,
piye kuuje gimruɗe ɗe'e booɗɗum ngam maŋgtugo mo bee sawtu.
Ngam wolde Jawmiraawo nde darnunde,
kuuɗe maako fuu ɗe koolniiɗe.
O yiɗi adilaaku e kiita ngooŋɗuka,
mbooɗeeŋga Jawmiraawo heewi duniyaaru.
Jawmiraawo tagri asamanji bee wolde mum,
koode fuu bee poofɗe mum.
O mooɓti ndiyamji mbeela fuu bana diŋiwol,
o ɗon loowa ndiyamji lugguɗi nder cigorɗi.
Sey duniyaaru fuu hula Jawmiraawo,
yimɓe maaru fuu ndiwna yeeso maako!
Ngam ko o wolwi fuu laati.
Ko o umri fuu waɗi.
Jawmiraawo ɗon wila nufayeeje ummaatooje,
o ɗon nattina anniyaaji jama'aaje.
Ammaa nufayeeje Jawmiraawo ɗon tabiti haa foroy,
anniyaaji maako duumoto haa gide fuu.
Barka laatano ummaatoore nde Jawmiraawo woni Allah mum,
jama'aare nde o suɓi haa o mara nde!
Diga asama Jawmiraawo ɗon laara ɓiɓɓe Adaama fuu,
o ɗon yi'a ɓe.
Diga nokkuure nde o jooɗi,
o ɗon laara yimɓe duniyaaru fuu.
Kaŋko tagi ɓerɗe maɓɓe fuu,
o ɗon hakkilana kuuɗe maɓɓe fuu.
Walaa laamiiɗo mo hisata bee jama'aare konu ɗuuɗnde,
walaa konoowo cuusɗo mo hisata bee ɗuuɗeeŋga semmbe mum.
Hoolaago baawɗe pucci ngam heɓugo jaalorgal,
ɗum huunde meere,
no semmbe maaji ɗuuɗiri fuu, ɗi mbaawataa hisnugo.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon ayna hulɓe ɗum,
o ɗon ayna hoolotooɓe mbooɗeeŋga maako.
O hisnan yoŋkiiji maɓɓe e maayde,
o wuurnan ɓe nder wakkati weelo.
En ɗon tammoro Jawmiraawo,
kaŋko woni balloowo meeɗen, o wawarde meeɗen.
Ngam en ɗon ceyoro mo,
en ɗon koolo innde maako seniinde.
Nde min ɗon kooli ma, yaa Jawmiraawo,
mbooɗeeŋga ma wonda bee amin!
Daawuda waɗi hoore mum bana o ginnaaɗo yeeso Abimelek, Abimelek boo riiwi mo, o dilli. Ɓaawo maajum Daawuda yimi yimre nde'e
Mi yettan Jawmiraawo foroy,
mi accataa maŋgtugo mo sam.
Ɓernde am ɗon juroro Jawmiraawo,
yaŋkiniiɓe fuu ɗon nana ɗum, ɗon ceyoro ɗum.
Ngare, maŋgten Jawmiraawo,
teddinen innde maako en fuu!
Mi tori Jawmiraawo, o jaabi yam,
o rimɗini yam diga ko hulnatammi fuu.
Tijjotooɓe mo mbaŋginan welwelo muuɗum'en,
ɓe cemtintaake.
To laafuɗo wookani Jawmiraawo, o nanan,
o hisnan mo ɓillaaje maako fuu.
Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo ɗon ayna hulɓe mo,
o ɗon rimɗina ɓe.
Maate, ngi'e no Jawmiraawo o booɗɗo!
Barka laatanto nyukkotooɗo haa maako fuu
Kule Jawmiraawo, onon senaaɓe maako!
Ngam hulɓe mo cooyataa koo ɗume.
Koo barooɗe boo ɗon maata sooynde e weelo,
ammaa ɗakkotirɓe bee Jawmiraawo cooyataa hayru sam.
Onon ɓikkoy am, ngare, naneeɗam,
haa mi ekkitina on kulol Jawmiraawo:
Moy yiɗi seyoraago ngeendam? Moy yiɗi juutal balɗe e hayru?
Sey o acca wolwugo kalluka, o hakkilana ɗemŋgal maako,
taa o wolwa bolle faasikiije.
O daayo halleende, o waɗa mbooɗeeŋga,
o tiino ɗaɓɓugo salaaman.
Jawmiraawo ɗon ayna adili'en,
noppi maako ɗon keɗito gookaali maɓɓe.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon hona waɗooɓe zunuuba,
haa o nattina ciftorki inɗe maɓɓe haa lesdi
To adili'en torake Jawmiraawo, o nanan,
o wurtinan ɓe diga ɓillaaje maɓɓe fuu.
Jawmiraawo o ɓadiiɗo ta'a-ɓerɗe'en,
o hisnan ittuɓe tammunde fuu.
Adiliijo fottan bee boneeji ɗuuɗɗi,
ammaa Jawmiraawo hisnan mo diga maaji fuu.
Jawmiraawo aynan mo,
ngam taa i'al maako koo gootal yewa
Sarru mbaran kalluɗo,
wanyɓe adiliijo ɓe hiiteteeɓe.
Jawmiraawo soottan yoŋkiiji jaggiiɓe muuɗum,
nyukkotooɓe haa maako fuu kisan kiita.
Yimre Daawuda.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, aybin aybinooɓe yam,
haɓ bee haɓooɓe bee am!
Naŋngu wawarde
Umma, wallam!
Los labbo e jaaral ma, fottu bee taasnooɓe yam!
Wi'am: Min woni kisndam ma!
Yiɗɓe mbarugo yam cemta!
Nufaniiɓe yam sarru loro ɓaawo, tosko!
Ɓe laato bana nyaande nde henndu ruuynata,
malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo riiwa ɓe!
Laawol maɓɓe nyiɓɓa, ngol moosta ɓe,
malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo taasna ɓe!
Ngam ɓe tuufani yam tuuforgol bilaa daliila,
ɓe ngasi ngaska ngam halkugo yoŋki am bilaa daliila.
Sey halkere ukkano ɓe bee juhuki!
Tuuforgol ngol ɓe tuufni naŋnga ɓe!
Ɓe ndo'o nder maagol, ɓe kalka!
Ammaa min mi seyoto ngam daliila Jawmiraawo,
mi welweltan daliila kisndam maako!
Bee ɓernde am fuu mbi'anmi:
“Yaa Jawmiraawo, walaa mo nanndi bee ma.
A ɗon hisna toonyaaɗo diga juŋngo ɓurɗo ɗum semmbe,
toskaaɗo e talakaajo boo diga juŋngo jaɓtoowo ɗum.”
Seedooɓe fewre ummake dow am,
ɓe ɗon ƴamammi dow huunde nde mi anndaa.
Ɓe ɗon mbarjo mbooɗeeŋga am bee halleende,
mi lutti feere am.
Saa'i ɓe nyawɓeno, mi ɓorni limce leppi buhuure,
mi torri hoore am bee suumaago,
mi tori bilaa accugo sam.
Mi ɗonno waɗa bana to deerɗam malla soobaajo am maayi,
mi ɗonno turi mi cuniiɗo bana cooyɗo daada mum.
Ammaa nde mi do'i, ɓe ceyi, ɓe mooɓtotiri,
ɓe mooɓotiri dow am!
Yimɓe ɓe mi anndaa ɗon piyammi,
ɗon ɓoccammi bilaa accugo.
Hawtaade bee halluɓe ɓe ɗon njancammi masin,
ɓe ɗon kirƴindira nyii'e dow am.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, haa ndey munyanta ɗum?
Hisnam diga ɓillaaje ɗe ɓe ukkantammi!
Hisnu yoŋki am diga barooɗe ɗe'e!
Min boo mi yettete nder mooɓtorde mawnde,
mi maŋgtete nder jama'aare ɗuuɗnde.
Taa accu konne'en am ceyoro do'ere am!
Taa accu wanyɓe yam bilaa daliila kimƴindira gite dow am
Ngam kamɓe ɓe mbolwataa haala salaaman,
ammaa ɓe ɗon kasa pewe dow de'uɓe dow lesdi.
Ɓe ɗon kaadanammi, ɓe ɗon mbi'a:
“Yowwa! Min ngi'i ko mbaɗɗa!”
An, yaa Jawmiraawo, a yi'i ɗum,
taa jeeɗa, taa daayu bee am!
Fin, yaa Jawmiraawo, gooŋɗinam!
Umma, yaa Allah am, jiŋngam!
Gooŋɗinam fodde adilaaku ma, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Yaa Allah am, taa accu ɓe ceyo daliila am!
Taa ɓe numa: “Yowwa, kanjum ngiɗen!”
Taa ɓe mbi'a: “En moɗi mo!”
Seyortooɓe bone am fuu,
sey ɓe cemta, ɓe tosko!
Mawnitittooɓe dow am,
ɓe cemta, ɓe tosko!
Ammaa seyortooɓe adilaaku am,
hokku ɓe seyo e welwelo,
haa ɓe mbi'a tum: “Jawmiraawo o mawɗo,
o ɗon seyoro hayru jaggiiɗo maako!”
Min kam mi wolwan haala adilaaku ma
e mi maŋgtete nyalɗe fuu!
Yimre Daawuda, jaggiiɗo Jawmiraawo. Ngam kaliifaajo gime.
Mi ɗon siftora wolde nde kalluɗo wolwi nder tuurtol mum, o hulataa Allah sam
Ngam o ɗon manta hoore maako,
haa o waawataa anndititgo aybe maako,
o wanyataa nde.
Ko o wolwata fuu, ɗum halleende e fewjere,
o acci ɗaɓɓititgo hikma, o meetataa waɗugo ko fotti bee hikma.
Dow be'itte maako o ɗon nufo kuuje kalluɗe,
o ɗon tokko laawol kalluŋgol,
o senndirtaa bee halleende.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mbooɗeeŋga ma yottoto asamanji,
bana non boo gooŋgaaku ma.
Adilaaku ma tabiti bana kooseeje towɗe,
kiitaaji ma nanndi bee mbeela lugguka.
Jawmiraawo, a ɗon hisna yimɓe e dabbaaji.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mbooɗeeŋga ma woodi saman masin,
ɓiɓɓe Aadama ɗuwoto haa ɗowdi bileeji ma.
Ɓe kaaran nyaamduuji ɗuuɗɗi haa saare ma,
a yarnan ɓe haa njaramji ma ɗuuɗɗi belɗi.
Ngam haa maaɗa seeɓoore ngeendam fuu iwi,
ngam daliila annoora ma min ɗon ngi'a annoora.
Tokka waŋgingo mbooɗeeŋga ma haa annduɓe ma
e adilaaku ma haa gooŋɗa-ɓerɗe'en.
Taa accu mawnitiiɓe njokkammi,
taa accu halluɓe ndiiwammi.
Ndaa, waɗooɓe halleende ndo'ake,
ɓe njani, ɓe ummitittaako.
Yimre Daawuda.
Taa tikkan halluɓe,
taa haaju waɗooɓe zunuuba.
Ngam fakat ɓe njooran law bana huɗo,
ɓe ɗaylan bana haakooji kecci.
Hoola Jawmiraawo, waɗ mbooɗeeŋga,
jooɗa nder lesdi, yeeɗu nder de'ere.
Seyora Jawmiraawo,
kaŋko o hokkete ko ɓernde ma yiɗi.
Halfin nufayeeje ma haa Jawmiraawo,
hoola mo, kaŋko o waɗan ɗum.
O waŋginan adilaaku ma bana annoora,
gooŋgaaku ma boo bana naaŋge caka nyalawma.
De'u yeeso Jawmiraawo, hoola mo.
Taa tikkan keɓɗo hayru nder nufayeeje mum
malla timminɗo dabareeji mum kalluɗi.
Accu tikkere, ɗalu ɓernuki,
taa tikku, ɗum nafataa ma.
Ngam halluɓe kalkan,
ammaa hooliiɓe Jawmiraawo maran lesdi.
Lutti seɗɗa, kalluɗo majjan.
To a ɗaɓɓiti mo haa nokkuure maako, a tawataa mo ton.
Ammaa yaŋkiniiɓe ndonan lesdi,
ɓe ceyorto de'ere timmunde
Kalluɗo ɗon haɓɓa dabareeji dow gooŋgaajo,
o ɗon hirƴindira nyii'e dow maako.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo ɗon jala mo,
ngam o anndi nyalaade kiita maako ɓaditake.
Halluɓe losi kaafahi, tiri lagaaje
ngam do'ugo laafuɓe e ɓilliiɓe,
ngam mbarugo tokkiiɓe laawol darnuŋgol.
Ammaa kaafaaje maɓɓe njuwan ɓerɗe maɓɓe,
lagaaje maɓɓe ngewan.
Pamarum ko gooŋgaajo mari
ɓuri risku halluɓe ɗuuɗɓe saman.
Ngam Jawmiraawo ittan baawɗe maɓɓe,
ammaa o wallitan adili'en.
Jawmiraawo ɗon hakkilana ngeendam timmuɓe,
maral maɓɓe tabiti haa foroy.
Wakkati sarru ɓe toskataako,
nyalɗe weelo boo ɓe kaaran.
Ammaa halluɓe kalkan,
konne'en Jawmiraawo ɗaylan bana pinndi ladde,
ɓe majjan, fakat ɓe majjan bana cuurɗe.
Kalluɗo hoo'an nyamaande, nyaaman nde.
Ammaa adiliijo saahoto, woonanan yimɓe.
Ngam barkiɗinaaɓe Jawmiraawo maran lesdi,
ammaa naalaaɓe maako kalkan.
To laawol neɗɗo fottani Jawmiraawo,
nden kam o tabitinan palanɗe maako.
Koo to o fergake, o do'ataako,
ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon jogi juŋngo maako.
Diga mi derke haa mi naywi
mi meeɗaay yi'ugo adiliijo mo Allah wudini
malla mo ɓikkoy mum ndooki nyaamdu.
Koo ndey fuu o mo'anan yimɓe, o hokkan nyamaale,
ɓikkoy maako keɓan barka.
Daaya halleende, waɗ mbooɗeeŋga,
nden kam a jooɗoto nder lesdi ma haa foroy.
Ngam Jawmiraawo yiɗi ko fotti,
o wudintaa hoolaaɓe maako, o ɗon ayna ɓe foroy.
Ammaa o wilan danygol halluɓe.
Adili'en maran lesdi,
ɓe njooɗoto nder maari haa foroy.
Hunnduko adiliijo wolwan bolle hikma,
ɗemŋgal maako wolwan bolle darnuɗe.
O ɗon jogi tawreeta Allah nder ɓernde maako,
palanɗe maako ndimmbataako.
Kalluɗo ɗon hora adiliijo,
ɗon ɗaɓɓa mbarugo mo.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo accataa mo haa juŋngo maako,
to ɓe njahri mo yeeso kiita, o accataa kiita do'a mo.
Tammora Jawmiraawo, tokka laawol maako.
O ɓaŋgtete, a mara lesdi,
a yi'a no o riiwrata halluɓe.
Mi yi'i kalluɗo nder semmbe muuɗum fuu,
o ɗon yaha yeeso yeeso bana lekki bilitanki.
Nde caaliimi nokkuure maako, mi yi'aay mo fahin,
mi ɗaɓɓiti mo, ammaa mi tawaay mo sam.
Hakkilan timmuɗo, laar gooŋgaajo,
ngam giɗɗo salaaman heɓan danygol.
Ammaa tuurtooɓe fuu nattan,
danygol halluɓe halkan.
Kisndam adili'en ɗon haa Jawmiraawo.
O hisrude maɓɓe wakkati ɓillaare.
Jawmiraawo wallan ɓe, rimɗinan ɓe.
O rimɗinan ɓe diga juuɗe halluɓe.
O hisni ɓe ngam ɓe cuuɗi haa maako.
Yimre Daawuda ngam ciftinorki.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, taa hiitam bee tikkere ma,
taa ɓoccam nder ɓernuki ma!
Ngam kuri ma piɗi yam,
juŋngo ma teddani yam.
Ngam daliila tikkere ma mi walaa njamu,
i'e am nyawi ngam hakkeeji am.
Ngam aybeeji am towi ɓuri darnde am.
Ɗi teddani yam bana doŋngal tedduŋgal.
Kuuduuje am nyoli, ɗon kacca,
ngam daliila faataare am.
Mi turiiɗo, mi tampi masin,
mi ɗon nyalla nder mettamɓeram.
Ɓooƴe am ɗon ngula bana yiite,
ɓanndu am walaa njamu sam.
Mi tampuɗo masin, semmbe am fuu jinni,
ɓernde am torrake, mi ɗon otta ngam bone.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, a anndi ko ngiɗmi,
uumaali am fuu cuuɗanaaki ma!
Ɓernde am ɗon fiita, semmbe am jinni, gite am purɗi.
Soobiraaɓe am e wondunooɓe bee am ndaayake yam
ngam daliila kuuduuje am
koo banndiraaɓe am boo ndaaytake yam masin.
Yiɗɓe mbarugo yam ɗon tuufna tuuforli,
tefanɓe sarrugo yam ɗon mbolwa ngam halkugo yam,
ɗon nyalla haɓɓugo dabareeji dow am.
Min mi laatake bana paho, mi nanataa,
mi ɗon bana muukaajo, mi wolwataa.
Mi laatake bana goɗɗo mo nanataa,
mo waawataa jaabaago.
Mi tammorake ma, an, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Jawmiraawo Allah am, an jaabanto yam!
Ngam mi wi'i: Taa konne'en am ceyo daliila am,
taa ɓe mawnito to kosɗe am ndimmbake.
Ngam mi ɓadake do'aago,
naaworlaaji am accaay yam.
Ngam, mi ɗon waŋgina aybe am,
mi cakliiɗo ngam daliila hakke am.
Konne'en am ɗon ngeeɗa booɗɗum, ɓe semmbiɗɓe,
wanyɓe yam bilaa hujja, ɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Warjotooɓe mbooɗeeŋga am bee halleende ɗon kaadanammi,
ngam mi yiɗi waɗugo ko fotti.
Taa wudinam, yaa Jawmiraawo!
Taa daayam, yaa Allah am!
Yaawɗa war wallam!
Yaa Jawmiraawo, Kisnoowo yam!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda fodde daande “Yedutuun”
Mi wi'no: “Sey mi hakkilana yahdu am,
ngam taa mi waɗa hakke bee ɗemŋgal am.
To kalluɗo ɗon yeeso am,
sey mi naŋgta hunnduko am, mi de'a.”
Mi jeeɗi siriw, mi wolwaay haala hayru sam.
Ammaa torra am tulliti.
Ɓernde am metti masin,
nde mi numti ɗum, mi tawi ɓernde am wuli bana yiite.
Haa mi waawaay naŋgtugo ɗemŋgal am, mi wi'i:
“Yaa Jawmiraawo, anndinam timmoode ngeendam am!
Nyalɗe noy luttani yam?
Haa mi anndita no balɗe am ndammiri!”
Ndaa, a rammini balɗe am bana njaajirka newre juŋngo,
ngeendam am laati bana huunde meere haa yeeso maaɗa,
bana foofannde woore, non koo moy neɗɗo geeto.
Fakat nder waancuru maako, o laati bana ɗowdi,
o ɗon torro meere boo.
O ɗon mooɓta jawdi, ammaa o anndaa mo nyaamata ndi.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, ɗume tammotoomi jonta?
Haa maaɗa tammunde am woni.
Hisnam diga kuuɗe sooynde ɗowtaare am,
ngam taa faataaɓe njancammi.
Mi jeeɗi siriw, mi wolwaay koo ɗume,
ngam an ukkani yam kuuje ɗe'e.
Accu ɓoccugo yam,
mi ɓadake maayugo ngam a ɗon honammi.
To goɗɗo waɗi aybe, a felan mo, a eltan mo,
a wonnan ko o samɗini,
bana mooƴu nyaamrata kuuje.
Fakat, neɗɗo koo moye bana foofannde woore tan.
Nan tornde am, yaa Jawmiraawo! Heɗa bojji am!
Taa sukku noppi ma to mi woyani ma.
Ngam mi koɗo haa saare ma, bana kaakiraaɓe am fuu, mi duurataa.
Taa laaram bee tikkere, haa mi mooso hiddeko mi dilla, mi majja.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Dow Jawmiraawo tabitinmi tammunde am.
Nden o wayliti heedi am, o nani wookaandu am.
O wurtini yam ngaska halkere e ngaska loope lugguɗe,
o jo'ini kosɗe am dow tapaare, o semmbiɗini palanɗe am.
O waɗi yimre hesre nder hunnduko am,
ngam mi yimana Allah men maŋgtoore.
Ɗuuɗɓe ngi'an ɗum, kultoran
ɓaawoɗon ɓe kooloto Jawmiraawo.
Barka laatanto kooliiɗo Jawmiraawo,
mo ɗakkotirtaa bee mawnitiiɓe e hasooɓe pewe!
Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah am,
a ɗuɗɗinani min kaayeefiiji ma e nufayeeje ma booɗɗe!
Walaa nannduɗo bee ma. Mi yiɗi yeccugo ɗum e wooynugo ɗum,
ammaa mi waawataa yeccugo ɗum fuu, ngam ɗi ɗuuɗɗi masin.
A seyoraaki kirseteeɗi e dokke nyaamdu,
a ɗaɓɓaay guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi ngam ittuki hakke.
Ammaa a maɓɓitani yam noppi ngam haa mi nane.
Nden mbi'mi: “Ndaa yam, mi wari.
Haala dow am winndaama nder deftere taggaande.
Mi ɗon seyoro waɗugo muuyo ma, yaa Allah am,
tawreeta ma ɗon nder lugguɗum ɓernde am
Mi wooynan adilaaku ma nder mooɓtorde mawnde,
yaa Jawmiraawo, an, a anndi mi accataa wooynugo ɗum.
Mi suuɗaay haala adilaaku ma nder ɓernde am,
mi wolwi dow hoolaare ma e kisndam ma.
Nder mooɓtorde mawnde, mi jeeɗaaki,
mi suuɗaay mbooɗeeŋga ma e gooŋgaaku ma.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi anndi a salataa hinnaago yam,
mbooɗeeŋga ma e gooŋgaaku ma ɗon aynammi koo ndey.
Torraaji ɗuuɗɗi taarake yam, ɗi limataake.
Aybeeji am taasni yam, njokkake yam,
ɗon kaɗammi yi'ugo.
Ɗi ɓuri gaasaaji hoore am ɗuuɗugo,
mi itti tammunde am fuu.
Useni, hisnam, yaa Jawmiraawo,
yaawɗa, yiidam!
Yiɗɓe mbarugo yam, ɓe fuu ɓe cemta!
Seyortooɓe sarru am, lornu ɓe ɓaawo, toskin ɓe!
Jalanɓe yam, sey ɓe kultora daliila toskaare maɓɓe!
Ammaa ɗakkotirɓe bee ma fuu, yaa Jawmiraawo,
hokku ɓe seyo e welwelo!
Yiɗɓe kisndam maaɗa mbi'a foroy:
“Jawmiraawo woni mawɗo!”
Min maa mi laafuɗo, mi talakaajo,
ammaa an, yaa Jawmiraawo, a ɗon hakkilana yam.
An woni balloowo yam, kisnoowo yam,
war law, yaa Allah am!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
Barka laatanto kakkilananɗo laafuɗo,
Jawmiraawo hisnan mo nder nyalaade sarru.
Jawmiraawo aynan mo, wuurnan mo,
barkiɗinan mo nder lesdi maako.
Jawmiraawo hokkataa mo haa juuɗe konne'en maako.
To o nyawi, o waalake dow be'itte maako,
Jawmiraawo wallan mo, yamɗitinan mo.
Min mi wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, hinnam!
Nyawndam, ngam mi waɗi hakke dow maaɗa!”
Konne'en am ɗon kallinammi, ɗon mbi'a:
“Ndey o maayata haa innde maako yejjite?”
Waranɓe laarugo yam fuu ɓe naafiki'en.
Ɓe mooɓtan haalaaji kalluɗi,
nden ɓe ngurto yaasi, ɓe mbolwana yimɓe.
Wanyɓe yam fuu ɗon cofndotira, ɗon nyo'ammi,
ɗon nufano yam sarru.
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Naaloore heɓi mo!
Ndaa o ɗon waali, o ummitittaako!”
Koo soobaajo am mo kooliimi,
mo nyaami nyaamdu am boo, ummani yam
Ammaa an, yaa Jawmiraawo, hinnam!
Umminam ngam haa mi waato!
To a accaay konne'en njaali yam,
nden kam mi anndan a yerdake yam.
A tabitini yam ngam mi timmuɗo,
foroy a aynatam yeeso ma.
Yettoore laatano Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila, haa abada abadin!
Aamiina! Aamiina
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre ekkitinoore nde ɓiɓɓe Koora.
Bana lelwa ɗomɗuŋga yenwirta ndiyam haa maaje,
non yoŋki am yenwirte, yaa Allah!
Yoŋki am ɗon yenwa Allah geeto masin.
Ndey keɓanmi wargo daro yeeso maaɗa, yaa Allah?
Gonɗi am laati nyaamdu am jemma e naaŋge fuu,
ngam foroy ɓe ɗon ƴamammi: “Toy Allah ma woni kadi?”
Naane mi yahdi bee yimɓe haa haykaliiru Allah,
mi ardi mooɓre maɓɓe mawnde,
min mbaɗi juulde bee hoolo seyo e gime maŋgtooje.
To mi siftori ɗum, ɓernde am naawan masin!
Ko nafata to mi sunake, to mi uumi bana non?
Ndikka mi tammoro Jawmiraawo.
Ngam mi anndi mi yettan mo fahin,
ngam kaŋko woni kisnoowo yam!
Yaa Allah am, ɓernde am suni, ngam man mi siftori ma,
diga mi ɗonno jooɗi haa lesdi Urdun,
gal kooseeje Hermoon e Mica'ar.
Ndiyamji lugguɗi ɗon koolda bana jurde ndiyam,
ƴuuge ma e ilamji ma fuu ɗon caalo dow am.
Nyalawma fuu, Jawmiraawo waŋginanammi mbooɗeeŋga mum,
jemma fuu mi yimanan mo maŋgtooje,
mi toro Allah mo ɗon yeeɗinammi.
Mi ɗon ƴama Allah, tapaare suuɗirde am:
“Koni a yejjiti yam?
Ngam ɗume cuniimi?
Ngam ɗume konne'en toonyatammi?”
Konne'en am ɗon kuɗammi.
Foroy ɓe ɗon ƴamammi: “Toy Allah ma woni kadi?” Bana to ɓe ɗon ngewammi i'e.
Ko nafata to mi sunake, to mi uumi bana non?
Ndikka mi tammoro Jawmiraawo.
Ngam mi anndi mi yettan mo fahin,
ngam kaŋko woni kisnoowo yam e Allah am!
Gooŋɗinam, yaa Allah!
Jiŋngam yeeso yimɓe sooya gooŋgaaku'en,
hisnam juuɗe fewooɓe e waɗooɓe zunuuba.
An woni Allah aynoowo yam.
Ngam ɗume a wudini yam?
Ngam ɗume cuniimi?
Ngam ɗume konne'en am toonyoto yam?
Neldu annoora ma e gooŋga ma! Ɗum ɗowammi,
ɗum hoorammi haa hooseere ma seniinde,
haa jooɗorde ma.
Nden mi ɓadititto hirsirde ma, yaa Allah,
ngam a hokkatam seyo e welwelo.
Mi maŋgtete bee moolooru, yaa Allah am!
Ko nafata to mi sunake, to mi uumi bana non?
Ndikka mi tammoro Jawmiraawo.
Ngam mi anndi mi yettan mo fahin,
ngam kaŋko woni kisnoowo yam e Allah am!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre ekkitinoore nde ɓiɓɓe Koora.
Yaa Allah, bee noppi amin min nani
haala kuuɗe mawɗe ɗe kuuwɗa wakkati ɓooyma.
Kaakiraaɓe amin limtani min
ɗum ko mbaɗɗa nder zamanu maɓɓe.
An bee hoore ma a riiwi ummaatooje,
a tabitini yimɓe ma nder lesdi maɓɓe.
A torri ummaatooje man,
ngam haa ummaatoore ma feeco.
Ngam ɓe nyaamaay lesdi bee kaafaaje maɓɓe,
ɓe njaalaaki ngam daliila baawɗe maɓɓe boo.
Baawɗe ma mawɗe e gondal ma e mbooɗeeŋga ma mbaɗi ɗum,
ngam a yerdi ɓe.
Yaa Allah, an woni laamiiɗo am,
an hokki danygol Yaakubu jaalorgal.
Bee ballal maaɗa min ndo'ata konne'en amin,
bee baawɗe innde ma min ndamman wanywanyɓe amin.
Ngam naa lagaawal am kooliimi,
kaafahi am hisnataa yam.
Ammaa an hisnata min juuɗe konne'en amin,
a semtini wanyɓe min.
Min ceyorto ma nyalaaɗe fuu, yaa Allah,
min maŋgtan innde ma foroy.
Ammaa jonta a wudini min, a toskini min,
a acci wondugo bee jama'aare konu amin.
A doggini min yeeso konne'en amin,
wanyɓe min njaɓti jawdi amin.
A laatini min bana baali kirseteeɗi ngam nyaameego,
a saŋkiti min nder lesɗe ummaatooje goɗɗe.
A soorri ummaatoore ma buutu,
a riskaay bee coggu man.
A acci heeddiɗɗiraaɓe amin ɗon kuɗa min,
ɓe ɗon njala min, ɓe ɗon njanca min.
A laatini min daliila jancoore yeeso ummaatooje goɗɗe,
yimɓe maaje ɗon njala min, ɗon ndimmbina ko'e muuɗum'en dow amin.
Mi ɗon yi'a toskaare am foroy,
mi heewi mbustu,
ngam jaleeɗe konne'en am
e bolle mettuɗe ɗe waatooɓe yam mbolwata.
Ɗum fuu ɗum warani min, koo nde min ngejjitaay ma boo,
min mbaɗaay aybe dow alkawal maaɗa bee amin.
Min accaay tokkaago ma,
min celaay laawol ma.
Ammaa an a dammi min haa nokkuure cuuli ngoni,
a nastini min nyiɓre nyiɓɓunde.
To min ngejjitino innde Allah amin,
to min torino ɗowanteeɗo jananno,
Allah heɓtataano ɗum naa,
kaŋko annduɗo numooji amin cuuɗiiɗi?
Ammaa ngam daliila maaɗa ɓe ɗon mbara min nyalɗe fuu,
ɓe ɗon ndaara min bana baali kirseteeɗi
Fin, yaa Jawmiraawo! Ngam ɗume ɗaanotoɗa?
Umma, taa wudin min haa foroy!
Ngam ɗume mbirnuɗa gite ma?
Ngam ɗume ngejjititɗa bone e ɓillaare amin?
Ngam min njani nder mbulwuldi,
ɓalli amin ɗon kippi dow lesdi!
Umma, war wallu min!
Hisnu min ngam daliila mbooɗeeŋga ma!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Fodde daande “gurguli”
Ɓernde am ɗon ɓula bolle belɗe,
sey mi yimana laamiiɗo gimol am.
Ɗemŋgal am laato binndirgol binndoowo goniijo.
A ɓuri ɓiɓɓe Aadama fuu wooɗugo, barkaama.
A wela-ɗemŋgaljo,
Ngam man Allah barkiɗini ma haa foroy.
Wakka kaafahi ma, an, konoowo cuusɗo,
marɗo maŋngu e daraja.
Wa'a moota pucci ma bee daraja, jaala,
ngam daliila gooŋga e yaŋkinaare e adilaaku!
Nyaamo ma huuwa kuuɗe kaayeefiije!
Kuri ma ceeɓɗi njuwa ɓerɗe konne'en ma,
ummaatooje ndo'o yeeso maaɗa!
Leeso laamu maaɗa yaa Allah, duumoto haa foroy,
a laamoto nder laamu ma bee kiita ndarnuka.
A yiɗi adilaaku, a ɗon wanya halleende.
Ngam man, Allah, waato Allah maaɗa moyti ma,
hokki ma seyo ko ɓuri wonduɓe bee maaɗa fuu
Baɗaadi e uurle belɗe feere feere ɗon dow limce ma,
fiyooɓe moolooji ɗon ceyna ɓernde ma
nder laamorde ma nyiɓraande bee nyii'e nyiibi.
Ɓiɓɓe laamiiɓe rewɓe ɗon caka yiɗaaɓe ma,
haa nyaamo ma daada saare ɗon dari,
o pawnoriiɗo bee kaŋŋeeri iwndi diga Ofir.
Ɓiŋngel am, laar e nan ko mbi'anmaami:
Yejjitit ummaatoore ma e saare baaba ma.
Laamiiɗo yiɗe daliila ŋarol ma!
Kaŋko woni jawma, tuggan mo koppi!
Yimɓe Tirus ngaddante dokke,
riskuɓe nder ummaatoore ɗaɓɓitan yerduye ma.
Ndaa, mayramjo, ɓaŋgeteeɗo laamiiɗo ɗon nasta, o booɗɗo masin.
Limce maako tuppitaama bee kaŋŋeeri.
O ɓorniiɗo limce booɗɗe tuppitaaɗe,
ɓe ɗon njahra mo haa laamiiɗo.
Faanyɓe, sappiraaɓe maako ɗon tokko mo,
ɓe njahraama yeeso maaɗa.
Ɓe ɗon njahra ɓe bee seyo e welwelo,
ɓe ɗon nasta laamorde.
Barkaama, ɓiɓɓe ma njooɗoto dow leeso laamu kaakiraaɓe muuɗum'en,
a ardinan ɓe dow lesdi fuu!
Mi siftinoran gide garanɗe fuu innde ma,
ngam man ummaatooje maŋgtete haa foroy.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre ɓiɓɓe Koora fodde daande “alamot”
Allah woni hisrude men e semmbe men!
Koo ndey ɓillaare heɓi en, o wallan en.
Ngam man en kultortaa koo to lesdi dimmbake,
koo to kooseeje ngibbi nder beeli,
koo to ndiyamji kooli, ƴuufi,
mbaɗi boo ƴuuge towɗe haa kooseeje ndimmbi.
Ndaa maayo, cele maago ɗon ceyna berniwol Allah,
jooɗorde Ɓaŋiiɗo seniinde.
Allah ɗon nder maagol, ngol dimmbataako,
diga baɓɓol Allah ɗon walla ngol.
Ummaatooje mbaɗi tuurtol, laamuuji ndimmbi.
To Allah telɓi, duniyaaru ɓolwan.
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɗon wondi bee meeɗen,
Allah mo Yaakubu laatani en hisrude townde.
Ngare, ndaare kuuɗe Jawmiraawo!
O huuwi kuuɗe nattinooje kulniiɗe haa duniyaaru.
Kaŋko timminta konuuji haa keeri duniyaaru fuu,
o ɗon yewa lagaaje e labbe,
o ɗon wula mootaaji pucci honooɓe.
O ɗon wi'a: “Nde'ite, annde min woni Allah.
Min woni Ɓaŋiiɗo dow ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu.”
Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama ɗon wondi bee meeɗen,
Allah mo Yaakubu laatani en hisrude townde.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre nde ɓiɓɓe Koora.
Onon ummaatooje fuu, kelle juuɗe,
teddine Allah bee hoolo seyo!
Ngam Jawmiraawo Ɓaŋiiɗo, o kuleteeɗo,
o laamiiɗo mawɗo dow duniyaaru fuu!
O leesnani en jama'aaje,
o ɗowtinani en ummaatooje!
O suɓani en maral meeɗen,
en ceyori ɗum, enen danygol Yaakubu ngol o yiɗi.
Allah wa'ake leeso laamu mum,
caka hoolo e fuufaaŋgo luwe.
Ngime! Ngimane Allah men maŋgtooje!
Ngime! Ngimane laamiiɗo men maŋgtooje!
Ngam Allah woni laamiiɗo duniyaaru fuu,
ngimane mo yimre ɓurnde wooɗugo.
Allah ɗon jooɗi dow leeso laamu mum seniiŋgo.
O ɗon laamano ummaatooje fuu.
Mawɓe ummaatooje ɗon mooɓo
hawtaade bee ummaatoore Allah
Ngam Allah jeyi bawarɗe
Yimre nde ɓiɓɓe Koora.
Jawmiraawo o mawɗo! O maŋgteteeɗo masin
nder berniwol Allah men, dow hooseere maako seniinde!
Towndiire nde'e wooɗi, nde ɗon seyna duniyaaru fuu.
Ɗum hooseere Siyona gal woyla.
Ɗum berniwol laamiiɗo mawɗo
Allah ɗon nder cuuɗi maagol cemmbiɗɗi
Koo moy anndi o hisrude townde.
Ndaa laamiiɓe kawti,
ɓe njehi hippoyaago Siyona.
Ɓe ndaari ngol, ɓe kayɗini, ɓe kultori, law ɓe ndoggi!
Diwŋgol naŋngi ɓe ton,
bana luuwe naŋngirta ɓesnanɗo.
A fusan koommbooje Tarsis bee henndu fuunaaŋge.
Bana ko en nanino, non en ngi'i ɗum
nder berniwol Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama,
nder berniwol Allah meeɗen.
Allah tabitinan ngol haa foroy.
Yaa Allah, nder haykaliiru ma
min ɗon numta mbooɗeeŋga ma.
Yaa Allah, yimɓe ɗon maŋgte koo toy fuu.
Innde ma anndaama haa keerol duniyaaru fuu,
tum nyaamo ma ɗon waɗa kiita adiliiha.
Hooseere Siyona ɗon seyo,
nder gure Yahuuda boo ɓe ɗon ceyoro kiitaaji ma.
Taare, ngiile nder berniwol Siyona,
lime cuuɗi maagol towɗi,
maande mahi taariiɗi ngol, linye cuuɗi maagol cemmbiɗɗi,
ngam anndingo ɗum yidere warannde.
Allah oo, o Allah meeɗen haa abada abadin,
o ɗowan en haa yotto maayde!
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Gimol ngol ɓiɓɓe Koora.
Nane ɗu'um, onon ummaatooje fuu!
Keɗite, onon yimɓe duniyaaru fuu,
mawɓe e leesɓe,
riskuɓe e talaka'en fuu!
Hunnduko am wolwan bolle hikma.
Ɓernde am numan numooji kakkilɗi.
Mi heɗititto balndol,
mi waŋginan ko saawi nder annditanamwol am,
saa'i mi ɗon fiya moolooru.
Ngam ɗume kulanmi nder nyalɗe sarru,
to halleende waɗooɓe yam rikici taarake yam?
Kamɓe ɓe ɗon ɓaaroro jawdi maɓɓe,
ɓe ɗon mantoro risku maɓɓe ɗuuɗŋgu.
Ammaa walaa mo waawata soottugo goɗɗo,
walaa mo waawata yoɓugo Allah coottaari yoŋki mum.
Ngam coottaari yoŋki maako saɗi masin,
koo ndey ndi heɓataako.
Ndi hisnataa mo ngaska lugguka,
haa o tokko yeeɗugo haa foroy.
Ɓe ɗon ngi'a koo hikma'en boo maayan
bana humaki'en e faataaɓe fuu,
ɓe accanan woɗɓe jawdi maɓɓe.
Ɓe ɗon numa joole maɓɓe tabitan haa foroy,
ɓe njooɗoto ton haa abada.
Ɓe inndi lesɗe mawɗe inɗe maɓɓe.
Ammaa neɗɗo bee maŋngu muuɗum fuu, duurataa,
o halkan bana dabbaaji kalkirta.
Ndaa nii laawol e faataare hooliiɓe ko'e muuɗum'en mba'i,
ndaare timmoode seyortooɓe bolle muuɗum'en mawnitiiɗe:
Ɓe yahreteeɓe haa joonde maayɓe bana baali,
waade duran ɓe.
Fajiri gooŋga'en ndamman ɓe, jaati maɓɓe wonnoto,
joonde maayɓe laatoto saare maɓɓe.
Ammaa Allah hisnan yoŋki am diga joonde maayɓe,
ngam o hoocatam.
To goɗɗo riski, to tedduŋgal saare maako ɗon ɓesdo,
taa hul,
ngam to o maayi, o hoocataa koo ɗume bee maako,
tedduŋgal maako tokkataako mo nder yenaande.
Koo to o maŋgtuno hoore maako saa'i o geeto,
koo to woɗɓe teddinno mo ngam o heɓi hayru,
fakat o hawtoyan bee kaakiraaɓe maako nder joonde maayɓe,
ɓe fuu ɓe meetataa yi'ugo naaŋge haa foroy.
Neɗɗo bee maŋngu muuɗum fuu, o walaa faamu,
o halkan bana dabbaaji kalkirta.
Yimre Asaf.
Jawmiraawo, Allah Mawɗo wolwi.
O ewni duniyaaru fuu
diga fuɗirde naaŋge haa mutirde maage.
Jayŋgol Allah ɗon yayna diga Siyona,
berniwol ŋarniiŋgol, timmuŋgol.
Allah meeɗen ɗon wara, o jeeɗataako!
Yiite nyaamooye ɗon ardi mo,
henndu saatundu ɗon taari mo.
O ɗon ewno asamanji e lesdi,
haa o hiito ummaatoore maako.
O wi'i: “Mooɓtaneeɗam hoolaaɓe am,
haɓɓuɓe alkawal bee am bee lii'anaago yam kirseteeɗi.”
Asamanji ɗon ngooyna adilaaku maako,
ngam Allah woni kiitoowo.
“Nan, an ummaatoore am! Haa mi wolwane.
An Isra'iila, mi seedoto aybe ma.
Min woni Allah, mi Allah maaɗa.
Mi felataa ma ngam kirseteeɗi maaɗa
e guleteeɗi ma ɗi lii'antoɗa yam tum.
Mi hoo'ataa ngari ma kalhaldi diga saare ma
malla jawɗi be'i haa waalde ma.
Ngam min mari dabbaaji laynde fuu,
non boo dabbaaji dow kooseeje ujineeje.
Mi anndi colli kooseeje fuu,
kuuje ladde fuu min jeyi.
Koo to mi maatino dolo, mi wi'ataano on,
ngam duniyaaru e bee ko hebbini ndu fuu, min jeyi.
Kadi mi nyaaman kusel ga'i na?
Malla mi yaran ƴiiƴam jawɗi?
Lii'ana Allah ma yettoore,
hebbin togayeeje ma heedi Ɓaŋiiɗo!
Toram nder wakkati ɓillaare,
nden kam mi hisnete, an boo a maŋgtatam.”
Ammaa kalluɗo, Allah wi'i ɗum:
“Koni limtata umrooje am,
koni mbolwata haala alkawal am?
An caliiɗo elto am,
a wudini bolle am ɓaawo ma!
To a yi'i gujjo, a hawtan bee maako,
a ɗon hawtana jeenooɓe.
Hunnduko ma ɗon ɓula bolle kalluɗe,
ɗemŋgal ma ɗon haso naafikaare.
A ɗon jooɗo nyo'a deerɗiraawo ma
a ɗon hallina ɓii daada ma.
Kanjum kuuwɗa – min mi jeeɗi.
Ngam man a tammi, min boo bana maaɗa mbaami.
Ammaa jonta mi felete
haa mi waŋginane aybe ma!
Paame ɗum, onon yejjitanɓe yam!
To naa non mi seekan on, kisnanɗo on boo walaa.
Lii'antooɗo yam yettoore, teddintam,
darnanɗo laawol mum, mi yi'nan ɗum kisndam am”.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda.
O winndi nde yaake Natan annabiijo wari haa maako, ɓaawo o waɗi njeenu bee Bat-Seeba
Hinnam, yaa Allah, fodde mbooɗeeŋga ma!
Fodde hinnuye ma ɗuuɗɗo, wilu tuurtolji am!
Lootu aybe am fuu!
Laɓɓinam tal diga hakke am
Ngam mi faami tuurtolji am,
mi ɗon yi'a hakke am tum.
Dow maaɗa tan mbaɗmi aybe,
mi waɗi kalluɗum yeeso ma.
Ngam maajum, a adiliijo to a feli yam,
a felataake to a hiitake yam.
Fakat mi danyaaɗo nder zunuuba,
diga daada am reedi yam, mi ɗon nder hakke.
Ammaa an, a ɗon seyora gooŋga nder lugguɗum ɓernde,
hebbin numooji am bee hikma maaɗa.
Ittu hakke am bee haako isop, nden kam mi laaɓan.
Lootu aybe am, nden kam mi ranwan tal bana mallimallooje
Accu mi nana hoolo seyo e welwelo,
haa mi maata seyo fahin, ɓaawo a hiiti yam kiita naawka.
Wiirnu gite ma ngam taa ngi'a hakkeeji am,
wilu aybe am fuu.
Yaa Allah, taganam ɓernde laaɓnde!
Hesɗitin ruuhu nder am, haa mi ɗakko ma booɗɗum!
Taa riiwam daayiiɗum diga yeeso ma,
taa ittanam Ruuhu ma Ceniiɗo!
Seynam bee kisndam ma fahin,
hokkam ruuhu yaŋkinaare heedi ma.
Nden kam mi ekkitinan tuurtanɓe ma laabi ma,
hakke'en boo lortoto haa maaɗa.
Yaa Allah, Allah Kisnoowo yam,
hisnam ngam mi rufi ƴiiƴam!
Min boo mi maŋgtete bee hoolo seyo ngam adilaaku ma!
Yaa Jawmiraawo, maɓɓitu hunnduko am
haa mi wooyna maŋgtoore ma.
Ngam a seyortaako kirseteeɗi, to naa non mi lii'antono ma ɗi,
guleteeɗi pottantaa ma.
Dokkal pottananŋgal ma, ɗum ɓernde suniinde,
ɓernde suniinde, mimsitannde hakkeeji, a salataako nde, yaa Allah.
Woonan Siyona fodde mo'ere ma!
Nyiɓta mahi Urusaliima!
Nden a seyorto kirseteeɗi pottuɗi, waato guleteeɗi,
ɓe lii'oto ga'i dow hirsirde ma.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda ekkitinoore.
O winndi nde ɓaawo Do'ek Edoomiijo yehi haa Sawulu, wi'i mo: Daawuda ɗon nder saare Ahimelek
Koni mantortooɗa halleende ma, an cuusɗo?
Mbooɗeeŋga Allah ɗon koo ndey fuu.
An naafikiijo, a ɗon haɓɓa dabareeji ngam halkugo woɗɓe,
ɗemŋgal ma nanndi bee beluhi belnaaki.
A ɓuri yiɗugo halleende dow mbooɗeeŋga,
a ɓuri yiɗugo fewre dow gooŋga.
A yiɗi wolwugo bolle bonnooje,
a pewoowo!
Ngam maajum Allah halkete haa foroy,
o naŋngete, o wiftete diga suudu laymaaru ma,
o ɗoofete diga lesdi yeeɗɓe.
Adili'en ngi'an ɗum, kultoran.
Ɓe njalete, ɓe mbi'an:
“Ndaa goɗɗo mo laaraay Allah bana hisrude muuɗum,
ammaa o hooli risku maako ɗuuɗŋgu,
o tammi o semmbiɗi daliila halleende maako.”
Ammaa min mi ɗon bana jaytunhi bilititki nder suudu Allah,
mi ɗon hooli mbooɗeeŋga Allah haa foroy.
Mi maŋgtete haa foroy ngam ko mbaɗɗa.
Mi ɗon tammoro innde ma ngam a booɗɗo heedi hoolaaɓe ma.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime. Yimre Daawuda ekkitinoore fodde daande “mahalat”
Faataaɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Allah walaa!”
Fakat ɓe mbonnake, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa sooynde adilaaku hulniinde.
Walaa baɗanɗo ko wooɗi, walaa koo gooto!
Diga asama, Allah jimmiti, o ɗon laara ɓiɓɓe Aadama,
haa o yi'a to woodi marɗo hakkiilo,
ɓaditanɗo mo
Ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe celi laawol gooŋga, ɓe mbonnake.
Walaa baɗanɗo ko wooɗi, walaa koo gooto!
“Waɗooɓe zunuuba ɓe'e fuu,
ngalaa hakkiilo na?
Ɓe ɗon nyaama ummaatoore am
bana nyaamugo nyaamdu,
ammaa ɓe ewnataa innde Allah.”
Kanjum ɓe ndiwnan ngam kulol,
koo to daliila kulol walaa.
Allah saŋkitan i'e hippooɓe ma,
ɓe mbustan, ngam Allah wudini ɓe.
Moy hokkata kisndam haa Isra'iila diga Siyona?
To Allah wartiri ummaatoore muuɗum diga jeyaaŋgu,
nden kam danygol Yaakubu welweltan, Isra'iila seyoto.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime bee moolooji. Yimre Daawuda ekkitinoore.
O winndi nde ɓaawo Zifa'en njehi haa Sawulu, mbi'i mo: “Daawuda ɗon nyukki haa amin
Yaa Allah, hisnam bee baawɗe innde ma!
Waɗanam kiita ndarnuka bee semmbe ma!
Yaa Allah, jaɓ tornde am,
heɗita bolle am!
Ngam jananɓe ummanake yam,
toonyooɓe ngiɗi mbarugo yam,
walaa ko yaali ɓe bee Allah.
Ammaa ndaa Allah woni balloowo yam.
Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee wallooɓe yam.
Halleende konne'en am loro dow ko'e muuɗum'en,
nattin ɓe fodde gooŋgaaku ma!
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi lii'anto ma kirseteeɗi bee seyo,
mi maŋgtan innde ma, ngam a booɗɗo.
Ngam a hisni yam ɓillaaje am fuu,
gite am ngi'i halkere konne'en am.
Ngam kaliifaajo gime bee moolooji. Yimre Daawuda ekkitinoore.
Yaa Allah, heɗita do'aare am,
taa sala nanugo tornde am!
Nanam, jaabam!
Mi cakliiɗo, mi ɗon siŋka, mi ɗon yiilo koo toy,
daliila purka konne'en am
e toonyaare halluɓe.
Ɓe ɗon ukka halkere dow am,
ɓe ɗon taasnammi bee nganyŋgu e tikkere.
Ɓernde am ɗon diwna,
kulol maayde ukkanake yam.
Kultoreeŋgol e diwŋgol naŋngi yam,
kulol caatuŋgol suddi yam.
Mi wi'i: “To mi woodino bileeji bana poola,
mi fiiranno, mi jooɗoyo ego!
Mi fiiranno daayiiɗum,
mi yahanno mi hoɗoya nder ladde.
Mi yaawanno haa mi hisa henndu saatundu bee law.”
Jiiɓu hakkiilooji e ɗemɗe maɓɓe, yaa Allah!
Ngam mi ɗon yi'a toonyaare e jokkirgol nder berniwol.
Jemma e naaŋge fuu ɓe ɗon taaro ngol dow mahol maagol,
ngol heewi zunuuba e zammba.
Halkere ɗon nder maagol,
ɓillaare e rikici ceedataa bee luumo maagol.
To ɗum konneejo am mo huɗi yam,
mi munyananno mo.
To ɗum ganyɗo yam mo ummani yam,
mi heɓanno suuɗaago yeeso maako.
Ammaa ɗum an, goɗɗo nannduɗo bee am!
Soobaajo am mo anndumi laaɓɗum!
En njooɗodino nder kawtal booɗŋgal,
en njahduno haa suudu Allah nder mooɓre.
Sey waade juha konne'en am!
Ɓe nasta joonde maayɓe ɓe yeeɗɓe!
Ngam halleende heewi ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Ammaa min mi ɗon wookana Allah,
Jawmiraawo hisnatam.
Maŋngariba e fajiri e caka nyalawma fuu
mi ɗon siŋka, mi ɗon uuma, o ɗon nanammi.
O hooratam jam diga konuuji am
bee konne'en am ɗuuɗɓe.
Diga ɓooyma Allah woni laamiiɗo.
Kaŋko o nanatam, o semtinan ɓe,
ngam ɓe mbootataa, ɓe kulataa Allah.
Kawtunooɗo bee am go ummani sooba'en mum,
fiisti alkawal ngal o haɓɓuno bee maɓɓe.
Bolle maako ɓuri leeɓol ɗelmugo,
ammaa ɓernde maako heewi konu!
Bolle maako ɗon ila bana nebbam,
ammaa ɗe ta'an bana kaafaaje belɗe!
Yowan Jawmiraawo doŋngal ɓernde ma, o jogoto ma,
o accataa koolaaɗo maako dimmbo sam.
