Duuɗe ngi'i ɗum, ɗe kuli. Keeri duniyaaru ndiwni, ɓaditi, ngari.
Yimɓe ɗon mballotira, koo moy ɗon wi'a keeddiɗɗum: Semmbiɗiɗ!

Baɗoowo sanaa'a ɗon semmbiɗina ɓolinoowo, tappoowo kaŋŋeeri ɗon semmbiɗina kilaajo tappoowo dow daada-kilaaru. O ɗon wi'ana takkuki njamndi: Ki wooɗi. Nden o tiggan lawru bee suufuuje ngam taa ndu dimmbo.
Ammaa an, Isra'iila
mi jogi ma diga keeri duniyaaru, mi ewni ma diga nokkuuje maaru ɓurɗe daayaago, mi wi'i ma: An woni suka am, mi suɓi ma, mi wudinaay ma!
Taa hul, ngam mi ɗon wondi bee ma! Taa laar koo toy bee kulol, ngam min woni Allah maaɗa. Mi semmbiɗinte, mi yiidete, mi jogoto ma bee nyaamo am jaalotooŋgo.
Ndaa, tikkananɓe ma fuu cemtan, toskoto. Jokkiranɓe bee ma laatoto meere, ɓe kalkan.
A ɗaɓɓitan wanyɓe ma, ammaa a tawataa ɓe. Honɓe ma laatoto huunde meere.
Ngam min Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa mi ɗon jogo nyaamo ma, min bi'ɗo ma: Taa hul, mi yiidete.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Taa hul, an ngilŋgel Yaakubu! An peetum Isra'iila, mi yiidete! Min Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, mi coottoowo ma.
Ndaa, mi waɗi ma bana corɓirɗum ceeɓɗum, kesum, marɗum nyii'e ɗuuɗɗe. A sorɓan kooseeje, a naman ɗe, a wartiran towndiije bana nyaande.
A jaartan ɗe, haa henndu wifa ɗe, henndu saatundu saŋkita ɗe. Ammaa an a seyorto Jawmiraawo, a jurorto Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.
Laafuɓe e yurumɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita ndiyam, ɗam woodaa. Ɗemɗe maɓɓe ɗon njoora ngam ɗomka. Min Jawmiraawo mi jaɓanan ɓe tornde maɓɓe. Min Allah Isra'iila mi accataa ɓe.
Mi ɓulnan maaje dow towndiije cooke, ceeɓooje boo caka waadiiji. Mi wartiran ladde weendu ndiyam, lesdi njoorndi boo ceeɓooje ndiyam.
Nder harde njo'inanmi leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe e leɗɗe gaware e asuraaje e jaytunje. Nder ladde njubotoomi leɗɗe booɗɗe e irin leɗɗe booɗɗe mawɗe e pamare
ngam haa ɓe ngi'a ɓe annda, ɓe ndaara, ɓe paama ɓe fuu, min Jawmiraawo waɗi ɗum, min Allah Ceniiɗo Isra'iila tagi ɗum.”
Jawmiraawo, laamaniiɗo danygol Yaakubu wi'i: “Onon labbi ummaatooje, anndine wullaandu mon, mbaŋgine hujjaaji mon!
Mbaŋgine ɗi, anndine min ko tammi laataago! Paamtine min kuuje ɓooymaaje no ɗe mba'i, haa min kakkilana ɗe, min annda no ɗe laatorto. Malla ngecce min kuuje garanɗe.
Mbi'e min ko warata ɓaawoɗon, nden min anndan on ɗowanteeɓe. Kadi mbaɗe booɗɗum malla kalluɗum, haa min kayɗina, min kula.
Ndaa, on laatake huunde meere, kuugal mooɗon boo ɗum meereejum koros. Mo suɓi on, laati nyidduɗo.
Mi ummini goɗɗo woyla, o wari. Haa fuunaaŋge ewniimi innde maako. O yaaɓan mawɓe bana loope, bana mahoowo payanɗe yaaɓirta loope kecce.
Moy caka mooɗon anndini ɗum diga fuɗɗam, haa min annda ɗum? Moy wi'i ɗum diga wakkati ɓooyma, haa min mbi'a: Gooŋga! Walaa anndinɗo ɗum, walaa geccuɗo ɗum, walaa nanɗo bolle mon.
Aartuɗo yottaago haa Siyona wi'i: Ndaa, ndaa ɓe! Mi ɗon hokka Urusaliima gaazoowo habaru seyo.
Mi ɗon laara ɗowanteeɓe ɓe'e, ammaa mi yi'ataa koo moy. Walaa carwoowo caka maɓɓe. Walaa jaabotooɗo to mi ƴami.
Ndaa, ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe huunde meere. Kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗe meere. Labbi maɓɓe ɗi henndu sookru.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ndaa suka am, mi jogoto mo, o cuɓaaɗo am mo yoŋki am seyorto ɗum. Mi waɗi Ruuhu am dow maako. O waŋginanan ummaatooje kiita ndarnuka
O wookataa, o townataa sawtu, walaa nananɗo daande maako haa laabi.
O yewataa kewal nyobbaaŋgal. O nyifataa pittirlayel cuuraaŋgel. Fakat o tabitinan kiita ngooŋɗuka.
Kaŋko o tampataa, o tiinoto haa to o tabitini kiita ngooŋɗuka nder duniyaaru. Duuɗe ɗon ndeena ekkitinol maako
Allah Jawmiraawo mo tagi asamanji, we'iti ɗi, mo waɗi lesdi e fuɗŋgooji maari, mo hokki yimɓe wonɓe dow maari poofɗe e yahooɓe dow maari ruuhu – ndaa nii o wi'i suka maako
“Min Jawmiraawo mi ewnori ma ngam adilaaku. Mi naŋngan juŋngo ma, mi aynete, bee maaɗa kaɓɓiranmi alkawal bee yimɓe, bee maaɗa ndokkiranmi ummaatooje annoora
haa mbumtina wumɓe, ngurtina haɓɓaaɓe diga fursina, jooɗiiɓe nder nyiɓre boo diga yaŋgada muuɗum'en.
Min woni Jawmiraawo, kanjum woni innde am. Mi hokkataa ɗowanteeɗo goɗɗo tedduŋgal am, mi senndataa maŋngu am bee labbi.
Kuuje aartanɗe laatake. Jonta kuuje kese anndinanmi. Hiddeko ɗe puɗɗa, ngeccanmi on ɗe.”
Ngimane Jawmiraawo yimre hesre, ngime maŋgtoore maako haa keeri duniyaaru, onon yahooɓe dow mbeela e ko hebbini nga, onon duuɗe e jooɗiiɓe ton!
Sey ladde hamaadaare bee gure gonɗe nder maare towna sawtu, non boo kawyeeji yimɓe Keedar. Sey jooɗiiɓe dow tapaare mbelmbelta, ɓe mbaɗa gookaali seyo dow geereeje kooseeje!
Sey ɓe teddina Jawmiraawo, ɓe anndina maŋgtoore maako haa duuɗe!
Jawmiraawo ɗon wurto bana jaaliiɗo, bana konoowo o ɗon ummina tikkere maako saatunde. O ɗon hoola, o ɗon wooka wookaandu konu. O ɗon jaalo konne'en maako.
Allah wi'i: “Duuri mi sirwi, mi jeeɗi, mi naŋgti hoore am. Jonta ngookanmi bana debbo ɓesnanɗo, mi foofan, mi laahan.
Mi ferwinan kooseeje e towndiije, mi ɗaylinan haako maaje fuu. Mi wartiran maaje ndiyam lesdi njoorndi, mi ɓeeɓnan beeli.
Mi yahran wumɓe dow laawol ngol ɓe anndaa, mi ɗowan ɓe dow laabi ɗi ɓe anndaa. Nyiɓre yeeso maɓɓe, mi wartiran nde jayŋgol, laawol leliiŋgol boo darnuŋgol. Kanjum mbaɗanmi, mi accataa ɗum sam.
Hooliiɓe labbi cehaaɗi, ewnotooɓe suuraaji ɓolinaaɗi ɗowanteeɓe muuɗum'en, ɓe loroto ɓaawo, ɓe cemta.”
“Nane, onon fahɓe! Onon wumɓe boo, ndaare, ngi'e!
Moy woni bumɗo, sonaa suka am? Moy woni paho bana nelaaɗo am mo nelanmi ɗum? Moy woni bumɗo bana ɗakkotirɗo bee am, moy woni paho bana suka Jawmiraawo?
On ngi'i ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa on kakkilanaay ɗum. Noppi mon maɓɓiti, ammaa on nanaay.”
Ɗum fottani Jawmiraawo o waŋgina maŋngu tawreeta maako, o teddina ka ngam daliila adilaaku maako.
Ammaa yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɓe jaɓtaaɓe, ɓortaaɓe. Ɓe maɓɓaaɓe nder gasɗe, suuɗiiɓe nder cuuɗi kaɓɓorli. Ɓe laati keɓal konu, walaa kisnanɗo ɓe. Ɓe jaɓtaaɓe, ammaa walaa bi'anɗo: Hokkitam!
Moy caka mooɗon nanata kuuje ɗe'e? Moy heɗititto, moy hakkilanta ɗum nder nyalɗe garanɗe?
Moy hokki Isra'iila, danygol Yaakubu haa juuɗe jaɓtooɓe? Naa ɗum Jawmiraawo mo mbaɗɗen hakke dow muuɗum? Ɓe cali tokkaago laabi maako, ɓe ɗowtanaaki tawreeta maako.
Ngam maajum o rufi tikkere maako saatunde e o ukki konu caatuŋgu dow maɓɓe. Ɗum ukki dow maɓɓe koo toy fuu bana yiite, ammaa ɓe paamaay. Ɗum wuli ɓe, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe njaɓaay.
Ammaa jonta, an Isra'iila
To a ɗon ta'a caka ndiyam lugguɗam, min mi wondan bee maaɗa, to a ɗon taƴta maaje, ɗe moɗataa ma. To a nasti yiite, a wulataa, ɗemŋgal yiite naawnataa ma.
Ngam min woni Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa, min Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, mi kisnoowo ma. Mi hokkan Misra ngam soottugo ma, Etiyopiya e Seba mbattudi ma.
A ɗon bee saman haa gite am, a tedduɗo, mi yiɗi ma boo. Ngam maajum ndokkanmi ummaatooje goɗɗe mbattudi ma ngam hisnugo yoŋki ma.
Taa hul, ngam min mi ɗon wondi bee ma. Diga fuunaaŋge kooranmi danygol ma, diga hiirnaaŋge boo mooɓtanmi yimɓe ma.
Mi wi'an woyla: Yooftu ɓe! Mi wi'an fombina boo: Taa jogita ɓe! Acce ɓiɓɓe am worɓe e rewɓe ngara diga daayiiɗum, diga keerol duniyaaru.
Ɓe ewnaaɓe bee innde am, mi tagi ɓe ngam mawninki tedduŋgal am.”
Ngurtine ummaatoore nde'e: Nde woodi gite, ammaa nde yi'ataa. Nde woodi noppi boo, ammaa nde nanataa!

Ummaatooje fuu mooɓotira, jama'aaje fuu kawta. Moy caka ɗowanteeɓe maɓɓe anndinta en kuuje garanɗe? Moy caka maɓɓe anndinta kuuje ɓooymaaje? Sey ɓe ndarna seedooɓe maɓɓe ngam ɓe ngooŋɗina ko'e maɓɓe, haa en nana, en mbi'a: Gooŋga.

Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Onon yimɓe Isra'iila on seedanooɓe yam, onon on sukaaɓe am ɓe cuɓmi ɗum, haa on anndammi, on nuɗɗinammi, on paama ɗum min. Walaa ɗowanteeɗo aarti yam, non boo walaa mo laatoto ɓaawo am.
Min woni Jawmiraawo, walaa kisnoowo sonaa min.
Mi anndini, mi hisni, mi wooyni. Walaa ɗowanteeɗo jananno meeɗi waɗugo ɗum caka mooɗon.” Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Onon on seedanooɓe yam, min boo mi Allah.
Koo yeeso ɗo, ɗum min. Walaa kisnanɗo e juŋngo am. Ko mi waɗi, moy sannjata ɗum?”
Jawmiraawo coottoowo on, Ceniiɗo Isra'iila wi'i: “Ngam daliila mooɗon nelanmi goɗɗo haa Baabila, mi do'an jamɗe kaɓɓirgal, mi wartiran seyo Kaldiya'en bojji.
Min woni Jawmiraawo, Ceniiɗo mooɗon, tagɗo Isra'iila, Laamiiɗo mooɗon.”
Jawmiraawo seeki laawol dow mbeela, dow ndiyamji cemmbiɗɗi,
yahri jama'aare konu semmbiɗnde bee mootaaji e pucci haa konu. Yimɓe maare ndo'ake, ɓe ummitittaako, ɓe mbaati, ɓe nyifi bana pittirlayel.
Taa ciftore haala ɓooyma, taa kakkilane ko laati naane.
Ndaa, mi ɗon waɗa kesum, jonta ɗum ɗon fuɗɗa. On anndataa ɗum na? Mi seekan laawol nder ladde, mi waɗanan on maaje haa harde.
Dabbaaji ladde teddintam, cuuli e dabbi fuu. Ngam mi ilnan maaje dow harde haa mi yarna ummaatoore am suɓaande.
Ummaatoore nde mbaɗmi ɗum ngam hoore am anndinan maŋgtoore am.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “On ewnaaki innde am nder do'a, danygol Yaakubu! On cafti yam, onon Isra'iila'en!
On ngaddanaay yam baali mon guleteeɗi. On teddinaay yam bee kirseteeɗi mon. Mi doolaay on waddango yam dokke nyaamdu, mi somnaay on bee uurle.
On majjinaay ceede ngam soodanango yam ƴommbe belɗe. On kaarnaay yam bee ɓellere kirseteeɗi mon. Ammaa on macciɗini yam bee hakkeeji mon, on comni yam bee aybeeji mon.
Min mi ittan zunuubaaji mon ngam daliila innde am, mi siftortaa hakkeeji mon.
Siftinoram ko a feliri yam, mbaɗen kiita, mbolwe haa ngooŋɗinon ko'e mooɗon.
Kaaka mon aartuɗo waɗi hakke, ardiiɓe mon boo tuurtani yam.
Ngam maajum coɓnumi ardiiɓe suudu seniindu, mi do'i danygol Yaakubu kiita nattere, mi acci jananɓe kuɗa yimɓe Isra'iila.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Jonta nan kadi, an suka am Isra'iila, danygol Yaakubu, ummaatoore am suɓaande!
Min Jawmiraawo mi waɗi ma, mi tagi ma nder reedu daada ma, mi balloowo ma. Taa hul, an suka am Yaakubu, an mo cuɓmi.
Ngam mi rufan ndiyam dow lesdi marndi haaje ndiyam e maaje dow lesdi njoorndi. Mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow ɓiɓɓe mon e barka am boo dow danygol mon.
Ɓe puɗan caka huɗo, bana leɗɗe kommbi maaje ilanɗe.
Oo wi'an: Min mo Jawmiraawo. Oya ewnoto hoore mum bee innde Yaakubu. Goɗɗo winndan dow juŋngo mum: Min mo Jawmiraawo. Goɗɗo feere boo inndan hoore mum Isra'iila.”
Jawmiraawo Laamiiɗo e coottoowo Isra'iila, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, wi'i: “Min woni arano, min woni ragareejo. Walaa Allah, sonaa min
Moy nanndi bee am? Sey o wara, o wolwa ɗum, o anndina ko waɗi diga mi jo'ini yimɓe ɓooyma e ko tammi laataago waato kuuje garanɗe.
Taa kultore, taa ndiwne! Naa min mi anndini on ɗum diga naane na? Onon on seedanooɓe yam. Woodi Allah na, sonaa min? Min woni tapaare mon semmbiɗnde, walaa feere.”
Waɗooɓe labbi fuu ɓe huunde meere. Kuuɗe maɓɓe ɓurɗe wooɗugo nafataa sam. Ɗe laati seedooɓe maaji, ɗe ngi'ataa, ɗe ngalaa anndal. Ngam maajum yimɓe ɓe'e cemtan.
Ɗum faataare ngam mo waɗanta hoore mum ɗowanteeɗo malla ɓolinta suura lawru ka nafataa sam?
Ndaa, hawtiɗiraaɓe maako fuu toskoto. Ngam waawɓe sanaa'a ɓe'e, kamɓe boo ɓe ɓiɓɓe Aadama. Sey ɓe mooɓotira, ɓe fuu ɓe ndaro. Ɓe kultoran, ɓe cemtan ɓe fuu.
Kilaajo ɗon waɗa fe'irde, ɗon huuwa bee yiite ƴulɓe. Juŋngo maako semmbiɗŋgo ɗon tappa bee tappirɗum murlum! Dolo naawan mo, semmbe maako jinnan. O yaraay ndiyam, ngam maajum o soman.
Cehoowo foondan leggal, diida ko tammi sehugo dow maagal, wartira ngal suura cehaaŋga. O foondan nga bee poondirɗum, hokka nga jaati goɗɗo, nanndina nga bee ɓii-Aadamaajo haa jo'ina nga nder suudu.
O fe'a leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe malla o hoo'a lekki makki e irin maaki, o acca ɗum mawnida bee leɗɗe laynde. Malla o juba leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe, iyeende mawnina ɗe.
Ɗum laatanto goɗɗo kuɓɓirɗum. O hoo'an goɗɗum maaje, o huɓɓan ɗe ngam o aytino e o sa'ira tamseeje boo. Bee leggal luttuŋgal o sehan ɗowanteeɗo, o rewa ɗum. O waɗan lawru, o sujidanan ndu.
Reeta maaje o wulan ɗe. Bee reeta man o nyaanciran kusel, o nyaama haa o haara. O aytinto boo, o wi'an: “Yowwa! Mi ɗon maata gulɗum, yiite nge'e wooɗi.”
Ammaa bee luttuɗum o waɗan ɗowanteeɗo, lawru maako. O sujidana ndu, o rewa ndu. O toroto ndu, o wi'a: “Hisnam, ngam an woni ɗowanteeɗo am!”
Ɓe ngalaa anndal e faamu. Gite maɓɓe takkaama, ngam taa ɓe ngi'a, ɓerɗe maɓɓe boo maɓɓaaɗe, ngam taa ɓe paama.

Walaa numanɗo koo gooto. Walaa anndal, walaa faamu sakko goɗɗo wi'a: “Reeta maaje ngulmi ɗe, dow ƴulɓe maaje ca'umi tamseeje e nyaancumi kusel, nyaammi. Bee luttuɗe ngaarumi huunde nyiddunde! Mi ɗon sujidana wuddere leggal!”
Ɗum faataare bana nyaamugo ndoondi. Faataare ɓernde maako majjini mo, o hisnataa yoŋki maako. O faamataa ko woni haa juŋngo maako, ɗum lawru meere.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Siftor ɗum, danygol Yaakubu, ummaatoore Isra'iila, ngam a suka am. Mi tagi ma haa laatoɗa suka am, mi yejjitittaa ma sam, Isra'iila.
Mi riiwan zunuubaaji ma bana cuurɗe, hakkeeji ma boo bana ruuldere. Lorta haa am, ngam min sootti ma.”

Onon asamanji, ceye ngam Jawmiraawo waɗi ɗum! Mbaɗe gookaali seyo, onon luggeeŋgaaji lesdi! Mbelmbelte, onon kooseeje, an laynde e leɗɗe nder maare fuu! Ngam Jawmiraawo sootti danygol Yaakubu, o waŋgini tedduŋgal maako haa Isra'iila.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, coottoowo ma, tagɗo ma nder reedu daada ma wi'i: “Min woni Jawmiraawo, baɗoowo koo ɗume fuu. Min feere am mi we'iti asamanji. Saa'i mi we'iti lesdi, moy wonduno bee am?
Mi ɗon wirga alaamaaji fewooɓe. Mi ɗon wartira waɗooɓe hatti faataaɓe. Mi ɗon lortina hikma'en ɓaawo, mi ɗon wartira anndal maɓɓe faataare
Ammaa mi ɗon tabitina wolde suka am, mi ɗon hiɓɓina nufayeeje nelaaɓe am. Mi wi'an dow Urusaliima: Yimɓe njooɗoto ton, dow gure Yahuuda boo: Ɓe nyiɓtoto ɗe. Mi mahitan bille maaje.
Mi wi'an ndiyam lugguɗam: Yoor! Mi ɓeeɓnan maaje maaɗa!
Mi wi'an Koores: A gaynaako am! A hiɓɓinan muuyo am fuu. A umran nyiɓtaago Urusaliima. A umran wallingo caɓɓaaje haykaliiru boo

Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i Koores laamiiɗo mo o moyti, mo o naŋngi juŋngo mum nyaamo ngam do'ugo ummaatooje yeeso maako, ngam ɓortugo laamiiɓe, ngam maɓɓititgo dammuɗe berniiji yeeso maako, taa pareeje maɓɓe fahin:
“Min mi ardoto ma, mi leesnan pelle towɗe, mi fusan pareeje njamndi, mi yewan jamɗe palduɗe.
Mi hokkete ndesaaje sirriije e nyukkiiɗe haa annda min woni Jawmiraawo, min Allah Isra'iila, mi ewni ma bee innde ma.
Mi ewni ma bee innde ma daliila Yaakubu suka am e daliila ummaatoore Isra'iila nde cuɓmi ɗum. Mi hokki ma soomoore teddunde, asee boo a anndaa yam.
Min woni Jawmiraawo, walaa goɗɗo feere sam. Walaa Allah, sonaa min. A anndaa yam, ammaa mi hokki ma baawɗe.
Mi waɗi ɗum haa yimɓe diga fuunaaŋge haa hiirnaaŋge paama, walaa Allah sonaa min. Min woni Jawmiraawo, walaa goɗɗo feere sam!
Mi waɗi annoora, mi tagi nyiɓre boo. Mi waɗi hayru, mi tagi sarru boo. Min Jawmiraawo waɗata kuuje ɗe'e fuu.
Asamanji, toɓne saawawre! Duule acce adilaaku ila! Lesdi maɓɓito, jaɓa ɗum haa ndi fuɗna kisndam e adilaaku! Min Jawmiraawo tagi ɗum fuu.”
Bone laatanto jokkiranɗo bee baɗɗo ɗum, ngam o fayannde caka payanɗe ɗe loope. Fakat, loope kecce potaay wi'ugo mahoowo: Ko mbaɗata? Kuugal maaɗa nafataa sam
Bone laatanto bi'anɗo baaba mum: Koni ndanyata? Malla daada mum: Koni ɓesnata?
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, tagɗo ummaatoore nde'e wi'i: “On ƴamatam haala kuuje garanɗe na? On umratam dow ɓikkoy am e dow ko kuuwanmi na? Kayya!
Min waɗi lesdi, min tagi neɗɗo dow maari. Juuɗe am mbe'iti asamanji, min ɗowata jama'aaje man fuu.
Min ummini Koores nder adilaaku, mi wo'itinan laabi maako fuu. Kaŋko o nyiɓtoto berniwol am, o yooftan yimɓe am dahaaɓe, naa daliila ceede malla caahuuji.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.

Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Risku Misra e bote filu Etiyopiya e Seba'en juuta-darɗe'en ngaran haa mooɗon, laatanto on. Ɓe tokkoto on, ɓe haɓɓaaɓe bee callalluuji, ɓe turoto yeeso mooɗon, ɓe ceedoto: Allah kam haa mooɗon tan woni, walaa ɗowanteeɗo feere.”
Fakat a Allah cuuɗiiɗo, Allah Isra'iila, kisnoowo!
Sehooɓe labbi fuu cemtan, keewan mbustu e toskaare.
Ammaa yimɓe Isra'iila keɓan kisndam nduumiiɗam haa Jawmiraawo. Ɓe cemtataa, ɓe meeɗataa mbustu haa abada abadin!
Jawmiraawo tagi asamanji, kaŋko woni Allah. O waɗi lesdi, o tabitini ndi. O tagaay ndi ngam haa ndi ferwa, ammaa ngam yimɓe njooɗo ton. Ndaa nii o wi'i: “Min woni Jawmiraawo, walaa Allah feere sam.
Mi wolwaay nder cuuɗiiɗum malla haa nokkuure nyiɓɓunde. Mi wi'aay yimɓe danygol Yaakubu: Ɗaɓɓiteeɗam meere! Ngam min woni Jawmiraawo, bolwanɗo gooŋga. Mi ɗon anndina ko fotti.”
Mooɓotire, ngare, ɓadite hawtaade, onon luttuɓe ummaatooje! Roondotooɓe lawru muuɗum'en ndu leggal e torotooɓe ɗowanteeɗo mo waawataa hisnugo, ɓe ngalaa anndal.

Ngare, mbaŋgine hujjaaji mon, carwootire hakkunde mooɗon! Moy yecci ɗum diga ɓooyma? Moy anndini ɗum diga naane? Naa min Jawmiraawo na? Walaa Allah, sonaa min. Allah adiliijo, kisnoowo feere woodaa, sey min.
“Kadi ngaylite haa am, kise, onon yimɓe haa keeri duniyaaru fuu! Ngam min woni Allah, walaa goɗɗo feere sam.
Mi ɗon hunoro hoore am, ko mbi'anmi ɗum gooŋga, ɗum waylataako: Koppi fuu tugganto yam, ɗemɗe fuu kunanto yam
Yimɓe ɓe'e mbi'an: Haa Jawmiraawo tan adilaaku e semmbe ngoni. Ammaa wanyɓe yam fuu ngaran yeeso am, ɓe cemtan.
Min Jawmiraawo mi adilinan danygol Isra'iila fuu, kamɓe boo ɓe mbelmbeltan.”
“Beel turake, Nebo
Labbi ɗi'i ngibbi, ɗi njani hawtaade, ɗi mbaawataa hisnugo dimŋgal man. Kanji ndahata ko'e maaji.
Naneeɗam, onon danygol Yaakubu, onon luttuɓe yimɓe Isra'iila fuu. Min efti on diga reedu daada mon. Mi roondi on diga danyeeki mon.
Mi wallan on boo haa yotto ndottaaku mon, haa on mbaɗa dandanndi. Mi eftan on, mi wallan on, mi hisnan on.
Bee ɗume nanndinton yam haa on potna yam bee maako? Bee moy nanndinton yam haa min nanndida?
Yimɓe maɓɓitan boorooji muuɗum'en, ngurtinan kaŋŋeeri, ɓe awnan cardi bee awnorɗum. Ɓe njoɓan tappoowo kaŋŋeeri haa o wartira ɗum lawru. Nden ɓe teddina ndu, ɓe cujidana ndu.

Ɓe eftan ndu dow balbe maɓɓe, ɓe ndoondoto ndu, nden ɓe njippina ndu haa nokkuure maaru. Ton ndu daroto, ndu sottataa e pellel maaru. Ɓe ngookanan ndu, ammaa ndu jaabataako, ndu hisnataa goɗɗo e ɓillaare muuɗum.
Ciftore ɗum, laate suusɓe! Kakkilane ɗum, onon tuurtooɓe.
Ciftore kuuje aartuɗe, laatiiɗe ɓooyma. Ngam min woni Allah, walaa goɗɗo feere sam. Min woni Allah, walaa nannduɗo bee am.
Diga fuɗɗoode, mi anndini ko tammi laataago, diga ɓooyma mi anndini on kuuje ɗe ciwaa laataago. Nufaye am hiɓɓan. Mi waɗan ko ngiɗmi fuu.
Mi ewnoto dutal haa fuunaaŋge, haa lesdi ndaayiindi ewnotoomi goɗɗo kiɓɓinanɗo nufayeeje am. Ko mbi'mi, mi laatinan ɗum boo. Ko nufiimi, mi waɗan ɗum boo.
Naneeɗam, onon saata-ko'e'en, daayiiɓe adilaaku!
Mi ɗon ɓadina adilaaku am, ngu daayaaki, kisndam am neeɓataa wargo. Mi hokkan kisndam haa Siyona. Mi hokkan Isra'iila daraja am.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “An Baabila, jippa leeso laamu ma, jooɗa nder mbulwuldi lesdi. Naane a nanndi bee paanyo debbo, a berniwol Kaldiya'en. Ammaa a meetataa ewneego neeminiiɗo, ɗelemɗo.
Hoo'u namarde, namu! Sudditit yeeso ma, ɓaŋgtu limce ma, sudditit kosɗe ma, eera maaje!
Temmbuki ma waŋga, koo moy yi'a toskaare ma. Mi waatoto, walaa mo haɗatammi!”
Non coottoowo amin wi'i. Innde maako Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Ceniiɗo Isra'iila.
Jooɗa siriw, nastu nder nyiɓre, berniwol Kaldiya'en! A meetataa ewneego jawmu laamuuji.
Mi tikkanino ummaatoore am, mi soɓnuno maral am, mi hokkuno ɓe haa juŋngo ma. A yurminaay ɓe, a yowani koo nayeejo boo kaɓɓirgal tedduŋgal.
A ɗonno wi'a: Mi laamoto haa foroy. A hakkilanaay kuuje ɗe'e, a numaay dow ko tammi laataago.
Jonta kam, nan ɗu'um, an cuunaaɗo neeminaare, jooɗiiɗo nder de'ere, an bi'anɗo nder ɓernde ma: Sey min, walaa goɗɗo sam! Mi meeɗataa laataago debbo jurumɗo, mi sooyataa ɓikkoy.

Ammaa kuuje ɗiɗi ɗe'e: Sooynde gorko e sooynde ɓikkoy ngaran dow ma nder saa'iire woore, nder nyalaade woore. Ɗe ngaran dow ma bee semmbe maaje fuu koo to hiilaaji ma ɗuuɗi, koo to moccooje ma ɗuuɗi masin
A ɗonno hoolo halleende ma. A wi'i: Walaa mo yi'atammi. Hikma ma e anndal ma majjini ma. A wi'i nder ɓernde ma: Sey min, walaa goɗɗo sam!
Sarru waran dow ma, a waawataa daaynugo ngu bee hiila. Masiibo ukkanto ma, a waawataa daɗugo mo. Bilaa anndaaŋgal ma, halkere waran dow ma bee juhuki.
“Kadi, dara dow sirriiji ma, bee hiilaaji ma ɗuuɗɗi ɗi kuuwɗa bee tiɗɗinaare diga nderkaaku ma. Teema ɗi nafete, teema a hulnan konne'en
A somi ngam sawariiji ɗi keɓɗa fuu. Sey annduɓe haala koode asama, yeccooɓe ko heɓete nde lewru dari fuu ndaro, ɓe kisne.
Ndaa, ɓe laati bana geene joorɗe, yiite nyaaman ɓe. Ɓe ndaɗataa ɗemŋgal yiite. Naa ɗum ƴulɓe ngam sa'ugo tamseeje malla boo ngam aytinaago.
Hiila'en ɓe comnuɗa hoore ma daliila muuɗum'en laatoto bana non. A tiini sarwaago ɓe diga nderkaaku ma. Jonta boo koo moy ɗon tiito yeeso muuɗum, walaa mo waawata hisnugo ma
Nane ɗu'um, onon yimɓe Yaakubu, ewnaaɓe bee innde Isra'iila, onon danygol Yahuuda: On ɗon kunoro bee innde Jawmiraawo, on ɗon ewno Allah Isra'iila, ammaa naa bee gooŋgaaku e adilaaku.
On ɗon ewno ko'e mon bee innde berniwol ceniiŋgol, on ɗon tuugo dow Allah Isra'iila mo innde mum Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Diga ɓooyma mi wooyni, mi anndini kuuje aartuɗe laataago. Nden mi waɗi ɗum, ɗum laati bee juhuki.
Mi anndi ko'e mon caati bana njamndi, bana njamndi mboɗeeri.
Ngam maajum anndinmi on ɗum diga ɓooyma, hiddeko ɗum laato. Mi yecci on ɗum, ngam taa on mbi'a: Lawru amin waɗi ɗum. Suura amin cehaaŋga e suura amin ɓolinaaŋga umri ɗum.
On nani ɗum, on ndaari ɗum fuu! Onon boo on anndintaa ɗum na?
“Diga jonta ngeccanmi on kuuje kese, kuuje cuuɗiiɗe ɗe on anndaa.
Jonta ɗe tagaama, naa ɓooyma. Haa wargo hannde on meeɗaayno nanugo haala maaje, ngam taa on mbi'a: Min anndi ɗe!
On meeɗaay nanugo koo anndugo ɗe. Noppi mon maɓɓitaaki diga ɓooyma. Ngam mi anndi on zammbooɓe, ɓe ewni on tuurtooɓe diga reedu daada.
Ngam daliila innde am paasitanmi tikkere am. Ngam daliila maŋgtoore am naŋgtumi hoore am, ngam taa mi nattina on.
Ndaa, mi laɓɓini on, ammaa naa bana cardi. Mi foondi on nder ɓolinirde ɓillaare.
Ngam daliila hoore am tan mbaɗanmi ɗum. Mi accataa goɗɗo soɓna innde am. Mi hokkataa goɗɗo feere tedduŋgal am.”
“Naneeɗam, onon yimɓe Isra'iila, danygol Yaakubu, ewnaaɓe am! Min woni arano, min boo ragareejo.
Juŋngo am saɓɓi lesdi, nyaamo am we'iti asamanji. To mi ewnake lesdi e asamanji, ɗum fuu ɗum darodotto.
Mooɓe, on fuu, nane! Moy caka ɗowanteeɓe anndini kuuje ɗe'e? Goɗɗo mo ngiɗmi ɗum, kaŋko o hiɓɓinan muuyo am dow Baabila, juŋngo maako yowoto dow Kaldiya'en.
Min, min feere am wolwi, mi ewni mo, mi waddi mo, nufaye maako hiɓɓan.
Ɓaditeeɗam, nane ɗu'um: Diga fuɗɗam mi wolwaay bee sirri. Diga fuɗɗoode kuuje ɗe'e, mi ɗon.” – Ammaa jonta Jawmiraawo Allah neli yam bee Ruuhu muuɗum.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, coottoowo on, Ceniiɗo Isra'iila wi'i: “Min woni Jawmiraawo Allah mon, ekkitinɗo on ko nafata on. Mi ɗowan on dow laawol ngol tokkotooɗon.
Kadi, to on kakkilanino umrooje am, salaaman mooɗon ilanno bana ndiyam nder maayo, adilaaku mooɗon bana ƴuuge mbeela.
Danygol mon laatotono bana njaareendi, ngol ɗuuɗanno bana gabbe maari. Innde maɓɓe nattataano, nde halkataano yeeso am.”
Ngurte Baabila, ndogge Kaldiya'en! Anndine ɗum bee hoolo seyo, ngooyne ɗum! Njahre habaru man haa keerol duniyaaru, mbi'e: “Jawmiraawo sootti suka mum Yaakubu
Ɓe maatataa ɗomka haa ladde haa o ɗowata ɓe. O ilnanan ɓe ndiyam e tapaare. O seekan tapaare, ndiyam ila.
“Walaa salaaman ngam halluɓe sam.” Nii Jawmiraawo wi'i
Naneeɗam, onon duuɗe! Keɗite, onon ummaatooje daayiiɗe! Jawmiraawo ewni yam diga mi siwaa danyeego. Diga reedu daada am o ewni innde am
O waɗi hunnduko am bana kaafahi belki. O suddi yam bee ɗowdi juŋngo maako. O wartiri yam kurol ceeɓŋgol, o suuɗi yam nder ɓaaru maako
O wi'i yam: “An Isra'iila, a suka am. Bee maaɗa mbaŋginiranmi tedduŋgal am.”
Ammaa mi wi'i: “Mi somni hoore am meere, mi majjini semmbe am meere, walaa nafuuda. Ammaa fakat geɗal am haa Jawmiraawo woni, mbarjaari am ɗon haa Allah am.”

Jonta Jawmiraawo ɗon wolwa – O waɗi yam diga reedu daada am haa mi laato suka maako, mi lortina danygol Yaakubu haa maako, mi mooɓta Isra'iila haa maako. Ngam mi tedduɗo haa gite Jawmiraawo, Allah am woni semmbe am –
O wi'i: “Laataago suka am ummitinanɗo le'i Yaakubu, lortinanɗo luttuɓe Isra'iila, he'aay. Mi waɗete a annoora ummaatooje, haa kisndam am yotto keeri duniyaaru

Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, Allah Ceniiɗo, kisnoowo Isra'iila wi'i jawaaɗo, ganyaaɗo ummaatoore, maccuɗo toonyooɓe: “Laamiiɓe ngi'an ɗum, ɓe ummoto. Ardiiɓe ngi'an ɗum, ɓe cujidan ngam daliila Jawmiraawo koolniiɗo, ngam daliila Ceniiɗo Isra'iila mo suɓi ma.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Wakkati mo'ere mi jaɓi tornde ma, nyalaade kisndam mi walli ma. Mi ɗon ayne haa laatoɗa alkawal ummaatoore, haa mbo'itina lesdi, cenndana yimɓe maral maɓɓe bonniiŋgal jonta
haa mbi'a haɓɓaaɓe: Ngurte, wonɓe nder nyiɓre boo: Mbaŋge haa jayŋgol. Ɓe nduran bana tokkere haa laabi, towndiije cooke fuu laatoto durduɗe maɓɓe.
Ɓe maatataa dolo koo ɗomka fahin. Henndu wulndu e naaŋge naawnataa ɓe, ngam kinnotooɗo ɓe ɗowan ɓe, yahran ɓe haa ceeɓooje ndiyam
Mi wartiran kooseeje am fuu laawol. Buuwi am towtan dow lesdi.
Ndaa, yimɓe am ɗon ngara diga daayiiɗum, woɗɓe diga woyla e hiirnaaŋge, woɗɓe boo diga lesdi Sinim haa fombina Misra.”
Koole bee seyo, onon asamanji, welweltu, an lesdi! Onon kooseeje, mbaɗe hoolo seyo, ngam Jawmiraawo de'itini ummaatoore muuɗum, o ɗon hinno ɓilliiɓe maako.
Ammaa Siyona wi'i: “Jawmiraawo acci yam, Allah yejjiti yam.”
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Debbo yejjitan musinanŋgel mum na? O enɗataa ɓii reedu maako na? Koo to daada yejjiti ɓiyum, min mi yejjitittaa ma sam.
Ndaa, mi winndi innde ma nder newe am. Tum mi ɗon numa dow mahi maaɗa.
Ɓiɓɓe ma ɗon ngara bee jaawal, wonnooɓe ma e wilooɓe ma ngurtoto yaasi.
Tijja, laar nder taarde fuu: Yimɓe ma fuu ɗon mooɓo, ɗon ngara haa maaɗa. Fakat bana min Jawmiraawo mi geeto! Mi wi'i ɗum, a jaagnorto ɓe bana fawne, a haɓɓan ɓe haa maaɗa bana ɓaŋgeteeɗo.
Lesdi ma nattinaama, ndi ferwi, ndi laati winnde. Ammaa jonta, fakat ndi faaɗanan jooɗiiɓe ton. Wilooɓe ma boo ndaayoto.
Ɓikkoy maaɗa koy cooynooɗa mbi'ete: Nokkuure nde'e faaɗani min, hokku min babal haa min njooɗo.
An boo a wi'an nder ɓernde ma: Moy danyani yam koy? Mi sooyno ɓikkoy, mi dimarono, mi dahaaɗono, gudinaaɗo. Moy mawnini koy? Ndaa, mi geewaaɗono. Toy koy ngonno?”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah wi'i: “Mi ɓaŋgtan juŋngo am heedi ummaatooje, mi darnan tuutawal am heedi jama'aaje. Ɓe lortinan ɓiɓɓe ma worɓe dow juuɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe ndoondoto ɓiɓɓe ma rewɓe dow balbe maɓɓe.
Laamiiɓe laatoto nyaamnooɓe ma, mayram'en boo musininooɓe ma. Ɓe cujidante, geese maɓɓe haa lesdi. Ɓe tahan mbulwuldi e kosɗe ma. Nden a anndan min woni Jawmiraawo. Hooliiɓe yam cemtintaake.”
Ɓe njaɓtan konoowo keɓal muuɗum na? Haɓɓaaɓe marɗo baawɗe ndaɗan na?
Jawmiraawo ɗon wi'a: “Nonnon, ɓe njaɓtan koo haɓɓaaɓe konoowo boo. Keɓal marɗo baawɗe daɗan. Mi honan honanɓe ma, mi hisnan ɓikkoy ma.
Mi nyaamnan ɓillooɓe ma kusel ɓalli muuɗum'en. Ɓe nguykiran ƴiiƴam maɓɓe bana bee inaboojam kesam. Nden kam, yimɓe fuu anndan min woni Jawmiraawo, kisnoowo ma, coottoowo ma, Baawɗo Yaakubu.”

Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Toy ɗereewol ceergal ngol mi seeri daada mooɗon bee maajum? Malla tokkiiɗo yam nyamaande moy coorrumi on haa muuɗum? Ndaa on coorraama ngam daliila zunuubaaji mon. Ngam daliila aybeeji mon daada mooɗon seeraama.

Nde ngarmi, koni walaa koo goɗɗo haa ɗo? Nde ewniimi, koni walaa jaabiiɗo? Kadi juŋngo am rammi, he'ataa rimɗingo na? Semmbe am he'aay hisnugo na? Ndaa, bee umroore am telɓananmi mbeela, njoornanmi nga, ngartiranmi maaje ladde meere. Liɗɗi gonɗi ton mbaatan daliila ɗomka, ɗi nyolan ngam ndiyam woodaa.
Mi ɓornan asamanji nyiɓre, mi suddan ɗi bee leppol buhuure.”
Allah Jawmiraawo hokki yam ɗemŋgal pukara'en haa mi waawa semmbiɗingo comɗo bee wolde. O findinammi nde weeti fuu, o fiɗɗi noppi am haa mi nana bana pukara'en nanirta.
Allah Jawmiraawo maɓɓitani yam nofru, min boo mi tuurtaay, mi loraaki ɓaawo.
Mi hokki ɓoccuɓe yam ɓaawo am, mi suuɗaay galaŋge am nde ɓe ɗoofi wakkude am, nde ɓe kuɗi yam, ɓe tuuti yam tuuɗe
Ammaa Allah Jawmiraawo walli yam. Ngam maajum mi toskaaki. Ngam maajum mi suusɗini hoore am, mi anndi mi semtintaake.
Adilinanɗo yam o ɓadiiɗo. Moy yiɗi wullaago yam? Sey ndaroden haa kiita. Moy dartinta gooŋga am? O ɓadito yam!
Ndaa, Jawmiraawo Allah yiidatam. Moy aybintammi? Ndaa, ɓe fuu ɓe kiiɗan bana limce, gilɗi nyaaman ɓe
Moy caka mooɗon ɗon hula Jawmiraawo bee nanugo sawtu suka maako? Koo moy jahanɗo nder nyiɓre, mo annoora yaynantaa ɗum, sey o hoolo innde Jawmiraawo, o tuugo dow Allah maako.
Ammaa onon huɓɓuɓe yiite, taaskiiɓe bee kuri giiteleeji fuu, naste nder yiite mon e kuri giiteleeji mon ɗi kuɓɓuɗon. Juŋngo Jawmiraawo waɗani on ɗum, on mbaaloto haa nokkuure bone.
Naneeɗam, onon yiɗɓe adilaaku, onon ɗakkotirɓe bee Jawmiraawo. Ndaare tapaare nde cehaaɗon nder muuɗum, ngaska ɓulndu boo ndu ngurtinaaɗon nder muuɗum.
Ciftore kaaka mon Ibrahiima e Saraatu, danyɗo on. Mi ewni Ibrahiima, saa'i o walaano ɓiŋngel. Mi barkiɗini mo, mi ɗuɗɗini mo.
Jawmiraawo de'itinan Siyona, o yurminan bille maagol fuu. O wartiran ladde maagol bana Adnin, harde maagol bana jarne Jawmiraawo. Ngol heewan seyo e welwelo, maŋgtooje e gime.
“Keɗiteeɗam, onon yimɓe ummaatoore am! Naneeɗam, onon yimɓe jama'aaje am! Ngam tawreeta iwan haa am. Mi darnan kiita am ngooŋɗuka haa ka laato annoora ummaatooje.
Adilaaku am ɓadake, kisndam am waŋgan, juuɗe am kiitoto ummaatooje. Duuɗe tammorto yam, ɗe ngeloto juŋngo am.
Tijje asama, ndaare lesdi haa les. Ngam asamanji caakoto bana cuurɗe, lesdi hiiɗan bana limce, jooɗiiɓe haa maari maayan bana buubi. Ammaa kisndam am duumoto haa foroy, adilaaku am ɗon tabiti tum.
Naneeɗam, onon annduɓe adilaaku, onon jogiiɓe tawreeta am nder ɓerɗe mon! Taa kule feloore yimɓe, taa ndiwtore daliila kuudi maɓɓe.
Ngam gilɗi nyaaman ɓe bana limce, somre nyaaman ɓe bana gaasa baali. Ammaa adilaaku am duumoto haa foroy, kisndam am tabitan diga yidere haa yidere.”
Fin, fin! Ɓorna baawɗe, an juŋngo Jawmiraawo! Fin bana nder nyalɗe ɓooyma, bana nder wakkati gide caaliiɗe. Naa an ta'i Rahab geɓe geɓe, yuwi kuuŋga mbeela?
Naa an ɓeeɓni mbeela, ndiyamji ilam lugguɗam, a waɗi laawol dow ndiyamji lugguɗi, haa hisnaaɓe ma caalo?
Rimɗinaaɓe Jawmiraawo ngartan, nastan Siyona bee hoolo seyo. Seyo duumiiŋgo heewan ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe keɓan welwelo e seyo, ngam mettamɓeram e uumaali laatantaako ɓe fahin.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Min, min feere am de'itinta on. Koni kuloton neɗɗo maayanɗo, ɓii Aadama nannduɗo bee huɗo?
On ngejjiti Jawmiraawo tagɗo on, mo we'iti asamanji, mo jo'ini lesdi dow caɓɓaaje maari na? On ndiwnan foroy yeeso tikkere ɓillooɓe on, anninɓe halkugo on na? Kadi, toy tikkere maɓɓe yahata?
Nii seɗɗa ɓe njooftan haɓɓaaɓe. Ɓe maayataa nder ngaska. Ɓe cooyataa nyaamdu.
Ngam min woni Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon, laanyanɗo mbeela, umminanɗo ƴuuge mbaɗa hoolo. Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama woni innde am.
Mi we'iti asamanji, mi jo'ini lesdi dow caɓɓaaje maari. Mi wi'i jooɗiiɓe haa Siyona: Onon on ummaatoore am. Mi waɗi bolle am nder kunnduɗe mon, mi suddi on bee ɗowdi juŋngo am.”
Fin, fin! Umma, an Urusaliima! A yari jardugel tikkere ngel juŋngo Jawmiraawo hokki ma. A yari ko woni nder jardugel fuu haa ɗum hokki ma giilol
Walaa ɗowuɗo ma caka ɓikkoy koy ndanyɗa fuu. Walaa naŋnguɗo ma juŋngo caka ɓikkoy koy mawninɗa.
Masiibooji ɗiɗi ɗi'i keɓi ma: Lesdi ma wonni, laati bille, yimɓe ma maayi bee dolo e kaafahi. Moy woyete, moy de'itinte?
Ɓiɓɓe ma tampi, njani. Ɓe ɗon mbaali haa nyobborle laabi bana jabaare nder tuuforgol. Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa rufi tikkere mum dow maɓɓe, o telɓani ɓe.
Ngam maajum, nane ɗu'um, onon yarɓe bone, onon wuykuɓe, ammaa naa bee inaboojam.
Ndaa ko Allah, Allah Jawmiraawo mon jiŋnganɗo ummaatoore mum wi'i: “Mi hoositan diga juŋngo maaɗa jardugel tikkere am, ngel hokkino ma giilol. A meetataa yarugo ngel!
Mi hokkan ngel haa juuɗe toonyinooɓe on, wi'ɓe on: Ture haa min njaaɓa dow mooɗon. Onon boo on ngartiri ɓaawe mon bana lesdi, bana laawol ngol yimɓe tokkoto foroy.”
Fin, fin! Ɓorna baawɗe ma, an Siyona, ɓorna jaage ma, an Urusaliima, berniwol ceniiŋgol! Ngam saadooniijo malla coɓɗo nastataa haa ma fahin
Fiɗɗu collaaje ma, darta, jooɗa, an Urusaliima! Piiste kaɓɓorli haa daaɗe mon, onon yimɓe Siyona haɓɓaaɓe!
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ɓe coorri on meere, min boo mi soottan on bilaa ceede.”
Allah Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ɓooyma yimɓe ummaatoore am njippi haa Misra, njooɗoyi ton. Nden Assuura'en ɓilli ɓe bilaa daliila.
Jonta boo, ko mbaɗanmi? Ɓe kooci yimɓe am bilaa daliila. Toonyooɓe ɓe ɗon koola. Ɓe ɗon nyalla wolwugo kalluka dow innde am
Ngam maajum yimɓe am anndan innde am nyannde feere. Nyannde man ɓe anndan min wi'i: Ndaa yam ɗo!”
Ɗume wooɗiri dow kooseeje bana kosɗe gaazoowo habaru seyo? O ɗon wooyna salaaman, o ɗon wadda kubaruwol ceynanŋgol, o ɗon wooyna kisndam. O ɗon wi'a Siyona: “Allah ma ɗon laamo
Nane hoolo aynooɓe, ɓe ɗon towna sawtu, ɓe ɗon koolda bee seyo. Ngam bee gite maɓɓe ɓe ɗon ngi'a Jawmiraawo ɗon lorto haa Siyona.
Mbelmbelte hawtaade, onon bille Urusaliima! Ngam Jawmiraawo de'itini ummaatoore muuɗum, sootti Urusaliima.
Jawmiraawo waŋgini juŋngo mum seniiŋgo yeeso ummaatooje fuu. Keeri duniyaaru fuu ngi'an kisndam Allah men.
Ndille, ndille, ngurte diga ton! Taa meeme coɓɗum! Ngurte e maagol. Laɓɓine ko'e mon, onon roondotooɓe kuuwruɗe Jawmiraawo
Taa ngurte bee jaawal, taa ndille bee dogguki ngam Jawmiraawo ardoto on, Allah Isra'iila wonan ɓaawo mooɗon, o faddoto on.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Suka am heɓan hayru. O heɓan maŋngu, o ɓaŋgoto ɓaŋgiiɗum masin.
Ɗuuɗɓe kultori daliila maako, ngam jaati maako wayli, nanndaay bee neɗɗo sam, tagdi maako nanndaay ndi ɓii Aadama.
Bana non boo ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe kayɗinan ngam maako
Moy nuɗɗini ko nanɗen? Haa moy Jawmiraawo waŋginani juŋngo mum
O mawni yeeso maako bana fuɗŋgo iwŋgo diga ɗaɗol nder lesdi njoorndi. O walaa ŋarol koo ɗelko sakko ngi'en mo, haa jaati maako boo, walaa ko fottani en.
Yimɓe njawi mo, ngudini mo. O woowri bee naaworlaaji e bone, koo moy wiirni yeeso mum ngam taa yi'a mo. En njawi mo, en paalaay mo.
“Asee boo naaworlaaji meeɗen o roondi, bone meeɗen o hooci. Bee non fuu en ndaari mo bana Allah hiiti mo, fiyi mo, leestini mo
Ammaa o yuwaama daliila zunuubaaji meeɗen, o torraama ngam aybeeji meeɗen. Kiita ka o jaɓi, waddani en salaaman, daliila kuuduuje maako en kurgake
Enen fuu en majjino bana baali, koo moy tokkuno laawol muuɗum. Ammaa Jawmiraawo yowi aybe meeɗen fuu dow maako
Ɓe toonyi mo, ammaa o munyani ɗum, o maɓɓitaay hunnduko maako bana jawgel ngel ɓe njahrata hirseego, bana mbaalu muukaaŋgu yeeso meksooɓe gaasa muuɗum, non o maɓɓitaay hunnduko maako
Ɓe naŋngi mo bee semmbe, ɓe ndo'i mo kiita. Caka yimɓe yidere maako, walaa mo numi dow ko heɓi mo. O ittaama diga lesdi yeeɗɓe daliila zunuubaaji ummaatoore am
Ɓe mbaɗi yenaande maako caka halluɓe, ɓe mbaɗi hawriire maako caka riskuɓe koo to o waɗaay toonyaare, hunnduko maako wolwaay fewre
Jawmiraawo muuyi torrugo mo e yarnugo mo bone. Ɓaawo o lii'i hoore maako ngam ittugo hakkeeji, o yi'an danygol maako, balɗe maako njuutan, muuyo Jawmiraawo hiɓɓoto bee maako.
Daliila torraaji ɗi o yari, o heɓan seyo fahin, o anndan o torraaki meere. Kaŋko woni suka am adiliijo. O roondi aybeeji ɗuuɗɓe, bana nii o adilinan ɓe.
Ngam maajum ndokkan mo mi geɗal maako caka mawɓe, o senndan keɓal bee semmbiɗɓe, ngam o jaɓi maayugo, o limdaama bee waɗɓe zunuuba. Ammaa o roondi hakkeeji ɗuuɗɓe, o do'ani waɗɓe zunuuba
“Ummin gookaali seyo, an dimaro mo meeɗaay danyugo! Welweltu, hoolu bee seyo, an mo meeɗaay luuweego! Ngam ɓikkoy geewaaɗo ɓuran ɓikkoy te'aaɗo ɗuuɗugo.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i
Yaajin babal suudu laymaaru ma. Sey ɓe mbe'ita wiirndallooji jooɗorde ma, taa famɗin. Juttin ɓoggi maaru, tiggu tiggirɗe ma booɗɗum.
Ngam a yaajan haa nyaamo e nano. Danygol ma heɓtan lesdi ndi ummaatooje nyaami ɗum, hebbinan berniiji geewaaɗi.
Taa hul, ngam a semtintaake. Taa sakla, ngam a toskintaake. A yejjitan toskaare nderkaaku ma, a meetataa siftorgo mbustu suddaare
Ngam tagɗo ma laatoto gorko ma, Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama woni innde maako, coottoowo ma, ɗum Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, o ewneteeɗo Allah duniyaaru fuu.
A nanndi bee debbo accaaɗo, mo hakkiilo mum sakli, ammaa Jawmiraawo ewni ma. Goɗɗo wudinan debbo sukaaku mum na? Non Allah ma wi'i:
“Mi acci on wakkati seɗɗa, ammaa mi jaɓan on bee enɗam ɗuuɗɗam.
Nde tikkere am saati, mi suuɗi on yeeso am wakkati seɗɗa, ammaa mi enɗan on bee mbooɗeeŋga nduumiiŋga.” Non Jawmiraawo coottoowo ma wi'i.
“Ɗum laatanto on bana nder zamanu Nuuhu: Mi hunino ilamji meetataa ilnugo lesdi. Bana non boo kunortoomi jonta mi meetataa tikkango on e telɓango on
Koo to kooseeje cotti, towndiije boo ndimmbake, mbooɗeeŋga am sottantaa on, alkawal salaaman am bee mooɗon dimmbataako.” Non Jawmiraawo enɗoowo on wi'i.
An Urusaliima, a ɓillaaɗo, keni ndimmbini ma, walaa mo de'itini ma! Ndaa, mi nyiɓtoto mahi ma dow kaa'e ɓaleeje. Mi wallinan caɓɓaaje ma bee kaa'e safira.
Mi lamsoto mahi ma bee kaa'e boɗeeje. Mi waɗan dammuɗe ma bee kaa'e ɗelkooje e mahi taariiɗi ma fuu bee kaa'e marɗe saman
Ɓikkoy ma fuu laatoto pukara'en Jawmiraawo. Salaaman ɓikkoy maaɗa ɗuuɗan
A tabitan bee adilaaku. A daayoto ɓillaare, a hulataa fahin. A daayoto kultoreeŋgol boo, ngol ɓaditittaako ma.
To goɗɗo ukkanake ma, ɗum iwaay diga am. Koo moy jokkiranɗo bee maaɗa do'oto daliila ma.
“Ndaa, min tagi kilaajo puufanɗo ƴulɓe jamnaaɗe ngam waɗugo balmi koo ɗiye. Min tagi nattinoowo boo ngam nattingo balmi ɗi'i.
Balmol taaskaaŋgol ngam naawnugo ma meemataa ma. A do'an wullotooɓe ma fuu. Non maral suka'en Jawmiraawo wa'i, mi waɗanan ɓe adilaaku am.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Hey! Onon ɗomɗuɓe, ngare haa ndiyam, koo mo walaa ceede! Ngare, coode, nyaame! Ngare, coode inaboojam e kosam bilaa ceede, bilaa yoɓugo koo ɗume
Koni ndokkoton cardi ngam ko laataaki nyaamdu? Koni ndokkoton ngeenaari mon ngam kuuje ɗe kaarnataa? Naneeɗam booɗɗum! Nyaame kuuje booɗɗe, nyaame nyaamdu ɓurdanndu wooɗugo.
Keɗite! Ngare haa am. Nane! Nden on ngeeɗan. Mi haɓɓan alkawal duumiiŋgal bee mooɗon, mi mo'anan on mo'ere nde mi iinani Daawuda
Ndaa, mi darni mo o ceedoowo yam caka ummaatooje, o ardiiɗo, umroowo ɗe.
Jonta a ewnoto ummaatoore nde a anndaa. Ummaatoore nde anndaano ma waran haa maaɗa bee jaawal. Min Allah Jawmiraawo ma, Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, mi waɗan ɗum, mi hokkete daraja.
Ɗakkotire bee Jawmiraawo saa'i o taweteeɗo. Tore mo saa'i o ɓadiiɗo.
Sey kalluɗo acca laawol mum, marɗo hakke acca numooji mum. O lorto haa Jawmiraawo, kaŋko boo o enɗan mo. O lorto haa Allah men, ngam o yaafoto ɗuuɗɗum.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Numooji am nanndaay bee numooji mooɗon, laabi mon boo nanndaay bee laabi am.
Bana asama towtiri dow lesdi, bana non laabi am towtiri dow laabi mooɗon, numooji am boo dow numooji mooɗon.
Iyeende e mallimallooje toɓan diga asama. Ɗe lorataako haa ton, sonaa to ɗe njarni lesdi, haa ndi fuɗna, ndi rima, ndi hokka aawoowo aawdi, nyaamoowo boo nyaamdu
Bana non boo wolde am wurtiinde hunnduko am. Nde lorataako haa am sookre, ammaa nde waɗan ko fottani yam, nde hiɓɓinan anniya am.
On ngurtoto bee seyo, mi hooran on nder salaaman. Kooseeje e towndiije mbelmbeltan yeeso mooɗon, leɗɗe ladde fuu kellan juuɗe.
Leɗɗe booɗɗe mawnan haa nokkuure gi'e, haa pellel giŋngille boo irin asuraaje. Ɗum laatanto yam daraja e alaama nduumiika, ɗum ittataake sam.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Kakkilane kiita ngooŋɗuka, mbaɗe kuuɗe adiliije. Ngam kisndam am ɓadake yottaago, adilaaku am ɓadake waŋgugo.
Barka laatanto neɗɗo baɗanɗo ɗum, ɓii Aadama jogotooɗo ɗum, kakkilananɗo nyannde siwtorde ngam taa o soɓna nde, aynanɗo juŋngo mum ngam taa waɗa halleende sam.”
Jananno mo hawtani yimɓe Jawmiraawo, taa wi'a: “Fakat Jawmiraawo senndirtam bee ummaatoore mum!” Taa cortaaɗo wi'a: “Ndaa, mi lekki joorki!”
Ngam Jawmiraawo wi'i sortaaɓe: “To on kakkilani nyalɗe ciwtorɗe am, to on mbaɗi ko fottani yam, to on tabiti nder alkawal am,
nden kam mi hokkan on ko ɓurata ɓiɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe, waato ciftinorɗum e daraja nder suudu am, caka mahi saare am. Inɗe mon nduumoto, ittataake sam.”
Jananɓe hawtananɓe yimɓe Jawmiraawo ngam jagganaago mo, yiɗɓe innde Jawmiraawo ngam laataago suka'en maako, hakkilananɓe nyannde siwtorde ngam taa ɓe coɓna nde e jogotooɓe alkawal am,
mi yahran ɓe haa hooseere am seniinde, mi seynan ɓe nder suudu do'a am. Mi yerdoto guleteeɗi maɓɓe e kirseteeɗi ɗi ɓe lii'anto yam dow hirsirde am. Suudu am wi'ete suudu do'a ngam ummaatooje fuu
Jawmiraawo Allah mooɓtanɗo Isra'iila'en dahaaɓe wi'i: “Mi ɓesdanan mooɓtaaɓe mooɓteteeɓe woɗɓe.”
Ngare, onon dabbaaji ladde e laynde fuu, haa on nyaama!
Aynooɓe Isra'iila ɓe wumɓe, walaa ko ɓe anndi, ɓe dawaaɗi muukaaji, ɗi mbaawataa wohugo. Ɓe ɗon koyɗa, ɓe ɗon mbaali, ɓe ngiɗi ɗoyɗi.
Ɓe dawaaɗi ɗuuɗa-suunooji ɗi kaarataa sam. Ɓe waynaaɓe ɓe paamataa sam, koo moy ɗon tokko laawol muuɗum. Koo moy maɓɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita riba muuɗum kalluka tan.
Koo moy ɗon wi'a: Ngare, sey mi ɗaɓɓita inaboojam. Njaren nguykinoojam haa nguyken! Jaŋngo boo nii non! Luttuɗam ɓuri ɗuuɗugo!
Adili'en ɗon kalka, ammaa kakkilanɗo ɗum woodaa. Yimɓe hoolaaɓe ittaama, ammaa paamɗo ɗum woodaa. Ngam daliila halleende, adili'en mbaraama.
Ɓe njahan haa nokkuure salaaman. Tokkiiɓe laawol darnuŋgol ciwtoto dow baalorɗe muuɗum'en.
Ɓadite, onon ɓiɓɓe debbo hiilaajo, onon danygol jeenoowo, daakaareejo!
Dow moy njaloton? Dow moy maɓɓititton kunnduɗe, njuutinton ɗemɗe? Naa on ɓikkoy tuurtukoy, on danygol fewre na?
On ɗon mbaalda bee labbi mon les leɗɗe mawɗe, les leɗɗe bilititɗe fuu. On ɗon kirsa ɓikkoy nder waadiiji e gaaruuji tapaaje.
Kaa'e ɓorwuɗe nder waadiwol ngoni geɗal mooɗon. On ɗon ngaɗana ɗe dokke dufeteeɗe, on ɗon lii'ano ɗe dokke nyaamdu. Kadi mi de'itinan hoore am dow maajum na?
On ɗon mbe'iti be'itte mon dow hooseere townde, on ɗon lii'o kirseteeɗi mon ton boo.

On ɗon njo'ina ciftinorɗe labbi mon haa ɓaawo dammuɗe cuuɗi mon. On ngayliti, on acci yam. On ɗon ɓorto, on ɗon mba'o dow be'itte, on ndokki ɓe pellel, on alkotiri bee yiɗɓe on. On ngiɗi waaldugo bee maɓɓe, on ɗon ndaara temmbuki maɓɓe.
On ɗon nguja ɓalli mon bee nebbam e uurle ngam yahugo sujidango lawru wi'eteendu Laamiiɗo.
On njanci haa on comi, ammaa on mbi'aay: Ɗum nafataa. On tammi semmbe mon hesɗitan, ngam maajum on tampaay.
“Kadi, moy kulɗon? On zammbi yam, on ngejjiti yam, on cali numugo. On acci hulugo yam ngam duuri mi ɗon jeeɗi.
Ammaa mi waŋginan adilaaku mon e kuuɗe mon. On naftortaako ɗum sam.
To on mboyi, sey mooɓgal labbi mon kisna on! Henndu wiftan ɗi fuu, foofaaŋgo sottinan ɗi. Ammaa hoolotooɓe yam maran lesdi, ɓe ndonan hooseere am seniinde.”
Jawmiraawo wi'an: “Ceeke laawol, ceeke ngol, mbaɗe laawol, itte perge fuu dow laawol ummaatoore am!

Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo, mawɗo, tabitɗo haa foroy, mo innde muuɗum Ceniiɗo ɗon wi'a: Mi ɗon jooɗi haa nokkuure seniinde townde, ammaa mi ɗon jooɗi kommbi ta'a-ɓerndeejo e jaŋkiniiɗo boo ngam semmbiɗingo ta'a-ɓerndeejo e yeeɗitingo jaŋkiniiɗo.
Ngam mi jokkirtaa bee maɓɓe haa foroy, mi tikkantaa ɓe haa abada. To naa non, ruuhuuji maɓɓe tampan yeeso am, non boo yoŋkiiji maɓɓe ɗi tagmi.
Mi tikkani ɓe, mi fiyi ɓe ngam aybe maɓɓe, ngam ɓe cuunaama riba kalluka. Mi suuɗi nder ɓernuki am. Kamɓe ɓe tuurti, ɓe tokki laawol ngol ɓerɗe maɓɓe ngiɗi.
Mi yi'i kuuɗe maɓɓe. Ammaa mi yamɗitinan ɓe, mi ɗowan ɓe, mi de'itinan ɓe kamɓe e woyanɓe ɓe,
mi waɗan maŋgtoore haa kunnduɗe maɓɓe. Salaaman! Salaaman laatano daayiiɓe e ɓadiiɓe fuu! Non Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi yamɗitinan ɓe
Ammaa halluɓe nanndi bee mbeela ndimmbotooŋga, nga waawataa de'ugo. Ndiyamji maaga ɗon ummina loope e tuundi.
Woodaa salaaman ngam halluɓe.” Non Allah am wi'i
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Hoolu bee sawtu, taa naŋgta! Townu sawtu ma bana luwal! Anndin ummaatoore am yimɓe danygol Yaakubu zunuubaaji e hakkeeji maɓɓe.

Ɓe ɗon ƴama muuyo am nde weeti fuu, ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓa anndugo laabi am. Ɓe ɗon bana ummaatoore waɗannde koo ɗume fodde adilaaku, nde accaay gooŋga Allah maare boo. Ɓe ɗon ƴamammi kiitaaji gooŋɗuɗi, ɓe ngiɗi mi ɓadito ɓe.”

Yimɓe ƴami: “Ko suumaye nafata to a faalataa ɗum? Ko yaŋgititgo ko'e amin nafata to a hakkilantaa ɗum?” Jawmiraawo jaabi: “Ndaa, nyannde on ɗon cuumo, on ɗon mbaɗa ko on ngiɗi, on ɗon ɓilla huuwanooɓe mon.
Suumaye mon ɗon yahra on haa jokkirgol e haɓre e kutupaaje naawɗe. On cuumaaki hannde bana no haandi sakko mi nana do'aaje mon diga dow.

On ɗon leestina ko'e. Kanjum woni suumayeere nde ngerdotoomi na? On ɗon tura ko'e mon bana kewal, on ɗon mbaalo dow limce buhuuje e ndoondi. Kanjum mbi'oton suumaye, nyalaade nde fottanta yaa Jawmiraawo na?
Ndaa, suumayeere nde ngerdotoomi: Yooftugo yimɓe ɓe naŋnguɗon bilaa hujja, fiɓtugo ɓoggi kaɓɓirgal, rimɗingo toonyaaɓe, yewugo kaɓɓirgal koo ngale.
Cennde nyaamdu mon bee dolɓe, nastine laafuɓe yiilotooɓe nder cuuɗi mon. To on ngi'i goɗɗo temmbo, ɓorne mo. Taa ngaylitane banndiraaɓe mon ɓaawo.
Nden kam annoora mon yaynan bana jayŋgol fajiri, kuuduuje mon nyawndoto law. Adilaaku mon ardoto on, tedduŋgal am boo wonan ɓaawo mooɗon, faddoto on.
To on torake yam, mi jaaboto on. To on ngookani yam ngam ballal, mi wi'an: Na'am. To on acci toonyaago e sappaago yimɓe bee kooli e wolwugo bolle kalluɗe,
to on ndokki dolɓe ko nyaamoton, on kaarni laafuɓe, nden kam annoora mon yaynan nder nyiɓre, nyiɓre mon laatoto bana caka nyalawma.
Min Jawmiraawo mi ɗowan on foroy, mi haarnan on caka lesdi njoordi, mi semmbiɗinan i'e mon. On laatoto bana jarne cafaaɗe, bana seeɓoore nde sooyataa ndiyam.
Daliila mooɗon, ɓe nyiɓtoto bille ɓooymaaje dow caɓɓaaje ɗe gide caaliiɗe mballini. On ewneteeɓe maɓɓooɓe ceekli, wo'itinooɓe pattule haa yimɓe njooɗo.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “To on kakkilani nyannde siwtorde, to on cuklanaaki kuuɗe mon nyalaade am seniinde, to on ceyorake nde, to on teddini nde, to on tokkaaki laabi mon, on mbolwataa bolle meereeje,

nden kam ɓerɗe mon keɓan welwelo haa am. Mi daaynan on cakle duniyaaru fuu. Mi laatinan on jaaliiɓe, on caaloto dow kooseeje lesdi. Mi nyaamnan on nder maral ngal ndokkumi kaaka mon Yaakubu. Min Jawmiraawo wi'i ɗum.”
Kay! Juŋngo Jawmiraawo rammaay ngam hisnugo on. Noppi maako pahɗaay ngam nanango on.
Ammaa aybeeji mon cenndata on bee Allah mooɗon, hakkeeji mon laati bana wiirndallo hakkunde maako bee mooɗon. Kanji kaɗata mo nanugo on.
Juuɗe mon coɓi bee ƴiiƴam, kooli mon boo bee aybeeji. Kunnduɗe mon ɗon mbolwa fewre, ɗemɗe mon ɗon mbaŋgina sooynde adilaaku.
Walaa gullotooɗo bee haala ndarnuka, walaa kiitotooɗo bee gooŋga. Ɓe ɗon koolo kuuje meereeje, ɓe ɗon mbolwa fewre. Ɓe kaari toonyaare, ɓe ndanyan sarru.
Ɓe ɗon cosɓina geeraaɗe poosokje, ɓe ɗon cannya cannyudi canycanyɗo. Nyaamanɗo geeraaɗe man maayan. To woore fusi, foosokre wurtoto.
Cannyaaɗum man he'ataa ngam waɗugo limce, goɗɗo waawataa suddugo ɓanndu bee maajum. Kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗum kuuɗe sarru, toonyaare woni haa juuɗe maɓɓe.
Kosɗe maɓɓe ɗon njaawɗa haa ɓe mbaɗa kalluɗum, ɓe ɗon njaawa rufugo ƴiiƴam yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe. Ɓe ɗon numa haala sarru tan. Bonnonda e halkere waɗan koo toy ɓe njehi fuu.
Ɓe anndaa laawol jam, woodaa gooŋga nder kuuɗe maɓɓe. Ɓe ɗon tokko laabi leliiɗi, koo moy tokki ɗi heɓataa salaaman
Ngam maajum kiita ngooŋɗuka daaytake min, adilaaku boo yottataako min. Min ngenwi annoora, ammaa ndaa nyiɓre. Min ngenwi jayŋgol, ammaa min ɗon njaha nder jemmaare nyiɓɓunde.
Min ɗon mamo bana wumɓe kommbi mahol, min ɗon mamo bana mo walaa gite. Min ɗon pergo caka nyalawma bana to jemma waɗi. Min yamɓe ammaa min ɗon bana maayɓe.
Min fuu min ɗon ngurɓo bana dabbaaji ladde, min ɗon mboya bana pooli. Min ngeli kiita ngooŋɗuka – ka woodaa. Min ngeli kisndam – ɗam daaytake min.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, zunuubaaji amin ɗuuɗi yeeso maaɗa, hakkeeji amin ɗon ngullo min. Tuurtolji amin ɗon ngondi bee amin, aybeeji amin boo min anndi ɗi:
Min tuurtani ma, min zammbi ma, min acci tokkaago ma. Min mbolwi haala toonyaare e tuurtol. Ɓerɗe amin numi pewe, kunnduɗe amin mbolwi ɗe.
Kiita ngooŋɗuka lori ɓaawo, adilaaku ɗon dari daayiiɗum. Gooŋga fergi haa luumo, darnuɗum heɓataa nastugo.
Gooŋga majji. To goɗɗo daayake halleende, ɓe ɓortan ɗum.
Jawmiraawo yi'i ɗum, sooynde adilaaku fottanaay mo sam.
O hayɗini ngam o yi'i walaa koo gooto ummi wallugo yimɓe maako. Ngam maajum o waɗi ɗum bee hoore maako, adilaaku maako hokki mo portaagu
O ɓorni adilaaku bana sulke, o waɗi kisndam dow hoore maako bana hufneere njamndi. O ɓorni anniya baatuki bana limce e tikkere haajunde bana alkibbaare
O warjoto koo moy fodde kuuɗe mum, o waatoto wanyɓe mo bee tikkere, konne'en maako boo bana no haandani ɓe, non boo jooɗiiɓe haa duuɗe.
Koo moy fuu, diga fuunaaŋge haa hiirnaaŋge, hulan innde Jawmiraawo e tedduŋgal muuɗum. To konneejo wari bana ƴuuge maayo ɗe henndu yerɓata, poofɗe Jawmiraawo ndiiwan mo.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Coottoowo waran haa Siyona ngam Isra'iila'en tuubuɓe, accuɓe tuurtol muuɗum'en

Ndaa alkawal am bee maɓɓe: Mi waɗi Ruuhu am dow mooɗon, mi nastini bolle am nder kunnduɗe mooɗon. Mi ittataa ɗe diga kunnduɗe mon e diga kunnduɗe ɓikkoy mon e diga kunnduɗe taaniraaɓe mon, diga jonta haa foroy.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Umma, yaynu! Ngam annoora maaɗa wari, tedduŋgal Jawmiraawo wari dow ma.
Nyiɓre ɗon sudda duniyaaru, nyiɓre nyiɓɓunde boo ɗon sudda ummaatooje. Ammaa dow maaɗa Jawmiraawo ɗon yayna, tedduŋgal maako ɗon waŋga dow maaɗa.
Ummaatooje ngaran haa annoora maaɗa, laamiiɓe boo haa jayŋgol ngol a fuɗɗi waŋgingo.
Tijja, laar nder taarde fuu: Yimɓe ma ɗon mooɓo, ɗon ngara haa maaɗa. Ɓiɓɓe ma worɓe ɗon ngara diga daayiiɗum, ɓiɓɓe ma rewɓe ɓe roondeteeɓe dow asaaŋgal.
A yi'an ɗum, a seyoto, seyo ma waŋgan. Ɓernde ma welweltan ngam seyo. Ngam jeynitaare mbeela waylititto gal maaɗa, risku ummaatooje boo waran haa maaɗa.
Mooɓre geelooɗi cuddete, ɗi ngaran diga Mediyan e Efa. Yimɓe Saba fuu ngaran, ɓe ngaddan kaŋŋeeri e uurle, ɓe ngaazoto maŋgtooje Jawmiraawo.
Tokke Keedar fuu mooɓoto haa maaɗa. Jawɗi Nebayot laatanto ma lii'eteeɗi. A lii'oto ɗi dow hirsirde, mi yerdoto ɗi. Mi mawninan daraja suudu am ko ɓuri naane.
Ɓeye piirata bana duule, bana pooli piiranɗi haa caɓɓe muuɗum'en?

Duuɗe ɗon tammoro yam, laanaaje Tarsis ɗon ardo, haa ɗe ngartira ɓikkoy ma e cardi ma e kaŋŋeeri ma diga daayiiɗum. Ɓe ɗon ngara maŋgtugo innde Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa, mo Ceniiɗo Isra'iila, mo hokki ma daraja.
Jawmiraawo wi'i Urusaliima: “Jananɓe nyiɓtoto mahi ma, laamiiɓe maɓɓe kuuwante. Ngam nder tikkere am mi fiyi ma, ammaa nder hinnuye am mi enɗete.
Dammuɗe ma maɓɓititto foroy, ɗe maɓɓataako jemma e naaŋge fuu, haa ɓe ngadda risku ummaatooje haa maaɗa, ɓe njahra laamiiɓe maɓɓe boo bee tokkindirki
Ammaa to ummaatoore malla laamu sali huuwango ma, ɗum halkan. Ummaatooje ɗe'e nattan fuu.
Tedduŋgal Libanon waran haa maaɗa, non boo leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe e irin leɗɗe booɗɗe mawɗe e pamare fuu ngam fawnugo nokkuure am seniinde. Mi teddinan nokkuure nde kosɗe am njaaɓata ton.
Ɓillooɓe ma ngaran haa maaɗa ɓe turiiɓe. Yawiiɓe ma cujidante. Ɓe ewnete Berniwol Jawmiraawo, Siyona, berniwol Ceniiɗo Isra'iila
Naane ɓe acci ma, ɓe nganyi ma, walaa koo gooto nasti nder maaɗa. Ngam maajum mi hokkete daliila mantaago foroy, a laatoto nokkuure seyo diga yidere haa yidere.
A musinan haa ummaatooje e haa laamiiɓe. Nden kam a anndan min Jawmiraawo mi kisnoowo ma e coottoowo ma, min Allah Yaakubu, mi Baawɗo.

Haa pellel njamndi mboɗeeri ngaddanmi kaŋŋeeri, haa pellel njamndi ɓaleeri ngaddanmi cardi, haa pellel leggal, njamndi mboɗeeri, haa pellel kaa'e boo njamndi ɓaleeri. Mi jo'inan salaaman bana aynoowo ma, adilaaku boo bana laamanooɓe ma.
Haala toonyaare meetataa naneego nder lesdi ma, haala bonnuki e halkere meetataa naneego nder keeri ma fuu. A inndan mahi ma Kisndam, dammuɗe ma boo Maŋgtoore.
Naaŋge laatataako annoora ma nyalawma fahin, lewru boo yaynantaa ma jemma. Min Jawmiraawo mi laatoto annoora ma haa foroy, min Allah maaɗa mi laatoto jayŋgol ma ɗelkanŋgol
Naaŋge maaɗa mutataa, lewru maaɗa sottataa. Ngam min Jawmiraawo mi laatoto annoora ma haa foroy. Nden nyalɗe suno ma timman.
Yimɓe ummaatoore ma fuu laatoto adili'en. Ɓe maran lesdi haa foroy. Min tiggi lisal man, mi waɗi kuugal nga'al ngam waŋgingo daraja am.
Pamaro mon laatoto ujineere, ɓurɗo leesugo caka mooɗon boo ummaatoore semmbiɗnde. Min Jawmiraawo mi waɗan ɗum nder wakkati maajum bee jaawal.”

Ruuhu Jawmiraawo Allah ɗon dow am. Ngam Jawmiraawo moyti yam, neli yam haa mi waazina laafuɓe habaru seyo, mi nyawnda ta'a-ɓerɗe'en, haa mi wooynana haɓɓaaɓe ndimu, jooɗiiɓe nder kaɓɓirgal boo dimɗinki
O neli yam yeeynugo hitaande baŋguki mo'ere Jawmiraawo e nyalaade nde Allah men waatoto konne'en mum. O neli yam de'itingo wonɓe nder suno fuu
meetugo yimɓe Siyona jooɗiiɓe nder ndoondi, rufugo nebbam seyo haa pellel bojji, maŋgtooje haa pellel saklere. Ɓe ewneteeɓe Leɗɗe Adilaaku, ciraka Jawmiraawo ngam waŋgingo tedduŋgal maako.
Ɓe nyiɓtoto bille ɓooymaaje, ɓe ndartinan nokkuuje gibbinaaɗe naane. Ɓe mbo'itinan berniiji geewaaɗi, perwuɗi nder gide caliiɗe.
Jananɓe ngaran, nduran dammooji mon. Ɓe ndeman gese mon, ɓe kuuwan nder gese inabooje mon boo.
Ammaa onon on ewneteeɓe liman'en Jawmiraawo. Ɓe ewnan on suka'en Allah meeɗen. On nyaaman risku ummaatooje, on njurorto tedduŋgal maaje.
Haa pellel toskaare, on keɓan barka cowi ɗiɗi. Haa pellel saklere, on ceyorto geɗe mon. On keɓtan marle mon cowi ɗiɗi nder lesdi maɓɓe, seyo laatanto on haa foroy.
Ngam min Jawmiraawo mi yiɗi kiita ngooŋɗuka. Mi ɗon wanya jaɓtuki e halleende. Mi hokkan yimɓe am mbarjaari maɓɓe bee hoolaare, mi haɓɓan alkawal duumiiŋgal bee maɓɓe.
Ummaatooje anndan danygol maɓɓe, jama'aaje boo anndan ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe. Yi'anɓe ɓe fuu annditan ɓe danygol ngol mi barkiɗini ɗum.

Urusaliima ɗon maŋgta: “Mi seyorto Jawmiraawo masin! Mi welweltan daliila Allah am. Ngam o ɓorni yam kisndam bana limce, o moji yam bee adilaaku bana alkibbaare, bana ɓaŋganɗo meetiiɗo meetaleewol mum nannduŋgol ngol limanjo, bana ɓaŋgeteeɗo pawniiɗo bee fawne muuɗum
Fakat bana lesdi fuɗnirta haako muuɗum, bana jarne boo fuɗnirta aawdi muuɗum, non Allah Jawmiraawo fuɗnirta adilaaku e maŋgtoore yeeso ummaatooje fuu
Ngam daliila Siyona mi jeeɗataako. Ngam daliila berniwol Urusaliima mi de'itittaa, haa to adilaaku maagol waŋgi bana ɗelko naaŋge, kisndam maagol boo bana jamre yiite.
Ummaatooje ngi'an adilaaku maaɗa, laamiiɓe fuu ngi'an tedduŋgal maaɗa. Ɓe ewnirte bee innde hesre nde Jawmiraawo taynorto ɗum.
A laatoto meetaleewol ɗelkanŋgol haa juŋngo Jawmiraawo, a meetaleewol laamiiɗo haa newre Allah maaɗa.
A meetataa wi'eego: Accaaɗo. Ɓe meetataa wi'ugo lesdi ma: Geewaaɗo. Ammaa ɓe mbi'ete: Ceynanɗo Jawmiraawo, lesdi ma boo: Te'aaɗo. Ngam Jawmiraawo seyorto ma, o laatanto lesdi ma bana ɓaŋɗo.
Bana suka te'irta paanyo debbo, non nyiɓtoowo ma haɓɓan teegal bee maaɗa. Bana ɓaŋɗo seyorto ɓaŋgeteeɗo, non Allah maaɗa seyorto ma.
An Urusaliima, mi darni aynooɓe dow mahi ma. Jemma bee naaŋge fuu ɓe njeeɗataako sam. Onon siftinoranɓe Jawmiraawo ko o huni, taa ciwte!
Taa acce mo o siwto, sey to o dartini Urusaliima, o wartiri ngol daliila maŋgtoore haa duniyaaru fuu.
Jawmiraawo hunori bee juŋngo mum nyaamo, semmbiɗŋgo: “Mi meetataa nyaamnugo konne'en mon alkamaari mon, jananɓe meetataa yarugo inaboojam mon ɗam keɓɗon bee kuugal mon caatuŋgal.
Ammaa mooɓtanɓe alkamaari, kamɓe nyaamata ndi, ɓe maŋgtan Jawmiraawo, ittanɓe inabooje njaran inaboojam nder daldal suudu am seniindu.”
Caale! Ngurte yaasi berniwol! Mbaɗane ummaatoore laawol! Ceeke buuwol, itte kaa'e! Ɓaŋgte tuutawal dow ummaatooje!
Ndaa, Jawmiraawo ɗon yeeyna haa yotti keeri duniyaaru: “Mbi'e Siyona: Kisndam ma ɗon wara. Mbarjaari maako ɗon bee maako, ngeenaari maako ɗon ardo mo.
Ɓe wi'eteeɓe ummaatoore seniinde, soottaaɓe Jawmiraawo. Urusaliima boo, yimɓe mbi'ete Berniwol ngol Allah yiɗi, berniwol ngol accataake.”
“Moy an garanɗo diga Edoom, diga Bosra, jaagniiɗo bee limce ɗelkanɗe boɗeeje coy, mantanɗo e jahanɗo bee semmbe mum fuu?”
Ɗum min, Jawmiraawo, bolwanɗo bee adilaaku, baawɗo ngam hisnugo.
Ngam ɗume limce ma mbooji, ɓornuce ma boo bana ɗe ɓiɗɗoowo inabooje?

“Min feere am ɓiɗɗi inabooje nder ɓiɗɗirde. Koo goɗɗo gooto nder ummaatooje wondaayno bee am. Mi yaaɓi ɗe nder tikkere am, mi nami ɗe nder ɓernuki am. Ƴiiƴam maaje wicci dow limce am, mi tunwini ɓornuce am fuu
Mi nufi nyalaade waataago konne'en am, hitaande coottuki ummaatoore am yottake.
Mi laari koo toy, ammaa balloowo yam woodaa. Mi hayɗini, ammaa walaa mo walliti yam. Nden mi waɗi ɗum bee hoore am, tikkere am semmbiɗini yam
Nder tikkere am, mi yaaɓi ummaatooje, mi sampiti ɗe ngam daliila ɓernuki am. Mi rufi ƴiiƴam maɓɓe haa lesdi
Mi siftoran ko Jawmiraawo waɗi nder mbooɗeeŋga mum, mi siftoran kuuɗe maako maŋgteteeɗe ko o waɗani en fuu. O woonani Isra'iila mboondi ɗuuɗndi fodde hinnuye maako e mbooɗeeŋga maako.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Fakat, ɓe yimɓe ummaatoore am, ɓe mbaɗataa yam rikici.” Ngam maajum o hisni ɓe
diga ɓillaaje maɓɓe fuu. Naa nelaaɗo hisni ɓe, naa malaa'ikaajo boo, ammaa kaŋko bee hoore maako. Ngam daliila yiide e enɗam maako o hisni ɓe. O efti ɓe, o roondi ɓe nyalɗe ɓooymaaje fuu.
Ammaa kamɓe ɓe tuurtani mo, ɓe mettini Ruuhu maako Ceniiɗo. Ngam maajum o wayli, o laati konneejo maɓɓe, o honi ɓe bee hoore maako.
Nden ummaatoore maako siftori nyalɗe Muusa ɓooymaaje: Toy Jawmiraawo mo wurtini tokkere muuɗum nder maayo Maaliya bee juuɗe waynaaɓe mum? Toy Jawmiraawo mo nastini Ruuhu mum Ceniiɗo nder maɓɓe,
mo baawɗe muuɗum mawɗe ɗonno haa nyaamo Muusa, mo seeki ndiyamji yeeso maɓɓe, haa o waɗani hoore maako innde duumiinde
O saalini ɓe nder ndiyam lugguɗam, bana pucci nder ladde hamaadaare, ɓe pergaaki sam.
Bana dabbaaji jippotooɗi nder waadiwol, non Ruuhu Jawmiraawo yahriri ɓe haa siwtaare. Bana non a ɗowri ummaatoore ma, a waɗani hoore ma innde teddunde.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, gonɗo haa asama, laar jooɗorde ma woonde seniinde! Toy yiide ma haajunde e cuusal ma? A salani min hinnuye ma e enɗam ma!
Alhaali boo an woni Baabiraawo amin. Ibrahiima anndaa min, Isra'iila boo faalataako min. Ammaa an, yaa Jawmiraawo, a Baabiraawo amin, coottoowo min diga ɓooyma, kanjum woni innde ma.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, ngam ɗume a accata min min cela laabi ma? Ngam ɗume a saatinta ko'e amin, haa min acca hulugo ma? Lora ngam daliila maccuɓe ma, ngam daliila le'i laatiiɗi maral ma!
Wakkati seɗɗa ummaatoore ma senaande marno lesdi, ammaa jonta wanyɓe min njaaɓi suudu ma seniindu.
Diga ɓooyma min laati bana yimɓe ɓe a laamanaaki ɓe, bana min laataaki ewnaaɓe bee innde maaɗa. To a seekino asamanji, to a jippakeno, kooseeje ndiwnanno yeeso maaɗa!
Bana yiite wulirta cannji, bana yiite waywinirta ndiyam, war, anndin wanyɓe ma innde ma, haa ummaatooje ndiwna yeeso maaɗa!
Naane a waɗi kaayeefiiji ɗi min tammaaki. Nde a jippi, kooseeje ndiwni yeeso maaɗa.
Diga ɓooyma, walaa mo meeɗi anndugo koo nanugo malla yi'ugo no ɗowanteeɗo waɗani hooliiɓe ɗum, sonaa an!
Seyortooɓe waɗugo adilaaku ma, siftoranɓe laabi ma, a fotti bee maɓɓe. A tikkani min ngam min mbaɗi hakke. Dow laabi ɗi'i boo, min kisan na
Min fuu min laatake bana soɓɓe, adilaaku amin nanndi bee limce tunwuɗe. Min fuu min ɗayli bana haako, aybeeji amin ɗon nduuyna min bana henndu.
Walaa mo ewnoto innde ma, mo ummoto ngam ɗakkotirgo bee maaɗa. Ngam a waylitani min ɓaawo, a acci min min ndo'o nder aybeeji amin.
Asee boo, yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni Baabiraawo amin. Minin min loope kecce, an a mahoowo min, min fuu juuɗe ma mbaɗi min.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, taa tikkere ma ɗuuɗa. Taa siftor aybe amin haa foroy. Laar useni, min fuu min yimɓe ummaatoore ma!
Berniiji ma ceniiɗi laatake ladde, Siyona laatake ladde, Urusaliima laatake bille.
Suudu amin seniindu, wooɗndu haa kaakiraaɓe amin maŋgtuno ma nder maaru, yiite wuli ndu. Ko min ngiɗno fuu natti.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, nattere nde'e fuu ɓillataa ma sam na? A jeeɗoto na, a toskinan min naawɗum bana nii na?
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi waŋgini hoore am haa yimɓe ɓe ƴamaay yam. Mi acci yimɓe ɓe ɗaɓɓitaay yam tawammi. Ummaatoore nde ewnaaki innde am, mi wi'i nde: Ndaa yam ɗo, ndaa yam ɗo
Mi weeɗi juuɗe am foroy ngam jaɓɓaago ummaatoore tuurtunde, tokkotoonde laawol kalluŋgol ngol numooji maare
Foroy yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon mettinammi. Ɓe ɗon lii'ano labbi kirseteeɗi nder jarne, ɓe ɗon ngula uurle dow birikje.
Ɓe ɗon jooɗo caka genaale, ɓe ɗon mbaalo nder lowi. Ɓe ɗon nyaama kusel gaduuji, ɓe ngoodi nyaamduuji karamɗi nder taasaaje maɓɓe.
Nden ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Dara to, taa ɓaditam, ngam mi cenaaɗo. To mi yi'i ko mbaɗoton fuu, mi ɗon tikka tikkere saatunde.
Ndaa, ɗum winndaama yeeso am. Mi jeeɗataako, mi warjoto ɓe. Mi warjoto
aybeeji maɓɓe e aybeeji kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe fuu. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i. Ɓe nguli uurle dow kooseeje, ɓe njanci yam dow towndiije. Fakat mi hokkan ɓe ngeenaari kuuɗe maɓɓe.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “To ndiyam waɗi nder inabooje, ɓe mbi'an: Taa wonnu ɗe, ngam barka ɗon nder maaje! Non boo mbaaranmi ngam daliila suka'en am, mi wonnataa mooɓgal fuu.
Mi hokkan yimɓe Yaakubu e Yahuuda danygol. Ɓe maran kooseeje am. Suɓaaɓe am maran lesdi ndi'i, suka'en am njooɗoto ton.
Saron laatoto ngaynaaka dammooji, waadiwol Akor boo waalde na'i ngam ummaatoore am ɗakkotirnde bee am
Ammaa onon accanɓe Jawmiraawo, yejjitanɓe hooseere am seniinde, taaskitantooɓe Gada nyaamdu, hebbinanɓe jardugel Meni
mi hoddiranan on kaafahi. On fuu, on turoto ngam ɓe mbara on. Ngam mi ewni on, ammaa on njaabaaki. Mi wolwani on, ammaa on nanaay, on mbaɗi kalluɗum yeeso am, on cuɓi ko fottanaay yam.
Ngam maajum, Allah Jawmiraawo wi'i: Suka'en am nyaaman, ammaa onon, dolo naawan on! Suka'en am njaran, ammaa onon, ɗomka naawan on! Suka'en am ceyoto, ammaa onon on cemtan!
Suka'en am ngiman, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ceyoto, ammaa onon on ngookan ngam torra ɓernde mon, on mboyan ngam metteeŋga ruuhu mon!
Suɓaaɓe am kunorto inɗe mooɗon, ɓe mbi'an: Jawmiraawo Allah mbara on! Ammaa suka'en am, mi ewnoto ɓe bee innde hesre.
Koo moy haa lesdi giɗɗo barkiɗineego, tefan ɗum bee innde Allah koolniiɗo. Koo moy kunotooɗo haa lesdi, hunorto bee Allah koolniiɗo. Ngam ɓe ngejjitan ɓillaaje ɓooymaaje, ɗe majjidan haa gite am.”
“Ndaa, mi tagan asamaawu kesu e lesdi kesri. Kuuje ɓooymaaje ciftortaake, ɗe ngartataa haa numo goɗɗo
Ammaa ceye, mbelmbelte haa foroy ngam ko taganmi. Urusaliima kesol ngol taganmi, laatoto berniwol welwelo, ummaatoore maagol boo ummaatoore seyo.
Mi welweltan daliila berniwol Urusaliima, mi seyorto ummaatoore am. Bojji e gookaali meetataa naneego nder maagol

Musinanŋgel maayanŋgel ɓaawo nyalɗe seɗɗa wonataa fahin. Nayeejo boo fuu ciknan balɗe muuɗum. Mo maayi yaake o ɗon bee duuɓi teemerre, o derkeejo. Mo yottaaki duuɓi teemerre, ɓe ndaaran mo bana naalaaɗo.

Ɓe nyiɓan cuuɗi, ɓe njooɗoto ton boo, naa goɗɗo feere. Ɓe njuboto gese inabooje, ɓe nyaaman ɓiɓɓe maaje boo, goɗɗo feere nyaamataa ɗe. Balɗe yimɓe am njuutan bana ɗe leɗɗe. Suɓaaɓe am ceyorto kuuɗe juuɗe muuɗum'en.
Ɓe torrataako meere, ɓe ndanyataa ɓikkoy ngam halkere. Min Jawmiraawo mi barkiɗinan ɓe, kamɓe e danygol maɓɓe.
Hiddeko ɓe ewno, njaabotoomi. Saa'i ɓe ɗon mbolwa tawon, nananmi.
Saafaandu e bortel ndurdan. Mbarooga nyaaman huɗo bana ngaari. Mboodi boo, mbulwuldi laatoto nyaamdu muuɗum. Halleende e nattere ngonataa dow hooseere am seniinde fuu.” Nii Jawmiraawo wi'i
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Asama woni leeso laamu am, lesdi woni jaaɓruɗum kosɗe am. Kadi suudu nduye on nyiɓantammi? Nokkuure ndeye laatoto siwtorde am
Kuuje ɗe'e fuu, juŋngo am waɗi ɗe, nden ɗe fuu ɗe laati. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i

Mo hirsi ngaari, mbari neɗɗo boo. Mo hirsi mbaalu, yewi rawaandu daande boo. Mo waddi dokkal, lii'i boo ƴiiƴam gaduuji. Mo wuli uurle ngam am, sujidani boo lawru. Kamɓe ɓe cuɓi laabi maɓɓe, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗon ceyoro kuuje maɓɓe nyidduɗe ɗe'e.
Ngam maajum min boo mi suɓanan ɓe sarru, mi ukkanan ɓe ko hulnata ɓe. Ngam mi ewni ɓe, ammaa walaa jaabiiɗo. Mi wolwi, ammaa ɓe nanaay, ɓe mbaɗi kalluɗum yeeso am, ɓe cuɓi ko fottanaay yam sam.”

Nane wolde Jawmiraawo, onon diwnanɓe ngam wolde maako: “Deerɗiraaɓe mon woɗɓe nganyi on, ndiiwi on ngam on ɗon tokko yam. Ɓe mbi'i: Jawmiraawo waŋgina tedduŋgal muuɗum haa min ndaara seyo mon! Ammaa kamɓe toskoto.”
Nane hoolo nder berniwol, hoolo nder haykaliiru! Ɗum sawtu Jawmiraawo mo ɗon waato konne'en maako.
“Hiddeko o luuwe, o danyi. Hiddeko luuwe naŋnga mo, o ɓesni ɓiɗɗo gorko
Moy meeɗi nanugo irin ɗu'um? Moy meeɗi yi'ugo irin maajum? Ummaatoore waawan danyeego nder nyannde woore na? Jama'aare waawan danyeego saa'iire woore na? Fuɗɗam luuwe nii Siyona danyi ɓiɓɓe muuɗum!
Kadi to mi yottini debbo haa wakkati luuwe mum, nden mi haɗan mo danyugo na?” Nii Jawmiraawo wi'i. “Min hokkata yoŋki, kadi mi maɓɓan danyrugol na?” Nii Allah wi'i.
Ceyode bee berniwol Urusaliima, mbelmbelte daliila maagol, onon yiɗɓe ngol fuu! Ceyode bee maagol, onon wonɓe nder suno daliila maagol.
Musine kosam maagol de'itinanɗam, kaare bee maajam. Ceyore ɗuuɗeeŋga risku maagol.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi ilnanan ngol salaaman bana maayo, tedduŋgal ummaatooje boo bana maayo teelanŋgo
Bana daada de'itinirta ɓiyum, non de'itiniranmi on nder Urusaliima!
On ngi'an ɗum, ɓerɗe mon ceyoto, i'e mon kesɗitan bana huɗo hecco.” Juŋngo Jawmiraawo waŋganan suka'en maako. Ammaa konne'en maako maatan tikkere maako.
Ngam ndaa, Jawmiraawo ɗon wara nder yiite, mootaaji pucci maako bana duluuru. O hiɓɓinan tikkere maako bee caatal, o telɓiran bee ɗemɗe yiite.
Ngam bee yiite e kaafahi maako, Jawmiraawo hiitorto yimɓe fuu. Yimɓe ɓe o mbarata ɗuuɗan.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Senanɓe ko'e muuɗum'en ngam yahugo jarne ngam rewugo labbi, tokkotooɓe ardiiɗo gonɗo haa caka, nyaamanɓe gaduuji e doombi e kuuje karamɗe, ɓe kalkan ɓe fuu.
Mi anndi kuuɗe maɓɓe e numooji maɓɓe.
Wakkati mooɓtugo yimɓe ummaatooje e ɗemɗe fuu yottake. To ɓe ngari, ɓe ngi'an tedduŋgal am.
Mi darnan alaama caka maɓɓe, mi nelan woɗɓe caka daɗɓe maɓɓe haa ummaatooje: Haa Tarsis e Pul e Lud, lesdi annduɓe fiɗugo kuri, haa Tubal e Yawan

Ɓe ngaddantam deerɗiraaɓe mon diga ummaatooje fuu, ɓe laatanto Jawmiraawo dokkal. Ɓe ngaddan ɓe haa hooseere am seniinde, haa Urusaliima, dow pucci e mootaaji pucci e leese e alfadariije e geelooɗi, bana yimɓe Isra'iila ngaddirta dokke nyaamdu haa suudu am nder taasaaje laaɓɗe.
Woɗɓe maɓɓe mi laatinan ɓe liman'en e Lewi'en.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Mi tagan asamaawu kesu e lesdi kesri, ɗum tabitan yeeso am. Bana non danygol e innde mon tabitirta
Juulde lewru hesru koo ndeye e nyannde siwtorde koo ndeyeere yimɓe fuu ngaran sujidango yam.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“To ɓe ngurtake, ɓe ngi'an ɓalli maayɓe tuurtanɓe yam. Ngilŋgu maɓɓe waatataa, yiite maɓɓe nyifataa. Ɓe laatoto nyidduɓe haa yimɓe fuu
Ndaa bolle Yeremiya ɓii Hilkiyya, gooto caka liman'en Anatot nder lesdi Benyamin.
Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya nder zamanu Yusiya ɓii Amon, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nder nduuɓu laamu maako sappo e tataɓu

Jawmiraawo wolwani mo fahin nder zamanu Yooyakim ɓii Yusiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, haa wargo timmoode nduuɓu sappo e go'oowu nder laamu Sedekiya ɓii Yusiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, haa konne'en ndahi yimɓe Urusaliima, nder lewru jowaɓru
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam, wi'i:
“Hiddeko mi waɗe nder reedu daada ma, mi anndi ma. Hiddeko a danye, mi seni ma, mi darni ma a annabiijo ngam ummaatooje.”
Ammaa min mi wi'i: “Kayya, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah! Mi anndaa wolwugo, ngam mi derkeejo!”
Jawmiraawo jaabi yam: “Taa wi': Mi derkeejo. Ammaa yah haa yimɓe ɓe mi nelete haa muuɗum'en fuu, wi' ɓe ko mi umrete fuu.
Taa hul ɓe, ngam mi ɗon wondi bee ma ngam hisnugo ma.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Nden o forti juŋngo maako, o meemi hunnduko am, o wi'i yam: “Ndaa, mi waɗi bolle am nder hunnduko maaɗa.
Hanndeere nde'e mi darni ma dow ummaatooje e laamuuji ngam ɗoofugo e fe'ugo, ngam halkugo e yibbingo, ngam nyiɓtaago e jubaago.”
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam, wi'i: “Yeremiya, ɗume a yi'ata?” Mi jaabi: “Mi ɗon yi'a lisal lawjahi
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “A yi'i booɗɗum, ngam mi ɗon hakkilana
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam ɗiɗawre, wi'i: “Ɗume a yi'ata?” Mi jaabi: “Mi ɗon yi'a fayannde waywannde. Hunnduko maare wuuri, ɗon ɓula diga woyla.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Diga woyla sarru ukkanto yimɓe lesdi ndi'i fuu,

ngam mi ɗon ewno yimɓe asli fuu diga laamuuji woyla.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i. “Kanji ɗi ngaran, ɗi njo'ina leese laamu maaji yeeso nastirɗe Urusaliima, yeeso mahi taariiɗi ngol fuu, ɗi konan berniiji Yahuuda fuu.
Mi do'an Yahuudu'en kiita daliila halleende maɓɓe fuu. Ɓe acci yam, ɓe ngulani ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe uurle, ɓe cujidani ko juuɗe maɓɓe mbaɗi.
Ammaa an, taada, yah yeccu ɓe ko mi umrete fuu. Taa hultor daliila maɓɓe, ngam taa mi hulne yeeso maɓɓe.
Ndaa, mi darni ma hannde a berniwol cemmbiɗŋgol, a daŋraŋgal njamndi e gasol njamndi mboɗeeri yeeso lesdi fuu, yeeso laamiiɓe Yahuuda e ardiiɓe, yeeso liman'en e yimɓe lesdi.
Ɓe konete, ammaa ɓe njaalataako ma ngam mi ɗon wondi bee maaɗa ngam hisnugo ma.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam, wi'i:
“Yah, wooynu haa berniwol Urusaliima: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi ɗon siftora adilaaku ma saa'i a paanyo
Saa'i man Isra'iila'en laatakeno senaaɓe ngam Jawmiraawo bana ƴaamle codol maako aartuɗe. Koo moy nyaami ɗe, waɗi aybe, sarru ukkani ɗum.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Nane wolde Jawmiraawo, onon yimɓe Yaakubu, onon le'i Isra'iila fuu!
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Aybewol ngole kaakiraaɓe mon tawi haa am haa ɓe ndaayti yam? Ɓe tokki meereejum, bana non ɓe laati kamɓe boo meere'en.
Ɓe ƴamaay: Toy Jawmiraawo mo wurtini en lesdi Misra, mo ɗowi en nder ladde, nder lesdi perewndi, keewndi gasɗe, nder lesdi njoorndi, nyiɓɓundi, ndi walaa saalotooɓe koo jooɗiiɓe ton?
Min waddi on nder lesdi ndimoori haa on nyaama ɓenndalooje maari e kuuje maari booɗɗe. Ammaa onon, nde on nasti ndi, on coɓni lesdi am, on ngartiri maral am nyidduŋgal.
Liman'en meeɗaay ƴamugo: Toy Jawmiraawo? Fassitirooɓe tawreeta anndaa yam, ardiiɓe tuurtani yam, annabi'en boo mbaɗi annabaaku bee innde Ba'al, tokki ɗowanteeɓe ɓe nafataa.
Ngam man ngullotoomi on fahin. Mi ɗon wullo boo taaniraaɓe mooɗon.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Njehe haa duuɗe Kitti'en, ndaaroye. Malla nele nelaaɓe haa Keedar, kakkile booɗɗum, ndaare teema irin ɗu'um meeɗi laataago!
Woodi ummaatoore sannjunde ɗowanteeɓe muuɗum na? Koo nde ɓe laataaki ɗowanteeɓe bee gooŋga! Ammaa ummaatoore am sannji tedduŋgal muuɗum bee ɗowanteeɗo mo nafataa!
Kayɗine daliila man, onon asamanji, ndiwne, kultore!” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Ngam ummaatoore am waɗi aybe cowi ɗiɗi: Min mo seeɓoore ngeendam, ɓe acci yam ɓe ngasi gaawi ceekɗi ɗi njogataako ndiyam ngam ko'e maɓɓe.
Kadi Isra'iila laati maccuɗo malla o danyaaɗo nder njeyaaŋgu na? Koni o laati keɓal konu?
Barooɗe
Koo yimɓe Memfis e Tahapanes
Ɗum fuu ɗum laatani on ngam on acci Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon yaake o ɗonno ɗowa on.
Kadi jonta boo, ko lortaago Misra ngam yarugo ndiyam Sikor nafata? Malla ko yahugo Assuura ngam yarugo ndiyam Efratis nafata?

Halleende mooɗon, kayre ɓoccata on, tuurtol mooɗon boo ɗon do'a on kiita! On acci yam, min Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon, on acci hulugo yam. Annde, paame no ɗum halliri masin!”, non Jawmiraawo Allah honooɓe asama wi'i.
“Diga ɓooyma on tuurtani yam, on teeti, on mbi'i: Min njaggantaako ma fahin! Ammaa on ɗon turi bana daakaareejo dow towndiije fuu e les leɗɗe kecce fuu.
Mi jubi on bana inabohi cuɓaaki, bana fuɗŋgo wooɗŋgo. Ko waɗi mi ɗon yi'a jonta on ngayli, on laati inabohi bonniiki, jananhi?
Koo to on ngiiwake bee kilbu, to on ɗuɗɗini lootirde, tuundi hakke mooɗon ɗon lutta yeeso am”, non Jawmiraawo Allah wi'i.
Koni on ɗon mbi'a: “Min coɓaay, min tokkaaki Ba'alji. Ndaare laabi mooɗon nder waadiwol, anndite kuuɗe mooɗon. On laati bana ngeelooba ndewa ndogganŋga koo toy fuu,

bana wamnde rewre woownde yeeɗugo nder ladde hamaadaare, laahannde ngam suuno maare ɗuuɗŋgo. Moy naŋgtata nde? Walaa haaje wamnde worde soma ɗaɓɓitugo nde. Nde lewru maare waɗi, koo moy tawan nde law.
Ndikka ndaroɗon! To naa non paɗe mooɗon paɗɗititto, kondondi mooɗon boo njooran! Ammaa on ɗon mbi'a: Aa'a, woodaa! Min ngiɗi jananɓe, min tokkoto ɓe.
Bana gujjo ɗon semta to o naŋngaama, bana non yimɓe Isra'iila ɗon cemta, kamɓe e laamiiɓe maɓɓe e ardiiɓe maɓɓe e liman'en maɓɓe e annabi'en maɓɓe.
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a leggal: An woni baaba amin! Ɓe ɗon mbi'a hayre boo: An danyi min! Ngam ɓe ngaylitani yam ɓaawe maɓɓe, naa geese maɓɓe. Ammaa to ɓe nasti bone, ɓe mbi'an: Umma, hisnu min!
Kadi toy ɗowanteeɓe mooɗon ɓe mbaɗanɗon ko'e mooɗon? Sey ɓe ummo, ɓe kisna on to on nasti bone! Onon yimɓe Yahuuda, ɗowanteeɓe mooɗon ɗuuɗi bana gure mooɗon.
Koni ngulloton yam? On fuu on tuurtani yam.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Mi ɓocci ɓiɓɓe mooɗon, ammaa ɗum nafaay, ɓe njaɓaay elto. Kaafahi mooɗon mbari annabi'en bana mbarooga zammbotoowa.
Onon yidere nde'e, kakkilane wolde Jawmiraawo! Kadi mi laatanake Isra'iila ladde malla lesdi nyiɓre ɓaleere na? Koni ummaatoore am ɗon wi'a: Min njahan haa min ngiɗi fuu, min lortataako haa maaɗa?
Kadi paanyo debbo yejjitan fawne muuɗum na? Ɓaŋgeteeɗo yejjitan toggoore ɓaŋgal muuɗum na? Ammaa ummaatoore am yejjiti yam, neeɓi.
Kayya, on anndi ɗaɓɓititgo yiɗɓe on! Ngam maajum on mboowi waɗugo zunuubaaji.
Ƴiiƴam laafuɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe ɗon haa gawarle limce mooɗon, koo nde on tawaay ɓe ɗon nasta cuuɗi mooɗon ngam wujjugo. Ammaa bee non fuu
on ɗon mbi'a: Min ngalaa aybe! Sey a acca tikkango min! Ndaa, mi hiitoto on ngam on mbi'i: Min mbaɗaay hakke!
On ɗon ngayla laabi mooɗon bee koyɗum! On cemtan daliila Misra, bana on cemtiri daliila Assuura.
On loroto diga ton bee juuɗe mooɗon dow ko'e mooɗon. Ngam yimɓe ɓe koolotooɗon, min Jawmiraawo mi wudini ɓe. On keɓataa hayru haa maɓɓe.”
“To goɗɗo seeri debbo muuɗum, debbo oo boo dilli, goɗɗo feere te'i mo. Ɗum duŋaama haa goriiko arano oo hooca mo fahin na? To o hoociti mo, ɗum soɓnataa lesdi na? Ammaa an
“Tijja seɗɗa heedi towndiije cooke, laar: Woodi nokkuure haa ɓe mbaaloraaki ma na? A jooɗino haa laabi, kal-kal bee goɗɗo Arabjo nder ladde. A soɓni lesdi bee daakaareeku ma e halleende nde mbaɗɗa.
Ngam maajum kaɗmi iyeende, a heɓaay iyeende ragareere. A debbo daakaareejo yoora-giteejo, a sali semtugo.
Jonta boo a ɗon woya yeeso am: Baaba am, an woni soobaajo am diga nderkaaku am!
A numi: O tikkantam haa foroy na, o limantam ɗum aybe haa abada na? Bana nii mbi'ɗa, ammaa bee non fuu a tokki waɗugo kalluɗum.”
Nder zamanu laamiiɗo Yusiya, Jawmiraawo wolwani yam: “A yi'i ko Isra'iila, gudinɗo nuɗɗinki waɗi na? O yehi dow kooseeje towɗe fuu e les leɗɗe kecce fuu, o waɗi daakaareeku ton
Mi tammino, ɓaawo o waɗi ɗum fuu, o wartan haa am sike. Ammaa o wartaay. Yahuuda, deerɗiiko zammboowo boo, yi'i ɗum.
O yi'i boo no mi wudiniri Isra'iila gudinɗo nuɗɗinki, no mi hokkiri mo ɗereewol ceergal ngam o waɗno njeenu. Ammaa Yahuuda, deerɗiiko zammbotooɗo, hulaay. O yehi kaŋko boo, o waɗi daakaareeku.
O numaay sam, o soɓni lesdi bee daakaareeku maako, o waɗi njeenu bee rewugo kaa'e e leɗɗe.
Bee non fuu Yahuuda, debbo zammbotooɗo go wartaay haa am bee gooŋga, sey bee fewjere.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Aybe Isra'iila gudinɗo nuɗɗinki mawnaay bana aybe Yahuuda zammbotooɗo.
Yah, wooynu bolle ɗe'e gal woyla: Jawmiraawo wi'i: An Isra'iila gudinɗo nuɗɗinki, lorta! Mi acci laarugo on bee tikkere, ngam mi koolniiɗo, mi tikkataa haa foroy.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Annditit aybe ma tan: A tuurtani Jawmiraawo Allah maaɗa, a rewi labbi jananni les leɗɗe kecce fuu, a nanaay bolle am.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Lorte, onon ɓiɓɓe tuurtuɓe, ngam min woni Jawmu mooɗon.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i. “Mi hoo'an on, gooto haa wuro, ɗiɗo boo haa banndiraaɓe, mi wartiran on haa Siyona.
Mi hokkan on waynaaɓe fottananɓe yam, ɓe ayna on bee hakkiilo e faamu.”

Jawmiraawo wi'i: “To on ɓesdake, on ɗuuɗi nder lesdi, saa'i man yimɓe mbolwataa haala sundukru alkawal Jawmiraawo, ɓe numataa haala maaru, ɓe ciftortaa ndu, ɓe ɗaɓɓitittaa ndu. Walaa baɗanɗo hesru boo.
Saa'i man ɓe ewnoto Urusaliima Leeso laamu Jawmiraawo. Ummaatooje fuu mooɓoto ton ngam teddingo innde Jawmiraawo haa Urusaliima. Ɓe meetataa tokkaago numooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
Saa'i man yimɓe Yahuuda ngardan bee yimɓe Isra'iila, ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe ummoto lesdi woyla, ɓe ngara nder lesdi ndi marnumi kaakiraaɓe mooɗon.
Mi wi'no: Fakat mi liman on caka ɓiɓɓe, mi hokkan on lesdi mboondi, maral ɓurŋgal wooɗugo caka ummaatooje. Mi wi'no: On ewnoto yam Baabiraawo, on accataa tokkaago yam sam.
Ammaa bana debbo zammborto gorum, bana non on zammborake yam, onon yimɓe Isra'iila.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Nane, bojji ɗon haa towndiije cooke. Yimɓe Isra'iila ɗon mboya ngam ɓe ngayli laabi maɓɓe, ɓe ngejjiti Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe!
“Lorte, onon ɓiɓɓe tuurtooɓe, haa mi hurga tuurtol mooɗon.” Yimɓe mbi'i: “Ndaa min, min ɗon ngara haa maaɗa, ngam an woni Jawmiraawo Allah amin.
Fakat, sujidango labbi haa nokkuuje towɗe nafataa, hoolo dow kooseeje woni meere. Fakat, kisndam Isra'iila ɗon haa Jawmiraawo Allah amin.
Lawru semtiniindu nyaami nafuuda kuugal kaakiraaɓe amin diga saa'i min derke'en tawon, ndu nyaami dammooji maɓɓe e na'i maɓɓe e ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe.

Sey min mbaalo min semtuɓe, toskaare amin sudda min, ngam min mbaɗi hakke dow maaɗa, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, minin e kaakiraaɓe amin, diga nderkaaku amin haa wargo hannde, min ɗowtanaaki Jawmiraawo Allah amin.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, to on ngiɗi lortaago, nden kam lorte haa am. To on itti kuuje mon nyidduɗe yeeso am, to on acci yiilaago,
to on kunorake bee wi'ugo fakat Jawmiraawo o geeto, nder gooŋgaaku e nder darnuɗum e adilaaku, nden kam ummaatooje goɗɗe boo keɓan barka daliila innde Jawmiraawo, ɗe mantorto mo boo.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i yimɓe Yahuuda e Urusaliima: “Pe'e ngesa kesa, taa aawe caka gi'e

Njuulne ko'e mooɗon ngam Jawmiraawo, itte saadooniiku ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon yimɓe Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, ngam taa tikkere am ummo bana yiite, taa nde wula ngam kuuɗe mooɗon kalluɗe, walaa baawanɗo nyifugo nge.”
Anndine nder Yahuuda, ngooyne haa Urusaliima! Puufe luwal nder lesdi, ngooke bee semmbe, mbi'e: Mooɓte ngam nastugo berniiji cemmbiɗɗi.
Ndarne tuutawal haa Siyona. Ndogge, taa ndare sam! Ngam mi waddan sarru e halkere mawnde diga woyla.
Mbarooga wurti lowol muuɗum, nattinoowo ummaatooje ummi, wurti nokkuure muuɗum ngam wartirgo lesdi mooɗon ladde meere, ngam wilugo berniiji mooɗon, ɗi cooya jooɗiiɓe ton.
Ngam maajum kadde limce buhuuje
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Nyalaade man ɓernde laamiiɗo e ɓerɗe ardiiɓe ta'an, liman'en mbemmboto, annabi'en boo kultoran.”
Nden mi wi'i: “Kayya! Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah, fakat a ƴoyri ummaatoore nde'e e Urusaliima bee wi'ugo: Jam laatano on! Asee boo kaafahi meemi daaɗe amin!”
Saa'i man ummaatoore nde'e e Urusaliima nanan habaru ni'i: “Diga towndiire sookre nder ladde, henndu wulndu ɗon jippo dow ummaatoore am, naa ngam jaartugo malla laɓɓingo.
Henndu saatundu ɗon iwa ton dow umroore am. Jonta min boo mi hiitoto ɓe.”
Ndaa, konneejo ɗon wara bana duule! Mootaaji pucci maako ɗon nanndi bee duluuru, pucci maako ɓuri dute yaawugo. Kayto, en majji!
Urusaliima, lootu ɓernde ma, ittu halleende, haa a hisa. Ndey accata nufayeeje ma kalluɗe?
Nane, hoolo ɗon wara diga Dan, habaru sarru iwi diga hooseere Efrayim.
Ngecce ɗum ummaatooje, anndine Urusaliima: “Hippooɓe ɗon ngara diga lesdi ndaayiindi, ɗon mbaɗa hoolo ngam ukkanaago berniiji Yahuuda.
Ɓe taaroto Urusaliima bana aynooɓe ngesa, ngam ngol tuurtani yam.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Laabi ma e kuuɗe ma ngaddani ma ɗum. Ɗum ngeenaari halleende ma. Ɗum kaaɗɗum masin, ɗum naawan ɓernde ma.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Wayyo teteki am, teteki am ɗon naawa! Ɓernde am ɗon fiita bee semmbe, mi waawataa de'ugo ngam mi ɗon nana hoolo luwal e hoolo konu!
Ɓe ɗon anndina masiibo dow masiibo, lesdi fuu natti, jonta nii cuuɗi am e laymaaji am kalki!
Haa ndey ngi'anmi tuutawal? Haa ndey nananmi hoolo luwal?”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yimɓe ummaatoore am ɓe faataaɓe, ɓe anndaa yam. Ɓe laatake bana ɓikkoy koy ngalaa hakkiilo koo faamu. Ɓe ngoodi hikma waɗugo ko halli, ammaa ɓe anndaa waɗugo ko fotti.”
Mi laari lesdi, ndaa, ndi cookri, ndi walaa koo ɗume. Mi laari asamanji, annoora maaji woodaa.
Mi laari kooseeje, ndaa ɗe ndimmbi, towndiije boo fuu ndiwtori.
Mi laari, ndaa, walaa yimɓe sam, colli asama boo piiri, ndilli.
Mi laari, ndaa, gese booɗɗe laati ladde meere. Gure fuu ngibbi yeeso Jawmiraawo ngam tikkere maako saatunde.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Lesdi fuu laatoto winnde, ammaa mi wilataa ndi fuu.
Ngam maajum lesdi sunoto, asama boo nyiɓɓan. Ngam min mi anndini anniya am, mi mimsitittaako, mi lorataako ɓaawo.
Yimɓe wonɓe nder gure fuu ɗon ndogga ngam hoolo wa'iiɓe pucci e fiɗooɓe kuri. Ɓe ɗon nasta nder layɗe, ɓe mba'o tapaaje. Ɓe acci gure fuu, walaa luttuɗo nder maaje.

An boo, Urusaliima berniwol gibbinaaŋgol, ko tammiiɗa waɗugo? A ɗon ɓorni jaage boɗeeje, a ɗon jaagnori bee fawne kaŋŋeeri, a ɗon mawnina gite ma bee pinaari, a ɗon wo'ina yaasi maaɗa meere. Waaye'en ma ɗon njawe, ɓe ngiɗi mbarugo ma.

Mi ɗon nana daande bana nde debbo ɓesnanɗo, wookaandu boo bana ndu danyanɗo afo mum. Ɗum berniwol Urusaliima, ngol ɗon laaha, ngol weeɗi juuɗe maagol, ngol ɗon woya: Kayto! Mi natti! Yoŋki am hokkaama haa juuɗe mbarooɓe.”

Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Caale nder laabi berniwol Urusaliima, ndaare, linye, ɗaɓɓite haa babe maagol, teema on tawan goɗɗo gooto mo ɗon waɗa ko fotti, mo ɗon ɗaɓɓita gooŋga! Nden kam mi yaafanto Urusaliima.
