Koo to ɓe mbi'i: Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto – ɓe ɗon kunoro fewre.”
Yaa Jawmiraawo, naa gite maaɗa ɗon kuuciti dow gooŋga na? A ɓocci ɓe, ammaa ɗum naawaay ɓe. A ɓadake nattingo ɓe, ammaa ɓe njaɓaay elto. Ɓe caatini ko'e maɓɓe ko ɓuri hayre, ɓe cali tuubugo.
Mi tammino: “Ɗum leesɓe, ɓe ngalaa hakkiilo. Ɓe anndaa laawol Jawmiraawo e kiita Allah maɓɓe ndarnuka.
Sey mi yaha haa mawɓe kadi, mi wolida bee maɓɓe. Ngam kamɓe ɓe anndi laawol Jawmiraawo e kiita Allah maɓɓe ndarnuka”. Ammaa ɓe tuurti, ɓe piisti kaɓɓotiral bee Allah.
Ngam maajum mbarooga laynde faɗɗan ɓe, saafaandu ladde nattinan ɓe, paaɗaawu ɗon waaltano gure maɓɓe, seekan gurtotooɗo fuu. Ngam tuurtol maɓɓe e zunuubaaji maɓɓe ɗuuɗi masin.

Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Noy mi yaaforanto ma ɗum fuu, an Urusaliima? Ɓiɓɓe maaɗa acci yam, ɓe ɗon kunoro labbi koo to ɗi laataaki ɗowanteeɓe. Min haarni ɓe, ammaa kamɓe ɓe mbaɗi njeenu, ɓe mooɓi haa cuuɗi daakaare'en.
Ɓe laati bana pucci ngurwooji payɗi, koo moy maɓɓe ɗon nodda debbo keeddiɗɗum.
Mi hiitataako kuuje ɗe'e na? Mi waatataako ummaatoore bana nde'e na?
Naste nder gese inabooje Urusaliima. Mbonne ɗe, ammaa taa nattine ɗe fuu! Ta'e lice maaje fuu, ngam naa min Jawmiraawo jeyi ɗe!”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yimɓe Isra'iila e yimɓe Yahuuda zammbi yam fakat.
Ɓe ngeddi yam, ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Walaa ko o waɗata! Sarru ukkantaako min, min - ngi'ataa kaafahi koo weelo.
Haala annabi'en boo– ɗum henndu meere. Wolde am woodaa nder kunnduɗe maɓɓe.”
Jawmiraawo Allah honooɓe asama wi'i: “Daliila bolle ɗe yimɓe ɓe'e mbolwi, mi laatinan bolle am nder hunnduko maaɗa yiite, yaa Yeremiya, ɓe laatoto leɗɗe, nge nyaama ɓe.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, mi waddan ummaatoore dow mooɗon diga daayiiɗum. Ɗum ummaatoore semmbiɗnde, tabitiinde diga ɓooyma. On anndaa wolde maare, on paamataa ko ɓe mbi'ata.
Ɓahi maare nanndi bee yenaande omtaande, honooɓe maare fuu ɓe semmbiɗɓe.

Nde nyaaman nafuuda gese mooɗon e nyaamdu mooɗon. Nde nyaaman ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe e rewɓe, nde nyaaman dammooji mooɗon e na'i mooɗon, nde nyaaman inabooje mooɗon e ibbe mooɗon. On ɗon koolo berniiji mooɗon cemmbiɗɗi, ammaa ummaatoore nde'e halkan ɗi bee kaafahi.
Bee non fuu, koo nder nyalɗe ɗe'e mi nattintaa on fuu.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.

To ɓe ƴami: Ngam ɗume Jawmiraawo Allah amin waɗi min ɗum fuu, nden yeccu ɓe: On acci Jawmiraawo, on ɗowtani ɗowanteeɓe jananɓe nder lesdi mooɗon. Ngam maajum on ɗowtanto jananɓe nder lesdi ndi on maraay.
Anndine yimɓe Yaakubu, ngooyne nder lesdi Yahuuda:
Nane, onon faataaɓe, sooya-hakkiilo'en! On ngoodi gite, ammaa on ngi'ataa. On ngoodi noppi, ammaa on nanataa

Jawmiraawo ɗon ƴama: “On kulataa yam na? On ndiwnataa yeeso am na? Min mi heerɗini mbeela bee njaareendi, ɗum keerol duumiiŋgol ngol saalataake. Ƴuuge mbeela ɗon ndimmbo, ammaa ɗe ngalaa baawɗe. Ɗe ɗon iida, ammaa ɗe caalataako keerol man
Ammaa on ngoodi ɓerɗe caatuɗe, tuurtuɗe. On ngayliti ɓaawo, on ndilli.
On mbi'aay haa ɓerɗe mooɗon: Kulenma Jawmiraawo Allah meeɗen, dokkoowo en iyeele arane e ragareeje nde saa'i maaje waɗi, taaskitinanɗo en asaweeje codol boo.
Ammaa ɗum aybeeji mooɗon njiiɓi ɗum, ɗum hakkeeji mooɗon ittani on barka.
Halluɓe ɗon caka ummaatoore am. Ɓe ɗon ndeena haa baaltol bana tuufnooɓe colli. Ɓe ɗon mbaɗa tuuforli ngam naŋngugo yimɓe.
Bana silaawo heewŋgo colli, non cuuɗi maɓɓe keewri rikici. Ngam maajum ɓe laati mawɓe e riskuɓe.
Ɓe payi, ɓe tekki. Halleende maɓɓe ɓuri semmbe. Ɓe kiitataako fodde kiita ngooŋɗuka. Ɓe ngooŋɗintaa haala atiime'en, ammaa ɓe ɗon keɓa hayru, ɓe njiŋngataa laafuɓe.
Jawmiraawo ɗon ƴama: Mi hiitataako kuuje ɗe'e na? Mi waatataako ummaatoore bana nde'e na?
Kulniiɗum e nyidduɗum laatake nder lesdi:
Annabi'en ɗon ngaazina fewre, liman'en ɗon laamo bana ɓerɗe maɓɓe ngiɗi, ummaatoore am boo yerdi ɗum. Ammaa ɗume on mbaɗata to timmoode yottake?”
“Onon yimɓe Benyamin, ndogge, ngurte Urusaliima! Puufe luwal haa Teko'a, mbaɗe alaama konu haa Bayti-Kerem, ngam sarru e halkere naawnde ɗon ngara diga woyla.
Urusaliima, berniwol booɗŋgol ɗelemŋgol, mi halkan ngol!
Waynaaɓe ngaran haa maagol bee tokke muuɗum'en, taarnan ngol bee bukkaaji, koo moy duran haa nokkuure muuɗum.
Cene ko'e mooɗon ngam haɓre bee maagol. Ummen, kippen ngol caka nyalawma! – Kayto! kiikiiɗe waɗi, ɗowdiiji ɗon njuuta. –
Ngare, kippen ngol bee jemma, en kalka cuuɗi maagol booɗɗi.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Pe'e leɗɗe, mbaage lesdi kommbi mahol Urusaliima. Kaŋgol woni berniwol ke'uŋgol kiita. Ngol heewi ɓillaare.
Bana ɓulndu ɓulnirta ndiyam muuɗum, bana non Urusaliima ɓulnirta halleende muuɗum. Hoolo toonyaare e halkere ɗon nder maagol, bone e kuuduuje ɗon yeeso am tum.
An Urusaliima, jaɓ barruye! Ngam taa mi acce, taa mi wartire nokkuure ladde nde walaa jooɗiiɓe ton.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i yam: “Mooɓtu luttuɓe Isra'iila bana goɗɗo mooɓtirta luttuɗe inabooje. Wallin juŋngo ma fahin haa lice bana ittoowo inabooje waarata.”
Mi ƴami: “Moy mbolwananmi, moy ceedinanmi haa ɓe nana ɗum? Keefeeraaku maɓɓe haɗi ɓe nanugo. Wolde Jawmiraawo laatani ɓe huunde jalnaare, fottantaa ɓe.
Min boo mi heewi tikkere Jawmiraawo, mi somi naŋgtuɗo nde.” O umri yam: “Ruf nde dow ɓikkoy haa laabi, non dow mooɓe suka'en boo. Nde naŋngan worɓe e rewɓe, ndotti'en e ɗuuɗa-duuɓi'en fuu.
Cuuɗi maɓɓe laatanto woɗɓe, non boo gese maɓɓe e rewɓe maɓɓe. Ngam mi fortan juŋngo am dow yimɓe lesdi ndi'i.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Ɓe fuu maɓɓe, mawɓe e leesɓe, ɗon ɗaɓɓa riba kalluka. Annabi'en e liman'en fuu ɗon mbaɗa rikici.
Ɓe ɗon kurga kuuduuje ummaatoore am dow dow bee wi'ugo: Jam, jam koo ɗume! Asee boo jam woodaa
Kadi ɓe cemti ngam ɓe kuuwi nyidduɗum na? Aa'a, ɓe cemtaay, ɓe ngalaa semteende sam. Ngam maajum ɓe ndo'oto caka do'otooɓe. Saa'i mi hiitoto ɓe, ɓe njanan.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ndare haa laabi, ndaare laabi ɓooymaaji, ƴame laawol ngole wooɗi, nden tokke ngol, haa on keɓa de'ere ngam yoŋkiiji mooɗon. Ammaa on njaabi: Min tokkataako ngol
Nden mi darni aynooɓe ngam mooɗon, ɓe mbi'i: Kakkilane hoolo luwal! Ammaa onon on mbi'i: Min kakkilantaa ɗum!
Ngam maajum nane, onon ummaatooje! Annde, onon jama'aare, ko ɗon laatano yimɓe am!
An lesdi, nan! Ndaa, mi ɗon yahra sarru dow ummaatoore nde'e, ɗum ngeenaari nufayeeje maɓɓe. Ngam ɓe kakkilanaay bolle am, ɓe njawi tawreeta am.
Mi ɗaɓɓataa uurdi lesdi Seba, koo ƴommbe uurɗe ɗe lesdi ndaayiindi. Guleteeɗi mooɗon pottantaa yam, kirseteeɗi mooɗon pottantaa yam.
Ngam maajum min Jawmiraawo mi wi'i: Mi wallinan perge haa laawol ummaatoore nde'e, haa baabiraaɓe e ɓikkoy fuu pergo, haa keeddiɗɗiraawo e soobaajo mum maaya.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ndaa, yimɓe ummaatoore ɗon ngara diga lesdi woyla, ummaatoore ɗuuɗnde ummi haa keeri duniyaaru.
Ɓe ɗon njogi lagaaje e labbe, ɓe saatuɓe, ɓe ngalaa enɗam. Daaɗe maɓɓe ɗon iida bana maayo maŋngo, ɓe wa'iiɓe pucci, ɓe taaski bana gorko gooto ngam haɓre bee maaɗa, Urusaliima!”
Yimɓe mbi'i: “Min nani habaru maɓɓe, juuɗe amin tampi, kulol naŋngi min bana luuwe naŋngirta ɓesnanɗo.
Taa ngurte haa ngesa, taa njehe haa laawol! Kaafahi konneejo ɗon ton, kultoreeŋgol ɗon bakeeje fuu!”
Ummaatoore am, hadda limce buhuuje
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Mi jo'ini ma a poondoowo yimɓe ummaatoore am ngam a heɓta, a foonda yahdu maɓɓe.
Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe tuurtuɓe masin, ɓe nyo'ooɓe, ɓe saatuɓe bana njamndi mboɗeeri e ɓaleeri, ɓe fuu ɓe wonnooɓe.
Buubuuti kilaajo wifi bee semmbe ngam wurtingo tuundi njamndi bee yiite. Ammaa kuugal ɓolinoowo nafaay, o heɓaay wurtingo tuundi man.
Jonta innde maɓɓe laati cardi ngudinaandi, ngam min Jawmiraawo mi wudini ɓe.”
Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya, o wi'i:
“Dara haa dammugal haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, wooynu habaru ni'i: Onon yimɓe Yahuuda nastiranɓe dammuɗe ɗe'e ngam sujidango Jawmiraawo, nane ko Jawmiraawo wi'ata on.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mbo'ine yahdu mooɗon e kuuɗe mooɗon, haa mi acca on on njooɗo haa nokkuure nde'e.
Taa koole bolle fewooɓe wi'anɓe: Ɗum haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ɗum haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ɗum haykaliiru Jawmiraawo!
Mbo'ine yahdu mooɗon e kuuɗe mooɗon, mbaɗe kiita ngooŋɗuka hakkunde mooɗon.
Taa ɓille hoɗɓe e atiime'en e rewɓe yurumɓe. Acce mbarugo yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe haa ɗo. Taa tokke ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, ngam taa on kalka.
Nden kam mi accan on on njooɗo haa ɗo nder lesdi ndi ndokkumi kaakiraaɓe mooɗon haa abada abadin.
Ndaa, on ɗon koolo pewe meere ɗe nafataa
On ɗon ngujja, on ɗon mbara, on ɗon mbaɗa njeenu, on ɗon kuno pewe, on ɗon ngula uurle ngam Ba'al, on ɗon tokko ɗowanteeɓe ɓe on anndaa.
Nden on ɗon ngara yeeso am nder suudu senaandu ngam am, on ɗon mbi'a: Min kisi! Nden on tokkitina waɗugo nyidduɗum ɗu'um fuu
Kayya! On tammi suudu senaandu ngam am laati lowol fasooɓe na? Min boo kanjum ngi'mi, non Jawmiraawo wi'i
Kadi njehe haa Silo, haa nokkuure arannde nde njo'inmi innde am ton. Ndaare ko mbaɗmi nde ngam halleende ummaatoore am Isra'iila.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “On ɗon mbaɗa hakkeeji ɗi'i fuu. Koo mi wolwani on tum, on cali nanugo. Nde mi ewni on, on njaabaaki.
Ngam maajum, koo to on koolake suudu senaandu ngam am, mi waɗan ndu ko mbaɗmi Silo, non boo nokkuure nde ndokkumi on, onon e kaakiraaɓe mooɗon
Mi wudinan on daayiiɗum bee am bana mi wudiniri banndiraaɓe mooɗon, danygol Efrayim fuu.”
“An kam, Yeremiya, taa do'ana yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e, taa ɓaŋgtu do'a e taa tora ngam maɓɓe, ngam mi nanantaa ma.
A yi'ataa ko ɓe mbaɗata nder gure Yahuuda e dow laabi Urusaliima na?

Ɓikkoy ɗon teena leɗɗe, baabiraaɓe maakoy ɗon kuɓɓa yiite, rewɓe boo ɗon njiiɓa kuroori haa ɓe tamsa tamseeje ngam lawru rewru ndu ɓe ewnata Mayramjo asama. Ɓe ɗon ndufa njaramji dufeteeɗi ngam labbi feere haa ɓe mettinammi ɓernde.
Min ɓe mettinta ɓernde na? Kay, ɓe ɗon mettina ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon toskina ko'e maɓɓe.
Ngam maajum, ndaa Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi rufan tikkere am saatunde dow nokkuure nde'e. Mi rufan nde dow yimɓe e dabbaaji, dow leɗɗe e nafuuda gese fuu. Tikkere am wulan bana yiite, nyifataako.
Ɓesde kirseteeɗi mooɗon, guleteeɗi mooɗon, nyaame kusel maaji.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i.
“Saa'i mi wurtini kaakiraaɓe mooɗon lesdi Misra, mi umraay ɓe haala guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi.
Ammaa mi umri ɓe ɓe ɗowtano yam, haa mi laato Allah maɓɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe laato ummaatoore am. Mi umri ɓe boo ɓe tokko laawol ngol umrumi ɓe tokkaago fuu, haa ɓe keɓa hayru.
Ammaa ɓe ɗowtaaki, ɓe kakkilaay. Ndaa ko ɓe mbaɗi: Ɓe tokki nufayeeje ɓerɗe maɓɓe caatuɗe, kalluɗe. Ɓe ngaylitani yam ɓaawe maɓɓe, naa geese maɓɓe.
Diga kaakiraaɓe mooɗon ngurti Misra haa wargo hannde, mi tokki nelugo nde weeti fuu annabi'en sukaaɓe am fuu haa maɓɓe.
Ammaa on nanaay, on kakkilaay. Ko'e mooɗon caati, on mbaɗi kalluɗum ko tulli kaakiraaɓe mooɗon.
An boo, Yeremiya, to a wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe'e fuu, ɓe nanantaa ma. To a ewnake ɓe, ɓe njaabataako.
Yeccu ɓe ɓe laati ummaatoore nde ɗowtantaako Jawmiraawo Allah muuɗum, nde jaɓataa elto boo. Gooŋgaaku majji, ɓe acci koo numugo ngu boo.”
Onon yimɓe Urusaliima, laɓe ko'e mooɗon, ngudine gaasa mooɗon! Ngime yimre boyki dow towndiije cooke, ngam min Jawmiraawo mi wudini yidere umminiinde tikkere am.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yimɓe Yahuuda mbaɗi kalluɗum yeeso am, ɓe njo'ini labbi maɓɓe nyidduɗi nder suudu senaandu ngam am, ɓe coɓni ndu.
Nder waadiwol Ɓii-Hinnom ɓe mahi hirsirde wi'eteende Tofet ngam wulugo ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe bana kirseteeɗi. Min mi umraay ɓe waɗugo ɗum, mi meeɗaay koo numugo ɗum
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Fakat, saa'i waran nde ɓe ewnataako ɗum Tofet malla Waadiwol Ɓii-Hinnom, ammaa Waadiwol kirsol. Ngam ɓe uwan maayɓe haa Tofet ngam sooynde babal.
Ɓalli yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e laatoto nyaamdu colli e dabbaaji ladde, walaa mo riiwata ɗi.
Lesdi laatoto ladde meere, mi je'inan gimi seyo e hoolo welwelo e daande ɓaŋɗo e daande ɓaŋgeteeɗo nder gure Yahuuda, non boo dow laabi Urusaliima
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Saa'i man ɓe ngurtinan i'e laamiiɓe e mawɓe Yahuuda nder genaale maɓɓe, non boo i'e liman'en e annabi'en e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima.

Ɓe mbaŋginan ɗe les naaŋge e lewru e koode asama. Kanjum, ɓe ngiɗno ɗum masin, ɓe ndewi ɗum, ɓe tokki ɗum, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee maajum, ɓe cujidani ɗum. I'e maɓɓe meetataa mooɓteego koo uweego, ammaa ɗe laatoto bana koonal dow lesdi.
Luttuɓe yidere hallunde nde'e, jooɗiiɓe haa nokkuuje ɗe mi riiwi ɓe fuu, ngerdoto maayde dow ngeendam.” Non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.
“An, yeccu ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: To goɗɗo do'ake, o ummataako na? To goɗɗo seli laawol, o lorataako na?
Onon yimɓe ummaatoore am haa Urusaliima, koni on tuurtanto yam foroy? On ɗon tabiti nder pewe, on ɗon calo lortaago haa am.

Mi heɗiti, mi nani, ammaa on mbolwaay gooŋga. Walaa koo gooto mooɗon mimsiti halleende muuɗum. Walaa koo gooto meeɗi wi'ugo: Kayya, ko mbaɗmi ɗo? Koo moy ɗon tokko laawol muuɗum, kal-kal bee puccu njaawananŋgu haɓre.
Koo ngaasiyoowal boo anndi wakkati muuɗum. Poola e sonndu zawleeru e kumaarewal anndi wakkati loraaki muuɗum'en. Ammaa yimɓe ummaatoore am kam anndaa umrooje am.
Noy mbi'roton: Min mari hakkiilo, tawreeta Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee amin! Ndaa, binndirɗi winndooɓe fewooɓe laatini ka fewre!
Hikma'en mooɗon toskake, ɓe ɗon mbemmbo, ɓe naŋngaaɓe. Ɓe cali bolle am, hikma kaye ɓe mari jonta?
Ngam maajum ndokkanmi rewɓe maɓɓe haa juuɗe woɗɓe, gese maɓɓe boo haa jawmiraaɓe woɗɓe. Koo moy maɓɓe, mawɗo e leesɗo fuu, ɗon ɗaɓɓa riba kalluka. Liman'en e annabi'en fuu ɓe ɗon mbaɗa rikici.
Ɓe ɗon kurga kuuduuje yimɓe am dow dow, ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Jam, jam koo ɗume! Asee boo jam woodaa
Kadi ɓe cemti ngam ɓe kuuwi nyidduɗum na? Aa'a, ɓe cemtaay, ɓe ngalaa semteende sam. Ngam maajum ɓe ndo'oto caka do'otooɓe. Saa'i mi hiitoto ɓe, ɓe njanan.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i
“Mi nattinan ɓe. Ɓe laati bana inabohi ki walaa inabooje, bana ibbi ki walaa ibbe, koo haakooji boo ɗayli. Mi hokki ɓe haa saalotooɓe ton.”

Yimɓe mbi'i: “Koni en ɗon njooɗi meere? Mooɓe haa en nasta berniiji cemmbiɗɗi, en kalka ton! Jawmiraawo Allah meeɗen ta'ani en kiita halkere, ɗon yarna en ndiyam mbaroojam, ngam en mbaɗi hakke dow maako.
En tammino jam, ammaa hayru woodaa. En ɗonno ndeena wakkati nyawndeeki, ammaa kultoreeŋgol ukkani en.

Haa berniwol Dan gonŋgol haa woyla en nani pucci konneejo ɗon pora. To pucci maako gorɗi ɗon kijo, lesdi fuu ɗon diwna. Ɗi ɗon ngara ngam halkugo lesdi e ko woni nder maari, berniwol meeɗen e jooɗiiɓe ton fuu.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ndaa, mi nelan boɗɗe caka mooɗon, poosokje mbarooje ɗe pijirtaake, kanje ɗe coppoto on.”
Bone am hurgataake, ɓernde am saklake.

Ndaa, mi ɗon nana wookaandu ummaatoore am diga lesdi daayiindi: Jawmiraawo wurtake Siyona na? Laamiiɗo maako walaa ton na? Jawmiraawo ƴami: Koni ɓe tikkini yam bee suuraaji maɓɓe, labbi jananni meereeji?
Codol saali, dabbunde timmi, ammaa en kisaay!
Ɓernde am naawnake, ngam ummaatoore am naawnaama. Mi ɗon woya, mi ɗon nder mettamɓeram.
Lekki woodaa haa lesdi Gile'at na? Walaa nyawndoowo ton na? Ngam ɗume ummaatoore am yamɗitaay?
Sey hoore am laato ndiyam, gite am boo ceeɓooje gonɗi, haa mi woya jemma e naaŋge fuu ngam mbaraaɓe ummaatoore am!
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi yiɗi mi heɓa hoɗorde nder ladde bana dillooɓe jahaaŋgal, haa mi acca yimɓe ummaatoore am, mi daayto ɓe. Ngam ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe jeenooɓe, ɓe laati mooɓre zammbotooɓe.
Foroy ɓe ɗon taaski fewugo. Ɓe kuuwtinirtaa gooŋga ngam laamanaago lesdi, ammaa fewre. Ɓe ɗon ɗuɗɗina kuuɗe kalluɗe, ɓe njaɓaay yam boo.
Sey koo moy reento e soobaajo mum, taa o hoolo koo deerɗiiko boo. Ngam koo moy, deerɗum ɗon fewja ɗum, koo moy ɗon waɗa soobaajo mum tufle.
Ɓe ɗon mbaɗindira rikici, walaa mo wolwata gooŋga. Ɓe mboowni ɗemɗe maɓɓe fewugo, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa hakke, ɓe cali tuubugo.
Toonyaare dow toonyaare, rikici dow rikici! Ɓe cali anndugo yam.” Nii Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Mi foondan ɓe, mi ɓolinan ɓe bana njamndi haa mi laara to ɓe gooŋga'en malla naa non. To naa non, noy mbaɗanmi ummaatoore am fahin?
Ɗemɗe maɓɓe nanndi bee kuri mbarooji, ɗe ɗon mbolwa fewjere. Koo moy ɗon wolwana keeddiɗɗum haala jam, ammaa ɓernde maako ɗon tuufana mo tuuforli.
Kadi mi hiitataako yimɓe ɓe'e na? Mi waatataako irin ummaatoore nde'e na?” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.

Yeremiya wi'i: “Mi woyan, mi uuman dow kooseeje, mi yiman gimol bojji ngam durduɗe nder ladde, ngam ɗe ngulaama, walaa caalotooɗo ton. Ubbaaŋgo ga'i woodaa, colli e dabbaaji ladde fuu ndoggi, ndilli.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi laatinan Urusaliima waagaare kaa'e e lowol cuuli. Mi laatinan gure Yahuuda ladde meere nde walaa jooɗiiɓe ton.”
Hikmaajo moy faami kuuje ɗe'e? To Jawmiraawo wolwani mo, nden kam sey o anndina ɗum woɗɓe! Ngam ɗume lesdi halki, wulaama bana ladde meere nde goɗɗo saalataako ɗum?
Jawmiraawo jaabi: “Ngam yimɓe am acci tawreeta am ka ekkitinmi ɓe. Ɓe nananaay yam, ɓe tokkaaki yam.
Ammaa ɓe tokki ɓerɗe maɓɓe caatuɗe, ɓe ɗowtani Ba'alji bana baabiraaɓe maɓɓe ekkitiniri ɓe.
Ngam maajum min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila mbi'anmi: Mi nyaamnan yimɓe am kaaɗɗum, mi yarnan ɓe ndiyam mbaroojam.
Mi saŋkitan ɓe caka ummaatooje ɗe ɓe anndaa, koo kamɓe, koo kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe. Mi ukkanan ɓe konu haa to mi nattini ɓe.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Kakkile, ewne rewɓe woyooɓe e annduɓe gimi cunooji ɓe ngara.”
Yimɓe mbi'i: “Sey ɓe njaawa, ɓe ngima yimre suno dow meeɗen! Sey gite men ndufa gonɗi, haa lare gite men ilna ndiyam!”
Nane uumaali iwɗi Siyona: “Kayto! Ɓe mbili min, mbustu ɗon sudda min! Ɓe ndiiwi min diga lesdi amin, ɓe ngibbini cuuɗi amin.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Onon rewɓe, nane ko Jawmiraawo wi'i, keɗite koŋngol maako: Ekkitine ɓiɓɓe mon rewɓe uumugo, sooba'en mon boo yimugo gime cunooje!
Ngam waade nasti gal burɗe cuuɗi men e laamorɗe men. Nde wifti ɓikkoy e laabi, suka'en boo e luuɓe.
Ɓalli maayɓe mbaaloto haa ngesa bana koonal, bana ƴommbe ɓaawo codoowo, walaa mooɓtanɗo ɗe. Kanjum Jawmiraawo anndini yam.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Hikmaajo, taa mantoro hikma mum. Cemmbiɗɗo, taa mantoro semmbe mum. Diskuɗo boo, taa mantoro risku mum!

To goɗɗo yiɗi mantaago, sey o manto ngam o woodi hikma, o anndi yam boo. Ngam min Jawmiraawo mi ɗon waɗa haa duniyaaru fodde mbooɗeeŋga e kiita ndarnuka e adilaaku. Kanjum mi yerdoto.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Saa'i ɗon wara haa mi hiito koo ɓeye juulnaaɓe fuu haa ɓalli muuɗum'en,
waato yimɓe Misra e Yahuuda e Edoom e Ammoon e Mo'ab e yimɓe ladde laɓa-taarna'en fuu. Yimɓe ɓe'e fuu njuulnaay e yimɓe Isra'iila boo ɓerɗe muuɗum'en njuulnaaka.”
Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, nane koŋngol Jawmiraawo dow mooɗon.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Taa tokke laawol ummaatooje goɗɗe. Taa kultore ngam alaamaaji haa asama, koo to ummaatooje man ɗon kula ɗi.
Farillaaji yimɓe ummaatooje ɗe'e nafataa sam. Ɓe pe'an lekki nder laynde, cehoowo sehan leggal man bee cehrugel,
fawnan ngal bee cardi e kaŋŋeeri. Nden o tigga cehaaɗum man bee tappirɗum e suufuuje, ngam taa ɗum dimmbo.
Suuraaji labbi ɗi'i nanndi bee kulnirɗum colli haa ngesa kurciije. Ɗi mbolwataa, ɗi njahataa boo, doole goɗɗo roondo ɗi. Taa kule ɗi, ngam ɗi mbaawataa waɗugo koo kalluɗum koo booɗɗum.”
Yaa Jawmiraawo, walaa nannduɗo bee maaɗa. A mawɗo, innde maaɗa nde mawnde marnde semmbe.
Moy hulataa ma, yaa laamiiɗo ummaatooje? An a he'i huleego. Walaa nannduɗo bee maaɗa caka marɓe hikma nder ummaatooje e nder laamuuji maɓɓe fuu
Ɓe fuu maɓɓe ɓe faataaɓe, sooya-hakkiilo'en, ngam ɗowanteeɓe ekkitinooɓe ɓe, ɗum leggal meere!
Cardi ngam labbi maɓɓe iwi haa Tarsis, kaŋŋeeri boo haa Ufas. Baɗoowo sanaa'a e kilaajo mbaɗi ɗi. Ɗi ɗon ɓorni limce carwinaaɗe e boɗeeje, baɗaaɗe bee juuɗe waawɓe.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo o Allah bee gooŋga, o Allah geeto, o laamiiɗo duumiiɗo. To o ɓerni, lesdi dimmboto, to o tikki, ummaatooje ndarataako.
Ndaa ko on mbi'ata ummaatooje: Labbi ɗi'i tagaay asama e lesdi, ɗi nattan dow lesdi, ɗi meetataa taweego les asama.
Jawmiraawo waɗi lesdi bee baawɗe mum, bee hikma maako o tagri duniyaaru, bee anndal maako o we'iti asama.
To o telɓi, ndiyamji nder asama ɗon mooɓo, o ɗon wa'ina duule e keeri duniyaaru, o ɗon sakkina ma'e haa iyeende toɓa, o ɗon wurtina henndu nder cigorɗi maako.
Yimɓe fuu ɓe faataaɓe, sooya-anndal'en. Koo moy kilaajo semtiran labbi muuɗum, ngam suuraaji ɗi o waɗi laataaki ɗowanteeɓe bee gooŋga, ɗi ngalaa yoŋki.
Ɗi kuuje meereeje, jalnooje, saa'i kiita ɗi kalkan.
Ammaa Allah laatiiɗo geɗal Yaakubu laataaki bana non. Kaŋko woni tagɗo kuuje fuu, o suɓi Isra'iila'en ɓe laato yimɓe maral maako. Innde maako Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Onon yimɓe Urusaliima, konne'en kippake on. Ɓofte kuuje mooɗon!
Ngam Jawmiraawo wi'i o riiwan jooɗiiɓe nder lesdi ndi'i jonta, o ɓillan ɓe ngam taa koo gooto maɓɓe daɗa
Yimɓe Urusaliima ɗon mboya: “Kayto, ɓe naawni min! Kuuduuje amin nyawndataako. Min tammino min mbaawan munyango bone ɗe'e!
Ɓe mbili cuuɗi amin, ɓe ta'i ɓoggi laymaaji amin. Ɓikkoy amin acci min, ndilli. Walaa luttuɗo ngam o dartina laymaaji amin, o haɓɓa wiirndallooji maaji.”
Ardiiɓe mooɗon ɓe faataaɓe, ɓe ɗakkotiraay bee Jawmiraawo. Ngam maajum ɓe keɓaay hayru, yimɓe maɓɓe fuu caŋkiti.
Nane! Habaru ɗon wara. Hoolo maŋngo waɗi haa lesdi woyla. Honooɓe maari laatinan berniiji Yahuuda ladde meere e jooɗorde cuuli.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, mi anndi neɗɗo maraay ngeendam muuɗum, o waawataa ɗowugo palanɗe maako.
Eltu min, yaa Jawmiraawo! Ammaa naa bee caatal. Taa eltu min bee tikkere, ngam taa a mbara min.
Ruf tikkere ma dow ummaatooje ɗe anndaa ma, dow yimɓe ɓe ewnaaki innde ma! Kamɓe ɓe mbari danygol Yaakubu, ɓe nattini min fuu, ɓe mbili lesdi amin!
Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya, wi'i:
“Nan bolle alkawal nga'al, anndin ɗe yimɓe Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima.
Yeccu ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Naaloore dow neɗɗo mo ɗowtantaako bolle alkawal nga'al.

Mi haɓɓi ngal bee kaakiraaɓe mooɗon, nyannde nde mi wurtini ɓe lesdi Misra, haa ɓolinirde ngam ɓolingo njamndi. Mi wi'i ɓe: Naneeɗam, mbaɗe ko mi umrata on fuu. Nden kam on laatoto ummaatoore am, min boo mi laatoto Allah mooɗon.
Bana nii kebbiniranmi hunayeere am nde kunaniimi kaakiraaɓe mooɗon, haa mi hokka ɓe lesdi keewndi kosam e njumri, bana ko laati hannde.” Mi jaabi: “Ooho, yaa Jawmiraawo!”
Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i Yeremiya: “Saala caka gure Yahuuda e laabi Urusaliima. Wooynu ko mbi'mi fuu, wi' yimɓe: Nane bolle alkawal nga'al, mbaɗe ko ɗe mbi'i on!
Nde mi wurtini kaakiraaɓe mooɗon lesdi Misra, mi barri ɓe ɗuuɗɗum haa ɓe ɗowtano bolle am. Mi tokki barraago
Ammaa ɓe nanaay, ɓe kakkilaay. Koo moy tokki ɓernde mum saatunde, hallunde. Mi umri ɓe ɓe ɗowtano alkawal, ammaa ɓe cali. Ngam maajum mi ukkani ɓe kiita ka winnda nder maagal fuu.”
Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i Yeremiya: “Yimɓe Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima ɗon kaɓɓa dabare dow am.
Ɓe lori haa hakkeeji kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe saliiɓe ɗowtanaago bolle am, ɓe tokki ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, ɓe ɗowtani ɓe. Yimɓe Isra'iila e yimɓe Yahuuda piisti alkawal ngal kaɓɓumi bee kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe.
Ngam maajum ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: mi ukkanan ɓe sarru, ɓe mbaawataa daɗugo ngu. To ɓe torake yam, mi nanataa ɓe.
Nden berniiji Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima njahan toraago labbi ɗi ɓe ngulani ɗi uurle. Ammaa ɗi mbaawataa hisnugo ɓe, saa'i sarru go ukkanto ɓe.
Labbi lesdi Yahuuda ɗuuɗi bana gure maɓɓe. Bana limgal laabi nder Urusaliima, bana non limgal kirsirɗe ɗe ɓe ndarni ngam wulango Ba'al uurle.
An Yeremiya, taa do'ana yimɓe ɓe'e, taa tora ngam maɓɓe! To ɓe mboyani yam nder saa'iire sarru, mi nanataa ɓe.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Yimɓe ɓe'e ɓe ngiɗmi, ɗon mbaɗa halleende. Ɗume ɓe ɗaɓɓata nder suudu am jonta? Ɓe tammo togayeeje e kusel kirsanaaŋgel labbi hisnan ɓe sarru na?
Naane mi ewni ɓe jaytunhi kecci, dimoohi ɓenndalooje booɗɗe. Ammaa jonta, bee hoolo bana felmaaŋgo kuɓɓanmi yiite haa haakooji maaki, mi yewan lice maaki.
Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama mi jo'ini Isra'iila e Yahuuda. Ammaa jonta ewniimi sarru dow maɓɓe, ngam ɓe mbaɗi kalluɗum: Ɓe ngulani Ba'al uurle, kanjum tikkini yam.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Jawmiraawo anndini no wanywanyɓe maako kaɓɓiri dabare dow maako.

Min maa, mi laatino bana jawgel beeɓŋgel ngel ɓe njahrata hirseego. Mi anndaano ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa dabare dow am. Ɓe mbi'i: Pe'enma lekki, saa'i ki kecci tawon. Itten mo diga lesdi yeeɗɓe, ngam taa goɗɗo siftora innde maako!”
Nden Yeremiya waɗi do'a: “Yaa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, an woni kiitoowo gooŋgaajo, a ɗon linya ɓerɗe e numooji yimɓe. Accu mi yi'a no a waatorto ɓe, ngam mi halfitinani ma haala am!
Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i dow yimɓe Anatot ɗaɓɓuɓe mbarugo yam. Ɓe mbi'i ɓe mbaratam, to mi tokkake waɗugo annabaaku bee innde Jawmiraawo!
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi hiitoto ɓe. Suka'en maɓɓe maayran bee kaafahi, ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe maayran bee weelo.
Walaa koo gooto maɓɓe luttata, ngam mi ukkan sarru dow yimɓe Anatot, nder hitaande nde ta'umi ngam hiitaago ɓe.”

Yeremiya tori, wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, a adiliijo timmuɗo, mi waawataa hujjotirgo bee ma! Ammaa bee non fuu mi yiɗi wolwango ma haala kiita ngooŋɗuka. Ngam ɗume nufayeeje halluɓe ɗon kiɓɓe, ɓe ɗon njaha yeeso yeeso? Ngam ɗume zammbotooɓe njooɗoto nder de'ere?
An jubi ɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe mbaɗi ɗaɗi. Ɓe ɗon ɓesdo, ɓe ɗon ndima ɓenndalooje. Foroy haala maaɗa ɗon nder kunnduɗe maɓɓe, ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe ɗon ndaayi bee ma.
Ammaa min, yaa Jawmiraawo, a anndi yam. A ɗon yi'ammi, a ɗon linya ɓernde am, a anndi no mi yiɗiri ma. Dasu halluɓe ɓe'e bana baali kirseteeɗi. Jo'in ɓe sera ngam nyalaade kirsol!
Haa ndey lesdi wonata nder suno e haakooji gese fuu ɗaylata? Dabbaaji e colli ɗon mbaata daliila halleende yimɓe jooɗiiɓe lesdi ndi'i, wi'ɓe o yi'ataa garanɗum meeɗen.”
Jawmiraawo jaabi yam: “To doggididgo bee yimɓe somni ma, noy a waawrata doggididgo bee pucci? To a ɗon hoolɗini nder lesdi hoolaare tan, ɗume a waɗata nder laynde sukkunde baŋnge maayo Urdun?
Koo deerɗiraaɓe ma e yimɓe saare baaba ma zammbi ma, ɓe ɗon mooɓta yimɓe dow maaɗa bilaa anndaaŋgal ma. Taa nuɗɗin ɓe to ɓe mbi'i ma bolle booɗɗe.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Mi acci suudu am, mi wudini maral am, mi hokki ummaatoore am yiɗaande haa juuɗe konne'en maare.
Ummaatoore laatiinde maral am wayliti, ɗon haɓa bee am bana mbarooga iwŋga laynde. Nde ɗon ubba dow am, ngam maajum mi ɗon wanya nde.
Nde nanndi bee sonndu woondu ndu colli loohotooɗi taari ɗum, ɗi ewni: Ngare, mooɓe dabbaaji ladde fuu, njahre ɗi haa pellel nyaamdu!
Ardiiɓe jananɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbonni ngesa inabooje am, njaaɓi maral am, laatini lesdi am mboondi ladde meere.
Ɓe laatini ndi ladde meere, ndi wonni, ndi ferwi yeeso am. Lesdi fuu ferwi, walaa mo numata ɗum.
Jaɓtooɓe ngari dow towndiije cooke nder ladde fuu, ngam mi ukki konu dow lesdi ngam halkugo ndi fuu. Walaa mo luttata jam.
Yimɓe am aawi alkamaari, ammaa ɓe codi gi'e. Ɓe comi meere. Codol maɓɓe laatani ɓe toskaare ngam daliila tikkere am saatunde.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ndaa ko mi wolwata dow heeddiɗɗiraaɓe am halluɓe, meemɓe maral ngal ndokkumi ummaatoore am Isra'iila. Mi ɗoofan ɓe nder lesdi maɓɓe, mi ɗoofan Yahuuda e juuɗe maɓɓe.
Ammaa ɓaawo to mi ɗoofi ɓe, mi enɗan ɓe kadiboo, haa mi lorna ɓe, koo moy nder maral muuɗum e lesdi muuɗum.

To ɓe tokki diina ummaatoore am, to ɓe kunori bee innde am, ɓe mbi'i: Fakat bana Jawmiraawo o geeto—, bana ɓe ekkitinino ummaatoore am naane, ɓe kunorono bee innde Ba'al—, nden kamɓe boo ɓe tabitan caka ummaatoore am.
Ammaa to ɓe ɗowtanaaki yam, mi ɗoofan irin ummaatoore nde'e, mi nattinan nde.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Yah, soodu taadorgol leŋ, taada ngol dow keeci ma, ammaa taa ndiyam meema ngol.”
Mi soodi taadorgol man bana Jawmiraawo umruno yam, mi taadi ngol.
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam ɗiɗawre, o wi'i:
“Yah haa maayo Efratis. Hoo'u taadorgol ngol cooduɗa, ngol taadiiɗa, yah nyukkinoy ngol nder ceekgol tapaare.”
Mi yehi, mi nyukkinoy ngol baŋnge Efratis, bana Jawmiraawo umruno yam.
Ɓaawo nyalɗe ɗuuɗɗe Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Lorta haa Efratis, hoocoy taadorgol ngol mi umruno ma nyukkinoygo ton.”
Mi lorti ton, mi ɗaɓɓiti nyukkorde taadorgol, mi hoo'i ngol. Ammaa ndaa, ngol wonnake, ngol nafataa sam.
Nden Jawmiraawo wolwani yam fahin, wi'i:
“Bana non kalkiranmi mawnitaare Yahuuda e mawnitaare Urusaliima ɗuuɗnde.
Yimɓe ummaatoore hallunde nde'e cali nanango yam, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa ko ɓerɗe maɓɓe caatuɗe ngiɗi, ɓe ɗon cujidana ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, ɓe ɗon ɗowtano ɓe. Ɓe laatoto bana taadorgol ngo'ol ngol nafataa sam!

Bana no goɗɗo taadori keeci mum bee taadorgol, non taadoriimi yimɓe Isra'iila e Yahuuda fuu haa am, haa ɓe laato ummaatoore am, ɓe mbaŋgina maŋngu, ɓe maŋgta innde am, ɓe teddina nde, ammaa ɓe nanaay.”
“Yeccu yimɓe ɓe'e: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Sey bulki fuu keewa bee njaram. Ɓe mbi'ete: Moy anndaa bulki ɗon ngam heewugo bee njaram?
Nden yeccu ɓe: Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi yarnan yimɓe lesdi ndi'i njaram haa ɓe nguyka, laamiiɓe jooɗiiɓe dow leeso laamu Daawuda e liman'en e annabi'en e jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima fuu.
Mi sampitan ɓe, oo dow oya, baabiraaɓe e ɓikkoy fuu. Mi enɗataa koo moy, mi yurmintaa koo moy, mi hinnataako koo moy. Walaa ko haɗatammi halkugo ɓe, non Jawmiraawo wi'i.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Nane, keɗite! Taa mawnite!
Teddine Jawmiraawo, Allah mooɗon hiddeko o waɗa nyiɓre, hiddeko kosɗe mooɗon pergo dow kooseeje ngam nyiɓɓuki. On ɗon ndeeni jayŋgol, ammaa o laatinan ngol nyiɓre, nyiɓre ɓaleere kurum.
To on nanaay, mi woyan nder cuuɗiiɗum ngam mawnitaare mooɗon. Mi woyan ɗuuɗɗum, gite am ndufan gonɗi ngam tokkere Jawmiraawo daheteende.
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Yeccu laamiiɗo e daada mum ɓe njippo leeso laamu, ngam meetaleeji tedduŋgal maɓɓe yani diga dow ko'e maɓɓe.
Konne'en maɓɓi gure nder Lesdi Fombina, walaa maɓɓitanɗo ɗe. Yimɓe Yahuuda fuu ndahaama.
Ɓaŋgtu gite, laar, an Urusaliima! Konne'en ɗon ngara diga woyla. Toy yimɓe halfitinaaɓe haa juuɗe maaɗa? Toy yimɓe ma ɓe mantortooɗa?
A woowi bee jananɓe bana sooba'en maaɗa. Ɗume mbi'ata to Jawmiraawo laamini ɓe dow maaɗa? Saa'i man luuwe naŋngete bana ɗe debbo ɓesnanɗo.
To a ƴami ngam ɗume irin ɗu'um laatani ma, ngam ɗume ɓe ɓaŋgti gawarle limce maaɗa, ɓe toskini ma, anndu: Ngam ɗuuɗeeŋga aybeeji maaɗa.
Etiyopiyaajo waawan waylugo noonde laral mum na? Paaɗaawu waawan ittugo toɓɓe mum na? To ɗum heɓoto, nden kam onon jooɗiiɓe Urusaliima woowɓe halleende boo on ekkititto waɗugo ko wooɗi.
Mi saŋkitan on bana henndu ladde wifirta nyaande.
Kanjum laatoto geɗal maaɗa ngal mi yeɗani ma, ngam a yejjiti yam, a hooli pewe.
Jawmiraawo bee hoore muuɗum ɓaŋgtan gawarle limce maaɗa, yimɓe ndaaran toskaare maaɗa
dow towndiije e gese, mi yi'i kuuɗe nyidduɗe ɗe kuuwɗa, non boo njeenu ma e suunooji ma kalluɗi e daakaareeku ma. Kayto, onon yimɓe Urusaliima, on coɓi! Haa ndeye on laaɓata?”
Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya haala hokkere, wi'i:
“Lesdi Yahuuda ɗon nder suno, berniiji maari ɗon mbaata, yimɓe maari ɗon njooɗi, ɗon mboya. Urusaliima ɗon ummina gookaali.
Mawɓe maɓɓe ɗon nela maccuɓe muuɗum'en nyeɗoygo ndiyam. Ɓe njaha haa gaawi, ammaa ndiyam woodaa. Ɓe ngarta bee bulki cooki, ɓe ɗon cakli, ɓe ɗon cudda ko'e maɓɓe ngam mettamɓeram e toskaare.
Lesdi waɗi ɓoli ngam iyeende woodaa. Ngam maajum remooɓe boo caklake, ɗon cudda ko'e muuɗum'en.
Koo lelwa haa ladde boo rimi, nden acci ɓiyum keccel, ngam huɗo woodaa.
Bamɗe ladde ɗon ndari dow towndiije cooke, ɗon laaha bana cuuli. Gite maaje tampi tefugo huɗo, ammaa ko woodaa.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Hakkeeji amin ɗon ngullo min, yaa Jawmiraawo, ammaa wallu min ngam daliila innde maaɗa. Nde ɗuuɗɗum, min tuurtani ma, min mbaɗi hakkeeji dow maaɗa!
An woni tammunde Isra'iila e kisnoowo mum diga ɓillaaje. Ngam ɗume laatiiɗa bana jananno nder lesdi, bana jahoowo baalanɗo jemmaare woore tan?
Ngam ɗume laatiiɗa bana cakliiɗo, bana cemmbiɗɗo mo waawataa hisnugo? Fakat a ɗon wondi bee amin, yaa Jawmiraawo, innde maaɗa ɗon ewne caka amin, taa accu min!”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i dow yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e: “Ɓe ngiɗi gaance jamum, ɓe naŋgtaay kosɗe maɓɓe. Ngam maajum mi seyortaako ɓe. Mi siftoran zunuubaaji maɓɓe, mi hiitoto hakkeeji maɓɓe.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Taa do'ana yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e hayru.
Koo to ɓe cuumake, mi nanataa bojji maɓɓe. Koo to ɓe lii'anake yam kirsaaɗi e dokke nyaamdu, mi yerdataako ɓe. Ammaa mi halkan ɓe bee konu e weelo e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu.”
Mi wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah, a anndi annabi'en ɗon ngecca ɓe: On ngi'ataa konu, weelo naŋngataa on, ammaa Jawmiraawo hokkan on jam timmuɗam haa nokkuure nde'e.”

Jawmiraawo jaabi yam: “Annabi'en ɗon ngaazo fewre bee innde am. Min mi nelaay ɓe, mi umraay ɓe koo ɗume, mi wolwanaay ɓe. Ko ɓe ngaazoto on, ɗum wahayuuji pewooji e hatti e dewki labbi e fewjere ɓerɗe maɓɓe non.
Min Jawmiraawo mi ɗon wi'a ko mbaɗanmi annabi'en waazotooɓe bee innde am koo to mi nelaay ɓe, wi'anɓe konu malla weelo waɗataa nder lesdi: Mi halkan annabi'en ɓe'e bee konu e weelo.

Yimɓe nanɓe annabaaku maɓɓe, kamɓe boo ɓe maayran bee konu e weelo, ɓe ngudinan ɓalli maɓɓe haa laabi Urusaliima, walaa uwanɗo ɓe. Non ɗum laatanto ɓe fuu, rewɓe maɓɓe e ɓikkoy maɓɓe ngorkoy e ndehoy. Mi lornan halleende maɓɓe dow ko'e maɓɓe.
Yeccu ɓe wolde nde'e: Jemma e naaŋge gite am accataa rufugo gonɗi, ngam ummaatoore am nde ngiɗmi ɗum fiyaama piyol naawŋgol.
To mi wurtake haa ngesa, mi yi'an mbaraaɓe bee kaafahi. To mi nasti berniwol, ndaa maayanɓe bee weelo. Koo annabi'en e liman'en boo ɗon ngiilo nder lesdi, ɓe anndaa ko ɓe mbaɗata!”

Yeremiya wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, a wudini Yahuuda cuy na? A ganyɗo Siyona na? Ngam ɗume piyɗa min naawɗum bana nii haa min mbaawataa nyawndeego? Min ngeli jam, ammaa booɗɗum woodaa. Min tammo min nyawndoto, ammaa ndaa, sey kultoreeŋgol.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, min anndi halleende amin e aybe kaakiraaɓe amin, min mbaɗi hakke dow maaɗa.
Ammaa ngam daliila innde maaɗa, taa wudin min, taa yawnu Urusaliima, jooɗorde tedduŋgal maaɗa. Siftor alkawal maaɗa bee amin, taa fiistu ngal!
Walaa lawru haa ummaatooje waawata toɓnugo iyeende, asama boo waawataa toɓnugo waabiliire. Tammunde hayru amin ɗon haa maaɗa, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin, ngam an waɗata kuuje ɗe'e fuu!”
Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Koo to Muusa e Samuyila ndarake yeeso am, torake yam, mi enɗataako yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e. Riiw ɓe yeeso am, ɓe ndilla

To ɓe ƴami ma: Toy min ndillata? Jaaba ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mo hoddirana maayrugo bee kaafahi, haa kaafahi o dillata. Mo hoddirana maayrugo bee weelo, haa weelo o dillata. Mo hoddirana daheeki
Mi ta'ani ɓe masiibooji nayi: Kaafahi ngam mbarugo ɓe, dawaaɗi ngam seekugo ɓe, colli e dabbaaji ngam nyaamugo ɓe e ngam nattingo ɓe.
Mi laatinan ɓe nyidduɓe haa laamuuji duniyaaru fuu ngam daliila kuuɗe ɗe Manassa ɓii Hezekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda waɗi haa Urusaliima
Onon yimɓe Urusaliima, moy yurminta on? Moy enɗoto on? Moy yaaloto on ngam ƴamugo njamu mooɗon?
Onon on ngudini yam, on ngaylitani yam ɓaawe mooɗon. Ngam maajum portanmi juŋngo am dow mooɗon ngam halkugo on. Mi somi yurmingo on.
Nder gure lesdi fuu njaartumi on. Mi halkan ummaatoore am, mi mbaran ɓikkoy mooɗon, ngam on accaay laabi mooɗon kalluɗi.
Mi ɗuɗɗini rewɓe yurumɓe haa mooɗon ko ɓuri njaareendi haa maayo. Mi neli kalkoowo dow daadiraaɓe honooɓe suka'en, bee juhuki ukkumi kultoreeŋgol maŋngol.

Daada marɗo ɓiɓɓe njoweeɗiɗo faɗɗaama, o maaynaama. Naaŋge maako muti caka nyalawma, o toski, o semti. Luttuɓe mooɗon, mi hokki ɓe haa juuɗe konne'en mooɗon, ɓe mbara on bee kaafahi.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Yeremiya wi'i: “Bone laatanto yam! Koni daada am danyimmi? Min laatiiɗo jokkiroowo e fitinamaajo ngam lesdi fuu! Mi hokkaay nyamaande, mi nyaamaay nyamaande, ammaa koo moy ɗon naalammi.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Fakat mi hisni ma haa keɓa hayru. Mi huni konne'en ma torete saa'i ɓe ɗon nder ɓillaare e bone.
Walaa gewanɗo njamndi ɓaleeri, sakkomaa iwndi lesdi woyla! Walaa boo gewanɗo njamndi mboɗeeri
Mi nelan konne'en haa ɓe njaɓta jawdi e ndesaaji yimɓe am, ngam daliila hakkeeji ɗi ɓe mbaɗi koo toy nder lesdi.
Mi laatinan ɓe maccuɓe konne'en maɓɓe nder lesdi ndi ɓe anndaa, ngam tikkere am saatunde dow maɓɓe ɗon wula bana yiite.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, a anndi kuuje fuu. Siftoram, yiidam, waata toonyooɓe yam. Taa juttin munyal maaɗa, ngam taa ɓe mbarammi. Anndu, mi ɗon munyana kuudi daliila ma.
Mi jaɓi bolle ɗe a wolwani yam. Ɗe laatani ɓernde am seyo e welwelo, ngam an, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah honooɓe asama, innde maaɗa ɗon dow am.
Mi meeɗaay jooɗodaago bee jalanɓe haa mi welwita bee maɓɓe. Mi maati juŋngo maaɗa dow am, ngam maajum njooɗiimi feere am, mi keewɗo tikkere.
Ngam ɗume naaworla am jinnataa? Ngam ɗume huuduure am nyawndataako? Ngam ɗume nde sali hurgaago? A laatani yam bana maayel ngel hoolataake ngam ndiyam maagel ɓeeɓan!”

Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo jaabi yam: “To a lortake, mi jaɓete fahin, a laatoto suka am fahin. To a wolwi nafoojum, naa meereejum, nden kam a laatoto annabiijo am fahin. Yimɓe tokkoto ma, ammaa naa an tokkoto ɓe.
Heedi yimɓe ɓe'e kam, mi laatinte bana mahol cemmbiɗŋgol ngol njamndi mboɗeeri. Ɓe kaɓan bee maaɗa, ammaa ɓe njaalataako ma. Ngam min mi ɗon wondi bee maaɗa ngam rimɗingo ma e hisnugo ma.
Mi rimɗinte e juuɗe halluɓe e toonyooɓe.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Jawmiraawo wolwani yam, wi'i:
“Taa ɓaŋgu debbo, taa danyu ɓiɓɓe worɓe malla rewɓe haa nokkuure nde'e.
Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i dow ɓikkoy ngorkoy e ndehoy ndanyeteekoy haa ɗo e dow baabiraaɓe e daadiraaɓe maakoy:
Ɓe maayran nyawuji kalluɗi, walaa boyanɗo ɓe koo uwanɗo ɓe. Ɓe mbaaloto haa lesdi bana koonal. Ɓe kalkan bee kaafahi malla bee weelo, ɓalli maɓɓe laatoto nyaamdu colli e kuuje ladde.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Taa nastu saare suniiɓe, koo ngam woyugo koo ngam de'itingo. Mi ittani ummaatoore nde'e salaaman am e mbooɗeeŋga am e enɗam am.
Mawɓe e leesɓe nder lesdi ndi'i maayan, ammaa walaa mo uwata ɓe, walaa mo woyata ɓe. Walaa mo ƴarata ɓanndu mum malla mo laɓata hoore mum ngam maɓɓe
Walaa mo nyaamdata koo yardata bee goɗɗo ngam de'itingo mo to goɗɗo saare maako maayi, koo to baaba maako malla daada maako maayi.
Taa nastu saare haa yimɓe ɗon mbaɗa juulde, taa jooɗoda bee yimɓe ngam nyaamdugo e yardugo bee maɓɓe.

Nan ko mbi'anmi, min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila: Mi je'inan hoolo seyo e welwelo, non boo daande ɓaŋɗo e daande ɓaŋaaɗo haa nokkuure nde'e. Ɗum laatoto saa'i on yeeɗɓe, on ngi'an ɗum bee gite mon
To a anndini yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e kuuje ɗe'e fuu, ɓe ƴami ma boo: Ngam ɗume Jawmiraawo ta'ani min sarru naawŋgu bana ngu'u? Ɗume woni aybe amin? Hakkewol ngole min mbaɗi dow Jawmiraawo Allah amin?
Nden yeccu ɓe: Jawmiraawo wi'i: Kaakiraaɓe mooɗon acci yam, tokki ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, njaggani ɓe, cujidani ɓe. Ammaa min, ɓe acci yam, ɓe ɗowtanaaki tawreeta am.
Onon boo on mbaɗi kalluɗum ko ɓuri kaakiraaɓe mooɗon. Koo moy mooɗon ɗon waɗa ko ɓernde mum saatunde, hallunde yiɗi, on nanantaa yam.
Ngam maajum ndiiwanmi on diga lesdi ndi'i haa lesdi ndi on meeɗaay anndugo, koo onon koo kaakiraaɓe mooɗon. Ton njaggantooɗon ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe jemma e naaŋge fuu, ngam mi hinnataako on.
Saa'i ɗon wara nde kunotooɗo wi'ataa: Fakat bana Jawmiraawo mo wurtini yimɓe Isra'iila e lesdi Misra o geeto,

ammaa o wi'an: Fakat bana Jawmiraawo mo wartiri yimɓe Isra'iila diga lesdi woyla e lesɗe ɗe o saŋkitino ɓe fuu, o geeto! Ngam mi hooran ɓe haa lesdi maɓɓe ndi ndokkumi kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Mi nelan waawooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe ngara naŋngugo yimɓe ɓe'e. Nden mi nelan loohooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɓe loohoto ɓe dow kooseeje e towndiije e nder ceekli tapaaje fuu.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Mi ɗon yi'a kuuɗe maɓɓe, walaa ko suuɗi. Aybe maɓɓe wiirnataako yeeso am.
Mi waatoto aybe maɓɓe e hakkeeji maɓɓe cowi ɗiɗi. Ngam ɓe coɓni lesdi am bee labbi maɓɓe maayɗi, ɓe kebbini maral am bee kuuje maɓɓe nyidduɗe.”

Yeremiya wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni semmbe am e aynol am e hisrude am nder nyalaade ɓillaare! Ummaatooje ngaran haa maaɗa diga keeri duniyaaru, mbi'an: Kaakiraaɓe amin ngoodino ɗowanteeɓe fewooɓe e labbi meereeji ɗi nafataa sam.
Goɗɗo waawan waɗango hoore mum ɗowanteeɓe na? Alhaali boo naa ɗum ɗowanteeɓe bee gooŋga!”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Jonta anndinanmi ɓe semmbe am e baawɗe am. Nden ɓe anndan min woni Jawmiraawo.”

Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Onon yimɓe Yahuuda, hakkeeji mon mbinndaama bee binndirgol njamndi, ngol hunnduko mum ɓuri hayre saatugo. Ɗi mbinndaama bana non haa nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, haa dow luwe haa seɓattooji kirsirɗe mooɗon boo.
Nden kam ɓiɓɓe mon ciftoran kirsirɗe e daŋraŋge Asera baŋnge leɗɗe kecce fuu e dow towndiije.
Onon rewanɓe labbi dow kooseeje e nder waadiiji, mi hokkan jawdi e ndesaaji mooɗon haa konne'en ngam daliila hakkeeji ɗi mbaɗɗon koo toy nder lesdi mooɗon.
Doole juuɗe mon njoofa lesdi ndi ndokkumi on. Mi laatinan on maccuɓe konne'en mooɗon nder lesdi ndi on anndaa, ngam caatal tikkere am dow mooɗon nde kuɓɓuɗon wulan haa foroy.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i:
“Naaloore dow neɗɗo mo hooloto ɓii-Aadamaajo, mo ɓernde mum wayliti, acci Jawmiraawo.
O nanndi bee wumre nder ladde hamaadaare, o meeɗataa yi'ugo hayru. Ammaa o jooɗoto nder ladde yoornde, haa nokkuure lammunde. Walaa mo jooɗoto ton.
Barka laatanto neɗɗo mo hooloto Jawmiraawo, mo tabitini hoolaare mum dow Jawmiraawo.
O nanndi bee lekki jubaaki baŋnge ndiyam, gurtinanki ɗaɗi mum gal maayel. To nguleeŋga waɗi, ki hulataa, ngam haakooji maaki kecci. Nder hitaande hokkere boo ki saklataako, ki ɗon tokko rimugo
Ɓernde neɗɗo ɓuri koo ɗume fuu naafikaaku, nde halli masin. Moy waawata faamugo nde?
Min Jawmiraawo mi linyan ɓernde, mi wiɗititto numooji. Mi warjoto koo moy fodde yahdu mum e fodde nafuuda kuuɗe mum
Mo riski bee rikici nanndi bee gerlal boofiiŋgal dow geeraaɗe ɗe ngal rufaay. Haa reeta balɗe maako risku maako majjiran mo, haa timmoode boo o paataaɗo non.”
Suudu amin seniindu woni jooɗorde tedduŋgal, ndu tabiti dow hooseere diga fuɗɗam.
Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni tammunde Isra'iila. Accuɓe ma keewan mbustu. Ɓe majjan bana inɗe binndaaɗe nder mbulwuldi, ngam ɓe acci Jawmiraawo, seeɓoore ndiyam ndokkanɗam ngeendam.
Yeremiya wi'i: “Yamɗitinam, yaa Jawmiraawo, nden mi yamɗitan. Hisnam, nden mi hisan fakat. An woni mo maŋgtanmi ɗum.
Yimɓe ɗon mbi'ammi: Toy koŋngol Jawmiraawo go? Sey ngol hiɓɓa kadi!
Min mi meeɗaay yerɓugo ma a nela sarru dow maɓɓe. Mi yelaay nyalaade bone ngam maɓɓe. An a anndi ɗum, yaa Jawmiraawo. A anndi ko mbi'mi.
Taa laatanam daliila kultoreeŋgol, ngam an woni hisrude am nder nyalaade hallunde!
Semtin toonyooɓe yam, ammaa taa mi semta! Hulnu ɓe, ammaa taa hulnam! Ukku nyalaade hallunde dow maɓɓe, halku ɓe cowi ɗiɗi!”
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Yah, dara haa Dammugal Ummaatoore, ngal laamiiɓe Yahuuda nastirta e ngurtirto berniwol, non boo haa dammuɗe Urusaliima goɗɗe fuu!
Wi' laamiiɓe e yimɓe Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, nastiranɓe dammuɗe man fuu: Nane ko Jawmiraawo wi'ata on:
Ndaa ko o wi'i: Kakkilane ko'e mooɗon, taa ndoonde doŋngal nder nyannde siwtorde, taa nastine doŋngal koo ngale haa dammuɗe Urusaliima
Taa ngurtine doŋngal e cuuɗi mon nyannde siwtorde, taa kuuwe kuugal boo. Ammaa cene nyannde siwtorde bana umrumi kaakiraaɓe mon
Kamɓe ɓe nananaay yam, ɓe kakkilaay, ammaa ɓe caatini ko'e maɓɓe, ɓe cali nanango yam, ɓe njaɓaay elto am.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Sey on ɗowtano yam booɗɗum. Taa on nastina doŋngal koo ngale haa dammuɗe berniwol ngo'ol nyannde siwtorde. Cene nyannde maajum, taa kuuwe kuugal koo ngale nder maare.

Nden kam laamiiɓe mon e ardiiɓe mon njooɗoto dow leeso laamu Daawuda. Ɓe mba'oto pucci e mootaaji pucci, kamɓe ɓe nastiran dammuɗe berniwol ngo'ol. Non boo yimɓe Yahuuda e Urusaliima. Yimɓe njooɗoto haa berniwol ngo'ol foroy.

Woɗɓe ngaran diga berniiji Yahuuda e gure taariiɗe Urusaliima, diga lesdi Benyamin e lesdi towndiije, diga kooseeje e Lesdi Fombina. Ɓe ngaddan guleteeɗi e kirseteeɗi e dokke nyaamdu e uurle, ɓe ngaddan dokke gettooje haa suudu am.

Ammaa sey on ɗowtano yam. Sey on cena nyannde siwtorde, taa on nastina doŋgle haa dammuɗe bernixol Urusaliima nder nyannde man. To naa non, mi huɓɓan yiite haa dammuɗe Urusaliima. Nge wulan cuuɗi maagol booɗɗi, nge nyifataako.”
Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya, wi'i:
“Umma, yah haa saare mahoowo payanɗe, ton mi anndinte habaru am.”
Mi yehi haa saare mahoowo payanɗe man. O ɗonno huuwa haa kuuwruɗum maako.
Fayannde nde o ɗon maha, fottanaay mo. Ngam maajum o mahi fayannde feere bee loope man, bana ko fottani mo.
Nden Jawmiraawo wolwani yam, wi'i:
“Onon yimɓe Isra'iila, mi waawataa waɗugo on bana mahoowo payanɗe waarata loope na? Bana loope haa juŋngo mahoowo payanɗe, nonnon on laatori haa juŋngo am.” Nii Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Saa'i feere mi wi'an mi ɗoofa ummaatoore koo laamu, mi yibbina, mi halka ɗum.
Ammaa to ummaatoore man wayliti, acci halleende muuɗum, nden kam mi faasitan waɗugo kalluɗum ko mbi'mi dow maare.
Saa'i feere boo mi wi'an mi nyiɓa ummaatoore koo laamu, mi ɗisa ɗum.
Ammaa to ummaatoore man waɗi kalluɗum yeeso am, to nde ɗowtanaaki yam, nden kam mi faasitan waɗugo booɗɗum ko mbi'mi dow maare.

Jonta kadi, yeccu yimɓe Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi ɗon taaskano on sarru, mi ɗon nufano on huunde hallunde. Lorte diga laabi mon kalluɗi, mbo'itine laabi mon e kuuɗe mon!
Ammaa ɓe njaaboto: Aa'a, woodaa! Min tokkoto numooji amin, min mbaɗan ko ɓerɗe amin kalluɗe caatuɗe ngiɗi.”
Ngam maajum Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ƴame ummaatooje fuu. Moy meeɗi nanugo irin ɗu'um? Yimɓe Isra'iila mbaɗi nyidduɗum masin.
Mallimallooje cuddataa geereeje kooseeje Libanon tum na? Ndiyamji peewɗi ilooji e kooseeje man ɓeeɓan na?
Ammaa yimɓe ummaatoore am ngejjiti yam, ɓe ɗon ngulana labbi meere uurle. Ngam maajum ɓe pergi dow laabi maɓɓe, dow laabi ɓooymaaji. Ɓe ɗon tokko laabi ɗi ceekaaka.
Ɓe laatini lesdi maɓɓe kulniindi, njawniindi haa foroy. Koo moy caalotooɗo hultoran, dimmban hoore mum, hayɗinan.
Mi saŋkitan yimɓe am yeeso konne'en maɓɓe bana collaaje ɗe henndu fuunaaŋge umminta. To halkere maɓɓe wari, mi waylitanan ɓe ɓaawo am, mi wallataa ɓe.”

Nden yimɓe mbi'i: “Ngare, en kaɓɓa dabare dow Yeremiya! Liman'en ekkitinooɓe en tawreeta ɗon foroy, hikma'en carwanto en tum, annabi'en ngaazoto wolde Allah foroy. Kallinen mo, taa kakkilanen bolle maako sam!”
Yeremiya tori Allah, wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, jaɓ tornde am, nan ko konne'en am mbi'ata.
Kadi halleende laatoto ngeenaari ngam mbooɗeeŋga na? Ammaa kamɓe ɓe ngasi ngaska ngam halkugo yam. Siftor no mi darori yeeso maaɗa, mi seetti ɓe ngam taa a waɗa ɓe fodde tikkere maaɗa!
Ngam maajum yooftu ɓikkoy maɓɓe haa koy maaya bee weelo, koy mbare bee kaafahi! Rewɓe maɓɓe, sooynu ɓe ɓikkoy e worɓe! Waade nattina worɓe maɓɓe, suka'en mbare bee kaafahi nder haɓre!
Nel mooɓre jaɓtooɓe bee juhuki dow maɓɓe, haa yimɓe nana bojji iwanɗi diga cuuɗi maɓɓe! Ɓe ngasi ngaska ngam naŋngugo yam, ɓe tuufani kosɗe am tuuforli.
Ammaa an, yaa Jawmiraawo a anndi nufayeeje maɓɓe mbarooje ɗe ɓe nufi dow am. Taa yaafa zunuuba maɓɓe, taa sottin hakkeeji maɓɓe yeeso maaɗa! Accu ɓe ndo'o yeeso maaɗa, hiita ɓe saa'i tikkere ma!”
Jawmiraawo wi'i ni'i: “Yah, soodu mbulku. Hoo'u woɗɓe caka ndotti'en ummaatoore e ndotti'en caka liman'en.
Yahdu bee maɓɓe haa Waadiwol Ɓii-Hinnom, haa yaasi Dammugal Keeɗe. Wooynu ton ko mi wi'ete

Wi': Sey on nana wolde Jawmiraawo, onon laamiiɓe Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe nder Urusaliima. Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi yahran sarru dow nokkuure nde'e. Koo moy nani ɗum, noppi mum ciikan.

Mi waɗan ɗum ngam yimɓe acci yam, ɓe cannji nokkuure nde'e bee wulugo uurle ngam ɗowanteeɓe jananɓe haa yimɓe annditaay nde. Koo kamɓe, koo kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe, koo laamiiɓe Yahuuda, walaa mo anndino ɗowanteeɓe ɓe'e. Ɓe kebbini nokkuure nde'e bee ƴiiƴam yimɓe mbaraaɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe.
Ɓe nyiɓi nokkuuje towɗe ngam Ba'al, haa ɓe nguloya ɓikkoy maɓɓe bee yiite bana guleteeɗi. Min mi umraay ɓe waɗugo ɗum, mi meeɗaay wolwugo irin man koo numugo ɗum
Ngam maajum min Jawmiraawo mi wi'i: Saa'i waran nde ɓe ewnataako nokkuure nde'e Tofet malla Waadiwol Ɓii-Hinnom, ammaa Waadiwol Kirsol.
Haa nokkuure nde'e mbilanmi nufayeeje Yahuuda e Urusaliima. Mi do'an yimɓe bee kaafahi konne'en maɓɓe yiɗɓe mbarugo ɓe. Mi nyaamnan colli e dabbaaji ɓalli maɓɓe.
Mi wilan berniwol ngo'ol, ngol laatoto daliila jancoore. Koo moy caalotooɗo baŋnge maagol hultoran, hayɗinan ngam masiibooji maagol fuu.
Mi nyaamnan jooɗiiɓe nder maagol kusel ɓikkoy muuɗum'en ngorkoy e ndehoy. Konne'en maɓɓe e yiɗɓe mbarugo kippoto berniwol. Nder ɓillaare nde'e, jooɗiiɓe ton nyaamnyaamtiran.”
Nden pusa mbulku go yeeso yahduɓe bee ma,
yeccu ɓe: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi fusan yimɓe ɓe'e e berniwol ngo'ol bana goɗɗo fusrata mbulku, ngu wo'itintaako. Ɓe uwan maayɓe haa Tofet ngam babal he'aay.
Bana non waaranmi berniwol ngo'ol e jooɗiiɓe ton. Mi laatinan ngol bana Tofet.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Cuuɗi Urusaliima e cuuɗi laamiiɓe Yahuuda waato soorooji haa ɓe ngulani jama'aare asama fuu uurle dow muuɗum, haa ɓe ndufi dokke dufeteeɗe ngam ɗowanteeɓe jananɓe – ɗi fuu ɗi coɓan bana Tofet.”
Yeremiya lori diga Tofet haa Jawmiraawo nelno mo waɗugo annabaaku. O dari haa babal yeeso haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, o wi'i ummaatoore fuu:
“Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi yahran sarru dow berniwol ngo'ol e gure maagol fuu, bana ko mbi'mi. Ngam on caatini ko'e mooɗon, on cali ɗowtanaago bolle am.”
Pashuuru ɓii Immer, limanjo e wakiiliijo hooreejo haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, nani Yeremiya ɗon waɗa annabaaku man.
O fiyi annabi Yeremiya, o haɓɓi mo dow tiggirgal haa dammugal Benyamin ɓaŋgiiŋgal haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Jaŋngo man, nde Pashuuru yoofti mo e tiggirgal, Yeremiya wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo ewnataako ma Pashuuru fahin, ammaa Magor-Missabib, waato Kulniiɗum koo toy.

Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi accete nder kulol, an e sooba'en maaɗa fuu. A yi'an bee gite ma no konne'en mbardata ɓe bee kaafahi. Mi hokkan Yahuuda fuu haa juŋngo laamiiɗo Baabila. O dahan woɗɓe haa Baabila, woɗɓe boo o mbaran ɓe bee kaafahi.

Mi accan konne'en njaɓta jawdi berniwol ngo'ol e risku maagol e kuuje maagol marɗe saman fuu. Ndesaaji laamiiɓe Yahuuda boo, mi hokkan ɗum fuu konne'en maɓɓe. Ɓe njaɓtan ɗum, ɓe koocan ɗum, ɓe njahran ɗum haa Baabila.
An boo, Pashuuru e yimɓe saare maaɗa, on daheteeɓe haa Baabila. Ton a maayata, ton ɓe uwete hawtaade bee sooba'en maaɗa ɓe mbaɗanɗa annabaaku fewre.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, a ƴoyri yam, min boo mi jaɓi ƴoyreego! A ɓuri yam semmbe, a jaali yam. Koo moy fuu ɗon jancammi, yimɓe ɗon njala yam.
Nde mi wolwata fuu, sey mi wooka, mi wi'a: Toonyaare e halkere! Foroy ɓe ɗon njancammi, ɓe ɗon njawo mi, ngam mi ɗon waaza wolde maaɗa.
Ammaa to mi numi: Sey mi yejjita Jawmiraawo, taa mi wolwa bee innde maako, nden huunde ɗon wula nder ɓernde e nder i'e am bana yiite. Mi somi naŋgtugo nde, mi waawataa.

Mi nani ɗuuɗɓe ɗon nyo'ammi. Ɓe coomi yam Kulniiɗum koo toy. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Pefte mo! Sey peften mo! Koo sooba'en am boo ɗon ndeena haa mi do'o. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: Teema en keɓan ƴoyrugo mo. Nden kam en naŋnga mo, en mbaatoto mo.

Ammaa an, yaa Jawmiraawo, a ɗon wondi bee am, a konoowo cemmbiɗɗo. Ngam maajum toonyooɓe yam ndo'oto, ɓe keɓataa jaalorgal. A semtinan ɓe masin, ɓe keɓataa jaalorgal. Toskaare maɓɓe duumoto, nde yejjitittaake!
Yaa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, a ɗon linya adili'en heedi ma, a anndi ɓerɗe maɓɓe e numooji maɓɓe. Accu mi yi'a no a waatorto wanywanyɓe yam, ngam mi halfitinani ma haala am.
Ngimane Jawmiraawo! Maŋgte Jawmiraawo! Ngam o hisni yoŋki laafuɗo e juuɗe halluɓe.
Naaloore dow nyalaade nde mi danya! Taa nyalaade nde daada am danyimmi heɓa barka.
Naaloore dow ceynuɗo baaba am masin, bi'ɗo mo: A danyanaama ɓiŋngel gorgel!
Gorko man laato bana gure ɗe Jawmiraawo wili bilaa enɗam. Nde weeti fuu o nana bojji, caka naaŋge boo hoolo konu!
Ngam o mbaraay yam diga nder reedu daada am, haa daada am laato yenaande am, o reeduujo bee am haa foroy.
Mi ɗon yara bone e mettamɓeram, balɗe am ɗon njinna nder toskaare. To non kam, koni ngurtiimi reedu daada am
Jawmiraawo wi'i Yeremiya saa'i laamiiɗo Sedekiya neli Pashuuru ɓii Malkiya e Sefaniya ɓii Ma'aseya, limanjo, haa maako ngam wi'ugo mo:
“Useni, ƴaman en Jawmiraawo, ngam Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila ɗon hona en. Teema Jawmiraawo waɗanan en kaayeefi, lornan mo ɓaawo
Yeremiya jaabi ɓe, wi'i: Mbi'e Sedekiya,

ndaa nii Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: “Balmi konu ɗi njogiiɗon ngam honirgo laamiiɗo Baabila e Kaldiya'en, mi wartiran ɗi dow mooɗon. Hippuɓe on wonɓe gaɗa mahol, mi mooɓtan ɓe haa caka berniwol.
Min bee hoore am mi haɓan bee mooɗon, bee juŋngo am fortiiŋgo semmbiɗŋgo, bee ɓernuki am e tikkere am saatunde.
Mi mbaran yimɓe berniwol ngo'ol, yimɓe e dabbaaji maayran nyawu ndaaɓoowu kalluŋgu masin.

Ɓaawo man ndokkanmi Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e saraaki'en mum e yimɓe luttuɓe nder berniwol haa juŋngo Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, haa juuɗe konne'en maɓɓe yiɗɓe mbarugo ɓe. Luttuɓe nder berniwol ɓe maayaay bee nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu malla kaafahi malla weelo, Nabukodonosor umran mbarugo ɓe bee kaafahi. O enɗataa ɓe, o accataa koo gooto maɓɓe bee yoŋki, o yurmintaa ɓe sam.”
Jawmiraawo umri Yeremiya: “Yeccu yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi ɗon holla on laawol ngeendam e laawol maayde, haa on cuɓa.
Koo moy jooɗoto nder berniwol ngo'ol, maayran bee kaafahi malla weelo malla nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu. Ammaa mo wurtoto ngam hawtango Kaldiya'en hippiiɓe on, kaŋko o yeeɗan, o hisnan yoŋki maako.
Ngam mi huucitini gite am dow berniwol ngo'ol haa mi waɗa kalluɗum, naa booɗɗum. Mi hokkan ngol haa juŋngo laamiiɗo Baabila, kaŋko o wulan ngol bee yiite.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.

Yeccu saare laamiiɗo Yahuuda: “Onon yimɓe saare Daawuda, nane ko Jawmiraawo wi'ata on! Nde weeti fuu mbaɗe kiita ngooŋɗuka! Kisne jaɓtaaɗo nder juŋngo toonyoowo, ngam taa tikkere am bana yiite nge goɗɗo waawataa nyifugo umma, wula koo ɗume fuu daliila kuuɗe mon kalluɗe.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Onon yimɓe Urusaliima, on ɗon njooɗi towɗum dow waadiwol, dow tapaare dow ƴoolde, on mbi'i: Walaa mo seekata mahi amin cemmbiɗɗi, o nasta nyukkorɗe amin.
Ammaa min mi hiitoto on daliila kuuɗe mooɗon. Mi huɓɓan yiite nder laynde mooɗon
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Yah haa saare laamiiɗo Yahuuda, anndin wolde nde'e:
Nane wolde Jawmiraawo, an laamiiɗo Yahuuda, jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu Daawuda e saraaki'en ma e yimɓe ma wonɓe haa laamorde fuu.

Ndaa nii o wi'i: Mbaɗe kiita ngooŋɗuka e adilaaku. Kisne jaɓtaaɗo nder juŋngo toonyoowo. Taa ɓille hoɗɓe e atiime'en e rewɓe yurumɓe, taa toonye ɓe! Acce mbarugo yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe haa nokkuure nde'e!
To on mbaɗi ko umrumi on, nden kam laamiiɓe mon mba'oto pucci e mootaaji pucci, tokkoto laamaago dow leeso laamu Daawuda. Kamɓe e saraaki'en maɓɓe e yimɓe maɓɓe nastan dammuɗe laamorde nde'e.
Ammaa to on ɗowtanaaki bolle ɗe'e, nden kam laamorde nde'e laatoto winnde. Min Jawmiraawo mi hunori ɗum bee hoore am.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Laamorde laamiiɗo Yahuuda wooɗi haa gite am bana lesdi Gile'at e yeereere hooseere Libanon. Ammaa mi wartiran nde winnde e nokkuure ferwunde.
Mi nelan worɓe ngam wilugo nde. Koo moy maɓɓe wara bee fe'irde mum, fe'a leɗɗe cemmbiɗɗe ma ɓurɗe wooɗugo, wubo ɗe nder yiite.
Ɓaawoɗon yimɓe ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe caaloto baŋnge berniwol ngo'ol, ɓe ƴamƴamtiran: Ngam ɗume Jawmiraawo waɗi berniwol maŋngol ngo'ol bana nii?
Nden ɓe njaaboto: Ngam jooɗiiɓe ton piisti alkawal bee Jawmiraawo Allah muuɗum'en, ɓe cujidani ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, ɓe ndewi ɓe.”
Onon yimɓe Yahuuda, taa mboye ngam laamiiɗo Yusiya maayɗo, taa cune daliila maako. Ammaa mboye ngam ɓiyiiko Sallum mo dilli, wartataa yi'ugo lesdi haa o danya.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i dow Sallum ɓii Yusiya mo laami haa pellel baaba muuɗum Yusiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda mo wurti nokkuure nde'e: “O dilli, o wartataa
O maayan haa lesdi ndi ɓe ndahi mo, o meetataa yi'ugo lesdi ndi'i
“Bone laatanto nyiɓanɗo saare mum bee sooynde adilaaku e cuuɗi mum dowji bee aybe, kuuwnanɗo heeddiɗɗiraaɓe mum, bilaa hokkugo ɓe ngeenaari.
Bone laatanto bi'ɗo: Mi nyiɓan saare mawnde, cuuɗi dow cuuɗi, mi yaajina cuuɗi am.” O ɗon waɗa burɗe haa cuuɗi maako, o ɗon sudda mahi maaji bee leɗɗe booɗɗe, o ɗon woojina ɗi.
Kadi a laamiiɗo ngam a ɗuɗɗina cuuɗi bee leɗɗe booɗɗe na? Baaba ma nyaami, yari. Ammaa o waɗi kiita ngooŋɗuka e adilaaku, ngam maajum o heɓi hayru.
O jiŋngi laafuɗo e talakaajo, koo ɗume fuu yehi booɗɗum. Kanjum woni anndugo yam, non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Ammaa sey riba maaɗa kalluka tan a suklanto. A ɗon mbara yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe, a ɗon ɓilla yimɓe, a ɗon toonyo ɓe.

Ngam maajum, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i dow Yooyakim ɓii Yusiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda: “Walaa mo woyata maayde maako, wi'a: Kayto, deerɗam gorko! Kayto, deerɗam debbo! Walaa mo woyata mo: Kayto, jawmam! Kayto, barkaama
O heɓan uwol bana ngol wamnde. Ɓe ndasan ɓanndu maako yaasi dammuɗe Urusaliima, ɓe ngudina mo ton
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “An Urusaliima, wa'a dow hooseere Libanon, wooku. Ummin gookaali haa lesdi Baasan. Waɗ hoolo dow hooseere Abariima, ngam waaye'en ma fuu kalki.
Mi wolwani ma saa'i a jooɗi jam, ammaa a sali nanugo. Bana non kuuwruɗa diga a derkeejo tawon, a yiɗaa ɗowtanaago yam.
Henndu ruuynan ardiiɓe ma, ɓe ndahan boo waaye'en ma. Nden a heewan semteende e toskaare ngam daliila halleende ma fuu.
A ɗon hoolɗina caka leɗɗe booɗɗe iwɗe Libanon. Ammaa a uuman, saa'i luuwe naŋngete bana ɗe ɓesnanɗo.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i dow Koniya
mi hokkete haa juuɗe yiɗɓe mbarugo ma, haa yimɓe hulnanɓe ma. Mi hokkete haa juuɗe Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila e haa Kaldiya'en.
Mi sakkinte bee daada ma haa lesdi ndi on ndanyaaka nder muuɗum, ton maayoton.
On meetataa wartugo lesdi ndi ngenwoton wartugo nder muuɗum.”
Yeremiya wi'i: “Kadi Koniya laati bana mbulku pusŋgu ngu goɗɗo yiɗaa, ngu nafataa na? Ngam ɗume kaŋko e danygol maako hoocete, wudinte haa lesdi ndi ɓe anndaa?
Lesdi! Lesdi! Lesdi! Nan wolde Jawmiraawo!

Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mbinnde innde gorko oo bana mo walaa ɓikkoy, mo walaa hayru balɗe mum fuu. Walaa koo gooto mo danygol maako heɓata jooɗaago dow leeso laamu Daawuda ngam laamanaago lesdi Yahuuda.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Kayto! Ardiiɓe yimɓe am ɓe halluɓe! Ɓe acci yimɓe am majja, caŋkito.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i dow ardiiɓe ɗowanɓe ummaatoore muuɗum: “On caŋkiti yimɓe am, on ndiiwi ɓe, on kakkilanaay ɓe sam. Ngam maajum kiitotoomi on ngam kuuɗe mon kalluɗe.
Mi mooɓtan yimɓe am luttuɓe diga lesɗe haa ndiiwmi ɓe fuu, mi hooran ɓe haa lesdi maɓɓe, ɓe ndanyndanytiran, ɓe ɗuuɗan.
Mi darnan ardiiɓe dow maɓɓe ngam hakkilango ɓe, ngam taa ɓe meeta hulugo koo hultorgo koo majjugo.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Saa'i ɗon wara haa mi suɓa goɗɗo mo danygol Daawuda bi'eteeɗo Fuɗŋgo, o adiliijo. O laatoto laamiiɗo, o laamoto bee faamu, o tabitinan kiita ngooŋɗuka e adilaaku nder lesdi.
Nder balɗe maako Yahuuda rimɗinte, Isra'iila boo jooɗoto jam. Yimɓe ewnoto laamiiɗo oo: Jawmiraawo-woni-adilaaku-meeɗen
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Saa'i ɗon wara nde kunotooɗo meetataa wi'ugo: Fakat bana Jawmiraawo mo wurtini yimɓe Isra'iila e Misra o geeto.
Ammaa o wi'an: Fakat Jawmiraawo o geeto. Kaŋko wartiri yimɓe Isra'iila diga lesdi woyla e lesɗe ɗe o saŋkitino ɓe fuu haa ɓe njooɗo nder lesdi maɓɓe.”
Ndaa ko Yeremiya wi'i dow annabi'en: “Ɓernde am ta'i, ɓanndu am fuu ɗon diwna ngam daliila Jawmiraawo, ngam bolle maako ceniiɗe. Mi laati bana guykuɗo mo nguykinoojam naŋngi ɗum.
Lesdi heewi jeenooɓe, yimɓe ɗon njaawɗa waɗugo ko halli, ɓe semmbiɗɓe waɗugo ko haanaay. Naaloore Jawmiraawo ɗon dow lesdi. Ngam maajum ndi ɗon nder suno, durduɗe fuu ɗayli.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Annabi'en e liman'en mbonnake, mi tawi halleende maɓɓe koo nder suudu am boo.
Ngam maajum laawol maɓɓe laatoto laawol moostanŋgol e nyiɓɓuŋgol. Mi waɗan ɓe pergo, ɓe ndo'o. Mi ukkan ɓe sarru, ngam saa'i kiita maɓɓe ɓadake, non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Mi yi'i faataare annabi'en haa Samariya. Ɓe mbaɗi annabaaku bee innde Ba'al, ɓe majjini ummaatoore am Isra'iila.

Ammaa mi yi'i annabi'en haa Urusaliima ɗon mbaɗa ko ɓuri nyiddugo. Ɓe ɗon mbaɗa njeenu, ɓe ɗon mbolwa pewe, ɓe ɗon mballa waɗooɓe zunuuba, ngam taa goɗɗo acca waɗugo ko halli. Haa gite am, ɓe fuu ɓe laati bana Sodoma, ɓe halluɓe bana yimɓe Gomorra

Ngam maajum, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i dow annabi'en ɓe'e: Mi nyaamnan ɓe kaaɗɗum, mi yarnan ɓe ndiyam mbaroojam. Ngam faasikaare fuu iwi haa annabi'en Urusaliima, nde saŋkiti haa lesdi fuu.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Taa nane bolle annabi'en. Ɓe ɗon kebbina ɓerɗe mooɗon bee tammunde meere. Ɓe ɗon anndina on ko ɓe ngi'i, ammaa ɗum iwaay haa am, ɗum iwi haa numooji maɓɓe.
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a yawotooɓe yam: Jawmiraawo wi'i jam wondan bee mooɗon. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a saata-ko'e'en boo: Sarru ukkantaako on.”
Moy caka annabi'en ɓe'e meeɗi jooɗaago nder dawriinde Jawmiraawo? Moy laari mo, nani habaru maako? Moy heɗiti wolde maako, hakkilani nde?
Tikkere Jawmiraawo waran bana henndu saatundu, bana duluuru ukkantoondu ko'e halluɓe.
Nde naŋgtataako, sey to o hiɓɓini anniya maako fuu. Haa timmoode on paaman ɗum laaɓɗum.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Min mi nelaay annabi'en ɓe'e, ammaa ɓe ndilli. Mi wolwanaay ɓe, ammaa ɓe ɗon tokko waɗugo annabaaku.
To ɓe ndawridino bee am, nden kam ɓe ngeccanno yimɓe am ko mbi'mi, ɓe lornanno ɓe diga laabi maɓɓe kalluɗi e kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
Kadi mi Allah gi'anɗo ko ɓadi tan na? Naa non! Mi Allah gi'anɗo ko daayi boo.
Woodi nyukkotooɗo haa pellel ngel mi yi'ataa mo na? Non Jawmiraawo wi'i. Naa min woni gonɗo koo toy haa asama e dow lesdi na?
Annabi'en waɗɓe annabaaku fewre bee innde am, mi nani ko ɓe mbi'i: Mi yi'i koyɗol, mi yi'i koyɗol!
Haa ndey annabi'en ɓe'e accata estugo yimɓe am bee hasugo pewe maɓɓe malla anndingo ɓe ko numooji maɓɓe nufi?
Ɓe tammi bee yeccirgo koyɗi maɓɓe ɓe mbaɗan yimɓe am ngejjita innde am, bana kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe ngejjitirno innde am, tokki Ba'al.
Annabiijo mo yi'i koyɗol, yecca ɗum bana koyɗol. Ammaa annabiijo mo nani wolde am, sey o wolwa wolde am bee gooŋga. Kadi ƴommbal nanndi bee sammeere na?” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Wolde am nanndi bee yiite malla bee tappirɗum ko fusata tapaare.” – Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Ngam maajum mi ɗon hona annabi'en ɓe'e. Ɓe ɗon koocindira bolle am, nden ɓe ngaaza ɗe bana bolle maɓɓe.
Mi ɗon hona annabi'en wolwanɓe bolle muuɗum'en, nden ɓe pewa: Kaŋko wi'i ɗum.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.

“Mi ɗon hona annabi'en waazanɓe koyɗi pewooji. Ɓe ɗon majjina ummaatoore am bee pewe maɓɓe e manooje maɓɓe. Min mi nelaay ɓe, mi umraay ɓe waɗugo annabaaku, ɓe mbaawataa wallugo ummaatoore sam.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“An Yeremiya, to gooto nder ummaatoore am koo annabiijo koo limanjo ƴami ma: Ɗume woni koŋngol Jawmiraawo? Doŋngal
To limanjo malla annabiijo malla gooto nder ummaatoore am wi'i: Ɗo woni koŋngol Jawmiraawo, nden kam mi hiitoto mo, kaŋko e saare maako fuu.
Ndikka koo moy ƴama keeddiɗɗum malla banndum: Ɗume Jawmiraawo jaabi, ɗume o wi'i?
Taa goɗɗo meeta wi'ugo: Ɗo woni koŋngol Jawmiraawo. Bolle ɗe goɗɗo man wolwata laataaki koŋngol Jawmiraawo, ammaa ɗum iwi haa maako. Yimɓe ngayli bolle Allah geeto mo Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama.
Sey a ƴama annabi'en: Ɗume Jawmiraawo jaabi, ɗume o wi'i?
To ɓe mbi'i ma: Ɗo woni koŋngol Jawmiraawo, – nden yeccu ɓe: Jawmiraawo haɗi on wolwugo bana nii, ammaa on mbolwi ɗum.
Ngam maajum, ndaa nii o wi'i: Fakat mi roondoto on dow balbe am bana goɗɗo roondorta doŋngal mum, nden mi wudinan on, onon e berniwol ngol ndokkumi on, onon e kaakiraaɓe mooɗon.
Mi suddan on bee jancoore duumiinde e toskaare duumiinde nde yejjitittaake.”
Jawmiraawo yi'ni yam cilaaje ɗiɗi keewɗe ibbe jo'inaaɗe yeeso haykaliiru Jawmiraawo. Ɗum waɗi ɓaawo nde Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila haɓɓi Yekoniya
Silaawo wooto heewi ibbe booɗɗe masin, bana ibbe aartuɗe ɓenndugo. Silaawo woɗŋgo heewi ibbe ɗe mbooɗaay sam, goɗɗo waawataa nyaamugo ɗe.
Jawmiraawo ƴami: “Yeremiya, ko ngi'ata?” Mi jaabi: “Ibbe. Booɗɗe maaje mbooɗi masin. Luttuɗe boo mbooɗaay sam, goɗɗo waawataa nyaamugo ɗe.”
Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i yam.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo Allah Isra'iila wi'i: “Mi ɗon laara dahaaɓe diga Yahuuda haa lesdi Kaldiya'en bana ibbe booɗɗe ɗe'e.
Mi woonanan ɓe, mi enɗan ɓe haa mi hoora ɓe haa lesdi ndi'i. Mi tammi tabitingo ɓe, mi nattintaa ɓe. Mi tammi ɗisugo ɓe, naa ittugo ɓe.
Mi hokkan ɓe faamu ngam anndugo min woni Jawmiraawo. Nden ɓe laatoto ummaatoore am, min boo mi laatoto Allah maɓɓe, ngam ɓe lortoto haa am bee ɓernde woore.
Ammaa Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e saraaki'en muuɗum e luttuɓe Urusaliima, jooɗiiɓe haa lesdi ndi'i malla haa Misra, min Jawmiraawo mi nanndinan ɓe bana ibbe ɗe nyaamataake ngam ɗe mbooɗaay.
Mi ukkanan ɓe sarru naawŋgu, haa laamuuji duniyaaru fuu kultora daliila maɓɓe. Yimɓe kuɗan ɓe, njancan ɓe, njalan ɓe, naalan bee innde maɓɓe haa nokkuuje ɗe ndiiwanmi ɓe fuu.
Mi ukkanan ɓe konu e weelo e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu, haa ɓe natta nder lesdi ndi ndokkumi ɓe e kaakiraaɓe maɓɓe.”
Nder nduuɓu Yooyakim ɓii Yusiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nayaɓu, waato nduuɓu Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, ngo'oowu, Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya dow ummaatoore Yahuuda fuu
Annabi Yeremiya wi'i ummaatoore Yahuuda e jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima fuu:
“Diga nduuɓu Yusiya ɓii Amon, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, sappo e tataɓu, haa wargo hannde, waato duuɓi noogas e tati, mi tokki yeccugo on ko Jawmiraawo anndini yam, ammaa on nanaay.
Jawmiraawo tokki nelango on jaggiiɓe mum annabi'en fuu, ammaa on nanaay, on kakkilaay sam.
Ɓe mbi'i koo moy mooɗon acca laabi mum kalluɗi e kuuɗe mum kalluɗe, nden on njooɗoto haa foroy nder lesdi ndi Jawmiraawo hokki on, onon e kaakiraaɓe mon.
Ɓe mbi'i on, taa on tokko ɗowanteeɓe woɗɓe, taa on ndewa ɓe, taa on cujidana ɓe, ngam taa on tikkina Jawmiraawo bee labbi ɗi mbaɗɗon bee juuɗe mon, kaŋko boo o hiito on. Nden kam o ukkantaa on sarru.
Jawmiraawo bee hoore mum wi'i: On cali nanango yam. Ammaa on tikkini yam bee labbi ɗi mbaɗɗon. Bana nii on njaanyani ko'e mooɗon sarru.”
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “On cali nanugo bolle am.

Ngam maajum ewnotoomi ummaatooje woyla fuu e suka am Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila. Mi waddan ɓe ngam haɓugo bee lesdi ndi'i e jooɗiiɓe ton e bee ummaatooje taariiɗe fuu. Mi nattinan yimɓe fuu, mi laatinan ɓe hulniiɓe yawniiɓe, lesdi maɓɓe boo ladde ferewnde haa foroy.
Mi je'inan hoolo seyo e welwelo caka maɓɓe, non boo daande ɓaŋɗo e daande ɓaŋgeteeɗo e sonyo namarde. Mi nyifan pittirla maɓɓe boo
Lesdi ndi'i fuu laatoto bille e ladde meere. Yimɓe ummaatooje ɗe'e fuu laatoto huuwanooɓe laamiiɗo Baabila duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi
Ammaa to duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi caalake, mi hiitoto laamiiɗo Baabila e ummaatoore maako ngam hakke maɓɓe. Mi laatinan lesdi Kaldiya'en bille haa foroy.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
“Mi hiitoto lesdi man fodde ko mbi'mi dow maari fuu, fodde ko winnda nder deftere nde'e fuu, ko Yeremiya wi'i dow ummaatooje ɗe'e fuu.
Ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe e laamiiɓe mawɓe macciɗinan Kaldiya'en, bana non mi warjorto ɓe halleende maɓɓe.”
Jawmiraawo, Allah Isra'iila wi'i yam: “Ndaa jardugel keewŋgel tikkere am. Hoo'u ngel nder juŋngo am, yarnu ngel ummaatooje haa nelanmaami fuu.
Ɓaawo ɗe njari ngel, ɗe ndimmboto, hakkiilo maaje majjan ngam daliila kaafahi ki neldanmi caka maaje.”
Nden mi hoo'i jardugel man nder juŋngo Jawmiraawo, mi yarni ngel ummaatooje fuu haa Jawmiraawo neli yam.
Mi yarni ngel Urusaliima e gure lesdi Yahuuda fuu, laamiiɓe e mawɓe maari, haa konne'en mbila lesdi, haa ndi laato kulniindi e njawniindi, yimɓe naaliran bee innde maari – bana ko laati hannde.
Nden mi yarni ngel Firawna, laamiiɗo Misra e suka'en muuɗum e saraaki'en muuɗum e ummaatoore muuɗum fuu
e jananɓe wonɓe haa Misra e laamiiɓe lesdi Uus e laamiiɓe berniiji Filisti'en fuu: Askalon e Gaaza e Ekuruun e luttuɗum Asdod.
Non boo yimɓe Edoom e Mo'ab e Ammoon,
laamiiɓe Tirus e Sidon fuu, laamiiɓe lesɗe gaɗa Mbeela
e berniiji Dedan e Tema e Bus e yimɓe laɓa-taarna'en fuu.
Non boo laamiiɓe Arabiya e laamiiɓe jananɓe jooɗiiɓe nder ladde
e laamiiɓe Zimiri e laamiiɓe Elam e laamiiɓe Mediya fuu
e laamiiɓe woyla ɓadiiɓe e daayiiɓe fuu. Laamuuji duniyaaru fuu njari ngel bee tokkindirko, haa ragare boo laamiiɗo Sesak

Nden Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: “Yeccu yimɓe, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Njare haa on nguyka, on tuuta, haa on ndo'o, on ummitittaako ngam daliila kaafahi ki neldanmi caka mooɗon.
To ɓe calake hoo'ugo jardugel nder juŋngo maaɗa e yarugo ngel, nden kam yeccu ɓe Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Doole on njara!

Mi fuɗɗiran ukkugo sarru dow berniwol haa innde am woni. Onon kam on tammi on ndaɗan kiita na? Woodaa! On keɓan kiita, ngam mi neldan kaafahi dow yimɓe duniyaaru fuu”, non Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i.

“An Yeremiya, anndin ɓe ko mi wi'ete fuu. Yeccu ɓe: Jawmiraawo ubban haa ɓaŋgiiɗum, riggoto diga jooɗorde mum seniinde haa asama. O ubboto dow yimɓe maako, o wookan bana ɓiɗɗooɓe inabooje. Koo moy haa duniyaaru nanan mo.
Hoolo man yottoto keeri duniyaaru, ngam Jawmiraawo hujjotiran bee ummaatooje, o waɗan kiita bee yimɓe fuu, o do'an halluɓe kiita maayde.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: “Sarru ɗon ukkano ummaatoore nde'e, nden ndeya, henndu saatundu ɗon ummo haa keeri duniyaaru ɓurɗi daayaago.
Nyalaade man mbaraaɓe Jawmiraawo mbaaloto dow lesdi, diga keerol duniyaaru ngo'ol haa ngola. Walaa mo woyata ɓe koo mooɓtata ɓe koo uwata ɓe. Ɓalli maɓɓe mbaaloto bana koonal haa lesdi.”
Mboye, onon ardiiɓe mbaɗe bojji. Talle nder mbulwuldi, onon jaagorɓe yimɓe mooɗon, saa'i hirsugo on waɗi, haa on ndo'o, on pusa bana fayannde marnde saman.
Laawol hisugo woodaa ngam ardiiɓe, jaagorɓe yimɓe ndaɗataa.
Ardiiɓe ɗon mboya, jaagorɓe yimɓe ɗon uuma, ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon wonna lesɗe maɓɓe.
Lesɗe maɓɓe de'itɗe kalki ngam tikkere Jawmiraawo saatunde.
O acci yimɓe maako bana mbarooga wurtorto lowol mum, ngam tikkere maako saatunde e kaafahi maako kulniiki ngartiri lesdi fuu ladde meere.
Saa'i Yooyakim ɓii Yusiya fuɗɗi laamaago nder lesdi Yahuuda, Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya
Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Dara haa daldal haykaliiru, yeccu yimɓe warɓe diga gure Yahuuda ngam sujidango yam fuu ko mi umri ma fuu, taa ittu koo wolde woore.
Teema ɓe nanan, ɓe fuu ɓe lorto diga laabi maɓɓe kalluɗi. Nden kam mi faasitan waɗugo ɓe sarru ngu anninmi ukkango ɓe daliila kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe.
Yeccu ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Naneeɗam, ɗowtane tawreeta ka ndokkumi on,
kakkilane bolle sukaaɓe am annabi'en ɓe tokkiimi nelugo haa mooɗon. Ammaa on nanaay.
To on ɗowtanaaki yam, nden kam mi waɗan nokkuure nde'e bana mbaarumi Silo. Ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu naaliran bee innde berniwol ngo'ol
Liman'en e annabi'en e ummaatoore fuu keɗiti yaake Yeremiya wolwi bolle ɗe'e haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Nde Yeremiya timmini wolwugo ko Jawmiraawo umruno mo o wolwana ummaatoore fuu, liman'en e annabi'en e ummaatoore fuu naŋngi mo, kooli: “A he'i mbareego!

Koni mbaɗɗa annabaaku bee innde Jawmiraawo, mbi'ɗa: Suudu ndu'u laatoto bana Silo, berniwol ngo'ol boo laatoto winnde, walaa goɗɗo jooɗoto ton.” Nden ummaatoore fuu mooɓotiri dow Yeremiya haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo.
Nde ardiiɓe Yahuuda nani haala man, ɓe ummi diga laamiiɗo ɓe ngari haa haykaliiru Jawmiraawo, ɓe njooɗi baŋnge Dammugal Kesal ngal haykaliiru haa ɓe mbaɗa kiita.
Nden liman'en e annabi'en mbi'i ardiiɓe e ummaatoore fuu: “Gorko oo he'i kiita mbareego, ngam o waɗi annabaaku dow berniwol ngo'ol, onon fuu on nani bee noppi mooɗon!”
Ammaa Yeremiya wi'i ardiiɓe e ummaatoore fuu: “Jawmiraawo neli yam waɗugo annabaaku dow suudu ndu'u e berniwol ngo'ol, bana ko nanɗon.
Ammaa jonta mbo'ine laabi mon e kuuɗe mon kadi. Nane bolle Jawmiraawo Allah mon. Nden kam Jawmiraawo faasitan ukkango on sarru ngu o wi'no.
Min kam, ndaa yam haa juuɗe mon. Mbaɗeeɗam ko fottani on.

Ammaa annde fakat: To on mbari yam, nden kam on mbari goɗɗo mo walaa aybe, on ndoondoto aybe ƴiiƴam dow ko'e mon e dow berniwol ngo'ol e dow yimɓe maagol. Ngam gooŋga, Jawmiraawo neli yam haa mooɗon, mi yecca on kuuje ɗe'e fuu.”
Nden ardiiɓe e ummaatoore fuu mbi'i liman'en e annabi'en: “Gorko oo he'aay kiita mbareego, ngam o wolwani en bee innde Jawmiraawo Allah meeɗen.”
Ɓaawo man woɗɓe caka ndotti'en ummi, mbi'i ummaatoore mooɓtiinde:

“Nder zamanu laamiiɗo Hezekiya, Mika mo Moraset waɗani yimɓe Yahuuda fuu annabaaku, yecci ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Konne'en ndeman Siyona bana ngesa, Urusaliima laatoto bille, hooseere haa haykaliiru woni laatoto towndiire guuɓe

Laamiiɗo Hezekiya e yimɓe Yahuuda fuu mbaraay Mika. Ammaa Hezekiya huli Jawmiraawo, tori mo ɗuuɗɗum. Jawmiraawo boo faasiti ukkango ɓe sarru ngu o wi'no. Enen jonta en ɗon nastina ko'e meeɗen nder sarru naawŋgu.”
Woodi boo goɗɗo feere mo waɗi annabaaku bee innde Jawmiraawo, innde maako Uriya ɓii Semaya mo Kiriyat-Ye'arim. Kaŋko o wolwi dow berniwol ngo'ol e lesdi ndi'i bana Yeremiya wolwiri.
Nde laamiiɗo Yooyakim e honooɓe muuɗum e ardiiɓe muuɗum fuu nani bolle Uriya, laamiiɗo tefi mbarugo mo. Ammaa Uriya faami ɗum, o hultori, o doggi haa Misra.
Nden laamiiɗo Yooyakim neli Elnatan ɓii Akbor bee worɓe woɗɓe haa Misra.
Ɓe ngaddi Uriya diga ton, ɓe njahri mo yeeso laamiiɗo Yooyakim. O mbari mo, o wudini mo nder ngaska ngoota bee mbaraaɓe woɗɓe.
Ahikam ɓii Safan faddi Yeremiya, ngam taa o hokke haa juuɗe ummaatoore yiɗnde mbargo mo.
Nde Sedekiya ɓii Yusiya fuɗɗi laamaago nder lesdi Yahuuda, Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya
Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Waɗan hoore ma kaɓɓirgal e ɓoggi, yow ngal dow daande ma.
Nden neldu ɗum laamiiɓe Edoom e Mo'ab e Ammoon e Tirus e Sidon, bee nelaaɓe maɓɓe warɓe haa Urusaliima ngam laarugo laamiiɗo Sedekiya.
Yeccu ɓe: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila umri on wi'ugo jaagorɓe mon:
Min bee baawɗe am mawɗe e juŋngo am fortaaŋgo tagrumi lesdi e yimɓe e dabbaaji gonɗi dow maari. Mi hokkan ɗum haa juŋngo mo ngiɗmi.
Min hokki ummaatooje ɗe'e fuu haa juŋngo suka am Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila. Mi hokki mo koo kuuje ladde boo haa ɗe kuuwana mo.
Ummaatooje fuu njagganto mo. Ɗe njagganto ɓiɗɗo maako e taaniraawo maako boo, sey to saa'i wari haa ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe e laamiiɓe marɓe baawɗe ɗowtina ummaatoore maako, kayre boo.

To ummaatoore wonnde malla laamu salake jagganaago Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila, jaɓaay kaɓɓirgal laamu maako, nden kam mi hiitoto ummaatoore man bee konu e weelo e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu, haa to mi nattini ummaatoore nde'e bee juŋngo maako.
Taa nanane annabi'en mon, koo laarooɓe mon, koo hoyɗooɓe mon, koo waɗooɓe hatti, koo hiila'en wi'anɓe on: On njaggantaako laamiiɗo Baabila.
Ɓe ɗon mbaɗa on annabaaku fewre haa ɓe ndaayna on e lesdi mon, haa mi riiwa on, on kalka.
Ammaa to ummaatoore jaɓi kaɓɓirgal laamiiɗo Baabila, huuwani mo, nden kam mi accan nde nde tokko remugo lesdi maare, nde jooɗo ton.” Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Yeremiya yecci Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, habaru man. O wi'i: “Njaɓe kaɓɓirgal laamiiɗo Baabila dow daaɗe mon, kuuwane ummaatoore maako, nden on ngeeɗan.
Walaa haaje on maayra bee konu e weelo e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu, an e ummaatoore ma! Ngam Jawmiraawo wi'i kanjum laatanto ummaatoore koo ndeyeere nde sali jagganaago laamiiɗo Baabila.
Taa nane bolle annabi'en wi'anɓe on: On njaggantaako laamiiɗo Baabila. Ngam ɓe ɗon mbaɗa on annabaaku fewre.
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Min kam, mi nelaay ɓe, ɓe ɗon pewa bee innde am, haa mi riiwa on, on kalka, onon e fewanɓe on wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en.”

Nden Yeremiya wolwani liman'en e ummaatoore fuu: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Taa nane bolle annabi'en mon waɗananɓe on annabaaku ni'i: Yeeso seɗɗa ɓe ngartiran kuuwruɗe haykaliiru Jawmiraawo diga Baabila. Ɓe ɗon pewana on.
Taa nanane ɓe. Njaggane laamiiɗo Baabila, nden on ngeeɗan. Walaa haaje berniwol ngo'ol laato bille!

To kamɓe ɓe laati annabi'en fakat, to wolde am ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe, sey ɓe toro yam min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, ngam taa kuuwruɗe luttuɗe nder haykaliiru am e nder saare laamiiɗo Yahuuda e nder Urusaliima njahre haa Baabila.
Saa'i Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila dahi Yekoniya ɓii Yooyakim, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e tedduɓe Yahuuda e Urusaliima fuu haa Baabila, o acci daŋraŋge e ko wi'ete loonde mawnde
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i dow kuuwruɗe luttuɗe nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo e nder saare laamiiɗo Yahuuda e nder Urusaliima fuu:
Ɓe ndahan ɗe haa Baabila. Ton ɗe ngonata, sey to mi yaali ɗe fahin. Nden mi hooran ɗe haa nokkuure nde'e.” Nii Jawmiraawo wi'i.

Hitaande man, waato nder nduuɓu Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda, nayaɓu, nder lewru jowaɓru, annabi Hananiya ɓii Azzuru mo wuro Gibiyon wolwani Yeremiya nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo yeeso liman'en e ummaatoore fuu, o wi'i
“Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi yewan kaɓɓirgal laamiiɗo Baabila.
Hiddeko duuɓi ɗiɗi timma, ngartiranmi kuuwruɗe haykaliiru am fuu haa nokkuure nde'e. Kuuwruɗe ɗe'e, Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila hoocuno ɗe haa ɗo, yahri ɗe haa Baabila.
Mi wartiran boo Yekoniya ɓii Yooyakim, laamiiɗo Yahuuda e dahaaɓe diga Yahuuda haa Baabila fuu. Ngam mi yewan kaɓɓirgal laamiiɗo Baabila. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.”
Annabi Yeremiya jaabi annabi Hananiya yeeso liman'en e ummaatoore dariinde nder haykaliiru Jawmiraawo fuu.
O wi'i: “Aamiina, Jawmiraawo waɗ ɗum! Jawmiraawo hebbitina ko mbi'ɗa, o wartira kuuwruɗe haykaliiru maako e dahaaɓe fuu diga Baabila!
Tan nii nan wolde nde mbi'anmaami, an e ummaatoore fuu:
Annabi'en aartuɓe en, kamɓe boo ɓe mbaɗi annabaaku dow lesɗe ɗuuɗɗe e laamuuji mawɗi. Ɓe mbolwi haala konu e sarru e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu.
Ammaa mo waɗi annabaaku jam – to jam man laatake, nden kam koo moy anndan o annabiijo mo Jawmiraawo neli ɗum fakat.”
Annabi Hananiya hooci kaɓɓirgal dow daande annabi Yeremiya go, yewi ngal.

Nden o wolwi yeeso ummaatoore fuu: “Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Bana nii ngewranmi kaɓɓirgal ngal Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila wallini dow ummaatooje fuu, hiddeko duuɓi ɗiɗi timma.” Nden Yeremiya dilli.
Ɓaawo nde annabi Hananiya yewi kaɓɓirgal dow daande annabi Yeremiya, Jawmiraawo wolwani Yeremiya, wi'i mo:
“Yah yeccu Hananiya: Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: A yewi kaɓɓirgal ngal leggal, ammaa a jo'ina ngal njamndi haa pellel maagal.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i: Mi wallini kaɓɓirgal ngal njamndi dow ummaatooje fuu ngam ɗe njaggano Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila. Koo kuuje ladde boo njagganto mo.”
Nden annabi Yeremiya wi'i annabi Hananiya: “Nan, Hananiya! Jawmiraawo nelaay ma. A ɗon esta yimɓe ɓe nuɗɗina fewre.
Ngam maajum, ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: Mi sottinte e lesdi ndi'i. A maayan hikka, ngam a esti ummaatoore haa nde tuurtana Jawmiraawo!”
Annabi Hananiya maayi hitaande man nden, nder lewru joweeɗiɗaɓru.
Diga Urusaliima, annabi Yeremiya winndi bataakewol haa luttuɓe ndotti'en e liman'en e annabi'en e ummaatoore fuu ɓe Nabukodonosor dahino diga Urusaliima haa Baabila.
O winndi ngol ɓaawo laamiiɗo Yekoniya e daada mum e saraaki'en mum e ardiiɓe Yahuuda e Urusaliima e kila'en e worɓe waɗooɓe sanaa'a fuu ndilli diga Urusaliima
Sedekiya, laamiiɗo Yahuuda neli El'aasa ɓii Safan e Gemariya ɓii Hilkiyya haa Nabukodonosor, laamiiɗo Baabila. Ɓe njahri bataakewol go. Ndaa ko winnda nder maagol:
“Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila wi'i dahaaɓe ɓe o dahi diga Urusaliima haa Baabila fuu:
Mahe cuuɗi, njooɗe nder maaji. Mbaɗe jarne, nyaame ko rimata nder maaje.
Te'e rewɓe, ndanyde ɓiɓɓe worɓe e rewɓe. Te'ane ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe, te'ne ɓiɓɓe mon rewɓe, ngam haa kamɓe boo ɓe keɓa ɓikkoy. Ɗuuɗe haa Baabila, taa uste!
Kakkilane salaaman berniwol ngol ndahmi on, toreeɗam ngam maagol. Ngam to ngol heɓi salaaman, onon boo on keɓan salaaman.
Min Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama, Allah Isra'iila, mi wi'i on: Taa acce annabi'en wonɓe caka mooɗon malla waɗooɓe hatti esta on, taa kakkilane koyɗi ɗi ɓe koyɗata.
Ɓe ɗon mbaɗa on annabaaku fewre bee innde am, min mi nelaay ɓe” – non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo wi'i: “To Baabila waɗi duuɓi cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi, mi yaalan on fahin. Nden mi hebbitinan wolde am woonde haa mi hoora on haa lesdi mon
Mi anndi nufayeeje am dow mooɗon. Mi ɗon nufano on hayru, naa sarru, haa nyalɗe mon garanɗe keewa tammunde – non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
On ewnoto yam, on ngaran ngam on toro yam, min boo mi jaɓan tornde mooɗon.
On ɗaɓɓitittam, on tawatam boo, ngam on ɗaɓɓitittam bee ɓernde woore

Fakat on tawatam. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i. Mi wartiran joonde mon bana naane, mi wurtinan on diga ummaatooje e nokkuuje haa ndiiwmi on fuu, mi hoora on haa lesdi ndi njooɗinooɗon hiddeko mi daha on. Non Jawmiraawo wi'i.
On ɗon mbi'a Jawmiraawo hokki on annabi'en haa Baabila.
Nane ko Jawmiraawo wi'i dow laamiiɗo jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu Daawuda e banndiraaɓe mon luttuɓe haa Urusaliima fuu, ɓe ndahaaka bee mooɗon.
Ndaa nii Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama wi'i: Mi nelan konu e weelo e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu caka maɓɓe. Mi laatinan ɓe bana ibbe nyolɗe ɗe yimɓe ngiɗaa nyaamugo ngam ɗe mbonnake masin.
Mi taasnan ɓe bee konu e weelo e nyawu kalluŋgu ndaaɓoowu, mi laatinan ɓe nyidduɓe haa laamuuji duniyaaru fuu. Koo toy haa caŋkitanmi ɓe, yimɓe kultoran, kuɗan, njancan ɓe, naaliran bee innde maɓɓe.
