Nde ɓe ngurtini mooɓre nde'e fuu yaasi, Yeesu nasti suudu, naŋngi juŋngo ɓiŋngel, nden ngel ummi.
Habaru man saŋkiti nder lesdi man fuu.
Nde Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, ɗonno dilla, wumɓe ɗiɗo tokki mo, ɓe ɗon mbi'a bee sawtu: “An Ɓii Daawuda, enɗu min!”
Nde Yeesu nasti saare, wumɓe go ɓaditi mo. O ƴami ɓe: “On nuɗɗini mi woodi baawɗe waɗugo ɗum na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Ooho, Jawmiraawo, a woodi baawɗe man.”
Nden Yeesu meemi gite maɓɓe, wi'i: “Ɗum laatano on bana on nuɗɗini.”
Law gite maɓɓe mbumti. Nden Yeesu barri
Ammaa kamɓe ɓe njehi, ɓe caŋkiti habaru Yeesu nder lesdi man fuu.
Saa'i ɓe ɗon ndilla, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu goɗɗo mo waawataa wolwugo sam, ngam o marɗo ginnawol.
Yeesu riiwi ginnawol man, muukaajo fuɗɗi wolwugo. Mooɓre hayɗini, wi'i: “Huunde bana nii meeɗaay yi'eego nder Isra'iila sam.”
Ammaa Farisa'en mbi'i: “Bee baawɗe laamiiɗo ginnaaji o riiwrata ginnaaji
Yeesu yiiloyi berniiji e gure fuu. O ekkitini yimɓe nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, o waazi ɓe kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu asamanji, o nyawndi yimɓe diga nyawuji feere feere fuu
Nde Yeesu yi'i mooɓe, o yurmini ɓe, ngam ɓe tampuɓe, ɓe sakliiɓe bana baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako
Nden o wi'i pukara'en maako: “Ƴaamle ɗuuɗi, ammaa sodooɓe ɗuuɗaay.
Tore Jawmu ƴaamnde o ɓesda nelugo sodooɓe haa ƴaamnde maako
Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo. O hokki ɓe baawɗe riiwugo ginnaaji e nyawndugo yimɓe diga nyawuji feere feere fuu.
Ndaa inɗe nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo man: Aran, Simon bi'eteeɗo Piyer e deerɗum Andire, Yaakuba e deerɗum Yuhanna, ɓiɓɓe Zebede,
Filip e Bartolome, Tomas e Matta jomnoowo, Yaakuba ɓii Alfa e Tadde,
Simon Kanaaniijo e Yahuuda Iskariyot zammbotooɗo Yeesu.
Yeesu neli pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo ɓe'e, o umri ɓe: “Taa njehe haa ummaatooje goɗɗe ngoni, taa naste gure Samariya'en boo.
Ammaa njehe haa Isra'iila'en laatiiɓe bana baali majjuɗi.
Njehe, ngaazine bee wi'ugo: Laamu asamanji ɓaditake.
Njamɗitine nyawɓe, ummitine maayɓe, laɓɓine kuturu'en, ndiiwe ginnaaji. On keɓi ɗum caahu, onon boo caahe ɗum.
Taa njoge kaŋŋeeri malla cardi malla ceede.
Taa njoge booro ngam jahaaŋgal malla limce ɗiɗi. Taa koo'e paɗe malla sawru boo, ngam kuuwoowo he'i heɓugo nguure muuɗum
To on nasti berniwol malla wuro fuu, ɗaɓɓite goɗɗo mo he'i jaɓɓaago on, njooɗe haa maako haa to on ndilli.
To on ɗon nasta saare goɗɗo, koofne wonɓe ton.
To yimɓe saare man njaɓɓake on, jam mooɗon laatanto ɓe. Ammaa to ɓe njaɓɓaaki on, jam mooɗon loroto haa mooɗon.
To on nasti saare malla wuro, ɓe cali jaɓɓaago on malla nanango on, ngurte saare man malla wuro man, piɗɗe collaaje kosɗe mooɗon
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Nyalaade darŋgal, kiita maɓɓe tullan dow kiita yimɓe Sodoma e Gomorra
“Ndaa, mi ɗon nela on bana baali caka caafaali. Ngam man laate on ƴoyɓe bana boɗɗe, laaɓɓe bana pooli
Ammaa ndeene ko'e mooɗon, ngam ɓe njahran on yeeso hiitooɓe, ɓe ɓoccan on nder cuuɗi dewal maɓɓe.
Ɓe njahran on yeeso ngomna'en e laamiiɓe ngam daliila am, ngam haa on ceedo seedamku mooɗon yeeso maɓɓe e yeeso yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe.
To ɓe njahri on yeeso hiitooɓe, taa cakle dow ko mbi'oton malla no mbolwirton, bolle ɗe on mbolwata ngaranan on saa'i man nden.
Ngam naa onon tammi wolwugo, ammaa Ruuhu Baabiraawo mooɗon wolwan nder mooɗon
Yimɓe ndokkan deerɗiraaɓe muuɗum'en ngam mbareego, baabiraaɓe boo ɓikkoy muuɗum'en, ɓikkoy ummanto saaro'en muuɗum'en, mbara ɓe
Yimɓe fuu nganyan on ngam daliila am. Ammaa mo munyi haa timmoode, hisan
To ɓe puɗɗi toonyaago on haa berniwol ngol, ndille haa berniwol ngola. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: On mbaawataa fiiltugo berniiji Isra'iila hiddeko
Jaŋngoowo ɓurataa jaŋnginoowo muuɗum maŋngu, maccuɗo boo ɓurataa jaagorɗo muuɗum maŋngu
To jaŋngoowo yottake darnde jaŋnginoowo muuɗum, maccuɗo boo yottake darnde jaagorɗo muuɗum, ɗum he'i. To ɓe ewnake jawmu saare Be'elzebul
“Kadi, taa kule ɓe. Cuuɗiiɗum fuu waŋgan, sirriijum fuu faamoto
Ko mi wi'ata on nder nyiɓre, mbaŋgine ɗum caka nyalawma. Ko on nanata nder sofndaago, ngooyne ɗum bee baŋguɗum.
Taa kule yimɓe ngam koo ɓe mbaawan mbarugo ɓalli mooɗon, ɓe mbaawataa mbarugo yoŋki. Ammaa kule Allah baawɗo halkugo ɓanndu e yoŋki fuu nder yiite jahannama.
Ɓe coorrataa colloy ɗiɗoy baakin suleyje ɗiɗi na? Ammaa walaa koo gootel maakoy do'oto haa lesdi sonaa to Baabiraawo mooɗon yerdake ɗum.
Onon boo, koo gaasaaji ko'e mooɗon ɗi limaaɗi gootol gootol fuu.
Ngam maajum taa kultore, on ɓuri colloy ɗuuɗkoy saman.”
“Koo moy seedi yeeso yimɓe o anndi yam, min boo mi seedoto yeeso Baabiraawo am mo asama mi anndi mo.
Ammaa mo yeddi yam yeeso yimɓe, min boo mi yeddan mo yeeso Baabiraawo am mo asama
“Taa nume mi waddi salaaman haa duniyaaru. Naa salaaman ngaddumi, ammaa kaafahi.
Mi wari ngam waadugo ɓiɗɗo gorko bee baaba mum, ɓiɗɗo debbo bee daada mum, debbo boo bee esum debbo.
Yimɓe saare goɗɗo laatoto wanywanyɓe mum
Koo moy ɓuri yiɗugo baaba muuɗum malla daada muuɗum dow am, he'aay laataago mo am. Koo moy ɓuri yiɗugo ɓiŋngel muuɗum gorgel malla deyel dow am he'aay laataago mo am.
Koo moy to hoo'aay gaafaaŋgal muuɗum, tokki yam, he'aay laataago mo am
Koo moy yiɗi aynugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki muuɗum ngam am, heɓtan ki
“Koo moy jaɓɓi on, jaɓɓi yam. Mo jaɓɓi yam, jaɓɓi nelɗo yam boo
Koo moy jaɓɓi annabiijo ngam o annabiijo, heɓan mbarjaari bana ndi annabiijo. Koo moy jaɓɓi adiliijo ngam o adiliijo, heɓan mbarjaari bana ndi adiliijo.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Koo moy hokki koo ndiyam peewɗam nder jardugel haa ɓurɗo leesugo caka pukara'en am ɓe'e ngam o pukaraajo am, heɓan mbarjaari muuɗum fakat.”
Nde Yeesu timmini umrugo pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, o ummi nokkuure man, o dilli ngam haa o ekkitina e o waazina nder berniiji fuu.
Saa'i man Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma ɗon nder fursina
ɓe ƴami mo: “An woni mo min nani waran na? Malla min ndeena goɗɗo feere?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Njehe, mbi'e Yuhanna ko on nani, ko on ngi'i boo:
Wumɓe ɗon ngi'a, woosɓe ɗon njaha, kuturu'en laaɓi, fahɓe boo ɗon nana, maayɓe ummitaama, talaka'en boo ngaazinaama kubaruwol ceynoowol
Barka laatanto koo moy mo accaay nuɗɗingo yam sam.”
Saa'i pukara'en Yuhanna ɗon ndilla, Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango mooɓre haala Yuhanna, o wi'i: “Ɗume on njehi laaroygo nder ladde hamaadaare? Ƴommbal ngal henndu dimmbinta na? Aa'a, naa non.
Ɗume on njehi laaroygo kadi? Goɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce booɗɗe na? Ammaa ɓorniiɓe limce booɗɗe, nder cuuɗi laamiiɓe ɓe ngoni.
Kadi ɗume on njehi laaroygo? Annabiijo na? Ooho! Mi ɗon wi'a on: Fakat, o ɓuri annabiijo.
Ngam Allah seedi dow Yuhanna nder Deftere, o wi'i: Ndaa, mi ɗon nela nelaaɗo am yeeso maaɗa, haa o mo'ina laawol ma yeeso maaɗa
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Caka ɓiɓɓe Aadama fuu walaa mo ɓuri Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma maŋngu, ammaa mo ɓuri leesugo haa laamu asamanji, ɓuran Yuhanna maŋngu.
Diga zamanu Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma haa wargo hannde, konne'en ɗon kippo laamu asamanji, ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓa jaɓtugo ngu.
Tawreeta Muusa e annabi'en fuu mbaɗi annabaaku dow laamu asamanji haa yotti saa'i Yuhanna
To on njaɓi ko mbi'anmi kam, Yuhanna woni Eliya mo tammi wargo
Mo woodi noppi fuu, nana!
Bee ɓeye nanndinanmi yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u? Ɓe nanndi bee ɓikkoy njooɗiikoy haa luuɓe. Koy ɗon ngookana ɓikkoy ngoɗkoy, koy ɗon mbi'a:
Min puufani on algaytaaru, on ngamaay, min ngimani on gimi bojji, on mboyaay.
Ngam Yuhanna wari, ɗon suumo, ɓe mbi'i: O woodi ginnawol.
wari, ɗon nyaama, ɗon yara, ɓe mbi'i: Ndaare goɗɗo oo, o ɗuuɗa-nyaamɗeejo e guykoowo, o soobaajo jomnooɓe e hakke'en. Ammaa hikma Allah gooŋɗinaama nder kuuɗe maako.”
Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi felugo berniiji ɗi o waɗi kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi ton, ammaa yimɓe maaji tuubaay. O wi'i:

“Bone laatano ma, an Korajin! Bone laatano ma, an Baytisayda! Ngam kaayeefiiji baɗaaɗi nder mooɗon, to ɗi mbaɗaano nder Tirus e Sidon kam, yimɓe maaji tuubanno law, ɓornotono buhuuje, ndufanno ndoondi dow ko'e muuɗum'en
Ngam maajum mi ɗon anndina on: Nyalaade darŋgal, kiita Tirus e Sidon hoyan dow kiita mooɗon.
An Kafarnahum, a ɗon tammo Allah ɓaŋgtete haa yotto asama na? Kayya! O sakkinte haa joonde maayɓe. Ngam kaayeefiiji baɗaaɗi nder maaɗa, to ɗi mbaɗano nder Sodoma, wuro ngo luttanno haa wargo hannde
Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Nyalaade darŋgal, kiita Sodoma ɓuran kiita ma hoyugo
Saa'i man Yeesu wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, Jawmu asama e lesdi, mi yetti ma ngam a waŋginani ɓikkoy pamaroy kuuje ɗe'e ammaa a suuɗi ɗe hikma'en e marɓe faamu.
Nonnon yaa Baabiraawo, bana nii ɗum fottani ma.”
Nden o wi'i: “Baabiraawo am halfini yam kuuje fuu. Walaa annduɗo
Onon somɓe e roondiiɓe doŋgle
Ndoonde kaɓɓirgal am, ekkite haa am, ngam mi ɗelma-gikkuujo, mi jaŋkiniiɗo. Fakat, yoŋkiiji mooɗon ciwtoto
Ngam ɗum koyɗum roondaago kaɓɓirgal am e ko mi roondata on boo, ɗum teddantaa on.”
Saa'i man, Yeesu saali nder ngesa alkamaari, ɗum
Nde Farisa'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe mbi'i Yeesu: “Pukara'en maaɗa ɗon kuuwa ko dagaaki huuweego nyannde siwtorde.”
O jaabi ɓe: “On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko Daawuda waɗino, kaŋko e yimɓe maako nde ɓe maati dolo na?
Ɓe nasti suudu Allah, ɓe nyaami tamseeje jo'inaaɗe yeeso Allah, koo nde ɓe ngalaa duŋayeere nyaamugo ɗe, sey liman'en tan
Malla on meeɗaay jaŋngugo nder tawreeta, liman'en ɗon kuuwa nder haykaliiru koo nyannde siwtorde boo na? Bee man ɓe ɗon luuta umroore, ammaa ɓe ngalaa aybe
Mi ɗon wi'a on: Ndaa, ko ɓuri
To on paamino ko saawi nder bolle ɗe'e: Enɗam ngiɗmi, naa dabbaaji kirsaaɗi, nden kam on aybintaano yimɓe ɓe ngalaa aybe
Ngam
Yeesu ummi ton, yehi, nasti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en.
Woodi goɗɗo waata-juŋngoojo ton. Farisa'en ngiɗi wullaago Yeesu, ngam man ɓe ƴami mo: “Tawreeta duŋani en yamɗitingo goɗɗo nyannde siwtorde na?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Goɗɗo caka mooɗon, to o woodi mbaalu ngootu tan, nden ngu yolli nder ngaska nyannde siwtorde, o wurtintaa ngu na
Fakat, neɗɗo ɓuri mbaalu saman, ngam maajum ɗum dagake huuwugo kuugal booɗŋgal nyannde siwtorde.”
Nden o wi'i gorko go: “Fortu juŋngo ma.” O forti ngo, ngo yamɗiti, warti bana ngoya.
Nden Farisa'en ngurti, carwootiri, kaɓɓi dabare ngam mbarugo Yeesu.
Ammaa Yeesu faami anniya maɓɓe, o ummi nokkuure man, o dilli, mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe tokki mo. O yamɗitini nyawɓe fuu.
Ammaa o barri
Ɗum hiɓɓini annabaaku Esaaya, bi'ɗo:
“Allah wi'i: Ndaa suka am mo mi suɓi,
giɗaaɗo am mo mi seyorto.
Mi neli Ruuhu am dow maako,
o anndinan ummaatooje kiita ndarnuka.
O jokkirtaa bee goɗɗo, o wookataa,
walaa mo nanata sawtu maako haa laabi.
O yewataa kewal nyobbaaŋgal.
O nyifataa pittirlayel, to ngel ɗon suura tawon,
haa to o heɓani kiita ngooŋɗuka jaalorgal.
Ummaatooje fuu tammorto innde maako
Nden ɓe ngaddani Yeesu goɗɗo mo ginnawol ɗon nder muuɗum, o bumɗo, muukaajo boo. Yeesu yamɗitini mo, o wolwi, o yi'i.
Ɗum hayɗini mooɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i: “Oo ɗo, naa o
Nde Farisa'en nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo ɗon riiwa ginnaaji bee baawɗe ɗe Be'elzebul, laamiiɗo ginnaaji hokki mo
Yeesu anndi numooji maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “To yimɓe laamu koo nguye narraay, laamu man do'oto. To yimɓe wuro koo ngoye malla yimɓe saare koo ndeye narraay, ɗum darataako.
To Sayɗaanu ɗon riiwa Sayɗaanu, nden kam o narraay bee hoore maako, noy laamu maako tabitirta?
To min mi ɗon riiwa ginnaaji bee baawɗe Be'elzebul, bee baawɗe ɗeye ɓikkoy mooɗon boo ndiiwrata ɗi? Ngam maajum ɓikkoy mooɗon kiitoto on.
Ammaa to bee baawɗe Ruuhu Allah ndiiwranmi ginnaaji boo, nden kam laamu Allah yottanake on.
Walaa mo waawataa nastugo saare cemmbiɗɗo, wujja kuuje maako, sonaa o aarta, o haɓɓa mo tawon, nden o ɓofta kuuje saare maako fuu.
Mo wondaay bee am, o konneejo am. Mo wallaay yam mooɓtugo, saŋkitan
Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Neɗɗo heɓan yaafuye hakkeeji mum e bolle mum kalluɗe dow Allah fuu. Ammaa mo wolwi kalluka dow Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, heɓataa yaafuye sam.
Koo bolwanɗo kalluka dow
“To lekki wooɗi, ɓiɓɓe maaki boo mbooɗan. To lekki wooɗaay, ɓiɓɓe maaki boo mbooɗataa. Ɓe annditan lekki haa ɓiɓɓe mum
Onon ɓiɓɓe poosokje, noy on mbaawrata wolwugo kuuje booɗɗe nde onon on halluɓe? Ko heewi ɓernde goɗɗo, kanjum hunnduko muuɗum wolwata
Neɗɗo booɗɗo ɗon wurtina kuuje booɗɗe nder siga mum mbooɗka, neɗɗo kalluɗo boo ɗon wurtina kuuje kalluɗe nder siga mum kalluka.
Mi ɗon wi'a on: Nyalaade darŋgal, yimɓe njaabanto ko'e muuɗum'en dow bolle meereeje ɗe ɓe mbolwi fuu.
Allah gooŋɗinte fodde bolle maaɗa malla boo o aybinte.”
Nden woɗɓe nder moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en mbi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, min ngiɗi a waɗa alaama haa min ndaara
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, ɓe halluɓe, zammbotooɓe Allah! Ɓe ngeli alaama, ammaa ɓe keɓataa, sonaa alaama annabi Yonas
Bana Yonas waɗi nyalawmaaje tati e jemmaaje tati nder reedu liiŋgu, bana non
Nyalaade darŋgal, yimɓe Niniwe ummanto yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, hiitoto ɓe, ngam yimɓe Niniwe tuubi nde ɓe nani waazu Yonas. Ndaa, ɓurɗum Yonas haa ɗo
Laamiiɗo debbo, mo Lesdi Fombina
“To ruuhuwol coɓŋgol wurtake goɗɗo, ngol yiiloyan haa karɗe ngam ɗaɓɓugo nokkuure siwtaago, to ngol heɓaay,
nden kam ngol wi'an: Mi loroto haa suudu am ndu mi wurtino. To ngol lori haa maaru, ngol tawan ndu sookru, wuuwaandu e mo'itinaandu,

nden ngol yaha, ngol wadda ruuhuuji goɗɗi joweeɗiɗi, ɓuranɗi ngol hallugo, ɗi nastan suudu man, ɗi njooɗoto nder maaru. Joonde goɗɗo oo hallan ko ɓuri naane. Bana nii ɗum laatanto yimɓe halluɓe nder zamanuuru ndu'u!”
Saa'i Yeesu ɗon wolwana mooɓre tawon, daada maako e deerɗiiko'en ɗon ndari yaasi, ngam ɓe ngiɗi wolwango mo.
Goɗɗo feere wi'i mo: “Ndaa, daada ma e deerɗiraaɓe ma ɗon ndari yaasi, ɓe ngiɗi wolwango ma.”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Moy woni daada am? Ɓeye ngoni deerɗiraaɓe am?”
Nden o sappi pukara'en maako, o wi'i: “Ndaa, ɓe'e ngoni daada am e deerɗiraaɓe am.
Ngam waɗanɓe muuyo Baabiraawo am mo asama fuu, kamɓe ngoni deerɗiraaɓe am worɓe e rewɓe e daada am.”
Nyalaade man Yeesu wurti saare, yehi, jooɗi haa fomoonde weendu.
Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe ngari haa maako. Ngam man o nasti koommbowal
O ekkitini nde kuuje ɗuuɗɗe bee balndi.
O wi'i ɓe: “Demoowo yehi ngesa ngam saakoygo.
Nde o ɗon saaka, aawdi ngoɗndi soli dow laawol, colli ngari, cuɓti ndi.
Aawdi ngoɗndi saami haa korka'e, haa lesdi ɗuuɗaay. Ndi fuɗi law ngam lesdi luggaay.
Nde naaŋge fuɗi, nge wuli fuɗŋgooji, ɗi njoori ngam ɗi ngalaa ɗaɗi.
Aawdi ngoɗndi soli caka gi'e. Gi'e mawnidi bee maari, ɓilli ndi.
Ammaa aawdi ngoɗndi soli haa lesdi mboondi, ndi nafi, waɗi cammeeje: Goɗɗe ɗon bee gabbe teemerre, goɗɗe bee cappanɗe joweego, goɗɗe boo bee cappanɗe tati.”
Mo woodi noppi fuu, nana!
Ɓaawoɗon pukara'en ngari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume a ɗon wolwana yimɓe bee balndi?”
O jaabi ɓe: “Onon, Allah anndini on sirriiji laamu mum, ammaa kamɓe ɓe anndinaaka.
Ngam marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo haa o wona nder jeynitaare, ammaa mo maraay koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum maako
Ngam man mi ɗon wolwana ɓe bee balndi. Ngam ɓe ɗon ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa. Ɓe ɗon nana, ammaa ɓe paamataa sam.
Bana nii annabaaku Esaaya gooŋɗiri ngam maɓɓe, o wi'no:
On nanan bee noppi mon, ammaa on paamataa sam,
on ndaaran bee gite mon, ammaa on ngi'ataa koo ɗume.
Ngam ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓe'e maatataa koo ɗume,
ɓe cukki noppi maɓɓe,
ɓe maɓɓi gite maɓɓe, ngam taa ɓe ngi'a,
taa ɓe nana,
taa ɓe paama,
taa ɓe tuuba boo, ngam taa min mi yamɗitina ɓe
Ammaa onon, barka woodani gite mon ngam ɗe ɗon ngi'a, barka woodani noppi mon boo ngam ɗi ɗon nana.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Annabi'en e adili'en ngiɗno yi'ugo ko ngi'oton, ammaa ɓe ngi'aay, ɓe ngiɗno nanugo ko nanoton, ammaa ɓe nanaay
“Onon, nane sifa balndol demoowo go.
Yimɓe woɗɓe nani habaru laamu asamanji, ammaa ɓe paamaay. Kamɓe ɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa laawol, ngam kalluɗo waran, wifto ko saaka nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Woɗɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa korka'e. Kamɓe, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, law ɓe njaɓa nde bee seyo.
Ammaa ɓe ngalaa ɗaɗi, ɓe tabitittaa, ngam to ɓillaare e toonyaare ukkanake ɓe daliila wolde Allah, ɓe accan nuɗɗinki law.
Woɗɓe boo nanndi bee aawdi caka gi'e. Kamɓe, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, laruuraaji e esto risku ɓiɗɗan wolde man, nde waɗataa nafuuda sam.
Ammaa woɗɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa lesdi mboondi. Kamɓe, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, ɓe paami nde, ɓe mbaŋginan ɓenndalooje: Woɗɓe cowi teemerre, woɗɓe cappanɗe joweego, woɗɓe boo cappanɗe tati.”
Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol feere, o wi'i: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee goɗɗo mo saaki aawdi mboondi waato alkamaari nder ngesa muuɗum.
Jemmaare feere, nde yimɓe fuu ɗon ɗaani, ganyo maako wari, saaki aawdi geene caka alkamaari maako, dilli.
Nde alkamaari mawni, waɗi cammeeje, geene boo mbaŋgi.
Huuwooɓe jawmu ngesa ngari, mbi'i mo: Jaagorɗo, naa alkamaari a saaki nder ngesa maaɗa na? Ko waɗi geene boo mbaŋgi ton?
O wi'i ɓe: Ganyo am waɗi ɗum. Huuwanooɓe ƴami mo: Nden kam a yiɗi min ɗoofa ɗe na?
O jaabi ɓe: Aa'a, ngam to on ɗon ɗoofa ɗe, on ɗoofdan alkamaari bee maaje.
Acce ɗum fuu ɗum mawnida haa wakkati codol. Saa'i man mi wi'an sodooɓe: Aarte mooɓtugo geene, kaɓɓe ɗe, ngule ɗe. Ammaa alkamaari kam, mooɓtaneeɗam ndi haa beembal am.”
Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol feere boo, o wi'i: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee gawel citta ndi goɗɗo hoo'i, saaki nder ngesa muuɗum.
Ndi ɓuri aawdiiji fuu famɗugo, ammaa to ndi fuɗi, ndi ɓuran haakooji goɗɗi fuu mawnugo, ndi laatoto lekki, haa colli ngara, mbaɗa caɓɓe maaji dow lice maaki.”
Yeesu wolwani ɓe balndol feere fahin, o wi'i: “Laamu asamanji nanndi bee ufnirɗum. Debbo hoo'i ɗum, waati ɗum nder kuroori etirɗe tati, kuroori man fuu ƴuufi.”
Kuuje ɗe'e fuu Yeesu wolwani yimɓe bee balndi, o wolwani ɓe koo ɗume fuu bee balndi,
ngam hiɓɓingo annabaaku Esaaya. Kaŋko o wi'i:
“Mi wolwan bee balndi,
mi anndinan ɓe kuuje cuuɗiiɗe diga tageeki duniyaaru
Nden Yeesu acci yimɓe, nasti saare. Pukara'en ngari haa maako, mbi'i mo: “Sifana min balndol geene nder ngesa alkamaari go.”
O wi'i ɓe: “Mo saaki aawdi mboondi, kaŋko woni
Ngesa ɗum duniyaaru, alkamaari ɗum yimɓe laamu asamanji, geene boo ɗum tokkiiɓe Kalluɗo.
Ganyo mo saaki ɗe boo, ɗum Sayɗaanu, saa'i codol ɗum timmuki duniyaaru, sodooɓe boo ɗum malaa'ika'en.
Bana ɓe mooɓtirta geene, ɓe ngula ɗe bee yiite, bana non ɗum laatoto haa timmuki duniyaaru boo.
nelan malaa'ika'en muuɗum, ɓe ngurtina diga laamu maako nastinɓe yimɓe nder hakke e halluɓe fuu,
ɓe ngudina ɓe nder yiite ɓolinirde. Haa ton ɓe mboyan, ɓe kirƴindiran nyii'e.
Ammaa saa'i man adili'en njaynan bana naaŋge nder laamu Baabiraawo muuɗum'en. Mo woodi noppi fuu, nana!”
“Laamu asamanji nanndi bee jawdi ndi ɓe nyukkini nder ngesa. Mo tawi ndi, nyukkini ndi fahin. O seyi masin, o yehi, o soorri mardi maako fuu, o soodi ngesa man.”
“Fahin, laamu asamanji nanndi bee piloowo ɗaɓɓanɗo luuluuje booɗɗe.
Nde o tawi luuluuri marndi saman masin, o yehi, o soorri mardi maako fuu, o soodi ndi.”
“Laamu asamanji nanndi boo bee zubaawol ngol waawooɓe ngubi nder weendu, ngol naŋngi liɗɗi feere feereeji.
Nde ngol heewi, ɓe pooɗi ngol haa fomoonde, ɓe njooɗi, ɓe ngurtini liɗɗi. Liɗɗi booɗɗi ɓe ndesi ɗi nder cilaaje maɓɓe, ammaa kalluɗi, ɓe ngudini ɗi.
Bana non ɗum laatoto haa timmuki duniyaaru boo: Malaa'ika'en ngaran, cenndan adili'en bee halluɓe,
ɓe nguboto halluɓe nder yiite ɓolinirde. Haa ton ɓe mboyan, ɓe kirƴindiran nyii'e.”
Yeesu ƴami pukara'en muuɗum: “On paami bolle ɗe fuu na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Ooho, min paami.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngam maajum koo moy moodibboojo tawreeta, laatiiɗo pukaraajo, annduɗo haala laamu asamanji, nanndi bee jawmu saare, gurtinanɗo kuuje kese e kuuje kiiɗɗe diga ndesaari muuɗum.”
Nde Yeesu timmini wolwango yimɓe balndi ɗi'i, o ummi nokkuure man,
o yehi haa berniwol ngol o mawni. O fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe nder suudu dewal maɓɓe. Wonɓe ton kayɗini, mbi'i: “Moy hokki mo hikma ka e baawɗe waɗugo kaayeefiiji ɗi'i?
Naa kaŋko woni ɓii cehoowo na? Naa Mariyama woni daada maako na? Naa Yaakuba e Yoses e Simon e Yahuuda ngoni deerɗiraaɓe maako na?
Naa deerɗiraaɓe maako rewɓe boo ɗon ngondi bee meeɗen haa ɗo na? Noy o waawri waɗugo kuuje ɗe fuu?”
Ngam maajum ɓe cali nuɗɗingo mo.
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe teddinan annabiijo koo toy fuu, ammaa nder wuro muuɗum e caka yimɓe saare muuɗum ɓe teddintaa mo
Ngam daliila sooynde nuɗɗinki maɓɓe, Yeesu waɗaay kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi ton.
Saa'i man Hirudus Antipas nani habaru Yeesu.
O wi'i sukaaɓe maako: “Kaŋko woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma, o ummitake diga maayde, ngam maajum o woodi baawɗe waɗugo kaayeefiiji.”
Naane Hirudus umrino, ɓe naŋnga Yuhanna, ɓe kaɓɓa mo, ɓe nastina mo fursina
ngam Yuhanna wi'no mo: “Haanaay a te'a Hirudiya
Hirudus yiɗino mbarugo Yuhanna, ammaa o huli mooɓre, ngam ɓe ɗon ndaara Yuhanna bana o annabiijo.
Nyannde siftinorde danyeeki Hirudus, ɓiɗɗo Hirudiya debbo wami yeeso ewnaaɓe, ɗum fottani Hirudus.
O hunani mo o hokkan mo ko o ƴami fuu.
Daada maako loowi mo bolle, nden o wi'i: “Hokkam hoore Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma nder le'al.”
Ɗum suni laamiiɗo, ammaa daliila hunayeere nde o hunanino mo yeeso ewnaaɓe, o umri ɓe ndokka mo ko o ƴami.
Hirudus neli goɗɗo haa suudu fursina, o yehi, o ta'i hoore Yuhanna.
O waddi nde nder le'al, o hokki nde ɓiɗɗo debbo go, yahrani nde daada muuɗum.
Pukara'en Yuhanna ngari, ɓe koosi ɓanndu maako, ɓe uwi ndu. Nden ɓe njehi, ɓe ngecci Yeesu ko laati.
Nde Yeesu nani habaru man, o ummi nokkuure man, o nasti koommbowal, o yehi ladde feere maako. Mooɓe nani ɗum, ɗe ngurti berniiji maaje, ɗe tokki mo bee kosɗe.
Nde Yeesu wurti koommbowal, o yi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde, o yurmini nde, o yamɗitini nyawɓe maare.
Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, pukara'en Yeesu ngari haa maako, mbi'i mo: “Naaŋge hiiri, nokkuure nde'e boo nde ferewnde. Ndikka a jaɓɓito yimɓe, ɓe ndilla haa kawyeeji, ɓe coodana ko'e maɓɓe nyaamdu.”
Yeesu jaabi: “Haanaay ɓe ndilla, ndokke ɓe nyaamdu, onon.”
Ammaa ɓe mbi'i mo: “Min ngalaa koo ɗume, sey tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi tan.”
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngaddaneeɗam ɗum haa ɗo.”
Nden o umri mooɓe njooɗo dow huɗo. O hoosi tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi go, o tijji asama, o yetti Allah. O yewi tamseeje man, o hokki pukara'en, ɓe ndokka mooɓe.
Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari. Pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum man, ɗum hebbini cilaaje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Limgal nyaamɓe tamseeje dillani baakin worɓe ujine njowo, rewɓe e ɓikkoy limaaka.
Nden law Yeesu dooli pukara'en muuɗum ɓe nasta koommbowal, ɓe aarta mo yahugo fomoonde gaɗaare, saa'i o ɗon jaɓɓito yimɓe.
O jaɓɓiti ɓe, o wa'i dow hooseere ngam waɗugo do'a. Haa jemma waɗi, o ɗon ton feere maako.
Nde koommbowal daayi masin bee fomoonde, henndu fuɗɗi ɓillugo ngal, ngam ngal ɗon fotta bee maaru.
Gal subaha, Yeesu wari haa pukara'en muuɗum, o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam bee kosɗe.
Nde pukara'en ngi'i mo o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam, ɓe cakli, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum ginnawol!” Ɓe ngooki ngam kulol.
Law Yeesu wolwani ɓe, wi'i: “Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mooɗon, taa kultore, ɗum min.”
Piyer wi'i mo: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, to ɗum an kam, umru mi yaha haa maaɗa dow ndiyam.”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “War.”
Piyer wurti koommbowal, fuɗɗi yahugo dow ndiyam, ngam haa o yotto haa Yeesu.
Ammaa nde o yi'i henndu, o hultori, o fuɗɗi mutugo, o wooki: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, hisnam!”
Law Yeesu forti juŋngo muuɗum, naŋngi mo, wi'i mo: “Hey an, famɗa-nuɗɗinkiijo, ngam ɗume a seki?”
Nde ɓe nasti koommbowal ɓe ɗiɗo fuu, henndu de'iti.
Nden pukara'en wonɓe nder koommbowal cujidani Yeesu, mbi'i: “Fakat a
Ɓe eeri weendu, ɓe njotti lesdi Genesaret.
Nde yimɓe lesdi man annditi Yeesu, ɓe ngeeyni habaru maako koo toy nder lesdi maɓɓe, ɓe ngaddani mo nyawɓe fuu.
Ɓe tori mo o acca nyawɓe man meema gawargal limce maako tan, meemɓe ngal fuu njamɗiti.
Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ngari diga Urusaliima haa Yeesu, ɓe ƴami mo:
“Koni pukara'en maaɗa ɗowtantaako al'aada kaakiraaɓe meeɗen? Ngam ɓe ɗon nyaama bilaa lootugo juuɗe.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Onon, koni on ɗowtantaako umroore Allah ngam daliila al'aada mooɗon?
Allah wi'i: Teddin baaba ma e daada ma, koo moy wolwi kalluka dow baaba malla daada mum, sey o mbare
Ammaa onon on ɗon mbi'a: To goɗɗo wi'i baaba malla daada mum: Geɗal jawdi am ndi mi waawanno wallugo ma bee maari, doole mi hokka ngal Allah.
Nden kam walaa haaje o teddina baaba maako. Bana non on mbonni umroore Allah ngam daliila al'aada mooɗon.
Naafiki'en! Annabaaku ngu Esaaya waɗi dow mooɗon gooŋɗi:
Allah wi'i: Yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon teddinammi bee kunnduɗe tan,
ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe ndaayake yam.
Ɓe ɗon cujidanammi meere,
ngam ɓe ɗon ekkitina geccaaji yimɓe
Nden Yeesu ewni yimɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Nane, paame ɗu'um:
Naa ko nastata hunnduko neɗɗo soɓnata mo, ammaa ko wurtoto hunnduko maako, kanjum soɓnata mo.”
Pukara'en ngari haa Yeesu, mbi'i mo: “A anndi bolle ma mettini ɓerɗe Farisa'en na?”
O jaabi ɓe: “Fuɗŋgo ngo Baabiraawo mo asama tiggaay fuu, ngo ɗoofeteeŋgo.
Acce ɓe, ɓe wumɓe, ɗowooɓe wumɓe. To bumɗo ɗon ɗowa bumɗo, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe ndo'oto nder ngaska
Piyer wi'i mo: “Faamtin min balndol ngol.”
Yeesu wi'i: “Haa jonta, onon boo on paamataa na?
Ko nastata hunnduko neɗɗo fuu, haa reedu mum ɗum yahata, nden ɗum wurto ɓanndu maako. On anndaa ɗum na?
Ammaa ko wurtoto hunnduko, ɗum ɗon iwa haa ɓernde, kanjum soɓnata neɗɗo
Ngam haa ɓernde neɗɗo, numooji kalluɗi e mbar-hoore e njeenu e daakaareeku e nguyka e seedamkuuji pewooji e kuudi kalluɗi iwata.
Kanjum soɓnata neɗɗo. Ammaa nyaamugo bilaa lootugo juuɗe, ɗum soɓnataa neɗɗo.”
Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, dilli haa lesdi Tirus e Sidon.
Debbo Kanaaniijo, jooɗiiɗo lesdi man, wari haa maako, tori mo bee sawtu: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, Ɓii Daawuda, enɗam! Ndaa ɓiŋngel am deyel ngel ginnawol ɗon torra masin.”
Ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo. Pukara'en maako ɓaditi mo, mbi'i mo: “Riiw mo, ngam o ɗon tokki en bee hoolo.”
Yeesu jaabi: “Mi nelaaka haa yimɓe feere, sey haa baali majjuɗi, ummaatoore Isra'iila.”
Ammaa debbo go wari, tuggani mo koppi, wi'i: “Wallam, yaa Jawmiraawo!”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Wooɗaay hoo'ugo nyaamdu ɓikkoy, sakkinana ndawaakon.”
Debbo wi'i: “Nonnon, yaa Jawmiraawo, ammaa koo ndawaakon boo ɗon nyaama caamɗum diga taabal jawmiikon.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i: “An debbo, nuɗɗinki maaɗa makki, ɗum laatano ma bana a yiɗi.” Ɓiŋngel maako deyel go yamɗiti saa'i man nden.
Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, tokki kommbi weendu Galiili. O wa'i hooseere, o jooɗi ton.
Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe ngari haa maako, ɓe ngaddi woosɓe e wumɓe e waata-terɗe'en e muuka'en e nyawɓe woɗɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Ɓe mballini ɓe kommbi Yeesu, o yamɗitini ɓe.
Yimɓe mooɓre kayɗini nde ɓe ngi'i muuka'en ɗon mbolwa, waata-terɗe'en njamɗiti, woosɓe ɗon njaha bee kosɗe muuɗum'en, wumɓe boo ɗon ngi'a. Ɓe teddini Allah Isra'iila.
Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i ɓe: “Mi ɗon yurmina yimɓe ɓe'e, ngam ɓe ɗon ngondi bee am nyalɗe tati, ɓe ngalaa ko ɓe nyaama. Mi yiɗaa jaɓɓitaago ɓe bee dolo ngo'o, ngam taa ɓe tampa dow laawol.”
Pukara'en mbi'i mo: “Haa toy keɓeten tamseeje nder ladde hamaadaare ɗo, haa en ndokka mooɓre ɗuuɗnde nde'e fuu?”
Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Tamseeje noy marɗon?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Tamseeje joweeɗiɗi e liikon seɗɗa.”
Nden Yeesu umri mooɓre jooɗo.
O hoo'i tamseeje joweeɗiɗi e liɗɗi go, o yetti Allah, o yewi ɗe, o hokki ɗe pukara'en maako, kamɓe boo ɓe ndokki ɗe mooɓre.
Yimɓe fuu nyaami, kaari. Pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum man, ɗum hebbini cilaaje joweeɗiɗi.
Limgal nyaamɓe nyaamdu man dillani worɓe ujine nayo, rewɓe e ɓikkoy limaaka.
Nde Yeesu jaɓɓiti mooɓre, o nasti koommbowal
Farisa'en e Saduki'en ngari haa Yeesu ngam jarribaago mo. Ɓe ƴami mo o waŋginana ɓe alaama iwka diga asama
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “To naaŋge muti, asama boo wooji, on ɗon mbi'a: Jaŋngo laaɓan.
Fajiri boo, to asama nyiɓɓi, duule mbooji, on ɗon mbi'a: Naargewol ummoto hannde! On mbaawi fassitirgo ko waŋgi haa asama, ammaa alaamaaji laatiiɗi jonta kam, on mbaawataa fassitirgo ɗi.
Yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u, ɓe halluɓe, zammbotooɓe Allah! Ɓe ngeli alaama, ammaa ɓe keɓataa, sonaa alaama annabi Yonas.” Nden o acci ɓe, o dilli
Pukara'en eeri weendu. Ɓe ngejjiti hoo'ugo tamseeje.
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Kakkile, ayne ko'e mooɗon e ufnirɗum Farisa'en e Saduki'en
Pukara'en carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: “O wolwi bana non ngam en koo'aay tamseeje.”
Yeesu anndi ko ɓe numata. O ƴami ɓe: “Koni mbi'oton on ngalaa tamseeje, onon famɗa-nuɗɗinki'en?
On paamaay tawon na? On ciftortaa haala tamseeje jowi ɗe mi senndani yimɓe ujine njowo e limgal cilaaje ɗe on adi
e haala tamseeje joweeɗiɗi ɗe mi senndani yimɓe ujine nayo e limgal cilaaje ɗe on adi na
Koni on paamataa? Mi wolwanaay on haala tamseeje! Kakkilane ufnirɗum Farisa'en e Saduki'en.”
Nden pukara'en paami o wi'aay ɓe ayna ko'e maɓɓe e ufnirɗum tamseeje ammaa ekkitinol Farisa'en e Saduki'en.
Yeesu yehi lesdi Kaysariya-Filippi. Ton o ƴami pukara'en maako: “Yimɓe ɗon mbi'a, min,
Ɓe njaabi mo: “Woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a an woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma, woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a an woni Eliya. Woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a an woni Yeremiya malla gooto annabi'en
Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Onon boo, on ɗon mbi'a mi moy?”
Simon Piyer jaabi mo: “An woni Almasiihu,
Yeesu wi'i mo: “A barkiɗinaaɗo, Simon ɓii Yonas, naa neɗɗo waŋginani ma gooŋga ka, ammaa ɗum Baabiraawo am mo asama.
Mi ɗon wi'e: An woni Piyer waato tapaare. Dow tapaare man mi mahan jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe yam. Koo maayde jaalataako nde sam.
Mi hokkete maɓɓitirɗum laamu asamanji. Ko a haɓɓi haa duniyaaru, ɗum haɓɓaama haa asama boo, ko a fiisti haa duniyaaru, ɗum fiistaama haa asama boo
Nden Yeesu umri pukara'en muuɗum taa ɓe ngecca koo moy kanyum woni Almasiihu.

Diga saa'i man Yeesu fuɗɗi faamtingo pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i: “Doole mi yaha Urusaliima, mi yara bone ɗuuɗɗum diga ndotti'en e mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta, ɓe mbarammi, ammaa mi ummito diga maayde nyalaade tataɓre.”
Piyer wicciti mo sera, fuɗɗi felugo mo, wi'i: “Kayya, yaa Jawmiraawo, Allah haɗ ɗum! Irin man warantaa ma sam!”
Ammaa Yeesu yeesiti, wi'i Piyer: “Daayam, an Sayɗaanu! A laatani yam daliila fergere, ngam numooji maaɗa iwaay haa Allah, ammaa haa yimɓe.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “To goɗɗo yiɗi tokkaago yam, sey o acca muuyo maako, o roondo gaafaaŋgal maako, o tokko yam
Ngam koo moy yiɗi hisnugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki mum ngam am, heɓtan ki
To neɗɗo heɓi duniyaaru fuu, ammaa o halki yoŋki maako, ɗume ɗum nafata mo? Malla woodi ko goɗɗo waawata hokkugo ngam soottugo yoŋki muuɗum na? Walaa sam!
Ngam
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, fakat woɗɓe caka mooɗon maayataa, sey to ɓe ngi'i garki Ɓii-neɗɗo bee laamu muuɗum.”
Ɓaawo nyalɗe joweego, Yeesu hoo'i Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna deerɗu Yaakuba, o dillidi bee maɓɓe dow hooseere townde, ɓe ɗon ton feere maɓɓe.
Jaati maako wayliti haa gite maɓɓe, yeeso maako yayni bana naaŋge, limce maako laati daneeje tal bana annoora.
Nden Muusa e Eliya mbaŋgani ɓe, ɗon mbolida bee Yeesu.
Piyer wi'i Yeesu: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, ɗum booɗɗum en ngona haa ɗo! To a yiɗi, mi waɗanan on bukkaaji tati, wooru ngam maaɗa, wooru ngam Muusa, wooru boo ngam Eliya.”
Nde o ɗon wolwa tawon, ndaa ruuldere ɗelkannde wari, suddi ɓe, sawtu iwi haa ruulde man, wi'i: “Oo woni
Nde pukara'en nani ɗum, ɓe kultori masin, ɓe ndo'i, ɓe kippi geese maɓɓe.
Yeesu ɓaditi ɓe, meemi ɓe, wi'i: “Umme, taa kultore.”
Ɓe ɓaŋgti gite maɓɓe, ɓe ngi'aay goɗɗo feere, sey Yeesu tan.
Nde ɓe ɗon njippo hooseere go, Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Taa mbi'e koo moy ko on ngi'i, haa to
Nden pukara'en ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon mbi'a sey Eliya aarta wargo tawon
O jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga Eliya aartan wargo, o mo'itina kuuje fuu.
Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on Eliya wari timmi, yimɓe annditaay mo, ɓe mbaɗi mo ko ɓe ngiɗi, ɓe torran Ɓii-neɗɗo boo bana non
Pukara'en paami o wolwani ɓe haala Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma.
Nde ɓe njotti haa mooɓre, goɗɗo wari haa Yeesu, tuggani mo koppi,
wi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, enɗu ɓiŋngel am! Ngel ɗon bee paɗɗe, o torraaɗo masin, nde ɗuuɗɗum o ɗon do'o nder yiite malla nder ndiyam.
Mi waddi ngel haa pukara'en maaɗa, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay yamɗitingo ngel.”
Yeesu wi'i: “Hey yimɓe sooya-nuɗɗinki'en, wonniiɓe! Haa ndey tokkotoomi wondugo bee mooɗon e munyango on? Ngaddaneeɗam ɓiŋngel ngel!”
Yeesu telɓani ginnawol, ngol wurti ɓiŋngel, ngel yamɗiti saa'i man nden.
Ɓaawoɗon pukara'en Yeesu ngari haa maako feere maɓɓe, ƴami mo: “Ngam ɗume min mbaawaay wurtingo ginnawol ngo'ol?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ngam nuɗɗinki mooɗon famɗi. Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki koo seɗɗa bana gawel citta, on mbi'an hooseere nde'e sotta ɗo, yaha to, nde sottoto, walaa ko salorta on sam
Ammaa irin ginnawol ngo'ol wurtintaake sonaa bee do'aago e suumaago.]”
Pukara'en Yeesu kawti haa lesdi Galiili. Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe tammi hokkugo
yimɓe man mbaran mo, ammaa nyannde tataɓre o ummititto diga maayde.” Nde pukara'en nani ɗum, ɓe cuni masin.
Nde Yeesu bee pukara'en muuɗum njotti Kafarnahum, jomnooɓe jomorgol haykaliiru ngari haa Piyer, ƴami mo: “Moodibbo mooɗon yoɓataa jomorgol haykaliiru na
Piyer jaabi: “O ɗon yoɓa.” Saa'i Piyer nasti suudu, Yeesu aarti wolwango mo, wi'i: “Ko numɗa, Simon? Ɓeye njoɓata jomorli malla garaama ngam laamiiɓe duniyaaru ndu'u? Ɓiɓɓe lesdi naa malla jananɓe?”
Piyer jaabi: “Ɗum jananɓe njoɓata.” Yeesu wi'i: “Nden kam ɓiɓɓe lesdi njoɓataa.
Ammaa ngam taa en mettina ɓe ɓerɗe, yah haa weendu, sakkin ngalum nder ndiyam, liiŋgu ngu a aartata naŋngugo, hoocu ngu, maɓɓitu hunnduko maagu, a tawan ceede cardi ton. Hoocu, yoɓ ɓe ngam am e ma.”
Saa'i man pukara'en Yeesu ɓaditi mo, ƴami: “Moy ɓurdi maŋngu haa laamu asamanji
Yeesu ewni ɓiŋngel pamarel, darni ngel caka maɓɓe.
O wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To on ngaylitaaki haa on laato bana ɓikkoy pamaroy, nden kam on nastataa laamu asamanji sam
Ngam maajum mo leestini hoore muuɗum bana ɓiŋngel nge'el, kaŋko woni ɓurduɗo maŋngu haa laamu asamanji.
Koo moy jaɓi ɓiŋngel pamarel bana nge'el ngam daliila innde am, min o jaɓi.”
“To goɗɗo do'i gooto ɓurɗo famɗugo caka nuɗɗinɓe yam nder hakke, ndikkana mo ɓe ɓila hayre namarde mawnde haa daande maako, ɓe njolla mo nder mbeela lugguŋga.
Bone laatanto duniyaaru ngam ndu ɗon nastina yimɓe nder hakke! Doole ko do'ata yimɓe nder hakke wona, ammaa bone laatanto neɗɗo mo laati daliila do'ere man.

To juŋngo ma malla kosŋgal ma nastinte nder hakke, ta'u ɗum, wudin ɗum daayiiɗum. Ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam bee juŋngo wooto malla kosŋgal gootal, dow nastugo yiite duumiiŋge bee juuɗe malla kosɗe ma ɗiɗi fuu
To yiitere ma nastinte nder hakke, ɗoof nde, wudin nde daayiiɗum. Ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam bee yiitere woore dow nastugo yiite jahannama bee gite maaɗa ɗiɗi fuu
“Kakkile ngam taa on njawo gooto haa famarɓe ɓe'e. Mi ɗon wi'a on: Malaa'ika'en maɓɓe haa asama ɗon ndari tum yeeso Baabiraawo am mo asama. [
Ngam
Ko numɗon? To goɗɗo woodi baali teemerre, nden ngootu maaji majji, o accataa cappanɗe joweenayi e joweenayi dow kooseeje ngam haa o yaha ɗaɓɓitoygo majjuŋgu na?
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To o heɓti ngu, o seyoto ngam daliila mbaalu ngootu ngu ko ɓuri baali cappanɗe joweenayi e joweenayi ɗi eeraay.
Bana non boo, Baabiraawo mooɗon mo asama yiɗaa koo gooto nder famarɓe ɓe'e halka.”
“To deerɗiraawo ma waɗi ma aybe
Ammaa to o salake nanango ma, yah haa maako bee goɗɗo gooto malla yimɓe ɗiɗo, ngam haa haala fuu laaɓa dow seedamku seedooɓe ɗiɗo malla tato
To o salake nanango ɓe boo, yeccu ɗum haa jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. To o sali nanango jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe, nden kam laar mo bana o keefeero malla o jomnoowo.”
“Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ko on kaɓɓi haa duniyaaru, ɗum haɓɓaama haa asama boo. Ko on piisti haa duniyaaru, ɗum fiistaama haa asama boo
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on fahin: To haa duniyaaru ndu yimɓe ɗiɗo caka mooɗon narri dow ko ɓe ƴamatammi fuu, Baabiraawo am mo asama hokkan ɓe ɗum.
Ngam haa yimɓe ɗiɗo malla tato kawti ngam innde am fuu, ton mi ɗon caka maɓɓe.”
Nden Piyer wari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Jawmiraawo, nde noy njaafotoomi deerɗiraawo am mo tokki waɗango yam aybe? Haa nde joweeɗiɗi na?”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Aa'a, naa nde joweeɗiɗi, ammaa cappanɗe joweeɗiɗi nde joweeɗiɗi
Ngam maajum laamu asamanji nanndi bee laamiiɗo mo yiɗi huuwooɓe mum mbaɗana mo lisaafi jawdi maako.
Nde o fuɗɗi kuugal man, ɓe ngaddani mo goɗɗo mo o tokki suleyje miliyarji ɗuuɗɗi.
Goɗɗo man walaa ko o yoɓra nyamaande nde. Jaagorɗo maako umri ɓe coorra mo, kaŋko e debbo maako e ɓikkoy maako e mardi maako fuu ngam yoɓugo nde.
Gorko go tuggi koppi yeeso jaagorɗo muuɗum, tori mo, wi'i: “Useni munyanam, barkaama, ɗum fuu mi yoɓete.”
Jaagorɗo maako yurmini mo, yoofi mo, yaafani mo nyamaande man fuu.
Kuuwoowo man wurti, fotti bee kuuwdiɗɗiraawo muuɗum, mo o tokki ɗum baakin booro teemerre, o naŋngi mo daande, o ɗon ɗeɗɗa mo, o ɗon wi'a: “Yoɓam nyamaande am!”
Kuuwdiɗɗiraawo maako do'i les kosɗe maako, tori mo, wi'i: “Useni munyanam, mi yoɓete.”
Ammaa o sali, o yehi, o nastini mo nder fursina
Nde huuwdiɗɗiraaɓe maako woɗɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɗum suni ɓe masin, ɓe njehi, ɓe anndini jaagorɗo maɓɓe haala ka fuu.
Nden jaagorɗo ewni kuuwoowo go, wi'i mo: An kuuwoowo kalluɗo, mi yaafani ma nyamaande ma fuu ngam a tori yam.
Kadi haandaayno a enɗa kuuwdiɗɗiraawo ma bana mi enɗiri ma na?
Jaagorɗo ɓernani mo, o yahri mo haa boŋngo'en haa to o yoɓi mo nyamaande maako fuu.
Bana non boo Baabiraawo am mo asama waɗanta on, to koo moy mooɗon yaafanaaki deerɗum bee ɓernde woore.
Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo, o ummi lesdi Galiili, o yehi lesdi Yahudiya, gaɗa maayo Urdun.
Mooɓe ɗuuɗɗe tokki mo, o yamɗitini ɓe ton.
Farisa'en ngari haa maako ngam jarribaago mo. Ɓe ƴami mo: “Tawreeta duŋani gorko seera debbo mum ngam daliila koo kaye na?”
O jaabi ɓe: “On njaŋngaay ko winnda na? Haa fuɗɗam Allah tagi gorko e debbo
Nden o wi'i: “Ngam maajum gorko accan baaba muuɗum e daada muuɗum, ɗakkotiran bee debbo muuɗum, ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe laatoto ɓanndu wooru
Bana non ɓe laatataako yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓaawoɗon, ammaa ɓanndu wooru. Ngam maajum taa neɗɗo fiista ko Allah haɓɓi.”
Farisa'en ƴami mo: “To non kam, ngam ɗume Muusa umri gorko hokka debbo muuɗum ɗereewol ceergal ngam seerugo ɗum
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Muusa duŋani on ɗum daliila caatal ɓerɗe mooɗon. Ammaa diga fuɗɗam ɗum laataaki non.
Mi ɗon wi'a on: Mo seeri debbo muuɗum, sonaa daliila daakaareeku, te'i debbo feere, waɗi njeenu
Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “To haala gorko bee debbo laatake non, ndikka taa ɓe te'a.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Naa yimɓe fuu njaɓata haala ka, sey ɓe Allah waawni:
Woɗɓe laati wahraaɓe diga danyeeki muuɗum'en, woɗɓe laati sortaaɓe, woɗɓe boo te'ataa ngam daliila laamu asamanji. Mo waawi jaɓugo haala ka, sey o jaɓa!”
Nden yimɓe ngaddi ɓikkoy pamaroy haa Yeesu ngam haa o yowa juuɗe maako dow maakoy, o waɗana koy do'a, ammaa pukara'en caatani ɓe.
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Acce ɓikkoy pamaroy ngara haa am, taa kaɗe koy, ngam laamu asamanji woodani yimɓe irin maakoy.”
O yowi juuɗe maako dow maakoy, nden o dilli.
Goɗɗo feere wari haa Yeesu, ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, kuugal booɗŋgal ngale mi huuwata haa mi heɓa ngeendam nduumiiɗam?”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ngam ɗume a ƴami yam ko wooɗi? Walaa booɗɗo, sey gooto tan. To a yiɗi nastugo nder ngeendam nduumiiɗam, sey a jogo umrooje.”
O ƴami Yeesu: “Umrooje ɗeye?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Taa mbar-hoore, taa waɗ njeenu, taa wujju, taa seeda fewre dow goɗɗo
Teddin baaba ma e daada ma, yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo maaɗa bana no a yiɗiri hoore ma
Suka go wi'i: “Umrooje ɗe'e fuu, mi ɗowtani ɗe, ko luttani yam fahin?”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “To a yiɗi laataago timmuɗo, yah, soorru ko marɗa, hokku ɗum talaka'en, nden kam a heɓoyan ndesaari haa asama. Nden war tokkam.”
Nde suka nani bolle ɗe, o dilli, ɓernde maako metti, ngam jawdi maako ɗuuɗndi masin.
Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɗum caɗɗum haa diskuɗo nasta laamu asamanji.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on fahin: Ngeelooba saalo nder wurdere baatal ɓuri hoyugo dow diskuɗo nasta laamu Allah.”
Nde pukara'en nani ɗum, ɓe kayɗini masin, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Kay, to non kam, moy waawata hisugo?”
Yeesu suti ɓe, wi'i: “Haa yimɓe ɗum waɗataako, ammaa haa Allah koo ɗume fuu waɗoto.”
Nden Piyer wi'i mo: “Ndaa, minin min acci kuuje fuu, min tokki ma, ko laatanto min kadi?”
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Saa'i
Koo moy acci saare muuɗum e deerɗiraaɓe worɓe e rewɓe malla saaro'en malla ɓikkoy malla gese muuɗum ngam daliila innde am, o heɓan cowi teemerre, o ronan ngeendam nduumiiɗam boo.
Ɗuuɗɓe aartuɓe laatoto sakkitiiɓe, ɗuuɗɓe sakkitiiɓe boo laatoto aartuɓe
“Laamu asamanji nanndi bee jawmu ngesa mo wurti fajiri cub ngam tefoygo huuwooɓe ngam ngesa inabooje muuɗum.
O narri bee maɓɓe, o yoɓa ɓe nyalaade fuu suleyre cardi. Nden o neli ɓe haa ngesa maako.
O wurti fahin saa'a joweenayi, o yi'i yimɓe woɗɓe ɗon ndari haa luumo, ɓe ngalaa kuugal.
O wi'i ɓe: Njehe haa ngesa am onon boo, mi yoɓan on ko haani.
Ɓe ndilli haa ngesa maako. Jawmu saare wurti fahin caka nyalawma, o wurti saa'a tati boo, o waɗi bana naane.
Saa'a jowi o wurti fahin, o tawi yimɓe woɗɓe ɗon ndari. O ƴami ɓe: Ngam ɗume nyalluɗon daraago haa ɗo meere?
Ɓe njaabi: Ngam walaa mo tefi min ngam kuugal sam. O wi'i ɓe: Njehe, kuuwe onon boo haa ngesa am.
Nde naaŋge muti, jawmu ngesa wi'i ardiiɗo kuugal muuɗum: Ewna huuwooɓe, yoɓ ɓe ngeenaari maɓɓe, fuɗɗir bee sakkitiiɓe yahugo haa ngesa, timminir bee aartuɓe
Yahɓe ngesa deydey saa'a jowi ngari, ɓe keɓi koo moy maɓɓe suleyre suleyre.
Nde aartuɓe yahugo ngesa ngari, ɓe tammino ɓe keɓan ɗuuɗɗum, ammaa o hokki ɓe kamɓe boo suleyre suleyre.
Nde ɓe njaɓi, ɓe ngurŋgurti dow jawmu ngesa,
ɓe mbi'i: Ndaa, huuwɓe saa'a ngoota tan a yoɓi ɓe kal-kal bee amin, minin nyalluɓe huuwugo nder bone e gulɗum naaŋge!
Ammaa jawmu ngesa jaabi gooto maɓɓe, wi'i: Soobaajo am, mi waɗaay ma rikici. En narraay dow ngeenaari suleyre cardi woore nder nyalawmaare na?
Hoo'u ngeenaari ma, yah, min mi yiɗi yoɓugo cakitiiɗo yahugo haa kuugal boo bana mi yoɓi ma.
Malla mi waawataa huuwtinirgo jawdi am bana mi yiɗi? Malla a haaji ngam mi booɗɗo?
Bana non boo, sakkitiiɓe laatoto aartuɓe, aartuɓe boo laatoto sakkitiiɓe
Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha Urusaliima, o hoo'i pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo feere maɓɓe. Dow laawol o wi'i ɓe:
“Nane, en ɗon njaha Urusaliima, ton ɓe ndokkan
Kamɓe ɓe ndokkan mo haa juuɗe heefeerɓe, ɓe njancan mo, ɓe ɓoccan mo, ɓe ɓilan mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ammaa nyalaade tataɓre, o ummititto diga maayde.”
Nden daada ɓiɓɓe Zebede wari haa Yeesu bee ɓiɓɓe mum. O sujidi, tori mo huunde.
Yeesu ƴami mo: “Ko ngiɗɗaa?” O jaabi: “Nyannde a laamake, accu ɓiɗɗo am gooto jooɗo haa nyaamo ma, gooto boo haa nano ma.”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “On anndaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaawan yarugo jardugel bone ngel min mi tammi yarugo na?” Ɓe mbi'i: “Min mbaawan.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga, on njaran jardugel am, ammaa jooɗaago haa nyaamo malla haa nano am, naa min hokkata ɗum, ɗum ɗon ngam yimɓe ɓe Baabiraawo am taaskitini.”
Nde pukara'en sappo luttuɓe nani haala ka'a, ɓe ɓernani deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo go.
Nden Yeesu ewni ɓe fuu, wi'i ɓe: “On anndi laamiiɓe ummaatooje ɗon ndoola yimɓe muuɗum'en, mawɓe boo ɗon kolla ɓe baawɗe.
Ammaa taa ɗum wona non caka mooɗon. To gooto mooɗon yiɗi laataago mawɗo, sey o laato jaggiiɗo mooɗon
Mo yiɗi ardaago caka mooɗon, laatoto maccuɗo mooɗon
Ngam Ɓii-neɗɗo boo waraay ngam yimɓe kuuwana mo, ammaa ngam o huuwana yimɓe, o hokka yoŋki maako ngam soottugo ɗuuɗɓe.”
Nde ɓe ngurti wuro Yeriko, mooɓre ɗuuɗnde tokki Yeesu.
Wumɓe ɗiɗo ɗonno njooɗi kommbi laawol, nde ɓe nani Yeesu ɗon saalo, ɓe ngooki, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo,
Mooɓre telɓani ɓe haa ɓe njeeɗo. Ammaa ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, Ɓii Daawuda, enɗu min!”
Yeesu dari, ewni ɓe, ƴami ɓe: “Ko ngiɗɗon mi waɗana on?”
Ɓe njaabi: “Jawmiraawo, haa gite amin mbumta.”
Yeesu yurmini ɓe, meemi gite maɓɓe, law yimɓe ɗiɗo go mbumti, ɓe tokki mo.
Nde ɓe ɓadi Urusaliima, ɓe njotti wuro Baytifaaji, gal Hooseere Jaytunje, Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo.
O wi'i ɓe: “Naste wuro wonŋgo yeeso mooɗon to, on tawan wamnde e molde maare ɗon kaɓɓi. Piiste ɗe, ngaddaneeɗam.
To goɗɗo wi'i on koo ɗume, njaabe mo: Jawmiraawo woodi haaje maaje, law o accanan on ɗe.”
Ɗum waɗi non ngam hiɓɓingo bolle annabiijo, biiɗo:
“Mbi'e berniwol Siyona:
Ndaa laamiiɗo ma ɗon wara haa maaɗa,
o jaŋkiniiɗo, o ba'iiɗo wamnde e molde maare
Pukara'en go ndilli, ɓe mbaɗi bana Yeesu umruno ɓe.
Ɓe ngaddi wamnde e molde maare. Ɓe ndaɗɗi limce maɓɓe dow maaje, nden Yeesu wa'i.
Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbe'iti limce muuɗum'en dow laawol, woɗɓe boo itti lice leɗɗe mbe'iti ɗe dow laawol.
Mooɓre ardunde Yeesu e tokkiinde ɓaawoɗon mbi'a bee sawtu: “
Nde Yeesu nasti Urusaliima, berniwol fuu dimmbi. Jooɗiiɓe ton ƴamƴamtiri: “Gorko oo, ɗum moy?”
Mooɓre jaabi ɓe: “Ɗum Yeesu, annabiijo iwɗo Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili.”
Nden Yeesu nasti
O wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa ko winnda: Suudu am wi'ete suudu waɗugo do'a, ammaa onon, on laatini ndu lowol fasooɓe
Wumɓe e woosɓe ngari haa Yeesu nder haykaliiru, o yamɗitini ɓe.
Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta tikki nde ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe kayɗiniiɗe ɗe o waɗi, ɓikkoy boo ɗon ngooka nder haykaliiru, ɗon mbi'a: “
Ɓe mbi'i Yeesu: “A ɗon nana ko koy mbi'ata na?” Yeesu jaabi: “Ooho, mi ɗon nana. On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko winnda na: Bee kunnduɗe ɓikkoy e musinankoy a taaskitinani hoore ma maŋgtoore
Nden o acci ɓe, o wurti berniwol, o dilli haa Baytaniya, o waali ton.
Jaŋngo man fajiri cub nde Yeesu ɗon loro haa berniwol, o maati dolo.
O yi'i ibbi kommbi laawol, o yehi les maaki, ammaa o tawaay koo ɗume, sey haakooji tan. Nden o wi'i ibbi: “Taa a meeta rimugo ɓiɓɓe sam!” Law ibbi go yoori.
Nde pukara'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe kayɗini. Ɓe ƴami Yeesu: “Noy ibbi ki yoori law bana nii?”

Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki, on cekaay, nden kam, on mbaawan waɗugo naa ko mi waɗi ibbi ki tan, ammaa ko ɓuri ɗum boo. Koo to on mbi'i hooseere nde'e: Ɗoofa diga ɗo ɗisoya nder weendu, ɗum waɗoto
To on ngoodi nuɗɗinki, on keɓan ko on tori fuu.”
Yeesu dilli, nasti haykaliiru. Nde o ɗon ekkitina yimɓe, mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en ngari haa maako, ƴami mo: “Bee duŋayeere moy a waarata kuuje ɗe'e? Moy duŋani ma waɗugo bana nii?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Min boo, mi ƴaman on huunde woore. To on njaabake yam, nden kam, min boo mi wi'an on bee duŋayeere moy mi waɗata kuuje ɗe'e.
Moy duŋani Yuhanna waɗango yimɓe baptisma?” Allah naa malla yimɓe? Ɓe puɗɗi sarwootirgo hakkunde maɓɓe, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “To en mbi'i Allah, o ƴaman en: koni on nuɗɗinaay Yuhanna?
Ammaa to en mbi'i yimɓe boo, en ɗon kula yimɓe, ngam yimɓe fuu nuɗɗini Yuhanna o annabiijo.”
Ngam maajum ɓe njaabi: “Min anndaa.” Yeesu wi'i: “Min boo mi wi'ataa on bee duŋayeere moy mbaɗanmi kuuje ɗe'e.”
“Ko numoton dow balndol ngo'ol? Goɗɗo woodi ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo. O yehi haa arano, o wi'i mo: Ɓiŋngel am, yah huuwoy haa ngesa inabooje hannde.
O jaabi: Mi yahataa. Ammaa ɓaawo man o numti, o yehi.
Nden baaba yehi haa ɗiɗaɓo, wi'i mo ko o wi'no arano. Kaŋko boo o jaabi: Mi yahan, jawmam! Ammaa o yahaay.
Caka ɓiɓɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e, moy waɗi ko baaba mum yiɗi?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Arano.” Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Jomnooɓe e rewɓe daakaare'en aartan on nastugo laamu asamanji.
Ngam Yuhanna wari haa mooɗon, o holli on laawol adilaaku, on nuɗɗinaay mo. Ammaa jomnooɓe e rewɓe daakaare'en nuɗɗini mo. Koo nde on ngi'i ɗum, on tuubaay, koo ɓaawoɗon boo on nuɗɗinaay mo

“Nane balndol goɗŋgol: Woodi jawmu saare feere, o waɗi ngesa inabooje, o taarni ka bee kowaagol, o waɗi ɓiɗɗirde inaboojam, o mahi suudu towndu ngam aynoowo ngesa. Nden o halfini ka remooɓe, o dilli jahaaŋgal
Nde saa'i teɓugo inabooje waɗi, o neli jaggiiɓe maako haa remooɓe go ngam ɓe njaɓana mo inabooje ngesa maako.
Remooɓe naŋngi nelaaɓe maako, ɓe ɓocci gooto, ɓe mbari gooto, tataɓo boo ɓe piɗi mo bee kaa'e.
O neli nelaaɓe woɗɓe ɓurɓe ɓeya ɗuuɗugo haa maɓɓe fahin, ɓe mbaɗi ɓe bana no ɓe mbaɗino aartuɓe.
Ɓaawo man o neli ɓiyiiko haa maɓɓe, o wi'i: Ɓe teddinan ɓiyam.
Ammaa nde remooɓe ngi'i ɓiyiiko, ɓe mbi'i hakkunde maɓɓe: Ndaa, kaŋko woni donoowo. En mbara mo ngam haa en mara ndonŋgu maako.
Ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe cakkini mo yaasi ngesa inabooje, ɓe mbari mo.”
Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Kadi to jawmu ngesa inabooje wari, ɗume o waɗata yimɓe ɓe'e?”
Ɓe njaabi mo: “O halkan halluɓe ɓe'e bilaa enɗam, nden o halfitinan ka remooɓe woɗɓe, tammiiɓe hokkugo mo ɓenndalooje to saa'i man yottake.”
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko winnda nder Defte Ceniiɗe na?
Hayre nde mahooɓe ngudini,
laati hayre talkumoore ɓurnde saman.
Jawmiraawo waɗi ɗum,
ɗum kaayeefi haa gite meeɗen
Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: “Allah hoositan laamu muuɗum, hokkan ngu ummaatoore woɗnde tammiinde rimugo ɓenndalooje. [
Koo moy do'i dow hayre nde'e, sampititto. To nde do'i dow goɗɗo boo, nde naman mo.]”
Mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en nani balndi ɗi Yeesu waɗi, ɓe paami dow maɓɓe o wolwi.
Nden ɓe tefi dabare naŋngugo mo, ammaa ɓe kuli yimɓe, ngam yimɓe ɗon ndaara mo bana annabiijo.
Kadiboo Yeesu waɗani ɓe balndi, wi'i ɓe:
“Laamu asamanji nanndi bee laamiiɗo mo waɗi juulde ɓaŋgal ɓiyum.
O neli suka'en maako haa ewnaaɓe haa nyaamdu juulde man, ammaa ɓe cali wargo.
Fahin o neli suka'en feere bee umroore bana ni'i: Mbi'e ewnaaɓe: Ga'i am e nyalbi am payɗi kirsaama, nyaamdu defaama jonta, kuuje fuu taaskitinaama, ngare haa juulde ɓaŋgal.
Ammaa ewnaaɓe kakkilanaay ɗum, ɓe ndilli: Goɗɗo haa ngesa muuɗum, goɗɗo boo haa filu muuɗum,
luttuɓe naŋngi suka'en laamiiɗo go, ɓe torri ɓe, ɓe mbari ɓe.
Laamiiɗo ɓerni, neli sooje'en muuɗum, ɓe mbari mbarooɓe ko'e ɓe'e, ɓe nguli wuro maɓɓe boo.
Nden o wi'i suka'en maako: Nyaamdu juulde ɓaŋgal defaama, ammaa ewnaaɓe ke'aay wargo.
Ngam maajum njehe haa kawtirɗe laabi fuu, ewne mo tawɗon fuu haa juulde ɓaŋgal.
Sukaaɓe go njehi haa laabi, ɓe tawi halluɓe e wooɗɓe fuu, ɓe mooɓti ɓe. Suudu ɓaŋgal heewi ewnaaɓe.
Laamiiɗo nasti ngam laarugo ewnaaɓe. Ton o yi'i goɗɗo, mo ɓornaaki limce ɓaŋgal.
O wi'i mo: Soobaajo am, noy a nastiri haa ɗo bilaa toggoore ɓaŋgal? O waawaay jaabaago mo sam.
Nden laamiiɗo wi'i jaggiiɓe muuɗum: Kaɓɓe kosɗe maako e juuɗe maako, ngudine mo yaasi nder nyiɓre, o woya, o hirƴindira nyii'e ton
Ngam woodi ewnaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ammaa suɓaaɓe kam ɗuuɗaay.
Nden Farisa'en njehi, mbaɗi sawari ngam naŋngugo Yeesu nder bolle muuɗum nder tuuforgol.
Ɓe neli pukara'en maɓɓe bee yimɓe Hirudus haa Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min anndi walaa ko yaalu ma bee goɗɗo, a senndindirtaa yimɓe, a ɗon anndina laawol Allah bee gooŋga.
Wi' min ko a numata: Ɗum kaanduɗum hokkugo laamiiɗo Roma jomorgol na malla naa non?”
Ammaa Yeesu anndi numo maɓɓe halluŋgo, o wi'i ɓe: “Hey onon naafiki'en, koni on tuufani yam tuuforgol?
Kolleeɗam ceede ɗe ɓe njoɓrata jomorgol.” Ɓe ngaddani mo suleyre.
Nden Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Suura e innde moy ɗo?”
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma jeyi.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Nden kam njoɓe Kaysara ko haanani mo, ndokke Allah boo ko haanani Allah.”
Nde ɓe nani jaawaabu man, ɓe kayɗini, ɓe ndilli, ɓe acci mo.
Nyalaade man Saduki'en, wi'anɓe maayɓe ummitittaako, ngari haa Yeesu. Ɓe ƴami mo
“Moodibbo, Muusa wi'i: To goɗɗo maayi, walaa ɓikkoy, sey deerɗiiko te'a debbo maako ngam haa o heɓana maayɗo ɓikkoy
Woodino haa amin deerɗiraaɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Arano te'i debbo, maayi, heɓaay ɓikkoy. Bana nii o accani deerɗiiko debbo maako.
Ɗum laati bana non dow ɗiɗaɓo, dow tataɓo haa yotti joweeɗiɗaɓo.
Ɓaawo maɓɓe fuu, debbo boo maayi.
Nyannde ummitineeki maayɓe kam, debbo oo laatanto moy caka maɓɓe? Nde nii ɓe fuu ɓe te'ino mo.”
Ammaa Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On ɗon mboofa masin! Ngam on anndaa ko winnda nder Defte Ceniiɗe, on anndaa baawɗe Allah boo.
To maayɓe ummitake, walaa teegal fahin, ammaa ɓe laatoto bana malaa'ika'en haa asama.
On njaŋngaay ko Allah wolwani on dow ummitineeki maayɓe na? O wi'i:
Min woni Allah Ibrahiima e Allah Isiyaaku e Allah Yaakubu. Mi Allah yeeɗɓe naa mo maayɓe
Ekkitinol maako hayɗini mooɓe nanɗe mo fuu.
Nde Farisa'en nani no Yeesu je'iniri Saduki'en, ɓe mooɓtotiri.
Gooto maɓɓe, moodibbo tawreeta waɗani Yeesu ƴamol ngo'ol ngam jarribaago mo:
“Moodibbo, umroore ndeye ɓuri mawnugo haa tawreeta?”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Yiɗ Jawmiraawo, Allah maaɗa bee ɓernde ma fuu, bee yoŋki ma fuu e bee hakkiilo ma fuu
Kayre woni umroore mawnde e arannde.
Ndaa ɗiɗawre nanndunde bee maare: Yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo maaɗa bana no a yiɗiri hoore ma
Tawreeta Muusa e ko annabi'en ngaazini fuu ɗon ndari dow umrooje ɗiɗi ɗe'e
Nde Farisa'en mooɓtotiri, Yeesu ƴami ɓe:
“Ko numoton dow Almasiihu? O ɓii moy?” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “O
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Kadi ngam ɗume Daawuda ewni mo Jawmiraawo bee baawɗe Ruuhu Allah? O wi'i:
Jawmiraawo wolwani jawmam:
Jooɗa haa nyaamo am,
haa to mi wallini konne'en maaɗa les kosɗe ma
Daawuda ewni mo Jawmiraawo, noy Almasiihu laatori ɓiyiiko kadi?”
Walaa mo waawi jaabaago mo koo wolde woore. Diga nyannde man koo moy huli ƴamugo mo ƴamɗe goɗɗe.
Nden Yeesu wolwani mooɓre e pukara'en muuɗum,
o wi'i: “Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en keɓi duŋayeere jaŋngingo yimɓe tawreeta Muusa.
Ɗowtane ɓe, mbaɗe ko ɓe mbi'ata on fuu, ammaa taa tokke kuuɗe maɓɓe, ngam ɓe mbaɗataa ko ɓe mbi'ata.
Ngam ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa doŋgle tedduɗe, ɓe ndoonda ɗe yimɓe, ammaa kamɓe ɓe meemataa ɗe koo bee hoondu maɓɓe.
Ɓe ɗon kuuwa kuuɗe maɓɓe fuu ngam haa yimɓe ndaara ɓe. Ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa filakterji
Ɓe ngiɗi joole marɗe saman haa pelle nyaamdu e joole tedduɗe nder cuuɗi dewal.
Ɓe ngiɗi hoofneego haa pelle kawte, yimɓe mbi'a ɓe: Moodibbo.
Ammaa onon, taa njaɓe ewneego Moodiɓɓe, ngam on fuu on deerɗiraaɓe e on ngoodi Moodibboojo gooto.
Taa ewne goɗɗo haa duniyaaru Baaba ngam on ngoodi Baabiraawo gooto, mo asama.
Taa ɗaɓɓe ewneego Ɗowooɓe, ngam on ngoodi Ɗowoowo gooto, kaŋko woni Almasiihu.
Ɓurɗo mawnugo caka mooɗon laatoto jaggiiɗo mooɗon
Koo moy mawnini hoore muuɗum, o leestinteeɗo. Koo moy leestini hoore muuɗum boo, o ɓaŋgteteeɗo
“Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On maɓɓani yimɓe feere dammugal laamu asamanji. Onon bee ko'e mooɗon boo on nastataa, on accataa yiɗɓe nastugo boo nasta ton.
Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon njaɓta marle rewɓe yurumɓe, yeeso yimɓe, on ɗon njuutina do'aaje mon. Ngam maajum on hiiteteeɓe kiita naawka.]

Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon mbaɗa jahaale dow lesdi e dow beeli ngam tefugo goɗɗo gooto mo yiɗi tokkaago diina mon. To o jaɓi, on ngartira mo ɓii-jahannamaajo haa ɓura on cowi ɗiɗi.
Bone laatanto on, onon wumɓe, ɗowooɓe wumɓe! On ɗon mbi'a: Koo moy hunori
Onon faataaɓe e wumɓe, ɗume ɓuri saman? Kaŋŋeeri naa malla haykaliiru ndu seni kaŋŋeeri man?
On ɗon mbi'a boo: Koo moy hunori hirsirde, ɗum meere, ammaa to o hunorake dokkal dow hirsirde, nden kam sey o hebbitina hunayeere maako.
Onon wumɓe, ɗume ɓuri saman? Dokkal naa malla hirsirde nde senata dokkal man?
Ngam maajum, mo hunori hirsirde, o hunorake hirsirde e ko woni dow maare fuu.
Mo hunori haykaliiru, o hunorake haykaliiru e Allah jooɗiiɗo nder maaru.
Mo hunori asama, o hunorake leeso laamu asamanji e Allah jooɗiiɗo dow maago fuu
Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon ittana Allah zakka koo haa haako minti e haako anisa e haako algaru
Onon wumɓe, ɗowooɓe wumɓe, on ɗon itta buubel nder njaram mooɗon, ammaa on ɗon moɗa ngeelooba!
Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon loota yaasi njardukoy mooɗon e yaasi taasaaje mooɗon, asee boo nder maaje ɗon heewi kuuje gujjaaɗe e suunooji mon.
Onon Farisa'en wumɓe, layɓe nder njardukoy mooɗon tawon, nden kam yaasi maakoy boo laaɓan.
Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon nanndi bee genaale ndanwinaaɗe, booɗɗe laareego, ammaa nder maaje ɗon heewi i'e maayɓe e nyolɗum fuu
Bana non onon boo, haa gite yimɓe on adili'en, ammaa ɓerɗe mooɗon ɗon keewi naafikaare e halleende fuu.”
“Bone laatanto on, onon moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Farisa'en, naafiki'en! On ɗon maha genaale annabi'en, on ɗon pawna genaale adili'en,
nden on ɗon mbi'a: To min ɗonno wakkati kaakiraaɓe amin, min kawtantaano ɓe ngam mbarugo annabi'en.
Bana nii on ɗon ceedano ko'e mooɗon on ɓiɓɓe yimɓe mbarnooɓe annabi'en ɓe'e.
Nden kam kebbitine ko kaakiraaɓe mooɗon puɗɗuno!
Onon boɗɗe, ɓiɓɓe poosokje! Noy on mbaawrata hisugo kiita jahannama

Ngam maajum mi ɗon nela, min bee hoore am, annabi'en e hikma'en e moodiɓɓe haa mooɗon. On mbaran woɗɓe, on ɓilan woɗɓe dow leggal gaafaaŋgal, woɗɓe boo on ɓoccan ɓe nder cuuɗi dewal mooɗon, on taasnan ɓe diga berniwol ngo'ol haa ngola.
Kiita ƴiiƴam adili'en ndufaaɗam nder duniyaaru fuu, diga ƴiiƴam Habila adiliijo, haa yotti ƴiiƴam Zekariya ɓii Barakiya mo on mbari hakkunde haykaliiru e hirsirde, do'oto dow mooɗon
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ɗum fuu ɗum waran dow yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u.”

“Urusaliima! Urusaliima! A mbari annabi'en, a fiɗi nelaaɓe ɓe Allah neli haa ma bee kaa'e. Nde ɗuuɗɗum mi yiɗino mooɓtugo yimɓe ma, bana no gertogal mooɓtirta ɓikkoy mum les bileeji mum, ammaa on cali.
Ndaa, suudu mooɗon laatoto winnde.
Mi ɗon wi'a on: Yeeso ɗo on ngi'ataa yam sam, haa yotto saa'i on mbi'ata: Barka laatano garanɗo bee innde Jawmiraawo
Yeesu wurti
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On ɗon ngi'a kuuje ɗe fuu na? Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Fakat, hayre luttataa dow hayre, ɓe ngibbinan koo ɗume fuu haa ɗo.”
Nde Yeesu ɗon jooɗi dow Hooseere Jaytunje, pukara'en maako ɓaditi mo, kamɓe feere maɓɓe, ɓe ƴami mo: “Yeccu min ndeye kuuje ɗe'e laatoto? Alaama kaye waŋginta saa'i loraaki ma e timmuki duniyaaru?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Kakkile, ngam taa goɗɗo majjina on.
Ngam ɗuuɗɓe ngaran bee innde am, ɓe mbi'an: Min woni Almasiihu. Ɓe majjinan yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
On nanan kubaruuji konuuji ɓadiiɗi e daayiiɗi. Kakkile, taa kultore. Doole ɗum laato, ammaa naa ɗum timmoode tawon.
Ummaatoore ummanto ummaatoore feere. Laamu ummanto laamu feere. Weelooji e dimmbanɗe lesdi mbaɗan haa nokkuuje feere feereeje.
Boneeji ɗi fuu laatoto bana fuɗɗam luuwe ɓesnanɗo.
Yimɓe naŋngan on, njahran on haa woɗɓe ngam ɓe torra on, ɓe mbara on. Ummaatooje fuu nganyan on daliila innde am.
Saa'i man ɗuuɗɓe accan nuɗɗingo yam, ɓe zammbotiran, ɓe nganyindiran.
Fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en ɗuuɗɓe mbaŋgan, ɓe majjinan yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Ngam halleende ɗuuɗan masin, yiide yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe feewtan.
Ammaa mo munyi haa timmoode, hisan
Kubaruwol belŋgol ngol laamu asamanji waazinte nder duniyaaru fuu, ngol laatanto ummaatooje seedamku, nden duniyaaru timman.”
“To on ngi'i nyidduɗum nattinoojum ko annabi Daniyel wolwino dow muuɗum ɗon dari haa nokkuure seniinde - mo jaŋngi ɗum, sey faama booɗɗum!
Nden kam sey wonɓe haa lesdi Yahudiya ndogga haa kooseeje.
Mo ɗon dow soorowol, taa jippo ngam hoocugo kuuje nder maagol.
Mo ɗon haa ngesa boo, taa loro haa saare ngam hoocugo limce mum
Kayto, bone laatanto reedu'en e musininanɓe nder nyannde man!
Tore Allah ngam taa doggudu mon laato saa'i duumol malla
Ngam saa'i man torra makka laatoto, irin maaka meeɗaay laataago diga duniyaaru jooɗi haa wargo jonta, ka meetataa laataago boo
To Allah ustaayno limgal nyalɗe man, walaa koo gooto hisanno. Ammaa o usti ɗe ngam daliila suɓaaɓe maako.
Wakkati man, to goɗɗo wi'i on: Ndaa Almasiihu haa ɗo! Malla: Ndaa mo haa to! Taa njaɓe.
Ngam fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe almasiihu'en malla ɓe annabi'en mbaŋgan, ɓe mbaɗan alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji mawɗi ngam majjingo koo suɓaaɓe Allah, to ɗum heɓoto.
Mi anndini on ɗum diga ɗum siwaa laataago.”
“To ɓe mbi'i on: Ndaa Almasiihu ɗon haa ladde! Taa njehe ton malla to ɓe mbi'i: O ɗon nyukki haa ɗo! Taa njaɓe ɗum.
Bana ma'ere ma'irta diga fuunaaŋge haa hiirnaaŋge, non boo nyalaade loraaki
Ngam haa nyawmande woni fuu, ton jigaaje mooɓtoto
Law ɓaawo nyalɗe ɓillaare go, naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru accan yaynugo, koode asama njanan, baawɗeeji asama boo ndimmboto
Nden alaama
O nelan malaa'ika'en maako, ɓe puufan luwal maŋngal, ɓe mooɓtan suɓaaɓe maako wonɓe haa alkibilaaji duniyaaru nayi fuu diga keerol asama ngo'ol haa ngola.”
“Paame ko ibbi anndinta on: To lice maaki kesɗiti, haakooji maaki boo mbiliti, on anndi duumol ɓadake.
Bana non onon boo, to on ngi'i kuuje ɗe'e ɗon laato, annde o ɓadake wargo.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatoto hiddeko yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u fuu maayda.
Asama e lesdi njinnan, ammaa bolle am njinnataa sam.”
“Walaa neɗɗo anndi nyalaade maajum malla saa'i man. Koo malaa'ika'en haa asama, koo
Ko laatino zamanu Nuuhu, ɗum waɗan saa'i loraaki
Nde ilam tuufaana siwaano wargo, yimɓe ɗonno nyaama, ɗonno njara, ɗonno ɓaŋga e ɗonno te'a haa nyalaade Nuuhu nasti koommbowal
Ɓe anndaa sam, haa ndiyam wari, halki ɓe fuu. Bana non loraaki
Saa'i man ɗiɗo ngondan haa ngesa, gooto hoo'e, gooto acce.
Rewɓe ɗiɗo namdan dow namarde, gooto hoose, gooto acce.
Ngam maajum ayne, nde nii on anndaa nyalaade loraaki Jawmiraawo mooɗon.
A anndi booɗɗum to jawmu saare anndino saa'iire ndeye gujjo warata, o ɗaanataakono, o accataano gujjo nasta saare maako.
Ngam maajum laate taaskiiɓe onon boo, ngam Ɓii-neɗɗo waran nder saa'iire nde on tammaaki sam
“Kadi, moy woni kuuwoowo koolaaɗo, kakkilɗo mo jaagorɗo mum halfini ɗum huuwooɓe saare mum, haa o hokka ɓe nyaamdu to saa'i man yottake?
Barka laatanto kuuwoowo oo, to jaagorɗo maako warti, tawti mo o ɗon suklani kuugal nga'al.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Jaagorɗo darnan mo dow jawdi muuɗum fuu.
Ammaa to kuuwoowo oo o kalluɗo, o numi: Jaagorɗo am wartataa law,
o fuɗɗi fiyugo huuwooɓe wonduɓe bee maako, o ɗon nyaamda e o ɗon yarda bee wuykooɓe,
nden jaagorɗo maako wartan nyalaade nde o tammaaki, nder saa'iire nde o anndaa boo.
Jaagorɗo maako torran mo torra caatuka, hokkan mo ngeenaari naafiki'en. Kaŋko o woyan, o hirƴindiran nyii'e ngam bone.”
“Saa'i man laamu asamanji nanndan bee faanyɓe rewɓe sappo. Ɓe koo'i pittirlaaji maɓɓe, ɓe ngurti ngam fottoygo bee ɓaŋɗo
Njowo nder maɓɓe faataaɓe, njowo luttuɓe boo hakkilɓe.
Faataaɓe ngaddi pittirlaaji muuɗum'en, ammaa ɓe njogaaki nebbam ngoɗɗam.
Hakkilɓe ngaddi pittirlaaji muuɗum'en, ɓe njogi nebbam ngoɗɗam nder paali boo.
Nde ɓaŋɗo waraay law, faanyɓe rewɓe ɓe'e fuu ngoŋngi, ɗaani.”
Caka jemma ɓe nani hoolo: “Ndaa ɓaŋɗo! Umme, njaɓɓe mo.”
Ɓe fuu ɓe pini, ɓe taaskitini pittirlaaji maɓɓe.
Faataaɓe mbi'i hakkilɓe: Useni ndokke min haa nebbam mooɗon seɗɗa, ngam pittirlaaji amin ɗon nyifa!
Hakkilɓe njaabi ɓe: Ɗum waɗataako! Ngam ɗum he'ataa en fuu, ndikka on njaha haa soorrooɓe, on coodoya.
Faataaɓe ndilli soodoygo nebbam, wakkati man boo ɓaŋɗo yotti. Faanyɓe taaskitiiɓe nastidi bee maako nder suudu ɓaŋgal. Nden dammugal maɓɓaama.
Nde neeɓi seɗɗa, faanyɓe rewɓe luttuɓe go ngari, ɓe tappi dammugal: Jaagorɗo! Jaagorɗo! Maɓɓitan min!
Ammaa o jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Mi anndaa on
Ngam maajum ayne, ngam on anndaa nyalaade koo saa'i maajum.”
“Ɗum laatoto bana goɗɗo mo yiɗi dillugo jahaaŋgal. O ewni huuwooɓe maako, o halfini ɓe mardi maako.
O hokki gooto ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi, gooto teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi, tataɓo boo teemerre, haa koo moy maɓɓe fuu deydey semmbe muuɗum. Nden o dilli.
Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi dilli law, waɗi filu bee maaje. O heɓi riba ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi goɗɗe.
Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi dilli, waɗi bana man boo. O heɓi riba ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi goɗɗe.
Ammaa keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemerre dilli, wasi lesdi, nyukkini ceede jaagorɗo mum ton.
Nde neeɓi jaagorɗo huuwooɓe go wartoyi, o ƴami ɓe lisaafi ceede maako.
Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi go ɓaditi, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, a hokki yam ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe jowi. Ndaa, mi heɓi riba teemeɗɗe jowi goɗɗe.
Jaagorɗo maako wi'i mo: Booɗɗum, a kuuwoowo booɗɗo, koolaaɗo! A waŋgini adilaaku ma nder kuuje seɗɗa, mi halfinte kuuje ɗuuɗɗe. War, seyoda bee am!
Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi go ɓaditi, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, a hokki yam ceede kaŋŋeeri teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi. Ndaa mi heɓi riba teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi goɗɗe.
Jaagorɗo maako wi'i: Booɗɗum, a kuuwoowo booɗɗo, koolaaɗo, a huuwi booɗɗum bee kuuje seɗɗa, mi halfinte kuuje ɗuuɗɗe. War, seyoda bee am!
Keɓɗo ceede kaŋŋeeri teemerre boo wari, wi'i: Jaagorɗo, mi anndi a goɗɗo caatuɗo, a ɗon soda haa a aawaay, a ɗon mooɓta boo haa a saakaay.
Mi huli, mi yehi, mi nyukkini ceede ma nder lesdi. Ndaa ceede ma.
Jaagorɗo maako wi'i mo: A kuuwoowo kalluɗo, mbaateendamjo! A anndi mi ɗon soda haa mi aawaay, mi ɗon mooɓta haa mi saakaay,
haandino a resa ceede am haa sigooɓe ceede, to mi warti mi heɓtanno ɗe am bee riba.
Njaɓte ceede kaŋŋeeri teemerre go haa maako, ndokke ɗe haa mo mari ceede kaŋŋeeri ujineere!
Ngam koo moy marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo haa o wona nder jeynitaare, ammaa mo walaa koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum maako
Ammaa kuuwoowo meereejo go, ngudine mo yaasi nder nyiɓre. O woya, o hirƴindira nyii'e ton
“To
Ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu mooɓtoto yeeso maako, o senndan yimɓe bana gaynaako senndirta baali bee be'i.
O darnan baali haa nyaamo maako, be'i boo haa nano maako.
Nden laamiiɗo wi'an wonɓe haa nyaamo muuɗum: Ngare, onon barkiɗinaaɓe Baabiraawo am, ndone laamu taaskitinaaŋgu ngam mooɗon diga tageeki duniyaaru.
Ngam mi beelaaɗono, on nyaamni yam, mi ɗomɗuɗono, on njarni yam, mi koɗono, on mbeerni yam,
mi walaano limce, on ɓorni yam, mi nyawɗono, on ngilli yam, mi kaɓɓaaɗono nder suudu fursina
Nden adili'en ɓe'e ƴaman mo: Jawmiraawo, ndey min ngi'i ma a beelaaɗo, min nyaamni ma? Malla a ɗomɗuɗo, min njarni ma?
Ndey min ngi'i ma a koɗo, min mbeerni ma? Malla a walaa limce, min ɓorni ma?
Ndey min ngi'i ma a nyawɗo malla a kaɓɓaaɗo nder suudu fursina, min ngilli ma?
Laamiiɗo jaaboto ɓe: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ko on mbaɗani gooto nder deerɗiraaɓe am ɓurɓe leesugo ɓe'e, min on mbaɗani.
Nden laamiiɗo wi'an wonɓe haa nano muuɗum: Ndaayeeɗam, onon naalaaɓe! Ndille nder yiite duumiiŋge, taaskitinaaŋge ngam Iblisa e malaa'ika'en muuɗum.
Ngam mi beelaaɗono, on nyaamnaay yam, mi ɗomɗuɗono, on njarnaay yam.
Mi koɗono, on mbeernaay yam, mi walaano limce, on ɓornaay yam, mi nyawɗono, mi kaɓɓaaɗono haa suudu fursina, on ngillaaki yam.
Nden ɓe ƴaman mo: Jawmiraawo, ndey min ngi'i ma a beelaaɗo malla a ɗomɗuɗo, a koɗo malla a walaa limce, a nyawɗo malla a kaɓɓaaɗo nder suudu fursina, min cuklanaaki ma?
Laamiiɗo jaaboto ɓe: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Ko on mbaɗanaay gooto nder yimɓe am ɓurɓe leesugo ɓe'e, min on cali waɗango ɗum.
Kamɓe ɓe nastan haa yaŋgada nduumiika, ammaa adili'en go keɓan ngeendam nduumiiɗam
Nde Yeesu timmini wolwugo bolle ɗe'e fuu, o wi'i pukara'en maako:
“On anndi lutti nyalɗe ɗiɗi haa juulde
Saa'i man mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en ummaatoore kawti haa saare Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en.
Ɓe carwootiri haa ɓe ƴoyra Yeesu, ɓe naŋnga mo, ɓe mbara mo.
Ammaa ɓe mbi'i: “Taa en mbaɗa ɗum wakkati juulde, ngam taa ɗum ummina fitina caka ummaatoore.”
Yaake Yeesu ɗonno haa Baytaniya nder saare Simon, kuturuujo,
debbo feere ɓaditi mo. O ɗon jogi faandu saɗndu heewndu uurdi marndi saman masin. O rufi ndi dow hoore Yeesu saa'i o ɗonno nyaama
Nde pukara'en ngi'i ɗum, ɓe ɓerni, ɓe mbi'i: “Wonnuru meere, ko ɗum nafi!
To ɓe coorrino uurdi man, ɓe keɓanno ceede ɗuuɗɗe, haa ɓe ndokka ɗe talaka'en.”
Nde Yeesu anndi ko ɓe mbolwata, o wi'i ɓe: “Koni on ɗon pitina debbo oo? O huuwani yam kuugal booɗŋgal.
Ngam talaka'en ngondan bee mooɗon foroy, ammaa min, mi wondataa bee mooɗon foroy
O rufi uurdi dow ɓanndu am ngam uweeki am.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Haa ɓe ngaazoto Linjiila ka'a nder duniyaaru fuu, ɓe mbolwan ko debbo oo waɗi, ngam siftorgo mo.”
Nden gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo mo innde muuɗum Yahuuda Iskariyot, yehi haa mawɓe liman'en.
O wi'i ɓe: “Ɗume on ndokkatammi to mi hokki on Yeesu?” Ɓe limani mo ceede cardi cappanɗe tati.
Diga saa'i man Yahuuda fuɗɗi tefugo saa'iire fottannde haa o hokka ɓe Yeesu.
Nder nyalaade go'oore juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, pukara'en Yeesu ɓaditi, ƴami mo: “Haa toy a yiɗi min mbaɗa taaskara kiirtaari
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Njehe nder berniwol, haa wayne, mbi'e mo: Moodibbo wi'i: Wakkati am wari, mi yiɗi waɗugo juulde Paska bee pukara'en am haa saare maaɗa.”
Pukara'en mbaɗi ko Yeesu umri ɓe, ɓe taaskitini kiirtaari Paska.
Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, Yeesu jooɗodi bee pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo ngam haa ɓe nyaama.
Nde ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu wi'i: Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: “Gooto mooɗon zammboto yam.”
Ɗum suni pukara'en masin, koo moy maɓɓe fuɗɗi ƴamugo mo: “Naa ɗum min sika, Jawmiraawo?”
Yeesu jaabi: “Mo ɗon suuwa juŋngo mum bee am nder le'al jonta, kaŋko zammboto yam
Gooŋga
Yahuuda zammbotooɗo mo ƴami: “Naa ɗum min sika, Moodibbo?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Bana mbi'ɗa, ɗum an!”
Nde ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu hoo'i tamseere, o yetti Allah, o yewi nde, o hokki pukara'en maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Koo'e ɗum, nyaame, ɗum ɓanndu am.”
Nden o hoo'i jardugel, o yetti Allah, o hokki ɓe, o wi'i: “Njare on fuu,
ngam ɗum ƴiiƴam am, ndufaaɗam ngam yaafuye hakkeeji yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, bee maajam Allah tabitiniri alkawal muuɗum
Mi ɗon wi'a on: Yeeso ɗo, mi meetataa yarugo inaboojam ɗa'am sam, haa nyannde njardanmi kesam bee mooɗon nder laamu Baabiraawo am.”
Nden ɓe ngimi gime maŋgtooje, ɓe ndilli haa Hooseere Jaytunje.
Dow laawol Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Jemmaare nde'e on accatam on fuu. Ngam Deftere wi'i: Mi mbaran gaynaako, tokkere baali boo saŋkititto
Ammaa to mi ummitake, mi aartan on yahugo lesdi Galiili
Piyer wi'i mo: “Koo to yimɓe fuu acci ma, min kam mi accataa ma sam!”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Gooŋga mbi'anmaami: Jemmaare nde'e, hiddeko asgumri
Piyer wi'i mo: “Mi meeɗataa wi'go mi anndaa ma koo to doole mi maayda bee maaɗa.” Pukara'en luttuɓe fuu mbi'i non.
Nden Yeesu wardi bee pukara'en muuɗum haa nokkuure wi'eteende Gecemane, o wi'i ɓe: “Njooɗe haa ɗo, haa mi waɗoya do'a haa to.”
O yahdi bee Piyer e ɓiɓɓe Zebede ɗiɗo, o fuɗɗi sunaago e maatugo torra nder ɓernde maako.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Torra ɓernde am yiɗi mbarugo yam. Tokke jooɗaago haa ɗo, ayne bee am.”
O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o hippi yeeso maako haa lesdi, o waɗi do'a bana ni'i: “Baabiraawo am, to ɗum heɓoto, daaynanam jardugel torra nge'el. Ammaa waɗ ko ngiɗɗa, naa ko ngiɗmi.”
O lori haa pukara'en tato go, o tawi ɓe ɗaanake. O wi'i Piyer: “On mbaawaay aynugo bee am koo saa'a ngoota!
Ayne, tore, ngam taa on nasta jarribeeki. Ko ruuhu neɗɗo yiɗi, ɓanndu muuɗum waawataa waɗugo ɗum, ngam ndu tampundu.”
O yehi ɗiɗawre, o waɗi do'a bana ni'i: “Baabiraawo am, to heɓataako jardugel ngel daayo, accammi, nden kam sey mi yara ngel, muuyo maaɗa laato.”
O lorti haa pukara'en maako fahin, o tawi ɓe ɓe ɗon ɗaani, ngam gite maɓɓe teddi.
O acci ɓe, o yehi fahin, o waɗi do'a kal-kal bana naane.
Nden o lorti haa pukara'en maako, o wi'i ɓe: “On ɗon ɗaani haa jonta na? On ɗon ciwto na? Ndaa saa'i waɗi haa ɓe ndokka
Umme, ndillen! Ndaa zammbotooɗo yam ɓaditake.”
Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, Yahuuda, gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo wari. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngardi bee maako, ɓe ɗon njogi kaafaaje e cabbi. Mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en neli ɓe.
Yahuuda, zammbotooɗo Yeesu, hokkuno ɓe alaama, wi'i: “Mo mi hebbata, ɗum kaŋko, naŋnge mo.”
Law Yahuuda ɓaditi Yeesu, wi'i mo: “Sannu, moodibbo!” Nden o hebbi mo.
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Soobaajo, timmin ko waddu ma haa ɗo.” Nden yimɓe ɓaditi, ukki dow Yeesu, naŋngi ɗum.
Gooto nder wonduɓe bee Yeesu losi kaafahi muuɗum, fe'i suka hooreejo liman'en, ta'i mo nofru.
Ammaa Yeesu wi'i mo: “Waatu kaafahi maaɗa haa suudu maaki! Ngam hoosanɓe kaafahi kalkiran bee maaki.
Malla a anndaa mi waawanno toraago Baabiraawo am ballal, kaŋko boo o neldanno yam mooɓe malaa'ika'en mawɗe sappo e ɗiɗi na?
Ammaa to non kam, noy ko winnda nder Defte Ceniiɗe gooŋɗirta? Ngam ɗe mbi'i sey ɗum laato bana nii.”
Saa'i man, Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On ngari naŋngugo yam bee kaafaaje e cabbi bana mi pasoowo! Tum mi ɗonno jooɗi nder
Ammaa ɗum fuu ɗum waɗi ngam haa ko winnda nder defte annabi'en ngooŋɗa.” Nden pukara'en fuu acci mo, ndoggi.
Naŋnguɓe Yeesu njahri mo haa saare Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en. Moodiɓɓe tawreeta e Ndotti'en ɗon mooɓi ton.
Piyer tokki Yeesu haa daayiiɗum, haa yotti daldal saare hooreejo liman'en. O nasti saare, o jooɗodi bee aynooɓe ton, haa o laara no ɗum timmirta.
Mawɓe liman'en e hiitooɓe nder dawriinde fuu ɗaɓɓi wullaandu dow Yeesu haa ɓe ndo'a mo kiita maayde.
Ammaa ɓe keɓaay, koo nde seedooɓe fewooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari. Ɓaawoɗon yimɓe ɗiɗo ngari,
mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo wi'no: Mi waawan yibbingo haykaliiru Allah, mi mahita ndu nder nyalɗe tati
Hooreejo liman'en ummi, wi'i Yeesu: “A jaabataako koo ɗume na? Ko mbi'ɗa dow gullaali wulliiɓe ma ɓe'e?”
Ammaa Yeesu jeeɗi. Nden hooreejo liman'en wi'i mo: “Mi ɗon hunne bee innde Allah geeto, wi' min: An woni Almasiihu,
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Nonnon, bana mbi'ɗa. Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: Yeeso ɗo, on ngi'an
Nden hooreejo liman'en seeki limce muuɗum, wi'i: “O wolwi kalluka dow Allah! En ngalaa haaje seedooɓe feere, kalluka ka on nani jonta he'i.
Ko mbi'ɗon?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “O he'i mbareego
Nden ɓe tuuti mo tuuɗe haa yeeso, ɓe lukki mo bee juuɗe, ɓe maari mo,
ɓe mbi'i: “An Almasiihu, heɓtu mo fiyi ma, to a annabiijo
Piyer ɗonno jooɗi haa daldal saare go, nden korɗo hooreejo liman'en wari haa maako, wi'i mo: “An boo a ɗonno wondi bee Yeesu mo Galiili.”
Ammaa Piyer yeddi ɗum yeeso yimɓe fuu, wi'i: “Mi anndaa ko a yiɗi wi'go.”
Nde o yehi gal dammugal zawleeru, debbo feere yi'i mo, wi'i yimɓe wonɓe ton: “Goɗɗo oo ɗonno wondi bee Yeesu mo Nasaratu.”
Piyer yeddi fahin, wi'i: “Mi hunake, gooŋga mi anndaa mo.”
Yeeso seɗɗa, yimɓe dariiɓe ton ngari haa Piyer, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Fakat a gooto maɓɓe, ɗemŋgal maaɗa ɗon waŋgina ɗum bee laaɓɗum.”
Nden Piyer wi'i: “Allah hiito yam to mi fewi. Mi hunake, gooŋga mi anndaa gorko oo!” Saa'i man nden, asgumri
Piyer siftori ko Yeesu wi'no mo: “Hiddeko asgumri u'a, a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.” O wurti haa yaasi, o woyi masin.
Fajiri cub, mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en fuu ndawri mbarugo Yeesu.
Ɓe kaɓɓi mo, ɓe njahri mo haa ngomna Pilaatu.
Nde Yahuuda, zammbiiɗo Yeesu yi'i ɓe ndo'i Yeesu kiita, o mimsiti, o wartiri ceede cardi cappanɗe tati go haa mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en.
O wi'i ɓe: “Mi waɗi hakke, ngam mi zammbi goɗɗo mo walaa aybe.” Ammaa ɓe mbi'i mo: “Walaa ko yaali min! Ɗum haala maaɗa!”
Yahuuda wudini ceede go nder
Mawɓe liman'en koo'i ceede go, ɓe mbi'i: “Tawreeta duŋanaaki en nastingo ceede ɗe'e nder ndesaari haykaliiru, ngam ɗum ceede ƴiiƴam.”
Ɓe ndawri, ɓe coodi ngesa mahoowo payanɗe bee maaje, ngam uwugo jananɓe ton.
Ngam maajum ɓe ɗon ewno ngesa man Ngesa-ƴiiƴam haa wargo hannde
Bana nii ko annabi Yeremiya wi'i, hiɓɓi: “Ɓe koo'i ceede cardi cappanɗe tati, coggu ngu yimɓe Isra'iila ndarni ngam maako,
ɓe coodi ngesa mahoowo payanɗe, bana Jawmiraawo umrino yam
Ɓe ndarni Yeesu yeeso Pilaatu ngomnaajo. Nden o ƴami mo: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Nonnon, bana mbi'ɗa.”
Ammaa yaake mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en ngulli mo, o jaabaaki sam.
Nden Pilaatu ƴami mo: “A nanaay gullaali ɗi ɓe ngulli ma fuu na?”
Ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo koo wolde woore, haa ngomnaajo hayɗini masin.
Nde juulde
Saa'i man woodino kaɓɓaaɗo nanaaɗo, innde maako Barabbas.
Nden Pilaatu ƴami yimɓe mooɓtiiɓe: “Moy on ngiɗi mi yoofana on? Barabbas naa malla Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu?”
Ngam o anndi ɓe njahri Yeesu haa maako daliila kaajal.
Saa'i Pilaatu ɗon jooɗi haa leeso kiita, debbo maako neli goɗɗo haa maako, wi'i mo: “Taa waɗ gorko adiliijo oo koo ɗume. Ngam jemmaare nde'e mi hoyɗi dow haala maako, ɗum ɓilli yam masin.”
Mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en irni mooɓe fuu haa ɓe ƴama o yoofa Barabbas, o mbara Yeesu.
Ngomna ƴami ɓe fahin: “Moy caka yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e on ngiɗi mi yoofana on?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Yoofan min Barabbas!”
O ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume mi waɗata Yeesu bi'eteeɗo Almasiihu kadi?” Ɓe njaabi ɓe fuu: “Ɓil mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Pilaatu ƴami ɓe: “Halleende ndeye o waɗi?” Ammaa ɓe ɓesdi wookugo bee sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Nde Pilaatu yi'i o waawataa waɗugo koo ɗume, hoolo boo ɗon ɓesdo, o hoo'i ndiyam, o looti juuɗe maako yeeso mooɓre nde'e, o wi'i: “Mi laaɓɗo e ƴiiƴam goɗɗo oo, ɗum haala mooɗon
Ummaatoore fuu wi'i: “Ƴiiƴam maako yowo dow amin e ɓiɓɓe amin!”
Nden Pilaatu yoofani ɓe Barabbas, o umri ɓe, ɓe ɓocci Yeesu, o hokki mo haa juuɗe maɓɓe ngam haa ɓe ɓila mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Sooje'en Pilaatu ngomnaajo njahri Yeesu haa laamorde, sooje'en wonɓe nder yeɓre woore fuu mooɓti dow maako.
Ɓe ɓorti mo, ɓe moji mo mojaare woɗeere,
ɓe mbaɗi meetaleewol gi'e, ɓe njo'ini ngol dow hoore maako, ɓe ndokki mo sawru haa juŋngo maako nyaamo. Nden ɓe tuggi koppi yeeso maako, ɓe njanci mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Allah woonane, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en!”
Ɓe tuuti mo tuuɗe, ɓe njaɓti sawru haa juŋngo maako go, ɓe piyi mo bee maaru haa hoore.
Nde ɓe timmini jancugo mo, ɓe ɓorti mo mojaare go, ɓe ɓorni mo limce maako, ɓe njahri mo ngam haa ɓe ɓila mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Nde ɓe ɗon ngurto, ɓe potti bee goɗɗo Sirene, innde maako Simon. Ɓe ndooli mo roondaago gaafaaŋgal Yeesu.
Ɓe njotti haa nokkuure wi'eteende Golgota, bana wi'go Gumbal-hoore.
Ton ɓe ndokki mo inaboojam njillindiraaɗam bee ndiyam kaaɗɗam, ngam haa o yara. Ammaa nde Yeesu metti ɗam, o sali yarugo.
Ɓe ɓili mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ɓe cenndi limce maako hakkunde maɓɓe bee waɗugo kur'u
Nden ɓe njooɗi ton, ɓe ayni mo.
Ɓe mbinndi daliila kiita maako dow alluha, ɓe ɓili ka haa dow hoore maako: “Oo woni Yeesu, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Ɓe ɓildi fasooɓe ɗiɗo bee maako, gooto haa nyaamo maako, gooto boo haa nano maako.
Saalotooɓe ton ndimmbini ko'e muuɗum'en, kuɗi mo
mbi'i: “A wi'no a yibbinan haykaliiru, a mahtoto ndu nder nyalɗe tati. Hisnu hoore ma! To a
Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ndotti'en boo njanci mo, mbi'i:
“O hisni yimɓe feere, o waawataa hisnugo hoore maako. Naa o laamiiɗo Isra'iila na? Sey o jippo jonta diga leggal gaafaaŋgal haa en nuɗɗina mo.
O ɗon hooli Allah, o wi'i o Ɓiɗɗo maako. Booɗɗum, sey en ndaara to Allah yiɗi hisnugo mo jonta
Fasooɓe ɓildaaɓe bee maako boo kallini mo bana non.
Diga caka nyalawma nyiɓre waɗi dow lesdi fuu, haa yotti saa'a tati.
Deydey saa'a tati Yeesu hooli bee sawtu, wi'i: “
Woɗɓe dariiɓe ton nani ɗum, mbi'i: “O ɗon ewno Eliya!”
Gooto maɓɓe doggi law, hoo'i irin sooso, suuwi ɗum nder lammuɗam, o ɓaŋgti ɗum bee loosol haa hunnduko Yeesu haa o yara
Ammaa woɗɓe mbi'i: “Sey en ndeena haa en ndaara to Eliya waran ngam hisnugo mo.”
Yeesu hooli bee sawtu fahin, nden o maayi.
Wakkati man wiirndallo nder
genaale maɓɓiti, senaaɓe maaynooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ummiti diga maayde.
Ɓe ngurti genaale ɓaawo ummitineeki Yeesu, ɓe nasti nder berniwol ceniiŋgol, ɓe mbaŋgani yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
Nde ardiiɗo dow sooje'en Roma teemerre e aynooɓe woɗɓe wonduɓe bee muuɗum ngi'i dimmbannde lesdi bee ko waɗi fuu, ɓe kultori masin, ɓe mbi'i: “Fakat, kaŋko woni
Rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗonno ton, ɓe ndari daayiiɗum, ɓe ɗon ndaara, ɓe tokkino Yeesu diga lesdi Galiili ngam huuwango mo.
Mariyama mo wuro Magdala e Mariyama, daada Yaakuba e Yusufu e daada ɓiɓɓe Zebede ɗon nder maɓɓe
Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, goɗɗo diskuɗo mo wuro Arimatiya wari. Innde maako Yusufu, kaŋko boo o pukaraajo Yeesu.
O yehi haa Pilaatu, o ƴami mo ɓanndu Yeesu. Pilaatu umri ɓe ndokka mo ndu.
Yusufu hoosi ndu, hasni ndu bee kasa kesa.
Nden o wallini ndu nder yenaande hesre nde o wasino nder tapaare ngam hoore maako. O talli hayre mawnde, o maɓɓi yenaande go bee maare, o dilli.
Mariyama mo Magdala e Mariyama goɗɗo ɗon njooɗi ton, ɗon tiiti yenaande.
Jaŋngo man, ɓaawo nyalaade taaskara, mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en kawti, njehi haa Pilaatu.
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Barkaama, min ciftori, nde pewoowo oo geetono, o wi'i: Ɓaawo nyalɗe tati mi ummititto diga maayde

Ndikka a umra ɓe ayna yenaande maako nyalɗe tati, ngam taa pukara'en maako ngara, ngujja ɓanndu maako, nden ɓe mbi'a ummaatoore: O ummitake diga maayde. Fewre ɓaawoore nde'e ɓuran aranndeere hallugo.”
Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa sooje'en. Njehe, ayne yenaande bana on mbaawi fuu.”
Ɓe njehi, ɓe ayni yenaande, ɓe mbaɗi lammba ngomna dow hayre nde ɓe maɓɓiri yenaande. Ɓe ndarni sooje'en aynooɓe ton.
Ɓaawo
Dimmbannde lesdi mawnde waɗi, ngam malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo jippi diga asama, ɓaditi, talli hayre go, jooɗi dow maare.
Jaati maako ɗon yayna bana ma'ere, limce maako boo daneeje bana hottollo.
Nde aynooɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe kultori masin, ɓe ndiwtori, ɓe laati bana maayɓe.
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i rewɓe: “Taa kultore onon kam, ngam mi anndi on ɗon ɗaɓɓita Yeesu gaafaaɗo.
O walaaɗon haa ɗo, o ummitake diga maayde bana o wi'no. Ngare, ndaare nokkuure haa o waalino.
Nden njehe law, mbi'e pukara'en maako: O ummitake diga maayde, o aartan on yahugo lesdi Galiili, on ngi'an mo ton. Kanjum ngeccumi on!”
Rewɓe ndilli diga yenaande bee jaawal, ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewi kulol e seyo maŋngo. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe njahri habaru man haa pukara'en Yeesu.
Nden Yeesu fotti bee maɓɓe, wi'i: “Mi hoofni on!” Rewɓe ɓaditi mo, naŋngi kosɗe maako, cujidani mo.
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore! Njehe, anndine deerɗam'en, ɓe njaha haa lesdi Galiili, ton ɓe ngi'atammi!”
Nde rewɓe go ɗon ndilla, woɗɓe nder sooje'en aynooɓe yenaande go njehi nder berniwol. Ɓe ngecci mawɓe liman'en ko waɗi fuu.
Mawɓe ɓe'e carwootiri bee ndotti'en. Nde ɓe narri, ɓe ndokki sooje'en go ceede ɗuuɗɗe,
ɓe mbi'i ɓe: “Mbi'e: Pukara'en maako ngari jemma, ɓe ngujji ɓanndu maako saa'i min ɗonno ɗaani.
To ngomna nani haala ka, min keɓtan dabare de'itingo mo, min kisnan on bone fuu.”
Sooje'en go njaɓi ceede man, mbaɗi bana ɓe tinndini ɓe. Geccawol ngol saŋkiti caka Yahuudu'en haa wargo hannde.
Pukara'en sappo e go'o ndilli haa lesdi Galiili, haa hooseere nde Yeesu umruno ɓe ɓe njaha ton
Nde ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe cujidani mo, ammaa woɗɓe maɓɓe ceki.
Yeesu ɓaditi ɓe, wi'i: “Baawɗe haa asama e dow lesdi fuu ndokkaama yam.
Ndille haa yimɓe ummaatooje fuu, mbaɗe ɓe pukara'en am, mbaɗane ɓe baptisma bee innde Baabiraawo e
Ekkitine ɓe haa ɓe tokko ko mi umri on fuu. Min mi ɗon wondi bee mooɗon nyalɗe fuu haa yotto timmuki duniyaaru.”
Haa ɗo Kubaruwol Belŋgol dow Yeesu Almasiihu Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuɗɗi.
