Bana ko winnda nder deftere annabi Esaaya: “Allah wi'i: Ndaa mi ɗon nela nelaaɗo am yeeso ma, ngam o mo'ina laawol maaɗa
Goɗɗo ɗon hoola nder ladde:
Mo'inane Jawmiraawo laawol.
Mbaɗane mo buuwi darnuɗi
Bana non Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma waŋgi nder ladde, o ɗon waazina yimɓe, o ɗon wi'a ɓe: “Tuube, njaɓe baptisma, Allah boo yaafanto on hakkeeji mooɗon.”
Lesdi Yahudiya e yimɓe Urusaliima fuu ngari haa Yuhanna, ɓe mbaŋgini hakkeeji maɓɓe, nden Yuhanna waɗani ɓe baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
Yuhanna ɗon ɓorni limce kuuwraaɗe bee gaasa ngeelooba, o ɗon taadi taadorgol laral, baɓɓatti e njumri ladde ngoni nyaamdu maako
Nder waazu maako, o wi'i: “Goɗɗo waran ɓaawo am. Kaŋko o ɓuratam daraja, koo turaago fiista ɓoggi paɗe maako mi he'aay.
Min mi waɗani on baptisma bee ndiyam, ammaa kaŋko o waɗanan on baptisma bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.”
Nder nyalɗe maajum Yeesu wari diga Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili, Yuhanna waɗani mo baptisma nder maayo Urdun.
Wakkati Yeesu ɗon wurto ndiyam, o yi'i asamanji maɓɓiti, Ruuhu Allah ɗon jippo dow maako bana poola.
Sawtu iwi diga asamanji, wi'i: “An woni
Law Ruuhu Allah dilliri Yeesu nder ladde.
O jooɗi ton nyalɗe cappanɗe nayi, Sayɗaanu ɗon jarribo mo. O ɗon wondi bee dabbaaji ladde, malaa'ika'en boo ɗon kuuwana mo.
Ɓaawo naŋngeeki Yuhanna, Yeesu wari haa lesdi Galiili, o waazi Linjiila Allah,
o wi'i: “Saa'i waɗi, laamu Allah ɓaditake, tuube, nuɗɗine Linjiila
Nde Yeesu tokki laawol kommbi weendu Galiili, o yi'i Simon e deerɗiraawo mum Andire, ɓe ɗon ngubo zubaaji
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Tokkeeɗam, mi waɗan on waawooɓe yimɓe.”
Law ɓe acci zubaaji maɓɓe, ɓe tokki mo.
Nde o yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o yi'i deerɗiraaɓe ɗiɗo, Yaakuba e Yuhanna, ɓiɓɓe Zebede. Ɓe ɗon nder koommbowal
O ewni ɓe, law ɓe acci baaba maɓɓe Zebede e huuwooɓe maako nder koommbowal, ɓe tokki mo.
Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum nasti berniwol Kafarnahum. Nde
Heɗitiiɓe ekkitinol maako kayɗini masin, ngam o ekkitini ɓe bee baawɗe, naa bana moodiɓɓe tawreeta
Woodino nder suudu man goɗɗo mo ruuhuwol coɓŋgol torri, o wooki.
O wi'i: “An Yeesu Nasaratuujo, ko yaalu ma bee amin? A wari ngam halkugo min na? Mi anndi fakat, a Ceniiɗo nelaaɗo Allah.”
Yeesu telɓani ruuhu coɓŋgu, wi'i: “Jeeɗa, wurta nder maako.”
Ngu ɓosli gorko go, nden ngu wooki, ngu wurti diga maako.
Yimɓe fuu kayɗini, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri: “Ɗum ɗume? Ɗum ekkitinol kesol bee baawɗe! Goɗɗo oo ɗon umra koo ruuhuuji coɓɗi ɗi ɗowtano mo!”
Law habaru Yeesu saŋkiti koo toy fuu nder lesdi Galiili.
Ɓe ngurti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, law ɓe njehi haa saare Simon e Andire. Yaakuba e Yuhanna njahdi bee maako.
Esiraawo Simon debbo ɗon waali o nyawɗo yontere. Nde Yeesu wari, ɓe ngecci mo haala nyawu maako.
Yeesu yehi haa maako, naŋngi juŋngo maako, ummini mo. O yamɗiti, o weerni ɓe.
Nde naaŋge muti, yimɓe ngaddi nyawɓe e marɓe ginnaaji fuu haa Yeesu.
Ummaatoore berniwol man fuu mooɓi haa yolnde saare.
Yeesu yamɗitini nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe e nyawuji maɓɓe feere feere, o riiwi boo ginnaaji ɗuuɗɗi. O accaay ginnaaji ɗi mbolwa koo ɗume, ngam ɗi anndi mo.
Jaŋngo maajum Yeesu dawi cub. O wurti, o dilli ladde. O waɗi do'a haa ton.
Simon e wonduɓe bee muuɗum taasni mo, ndilli ɗaɓɓitoygo mo.
Nde ɓe tawi mo, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Yimɓe fuu ɗon ɗaɓɓite.”
Ammaa o jaabi: “Ndillen haa kawyeeji ɓadiiɗi, haa mi waazina yimɓe ton boo. Ngam kuugal man waddi yam.”
Bana non, o yehi cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en nder lesdi Galiili fuu, o waazi e o riiwi boo ginnaaji
Kuturuujo wari haa Yeesu, tuggi koppi yeeso maako, tori mo: “To a muuyi, a waawan yamɗitingo yam.”
Yeesu yurmini mo, forti juŋngo muuɗum, meemi mo, wi'i: “Mi muuyi, a yamɗita!”
Law saɗawre acci mo, o yamɗiti.
Nden, Yeesu jaɓɓiti mo, wi'i mo bee caatal, dillu!
“Hakkil, taa yeccu ɗum koo moy. Ammaa yah jonta, hollu limanjo hoore ma. Nden lii'a dokkal ngal Muusa umri, ngam seedamku yeeso yimɓe
Ammaa goɗɗo oo dilli, o fuɗɗi saŋkitugo habaru man koo toy. Ngam daliila man, Yeesu waawaay nastugo berniwol. Ammaa o jooɗi yaasi berniwol. Yimɓe ngari haa maako diga koo toy.
Ɓaawo nyalɗe seɗɗa, Yeesu lorti haa Kafarnahum. Yimɓe nani o ɗon nder saare.
Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde hawti haa babal luttaay koo haa yolnde boo. Nden Yeesu waazini ɓe Kubaruwol Belŋgol.
Yimɓe feere ngari haa maako, ɓe ngaddani mo waata-terɗeejo, worɓe nayo ɗon ndoondi mo.
Ammaa ɓe mbaawaay yottingo mo haa Yeesu ngam yimɓe ɗuuɗi. Nden ɓe maɓɓiti kippol suudu haa dow nokkuure nde Yeesu woni. Nden ɓe nastini waata-terɗeejo baaliiɗo dow be'itte mum, ɓe njippini mo.
Nde Yeesu yi'i nuɗɗinki yimɓe ɓe'e, o wi'i waata-terɗeejo: “Ɓiŋngel am, hakkeeji ma njaafaama.”
Moodiɓɓe tawreeta woɗɓe jooɗiiɓe ton numi nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe:
“Koni goɗɗo oo wolwata kalluka bana ka'a? Moy waawata yaafaago hakkeeji sonaa Allah feere mum?”
Yeesu annditi nder muuɗum ko ɓe numi. O ƴami ɓe: “Koni numoton bana nii?
Ko ɓuri hoyugo? Wi'go waata-terɗeejo: Hakkeeji maaɗa njaafaama naa malla wi'go mo: Umma, hoocu be'itte ma, yah?
Ammaa ngam haa mi faamtina on
“Mi ɗon wi'e: Umma, hoocu be'itte ma, hootu.”
Law o ummi, o hoosi be'itte maako, o wurti, o dilli gite yimɓe fuu, haa ɓe kayɗini, ɓe teddini Allah, ɓe mbi'i: “Min meeɗaay yi'ugo irin ɗu'um.”
Yeesu dilli fahin haa weendu Galiili. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari haa maako, o ekkitini ɓe.
Nde o ɗon tokki laawol, o yi'i Lewi ɓii Halfa ɗon jooɗi haa baariki jomorgol. O wi'i mo: “Tokkam.” Lewi ummi, tokki mo.
Ɓaawo man Yeesu jooɗodi nder saare Lewi bee pukara'en
Moodiɓɓe Farisa'en Woɗɓe ngi'i mo o ɗon nyaamda bee jomnooɓe e hakke'en, ɓe ƴami pukara'en maako: “Koni o nyaamdata bee yimɓe ɓe'e?”
Nde Yeesu nani ɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “Yamɓe ngalaa haaje kurgoowo, sey nyawɓe. Mi waraay ngam ewnaago adili'en, sey hakke'en.”
Nyannde feere pukara'en Yuhanna e Farisa'en ɗonno cuumo. Woɗɓe ngari ƴami Yeesu: “Ngam ɗume pukara'en Yuhanna e Farisa'en ɗon cuumo, ammaa pukara'en maaɗa cuumataako?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On numi ewnaaɓe haa ɓaŋgal cuumoto nde ɓaŋɗo ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe na? Walaa sam! Ɓe cuumataako yaake ɓaŋɗo ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe.
Ammaa saa'i waran nde ɓaŋɗo tawataake caka maɓɓe, wakkati man ɓe cuumoto.
Walaa mo takkata leppel kesel dow limce kiiɗɗe, ngam leppel kesel fooɗan limce kiiɗɗe, ceekgol man tullitan.
Non boo goɗɗo loowataa inaboojam kesam nder kanyakanyaaji
Nden Farisa'en mbi'i Yeesu: “Laar, koni pukara'en ma ngaɗata ko tawreeta meeɗen haɗi waɗugo nyannde siwtorde?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko Daawuda waɗi nde kaŋko e wonduɓe bee maako ɓe maati dolo
O nasti suudu Allah, o nyaami tamseeje ɗe ɓe lii'ani
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe fahin: “Nyalaade siwtorde waɗaama ngam neɗɗo. Neɗɗo waɗaaka ngam nyalaade siwtorde.
Ngam maajum,
Ɓaawoɗon, Yeesu lorti haa suudu dewal Yahuudu'en. Goɗɗo waata-juŋngoojo ɗonno ton.
Farisa'en ɗonno ayna Yeesu ngam yi'ugo to o yamɗitinan goɗɗo
Yeesu wi'i waata-juŋngoojo go: “Umma, dara yeeso yimɓe fuu.”

Nden Yeesu ƴami yimɓe ɓe ɗonno ndaara mo: “Ɗume tawreeta meeɗen duŋi nyalaade siwtorde? Waɗugo mbooɗeeŋga naa malla waɗugo halleende? Hisnugo yoŋki goɗɗo naa malla mbarugo mo?” Ammaa ɓe cali jaabaago mo.
Yeesu laari ɓe fuu bee tikkere, ɓernde maako naawi ngam caatal ɓerɗe maɓɓe. Nden o wi'i waata-juŋngoojo go: “Fortu juŋngo ma.” O forti ngo, juŋngo maako yamɗiti.
Farisa'en ngurti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, ɓe kawti law bee woɗɓe nder yeɓre yimɓe Hirudus, ɓe carwootiri ngam halkugo Yeesu.
Yeesu dillidi bee pukara'en muuɗum haa weendu Galiili. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde tokki mo. Nde iwi diga Galiili e Yahudiya
e Urusaliima e Idumaya, diga gaɗa maayo Urdun e diga lesdi kommbi Tirus e Sidon. Yimɓe ɓe fuu ngari haa maako, ngam ɓe meeɗi nanugo habaru kuuɗe maako.
Nden Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum ɓe tefana mo koommbowal
Ngam o yamɗitini yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe, nyawɓe fuu ɗon njaawa ɓaditaago ngam meemugo mo
Nde yimɓe ɓe ruuhuuji coɓɗi torri ngi'i Yeesu, ɓe ndo'i yeeso maako, ɓe ngooki ɓe mbi'i: “An a
Ammaa Yeesu umri ɗi bee caatal, taa ɗi mbaŋgina mo.
Nden Yeesu wa'i dow towndiire, o ewni ɓe o yiɗi fuu. Ɓe ngari haa maako.
Bana nii o waɗi ɓe nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo, ngam ɓe ngonda bee maako e o nela ɓe waazoygo,
o hokki ɓe boo baawɗe riiwugo ginnaaji.
Ndaa nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo ɓe o suɓi: Simon (Yeesu inndi mo Piyer)
e Yaakuba e Yuhanna, ɗiɗo fuu ɓiɓɓe Zebede. Yeesu inndi ɓe Bowanerges, bana wi'go: (Yimɓe bana felmaaŋgo)
e Andire e Filip e Bartolome e Matta e Tomas e Yaakuba ɓii Halfa e Tadde e Simon Kanaaniijo
e Yahuuda Iskariyot zammbotooɗo Yeesu.
Ɓaawo man Yeesu warti saare. Mooɓre hawti fahin, haa Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum mbaawaay koo nyaamugo.
Nde banndiraaɓe maako nani haala man, ɓe ngari hoocugo mo, ngam yimɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Hakkiilo maako jiiɓake.”
Moodiɓɓe tawreeta warɓe diga Urusaliima mbi'i: “Be'elzebul
Nden Yeesu ewni ɓe, o wolwani ɓe bee balndi. O wi'i: “Bana noy Sayɗaanu waawrata riiwugo Sayɗaanu?
To laamu senndake geɓe geɓe, ngu wilan.
To yimɓe saare narraay hakkunde maɓɓe, saare man wilan.
Non boo to Sayɗaanu ɗon dartano hoore muuɗum, to cennduki waɗi nder laamu maako, o darataako, o nattan.
Goɗɗo waawataa nastugo saare cemmbiɗɗo ngam jaɓtugo jawdi maako, sey o aarta o haɓɓa cemmbiɗɗo oo, nden o ɓofta kuuje saare maako fuu.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, yimɓe keɓan yaafuye hakkeeji muuɗum'en fuu e yaafuye bolle muuɗum'en kalluɗe dow Allah fuu
Ammaa mo wolwi kalluka dow Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, heɓataa yaafuye sam, ngam o waɗi hakkewol duumiiŋgol.”
Yeesu wi'i non ngam woɗɓe mbi'no: “O woodi ruuhuwol kalluŋgol.”
Daada
Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon njooɗodi bee Yeesu. Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Daada ma e deerɗiraaɓe ma ɗon yaasi, ɓe ngiɗi laarugo ma.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Moy woni daada am e ɓeye ngoni deerɗiraaɓe am?”
Nden o laari yimɓe taariiɓe mo, o wi'i: “Ndaa daada am e deerɗiraaɓe am ɗon ɗo!
Waɗanɓe muuyo Allah fuu, kamɓe ngoni deerɗiraaɓe am worɓe e rewɓe e daada am.”
Fahin Yeesu fuɗɗi ekkitingo yimɓe haa fomoonde weendu Galiili. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde masin mooɓi haa maako. Ngam maajum o nasti koommbowal
O ekkitini ɓe kuuje ɗuuɗɗe bee balndi. Nder ekkitinol maako o wi'i ɓe:
“Keɗite! Nyannde feere demoowo yehi ngesa ngam saakoygo.
Nde o ɗon saaka, aawdi ngoɗndi soli dow laawol. Colli ngari, cuɓti ndi.
Aawdi ngoɗndi soli haa korka'e, haa lesdi ɗuuɗaay. Law ndi fuɗi ngam lesdi ɗuuɗaay.
Nde naaŋge ɓaŋgti, nge wuli puɗndi man, ndi yoori ngam ɗaɗi maari luggaay.
Aawdi ngoɗndi boo soli caka gi'e. Gi'e mawni, ɓilli puɗndi man, ndi wurtinaay cammeeje.
Ammaa aawdi ngoɗndi soli haa lesdi mboondi, ndi fuɗi, ndi mawni, ndi wurtini cammeeje, ndi ɓenndi. Goɗɗe ɗon bee gabbe cappanɗe tati, goɗɗe boo bee gabbe cappanɗe joweego e goɗɗe bee gabbe teemerre.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Mo woodi noppi ngam nanugo, nana!”
Nde Yeesu jooɗi feere muuɗum, wondunooɓe bee muuɗum e pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo ƴami mo maana balndi go.
O jaabi ɓe: “Onon, Allah anndini on sirri laamu muuɗum. Ammaa ngam woɗɓe, sey bee balndi.
Ngam maajum
ɓe ɗon ndaara, ammaa ɓe ngi'ataa.
Ɓe ɗon nana, ammaa ɓe paamataa.
Ngam taa ɓe lorto haa Allah,
Allah boo yaafo ɓe
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On paamaay balndol ngo'ol na? Nden kam noy on mbaawrata faamugo balndi goɗɗi?
Demoowo ɗon saaka wolde Allah.
Woɗɓe nanndi bee aawdi dow laawol, to ɓe nani wolde Allah, law Sayɗaanu wara, wifta wolde nde ɓe nani.
Woɗɓe nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa korka'e. To ɓe nani wolde Allah, law ɓe njaɓa nde bee seyo.
Ammaa nde waɗataa ɗaɗi nder maɓɓe, ɓe nuɗɗinan wakkati seɗɗa non. Nden, to ɓillaare malla toonyaare ummake ngam daliila wolde Allah, law ɓe accan nuɗɗinki.
Woɗɓe boo nanndi bee aawdi caka gi'e. Ɓe nani wolde Allah,
ammaa laruuraaji duniyaaru ndu e esto jawdi e suunooji feere feere nastan ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ɗi ɓillan wolde Allah e nde waɗataa nafuuda.

Woɗɓe fahin, nanndi bee aawdi colndi haa lesdi mboondi. Ɓe ɗon nana wolde Allah, ɓe ɗon njaɓa nde, ɓe ɗon mbaŋgina ɓenndalooje, woɗɓe cowi cappanɗe tati, woɗɓe boo cowi cappanɗe joweego, woɗɓe feere cowi teemerre.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Goɗɗo jamnan pittirla ngam jo'ingo nga les bokoti malla les leeso na? Naa o jo'inan nga dow jo'inirɗum
Ngam cuuɗiiɗum fuu waŋgan nyalaade woɗnde, sirriijum fuu anndititte
Mo woodi noppi fuu nana!”
Fahin Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Kakkilane ko on nanata. Allah foondan ko o hokkata on bee poondirgol ngol on poondirta e o ɓesdan dow maajum fahin
Ngam marɗo huunde, ɓe ɓesdanan mo, ammaa mo maraay koo ɗume, ɓe koocan koo peetum maako
Fahin Yeesu wi'i: “Laamu Allah nanndi bee goɗɗo mo rufi aawdi haa lesdi.
Nden o yaha o ɗaano jemma, o fina nde weeti fuu. Wakkati maajum aawdi ɗon fuɗa, ɗon mawna, kaŋko boo o anndaa no ndi mawnirta.
Lesdi ndin ɗon fuɗna ko rufa: Aran fuɗŋgo, nden wurtina sammeere, ɓaawo man ɗum waɗa ɓikkoy nder sammeere.
To alkamaari ɓenndi, o fuɗɗan wa'go, ngam saa'i waɗi
Fahin Yeesu wi'i: “Bee ɗume nanndinten laamu Allah? Bee balndol ngole en paamtinta haala maagu?
Ngu nanndi bee gawel citta. Ndi ɓuri aawdi duniyaaru fuu famɗugo.
Ammaa to ɓe aawi ndi, ndi fuɗan, ndi mawnan haa ɓura fuɗŋgooji fuu. Lice maaki mawnan haa colli mbaɗa caɓɓe haa ɗowdi maaki.”
Yeesu waazini yimɓe Kubaruwol Belŋgol bee balndi ɗuuɗɗi bana ɗi'i, fodde ko ɓe mbaawi faamugo.
O wolwani ɓe tum bee balndi. Ammaa nde o luttidi bee pukara'en maako kamɓe feere maɓɓe, o laɓɓinani ɓe koo ɗume fuu.
Nyannde maajum nde hiiri, Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Sey en eero gaɗa weendu.”
Nden ɓe acci mooɓre. Pukara'en nasti koommbowal
Henndu saatundu ummi, ƴuuge ukki dow koommbowal haa ngal heewi ndiyam.
Yeesu ɗon haa sakkitorde koommbowal, o ɗon ɗaani, hoore maako ɗon dow waflaare. Pukara'en maako pindini mo, mbi'i: “Moodibbo, en ɗon kalka, walaa ko ɗum yaali ma na?”
Nde o fini, o telɓani henndu, o wi'i weendu: “Sirwa!” Henndu de'iti, de'ere mawnde laati.
Nden Yeesu wi'i pukara'en: “Ngam ɗume on kultori? Haa jonta on koolaaki yam na?”
Ammaa ɓe kultorino masin, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Goɗɗo oo o moy? Koo henndu e weendu boo ɗon ɗowtano mo.”
Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum njotti Galiili nder lesdi Geraseni'en gaɗa weendu.
Nde Yeesu wurti koommbowal
O ɗonno yeeɗa caka genaale. Walaa baawɗo haɓɓugo mo, koo bee callallu.
Nde ɗuuɗɗum yimɓe kaɓɓuno mo bee ge'elle e callalluuji, ammaa o ta'i callalluuji haa juuɗe maako, o yewi ge'elle haa kosɗe maako. Semmbe maako salori eltanɗo mo fuu.
Tum jemma e naaŋge fuu o ɗon caka genaale e nder kooseeje, o ɗon hoola, o ɗon ŋaasa ɓanndu maako bee kaa'e.
Ammaa nde o eewi Yeesu, o doggi, o wari, o tuggi koppi haa yeeso muuɗum,
Nden o wooki, o wi'i: “An Yeesu,
O wi'i ɗum ngam Yeesu wi'no mo: “An ruuhu coɓŋgu, wurta diga gorko oo!”
Nden Yeesu ƴami mo: “Noy innde ma?” O jaabi: “Innde am Mooɓre, ngam min ɗuuɗi.”
O tori Yeesu ɗuuɗɗum, taa o riiwa ɗi daayiiɗum diga lesdi man.
Woodi tokkere gaduuji ɗuuɗɗi ton, ɗi ɗon ndura baŋnge kooseeje.
Ruuhuuji coɓɗi go tori Yeesu: “Nel min haa gaduuji ɗi ngam min nasta nder maaji.”
Yeesu duŋani ɗi. Ɗi ngurti diga goɗɗo oo, ɗi nasti nder gaduuji. Gaduuji man caamni, ndo'i diga dow fomoonde townde nder weendu. Ɗi fuu ɗi kalki, ɗi ndillani ujine ɗiɗi.
Durooɓe gaduuji ndoggi, ngecci haala maajum nder wuro e haa kawyeeji. Yimɓe ngurti ngam ɓe ndaara ko waɗi.
Ɓe ngari haa Yeesu, ɓe ngi'i marnooɗo mooɓre ginnaaji go ɗon jooɗi, ɗon ɓorni, hakkiilo maako boo de'iti. Ɓe kultori.
Yi'ɓe ɗum fuu ngecci yimɓe ko waɗi marɗono ginnaaji go e ko fe'ani gaduuji.
Nden yimɓe puɗɗi toraago Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: Wurta, daaya lesdi amin.
Yaake Yeesu ɗon nasta koommbowal, gurtinaaɗo ruuhuuji coɓɗi go tori mo, wi'i: “Accu mi jooɗodo bee ma.”
Yeesu duŋanaaki mo, ammaa o wi'i mo: “Hootu haa yimɓe ma, yeccu ɓe ko Jawmiraawo waɗani ma nder enɗam muuɗum fuu.”
Goɗɗo oo dilli, o fuɗɗi anndingo yimɓe haa jihaaji bi'eteeɗi Berniiji-Sappo ko Yeesu huuwani mo fuu, haa yimɓe fuu kayɗini.
Yeesu eerti weendu bee koommbowal, warti gaa'e. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde mooɓti haa maako baŋnge weendu.
Gooto haa ardiiɓe suudu dewal Yahuudu'en mo innde muuɗum Jayrus wari haa maako. Nde o yi'i Yeesu, o tuggi koppi yeeso maako,
o tori mo ɗuuɗɗum, o wi'i: “Ɓiŋngel am deyel nyawi haa ngel ɓadake maayugo. Useni war, wallin juuɗe ma dow maagel haa ngel hisa, ngel yeeɗa.”
Yeesu dillidi bee maako. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde yahdi bee maako, nde ɗon ɓiɗɗa mo.
Woodi boo debbo feere ton. Duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, o nyawi nyawu ilugo ƴiiƴam.
O yehi haa hurgooɓe ɗuuɗɓe, o majjini jawdi maako fuu. Ammaa nyawu maako waɗaay daama sam, sey tullititgo.
Nde o nani habaru Yeesu, o wari nder mooɓre ɓaawo maako, o meemi limce maako.
Ngam o numno: “To mi heɓi mi meemi koo limce maako tan, mi yamɗitan.”
Nde o meemi limce Yeesu, law ilugo ƴiiƴam maako ta'i, o maati nder ɓanndu maako o yamɗiti diga nyawu maako.
Wakkati man Yeesu anndi semmbe wurti haa muuɗum. O wayliti caka mooɓre, o ƴami: “Moy meemi limce am?”
Pukara'en maako njaabi: “A ɗon yi'a mooɓre ɗon ɓiɗɗe. Noy ƴamrata: Moy meemi yam?”
Ammaa Yeesu laari taariiɓe mo haa o yi'a debbo meemɗo mo.
Debbo oo diwni ngam kulol ngam o anndi ko waɗi mo, nden o wari, o tuggi koppi les kosɗe Yeesu, o yecci mo gooŋga man fuu.
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel am, nuɗɗinki maaɗa yamɗitini ma. Yah jam, a rimɗi e bone ma.”
Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, ardiiɓe saare Jayrus ngari, mbi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel ma maayi. Ngam ɗume a ɗon ɓilla moodibbo fahin?”
Ammaa Yeesu faalaay bolle maɓɓe. O wi'i Jayrus: “Taa hul, nuɗɗin tan!”
Nden o duŋanaay koo gooto yahda bee maako, sey Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna, deerɗiraawo Yaakuba.
Nde ɓe njotti saare Jayrus ardiiɗo suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, Yeesu laari yimɓe ɗon koola, ɗon mboya, ɗon njooyna ɗuuɗɗum ton.
O nasti saare, o wi'i ɓe: “Koni on koolata bana nii? Koni on mboyata? Ɓiŋngel maayaay, ngel ɗaani non.”
Ɓe njanci mo. Nden o wurtini ɓe fuu. O luttidi bee baaba ɓiŋngel e daada maagel e pukara'en maako tato go, ɓe nasti suudu ndu ɓiŋngel woni.
O naŋngi juŋngo maagel, o wi'i ngel: “
Law ɓiŋngel deyel ummi, fuɗɗi yahugo. Ngel ɗon mari duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi. Nde yimɓe ngi'i ɗum, ɓe kayɗini masin.
Ammaa Yeesu barri ɓe bee caatal, taa ɓe anndina ɗum koo moye. Nden o wi'i: “Ndokke ngel nyaamdu.”
Yeesu ummi nokkuure maajum, o lorti haa berniwol ngol o mawni, pukara'en maako tokki mo.
Nde
Naa kaŋko woni cehoowo? Naa o ɓii Mariyama e deerɗiraawo Yaakuba e Yoses e Yahuuda e Simon? Naa deerɗiraaɓe maako rewɓe boo ɗon ngondi bee meeɗen haa ɗo?” Ngam maajum ɓe cali nuɗɗingo mo.
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Yimɓe ɗon teddina annabiijo koo toy, ammaa nder wuro ngo o danya e caka banndiraaɓe maako e yimɓe saare maako o walaa tedduŋgal.”
Yeesu waawaay waɗugo kaayeefiwol koo ngole ton, sey o yowi juuɗe maako dow nyawɓe woɗɓe, o yamɗitini ɓe.
O hayɗini ngam sooynde nuɗɗinki maɓɓe.
Ɓaawo maajum Yeesu yiiloyi haa gure lesdi man fuu, o ekkitini yimɓe.
O ewni pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo, o hokki ɓe baawɗe dow ruuhuuji coɓɗi, nden o neli ɓe ɗiɗo ɗiɗo.
O hokki ɓe umroore nde'e: “Taa njoge koo ɗume ngam jahaaŋgal, koo nyaamdu, koo booro njooɓaari, koo ceede seɗɗa, sey sawru tan.
Koo'e paɗe, ammaa taa ɓorne limce ɗiɗi.”
Fahin o wi'i ɓe: “To on nasti wuro woɗŋgo, njooɗe haa saare nde ɓe njaɓɓi on, haa saa'iire nde on ngurtoto wuro man.
To on ngari haa wuro ngo ɓe cali jaɓɓaago on malla nanango on, ngurte ngo, piɗɗe collaaje kosɗe mooɗon, ɗum laato ngam reentingo
Pukara'en ndilli, ngaazoyi yimɓe ngam ɓe tuuba, ɓe acca hakkeeji maɓɓe.
Ɓe ndiiwi ruuhuuji coɓɗi ɗuuɗɗi, ɓe nguji nyawɓe ɗuuɗɓe bee nebbam, ɓe njamɗitini ɓe
Ammaa laamiiɗo Hirudus nani habaru Yeesu, ngam koo toy fuu yimɓe mani innde Yeesu. Woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma ummitake diga maayde. Ngam maajum o ɗon bee baawɗe waɗugo kaayeefiiji.”
Ammaa woɗɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum Eliya.” Woɗɓe boo mbi'i: “Ɗum annabiijo bana gooto annabi'en ɓooyma
Nde Hirudus nani ɗum, o wi'i: “Ɗum Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma! Mi ta'ino hoore maako, ammaa o ummitake.”
Naane Hirudus bee hoore muuɗum umrino, ɓe naŋnga Yuhanna, ɓe kaɓɓa mo haa suudu fursina
Ngam Yuhanna wi'no Hirudus: “Haanaay a te'a debbo deerɗa
Ngam maajum Hirudiya wanyi Yuhanna, yiɗi mbarugo mo. Ammaa o waawaay,
ngam Hirudus huli Yuhanna, ngam o anndi o gooŋgaajo, o cenaaɗo. O ayni mo booɗɗum. Ammaa nde o nani mo fuu, o wemmboto masin, bee non fuu, o yiɗi nanugo haala maako.
Nde nyalaade siftinorde danyeeki Hirudus yotti, nde laati nyalaade fottunde ngam Hirudiya. Hirudus waɗi nyaamduuji ngam mawɓe lesdi muuɗum e ardiiɓe dow sooje'en ujineeje e ardiiɓe lesdi Galiili fuu.
Ɓii Hirudiya debbo nasti, wami, seyni Hirudus e ewnaaɓe muuɗum. Laamiiɗo wi'i paanyo debbo: “Ƴamam ko a yiɗi, mi hokkete ɗum.”
E o hunani mo hunayeere nde'e: “Mi hokkete ko a ƴami, koo reeta laamu am.”
Paanyo wurti, wi'i daada muuɗum: “Ɗume mi ƴamata mo?” O jaabi: “Hoore Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma.”
Law paanyo lori haa laamiiɗo, wi'i mo: “Mi yiɗi a hokkammi hoore Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma jonta nder le'al.”
Ɗum suni laamiiɗo, ammaa o yiɗaa salanaago mo, ngam daliila kunayeeje ɗe o hunino yeeso ewnaaɓe maako.
Nden o neli gooto nder sooje'en aynanɓe mo, o umri mo o wadda hoore Yuhanna. Soojeejo dilli haa suudu fursina
Nden o waddi nde nder le'al, o hokki nde paanyo debbo. Kaŋko boo o hokki nde daada maako.
Nde pukara'en Yuhanna nani ɗum, ɓe ngari, ɓe kooci ɓanndu Yuhanna, ɓe uwi ndu.
Nelaaɓe go lorti, kawti haa Yeesu. Ɓe ngecci mo ko ɓe mbaɗi e ko ɓe ekkitini fuu.
Ammaa, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ngara, ɗon ndilla, haa Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum keɓaay wakkati nyaamugo. Ngam maajum o wi'i ɓe: “Ngare ndillen haa nokkuure ferwunde haa on ciwto seɗɗa.”
Nden ɓe nasti koommbowal,
Ammaa ɗuuɗɓe ngi'i ɓe ɗon ndilla e ɓe paami haa ɓe njahata, nden ɓe ngurti gure fuu, ɓe ndoggi bee kosɗe, ɓe aarti Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum yottaago haa nokkuure man.
Nde Yeesu jippi koommbowal, o yi'i mooɓre yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe. O yurmini ɓe, ngam ɓe nanndi bee baali ɗi ngalaa gaynaako. O fuɗɗi ekkitingo ɓe kuuje ɗuuɗɗe
Nde hiiri, pukara'en maako ngari haa maako, mbi'i mo: “Naaŋge hiiri, nokkuure nde'e boo nde ferwunde.
Jaɓɓita yimɓe ɓe ndilla haa kawyeeji e gure ɓadiiɗe ɓe cooda ko ɓe nyaamata.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Onon man ndokke ɓe ko ɓe nyaamata.” Pukara'en mbi'i mo: “A yiɗi min njaha, min majjina suleyje cardi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi ngam soodugo tamseeje haa ɓe nyaama na?”
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Tamseeje noy marɗon? Njehe, ndaare.” Nde ɓe kumpiti, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Min ngoodi tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi.”
Nden, Yeesu umri pukara'en ɓe njo'ina yimɓe fuu geɓe geɓe dow huɗo hecco.
Ɓe njo'ini yimɓe teemerre teemerre, cappanɗe njowo cappanɗe njowo.
Nden Yeesu hoo'i tamseeje jowi e liɗɗi ɗiɗi go, o tijji asama, o yetti Allah. Nden o yewi tamseeje, o hokki pukara'en ngam ɓe cenndana yimɓe. Bana non boo o senndani ɓe liɗɗi ɗiɗi go ɓe fuu.
Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari.
Pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum tamseeje e liɗɗi go, kebbini cilaaje sappo e ɗiɗi.
Limgal nyaamɓe tamseeje man waɗi worɓe ujine njowo.
Ɓaawo man Yeesu dooli pukara'en muuɗum ɓe nasta koommbowal
Ɓaawo o jaɓɓiti nde, o dilli hooseere ngam waɗugo do'a.
Nde jemma waɗi, koommbowal boo ɗon caka weendu, Yeesu ɗon haa lesdi feere muuɗum.
O yi'i pukara'en maako ɗon kaɓda laanyugo koommbowal, ngam ɓe ɗon tiitotira bee henndu, deydey subaha, o wari haa maɓɓe, o ɗon yaha dow mbeela bee kosɗe, bana o saaloto ɓe.
Nde ɓe ngi'i mo o ɗon yaha dow ndiyam, ɓe tammi ɗum ginnawol, ɓe ngooki.
Ngam ɓe fuu ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe kuli. Ammaa law Yeesu wolwani ɓe, wi'i: “Tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mon, ɗum min, taa kultore!”
Nden o nasti koommbowal, henndu de'iti. Pukara'en kayɗini masin.
Ngam ɓe paamaay kaayeefiwol tamseeje go, ngam ɓerɗe maɓɓe caati.
Nde ɓe timmini eeraago weendu, ɓe njotti lesdi Genesaret, ɓe tiggi koommbowal maɓɓe haa fomoonde.
Ɓe ngurti koommbowal, law yimɓe annditi Yeesu,
ɓe ndoggoy koo toy nder lesdi man fuu, ɓe ngaddani mo nyawɓe waaliiɓe dow be'itte.
Koo toy Yeesu yehi, nder gure malla berniiji malla kawyeeji, yimɓe ɗon mballina nyawɓe maɓɓe haa luuɓe, ɓe toro mo haa nyawɓe keɓa meemugo koo gawargal limce maako. Meemɓe ngal fuu njamɗiti.
Farisa'en e woɗɓe nder moodiɓɓe tawreeta warɓe diga Urusaliima kawti haa Yeesu.
Ɓe ngi'i woɗɓe caka pukara'en maako ɗon nyaama bee juuɗe coɓɗe, waato ɓe lootaay ɗe fodde al'aada Farisa'en.
Ngam Farisa'en e Yahuudu'en fuu ɗon kakkilana al'aadaaji kaakiraaɓe, ɓe nyaamataa sonaa to ɓe looti juuɗe maɓɓe laaɓi tal.
To ɓe ngarti luumo, ɓe nyaamataa sonaa to ɓe ngiiwake. Ɓe ɗon ɗowtano umrooje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe ɗe ɓe ekkiti ngam ɗowugo ɓe, bana laɓɓingo njardukoy e payanɗe e taasaaje njamndi mboɗeeri.
Farisa'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta ƴami Yeesu: “Koni pukara'en maaɗa ɗowtantaako al'aada kaakiraaɓe meeɗen, ɓe ɗon nyaama bee juuɗe coɓɗe?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Annabaaku ngu Esaaya waɗi dow mooɗon gooŋɗi. On naafiki'en, bana no o winndiri:
Allah wi'i: Yimɓe ummaatoore nde'e ɗon teddinammi bee kunnduɗe,
ammaa ɓerɗe maɓɓe ndaayake yam.
Ɓe ɗon cujidanammi meere,
ngam ɓe ɗon ekkitina geccaaji yimɓe
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On acci umrooje Allah, on ɗon njogi al'aadaaji yimɓe.”
Nden o ɓesdi wi'ugo: “On mbaawi wudingo umroore Allah ngam jogaago al'aada mooɗon.
Muusa wi'i: Teddin baaba ma e daada ma. Koo moy wolwi kalluka dow baaba malla daada mum, sey o mbare
Ammaa onon, on ɗon mbi'a to goɗɗo wi'i baaba malla daada mum: Geɗal jawdi am ndi mi waawanno wallugo ma bee maari laatake
nden kam walaa haaje o walla baaba malla daada maako fahin, on ɗon njaɓana mo ɗum.
Bana nii, on ɗon mbonna ko wolde Allah ƴami bee al'aadaaji mooɗon ɗi on ɗon ekkitina. E on ɗon mbaɗa kuuje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe bana maaji.”
Fahin Yeesu ewni yimɓe ɓe ngara haa maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Naneeɗam on fuu, paame:
Walaa koo ɗume ko woni yaasi neɗɗo waawata soɓnugo mo bee nastugo nder maako. Ammaa ko wurtoto haa maako, kanjum soɓnata mo.
[Mo woodi noppi ngam nanugo nana!]”
Nde Yeesu seedi bee mooɓre, o nasti suudu, pukara'en maako ƴami mo maana balndol ngo'ol.
O wi'i ɓe: “Onon boo on ngoodaa faamu na? On paamaay nii ko nastata neɗɗo diga yaasi fuu, waawataa soɓnugo mo,
ngam ɗum nastataa ɓernde maako, ammaa nder reedu, ɓaawoɗon ɗum wurto haa ɓaawo suudu.” Yeesu wi'i bana nii ngam o sena nyaamdu fuu.
Fahin o wi'i: “Ko wurtoto diga nder neɗɗo, kanjum soɓnata mo.
Ngam haa nder, haa ɓernde neɗɗo, numooji kalluɗi iwata, ɗi njahra mo haa daakaareeku e nguyka e mbar-hoore
e njeenu e suuno e halleende e fewjere e kuuje cemtiniiɗe e kaajal e kuudi kallundi e mawnitaare e faataare.
Kuuje kalluɗe ɗe'e fuu nder neɗɗo ɗe iwata, ɗe coɓna mo.”
Yeesu ummi ton, dilli haa lesdi Tirus. O nasti saare woɗnde, o yiɗaa yimɓe annda ɗum. Ammaa o waawaay nyukkaago.
Nden debbo mo ruuhu coɓŋgu ɗon torra ɓiŋngel muuɗum deyel, nani habaru Yeesu, o wari law haa maako, o tuggi koppi yeeso maako.
Debbo oo, o Yunaniŋkeejo
Ammaa Yeesu wi'i mo: “Accu ɓikkoy kaara tawon, ngam wooɗaay hoo'ugo nyaamdu ɓikkoy sakkinana ndawaakon.”
Debbo wi'i mo: “Nonnon yaa Jawmiraawo, ammaa koo ndawaakon ngonkon les taabal boo nyaaman caamɗum nyaamdu ɓikkoy.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ngam daliila wolde maaɗa nde'e, yah, ruuhu coɓŋgu wurtake ɓiŋngel ma.”
O hooti, o tawi ɓiŋngel maako ɗon waali dow be'itte, ruuhu coɓŋgu wurtake nder maagel.
Ɓaawo man Yeesu wurti lesdi Tirus. O saali gal lesdi Sidon, o lorti gal weendu Galiili, o yotti haa lesdi wi'eteendi Berniiji-Sappo.
Ɓe ngaddani mo goɗɗo paho mo waawataa wolwugo laaɓɗum. Ɓe tori mo o wallina juŋngo dow maako.
Nden Yeesu wurtini mo nder mooɓre, darni mo feere maako, o nastini kooli nder noppi goɗɗo oo e o meemi ɗemŋgal maako bee tuuɗe mum.
Nden o tijji asama, o uumi, o wi'i goɗɗo go: “
Law noppi maako cukkiti, ko haɓɓino ɗemŋgal maako fiisti, o wolwi bee laaɓɗum.
Yeesu umri ɓe fuu taa ɓe anndina goɗɗo haala man. Ammaa koo nde o ɗuɗɗini bolle, kamɓe ɓe ngeeyni ɗum masin.
Nanɓe ɗum kayɗini masin, ɓe mbi'i: “Ko o waɗata fuu, wooɗi masin! O waɗi haa fahɓe nana, muuka'en boo mbolwa.”
Saa'i man mooɓre ɗuuɗnde mooɓti fahin. Nde ɓe ngoodaa ko ɓe nyaama, Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i ɓe:
“Mi ɗon yurmina yimɓe ɓe'e, ngam ɓe ɗon ngondi bee am jonta nyalɗe tati, ɓe ngoodaa ko ɓe nyaama boo.
To mi jaɓɓiti ɓe, ɓe koota mi hokkaay ɓe nyaamdu, nden kam ɓe tampan dow laawol, woɗɓe maɓɓe boo ngari diga daayiiɗum.”
Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “Noy goɗɗo heɓrata nyaamdu he'anndu yimɓe ɓe fuu haa nder ladde hamaadaare nde'e?”
Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Tamseeje noy marɗon?” Ɓe njaabi: “Joweeɗiɗi.”
O umri yimɓe njooɗo. Nden o hoo'i tamseeje joweeɗiɗi go, o yetti Allah, o yewi ɗe, o hokki pukara'en maako ɓe cenndana yimɓe. Pukara'en mbaɗi bana non.
Ɓe ngoodi boo liɗɗi pamari seɗɗa. Yeesu waɗi yettoore ngam maaji, nden o umri pukara'en maako ɓe cenndana ɗi yimɓe.
Ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami, ɓe kaari, pukara'en mooɓti luttuɗum man, kebbini cilaaje joweeɗiɗi.
Limgal yimɓe man waɗi baakin worɓe ujine nayo, nden Yeesu jaɓɓiti ɓe.
Law o nasti koommbowal
Farisa'en ngari puɗɗi waabotirgo bee Yeesu. Ɓe ngiɗi jarribaago mo. Ngam maajum ɓe ƴami mo o waŋginana ɓe alaama iwka diga asama
Yeesu uumi nder muuɗum, wi'i: “Koni yimɓe ɓe'e ɗaɓɓata alaama? Fakat mi ɗon wi'a on, ɓe keɓataa alaama ka sam
Nden o acci ɓe, o lorti nder koommbowal, o eeri haa fomoonde gaɗaare.
Pukara'en ngejjiti hoo'ugo tamseeje. Ɓe ngalaa tamseeje, sey woore ɓe mari haa maɓɓe nder koommbowal.
Yeesu reentini
Pukara'en carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: “O wi'i ɗum ngam en ngoodaa tamseeje.”
Yeesu anndi ko ɓe mbi'i, o ƴami ɓe: “Koni mbi'ɗon on ngalaa tamseeje? On anndaa na? Haa jonta on paamataa na? Ɓerɗe mon ɗon caati na?
On ngoodi gite, on ngi'ataa na? On ngoodi noppi, on nanataa na? On ciftortaa na
Nde mi senndani yimɓe ujine njowo tamseeje jowi, cilaaje noy on kebbini bee luttuɗe?” Ɓe njaabi: “Sappo e ɗiɗi.”
“Yeesu wi'i ɓe, nde mi senndani yimɓe ujine nayo tamseeje joweeɗiɗi, cilaaje noy on kebbini bee luttuɗe?” Ɓe njaabi: “Joweeɗiɗi.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Haa jonta on ngalaa faamu na?”
Ɓe njotti Baytisayda, ton, yimɓe ngaddani Yeesu bumɗo, ɓe tori mo o meema mo.
Yeesu naŋngi juŋngo bumɗo oo, yahri mo yaasi wuro. Nden o tuuti tuuɗe dow gite bumɗo man, o wallini juŋngo dow maako, o ƴami mo: “A ɗon yi'a na?”
Bumɗo ɓaŋgti gite, wi'i: “Mi ɗon yi'a yimɓe, ammaa bana leɗɗe jahanɗe.”
Fahin Yeesu wallini juuɗe dow gite maako, o wumti, o yi'i kuuje fuu laaɓɗum.
Nden Yeesu jaɓɓiti mo, wi'i: Hootu saare. “Taa nastu wuro.”
Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum ndilli gure ɓadiiɗe bee Kaysariya Filippi. Dow laawol, o ƴami ɓe: “Yimɓe ɗon mbi'a min mi moy?”
Ɓe njaabi mo: “Woɗɓe ɗon mbi'a an woni Yuhanna baɗoowo baptisma. Woɗɓe boo ɗon mbi'a an woni Eliya. Fahin woɗɓe ɗon ndaare bana gooto annabi'en ɓooyma
Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Onon boo, on ɗon mbi'a mi moy?” Piyer jaabi: “An woni Almasiihu
Nden Yeesu umri ɓe bee caatal, wi'i: “Taa yeccu ɗum koo moy.”
Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi anndingo pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i: “Doole
O wi'i ɓe ɗum bee baŋguɗum. Piyer wicciti mo sera, fuɗɗi felugo mo.
Ammaa Yeesu wayliti, laari pukara'en muuɗum. Nden o telɓani Piyer, o wi'i: “Daayam, an Sayɗaanu, numooji maaɗa ɗi yimɓe, naa ɗi Allah.”
Nden Yeesu ewni mooɓre e pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “To goɗɗo yiɗi tokkaago yam, sey o acca muuyo maako, o roondo gaafaaŋgal maako, o tokko yam
Ngam koo moy yiɗi hisnugo yoŋki muuɗum, majjinan ki. Ammaa mo majjini yoŋki mum ngam am e ngam Linjiila, hisnan ki
To goɗɗo heɓi duniyaaru fuu, ammaa o halki yoŋki maako, ɗume ɗum nafata mo?
Malla woodi ko goɗɗo waawata hokkugo ngam soottugo yoŋki maako na? Walaa sam!
To goɗɗo semti yam e bolle am hannde caka yimɓe halluɓe, zammbotooɓe Allah ɓe'e, nden kam
Fahin Yeesu wolwani ɓe, o wi'i: “Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on, woɗɓe caka wonɓe haa ɗo, maayataa sey to ɓe ngi'i laamu Allah wari bee baawɗe.”
Ɓaawo nyalɗe joweego, Yeesu hoo'i Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna, o yahri ɓe dow hooseere townde, kamɓe feere maɓɓe. Jaati maako wayliti haa gite maɓɓe,
limce maako ɗelki, daneeje tal, walaa koo gooto haa duniyaaru fuu waawata ranwingo limce bana non.
Nden Eliya e Muusa mbaŋgani ɓe, ɓe ɗon mbolida bee Yeesu.
Piyer wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, ɗum booɗɗum en ɗon ɗo. Accu min mbaɗa bukkaaji tati, wooru ngam maaɗa, wooru ngam Muusa, wooru boo ngam Eliya.”
O anndaa ko o wi'ata, ngam kaŋko e pukara'en woɗɓe ɗiɗo go, ɓe kultori masin.
Ruuldere jippi, suddi ɓe, ɓe nani sawtu ɗon wolwa nder maare: “Oo woni
Ɗon nii pukara'en ndaari haa kommbi maɓɓe, ammaa ɓe ngi'aay goɗɗo, sey Yeesu ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe.
Nde ɓe ɗon njippo hooseere go, Yeesu umri ɓe taa ɓe ngecca yimɓe woɗɓe ko ɓe ngi'i, sey to
Ɓe ɗowtani wolde nde, ammaa ɓe ƴamƴamtiri hakkunde maɓɓe: “Ɗume ummitaago diga maayde yiɗi wi'go?”
Nden ɓe ƴami Yeesu: “Ngam ɗume moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon mbi'a sey Eliya aarta wargo tawon
O jaabi ɓe: “Gooŋga Eliya aartan wargo, o mo'itina kuuje fuu. Kadi ngam ɗume Deftere wi'ata doole
Ammaa mi ɗon wi'a on: Eliya wari timmi, yimɓe mbaɗi mo ko ɓe ngiɗi, bana ko winnda dow maako.”
Nde ɓe njotti haa pukara'en luttuɓe, ɓe ngi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde ɗon taari ɓe. Moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɗon ngaabotira bee maɓɓe.
Nde yimɓe ngi'i Yeesu, ɓe kayɗini masin. Ɓe ndoggi, ɓe ngari ɓe koofni mo.
Yeesu ƴami pukara'en muuɗum: “Dow ɗume on ngaabotirta bee maɓɓe?”
Gooto nder mooɓre jaabi mo: “Moodibbo, mi waddani ma ɓiŋngel am gorgel marŋgel ruuhu muukaaŋgu.

Koo toy ruuhu ngu naŋngi ngel fuu, ngu do'an ngel haa lesdi. Hunnduko maagel waɗan nguufo, ngel hirƴindiran nyii'e, ɓanndu maagel saatan. Mi ƴami pukara'en maaɗa ɓe ndiiwa ruuhu ngu, ammaa ɓe mbaawaay.”
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Hey yimɓe sooya-nuɗɗinki'en, haa ndey tokkotoomi wondugo bee mooɗon e munyango on? Ngadde ɓiŋngel man!”
Ɓe ngaddi ngel haa maako. Nde ɓiŋngel yi'i Yeesu, law ruuhu dimmbi ngel. Ngel do'i haa lesdi, ngel talli, hunnduko maagel waɗi nguufo.
Yeesu ƴami baaba maagel: “Diga ndey ɗum fuɗɗi waɗugo ngel?” Baaba maagel jaabi: “Diga ngel pamarel.
Nde ɗuuɗɗum boo ruuhu ngu do'i ngel nder yiite koo nder ndiyam, ngam halkugo ngel. To a waawi, useni enɗu min, wallu min!”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Koni a wi'i: To a waawi? Walaa ko salorta nuɗɗinɗo, koo ɗume fuu waɗoto.”
Law baaba ɓiŋngel hooli: “Mi nuɗɗini, ammaa ɗum caɗɗum haa am, wallam!”
Nde Yeesu yi'i mooɓre ɗon dogga wara haa maɓɓe, o telɓani ruuhu coɓŋgu go: “An ruuhu muukaaŋgu, pahu! Mi umri ma: Wurta ɓiŋngel nge'el, taa meetu nastugo nder maagel.”
Ruuhu hooli, ɓosli ngel, wurti haa maagel. Ngel laati bana maayɗo, haa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbi'i: “Ngel maayi.”
Ammaa Yeesu naŋngi ngel juŋngo, ummini ngel, ngel dari.
Nde Yeesu nasti suudu, pukara'en maako ƴami mo bee sirri: “Ngam ɗume minin min mbaawaay riiwugo ngu?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Walaa baawɗe feere riiwata irin ruuhu ngu'u, sey do'a.”
Ɓe ummi ton, ɓe caali nder lesdi Galiili. Yeesu yiɗaa koo gooto annda haa o woni.
Ngam o ɗon anndina pukara'en maako, o wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe ndokkan
Pukara'en paamaay maana anndinol ngol, ammaa ɓe kuli ƴamugo mo boo.
Ɓe njotti Kafarnahum. Nde ɓe nasti saare, Yeesu ƴami pukara'en muuɗum: “Dow ɗume on ngaabotiri haa laawol?”
Ammaa ɓe njeeɗi, ngam haa laawol ɓe ngaabotiri dow moy ɓurata mawnugo caka maɓɓe
Yeesu jooɗi, ewni pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo, wi'i ɓe: “To goɗɗo yiɗi o laato arano, sey o waɗa hoore maako o ɓaawoojo yimɓe fuu e o laato jaggiiɗo yimɓe fuu
Nden o hoo'i ɓiŋngel pamarel, o darni ngel caka maɓɓe. O huufi ngel, o wi'i pukara'en maako:
“Mo jaɓi ɓiŋngel pamarel bana nge'el daliila innde am, min o jaɓi. Mo jaɓi yam, naa min o jaɓi, ammaa nelɗo yam
Yuhanna wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, min ngi'i goɗɗo ɗon riiwra ginnaaji bee innde ma. Min ngiɗno haɗugo mo, ngam o tokkaaki en.”
Ammaa Yeesu jaabi: “Taa kaɗe mo, ngam walaa mo waawata waɗugo kaayeefi bee innde am, law ɓaawoɗon o hallina yam.
Ngam koo moy mo honnaaki en, ɗon bee meeɗen
Ngam koo moy yarni on ndiyam seɗɗa daliila innde am ngam on yimɓe Almasiihu, mi ɗon wi'a on fakat o heɓan mbarjaari maako
To goɗɗo do'i gooto ɓurɗo famɗugo caka nuɗɗinɓe yam nder hakke, ndikkana mo ɓe ɓila hayre namarde mawnde haa daande maako, ɓe ngubo mo nder weendu.
To ɗum juŋngo ma nastinte nder hakke, ta'u ngo, ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam a guddo dow nastugo bee juuɗe ma ɗiɗi nder yiite jahannama nge nyifataa sam
[Ton, gilɗi nyaamanɗi ɓanndu mbaatataa, yiite boo nge nyifataa sam.]
To ɗum kosŋgal ma nastinte nder hakke, ta'u ngal, ndikka a nasta ngeendam nduumiiɗam bee kosŋgal gootal dow wubeego bee kosɗe ma ɗiɗi nder yiite jahannama nge nyifataa sam.
[Ton, gilɗi nyaamanɗi ɓanndu mbaatataa, yiite boo nge nyifataa sam.]
E to ɗum yiitere ma nastinte nder hakke, ɗoof nde, ndikka a nasta laamu Allah bee yiitere woore dow wubeego nder yiite jahannama bee gite ma ɗiɗi
Ton, gilɗi nyaamanɗi ɓanndu mbaatataa, yiite boo nge nyifataa sam
Ngam yiite lamminan koo moy fuu bana mannda.
“Mannda wooɗi, ammaa to lammeeŋga maajam ittake, bana noy on lamminirta ɗam fahin? Sey on laato on marɓe mannda nder mooɗon. Njooɗode jam bee koo moy
Yeesu ummi nokkuure man, dilli lesdi Yahudiya, nden o eeri maayo Urdun. Fahin yimɓe mooɓti haa maako. O ekkitini ɓe bana ko woowa.
Farisa'en woɗɓe ngari haa maako ngam jarribaago mo. Ɓe ƴami mo: “Tawreeta duŋanake gorko seera debbo mum na?”
Yeesu jaabori ɓe bee ƴamol ngol: “Ɗume Muusa umri on?”
Ɓe njaabi: “Muusa duŋani gorko winnda ɗereewol ceergal, nden o seera debbo maako
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngam caatal ko'e mooɗon Muusa winndani on umroore nde'e.
Ammaa haa fuɗɗam, Allah tagi gorko e debbo
Ngam maajum gorko accan baaba muuɗum e daada muuɗum, ɗakkotiran bee debbo muuɗum.
Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe laatoto ɓanndu wooru. Bana non ɓe laatataako yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓaawoɗon, ammaa ɓanndu wooru
Ngam maajum taa neɗɗo fiista ko Allah haɓɓi.”
Nde ɓe nasti saare, pukara'en maako ƴamti mo haala man.
Yeesu faamtini ɓe, wi'i: “Koo moy seeri debbo muuɗum, te'i debbo feere, o waɗi njeenu dow debbo arano.
Non boo to debbo acci gorko muuɗum, te'ri bee gorko feere, o waɗi njeenu
Yimɓe ngaddi ɓikkoy pamaroy haa Yeesu ngam o meema koy. Ammaa pukara'en caatani yimɓe ɓe.
Nde Yeesu yi'i ɗum, o ɓerni, o wi'i pukara'en maako: “Acce ɓikkoy pamaroy ngara haa am. Taa kaɗe koy, ngam laamu Allah woodani irin maakoy.
Mi ɗon wi'a on, mo jaɓaay laamu Allah bana ɓiŋngel pamarel, fakat o nastataa ngu sam
Nden o huufi ɓikkoy go, o wallini juuɗe maako dow maakoy, o barkiɗini koy.
Nde Yeesu ɗon yaha dow laawol, goɗɗo doggoy wari, tuggi koppi yeeso maako, ƴami mo: “Moodibbo booɗɗo, ɗume mi waɗata haa mi heɓa ngeendam nduumiiɗam?”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Ngam ɗume a wi'ata yam mi booɗɗo? Sey Allah gooto tan woni booɗɗo.
A anndi umrooje: Taa mbar-hoore, taa waɗ njeenu, taa wujju, taa seeda fewre, taa waɗ rikici, teddin baaba ma e daada ma
Goɗɗo oo wi'i: “Moodibbo, mi ɗowtani umrooje ɗe'e fuu diga mi derkeejo tawon.”
Yeesu suti mo bee yiide, wi'i mo: “Luttani ma huunde woore: Yah soorru ko a mari fuu, hokku talaka'en ceede man, nden a heɓoyan ndesaari haa asama, ɓaawoɗon, war tokkam.”
Ammaa nde goɗɗo oo nani bolle ɗe'e, yeeso maako nyiɓɓi, ɓernde maako metti, o dilli, ngam o diskuɗo masin.
Yeesu laari pukara'en muuɗum, o wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum saɗani riskuɓe nastugo laamu Allah.”
Bolle ɗe'e kayɗini pukara'en masin. Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe fahin: “Ɓikkoy am, nastugo laamu Allah saɗi masin!
Ngeelooba saalo nder wurdere baatal ɓuri hoyugo dow diskuɗo nasta laamu Allah.”
Pukara'en ɓesdi hayɗingo masin, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri, ɓe mbi'i: “To non kam, moy waawata hisugo?”
Yeesu suti ɓe, wi'i: “Haa yimɓe, ɗum waɗataako, ammaa haa Allah ɗum waɗoto, ngam haa Allah, koo ɗume fuu waɗoto.”
Nden Piyer wi'i mo: “Ndaa minin min acci kuuje fuu, min tokki ma.”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Gooŋga. Min boo mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo moy acci saare malla deerɗiraaɓe malla daada malla baaba malla ɓikkoy malla gese muuɗum ngam daliila am e ngam Linjiila,

o heɓtan ɗum cowi teemerre nder ngeendam maako jonta: Calaaje e deerɗiraaɓe worɓe e rewɓe e daadiraaɓe e ɓikkoy e gese e bee toonyaaŋgeeji boo. Nder zamanuuru waranndu boo o heɓan ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Ɗuuɗɓe aartuɓe laatoto sakkitiiɓe, ɗuuɗɓe sakkitiiɓe boo laatoto aartuɓe

Ɓe ɗon dow laawol yahugo Urusaliima. Yeesu ɗon ardi pukara'en muuɗum, ɓe kayɗini, yimɓe tokkiiɓe ɓaawo maɓɓe ɗon kula boo. Fahin Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo feere maɓɓe, o anndini ɓe ko tammi waɗugo mo.
O wi'i ɓe: “Nane, en ɗon njaha Urusaliima, ton ɓe ndokkan
Kamɓe boo ɓe njancan mo, ɓe tuutan mo tuuɗe, ɓe ɓoccan mo, ɓe mbaran mo. Ammaa ɓaawo nyalɗe tati o ummititto diga maayde.”
Nden Yaakuba e Yuhanna ɓiɓɓe Zebede ɓaditi Yeesu, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min ngiɗi a waɗana min ko min ƴamata ma.”
Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume on ngiɗi mi waɗana on?”
Ɓe njaabi mo: “To a jooɗake dow leeso laamu ma nder tedduŋgal ma, nden kam min ngiɗi a jo'ina min gooto haa nyaamo ma e gooto haa nano ma.”
Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “On anndaa ko torotooɗon. On mbaawan yarugo jardugel bone ngel mi yarata na malla jaɓugo baptisma bone ɗe mi jaɓata na
Ɓe njaabi mo: “Min mbaawan.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga, on njaran jardugel bone bana am, on njaɓan boo baptisma ka mi jaɓata.
Ammaa ko laarani jooɗaago haa nyaamo malla haa nano am, naa min hokkata ɗum, ɗum ɗon ngam yimɓe ɓe Allah taaskani.”
Nde pukara'en sappo luttuɓe nani haala man, ɓe ɓernani Yaakuba e Yuhanna.
Nden Yeesu ewni ɓe fuu, wi'i ɓe: “On anndi, yimɓe ɓe on ndaarata bana ardiiɓe ummaatooje, ɓe ɗon ndoola yimɓe maɓɓe, mawɓe boo ɗon kolla ɓe baawɗe.
Ammaa taa ɗum wona non caka mooɗon. To gooto mooɗon yiɗi laataago mawɗo, sey o laato jaggiiɗo mooɗon
Mo yiɗi ardaago caka mooɗon, sey o wona maccuɗo yimɓe fuu
Ngam
Ɓe njotti Yeriko. Nde Yeesu wurti wuro maajum bee pukara'en muuɗum e mooɓre ɗuuɗnde, bumɗo bi'eteeɗo Bartime ɓii Time ɗonno jooɗi sera laawol, o ɗonno rooko.
Nde o nani Yeesu Nasaratuujo ɗon saalo, o fuɗɗi hoolugo: “Yeesu
Ɗuuɗɓe telɓani mo, mbi'i mo o jeeɗo, ammaa o ɓurti hoolugo: “Ɓii Daawuda, enɗam!”
Yeesu dari, wi'i: “Ewne mo.” Ɓe ewni bumɗo go, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma, umma, o ɗon ewne.”
Nden o wudini alkibbaare maako, o ummi, o wari haa Yeesu.
Yeesu ƴami mo: “Ɗume ngiɗɗa mi waɗane?” Bumɗo jaabi: “Moodibbo, wumtinam haa mi yi'a fahin.”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Yah, nuɗɗinki ma hisni ma.” Law o wumti o ɗon yi'a, nden o tokki Yeesu.
Nde ɓe ɓaditi Urusaliima, gal wakeere gure Baytifaaji e Baytaniya, kommbi Hooseere Jaytunje, Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo,
o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe wuro wonŋgo yeeso mooɗon. To on nasti ngo, on tawan wamnde molde haɓɓaande nde goɗɗo meeɗaay wa'aago. Piiste nde, ngadde.
To goɗɗo ƴami on: Koni piistoton nde? Njaabe mo: Jawmiraawo woodi haaje maare, o lornan nde law.”
Nden ɓe ndilli, ɓe tawi molde haa laawol, nde ɗon haɓɓi haa yolnde goɗɗo, ɓe piisti nde.
Woɗɓe dariiɓe ton ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume mbaɗoton ɗo? Ngam ɗume piistoton molde nde?”
Ɓe njaabi bana Yeesu wi'no ɓe, nden yimɓe man acci ɓe.
Ɓe ngaddani Yeesu molde, ɓe ndaɗɗi limce maɓɓe dow maare, Yeesu wa'i nde.
Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe mbe'iti limce muuɗum'en dow laawol, woɗɓe itti haakooji haa gese, caɓɓi ɗi dow laawol.
Yimɓe ardiiɓe Yeesu e tokkiiɓe ɓaawo fuu kooli, mbi'i: “
Allah barkiɗina laamu ngaranŋgu, ngu baaba meeɗen Daawuda!
Yeesu nasti Urusaliima. O nasti haykaliiru boo, o timmini laarugo ko woni nder maaru fuu, nde hiiri, o dilli Baytaniya bee pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo.
Jaŋngo maajum nde ɓe ngurti Baytaniya, Yeesu maati dolo.
O eewi ibbi bee haakooji ɗuuɗɗi, o yehi ngam o laara teema ibbe ɗon haa maaki. Ammaa nde o yehi les maaki, o tawi sey haakooji tan, ngam naa ɗum saa'i ibbe.
Nden Yeesu wi'i ibbi: “Taa goɗɗo meeta nyaamugo ibbe haa maaɗa!” Pukara'en maako nani.
Nde ɓe njotti Urusaliima, Yeesu nasti
O accaay koo gooto saalo nder haykaliiru bee doŋngal.
Nden o ekkitini yimɓe, o wi'i: “Ndaa ko winnda nder Deftere Seniinde: Suudu am wi'ete suudu waɗugo do'a ngam ummaatooje fuu. Ammaa onon on ngartiri ndu lowol fasooɓe
Mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta nani haala man, ɓe puɗɗi tefugo dabare mbarugo Yeesu, ammaa ɓe ɗon kula mo ngam mooɓre fuu hayɗini ekkitinol maako.
Nde hiiri, Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum ngurti berniwol.
Jaŋngo man fajiri, nde ɓe ɗon caalo, ɓe ngi'i ibbi go, ki yoori bee ɗaɗi maaki fuu.
Piyer siftori, wi'i Yeesu: “Moodibbo, ndaa ibbi ki a naali go. Ki yoori.”
Nden Yeesu jaabi pukara'en muuɗum: “Nuɗɗine Allah.
Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on, to goɗɗo wi'i hooseere nde'e: Sootta diga ɗo, yolla nder mbeela, to o sekaay nder ɓernde maako sam, ammaa o nuɗɗini ko o wi'i laato, ɗum laatanto mo fakat
Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on: Nde on toroto huunde fuu, nuɗɗine on keɓi nde e on keɓan nde.
Yaake on ndarake ngam waɗugo do'a, to woodi huunde hakkunde mooɗon bee goɗɗo, njaafe mo, ngam haa Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo haa asama boo yaafano on aybeeji mooɗon.
[Ammaa to on njaafaaki woɗɓe, nden kam Baabiraawo mooɗon gonɗo haa asama boo yaafantaako on aybeeji mooɗon
Ɓe lorti haa Urusaliima. Yaake Yeesu ɗon waanca nder haykaliiru, mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ndotti'en dawrooɓe ngari haa maako.
Ɓe ƴami mo: “Bee duŋayeere moy a waarata kuuje ɗe'e? Moy duŋani ma waɗugo bana nii?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Min boo mi ƴaman on huunde woore. To on njaabake yam, nden kam min boo mi jaaboto on bee duŋayeere moy kuuwranmi kuuje ɗe'e.
Moy duŋani Yuhanna waɗango yimɓe baptisma? Allah naa malla yimɓe? Njaabe.”
Nden ɓe carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: “To en njaabake: Allah, o ƴaman en: Koni on nuɗɗinaay mo?
Haa en njaabo ɗum yimɓe…” ndaa ɓe ɗon kula ummaatoore ngam yimɓe fuu ndaari Yuhanna o annabiijo fakat.
Nden ɓe njaabi Yeesu: “Min anndaa.” Yeesu wi'i: “Min boo mi wi'ataa on bee duŋayeere moy mbaɗanmi kuuje ɗe'e.”
Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi wolwango ɓe bee balndi. O wi'i: “Goɗɗo jubi ngesa inabooje, o howi ka, o waɗi ɓiɗɗirde inaboojam, o mahi suudu towndu ngam aynoowo ngesa. Nden o halfini ka remooɓe, o dilli jahaaŋgal
Nde saa'i teɓugo inabooje waɗi, o neli jaggiiɗo maako haa remooɓe go ngam o jaɓana mo geɗal maako haa inabooje.
Ammaa ɓe naŋngi jaggiiɗo oo, ɓe piyi mo, ɓe ndiiwi mo juŋngo sooko.
Nden jawmu ngesa neli jaggiiɗo muuɗum feere. Kaŋko boo remooɓe naawni mo haa hoore, ɓe toski mo.
Jawmu ngesa neli jaggiiɗo muuɗum feere fahin, ammaa ɓe mbari mo. Bana non ɓe mbaɗi ɗuuɗɓe, ɓe piyi woɗɓe, ɓe mbari woɗɓe boo.
Luttani jawmu ngesa ɓiɗɗo gooto tan, giɗaaɗo maako. Haa ragare man o neli mo haa remooɓe go, o numi: Ɓe teddinan ɓiyam kam.
Ammaa remooɓe ɓe'e carwootiri, ɓe mbi'i: Ndaa kaŋko tammi ronugo. Sey en mbara mo, nden en marta ndonŋgu maako.
Nden ɓe naŋngi ɓiɗɗo go, ɓe mbari mo, ɓe ngudini mo yaasi ngesa.”
Nden Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Ɗume jawmu ngesa waɗata? O waran, o halkan remooɓe go, o hokkan ngesa inabooje haa woɗɓe.
Walaa seko on njaŋngi aaya ka'a:
Hayre nde mahooɓe ngudini,
laati hayre talkumoore ɓurnde saman.
Jawmiraawo waɗi ɗum,
ɗum kaayeefi haa gite meeɗen
Mawɓe Yahuudu'en ɗaɓɓi naŋngugo Yeesu, ngam ɓe anndi o wolwi balndol ngol dow maɓɓe. Ammaa ɓe kuli mooɓre, ngam maajum ɓe acci mo, ɓe ndilli.
Ɓe neli Farisa'en woɗɓe e yimɓe Hirudus haa Yeesu ngam naŋngugo mo nder ƴamol tuufnorgol.

Ɓe ngari, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Moodibbo, min anndi walaa ko yaali ma bee goɗɗo, ngam a senndindirtaa yimɓe, ammaa a ɗon anndina laawol Allah bee gooŋga. Yeccu min, ɗum kaanduɗum hokkugo laamiiɗo Roma jomorgol na? Min ndokka na malla min calo hokkugo?”
Nde Yeesu anndi naafikaare maɓɓe, o jaabi ɓe: “Koni on tuufani yam tuuforgol? Ngaddaneeɗam suleyre haa mi yi'a.”
Ɓe ngaddani mo. Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Suura moy e innde moy dow maare?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma jeyi.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Njoɓe Kaysara, ko haanani mo, ndokke Allah boo ko haanani mo.” Jaawaabu maako hayɗini ɓe masin.
Saduki'en wi'anɓe maayɓe ummitittaako ngari haa Yeesu. Ɓe ƴami mo ƴamol ngo'ol
“Moodibbo, Muusa winndani en umroore nde'e: To goɗɗo maayi, acci debbo mo walaano ɓiŋngel, sey deerɗiiko te'a mo ngam haa ɓe keɓana maayɗo danygol
Woodino deerɗiraaɓe njoweeɗiɗo. Arano te'i debbo, maayi, accaay ɓikkoy.
Ɗiɗaɓo te'i mo, maayi, kaŋko boo o accaay ɓikkoy, bana non boo tataɓo.
Haa njoweeɗiɗo te'ɓe debbo oo fuu maayi, ɓe accaay ɓikkoy. Ɓaawo maɓɓe debbo boo maayi.
Nyalaade ummitineeki, to maayɓe ummitake, debbo moy o laatanto caka maɓɓe kadi? Ngam ɓe njoweeɗiɗo fuu ɓe te'ino mo.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “On ɗon mboofa masin! Ngam on anndaa Defte Ceniiɗe, on anndaa boo baawɗe Allah.
Ngam to maayɓe ummitake, walaa teegal fahin, ɓe laatoto bana malaa'ika'en haa asama.
Ko laarani haala maayɓe e ummitineeki maɓɓe, on meeɗaay jaŋngugo ko winnda nder deftere Muusa dow haala wumre na? Ton Allah wi'i Muusa: Min woni Allah Ibrahiima e Allah Isiyaaku e Allah Yaakubu na
Allah o Allah yeeɗɓe, naa o Allah maayɓe. Ngam maajum on mboofi masin.”
Gooto nder Moodiɓɓe tawreeta nani kujjootiral maɓɓe, o nani Yeesu jaabi Saduki'en booɗɗum, nden o ƴami mo: “Dow umrooje fuu, umroore ndeye ɓuri mawnugo?”
Yeesu jaabi: “Ndaa umroore ɓurnde mawnugo: Onon Isra'iila'en, nane: Allah Jawmiraawo meeɗen, o gooto.
Yiɗ Jawmiraawo, Allah maaɗa bee ɓernde ma fuu, bee yoŋki ma fuu, bee hakkiilo ma fuu e bee semmbe ma fuu
Ndaa umroore ɗiɗawre: Yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo maaɗa bana hoore maaɗa. Walaa umroore feere ɓuri ɗe'e.
Nden moodibbo tawreeta wi'i Yeesu: “Booɗɗum moodibbo. Ko a wi'i, ɗum gooŋga: Jawmiraawo Allah o gooto, walaa Allah feere, sey kaŋko tan
Sey koo moy fuu yiɗa Allah bee ɓernde e hakkiilo e semmbe mum fuu, sey o yiɗa keeddiɗɗiiko boo bana no o yiɗirta hoore maako. Ɗum ɓuri dokke dabbaaji gulaaɗi e lii'aaɗi fuu
Yeesu nani o jaabi booɗɗum bee hikma, nden o wi'i mo: “A daayaaki laamu Allah.” Ɓaawo maajum koo moy huli ƴamugo mo ƴamɗe goɗɗe.
Nde Yeesu ɗon ekkitina nder haykaliiru, o waɗi ƴamol ngo'ol: “Noy moodiɓɓe mbi'rata Almasiihu woni
Ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗowi Daawuda, o wi'i bee hoore maako:
Jawmiraawo wolwani jawmam:
Jooɗa haa nyaamo am,
haa to mi wallini konne'en maaɗa les kosɗe ma.
Daawuda bee hoore muuɗum ewni mo Jawmiraawo, kadi noy Almasiihu laatori ɓii Daawuda?” Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde heɗiti haala Yeesu bee seyo.
Ndaa ko o ɗon ekkitina koo moy: “Ndeente e moodiɓɓe tawreeta, yiɗɓe waancugo bee ngapaleeji juuɗɗi, ɓe ngiɗi yimɓe koofna ɓe haa luuɓe.
Nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, ɓe ngiɗi jooɗaago haa joole tedduɗe e to ɓe ewnake ɓe ngam nyaamdu boo ɓe ɗaɓɓitan joole camɗinaaɗe.
Ɓe ɗon njaɓta marle rewɓe yurumɓe, ɓe ɗon njuutina do'aare ngam yimɓe ngi'a ɓe. Ɓe keɓan kiita naawka masin.”
Nden Yeesu jooɗi baŋnge baatirɗum ceede nder haykaliiru. O hakkilani yimɓe waatanɓe ceede nder baatirɗum ceede man. Riskuɓe ɗuuɗɓe ndokki ceede ɗuuɗɗe.
Debbo jurumɗo talakaajo boo wari, waati aniini ɗiɗi, waato ceede seɗɗa non.
Yeesu ewni pukara'en muuɗum, wi'i ɓe: “Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on, debbo jurumɗo talakaajo oo waati nder baatirɗum ceede ko ɓuri yimɓe woɗɓe fuu.
Ngam kamɓe ɓe ndokki seɗɗa diga ɗuuɗeeŋga jawdi maɓɓe, ammaa debbo oo, koo nde o laafuɗo, o hokki ko o mari ngam nguure maako fuu.”
Nde Yeesu wurti haykaliiru, gooto haa pukara'en maako wi'i mo: “Moodibbo, laar no kaa'e e nyiɓle ɗe'e mbooɗiri!”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “A ɗon yi'a nyiɓle mawɗe ɗe'e na? Fakat, hayre luttataa dow hayre, ɓe ngibbinan koo ɗume fuu.”
Yeesu ɗon jooɗi dow Hooseere Jaytunje haa huucitirde haykaliiru. Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna e Andire feere maɓɓe ƴami mo:
“Yeccu min ndey kuuje ɗe'e laatoto e alaama kaye waŋginta saa'iire timmoode kuuje ɗe'e fuu?”
Nden Yeesu fuɗɗi wi'ugo ɓe: “Kakkile, ngam taa goɗɗo majjina on.
Ɗuuɗɓe ngaran bee innde am, ɓe mbi'an: Min woni Almasiihu, ɓe majjinan yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe.
To on nani habaru konuuji ɓadiiɗi e daayiiɗi, taa kultore, doole ɗum laato, ammaa naa ɗum timmoode tawon.
Ummaatoore haɓan bee ummaatoore woɗnde, laamu ummanto laamu feere. Dimmbanɗe lesdi mbaɗan haa nokkuuje feere feere, non boo weelo. Ɗum laatoto bana fuɗɗam luuwe danyugo.

Ammaa onon, kakkilane ko'e mooɗon, ngam ɓe naŋngan on, ɓe njahran on yeeso hiitooɓe. Ɓe piyan on nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en. On ndaroto yeeso mawɓe e laamiiɓe ngam daliila am, haa on mbaɗa seedamku mooɗon yeeso maɓɓe.
Sey ummaatooje fuu nana waazu Linjiila tawon.
To ɓe naŋngi on, ɓe njahri on yeeso hiitooɓe, taa cuklane ko mbi'oton. Ammaa to wakkati man wari, mbolwe bolle ɗe on keɓata. Kanje ɗe iwataa haa mooɗon, ammaa haa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
Yimɓe ndokkan deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe ngam mbareego, baabiraaɓe mbaɗan ɓikkoy maɓɓe bana non, ɓikkoy ummanto saaro'en maɓɓe e koy mbaran ɓe.
Koo moy fuu wanyan on daliila innde am. Ammaa mo munyi haa timmoode, o hisan
Yeesu wi'i boo: “On ngi'an ko wi'ete nyidduɗum nattinoojum ɗon dari haa pellel ngel haanaay ɗum daro. Mo jaŋngi ɗum, sey faama booɗɗum! Nden kam sey wonɓe lesdi Yahudiya ndogga haa kooseeje
Mo ɗon dow soorowol, taa jippo ngam hoocugo koo ɗume nder maagol.
Mo ɗon haa ngesa, taa hoota saare ngam hoo'ugo limce mum
Kayto! Bone laatanto reedu'en e musininanɓe nder nyalɗe man!
Tore Allah ngam taa ɗum laato saa'i duumol.
Ngam nder nyalɗe maajum ɓillaare naawnde waɗan, bana maare meeɗaay waɗeego diga fuɗɗoode duniyaaru haa wargo hannde, nde meetataa waɗugo boo
To Allah ustaayno limgal nyalɗe man, walaa koo gooto hisanno. Ammaa o usti ɗe ngam daliila yimɓe maako ɓe o suɓi.
Wakkati man, to goɗɗo wi'i on: Ndaa
Ngam fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe almasiihu'en malla ɓe annabi'en mbaŋgan, ɓe mbaɗan alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji ngam ɓe majjina koo suɓaaɓe boo, to ɗum heɓoto.
Onon, kakkile! Mi yecci on ɗum fuu diga aran.”
Nder nyalɗe ɓaawo ɓillaare nde'e, naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru accan yaynugo
koode asama njanan, baawɗeeji asama boo ndimmboto
Nden
O nelan malaa'ika'en haa alkibilaaji nayi ngam mooɓtugo suɓaaɓe maako diga keerol duniyaaru ngo'ol haa ngola.
Paame ko ibbi anndinta on: To lice maaki kesɗiti, haakooji maaki boo mbiliti, on anndi duumol ɓadake.
Bana non onon boo, to on ngi'i kuuje ɗe'e ɗon laato, annde o ɓadake wargo.
Gooŋga mbi'anmi on: Kuuje ɗe'e fuu laatoto hiddeko yimɓe zamanuuru ndu'u fuu maayda.
Asama e lesdi njinnan, ammaa bolle am njinnataa sam.
“Ammaa walaa mo anndi nyalaade maajum koo saa'a maajum, malaa'ika'en anndaa, koo
Kakkile! Ayne! Ngam on anndaa ndey saa'i maajum laatoto.
Ɗum laatoto bana to goɗɗo dilli jahaaŋgal, acci saare mum, halfitini huuwooɓe muuɗum gooto gooto fuu kuugal muuɗum, umri aynoowo saare o ayna
Ngam maajum ayne, nde nii on anndaa ndey jawmu saare wartata, kiikiiɗe malla caka jemma malla boo baɓɓol, koo fajiri.
To o warti bee juhuki, taa o tawta on ɗon ɗaani.
Ko mi wi'i on, mi ɗon wi'a ɗum yimɓe fuu: Ayne!”
Lutti nyalɗe ɗiɗi haa juulde
Ɓe mbi'i: “Taa en mbaɗa ɗum wakkati juulde, ngam taa ɗum ummina fitina caka ummaatoore.”

Yeesu ɗon haa Baytaniya nder saare Simon kuturuujo. Saa'i o ɗon nyaama, debbo feere wari, o ɗon jogi faandu saɗndu heewndu uurdi mbi'eteendi nardi, ndi laaɓndi e caɗndi masin. O fusi hunnduko faandu man, o rufi uurdi go dow hoore Yeesu
Woɗɓe caka yimɓe ton ɓerni, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Koni o majjini nebbam ɗa'am meere?
To o soorrino ɗam ko ɓuri suleyje cardi teemeɗɗe tati, o hokkuno ceede man haa talaka'en, ɓuranno nafugo.” Ɓe peli mo bee caatal.
Ammaa Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Acce mo! Koni on pitinta mo? O huuwani yam kuugal booɗŋgal.
Talaka'en ɗon ngondi bee mooɗon foroy, on mbaawan waɗango ɓe ko wooɗi koo ndey on ngiɗi fuu. Ammaa min mi wondataa bee mooɗon foroy
Kaŋko o waɗi ko o waawi. Diga saa'i siwaa o rufi nebbam dow ɓanndu am ngam uweego.
Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on: Koo toy nder duniyaaru haa nuɗɗinɓe yam ngaazinta Linjiila fuu, ɓe ngeccan boo ko debbo oo waɗi e ɓe ciftoran mo.”
Nden Yahuuda Iskariyot, gooto nder pukara'en sappo e ɗiɗo, dilli haa mawɓe liman'en ngam o hokka Yeesu haa juuɗe maɓɓe.
Nde ɓe nani haala maako, ɓe ceyi. Ɓe iinani mo ceede. Nden Yahuuda ɗaɓɓiti wakkatiire ɓurnde fottugo ngam o hokka Yeesu haa juuɗe maɓɓe.
Nyalaade arannde haa juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka, nde ɓe kirsata jawgel
Nden Yeesu neli pukara'en muuɗum ɗiɗo, wi'i ɓe: “Naste nder berniwol, on pottan bee goɗɗo doondiiɗo mbulku ndiyam, tokke mo.
Haa saare nde o nastata, mbi'e jawmu saare man: Moodibbo wi'i: Toy suudu haa mi nyaama kiirtaari Paska bee pukara'en am?
O hollan on suudu mawndu, dowru, mo'itinaandu, taaskitinaandu, on taaskitina kuuje fuu ngam meeɗen ton.”
Pukara'en go ndilli, nasti berniwol, ɓe tawi koo ɗume fuu bana o wi'i ɓe, ɓe taaskitini kiirtaari Paska.
Nde kiikiiɗe waɗi, Yeesu wardi bee pukara'en muuɗum sappo e ɗiɗo.
Saa'i ɓe njooɗi ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu wi'i: “Gooŋga mbi'anmi on, gooto mooɗon mo ɗon nyaamda bee am, zammboto yam
Ɗum naawi ɓerɗe pukara'en, koo moy maɓɓe fuɗɗi ƴamugo mo: “Naa ɗum min sika?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Ɗum gooto haa sappo e ɗiɗo mooɗon, mo ɗon suuwa loŋngere mum bee am nder le'al.
Gooŋga
Nde ɓe ɗon nyaama, Yeesu hoo'i tamseere, waɗi yettoore, yewi tamseere man, hokki ɓe, wi'i: “Koo'e, ɗum ɓanndu am.”
Ɓaawo maajum o hoo'i jardugel, o yetti Allah, o hokki ɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe njari nder maagel.
O wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum ƴiiƴam am ndufaaɗam ngam ɗuuɗɓe, bee maajam Allah tabitiniri alkawal muuɗum
Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'a on: Mi meetataa yarugo inaboojam ɗam haa nyalaade mi yarata kesam nder laamu Allah.”
Nden ɓe ngimi gime maŋgtooje, ɓe ndilli haa Hooseere Jaytunje.
Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “On fuu on accatam on ndoggan, bana ko winnda nder Deftere: Mi mbaran gaynaako, baali caŋkititto
Ammaa to mi ummitake, mi aartan on yahugo lesdi Galiili
Piyer wi'i mo: “Koo to yimɓe fuu acci ma, min kam mi accataa ma.”
Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Gooŋga mbi'anmaami: Jemmaare nde'e, hiddeko asgumri
Ammaa Piyer tabitini ko o wi'i bee sawtu: “Mi meeɗataa wi'go mi anndaa ma, koo to doole mi maayda bee maaɗa.” Pukara'en luttuɓe fuu njaabi bana non.
Nde ɓe njotti nokkuure wi'eteende Gecemane, Yeesu wi'i pukara'en muuɗum: “Njooɗe haa ɗo, haa mi waɗoya do'a.”
Nden o yahdi bee Piyer e Yaakuba e Yuhanna. Kulol e saklere ukkani mo.
O wi'i ɓe: “Torra ɓernde am yiɗi mbarugo yam. Tokke jooɗaago haa ɗo, ayne.”
O yehi yeeso seɗɗa, o do'i haa lesdi, o tori haa saa'iire torra nde'e saalo acca mo, to heɓoto.
O wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo am, an a waawi waɗugo koo ɗume fuu. Ittanam jardugel torra nge'el. Ammaa waɗ ko ngiɗɗa, naa ko ngiɗmi.”
Nden o lori, o tawti pukara'en tato go, ɓe ɗon ɗaani. O wi'i Piyer: “Simon, a ɗon ɗaani na? A waawaay aynugo koo saa'a ngoota na?
Ayne, tore Allah ngam taa on nasta jarribeeki. Ko ruuhu neɗɗo yiɗi, ɓanndu muuɗum waawataa waɗugo ɗum, ngam ndu tampundu.”
Fahin o yehi, o waɗi do'a bana o waɗno naane.
Nde o lorti, o tawti ɓe ɓe ɗon ɗaani fahin, ngam gite maɓɓe teddi. Ɓe anndaa ko ɓe njaaboto mo.
Nde o wari haa maɓɓe tataɓre, o wi'i ɓe: “On ɗon ɗaani haa jonta na? On ɗon ciwto na? He'i kadi, saa'i waɗi! Jonta ɓe ndokkan
Umme, ndillen! Ndaa zammbotooɗo yam ɓaditake.”

Diga Yeesu timminaay wolwugo tawon, Yahuuda, gooto nder pukara'en maako sappo e ɗiɗo go wari. Mooɓre ɗuuɗnde wardi bee maako bee kaafaaje e cabbi, mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e ndotti'en dawrooɓe neli ɓe.
Yahuuda zammbotooɗo Yeesu hokkuno ɓe alaama, wi'i: “Mo mi hebbata, ɗum kaŋko. Naŋnge mo, ndillire mo, ayne mo booɗɗum.”
Nde o yotti, o ɓaditi Yeesu, o wi'i mo: “Moodibbo.” Nden o hebbi mo.
Nden woɗɓe boo ukki dow Yeesu, naŋngi mo.
Ammaa gooto haa dariiɓe ton losi kaafahi muuɗum, fe'i maccuɗo hooreejo liman'en, ta'i mo nofru.
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Koni on ngari bee kaafaaje e cabbi ngam naŋngugo yam bana mi pasoowo?
Nyalɗe fuu mi ɗonno wondi bee mooɗon nder
Nden pukara'en fuu ndoggi acci mo.
Suka feere tokki Yeesu, o ɗon wakki suddaare tan dow ɓanndu maako. Ɓe naŋngi mo,
ammaa o teeti, o wudini suddaare, o doggi o temmbo, o daɗi.
Ɓe njahri Yeesu haa hooreejo liman'en. Mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta fuu ɗon mooɓti ton.
Piyer tokki daayiiɗum, o nasti saare hooreejo liman'en. O jooɗodi bee aynooɓe, o ɗon aytino yiite.
Mawɓe liman'en e hiitooɓe nder dawriinde fuu ɗaɓɓi wullaandu dow Yeesu haa ɓe ndo'a mo kiita maayde, ammaa ɓe keɓaay.
Seedooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ceedi pewe dow maako, ammaa bolle maɓɓe luutindiri.
Nden woɗɓe maɓɓe ummi ceedi fewre nde'e dow maako, ɓe mbi'i:
“Min nani bee noppi amin o wi'i: Mi yibbinan haykaliiru ndu yimɓe mahi e mi mahitan ndu nder nyalɗe tati, naa bee juuɗe yimɓe
Ammaa kamɓe boo, seedamkuuji maɓɓe njahdaay.
Hooreejo liman'en ummi, dari caka yimɓe, ƴami Yeesu: “A jaabataako koo ɗume dow gullaali wulliiɓe ɓe'e na?”
Ammaa Yeesu jeeɗi, jaabaaki sam. Fahin hooreejo liman'en ƴami mo: “An a Almasiihu,
Yeesu wi'i: “Ooho, min woni kaŋko, onon boo on ngi'an
Hooreejo liman'en seeki limce mum, wi'i: “Walaa haaje en ɗaɓɓita seedooɓe feere.
On nani kalluka maako dow Allah. Ɗume on mbi'ata dow maajum?” Ɓe fuu ɓe njaabi o aybuɗo, ɓe kiiti mo kiita mbareego
Woɗɓe maɓɓe tuuti tuuɗe dow Yeesu. Ɓe cuddi gite maako, ɓe lukki mo, nden ɓe mbi'i mo: “Annditu, moy waɗi ma ɗum?” Aynooɓe boo koo'i mo, maari mo.
Nde Piyer ɗonno haa les, haa daldal saare tawon, gooto haa horɓe hooreejo liman'en wari.
Nde o yi'i Piyer ɗon aytino yiite, o laari mo, o wi'i: “An boo a ɗonno wondi bee Yeesu Nasaratuujo.”
Ammaa Piyer yeddi, wi'i: “Mi anndaa, mi faamaay ko a wi'i.” Nden o dilli haa zawleeru. Saa'i maajum asgumri
Korɗo go yi'i mo, wi'i dariiɓe ton fahin: “Oo ɗo, o gooto maɓɓe.”
Ammaa fahin Piyer yeddi. Ɓaawo maajum seɗɗa dariiɓe ton mbi'i Piyer: “Fakat a gooto maɓɓe, ngam an boo a goɗɗo Galiili.”
Piyer fuɗɗi hunaago: “Allah hiito yam to mi fewi! Mi anndaa gorko mo on mbolwanta ɗo.”
Saa'i maajum asgumri u'i ɗiɗawre. Piyer siftori wolde nde Yeesu wi'no mo: “Hiddeko asgumri u'a nde ɗiɗi, an a wi'an nde tati a anndaa yam.” Nden o wayliti o fuɗɗi woyugo.
Fajiri cub, mawɓe liman'en kawti bee ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta e hiitooɓe nder dawriinde fuu, ɓe carwootiri. Ɓe kaɓɓi Yeesu, ɓe njahri mo, ɓe ndokki mo haa juuɗe Pilaatu
Kaŋko boo o ƴami mo: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?” Yeesu jaabi mo: “Nonnon bana mbi'ɗa.”
Mawɓe liman'en ngullori Yeesu kuuje ɗuuɗɗe.
Nden Pilaatu ƴami mo fahin: “A jaabataako koo ɗume na? Laar no ɓe ngullori ma gullaali ɗuuɗɗi.”
Ammaa Yeesu sali wolwugo, haa Pilaatu hayɗini.
Nde juulde
Wakkati maajum goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Barabbas ɗon haa suudu fursina
Nden yimɓe mooɓre ndilli haa saare Pilaatu, ɓe mbi'i mo o waɗana ɓe ko o woowi waɗango ɓe.
Pilaatu ƴami ɓe: “On ngiɗi mi yoofana on laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?”
Ngam o anndi, mawɓe liman'en njahrani mo Yeesu ngam kaajal.
Ammaa mawɓe liman'en tiɗɗini yimɓe ɓe mbi'a mo ndikka o yoofana ɓe Barabbas.
Fahin Pilaatu wolwani yimɓe: “Mo on mbi'ata laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en, mi waɗa mo ɗume kadi?”
Ɓe kooli fahin, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Pilaatu ƴami: “Kadi halleende ndeye o waɗi?” Ammaa ɓe ɓesdi wookugo bee sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal!”
Pilaatu yiɗi fottango mooɓre. Ngam maajum o yoofani ɓe Barabbas. Nden o umri sooje'en, ɓe ɓocci Yeesu, o hokki mo haa juuɗe maɓɓe ngam ɓe ɓila mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Sooje'en njahri Yeesu haa daldal laamorde, ɓe mooɓti sooje'en wonɓe nder yeɓre woore fuu.
Ɓe ɓorni mo mojaare woɗeere, ɓe mbaɗi meetaleewol gi'e, ɓe njo'ini ngol dow hoore maako.
Nden ɓe koofni mo: “Allah woonane, an laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Ɓe piyi mo bee sawru dow hoore, ɓe tuuti mo tuuɗe, ɓe tuggi koppi ɓe cujidani mo.
Nde ɓe timmini jancugo mo, ɓe ɓorti mo mojaare woɗeere go, ɓe ɓorni mo limce maako. Nden ɓe njahri mo yaasi berniwol ngam ɓe ɓila mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Haa laawol ɓe potti bee goɗɗo Sirene, bi'eteeɗo Simon, baaba Aleksandire e Rufus, o ɗon warta ngesa. Sooje'en ndooli mo roondaago leggal gaafaaŋgal Yeesu
Ɓe njahri Yeesu haa nokkuure nde ɓe mbi'ata Golgota bana wi'ugo: nokkuure Gumbal-hoore.
Ton ɓe ngiɗi yarnugo mo inaboojam ɓennduɗam jillaaɗam bee ɗacce, ammaa Yeesu sali yarugo.
Nden ɓe ɓili mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal, ɓe cenndi limce maako bee waɗugo kur'u ngam ɓe keɓta ko koo moy maɓɓe hoo'ata
Ɗum ɗonno saa'a joweenayi fajiri, ɓe ɓili mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal.
Ɓe mbinndi daliila kiita maako dow alluha bana ni'i: “Laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Ɓe ɓildi fasooɓe ɗiɗo bee Yeesu haa leɗɗe gaafaaɗe, gooto haa nyaamo maako, gooto boo haa nano maako.
[Bana nii ko deftere wi'i gooŋɗiri, nde wi'i: “Ɓe limi mo nder huuwooɓe zunuuba
Saalotooɓe ton ndimmbini ko'e muuɗum'en, kuɗi mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Hey! A wi'no a yibbinan
Jippa leggal gaafaaŋgal kadi, hisnu hoore ma!”
Bana non boo mawɓe liman'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta njanci Yeesu, ɓe mbolwi hakkunde maɓɓe ɓe mbi'i: O hisni woɗɓe, ammaa o waawataa hisnugo hoore maako.
Sey en ngi'a
Caka naaŋge nyiɓre suddi lesdi fuu haa yotti saa'a tati asiri.
Saa'a tati Yeesu hooli bee sawtu: “
Woɗɓe dariiɓe ton nani ɗum, ɓe mbi'i: “Ndaa o ɗon ewno Eliya.”
Gooto maɓɓe yaawi suuwi sooso nder lammuɗam, taari ɗum dow loosol, nden o ɓaŋgti ɗum ngam yarnugo Yeesu, o wi'i: “Sey en ndeena e en ndaara to Eliya waran jippina mo diga leggal gaafaaŋgal.”
Ammaa Yeesu hooli bee semmbe, o maayi.
Wiirndallo nder
Nde ardiiɗo dow sooje'en Roma teemerre dariiɗo les leggal gaafaaŋgal yi'i no Yeesu maayri, o wi'i: “Fakat, goɗɗo oo o
Woodi boo rewɓe ton, ɓe ɗon ndaara diga daayiiɗum. Nder maɓɓe Mariyama mo wuro Magdala e Mariyama daada Yaakuba pamaro e Yoses e Salome.
Ɓe tokkino Yeesu, ɓe njagganino mo nde o ɗonno haa Galiili. Woodi boo rewɓe feere ɗuuɗɓe, ɓe ngarduno bee Yeesu haa Urusaliima
Nde ɗum nyalaade taaskara, bana wi'go nyalaade nde aartata
Yusufu mo wuro Arimatiya wari. O mawɗo tedduɗo caka dawrooɓe. O ɗon reeni garki laamu Allah boo. Kaŋko o tiɗɗini ɓernde maako, o yehi haa Pilaatu, o tori mo ɓanndu Yeesu.
Pilaatu hayɗini nanugo Yeesu maayi law bana nii. O ewni mawɗo sooje'en go, o ƴami mo: “Neeɓi o maayi na?”
Ɓaawo mawɗo sooje'en Roma anndini mo habaru man, o duŋani Yusufu hoosugo ɓanndu Yeesu.
Yusufu soodi kasa ɗigguka, o jippini ɓanndu Yeesu, o hasni ndu, o wallini ndu nder yenaande wasaande nder tapaare. Nden o talli hayre mawnde, o maɓɓi nastirde yenaande.
Mariyama mo Magdala e Mariyama daada Yoses ndaari haa ɓe mballini ɓanndu Yeesu.
Nde
Alat, nyannde go'oore nder asaweere, ɓe ndawi cub yahugo yenaande, ɓe njotti ton saa'i puɗki naaŋge.
Ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri hakkunde maɓɓe: “Moy sottinanta en hayre haa nastirde yenaande?”
Ammaa nde ɓe ɓaŋgti gite, ɓe ngi'i hayre mawnde go sottinaama.
Ɓe nasti nder yenaande. Ɓe ngi'i suka ɗon jooɗi ton haa wakeere nyaamre, o ɗon ɓorni toggoore raneere. Ɓe kultori.
Ammaa o wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore! On ɗon ɗaɓɓita Yeesu Nasaratuujo mo ɓe ɓilino haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. O walaaɗon haa ɗo, o ummitake. Ndaa haa ɓe mballinno mo.
Jonta ndille, mbi'e pukara'en maako e Piyer kubaruwol ngo'ol: O aartan on yahugo Galiili, ton ngi'oton mo bana o wi'no on
Rewɓe ngurti yenaande man, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe ndiwni ɓe kultori masin. Ɓe mbi'aay haala man koo moy, ngam ɓe kultori.
Ɓaawo Yeesu ummiti diga maayde, nyannde Alat fajiri cub, o aarti waŋgango Mariyama mo Magdala mo o riiwi ruuhuuji coɓɗi joweeɗiɗi haa maako.
O yehi, o anndini ɗum hawtiɗiraaɓe Yeesu. Kamɓe ɓe ɗonno mboya, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ta'ino.
Ɓe nani Mariyama ɗon wi'a: “Yeesu o geeto, mi yi'i mo!” Ammaa ɓe nuɗɗinaay ko o wi'i.
Ɓaawo maajum Yeesu waŋgani ɗiɗo maɓɓe bee jaati feere, nde ɓe ɗon njaha kawye.
Ɓe lori, ɓe ngecci ɗum luttuɓe, ammaa kamɓe boo ɓe nuɗɗinaay ɗum.
Ɓaawoɗon Yeesu waŋgani pukara'en sappo e go'o saa'i ɓe ɗon nyaama. O feli ɓe ngam sooynde nuɗɗinki maɓɓe. O feli ɓe boo ngam caatal ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay bolle yi'ɓe mo ɓaawo o ummiti.
Nden o wi'i ɓe: “Njehe koo toy nder duniyaaru, ngaazine koo moy Linjiila
Koo moy nuɗɗini, jaɓi baptisma, hisan. Mo nuɗɗinaay, Allah hiitoto mo.
Nuɗɗinɓe mbaŋginan alaamaaji ɗi'i: Ɓe ndiiwan ginnaaji bee innde am, ɓe mbolwan bee ɗemɗe kese.
To ɓe naŋngi boɗɗe bee juuɗe malla to ɓe njari njaram mbaroojam, ɗum naawnataa ɓe sam. Ɓe njowan juuɗe maɓɓe dow nyawɓe, ɓe njamɗitan.”]
Ɓaawo nde Jawmiraawo timmini wolwango pukara'en muuɗum, o eeŋgti haa asama, o jooɗi haa nyaamo Allah
Pukara'en kam ndilli, ngaazini Linjiila koo toy fuu. Jawmiraawo boo huuwdi bee maɓɓe, gooŋɗini waazu maɓɓe bee alaamaaji go.
Yaa Teyofilus tedduɗo: Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe kaɓdi winndugo kubaruwol kuuje laatiiɗe caka meeɗen.
Ɓe mbinndi ko min nani haa yi'ɓe kuuje ɗe'e bee gite muuɗum'en diga fuɗɗam, halfitinaaɓe kuugal anndingo kubaruwol man.
Ngam maajum nde mi humpiti laaɓka kuuje ɗe'e fuu diga fuɗɗoode maaje, ɗum haandani yam haa mi winndane ɗum bee tokkindirki, yaa Teyofilus tedduɗo.
Mi waɗi ɗum ngam haa a faama hoolɗinaare ekkitinolji ɗi keɓɗa.
Nder zamanu Hirudus ɗonno laamani lesdi Yahudiya, woodino goɗɗo limanjo, mo innde muuɗum Zekariya, gonɗo nder yeɓre
Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe adili'en yeeso Allah, ɓe ɗon ɗowtano umrooje Jawmiraawo e farillaaji muuɗum fuu bee booɗɗum.
Ammaa ɓe ngalaano ɓiŋngel, ngam Elizabet laatino dimaro e non boo ɓe ɗiɗo fuu ɓe naywi.
Nyannde feere Zekariya ɗon huuwa kuugal limanku muuɗum yeeso Allah, ngam ɗum wakkati kuugal yeɓre maako.
Liman'en mboowi senndugo kuuɗe hakkunde muuɗum'en bee waɗugo
Saa'i o ɗon wula uurle, mooɓre ummaatoore fuu ɗon waɗa do'a haa yaasi.
Ɗon nii, Zekariya yi'i malaa'ikaajo ɗon dari haa wakeere gulduɗum uurle nyaamre.
Nde o yi'i mo, o hultori, o sakli.
Ammaa malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Taa hultor, Zekariya, ngam Allah nani do'aare maaɗa. Debbo maaɗa Elizabet danyante ɓiŋngel, a innda ngel Yuhanna.
A seyoto masin, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ceyodoto bee maaɗa ngam danyeeki maagel.
Ngam o laatoto mawɗo yeeso Jawmiraawo. O yarataa inaboojam malla nguykinoojam koo ɗame. O kebbinteeɗo bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo diga nder reedu daada maako
O lornan Isra'iila'en ɗuuɗɓe haa Jawmiraawo Allah maɓɓe.

O aartan Jawmiraawo wargo nder ruuhu e baawɗe ɗe annabi Eliya heɓno, ngam o lortina ɓerɗe baabiraaɓe haa ɓikkoy muuɗum'en, o wartira ɓerɗe tuurtooɓe haa hikma ka adili'en, o taaskitina ummaatoore ngam Jawmiraawo.”
Ammaa Zekariya wi'i malaa'ikaajo: “Noy anndiranmi ɗum gooŋga? Ngam min mi naywi, debbo am boo duuɓi muuɗum ɗuuɗi.”
Malaa'ikaajo jaabi mo: “Min mi Jibirilla, mi ɗon daro yeeso Allah ngam huuwango mo. Kaŋko neli yam mi wolwane, mi anndine kubaruwol belŋgol ngo'ol
Ammaa a nuɗɗinaay bolle am tammiiɗe gooŋɗugo to wakkati man waɗi. Ngam maajum a laatoto muukaajo, a waawataa wolwugo haa to kuuje ɗe'e laatake.”
Saa'i man yimɓe ɗon ndeena Zekariya. Ɓe kayɗini ngam o neeɓi nder haykaliiru.
Nde o wurti, o waawaay wolwango ɓe, ɓe paami o yi'i kaayeefi nder haykaliiru. O ɗonno waɗana ɓe alaamaaji bee juuɗe, ngam o waawaay wolwugo.
Nde wakkati kuugal Zekariya nder haykaliiru timmi, o hooti saare maako.
Nyalɗe seɗɗa ɓaawoɗon, debbo maako Elizabet reedi, o suuɗi baakin lebbi jowi. O wi'i:
“Ndaa ko Jawmiraawo waɗani yam: O ittani yam semteende ndimaraaku am caka yimɓe fuu.”
Nde Elizabet reedi, waɗi lebbi joweego, Allah neli malaa'ikaajo Jibirilla haa berniwol bi'eteeŋgol Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili.
O neli mo haa paanyo debbo, kaɓɓanaaɗo gorko bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, mo danygol Daawuda. Innde paanyo debbo boo Mariyama
Malaa'ikaajo wari haa maako, wi'i mo: “Seya, an keɓɗo mo'ere Allah! Jawmiraawo ɗon wondi bee maaɗa!”
Bolle ɗe'e cakli Mariyama masin, o numi ko ɗum yiɗi wi'go.
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Taa hultor, Mariyama, ngam a heɓi mo'ere Allah.
A tammi reedugo, a danyan ɓiɗɗo gorko, a inndan mo Yeesu
O laatoto mawɗo, ɓe ewnoto mo
O laamanto ummaatoore Isra'iila haa foroy, laamu maako timmataa sam
Mariyama wi'i malaa'ikaajo: “Noy ɗum laatorto, nde min mi anndaa gorko sam?”
Malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Ruuhu Ceniiɗo waran dow maaɗa, baawɗe Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo suddete bana ɗowdi. Ngam maajum ɓiɗɗo mo a tammi danyugo, laatoto Ceniiɗo e ɓe ewnoto mo Ɓiɗɗo
Elizabet, banndiraawo maaɗa ɗon bee reedu, o danyan ɓiŋngel gorgel, koo nde o naywi, ɓe mbi'no mo o dimaro boo, ammaa jonta o ɗon bee reedu lebbi joweego.
Ngam walaa ko saɗani Allah
Mariyama wi'i: “Min mi korɗo Jawmiraawo, ɗum laatano yam bana mbi'ɗa.” Nden malaa'ikaajo dilli, acci mo.
Nder balɗe man Mariyama ummi, dilli bee jaawal haa wuro woɗŋgo, nder kooseeje lesdi Yahudiya.
O nasti saare Zekariya, o hoofni Elizabet.
Saa'i Elizabet nani koofŋgol Mariyama, ɓiŋngel fuɗɗi dimmbaago nder reedu maako. Nden Elizabet heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo,
wi'i bee sawtu: “A barkiɗinaaɗo caka rewɓe fuu, ɓiŋngel ngel a tammi danyugo boo barkiɗinaaŋgel!
Min mi moye haa daada
Ngam ndaa, saa'i mi nani koofŋgol ma, ɓiŋngel dimmbi nder reedu am ngam seyo.
Barka laatani ma ngam a nuɗɗini ko Jawmiraawo wi'i ma, ɗum laatoto.”
Nden Mariyama wi'i:
“Nafsu am ɗon maŋgta Jawmiraawo,
ɓernde am ɗon heewi seyo ngam Allah am, kisnoowo yam!
Ngam o yerdi laarugo korɗo maako leesɗo.
Fakat, diga jonta yimɓe gide fuu mbi'an mi barkiɗinaaɗo,
ngam Allah Baawɗo waɗani yam kuuje mawɗe!
Innde maako woni Ceniiɗo,
enɗam maako ɗon dow hulɓe mo diga yidere haa yidere.
O huuwi kuuɗe mawɗe bee juŋngo maako semmbiɗŋgo,
o saŋkiti mawnitiiɓe nder numooji muuɗum'en.
O jippini semmbiɗɓe diga leese laamu muuɗum'en,
o ɓaŋgti leesɓe.
O haarni dolɓe bee kuuje booɗɗe,
riskuɓe boo, o riiwi ɓe juuɗe meere.
O walli Isra'iila, jagganiiɗo mo,
o siftori enɗam maako,
bana o wi'no kaakiraaɓe meeɗen, waato Ibrahiima e danygol muuɗum haa foroy
Mariyama jooɗodi bee Elizabet ko dillani lebbi tati, nden o hooti saare maako.
Nde saa'i Elizabet danyata yotti, o danyi ɓiɗɗo gorko.
Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako e banndiraaɓe maako nani Jawmiraawo waɗani mo enɗam ɗuuɗɗam, ɓe ceyodi bee maako.
Nde nyalaade joweetataɓre waɗi, ɓe ngari ngam juulnugo
Ammaa daada maagel wi'i: “Aa'a, naa non, ngel inndete Yuhanna.”
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Walaa koo gooto nder banndiraaɓe ma mari innde nde'e.”
Nden ɓe mbaɗani baaba maagel alaama bolle bee juuɗe, ngam haa ɓe ƴama mo innde ndeye o yiɗi inndugo ngel.
Zekariya anndini ɓe, ɓe ndokka mo alluha. Nden o winndi: “Innde maagel Yuhanna.” Yimɓe fuu kayɗini.
Saa'i man nden hunnduko Zekariya maɓɓiti, ɗemŋgal maako fiisti, o fuɗɗi wolwugo, o maŋgti Allah bee sawtu.
Heeddiɗɗiraaɓe maako fuu kultori masin. Haa lesdi kooseeje Yahudiya fuu ɓe mbolwi haala kuuje ɗe'e.
Nanɓe ɗum fuu tokki numugo: “Ɗume ɓiŋngel nge'el tammi laataago?” Ngam fakat, baawɗe Jawmiraawo ɗon ngondi bee maagel.
Zekariya, baaba ɓiŋngel go heewi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, o waɗi annabaaku, o wi'i:
“Yettoore laatano Allah, Jawmiraawo Isra'iila,
ngam o hakkilani ummaatoore maako, o rimɗini nde.
O darnani en kisnoowo cemmbiɗɗo,
nder danygol Daawuda, jaggiiɗo maako.
Kanjum woni ko o anndinno diga ɓooyma
bee kunnduɗe annabi'en maako seniiɓe,
o wi'no o rimɗinan en diga juuɗe konne'en meeɗen,
e baawɗe wanyɓe en fuu.
O waŋginani kaakiraaɓe meeɗen enɗam maako,
o siftori alkawal maako ceniiŋgal.
Ngam Allah hunani kaakiraawo meeɗen Ibrahiima,
o hisnan en baawɗe konne'en meeɗen,
haa en njaggano mo bilaa kulol,
ngam haa en laato yimɓe maako seniiɓe e adili'en nder balɗe ngeendam meeɗen fuu.
An boo, ɓiŋngel pamarel, ɓe ewnoto ma annabiijo Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo,
ngam a aartan Jawmiraawo ngam haa a mo'inana mo laawol
A anndinan yimɓe maako o hisnan ɓe,
bee yaafango ɓe hakkeeji maɓɓe.
Allah meeɗen o keewɗo enɗam,
daliila enɗam ɗa'am, o yaynan dow meeɗen bana naaŋge puɗanŋge,
ngam yaynango wonɓe nder nyiɓre e les ɗowdi maayde
e ɗowugo kosɗe meeɗen dow laawol salaaman
Yuhanna mawni, o semmbiɗi boo nder ruuhu. O jooɗi nder ladde haa yotti wakkati o waŋgi haa ummaatoore Isra'iila.
Nder saa'i man laamiiɗo Agustus, umri binndol yimɓe nder lesɗe maral maako fuu.
Kaŋgol woni binndol aranol, ngol waɗi yaake Kiriniyus ɗonno ngomna lesdi Siriya.
Yimɓe njehi ngam winndeego, koo moy fuu haa wuro iwde muuɗum.
Yusufu ummi wuro Nasaratu nder lesdi Galiili, yehi nder lesdi Yahudiya, haa Baytilaama, wuro laamiiɗo Daawuda danyano, ngam o iwi haa asŋgol Daawuda.
O yehi ton ngam winndeego, kaŋko e Mariyama, kaɓɓanaaɗo maako, reeduujo.
Yaake ɓe ɗon ton, nyalaade haa Mariyama ɓesna yotti.
O danyi ɓiŋngel gorgel, afel maako, o saawi ngel nder limce, o wallini ngel nder nyaamnirde dabbaaji, ngam ɓe keɓaay nokkuure nder saare haa hoɗɓe mbeerata.
Woodino waynaaɓe haa ladde nder lesdi maajum, ɓe ɗon ayna tokke dammooji maɓɓe jemma.
Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo waŋgani ɓe, tedduŋgal Jawmiraawo yayni dow maɓɓe, ɓe kultori masin.
Ammaa malaa'ikaajo wi'i ɓe: “Taa kultore! Ngam mi waddani on kubaruwol belŋgol, ceynanŋgol masin ngam ummaatoore fuu.
Jemmaare hanndeere nde'e, kisnoowo danyanaama on nder wuro Daawuda, kaŋko woni Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo.
Ndaa, on keɓtiran mo bee alaama ka'a: On tawan ɓiŋngel caawaaŋgel bee limce, ballinaaŋgel nder nyaamnirde dabbaaji.”
Law, mooɓre malaa'ika'en asama kawti bee malaa'ikaajo go, ɓe teddini Allah, ɓe mbi'i:
“Tedduŋgal haa Allah towɗo dow asamanji,
salaaman boo dow lesdi haa yimɓe yiɗaaɓe Allah!”
Nde malaa'ika'en acci ɓe, lorti haa asama, waynaaɓe mbi'mbi'tiri hakkunde muuɗum'en: “Ndillen haa en njotto Baytilaama, en ndaara ko Jawmiraawo anndini en go.”
Ɓe njaawi yahugo ton, ɓe tawi Mariyama bee Yusufu e ɓiŋngel keccel, ngel ɗon waali nder nyaamnirde dabbaaji.
Nde ɓe ngi'i ngel, ɓe ngecci ko malaa'ikaajo wi'no ɓe dow maagel.
Nanɓe ko waynaaɓe mbi'i fuu, kayɗini.
Ammaa Mariyama jogi ɗum fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum, o tokki numtugo ɗum.
Nden waynaaɓe lori, ɓe ɗon teddina Allah, ɓe ɗon maŋgta mo ngam kuuje ɗe ɓe nani e ɓe ngi'i fuu, ngam ɗum fuu ɗum laati bana malaa'ikaajo anndinno ɓe.
Nde nyalɗe joweetati caali, ɓe njuulni
Nde wakkati laɓɓinki
Ngam tawreeta Jawmiraawo wi'i: “Ɓiɗɗo gorko afo fuu, Jawmiraawo jeyi
Ɓe ngari boo ngam ɓe lii'o kirseteeɗum bana Jawmiraawo umri: “Pooli masar ɗiɗi malla pooloy ɗiɗoy
Woodino goɗɗo feere ton, innde maako Simeyon, o adiliijo e kulɗo Allah, o ɗonno reena kisnoowo Isra'iila garanɗo. Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗon wondi bee maako,
anndini mo o maayataa, sey to o yi'i
Ruuhu yerɓi mo, o yehi nder haykaliiru. Saa'i maajum saaro'en Yeesu ngaddi ɓiŋngel muuɗum'en ngam ɓe mbaɗana ngel ko tawreeta umri.
Simeyon hoo'i ngel haa juuɗe muuɗum, o yetti Allah e o wi'i:
“Jonta yaa Jawmiraawo, a hebbitini iinawol ngol a waɗi.
Accu maccuɗo maaɗa maaya nder salaaman.
Ngam mi yi'i kisndam maaɗa bee gite am,
kisndam ɗam a taaskitinani ummaatooje fuu.
Kanjum woni annoora ka waŋginte haa ummaatooje goɗɗe,
kaŋka laatoto boo tedduŋgal ummaatoore maaɗa Isra'iila
Baaba e daada Yeesu kayɗini nde ɓe nani Simeyon ɗon wolwa dow maako bana non.
Simeyon barkiɗini ɓe e o wi'i Mariyama, daada Yeesu: “Allah suɓi ɓiŋngel nge'el ngam laataago daliila do'uki e ummuki yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder Isra'iila, o laatoto alaama Allah ka yimɓe tammaay jaɓugo.
O waŋginan numooji yimɓe cuuɗiiɗi. An bee hoore maaɗa boo, naaworla tufete ɓernde bana kaafahi!”
Woodino annabiijo debbo, innde maako Anna, ɓii Fanuwel, mo lenyol Aser. O naywi masin. O jooɗino duuɓi joweeɗiɗi tan bee goriiko yaake o derkeejono.
O jooɗi o jurumɗo haa duuɓi maako mbaɗi cappanɗe joweetati e nayi. O ɗon haa
O wari wakkati man, o fuɗɗi yettugo Allah. O wolwi dow ɓiŋngel nge'el haa yimɓe reenanɓe ndimu Urusaliima fuu.
Nde saaro'en Yeesu timmini waɗugo ko tawreeta Jawmiraawo umri, ɓe kooti bee maako haa lesdi Galiili, haa Nasaratu berniwol maɓɓe
Ɓiŋngel tokki mawnugo e semmbiɗiɗgo, ngel heewi faamu. Ngel heɓi yerduye Allah.
Hitaande fuu saaro'en Yeesu ɗon njaha Urusaliima ngam waɗugo juulde
Nde Yeesu waɗi duuɓi sappo e ɗiɗi, ɓe njehi ton fodde al'aada.
Nde juulde timmi, ɓe kooti, ammaa Yeesu lutti haa Urusaliima, saaro'en maako kattitaaki ɗum.
Ɓe tammino o ɗon wondi bee yahdanɓe bee maɓɓe. Ɓe njehi baakin nyalaade woore, nden ɓe puɗɗi ɗaɓɓititgo mo caka banndiraaɓe maɓɓe e soobiraaɓe maɓɓe.
Ammaa ɓe keɓtaay mo, ngam maajum ɓe lori haa Urusaliima ngam ɗaɓɓitoygo mo.
Nyannde tataɓre maajum, ɓe tawi mo nder
Nanooɓe mo fuu kayɗini daliila faamu maako e jaawaabuuji ɗi o jaabori.
Nde saaro'en maako ngi'i mo, ɓe kayɗini masin. Daada maako wi'i mo: “Ɓiŋngel am, ngam ɗume ngaɗɗa min bana nii? Min bee baaba maaɗa fuu, min cakli masin bee ɗaɓɓititgo ma!”
O jaabi ɓe, o wi'i: “Ngam ɗume ɗaɓɓititton yam? On anndaa sey mi wona nder suudu Baabiraawo am na?”
Ammaa ɓe paamaay ko o wi'i ɓe.
Nden Yeesu hooti bee maɓɓe haa Nasaratu, o ɗowtani ɓe. Daada maako tokki jogaago kuuje ɗe'e fuu nder ɓernde muuɗum.
Yeesu ɗon mawna, faamu maako yehi yeeso yeeso, o heɓi yerduye Allah e nde yimɓe fuu

Nder hitaande sappo e jowaɓre haa laamu Tiberiyus Kaysara, laamiiɗo Roma, Pontiyus Pilaatu wonno ngomna dow lesdi Yahudiya, Hirudus laamani lesdi Galiili, deerɗum Filip boo laamani lesdi Itureya e lesdi Tarakonitis, Lisaniya boo laamani lesdi Abilen,
Annas e Kayafas ngonno mawɓe liman'en. Saa'i man Allah wolwani Yuhanna ɓii Zekariya nder ladde.
O waanci lesdi kommbi maayo Urdun fuu, o waazini yimɓe ɓe tuuba, ɓe njaɓa baptisma ngam yaafuye hakkeeji maɓɓe.
Ɗum laati bana annabi Esaaya winnduno nder deftere muuɗum:
“Goɗɗo ɗon hoola nder ladde:
Mo'inane Jawmiraawo laawol,
mbaɗane mo buuwi darnuɗi.
Waadiwol fuu fottitan,
hooseere e towndiire fuu leestinte,
laawol leliiŋgol fuu dartoto,
laabi kalluɗi fuu mbootan.
Yimɓe fuu ngi'an kisndam Allah
Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngari haa Yuhanna ngam o waɗana ɓe baptisma. O wi'i ɓe: “Ɓiɓɓe poosokje, moy wi'i on on kisan tikkere Allah warannde
Kuuwe kuuɗe ɗe mbaŋginta on tuubi! Taa nume nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, on mbi'a: Ibrahiima woni kaaka amin. Ngam mi ɗon wi'a on, Allah woodi baawɗe waɗango Ibrahiima ɓiɓɓe bee kaa'e ɗe'e.
Jonta ma fe'irde ɗon taaski ngam fe'ugo lekki diga ɗaɗi mum: Lekki ki rimataa ɓiɓɓe booɗɗe fuu, ki fe'e, ki wudine nder yiite
Yimɓe ƴami mo: “Ɗume haani min mbaɗa kadi?”
O jaabi ɓe: “Mo mari toggooje ɗiɗi, sey o sennda ɗe bee mo walaa sam. Marɗo nyaamdu boo, sey waɗa bana non.”
Jomnooɓe boo ngari haa Yuhanna ngam ɓe njaɓa baptisma, ɓe ƴami mo: “Moodibbo, ɗume haani min mbaɗa
O jaabi ɓe: “Taa on njomna yimɓe ɓura ko ɓe umri on jaɓugo haa maɓɓe.”
Sooje'en boo ngari, ƴami mo bana non, ɓe mbi'i: “Minin boo, ko haani min mbaɗa?” O jaabi ɓe: “Taa on njaɓta jawdi koo moy malla on kooca ndi dow seedamku fewre. Ammaa ceyore ngeenaari mooɗon tan.”
Yimɓe ɗonno ndeena bee tammunde, koo moy ɗonno numa: “Teema Yuhanna oo woni Almasiihu.”
