Ammaa ngam haa duniyaaru annda mi yiɗi Baabiraawo, ngam maajum mi ɗon waɗa ko Baabiraawo umri yam. Umme, ndillen diga ɗo!”
Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Min, mi inabohi gooŋgahi, Baabiraawo am woni jawmu ngesa.
Lisal koo ngale haa am ngal rimataa ɓiɓɓe, o ta'an ngal. Ammaa lisal dimanŋgal ɓiɓɓe, o mo'inan ngal haa ngal ɓesda rimugo ɓiɓɓe fahin.
Onon on mo'inaaɓe ngam daliila wolde nde mi wolwani on.

Tabite nder kawtal bee am, nden kam min boo mi tabitan nder kawtal bee mooɗon. Bana no lisal inabohi rimataa ɓiɓɓe, sonaa to ngal hawti bee inabohi, bana non onon boo, on mbaɗataa nafuuda sonaa to on ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee am.
Min woni inabohi, onon on lice. Mo tabiti nder kawtal bee am, min boo mi tabiti nder kawtal bee muuɗum, kaŋko o waɗan nafuuda. Ammaa to on ngondaay bee am, on mbaawataa waɗugo koo ɗume.
To goɗɗo tabitaay nder kawtal bee am, o wudinteeɗo yaasi bana lisal ta'aaŋgal, ngal yooran, nden ɓe koocan ngal ɓe ngudina ngal nder yiite, ngal wula.
To on ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee am, bolle am boo ɗon tabiti nder mooɗon, tore ko on ngiɗi fuu, on keɓan ɗum.
Ndaa ko teddinta Baabiraawo am: On mbaɗa nafuuda ɗuuɗka, on laato pukara'en
Bana no Baabiraawo yiɗiri yam, non min boo mi yiɗiri on. Tabite nder yiide am.
To on ɗon njogo umrooje am, on tabitan nder yiide am, bana no min boo mi jogori umrooje Baabiraawo am, mi ɗon tabiti nder yiide maako.
Mi wolwani on ɗum bana nii ngam haa seyo am wona nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, seyo mooɗon boo heewa.
Ndaa umroore am: Ngiɗindire bana no mi yiɗiri on
Walaa yiide ɓurata nde'e: Goɗɗo hokka yoŋki muuɗum ngam soobiraaɓe muuɗum.
On soobiraaɓe am, to on ɗon mbaɗa ko mi umri on.
Mi ewnataa on huuwooɓe fahin, ngam kuuwoowo anndaa ko jaagorɗo muuɗum waɗata. Mi ewni on soobiraaɓe am, ngam ko mi nani haa Baabiraawo am fuu, mi anndini on ɗum.

Naa onon cuɓi yam, ammaa min suɓi on. Mi suɓi on, mi yowani on kuugal, ngam haa on njaha, on mbaɗa nafuuda, nafuuda mooɗon boo tabita, ngam haa ko on ƴamata haa Baabiraawo bee innde am fuu, o hokka on ɗum.
Ngiɗindire, kanjum mi umri on.”
To duniyaaru wanyi on, annde ndu aarti wanyugo yam min.
To on laatino ɓe duniyaaru, ndu yiɗanno on ngam on yimɓe maaru. Ammaa nde nii on laataaki ɓe duniyaaru, mi suɓi on, mi wurtini on diga duniyaaru, ngam maajum, duniyaaru ɗon wanya on.
Ciftore ko mi wi'i on: Kuuwoowo ɓurataa jaagorɗo muuɗum maŋngu. To ɓe toonyake yam, ɓe toonyoto on onon boo. To ɓe ɗowtanake bolle am, ɓe ɗowtanto bolle mooɗon boo
Ammaa ɓe mbaɗan on ɗum fuu ngam daliila innde am, ngam ɓe anndaa nelɗo yam.
Ɓe ngalaano aybe to mi waraayno, mi wolwanaayno ɓe. Ammaa jonta ɓe ngalaa hujja ngam hakke maɓɓe.
Koo moy wanyi yam, wanyi Baabiraawo am boo.
Ɓe ngalaano aybe to mi huuwaayno kuuɗe caka maɓɓe ɗe goɗɗo meeɗaay huuwugo. Ammaa jonta ɓe ngi'i kuuɗe am, bee non fuu ɓe nganyi yam, min e Baabiraawo am.
Ɗum laati non, ngam haa ko winnda nder defte maɓɓe, waato tawreeta gooŋɗa: Ɓe nganyi yam bilaa daliila
To Balloowo mo mi nelata haa mooɗon diga Baabiraawo wari, waato Ruuhu mo gooŋga garanɗo diga Baabiraawo, kaŋko o seedanto yam.
Onon boo on ceedanto yam, ngam on ngondi bee am diga fuɗɗam.
“Mi wolwani on ɗum bana nii ngam taa on acca nuɗɗingo yam.
Ɓe ngurtinan on cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en. Saa'iire waran, nde koo moy mbari goɗɗo mooɗon tammi o waɗi ko Allah yiɗi.
Ɓe mbaɗan ɗum ngam ɓe anndaa Baabiraawo, ɓe anndaa yam min boo.
Ammaa mi wolwani on bana nii ngam to saa'i man waɗi, on ciftora mi biiɗo on ɗum.” Mi wi'aayno on ɗum diga fuɗɗam, ngam mi ɗonno wondi bee mooɗon.
Jonta, mi ɗon dilla haa nelɗo yam, walaa koo gooto mooɗon ƴami yam: Toy njahataa?
Ammaa jonta ɓerɗe mon cunake ngam mi wi'i on ɗum.
Ammaa gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Ɗum ɓuran nafugo on to mi dilli, ngam to mi dillaay, Balloowo go warataa haa mooɗon. To mi dilli, mi nelan mo haa mooɗon.
Kaŋko, to o wari, o waŋginan boofi yimɓe duniyaaru dow haala hakke e adilaaku e kiita.
Ɓe ɗon mboofa dow haala hakke, ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay yam.
Ɓe ɗon mboofa dow haala adilaaku, ngam mi ɗon dilla haa Baabiraawo, on meetataa yi'ugo yam.
Ɓe ɗon mboofa dow haala kiita boo, ngam laamiiɗo duniyaaru ndu hiitaama.
“Kuuje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe luttani yam wi'ugo on, ammaa ɗum ɓuran faamu mooɗon tawon.
To Ruuhu mo gooŋga wari, o ɗowan on nder gooŋga fuu. Ngam o wolwataa ngiɗa maako, ammaa o wi'an on ko o nani, ko tammi wargo fuu.
Kaŋko o teddintam, ngam o yeccan on ko o heɓi haa am.
Ko Baabiraawo mari fuu, min mari ɗum. Ngam maajum mbi'mi: Ruuhu yeccan on ko o nani haa am.”
Yeesu wi'i: “Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, ɓaawoɗon seɗɗa on ngi'atam fahin.”
Woɗɓe caka pukara'en maako ƴamƴamtiri: “Ɗume o yiɗi wi'go en: Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, ɓaawoɗon seɗɗa on ngi'atam fahin. Kadiboo: Ngam mi ɗon dilla haa Baabiraawo?
Ɗume ɗum yiɗi wi'go: Yeeso seɗɗa? En paamataa ko o yiɗi wi'ugo.”
Yeesu anndi ɓe ngiɗi ƴamugo mo, o wi'i ɓe: “Mi wi'i on: Yeeso seɗɗa on ngi'ataa yam, ɓaawoɗon seɗɗa on ngi'atam fahin. Dow maajum on ɗon ƴamƴamtira na?
Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: On mboyan, on cunoto, ammaa duniyaaru seyoto. On cunoto, ammaa suno mooɗon laatoto seyo.
To debbo reeduujo ɓadake ɓesnugo, o sunoto ngam saa'i torra warani mo. Ammaa to o ɓesni, o yejjitan bone man ngam daliila seyo, ngam o danyi neɗɗo haa duniyaaru.
Bana non onon boo, on cunake jonta, ammaa mi yi'an on fahin. Nden kam ɓerɗe mooɗon ceyoto, walaa mo ittata seyo mooɗon sam.
To nyalaade man yottake, on ƴamataa yam koo ɗume. Gooŋga mi wi'ata on: Koo ɗume on tori Baabiraawo bee innde am fuu, o hokkan on ɗum.
Haa wargo hannde on toraaki koo ɗume bee innde am. Tore, on keɓan ko on tori, ngam haa seyo mooɗon heewa.”
Yeesu tokki wi'ugo: “Mi wolwani on kuuje ɗe'e fuu bee balndi. Saa'iire waran nde mi wolwantaa on bee balndi fahin, ammaa mi wolwanan on haala Baabiraawo bee laaɓɗum.
To nyalaade man yottake, on toroto Baabiraawo bee innde am. Mi wi'aay on, mi toroto Baabiraawo ngam mooɗon.
Baabiraawo bee hoore mum yiɗi on, ngam on ngiɗi yam, on nuɗɗini mi iwi haa Allah.
Mi iwi haa Baabiraawo, mi wari nder duniyaaru. Jonta mi accan duniyaaru, mi hootan haa Baabiraawo.”
Pukara'en maako mbi'i mo: “Ndaa, jonta a ɗon wolwa laaɓɗum, bilaa balndi.
Jonta min paami a anndi koo ɗume fuu. A walaa haaje goɗɗo ƴame, a anndi ko o yiɗi ƴamugo. Ngam maajum min nuɗɗini a iwi haa Allah.”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Jonta on nuɗɗini na?
Saa'i waran, koo jonta maa ɗum waɗi, on fuu on caŋkititto, koo moy fuu haa saare muuɗum, on accatam min feere am. Ammaa mi laataaki feere am, ngam Baabiraawo ɗon wondi bee am.
Mi wolwani on ɗum ngam haa on keɓa salaaman nder am. On njaran bone nder duniyaaru, ammaa tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mooɗon, min mi jaalake duniyaaru.”
Nde Yeesu timmini bolle ɗe'e fuu, o tijji asama, o wi'i: “Yaa Baabiraawo, saa'i am waɗi. Waŋgin tedduŋgal am, min
A hokki yam baawɗe dow yimɓe fuu, ngam mi hokka ngeendam nduumiiɗam haa yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam.
Ndaa ko woni ngeendam nduumiiɗam: Ɓe annda an woni Allah gooto, gooŋgaajo, ɓe annda boo Yeesu Almasiihu, nelaaɗo ma.
Mi waŋgini tedduŋgal maaɗa nder duniyaaru, mi timmitini kuugal ngal a hokki yam.
Jonta, yaa Baabiraawo, hokkam tedduŋgal haa yeeso ma, tedduŋgal ngal mi marno yaake mi ɗonno wondi bee maaɗa, diga duniyaaru tagaaka tawon.
Mi waŋgini innde ma haa yimɓe ɓe a wurtini nder duniyaaru, a hokki yam. An mari ɓe, a hokki yam ɓe, ɓe ɗowtani wolde ma.
Jonta, ɓe anndi ko a hokki yam fuu iwi haa maaɗa.
Ngam mi wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe a wolwani yam, ɓe njaɓi ɗe. Ɓe annditi fakat mi iwi haa maaɗa, ɓe nuɗɗini an neli yam.
Mi ɗon toro ma ngam maɓɓe. Mi torataako ngam duniyaaru, ammaa mi ɗon toro ma ngam yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam, ngam ɓe yimɓe maaɗa.
Ko marmi fuu, an jeyi, ko marɗa fuu boo, min jeyi, mi teddinaama nder maɓɓe.

Mi jooɗataako nder duniyaaru fahin, ammaa kamɓe ɓe ɗon njooɗi nder maaru. Jonta mi ɗon yaha haa maaɗa. Yaa Baabiraawo Ceniiɗo, a waŋginani yam baawɗe innde maaɗa, aynu ɓe bee baawɗe man, ngam haa ɓe laato gootum, bana min bee ma en gootum.
Yaake mi ɗonno wondi bee maɓɓe, mi faddi ɓe bee baawɗe innde ma nde a hokki yam. Mi ayni ɓe, walaa koo gooto maɓɓe halki, sonaa mo majjini hoore muuɗum, ngam haa ko winnda nder Deftere gooŋɗa
Jonta mi ɗon yaha haa maaɗa, mi ɗon wi'a ɗum fuu diga mi ɗon nder duniyaaru tawon, ngam haa ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewa seyo am timmididŋgo.
Mi anndini ɓe wolde ma. Duniyaaru wanyi ɓe, ngam ɓe laataaki ɓe duniyaaru, bana min boo mi laataaki mo duniyaaru.
Mi torataako ma ngam a wurtina ɓe duniyaaru, ammaa a fadda ɓe diga Kalluɗo
Ɓe laataaki ɓe duniyaaru, bana min boo mi laataaki mo duniyaaru.
Wolde maaɗa woni gooŋga. Senu ɓe bee gooŋga man.
Bana a neldiri yam nder duniyaaru, bana non min boo mi neldi ɓe haa duniyaaru.
Mi lii'ani ma yoŋki am ngam maɓɓe, ngam haa ɓe laato lii'anaaɓe ma daliila gooŋga.
Mi ɗon toro ma naa ngam maɓɓe tan, ammaa mi ɗon toro ma boo ngam nuɗɗinanɓe yam daliila waazu maɓɓe fuu,

ngam haa ɓe fuu ɓe laato gootum. Bana an, Baabiraawo, a ɗon nder kawtal bee am, min boo mi ɗon nder kawtal bee maaɗa. Kamɓe boo ɓe ngona nder kawtal bee meeɗen, ngam haa duniyaaru nuɗɗina an neli yam.
Mi hokki ɓe tedduŋgal ngal a hokki yam, ngam haa ɓe laato gootum, bana an bee am en laati gootum.
Min mi ɗon nder kawtal bee maɓɓe, an boo a ɗon nder kawtal bee am, ngam haa ɓe laato gootum fakat, ngam haa duniyaaru annda an neli yam, a yiɗi ɓe bana a yiɗiri yam.
Yaa Baabiraawo, yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam, mi yiɗi ɓe ngonda bee am haa ngonanmi, ngam haa ɓe ngi'a tedduŋgal am ngal a hokki yam, ngam a yiɗi yam diga duniyaaru tagaakano tawon.
Yaa Baabiraawo, adiliijo, duniyaaru anndaa ma, ammaa min mi anndi ma, yimɓe ɓe boo anndi an neli yam.
Mi anndini ɓe innde ma, mi tokkoto anndingo ɓe boo, ngam haa yiide nde a yiɗiri yam wona nder maɓɓe, min boo mi wona nder kawtal bee maɓɓe.”
Nde Yeesu timmini bolle ɗe'e, o dilli bee pukara'en maako gaɗa maayel Kederon. Woodi jarne haa nokkuure man, o nasti ton bee pukara'en maako.
Yahuuda, zammbotooɗo mo boo anndi nokkuure man, ngam Yeesu e pukara'en muuɗum mboowi hawtugo haa ton.
Yahuuda yahdi haa jarne man bee sooje'en e nelaaɓe mawɓe liman'en e Farisa'en, ɓe ɗon njogi balmi e pittirlaaji e jame yiite e balmi.
Yeesu anndi ko heɓata mo fuu. O wurti, o ƴami ɓe: “Moy on ɗaɓɓititta?”
Ɓe njaabi mo: “Min ɗon ɗaɓɓita Yeesu mo Nasaratu.” Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ɗum min.”
Yahuuda, zammbotooɗo mo boo ɗon darodi ton bee maɓɓe.
Nde Yeesu wi'i: “Ɗum min”, ɓe lori ɓaawo ɓaawo, ɓe ndo'i haa lesdi.
Yeesu ƴami ɓe fahin: “Moy on ɗaɓɓititta?” Ɓe njaabi: “Yeesu mo Nasaratu.”
Yeesu wi'i: “Mi wi'i on, ɗum min. To ɗum min on ɗaɓɓititta kam, acce yimɓe ɓe'e ndilla.”
Ɗum laati non ngam gooŋɗingo wolde nde Yeesu wi'no: “Mi majjinaay koo gooto nder yimɓe ɓe a hokki yam.”
Simon Piyer woodino kaafahi, o losi ki, o soppi suka hooreejo liman'en, o ta'i mo nofru nyaamru. Innde suka oo, Malkus.
Ammaa Yeesu wi'i Piyer: “Waatu kaafahi maaɗa haa suudu maaki. Mi yarataa jardugel bone ngel Baabiraawo am hokki yam na
Nden sooje'en e mawɗo maɓɓe e Yahuudu'en aynooɓe naŋngi Yeesu, kaɓɓi mo.
Aran ɓe njahri mo haa Annas, kaŋko woni esiraawo Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en hitaande maajum.
Kayafas woni mo sarwuno Yahuudu'en, wi'no ɓe: “Ndikka goɗɗo gooto maaya ngam ummaatoore fuu
Simon Piyer e pukaraajo feere ɗonno tokki Yeesu. Pukaraajo oo, hooreejo liman'en anndi mo, kaŋko o nastidi bee Yeesu haa daldal saare hooreejo liman'en.
Ammaa Piyer ɗonno dari yaasi, kommbi dammugal. Nden pukaraajo mo hooreejo liman'en anndi ɗum go wurti wolwani debbo aynanɗo dammugal, nastini Piyer nder saare.
Debbo man wi'i Piyer: “Naa an boo a pukaraajo gorko oo?” O jaabi: “Aa'a, naa ɗum min.”
Huuwooɓe e aynooɓe kuɓɓi yiite, ɗon aytino ton, ngam jaaŋgol ɗonno waɗa. Piyer boo ɗonno darodi bee maɓɓe, ɗonno aytino.
Nden hooreejo liman'en ƴami Yeesu dow haala pukara'en muuɗum e ekkitinol muuɗum.
Yeesu jaabi mo: “Mi wolwi bee baŋguɗum yeeso yimɓe fuu. Foroy mi waazi nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en e nder haykaliiru, haa Yahuudu'en fuu mooɓtoto, mi wolwaay koo ɗume bee sirri.
Ngam ɗume a ƴamatammi? Ƴam nanɓe yam ko mi wolwani ɓe, kamɓe ɓe anndi.”
Nde Yeesu wolwi bolle ɗe'e, gooto nder aynooɓe maari mo, wi'i: “Bana nii a jaaborto hooreejo liman'en na?”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “To kalluka mbolwumi, waŋgin ɗum. Ammaa to booɗɗum mbolwumi, koni a maari yam?”
Nden Annas neldi mo o kaɓɓaaɗo haa Kayafas, hooreejo liman'en.
Simon Piyer ɗonno dari ton, ɗonno aytino. Nden ɓe mbi'i mo: “An boo naa a gooto nder pukara'en gorko oo na?” Ammaa o yeddi ɗum, o wi'i: “Aa'a, naa ɗum min.”
Gooto nder suka'en hooreejo liman'en, banndiraawo goɗɗo mo Piyer ta'ino nofru mum go, wi'i mo: “Mi yi'aay ma nder jarne bee maako na?”
Ammaa Piyer yeddi ɗum fahin. Saa'i man nden asgumri
Jaŋngo maajum fajiri cub ɓe koo'i Yeesu haa saare Kayafas, ɓe njahri mo haa suudu kiita haa saare ngomna Roma'en. Yahuudu'en nastaay saare man, ngam taa ɓe coɓa, haa ɓe keɓa nyaamugo nyaamdu
Nden Pilaatu, wurti, wari haa maɓɓe, ƴami ɓe: “Ɗume on ngullori goɗɗo oo?”
Ɓe njaabi mo: “To o laataakino kalluɗo, min ngaddataano mo haa maaɗa.”
Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Kooce mo onon, kiite mo fodde tawreeta mooɗon.” Yahuudu'en njaabi mo: “Ɗum duŋanaaki min min kiito goɗɗo kiita maayde.”
Ɗum laati non ngam gooŋɗingo bolle ɗe Yeesu wi'no, ngam tinndingo no o maayrata
Pilaatu nasti saare mum fahin, ewni Yeesu, ƴami mo: “An woni laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en na?”
Yeesu jaabi: “A wi'i ɗum bee hoore ma naa malla woɗɓe ngecci ma ɗum?”
Pilaatu jaabi: “Min mi Yahuuduujo na? Yimɓe ummaatoore maaɗa e mawɓe liman'en ngulli ma haa am. Ɗume a waɗi?”

Yeesu jaabi: “Laamu am laataaki laamu duniyaaru ndu. To laamu am laatino ngu duniyaaru ndu, jaggiiɓe am ngaranno haɓugo ngam am, ngam taa mi nasta juuɗe Yahuudu'en. Ammaa gooŋga laamu am laataaki laamu duniyaaru ndu.”
Pilaatu ƴami mo: “A laamiiɗo kadi na?” Yeesu jaabi: “An maa a wi'i ɗum: Mi laamiiɗo. Mi danyaama, mi wari nder duniyaaru ndu'u ngam mi seedano gooŋga. Koo moy yiɗi gooŋga, heɗititto ko mi wi'ata.”
Pilaatu ƴami mo: “Ɗume woni gooŋga?”
Nden Pilaatu wurti fahin, wari haa Yahuudu'en, wi'i ɓe: “Min mi tawaay daliila hiitaago gorko oo sam.
Ammaa bana ko woowa haa mooɗon, juulde
Ammaa ɓe ngooki fahin, ɓe mbi'i: “Aa'a, naa kaŋko a yoofata, min ngiɗi a yoofana min Barabbas!” Barabbas man o pasoowo.
Nden Pilaatu umri yimɓe mum ɓe kooca Yeesu, ɓe ɓocca mo.
Sooje'en mbami meetaleewol gi'e, ɓe njo'ini ɗum dow hoore Yeesu, ɓe moji mo mojaare woɗeere.
Ɓe ɓaditi mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Allah woonane, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en!” Ɓe maari mo.
Pilaatu wurti fahin, wolwani yimɓe, wi'i: “Ndaa, mi wurtinan mo haa mooɗon, ngam haa on paama mi tawaay daliila hiitaago mo.”
Nden Yeesu wurti, meetaleewol gi'e ɗon dow hoore maako, o ɗon moji mojaare woɗeere go. Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa mo.”
Ammaa nde liman'en e aynooɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe ngooki, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal! Ɓil mo!” Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Kooce mo onon, ɓile mo, ngam min mi tawaay daliila hiitaago mo.”
Yahuudu'en mbi'i mo: “Min ngoodi umroore woore. Fodde umroore man sey o maaya, ngam o waɗi hoore maako o
Nde Pilaatu nani wolde nde'e, kulol maako ɓesdi.
O nasti saare fahin, o ƴami Yeesu: “Toy iwɗaa?” Ammaa Yeesu jaabaaki mo sam.
Pilaatu wi'i mo: “A jaabataako yam na? A anndaa mi woodi baawɗe yoofugo ma, mi woodi boo baawɗe ɓilugo ma haa leggal gaafaaŋgal na?”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “A walaano baawɗe dow am koo seɗɗa, to Allah hokkaayno ma ɗe. Ngam maajum mo hokki yam haa juŋngo ma, hakke maako ɓuri mawnugo.”

Diga saa'i man Pilaatu tefi dabare yoofugo Yeesu. Ammaa Yahuudu'en ngooki, mbi'i: “To a yoofi mo, nden kam naa a soobaajo Kaysara laamiiɗo Roma. Koo moy waɗi hoore muuɗum laamiiɗo, o konneejo Kaysara laamiiɗo Roma.”
Nde Pilaatu nani bolle ɗe'e, o wurtini Yeesu fahin, o jooɗi dow koromwal kiita, haa nokkuure wi'eteende bee Ibraniŋkeere Gabbata, waato Taŋkol-kaa'e.
Ɗum nyalaade taaskara juulde
Ɓe ngooki, ɓe mbi'i: “Mbar mo, mbar mo, ɓil mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal.” Pilaatu wi'i ɓe: “Kadi mi ɓila laamiiɗo mooɗon na?” Mawɓe liman'en njaabi: “Min ngalaa laamiiɗo feere, sey laamiiɗo Kaysara.”
Nden, Pilaatu hokki ɓe Yeesu haa ɓe ɓila mo haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ɓe ndilliri mo.
Yeesu wurti yaasi berniwol, o ɗon roondi gaafaaŋgal maako, haa o yotti nokkuure wi'eteende bee Ibraniŋkeere Golgota, waato Gumbal-hoore.
Haa ton sooje'en ɓili Yeesu haa leggal gaafaaŋgal. Ɓe ɓildi worɓe ɗiɗo bee Yeesu, gooto haa wakeere nyaamre, gooto boo haa wakeere nannde, Yeesu ɗon haa caka.
Pilaatu winndi dow alluha, o ɓili ɗum haa gaafaaŋgal. Ndaa ko o winndi: “Yeesu mo Nasaratu, laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe njaŋngi ɗum, ngam nokkuure man daayaaki bee berniwol. Binndi man winndaama bee Ibraniŋkeere e Romaŋkeere e Yunaniŋkeere.
Ammaa mawɓe liman'en Yahuudu'en mbi'i Pilaatu: “Taa winndu: Laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en, ammaa winndu: O wi'i o laamiiɗo Yahuudu'en.”
Pilaatu jaabi ɓe: “Ko mi winndi, ɗum tabiti.”

Nde sooje'en timmini ɓilugo Yeesu haa leggal gaafaaŋgal, ɓe kooci limce maako, ɓe cenndi ɗe geɓe nayi, soojeejo fuu heɓi yeɓre woore. Ɓe kooci boo toggoore maako sannyaande diga dow haa les bilaa nyoogol.
Sooje'en mbi'i hakkunde muuɗum'en: “Taa en ceeka toggoore nde, ammaa en mbaɗa kur'u ngam en ndaara moy heɓata nde.” Bana nii ko Deftere wi'i, gooŋɗiri:
“Ɓe cenndi limce am hakkunde maɓɓe,
ɓe mbaɗi kur'u ngam limce am.”
Bana nii sooje'en mbaɗi
Daada Yeesu e deerɗum debbo e Mariyama debbo Kolopas e Mariyama mo Magdala, ɓe ɗon ndari kommbi leggal gaafaaŋgal haa ɓe ɓili Yeesu.
Yeesu yi'i daada muuɗum e pukaraajo mo o yiɗi ɗum, ɓe ɗon ndarodi ton. O wi'i daada maako: “Debbo, ndaa ɓiɗɗo ma.”
Nden o wi'i pukaraajo man: “Ndaa daada ma.” Diga saa'i man pukaraajo man hooci Mariyama haa saare muuɗum.
Ɓaawo maajum, nde Yeesu anndi kuuje fuu kebbitinaama, ngam o gooŋɗina ko winnda nder Deftere, o wi'i: “Mi ɗomɗi
Woodi mbulku ton, kebbinaaŋgu inaboojam lammuɗam. Ɓe cuuwi irin sooso nder maajam, ɓe mbaɗi ɗum haa ƴommbal isop, ɓe ɓaŋgti ɗum haa hunnduko Yeesu.
Nde Yeesu metti lammuɗam, o wi'i: “Ɗum fuu ɗum timmidi.” Nden o turi hoore maako, o maayi.
Ɗum nyannde taaskara
Nden sooje'en ngari, ɓe ngewi kosɗe arano, nden ɓe ngewi ɗe ɗiɗaɓo haa ɓildaaɓe bee Yeesu dow leɗɗe gaafaaɗe.
Nde ɓe njotti haa Yeesu, ɓe tawi o maayi, ngam maajum ɓe ngewaay kosɗe maako.
Ammaa gooto nder sooje'en yuwi mo wuttudu bee labbo, law ƴiiƴam e ndiyam ngurti.
Gi'ɗo seedi ɗum, seedamku maako gooŋga, kaŋko boo o anndi gooŋga o wolwi, ngam haa onon boo on nuɗɗina.
Ɗum laati non ngam hebbitingo ko Deftere wi'i: “Ɓe ngewataa i'e maako koo gootal
Aayaare feere boo wi'i: “Ɓe ndaaran mo ɓe njuwi

Ɓaawo maajum, Yusufu mo wuro Arimatiya tori Pilaatu duŋayeere hoocugo ɓanndu Yeesu. Yusufu boo laatino pukaraajo Yeesu, ammaa bee sirri, ngam o ɗonno hula Yahuudu'en. Pilaatu duŋani mo. O yehi, o hooci ɓanndu Yeesu.
Nikodemus mo yehino haa Yeesu jemmaare woɗnde, kaŋko boo o wari, o waddi jillindiraaɗum uurdi baɗaadi e leɗɗe uurɗe, baakin kilo cappanɗe tati
Kamɓe ɗiɗo ɓe kooci ɓanndu Yeesu, ɓe caawi ndu bee leppi, ɓe ndufi nebbam uurɗam dow maaru, bana Yahuudu'en mboowi waɗugo to ɓe ɗon uwa maayɗo.
Haa kommbi nokkuure ɓe ɓilno Yeesu, woodi jarne ton. Nder jarne man woodi yenaande hesre nde ɓe meeɗaay wallingo maayɗo nder muuɗum.
Haa ton ɓe mballini ɓanndu Yeesu, ngam ɗum nyalaade taaskara siwtorde Yahuudu'en e yenaande man boo daayaaki.
Nyalaade aranndeere, waato nyannde Alat, fajiri cub, diga weetaay booɗɗum tawon, Mariyama mo Magdala yehi haa yenaande. O yi'i hayre sottinaama diga hunnduko yenaande.
O doggi, o yehi haa Simon Piyer e pukaraajo giɗaaɗo Yeesu. O wi'i ɓe: “Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Jawmiraawo diga yenaande, min anndaa haa ɓe mballinoyi ndu!”
Piyer e pukaraajo oya go ngurti, ndilli haa yenaande.
Ɓe ndoggi ɓe ɗiɗo fuu, ammaa pukaraajo oya go ɓuri Piyer pargal, o aarti yottaago haa yenaande.
O yurni nder yenaande, o yi'i leppi ɗon mbaali, ammaa o nastaay.
Nden Piyer mo tokkino mo go boo yotti, nasti yenaande, o yi'i leppi ɗon mbaali.
Leppol ngol ɓe caawino hoore Yeesu bee maajum wondaay bee leppi goɗɗi go, ammaa ngol ɗon taggi, waali haa pellel goɗŋgel.
Nden pukaraajo aartuɗo yottaago haa yenaande go boo nasti. O yi'i, o nuɗɗini.
Haa wargo wakkati man fuu ɓe paamaayno ko Deftere wi'i tawon. Ngam nde wi'i Yeesu ummititto caka maayɓe.
Nden pukara'en ɗiɗo go kooti.
Mariyama ɗonno dari haa yaasi, kommbi yenaande, o ɗonno woya. Wakkati o ɗonno woya, o turi, o yurni nder yenaande,
o yi'i malaa'ika'en ɗiɗo, ɓe ɗon ɓorni limce daneeje, ɓe ɗon njooɗi haa nokkuure nde ɓanndu Yeesu wonno, gooto gal hoore, gooto boo gal kosɗe.
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Debbo, koni mboyata?” O jaabi: “Ɓe kooci ɓanndu Jawmiraawo am, mi anndaa haa ɓe mballinoyi ndu.”
Nde o wolwi bolle ɗe'e, o yeesiti, o yi'i Yeesu ɗon dari, ammaa o anndaa ɗum Yeesu.
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Debbo, koni mboyata? Moy a tefata?” Mariyama tammi ɗum kuuwoowo jarne. O wi'i mo: “Jawmam, to an hooci ndu, wi'am haa a wallinoyi ndu, haa mi yaha, mi hooca ndu.”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Mariyama!” Mariyama wayliti haa maako, wi'i mo bee Ibraniŋkeere: “Rabbuni!” Bana wi'go Moodibbo.

Yeesu wi'i mo: “Taa meemam, ngam mi siwaa eeŋgtugo haa Baabiraawo am. Ammaa yah, wi' deerɗiraaɓe am, mi ɗon eeŋgta haa Baabiraawo am, laatiiɗo Baabiraawo mooɗon boo, haa Allah am, laatiiɗo Allah mooɗon boo.”
Nden Mariyama mo Magdala dilli, wi'i pukara'en: “Mi yi'i Jawmiraawo”, nden o yecci ɓe ko Yeesu wi'no mo.
Nyannde Alat man, nde jemma waɗi, pukara'en ɗon mooɓi nder suudu. Ɓe kuɓli dammugal, ngam ɓe ɗonno kula Yahuudu'en. Yeesu wari, dari caka maɓɓe, wi'i ɓe: “Salaaman wonda bee mooɗon!”
Nde o wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe'e, o holli ɓe juuɗe maako e wuttudu maako. Nde pukara'en ngi'i Jawmiraawo, ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewi seyo.
Yeesu wi'i ɓe fahin: “Salaaman wonda bee mooɗon. Bana no Baabiraawo neli yam, min boo mi ɗon nela on.”
Nde o wolwani ɓe bolle ɗe'e, o fuufi dow maɓɓe, o wi'i: “Njaɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo!
Ɓe on njaafani hakke muuɗum'en, keɓan yaafuye, ɓe on njaafanaaki boo, keɓataa yaafuye
Nde Yeesu warino haa pukara'en, gooto nder maɓɓe, Tomas bi'eteeɗo Ciwto, wondaay bee maɓɓe.
Pukara'en woɗɓe mbi'i mo: “Min ngi'i Jawmiraawo.” Ammaa Tomas wi'i ɓe: “To mi yi'aay ɓattajje suufuuje
Asaweere woore ɓaawoɗon, pukara'en ɗon mooɓti nder suudu fahin, Tomas ɗon wondi bee maɓɓe. Dammugal ɗon huɓli, ammaa Yeesu wari, dari caka maɓɓe, wi'i: “Salaaman wonda bee mooɗon.”
Nden o wi'i Tomas: “Waddu hoondu ma haa ɗo, laar juuɗe am, waddu juŋngo ma, nastin ngo nder wuttudu am, accu waabaago, nuɗɗin.”
Tomas jaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo am, Allah am!”
Yeesu wi'i mo: “Jonta nde a yi'i yam a nuɗɗini na? Barka laatanto ɓe ngi'aay yam, ammaa ɓe nuɗɗini yam.”
Yeesu waɗi kaayeefiiji goɗɗi ɗuuɗɗi yeeso pukara'en muuɗum, ɗi mbinndaaka nder deftere nde'e.
Ammaa ko winnda nder maare, ɗum winndaama ngam haa on nuɗɗina Yeesu woni Almasiihu,
Ɓaawo maajum fahin Yeesu waŋgani pukara'en muuɗum haa kommbi weendu Tiberiyas. Ndaa no o waŋgirani ɓe:
Simon Piyer e Tomas bi'eteeɗo Ciwto e Natanayel mo wuro Kana nder lesdi Galiili e ɓiɓɓe Zebede e pukara'en Yeesu woɗɓe ɗiɗo, fuu ɗon kawti.
Simon Piyer wi'i ɓe: “Mi dillan waawoygo liɗɗi.” Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Minin boo min njahdan bee maaɗa.” Ɓe ndilli, ɓe nasti koommbowal
Nde fuɗɗi weetugo, Yeesu dari haa fomoonde, ammaa pukara'en anndaa ɗum kaŋko.
Nden Yeesu ƴami ɓe: “Ɓikkoy, on keɓi nyaamdu na?” Ɓe njaabi mo: “Aa'a.”
O wi'i ɓe: “Cakkine zubaawol haa wuttudu koommbowal nyaamru, on keɓan.” Ɓe cakkini zubaawol, ɓe naŋngi liɗɗi ɗuuɗɗi masin haa ɓe mbaawaay nastingo zubaawol nder koommbowal
Nden pukaraajo mo Yeesu yiɗi ɗum wi'i Simon Piyer: “Ɗum Jawmiraawo!” Nde Simon Piyer nani ɗum, o ɓorni limce maako, ngam o ɓortino ɗe, o diwi nder ndiyam.
Pukara'en woɗɓe ngari bee koommbowal, ɓe ɗon ndasa zubaawol keewŋgol liɗɗi go, ɓe ndaayaakino fomoonde, ɓuraay meetir teemerre.
Nde ɓe ngurti, ɓe njippi haa lesdi, ɓe ngi'i yiite bee liɗɗi dow maage e tamseeje.
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngadde liɗɗi seɗɗa nder ko on naŋngi jonta.”
Simon Piyer nasti koommbowal, wurtini zubaawol keewŋgol liɗɗi mawɗi mawɗi, limgal maaji teemerre e cappanɗe jowi e tati (153). Koo nde ɗi ɗuuɗɗi bana non, zubaawol seekaay.
Yeesu wi'i ɓe: “Ngare, nyaame.” Walaa koo gooto nder pukara'en numi ƴamugo mo: “An a moy?” Ngam ɓe anndi ɗum Jawmiraawo.
Yeesu ɓaditi ɓe, hoo'i tamseere, hokki ɓe, o hokki ɓe liɗɗi boo.
Kanjum woni waŋgannde tataɓre nde Yeesu waŋgani pukara'en muuɗum, ɓaawo o ummitinaama caka maayɓe.
Ɓaawo ɓe nyaami, Yeesu wi'i Simon Piyer: “Simon ɓii Yuhanna, a yiɗi yam ko ɓuri ɓe'e ɗo na?” O jaabi: “Ooho, Jawmiraawo, a anndi mi yiɗi ma.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Duru ɓiɓɓe baali am.”
Nden o wolwani mo ɗiɗawre, o ƴami: “Simon ɓii Yuhanna, a yiɗi yam na?” O jaabi mo: “Ooho, a anndi mi yiɗi ma.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Laata gaynaako baali am.”

O wolwani mo tataɓre: “Simon ɓii Yuhanna, a yiɗi yam na?” Piyer suni nde Yeesu ƴami mo ƴamol tataɓol: “A yiɗi yam na?” O jaabi mo: “Jawmiraawo, an a anndi koo ɗume fuu, a anndi mi yiɗi ma.” Yeesu wi'i mo: “Duru baali am.

Gooŋga mi ɗon wi'e: Yaake a derkeejono, an bee hoore ma a ɗon taado taadorgol ma, a ɗon yaha haa a yiɗi fuu. Ammaa to a ndottidi, a fortanan goɗɗo feere juuɗe ma, kaŋko boo o taadante taadorgol, o yahrete haa a yiɗaa.”
Bee bolle ɗe'e Yeesu yiɗi tinndingo irin maayde nde Piyer tammi maayugo ngam teddingo Allah. Nden Yeesu wi'i mo: “Tokkam.”
Piyer yeesiti, yi'i pukaraajo mo Yeesu yiɗi ɗum ɗon wara ɓaawo maɓɓe, kaŋko ɓaarino Yeesu yaake ɓe ɗonno nyaama, ƴamno mo: “Jawmiraawo, moy zammboto ma
Nde Piyer yi'i mo, o wi'i Yeesu: “Jawmiraawo, e noy oo ɗo, ɗume waɗata mo?”
Yeesu jaabi mo: “To mi yiɗi o yeeɗa haa to mi lori, ko yaalu ma? An kam tokkam!”
Haala man saŋkiti caka nuɗɗinɓe, ɓe ɗon mbi'a pukaraajo oo maayataa. Alhaali boo Yeesu wi'aay Piyer: “Pukaraajo oo maayataa.” Ammaa o wi'i mo: “To mi yiɗi o yeeɗa haa to mi lori, ko yaalu ma?”
Pukaraajo oo, kaŋko woni ceedoowo kubaruuji ɗi'i, o winndi ɗi boo, min anndi seedamku maako ɗum gooŋga.
Yeesu huuwi kuuɗe goɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe. To ɗe mbinndano gootal gootal fuu, mi tammi duniyaaru waawataa jogaago defte man.
Yaa Teyofilus, nder deftere am arannde, mi winndi ko Yeesu fuɗɗi waɗugo e ekkitingo fuu
haa nyannde o eeŋga haa asama. Diga o siwaa eeŋgineego, bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o anndini umrooje maako haa nelaaɓe ɓe o suɓno.
Ɓaawo boneeji ɗi o yari, o waŋgani ɓe o geeto fakat bee alaamaaji ɗuuɗɗi laaɓɗi. Baakin nyalɗe cappanɗe nayi, ɓe ngi'i mo, ɓe mbolidi haala laamu Allah.
Yaake o ɗon bee maɓɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Taa cotte Urusaliima, ammaa ndeene ko Baabiraawo iinani on, bana mbi'mi on
Ngam Yuhanna waɗani yimɓe baptisma bee ndiyam, ammaa onon, on njaɓan yeeso seɗɗa, baptisma bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
Nden mooɓtiiɓe ton ƴami mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Jawmiraawo, a wo'itinan laamu ngam Isra'iila jonta na?”
Yeesu jaabi ɓe: “Baabiraawo am bee baawɗe mum ta'i wakkatiiji e saa'iiji man, on mbaawataa anndugo ɗi,
ammaa to Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippake dow mooɗon, on keɓan baawɗe, nden on laatoto seedantooɓe yam haa Urusaliima, haa lesdi Yahudiya fuu bee Samariya e haa keerol duniyaaru fuu
Nde o timmini wolwugo bolle ɗe'e, o eeŋgi. Ɓe ɗon ndaara, haa ruuldere suddi mo
Nde pukara'en ɗon tijjo heedi asama haa Yeesu ɗon eeŋgo, law worɓe ɗiɗo ɓorniiɓe limce daneeje mbaŋgani ɓe,
mbi'i ɓe: “Onon Galiili'en, koni on ɗon ndari, tijjo dow? Yeesu oo, mo eeŋgi, acci on, o loroto bana on ngi'i o dilliri asama.”
Nden nelaaɓe njippi hooseere wi'eteende Hooseere Jaytunje, ɓe lori haa Urusaliima, ɗum daayi baakin kilomeetir gootel.

Nde ɓe nasti Urusaliima, ɓe mba'i suudu dowru, haa weerde maɓɓe bana ko woowa. Ɗum Piyer, Yuhanna, Yaakuba, Andire, Filip, Tomas, Bartolome, Matta, Yaakuba ɓii Alfa, Simon mo goɗɗo yeɓre Jelot'en e Yahuuda ɓii Yaakuba
Nder anniya ngoota, ɓe fuu ɓe ɗon kawta tum ngam toraago Allah hawtaade bee Mariyama, daada
Nyannde feere, nde nuɗɗinɓe baakin teemerre e noogas (120) ɗon kawti, Piyer ummi caka deerɗiraaɓe, wi'i:
“Deerɗiraaɓe am, doole ko Deftere Allah aartuno wi'go dow Yahuuda, gooŋɗa. Bee hunnduko Daawuda, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'no ɗum dow Yahuuda, mo ɗowi naŋnguɓe Yeesu,
ngam Yahuuda laatino mo amin, ngam Yeesu suɓi mo haa min kuuwda kuugal nga'al.”
Yahuuda soodi ngesa bee ngeenaari ndi o heɓri bee kuugal maako kalluŋgal. Ton o do'ori hoore hoore, reedu maako seeki, teteki maako fuu ndufi yaasi.
Yimɓe Urusaliima fuu nani haala ka'a. Kanjum waɗi ɓe inndi ngesa ka'a
Ngam ɗum winndaama haa deftere Jabuura:
Saare maako laato winnde,
taa goɗɗo jooɗo ton.
Sey goɗɗo feere hoosa babal maako
Ngam maajum, sey goɗɗo caka yahduɓe bee amin nder jahaale bee Yeesu Almasiihu fuu,
diga nyannde nde Yuhanna waɗani mo baptisma haa nyannde nde o eeŋga haa asama, ceediiɗo ummitineeki maako bee amin, foti hawtana min.
Nden ɓe mbaŋgini inɗe yimɓe ɗiɗo: Yusufu bi'eteeɗo Barsabas, coometeeɗo Yustus bee Mattiyas.
Nden ɓe tori Allah, ɓe mbi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, a anndi ɓerɗe yimɓe fuu. Ngam maajum hollu min hakkunde yimɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e, moy cuɓɗa
ngam haa o hoosa kuugal nelal ngal Yahuuda acci haa o dilli haa pellel maako.”
Ɓaawoɗon ɓe mbaɗi kur'u
Nde nyannde juulde
Law ɓe nani iidoore iwnde haa asama bana iidoore henndu semmbiɗndu, heewi suudu haa ɓe ɗon njooɗi.
Nden ɗemɗe nannduɗe ɗemɗe yiite mbaŋgani ɓe, caŋkiti e njooɗi dow koo moy maɓɓe.
Ɓe fuu ɓe kebbinaaɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe puɗɗi wolwugo bee bolle jananne, bana no Ruuhu hokkiri ɓe baawɗe wolwugo.
Woodino Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima, hulɓe Allah, iwɓe haa lesɗe duniyaaru fuu.
Nde ɓe nani hoolo ngo'o, ɗuuɗɓe maɓɓe mooɓi ton. Ɓe cakli ngam koo moy maɓɓe nani nuɗɗinɓe ɗon mbolwa wolde muuɗum.
Ɓe kayɗini masin, ɓe mbi'i: “Yimɓe wolwanɓe bolle ɗe'e, naa ɓe fuu ɓe yimɓe lesdi Galiili!
Kadi noy en nanata ɓe ɗon mbolwa bolle meeɗen?
Ɓe iwi haa lesɗe Partiya, Mediya, Elam, Mesopotamiya, Yahudiya, Kappadosiya, haa Pontus e Asiya,
haa Firigiya e Pamfiliya, haa Misra, haa geɓe lesdi Libiya kommbi Sirene, woɗɓe maɓɓe ngari diga Roma,
woɗɓe boo ngari diga Kereta e Arabiya. Woodi boo Yahuudu'en e jananɓe tokkiiɓe diina Yahuudu'en. Ammaa en ɗon nana ɓe ɗon mbolwa bee bolle meeɗen haala kuuɗe mawɗe ɗe Allah waɗi.”
Ɓe fuu ɓe kayɗini, ɓe cakli, ɓe ƴamƴamtiri: “Ɗume ɗum yiɗi wi'go?”
Ammaa woɗɓe njanci nuɗɗinɓe, mbi'i: “Ɓe nguyki!”
Nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo fuu ummi. Nden Piyer towni sawtu, wi'i ɓe: “Onon Yahuudu'en e yimɓe jooɗiiɓe haa Urusaliima fuu, paame ko ɗon saalo e nananeeɗam booɗɗum:
Yimɓe ɓe'e, ɓe nguykaay bana numoton, ngam naaŋge nyalwaay tawon,
ammaa ɗum kebbitinki ko annabi Yo'el wolwuno:
Allah wi'i: Nder balɗe ragareeje:
Mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow yimɓe fuu:
Ɓiɓɓe mon worɓe e rewɓe mbaɗan annabaaku,
suka'en mooɗon keɓan wahayuuji,
ndotti'en mooɗon koyɗan koyɗi.
Koo dow maccuɓe am e horɓe am fuu boo,
mi waanjan Ruuhu am dow maɓɓe nder saa'i man,
ɓe mbaɗan annabaaku.
Mi waɗan kaayeefiiji haa asama
e dow lesdi boo alaamaaji,
ƴiiƴam e yiite e cuurɗe ɓaleeje mbaŋgan.
Naaŋge nyiɓɓan, lewru boo woojan bana ƴiiƴam. Nden nyalaade am mawnde hulniinde waran!
Koo moy ewnotooɗo innde Jawmiraawo, hisan
Onon Isra'iila'en, nananeeɗam: Yeesu mo Nasaratu, o gerdaaɗo Allah yeeso mooɗon. On anndi ɗum, ngam bee maako Allah waari kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji caka mooɗon.
Diga ɓooyma Allah muuyi, acci Yeesu haa juuɗe mooɗon. Onon on mbari mo, nde on nduŋani hakke'en ɓe ɓila mo dow leggal gaafaaŋgal
Ammaa Allah ummitini mo, wurtini mo taaku maayde, ngam maayde walaa baawɗe jogaago mo
Ndaa ko Daawuda wi'no dow maako:
Mi ɗon yi'a Jawmiraawo yeeso am tum, o ɗon haa nyaamo am,
ngam taa mi dimmbo.
Ngam maajum ɓernde am ɗon seyo, hunnduko am ɗon welwita,
Koo ɓanndu am boo siwtoto jam nder hoolaare.
Ngam an, yaa Allah, a wudintaa yoŋki am haa joonde maayɓe,
a accataa ceniiɗo maaɗa nyola.
A holli yam laawol jahranŋgol haa ngeendam,
ngam a ɗon wondi bee am,
mi woodi seyo ɗuuɗŋgo
Deerɗiraaɓe am, sey mi wolwana on bee dartaare dow kaakiraawo meeɗen Daawuda. O maayi, ɓe uwi mo. Haa hannde yenaande maako ɗon ɗo.
O annabiijo, o anndi hunayeere nde Allah waɗani mo: Allah huni o laaminan goɗɗo danygol maako dow leeso laamu maako
Daawuda faami ummitineeki Almasiihu diga wakkati man siwaa. Ngam maajum o wi'i:
Allah accaay mo nder joonde maayɓe,
ɓanndu maako boo nyolaay.
Yeesu oo, Allah ummitini mo diga maayde, min fuu min seedooɓe haala ka'a.
Allah ɓaŋgti mo, jo'ini mo haa nyaamo muuɗum. O heɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo diga Baabiraawo mo iinanino mo ɗum, waanji Ruuhu oo dow amin bana no ngi'oton e nanoton.
Ngam Daawuda eeŋgaay haa asama, ammaa kaŋko bee hoore maako o wi'i:
Jawmiraawo wi'i jawmiraawo am:
Jooɗa haa nyaamo am,
haa to mi laatini konne'en ma jaaɓruɗum kosɗe ma
Ngam maajum sey Isra'iila'en fuu paama fakat, Yeesu oo, mo on ɓili dow leggal gaafaaŋgal, Allah laatini mo Jawmiraawo e
Nde yimɓe nani ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ta'i, ɓe mbi'i Piyer e nelaaɓe woɗɓe: “Noy min mbaɗata, deerɗiraaɓe?”
Piyer jaabi: “Tuube, koo moy mooɗon jaɓa baptisma bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu. Nden Allah yaafanto on hakkeeji mooɗon, o hokkan on Ruuhu Ceniiɗo boo.
Iinawol ngo'ol ɗon ngam mooɗon, ngam ɓiɓɓe mon e yimɓe daayiiɓe fuu, ɓe Allah tammi ewnaago haa maako.”
Piyer ɓesdi wolwango ɓe bolle ɗuuɗɗe ngam wasugo ɓe, o wi'i ɓe: “Kisne ko'e mooɗon e yimɓe zamanuuru hallundu ndu'u!”
Jaɓɓe bolle ɗe Piyer wolwi njaɓi baptisma. Nyannde man yimɓe baakin ujine tato ɓesdaama dow nuɗɗinɓe.
Ɓe tiiɗi nanugo ekkitinol nelaaɓe, jooɗaago nder kawtal deerɗiraagu, senndugo nyaamdu e waɗugo do'a.
Nelaaɓe ngaɗi kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji ɗuuɗɗi, haa yimɓe fuu kultori.
Nuɗɗinɓe fuu kawti, laati jama'aare woore, ɓe mooɓti ko ɓe mari fuu
Ɓe coorri kuuje e mardi maɓɓe, ɓe cenndi ceede man caka maɓɓe, fodde haaje koo moy.
Nyalaade fuu ɓe ɗon kawta nder
ɓe ɗon ngetta Allah. Yimɓe fuu ngerdi ɓe. Nyalaade fuu Jawmiraawo ɗon ɓesdana jama'aare maɓɓe hisnaaɓe.
Nyannde feere Piyer bee Yuhanna njehi
Haa dammugal bi'eteeŋgal Dammugal-Booɗŋgal, woodi goɗɗo boosɗo
Nde o laari Piyer e Yuhanna ɗon nasta, o rooki ɓe.
Ɓe cuti mo, nden Piyer wi'i: “Laar min!”
Boosɗo laari ɓe booɗɗum, ngam o tammino ɓe ndokkan mo huunde.
Ammaa Piyer wi'i mo: “Mi walaa ceede, mi walaa boo kaŋŋeeri, ammaa mi hokkete ko marmi: Bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu mo Nasaratu, umma, yah!”
Nden Piyer naŋngi juŋngo maako nyaamo, ummini mo. Law, kosɗe maako keɓi semmbe,
o hafti, o dari, o fuɗɗi yahugo. O nastidi bee Piyer e Yuhanna nder haykaliiru, o ɗon yaha, o ɗon diwa, o ɗon yetta Allah.
Ummaatoore fuu yi'i mo o ɗon yaha, o ɗon yetta Allah.
Nde ɓe annditi ɗum boosɗo mo jooɗino haa Dammugal-Booɗŋgal ngal haykaliiru ngam rookaago, ɓe kayɗini masin dow ko saali.
Nde nii gorko go accaay Piyer e Yuhanna, ummaatoore fuu doggi, yehi haa maɓɓe haa daŋki bi'eteeki Daŋki Suleymaanu, ngam ɗum hayɗini ɓe masin.
Nde Piyer yi'i ɓe, o wi'i: “Onon Isra'iila'en, ko hayɗini on, koni cutiiɗon min? On tammi gorko oo fuɗɗi yahugo bee baawɗe amin malla kuuɗe amin booɗɗe na?
Allah mo Ibrahiima, mo Isiyaaku, mo Yaakubu, Allah kaakiraaɓe meeɗen teddini suka muuɗum Yeesu mo on ndokki haa juuɗe mawɓe, on ngeddi mo yeeso Pilaatu, koo nde Pilaatu yiɗino yoofugo mo
On ngudini Ceniiɗo, Adiliijo, on tori Pilaatu o yoofana on mbaroowo ko'e
Non on mbari jawmu ngeendam, ammaa Allah ummitini mo diga maayde. Minin boo min seedooɓe haala ka'a.
Boosɗo mo ngi'oton e mo annduɗon oo heɓti semmbe mum ngam daliila nuɗɗinki nder innde Yeesu. Nuɗɗinki ki'i hokki mo njamu yeeso mooɗon fuu.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, mi anndi, onon e mawɓe mon, on mbaɗi ɗum ngam on paamaayno.
Diga ɓooyma bee kunnduɗe annabi'en fuu, Allah anndini no Almasiihu muuɗum torroto. Bana nii o gooŋɗiniri ko o wi'no.
Tuube! Ngartane Allah, ngam haa o yaafano on hakkeeji mon fuu,
o suusɗina ɓerɗe mon, o neldana on Yeesu
Doole Yeesu jooɗo haa asama, haa wakkati Allah tammi hesɗitingo kuuje fuu yotto, bana no o wi'i diga ɓooyma bee kunnduɗe annabi'en senaaɓe.
Muusa wi'i: Allah, Jawmiraawo mooɗon umminanan on annabiijo bana am nder deerɗiraaɓe mooɗon. Sey on nana ko o wi'ata on fuu
Mo nananaay annabiijo oo fuu, o gurtinteeɗo e o nattinteeɗo diga caka ummaatoore
Annabi'en fuu, diga Samuyila e annabi'en warɓe ɓaawo maako, mbolwi dow balɗe ɗe'e, ngooyni ɗe.
Onon ngoni ɓiɓɓe annabi'en e ɓiɓɓe alkawal ngal Allah haɓɓi bee kaakiraaɓe mooɗon, o wi'i Ibrahiima: Daliila danygol maaɗa, ummaatooje duniyaaru fuu keɓan barka
Non Allah ummini suka mum, aarti nelugo mo haa mooɗon, haa keɓon barka, haa koo moy mooɗon waylito, acca kuuɗe mum kalluɗe.”
Yaake Piyer e Yuhanna ɗon mbolwana yimɓe, liman'en e mawɗo aynooɓe haykaliiru e Saduki'en ngari haa maɓɓe.
Ɓe tikki masin ngam nelaaɓe go ɗon ekkitina yimɓe no Allah ummitini Yeesu Almasiihu diga maayde, nden maayɓe fuu tammi ummitineego.
Ɓe naŋngi ɓe, ɓe maɓɓi ɓe haa suudu fursina
Ammaa ɗuuɗɓe haa nanɓe bolle nelaaɓe ɓe'e nuɗɗini, haa limgal worɓe waɗi baakin ujine njowi.
Jaŋngo man mawɓe Yahuudu'en e ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta kawti haa Urusaliima.
Ɓe kawti bee Annas hooreejo liman'en e Kayafas e Yuhanna e Aleksandire e yimɓe saare hooreejo liman'en woɗɓe fuu.
Ɓe ndarni nelaaɓe yeeso maɓɓe, ɓe ƴami ɓe: “Bee baawɗe ɗeye malla bee innde moy mbaɗɗon ɗum?”
Nden Piyer, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jaabi, wi'i ɓe: “Yaa ardiiɓe ummaatoore e ndotti'en,
min ngullaama yeeso mon hannde ngam daliila kuugal booɗŋgal ngal min mbaɗani boosɗo e noy o yamɗitiri.
Onon bee Isra'iila'en fuu, sey anndon: Neɗɗo dariiɗo yeeso mooɗon oo, o jamo ngam daliila innde Yeesu Almasiihu mo Nasaratu mo on ngaafi, ammaa Allah ummitini mo diga maayde.
Kaŋko woni:
Hayre nde onon mahooɓe, on ngudini,
kayre laati hayre talkumoore ɓurnde saman
Haa maako tan keɓeten kisndam, ngam walaa goɗɗo feere haa duniyaaru sam, mo Allah hokki baawɗe haa en keɓa hisrugo bee muuɗum.”
Dawrooɓe Yahuudu'en go kayɗini ngam ɓe ngi'i Piyer e Yuhanna kulaay sam, sakko nde ɓe tawi naa ɓe tedduɓe, naa ɓe jaŋnguɓe boo. Nden ɓe annditi ɓe ɗonno ngondi bee Yeesu.
Ammaa walaa ko ɓe mbaawi wi'ugo ngam ɓe ngi'i goɗɗo boosɗo go ɗon dari bee Piyer e Yuhanna, o jamo.
Ngam maajum ɓe ngurtini Piyer e Yuhanna diga suudu dawriinde, ɓe carwootiri,
ɓe mbi'i: “Ko mbaɗeten yimɓe ɓe'e? Caka yimɓe Urusaliima fuu walaa mo anndaa alaama kayɗiniika ka ɓe mbaɗi. En mbaawataa yeddugo ɗum.
Ammaa ngam taa haala ka'a ɓesda saŋkitaago caka ummaatoore, sey mbarren ɓe taa ɓe meeta wolwango koo moy bee innde nde'e.”
Nden ɓe ewni ɓe fahin. Ɓe kaɗi ɓe, ɓe mbi'i taa ɓe meeta wolwango e ekkitingo yimɓe bee innde Yeesu sam.
Ammaa Piyer e Yuhanna njaabi: “Onon bee ko'e mon, ta'e haala ka'a. Ko wooɗi yeeso Allah: Ɗowtanaago on na malla ɗowtanaago Allah?
Ngam doole min tokko wolwugo ko min ngi'i e ko min nani.”
Dawrooɓe mbarri ɓe fahin, nden ɓe njoofi ɓe. Ɓe tawaay daliila hiitaago ɓe, ngam ummaatoore fuu ɗon teddina Allah ngam ko laati.
Duuɓi goɗɗo mo ɓe njamɗitini ɗum bee kaayeefi, ɓuran cappanɗe nayi.
Nde ɓe njoofi Piyer e Yuhanna, ɓe lori ɓe ɗiɗo fuu haa yimɓe maɓɓe. Ɓe ngecci ɓe ko mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en mbi'i ɓe fuu.
Nde yimɓe maɓɓe nani ɗum, ɓe fuu ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe tori Allah bee ɓernde woore, ɓe mbi'i: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, an woni tagɗo asama e lesdi e beeli bee ko woni ton fuu
An waɗi kaaka amin Daawuda, suka maaɗa, wolwa bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, nde o wi'i:
Koni ummaatooje umminta haala,
koni jama'aaje nufoto numooji meereeji?
Laamiiɓe duniyaaru ɗon taaski waɗugo fitina,
ardiiɓe boo ɗon kaɓɓa dabare dow Jawmiraawo
e dow
Ngam bana non Hirudus e Pontiyus Pilaatu e ummaatooje e Isra'iila'en ɓe fuu ɓe kawti nder berniwol ngo'ol dow Yeesu, suka maaɗa ceniiɗo, mo a waɗi ɗum Almasiihu
Ɓe mbaɗi ko a taaskitini bee baawɗe ma e muuyo ma diga ɓooyma.
Jonta, yaa Jawmiraawo, nan barriya maɓɓe! Hokku maccuɓe ma baawɗe wolwugo bolle maaɗa bee dartaare timmididnde!
Waŋgin baawɗe maaɗa haa nyawɓe njamɗita, waɗ alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji bee innde Yeesu, suka maaɗa ceniiɗo!”
Nde ɓe timmini waɗgo do'a, nokkuure haa ɓe ɗonno kawti dimmbi. Ɓe fuu ɓe kebbinaama Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, ɓe ngaazi wolde Allah bee dartaare.
Jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe hawti ɓernde woore e hakkiilo wooto. Walaa bi'ɗo: “Jawdi am, min feere am jeyi”, ammaa ɓe kawti ko ɓe mari fuu
Bee baawɗe ɗuuɗɗe nelaaɓe ceedi ummitineeki Jawmiraawo Yeesu. Allah barkiɗini ɓe fuu bee barka ɗuuɗka.
Walaa talakaajo caka maɓɓe. Marɓe gese malla cuuɗi coorri ɗum, ngaddi ceede coggu man,
njo'ini haa nelaaɓe, kamɓe ndokkata ceede man haa koo moy fodde haaje muuɗum.
Woodi goɗɗo Lewiijo bi'eteeɗo Yusufu, danyaaɗo haa Kiprus. Nelaaɓe coomi mo Barnabas, bana wi'go Cemmbiɗinoowo-yimɓe.
Kaŋko boo o soorri ngesa maako, o waddi ceede man haa nelaaɓe.
Ammaa woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas, innde debbo maako boo Safira, o soorri goɗɗum haa maral maɓɓe.
O narri bee debbo maako, o senndi ceede man, yeɓre o sigi, yeɓre
Piyer wi'i mo: “Ananiyas, koni a acci Sayɗaanu nasta ɓernde ma haa a fewana Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, a sigi yeɓre ceede coggu babal mooɗon?
Diga a soorraay ngal, an jeyi. Nde a soorri ngal boo, an mari ceede man. Koni a waɗi anniya huuwugo kuugal nga'al? Allah a fewani, naa yimɓe.”
Nde Ananiyas nani bolle ɗe'e, o do'i, o maayi. Kulol maŋngol naŋngi nanɓe haala ka'a fuu.
Suka'en ngari, kasni mo, koo'i mo, uwoyi mo.
Ɓaawo saa'aaji tati debbo maako wari, o anndaa ko saali.
Piyer wi'i mo: “Yeccam, ceede bana nii coorruɗon babal mon na?” O wi'i: “Ooho, non min coorri ngal.”
Nden Piyer wi'i mo: “Koni on narri, an bee gorko ma ngam jarribaago Ruuhu Jawmiraawo? Suka'en uwɓe gorko ma ɗon haa yolnde jonta, ɓe ndoondete an boo!”
Ɗon nii, o do'i, o maayi. Suka'en nasti, tawi o maayi, ɓe ndoondi mo, ɓe uwoyi mo kommbi yenaande goriiko.
Kulol maŋngol naŋngi jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe e nanɓe haala ka'a fuu.
Nelaaɓe ɗon kuuwa kuuɗe e alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji ɗuuɗɗi caka ummaatoore. Nuɗɗinɓe fuu ɗon kawta les daŋki Suleymaanu.
Yimɓe wuro fuu kuli hawtango ɓe koo nde ummaatoore ɗonno maŋgta ɓe.
Tum worɓe e rewɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon ɓesdano nuɗɗinɓe Jawmiraawo.
Ngam maajum ɓe ɗon njahra nyawɓe haa laabi, ɓe ɗon mballina ɓe haa leese e daage, ngam haa mbeelu Piyer yaala dow woɗɓe maɓɓe, saa'i to o ɗon saalo.
Yimɓe ngari diga gure taariiɗe Urusaliima, ɓe ngaddi nyawɓe maɓɓe ɓe ruuhuuji coɓɗi torri. Ɓe fuu ɓe njamɗiti.
Nden hooreejo liman'en e wonduɓe bee maako fuu, waato yeɓre Saduki'en, kaaji nelaaɓe masin,
ɓe naŋngi ɓe, ɓe nastini ɓe fursina
Ammaa jemmaare man malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wari, maɓɓiti pareeje fursina, wurtini nelaaɓe, wi'i ɓe:
“Njehe, ndare nder
Nelaaɓe njaɓi, mbaɗi non. Bee baɓɓol ɓe nasti haykaliiru, ɓe ekkitinani yimɓe kuuje ɗe'e.
Hooreejo liman'en e wonduɓe bee maako ngari, ɓe ewni ndotti'en Yahuudu'en fuu ngam dawriinde. Nden ɓe neli haa fursina haa ɓe ngaddana ɓe nelaaɓe go.
Nde Sooje'en njotti fursina, ɓe tawaay ɓe ton. Nden ɓe lori, ɓe ngecci dawrooɓe:
“Min tawi dammuɗe ɗon maɓɓi booɗɗum, aynooɓe boo ɗon ayna, ammaa nde min maɓɓiti, min tawaay koo goɗɗo haa ton.”
Nde mawɗo aynooɓe haykaliiru e mawɓe liman'en nani ɗum, ɗum sakli ɓe ngam ɓe anndaa ko saali.
Nden goɗɗo wari, wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa, worɓe ɓe on nastinno fursina ɗon ndari nder haykaliiru, ɗon ekkitina ummaatoore!”
Nden mawɗo aynooɓe dillidi bee yimɓe mum ton, ɓe ngaddi nelaaɓe, ammaa naa bee semmbe, ngam ɓe kuli taa ummaatoore fiɗa ɓe bee kaa'e.
Nde ɓe ngaddi nelaaɓe, ɓe ndarni ɓe yeeso dawrooɓe. Hooreejo liman'en feli ɓe,
wi'i: “Min kaɗi on, taa on ngaazina ummaatoore bee innde gorko oo sam, ammaa ndaa ko on mbaɗi! On caŋkiti waazu mon haa Urusaliima fuu. On ngiɗi yowango min aybe mbareeki maako
Piyer e nelaaɓe woɗɓe njaabi: “Allah min ɗowtanto, naa yimɓe.
Allah mo kaakiraaɓe meeɗen ummitini Yeesu diga maayde, koo nde on mbarino mo bee ɓilugo mo dow leggal.
Allah boo ɓaŋgti mo, jo'ini mo haa nyaamo muuɗum, laatini mo laamiiɗo, kisnoowo, ngam haa Isra'iila heɓa tuubu e yaafuye hakkeeji.
Minin ngoni seedooɓe haala ka'a, non boo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, mo Allah hokki ɗowtaniiɓe mo.”
Nde dawrooɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ɓerni masin haa ɓe mbaɗi anniya mbarugo nelaaɓe.
Ammaa woodi gooto maɓɓe, Farisaajo mo innde mum Gamaliyel. O moodibbo tawreeta, teddinaaɗo yeeso ummaatoore fuu. O dari, o umri ɓe ngurtina nelaaɓe yaasi ngam wakkati seɗɗa.
Nden o wi'i dawrooɓe: “Onon Isra'iila'en, kakkilane ko on tammi waɗugo yimɓe ɓe'e.
Aran boo Tewdas waŋgi, o wi'i o goɗɗo mawɗo. Yimɓe baakin teemeɗɗe nayo tokki mo. Ammaa o mbaraama, tokkiiɓe mo fuu caŋkiti, haala maako waati.
Ɓaawoɗon Yahuuda Galiiliijo waŋgi yaake limki yimɓe lesdi. Kaŋko boo, yimɓe tokki mo, ammaa nde o mbara, tokkiiɓe mo caŋkiti.
Ngam maajum mi ɗon wi'a on, ndaaye yimɓe ɓe'e, acce ɓe. Ngam to nufaye man malla kuugal man iwi haa yimɓe, ɗum majjan.
Ammaa to haa Allah ɗum iwi, on mbaawataa jaalaago ɓe. Kakkile ngam taa on kaɓa bee Allah!” Dawrooɓe njaɓi haala maako.
Ɓe ewniti nelaaɓe, ɓe piyi ɓe, ɓe kaɗi ɓe wolwugo bee innde Yeesu. Nden ɓe njoofi ɓe.
Nelaaɓe ummi caka dawrooɓe, ngurti, ndilli. Ɓe seyiiɓe masin ngam Allah heyni ɓe torreego ngam daliila innde Yeesu.
Nyalaade fuu, ɓe ɗon ekkitina e ɓe ɗon ngaazina yimɓe Linjiila Yeesu Almasiihu nder haykaliiru e haa ci'e
Nyalɗe man nuɗɗinɓe tokki ɓesdaago. Nden wolwooɓe Yunaniŋkeere
Nelaaɓe sappo e ɗiɗo mooɓti nuɗɗinɓe fuu, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗum fottaay min acca waazaago wolde Allah haa min cuklano senndugo nyaamdu.
Ngam maajum, deerɗiraaɓe, cuɓe caka mooɗon worɓe njoweeɗiɗo, hoolaaɓe, hebbinaaɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, marɓe hikma, haa min kalfitina ɓe kuugal nga'al.
Minin kam, min tiinanan do'a e waazaago wolde Allah.”

Haala ka'a fottani nuɗɗinɓe fuu, ɓe cuɓi Etiyen, goɗɗo marɗo nuɗɗinki, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, Filip, Porokorus, Nikanor, Timon, Parmenas bee Nikolawus mo Antakiya, jananno tokkiiɗo diina Yahuudu'en.
Ɓe njahri ɓe haa nelaaɓe. Nelaaɓe mbaɗi do'a, mballini juuɗe muuɗum'en dow suɓaaɓe go.
Wolde Allah tokki saŋkitaago. Limgal nuɗɗinɓe tokki ɓesdaago masin nder Urusaliima, ɗuuɗɓe nder liman'en boo nuɗɗini.
Etiyen, kebbinaaɗo mo'ere e baawɗe Allah, waɗi kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji mawɗi caka yimɓe.
Ammaa woɗɓe nder suudu dewal Yahuudu'en wi'eteendu Suudu Rimɗinaaɓe, iwɓe haa Sirene bee Aleksandiriya bee yimɓe Silikiya e Asiya ndarni ngaaba bee Etiyen.
Etiyen wolwi bee hikma e bee baawɗe Ruuhu haa ɓe mbaawaay dartanaago mo.
Ngam man ɓe njoɓi woɗɓe nder sirri haa ɓe mbi'a: “Min nani o wolwi kalluka dow Muusa e dow Allah boo.”
Bana nii ɓe umminiri ɓerɗe ummaatoore e ndotti'en e moodiɓɓe tawreeta. Ɓe kippi Etiyen, ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo yeeso dawrooɓe.
Nden ɓe ngaddi seedooɓe haa pewana mo, ɓe mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo, tum o ɗon wolwa kalluka dow suudu Allah seniindu ndu'u e dow tawreeta Muusa boo.
Ngam min nani o wi'i: Yeesu mo Nasaratu oo, wilan suudu Allah e waylitan al'aadaaji ɗi Muusa accani en.”
Dawrooɓe tawaaɓe ton fuu ɗon cuti Etiyen, ɓe ngi'i yeeso maako nanndi bee yeeso malaa'ikaajo.
Hooreejo liman'en ƴami Etiyen: “Gooŋga ɓe mbi'i na?”
Etiyen jaabi: “Deerɗiraaɓe e baabiraaɓe, nananeeɗam. Allah tedduɗo waŋgani kaakiraawo meeɗen Ibrahiima diga o ɗonno haa Mesopotamiya, o siwaa jooɗaago haa Haran tawon.
Allah wi'i mo: Wurta lesdi ma, accu lenyol ma, yah haa lesdi ndi mi hollete
Nden o acci lesdi Kaldiya, o eggi, o jooɗoyi haa Haran. Ɓaawo maayde baaba maako, Allah waddi mo haa lesdi ndi on njooɗi nder maari jonta
Yaake man Allah marnaay Ibrahiima koo yaaɓannde kosŋgal nder lesdi ndi'i. Ammaa o iini marnugo mo ndi, kaŋko e danygol maako. Saa'i man boo Ibrahiima walaano ɓiŋngel tawon
Allah wi'i mo: Danygol ma njooɗoto haa lesdi njananndi, ɓe laatoto maraaɓe, ɓe torroto baakin duuɓi teemeɗɗe nayi.
Ammaa mi hiitoto ummaatoore nastinnde ɓe nder maccuŋgaaku. Ɓaawoɗon, ɓe ngurtoto lesdi man, ɓe njagganto yam haa nokkuure nde'e
Nden Allah waɗani Ibrahiima alkawal, juulnol
Kaakiraaɓe ɓe'e kaaji Yusufu, ɓe coorri mo haa Misra. Ammaa Allah wondi bee maako
wurtini mo diga nder torraaji maako, hokki mo hikma e mo'ere yeeso Firawna, laamiiɗo Misra. Firawna waɗi mo ardiiɗo dow lesdi Misra e dow saare mum fuu
Yaake man weelo
Ngam maajum, nde Yaakubu nani nyaamdu ɗon haa Misra, o neli kaakiraaɓe meeɗen ton jahaaŋgal aranal.
Haa jahaaŋgal ɗiɗaɓal Yusufu annditini hoore muuɗum haa deerɗiraaɓe mum. Bana non Firawna anndiri yimɓe saare baaba Yusufu
Nden Yusufu neli, hoosi baaba mum Yaakubu bee saare maako fuu: Ɓe cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njowo (75)
Nden Yaakubu yehi, jooɗi haa Misra. Ton o maayi, kaŋko e kaakiraaɓe meeɗen fuu
Ɓe njahri ɓe haa Sikem. Ton ɓe uwi ɓe nder yenaande nde Ibrahiima sooduno haa ɓiɓɓe Hamor
Nde saa'i iinawol ngol Allah hunani Ibrahiima ɓadake yottaago, Isra'iila'en ɓesdi ɗuuɗugo nder Misra,
haa wakkati laamiiɗo goɗɗo mo anndaa Yusufu laamani Misra
O ƴoyri yimɓe meeɗen, o torri kaakiraaɓe meeɗen go, o dooli ɓe, ɓe ngudina ɓikkoy maɓɓe musinankoy, ngam taa koy ngeeɗa
Yaake man nden ɓe ndanyi Muusa, o ɓiɗɗo ŋarniiɗo yeeso Allah. Ɓe njogi mo haa saare baaba maako lebbi tati
nden ɓe ngurtini mo. Ammaa ɓiɗɗo Firawna debbo hoosi mo, mawnini mo bana ɓiŋngel muuɗum halal
Muusa ekkiti anndal Misra'en fuu, haa o laati baawɗo bolle e kuuɗe fuu.
Nde Muusa yotti duuɓi cappanɗe nayi, o waɗi anniya yillaago banndiraaɓe maako, Isra'iila'en.
Nde o yi'i Misraajo ɗon torra Isra'iilaajo, o yehi haa o walla mo. O jiŋngi mo, o waati mo, o mbari Misraajo go.
O tammino yimɓe maako paaman Allah neli mo haa o hisna ɓe, ammaa ɓe paamaay.
Jaŋngo man boo o tawi Isra'iila'en ɗiɗo ɗon kaɓa. O tefi senndugo ɓe, o wi'i: Hey worɓe, onon on deerɗiraaɓe, koni on ngiɗi sarrindirgo?
Ammaa torranɗo deerɗum jaabi Muusa, wi'i mo: Moy darni ma hooreejo e kiitoowo amin?
A yiɗi mbarugo yam bana mbarɗa Misraajo keenya na?
Nde Muusa nani ɗum, o doggi, o jooɗoyi haa Mediyan, lesdi njannandi. O danyi ɓiɓɓe worɓe ɗiɗo ton
Ɓaawo duuɓi cappanɗe nayi, malaa'ikaajo waŋgani Muusa nder jamre yiite nder wumre haa ladde haa hooseere Sina.
Ko o yi'i hayɗini mo, o ɓaditi wumre haa o laara booɗɗum. Nden o nani sawtu Jawmiraawo ɗon wi'a:
Min woni Allah kaakiraaɓe ma, Allah Ibrahiima, Allah Isiyaaku e Allah Yaakubu. Muusa hultori, diwni, huli laarugo.
Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: Faɗɗita ngam nokkuure haa a ɗon dari, nde seniinde.
Mi yi'i bone yimɓe am nder Misra. Mi nani uumaali maɓɓe, mi jippake haa mi hisna ɓe. Jonta war, haa mi nele haa Misra

Kaŋko woni Muusa mo Isra'iila'en njaɓaayno, ɓe mbi'i mo: Moy waɗi ma hooreejo e kiitoowo? Ammaa Allah neli mo o laato hooreejo e kisnoowo. Allah waɗi ɗum bee juŋngo malaa'ikaajo mo waŋgani mo nder wumre go.
Muusa wurtini ɓe bee waɗugo kaayeefiiji e alaamaaji nder lesdi Misra, haa maayo Maaliya e haa ladde duuɓi cappanɗe nayi
Muusa wi'i Isra'iila'en: Allah umminanan on annabiijo bana am caka deerɗiraaɓe mooɗon
Yaake jama'aare ɗonno nder ladde, kaŋko laati dariiɗo hakkunde kaakiraaɓe meeɗen e malaa'ikaajo bolwanɗo mo haa hooseere Sina. Ton o jaɓi bolle ngeendam haa o hokka en ɗe
Ammaa kaakiraaɓe meeɗen cali ɗowtanaago Muusa. Ɓe ɗoyli mo, ɓe ngiɗi loraago haa Misra.
Ngam man ɓe mbi'i Haruna
Ɓe mbaɗi lawru nanndundu bee gaggel, ɓe lii'ani ndu kirseteeɗi, ɓe mbaɗi juulde, ɓe ceyori kuugal maɓɓe nga'al
Ammaa Allah ɗoyli ɓe, acci ɓe ɓe cujidana koode asama, bana ko winnda nder deftere annabi'en:
Onon Isra'iila'en! Nde on lii'i kirseteeɗi e dokke
duuɓi cappanɗe nayi nder ladde, min on lii'ani na?
On ndoondi laymaaru lawru mon Molok,
on ndoondi horre lawru mon Refan,
labbi ɗi on mbaɗi ngam on cujidana ɗi.
Ngam maajum mi dahan on
Laymaaru Allah ɗonno caka kaakiraaɓe meeɗen nder ladde. Ɓe nyooti ndu bana no Allah waŋginani Muusa, bana misaalu ɗum o holli mo

Ɓaawoɗon kaakiraaɓe meeɗen ndoni ndu haa baabiraaɓe muuɗum'en. Ɓe ndoondi ndu haa jahaaŋgal maɓɓe dow ardaaŋgal Yosuwa. Allah riiwi ummaatooje goɗɗe yeeso maɓɓe. Laymaaru ndu jooɗi ton haa yotti zamanu Daawuda
Daawuda heɓi mo'ere Allah, tori haa o nyiɓana danygol Yaakubu jooɗorde
Ammaa ɗum Suleymaanu nyiɓani mo nde
Ammaa Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo jooɗataako nder cuuɗi ɗi yimɓe mahata, bana no annabiijo wi'i:
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Asama woni leeso laamu am,
lesdi woni jaaɓruɗum kosɗe am.
Suudu nduye on nyiɓantammi?
Nokkuure ndeye laatoto siwtorde am?
Naa min waɗi kuuje ɗe'e fuu na
Onon saata-ko'e'en, on nanataa haala Allah sam! On cali nanango Ruuhu Ceniiɗo bana kaakiraaɓe mon
Woodi annabiijo koo gooto mo kaakiraaɓe mooɗon toonyaaki na? Ɓe mbari nelaaɓe Allah, anndinɓe garki Adiliijo. Ndaa, on zammbi mo, on mbari mo.
On njaɓi tawreeta Allah ka malaa'ika'en anndini on, ammaa on tokkaaki ka.”
Nde dawrooɓe Yahuudu'en nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe ɓernani Etiyen masin, haa ɓe kirƴindiri nyii'e.
Ammaa Etiyen, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, tijji asama, yi'i tedduŋgal Allah, yi'i Yeesu boo ɗon dari haa nyaamo Allah!
O wi'i: “Ndaa, mi ɗon yi'a asama ɗon maɓɓiti, mi ɗon yi'a
Ɓe ngooki bee sawtu, ɓe cukki noppi maɓɓe, ɓe fuu ɓe kawti, ɓe kippi mo.
Ɓe ngurtini mo haa yaasi berniwol, ɓe piɗi mo bee kaa'e. Seedooɓe acci limce muuɗum'en haa derkeejo bi'eteeɗo Sol.
Saa'i ɓe ɗon piɗa Etiyen, kaŋko o ɗon toro bana ni'i: “Jawmiraawo Yeesu, jaɓ yoŋki am!”
O tuggi koppi maako, o hooli, o wi'i: “Jawmiraawo! Yaafana ɓe hakkewol ngo'ol!” Nde o wi'i ɗum o maayi.
Sol boo yerdi mbareeki Etiyen. Nyannde man fitina caatuka ukkani jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Urusaliima. Ɓe fuu ɓe caŋkiti haa kawye Yahudiya e Samariya, sey nelaaɓe tan lutti.
Yimɓe hulɓe Allah uwi Etiyen, ɓe mboyi mo masin.
Ammaa Sol ɗaɓɓi nattingo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. O yehi haa ci'e
Nuɗɗinɓe saŋkitiiɓe go ngaazi Linjiila, haa ɓe njehi fuu.
Filip yehi haa berniwol Samariya, o waazi yimɓe habaru Almasiihu.
Mooɓe yimɓe kawti, nani bolle Filip bee hakkiilo, ngi'i boo kaayeefiiji ɗi o waɗi.
Ngam ruuhuuji coɓɗi ngurti diga yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe bee gookaali. Jiijiiɓe e woosɓe ɗuuɗɓe boo njamɗiti.
Yimɓe Samariya ceyi masin.
Woodino goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Simon nder berniwol ngo'ol. O ɗonno hayɗina yimɓe Samariya bee hiilaaji maako. O wi'i o mawɗo.
Ngam maajum yimɓe nder berniwol fuu, mawɓe e leesɓe ɗonno nana mo bee hakkiilo. Ɓe mbi'i: “Kaŋko woni baawɗe Allah bi'eteeɗe Baawɗe Mawɗe.”
Neeɓi o ɗonno hayɗina ɓe bee hiilaaji maako, ngam maajum ɓe ngerdi mo.
Nde Filip waazi ɓe Linjiila dow laamu Allah e dow innde Yeesu Almasiihu, ɓe nuɗɗini, worɓe e rewɓe fuu, ɓe njaɓi baptisma.
Simon boo nuɗɗini. Nde o jaɓi baptisma, o tokki Filip, o hayɗini nde o yi'i alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji mawɗi ɗi Filip waɗata.
Nde nelaaɓe haa Urusaliima nani yimɓe Samariya njaɓi wolde Allah, ɓe neli Piyer e Yuhanna haa maɓɓe.
Nde Piyer e Yuhanna njotti ton, ɓe tori Allah haa o hokka ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Ngam yimɓe Samariya jaɓino baptisma bee innde Jawmiraawo Yeesu, ammaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippaakino koo dow gooto maɓɓe tawon.
Nden Piyer e Yuhanna mballini juuɗe dow maɓɓe, ɓe keɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.
Nde Simon yi'i yimɓe keɓi Ruuhu ngam nelaaɓe mballini juuɗe dow maɓɓe, o hokki Piyer bee Yuhanna ceede,
o wi'i ɓe: “Ndokkeeɗam min boo baawɗe ɗe'e, ngam haa mo mi wallinani ɗum juuɗe am fuu, heɓa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.”
Ammaa Piyer jaabi mo: “Allah halkide bee ceede maaɗa fuu, ngam a numi soodugo dokkal Allah bee ceede!
A walaa geɗal nder haala ka'a sam, ngam ɓernde ma laaɓaay haa yeeso Allah.
Tuubu dow halleende ma! Tora Allah! Teema o yaafante anniya ɓernde ma kalluka ka'a,
ngam mi yi'i ɓernde ma ɗon heewi kaajal, a maccuɗo halleende.”
Nden Simon tori Piyer e Yuhanna: “Useni, toraneeɗam Jawmiraawo, ngam taa ko mbi'ɗon waranammi.”
Piyer e Yuhanna mbaɗi seedamku, ɓe ngaazi wolde Jawmiraawo, nden ɓe lorti haa Urusaliima. Nde ɓe ɗon koota, ɓe ngaazi Linjiila haa gure ɗuuɗɗe nder Samariya.
Malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo wi'i Filip: “Umma, yah haa fombina haa laawol ummotooŋgol Urusaliima yahugo Gaaza.” Yimɓe accino tokkaago laawol ngo'ol.
Filip ummi, yehi. Haa ton o tawi Etiyopiyaajo: O cortaaɗo, ardiiɗo mawɗo, kaliifaajo mardi laamiiɗo Kandas debbo mo laami dow lesdi Etiyopiya
O ɗonno jooɗi nder moota pucci maako, o ɗon hoota. O ɗonno jaŋnga deftere annabi Esaaya.
Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i Filip: “Ɓadita
Filip doggi, jokki mo, nani o ɗon jaŋnga nder deftere annabi Esaaya, nden o ƴami mo: “A ɗon faama ko a jaŋngata na?”
Etiyopiyaajo wi'i: “Noy paamranmi nde mi walaa paamtinoowo?” O tori Filip o wa'o moota pucci, o jooɗo kommbi maako.
Ndaa ko o jaŋngi nder deftere man:
“O ɗon bana jawgel ngel ɓe njahrata hirseego.
Bana mbaalu muukaaŋgu yeeso meksooɓe gaasa muuɗum,
non o maɓɓitaay hunnduko maako.
Ɓe leestini mo, walaa jiŋnguɗo mo.
Moy wolwata haala danygol maako?
Ngam ɓe itti ngeendam maako diga duniyaaru
Etiyopiyaajo wi'i Filip: “Useni, yeccam, dow moy annabiijo wolwi ɗum? Dow hoore maako naa malla dow goɗɗo?”
Filip fuɗɗi wolwugo dow aayaaje go, o waazini mo Linjiila Yeesu.
Nde ɓe ɗon tokkitina jahaaŋgal maɓɓe, ɓe njotti nokkuure ndiyam. Etiyopiyaajo wi'i: “Ndaa ndiyam, ko haɗatammi jaɓugo baptisma?” [
Filip wi'i mo: “Ɗum waɗoto to a nuɗɗini bee ɓernde woore.” O jaabi: “Mi nuɗɗini Yeesu Almasiihu woni
Nden o umri ɓe ndarna
Nde ɓe ngurti ndiyam, Ruuhu Jawmiraawo wifti Filip. Etiyopiyaajo meetaay yi'ugo mo. O tokkitini jahaaŋgal maako bee seyo.
Filip tawaama haa Asdod. O tokki waazaago Linjiila haa gure haa o saali fuu, haa o yotti wuro Kaysariya.
Ammaa Sol tokki furkitaago nuɗɗinɓe Jawmiraawo, nufi mbarugo ɓe. O ɓaditi hooreejo liman'en,
o ƴami mo o winndana mo bataakeeji ngam cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en haa wuro Damas. Ngam to o tawi tokkiiɓe Laawol Jawmiraawo ton, worɓe e rewɓe, o naŋnga ɓe, o wadda ɓe haa Urusaliima.
Nde o ɗon haa laawol, o ɓadi yottaago Damas, ɗon nii annoora iwi haa asama, yayni taarde maako fuu.
O do'i haa lesdi, nden o nani sawtu ɗon wi'a mo: “Sol, Sol! Koni toonyotoɗa mi?”
O ƴami: “An a moy, Jawmiraawo?” Sawtu go jaabi: “Min woni Yeesu mo toonyotoɗa.
Ammaa umma, yah haa nder wuro, ɓe ngeccete ko a waɗata.”
Yimɓe yahdanɓe bee maako ndari, njeeɗi siriw. Ɓe nani sawtu, ammaa walaa mo ɓe ngi'i.
Sol ummi, dari, koo nde gite maako ɗonno maɓɓiti, o waawaay yi'ugo koo ɗume. Ngam maajum ɓe njogi mo juŋngo, ɓe njahri mo haa Damas.
Balɗe tati o waawaay yi'ugo, o nyaamaay, o yaraay koo ɗume boo.
Woodi nuɗɗinɗo haa Damas, innde maako Ananiyas. Nder wahayu, Jawmiraawo ewni mo: “Ananiyas!” O jaabi: “Ndaa yam, Jawmiraawo.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Umma, yah haa laawol bi'eteeŋgol Laawol-Darnuŋgol, haa saare Yahuuda, a ƴama goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Sol mo wuro Tarsus. O ɗon waɗa do'a.
Nder wahayu o yi'i goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas nasti, wallini juuɗe mum dow hoore maako ngam haa o heɓa yi'ugo fahin.”
Ananiyas jaabi: “Jawmiraawo, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngecci yam sarru ngu gorko oo ukkani senaaɓe ma haa Urusaliima.
Ndaa o wari haa ɗo bee duŋayeere mawɓe liman'en haa o naŋnga ewnotooɓe innde ma fuu.”
Jawmiraawo wi'i mo: “Yah, ngam mi suɓi mo, mi laatini mo kuuwanoowo yam haa o waŋgina innde am haa ummaatooje e laamiiɓe e haa Isra'iila'en.
Min bee hoore am mi hollan mo no o tammi torreego daliila innde am.”

Nden Ananiyas dilli, nasti saare go, wallini juuɗe mum dow hoore Sol. O wi'i: “Sol, deerɗam, Jawmiraawo mo waŋgani ma haa laawol ngol ngarduɗa haa ɗo, neli yam ngam haa a wumta, a hebbine bee Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.”
Ɗon nii goɗɗum bana koɓe yani diga gite maako, o wumti. O ummi, o jaɓi baptisma.
Nden o nyaami, o heɓti semmbe maako.
Sol jooɗodi bee nuɗɗinɓe wonɓe haa Damas balɗe seɗɗa.
Ɓaawoɗon o yehi haa cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en, o waazi habaru Yeesu. O wi'i: “Yeesu woni
Nanɓe mo fuu kayɗini, ɓe mbi'i: “Naa kaŋko ɗonno torra nuɗɗinɓe haa Urusaliima na? O waraay haa ɗo ngam o naŋnga ɓe, o haɓɓa ɓe, o yahra ɓe haa mawɓe liman'en na?”
Ammaa Sol ɓesdi waazugo bee dartaare. Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe haa Damas mbaawaay waabaago mo ngam o tinndini ɓe bee laaɓɗum Yeesu woni
Ɓaawo balɗe ɗuuɗɗe, Yahuudu'en mbaɗi sawari, ɓe narri dow mbarugo Sol,
ammaa o nani ko haɓɓa dow maako, ɓe ɗon ayna dammuɗe berniwol jemma bee naaŋge fuu haa ɓe mbara mo.
Ammaa jemmaare feere tokkiiɓe Sol koosi mo, mbaɗi mo nder silaawo, njippiniri mo gaɗa mahol
Sol lori haa Urusaliima, o tefi hawtugo bee nuɗɗinɓe. Ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe kuli mo, ɓe njaɓaay kaŋko boo o laati nuɗɗinɗo.
Nden Barnabas hoo'i mo, yahri mo haa nelaaɓe, yecci ɓe no Jawmiraawo waŋgirani Sol haa laawol e ko o wolwani mo e no Sol waaziri habaru Yeesu haa Damas bilaa kulol.
Nden Sol jooɗodi bee maɓɓe, o ɗon waancida bee maɓɓe nder Urusaliima, o ɗon waazina wolde Allah bilaa kulol.
O ɗon yeewtida, o ɗon waabotira boo bee Yahuudu'en wolwooɓe Yunaniŋkeere, ammaa kamɓe ɓe tefi mbarugo mo.
Nde deerɗiraaɓe nani ɗum, ɓe njahri Sol haa Kaysariya, ɓe neli mo haa Tarsus.

Nden jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe gonɗe haa lesɗe Yahudiya e Galiili e Samariya fuu njooɗi jam, bilaa torra. Ɗe mawni nder nuɗɗinki, ɗe ngeeɗi nder kulol Jawmiraawo. Bee ballal Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, limgal nuɗɗinɓe ɓesdi.
Piyer ɗon yaha koo toy, nyannde feere o yehi laarugo nuɗɗinɓe wonɓe haa Lidda.
Ton o tawi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Ayne'as. O jiijiiɗo, o ɗon waali dow be'itte maako waɗi duuɓi joweetati.
Piyer wi'i mo: “Ayne'as, Yeesu Almasiihu yamɗitini ma. Umma, taggu be'itte ma bee hoore ma!” Ɗon nii o ummi.
Nde yimɓe Lidda e Saroon fuu ngi'i mo, ɓe nuɗɗini Jawmiraawo.
Nder wuro Joppe woodi debbo nuɗɗinɗo, innde maako Tabita bana wi'go Lelwa. O ɗonno huuwa kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗuuɗɗe, o ɗonno walla talaka'en.
Wakkati man o nyawi, nden o maayi. Ɓe ngiiwi mo, ɓe mballini mo nder suudu dowru.
Lidda daayaaki bee Joppe. Nde nuɗɗinɓe haa Joppe nani Piyer ɗon ton, ɓe neli yimɓe ɗiɗo haa maako, ɓe tori mo: “Useni, yaawɗa, war haa amin!”
Piyer dillidi bee maɓɓe. Nde o yotti, ɓe njahri mo haa suudu dowru go. Rewɓe yurumɓe taari mo, ɓe ɗon mboya, ɓe ɗon kolla mo toggooje e limce ɗe Tabita nyooti saa'i o geeto.
Piyer wurtini ɓe fuu, tuggi koppi, waɗi do'a. Nden o wayliti haa maayɗo, o wi'i: “Tabita, umma!” Tabita maɓɓiti gite mum, nde o yi'i Piyer, o jooɗi.
Piyer naŋngi mo juŋngo, ummini mo. Nden o ewni rewɓe yurumɓe go e nuɗɗinɓe fuu, o holli ɓe Tabita, o geeto.
Habaru man saŋkiti haa yimɓe Joppe fuu, ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini Jawmiraawo.
Ɓaawo man Piyer faɓɓi haa Joppe haa saare koppoowo lare bi'eteeɗo Simon.
Woodi goɗɗo haa Kaysariya, innde muuɗum Korneliyus: O ardiiɗo dow yeɓre sooje'en Roma teemerre wi'eteende Yeɓre Italiya.
O kulɗo Allah, kaŋko bee saare maako fuu, ɓe ɗon ndewa Allah. Tum o ɗon walla ummaatoore, o waɗa sadaka, o ɗon toro Allah tum.
Nyannde feere deydey njamndi tati, o yi'i bee baŋguɗum nder wahayu, malaa'ikaajo Allah nasti saare maako, ewni mo: “Korneliyus!”
O suti malaa'ikaajo man, o hultori, o wi'i: “Ko waɗi, jawmam?” Malaa'ikaajo jaabi: “Allah nani tornde ma, o yerdi sadaka ma.
Jonta nel nelaaɓe haa Joppe haa ɓe ewnoya Simon coometeeɗo Piyer.
O ɗon weeri haa Simon, koppoowo lare, saare maako ɗon kommbi mbeela.”
Nde malaa'ikaajo go dilli, Korneliyus ewni ɗiɗo haa suka'en mum, bee soojeejo gooto ɓadiiɗo mo, kulɗo Allah.
Korneliyus limtani ɓe haala ka'a fuu, nden o neli ɓe haa Joppe.
Jaŋngo man, deydey caka nyalawma, yaake nelaaɓe go ɗonno haa laawol, ɓe ɓadino yottaago Joppe, Piyer wa'i dow soorowol ngam waɗugo do'a.
O maati dolo, o yiɗi nyaamugo. Ammaa nde ɓe ɗon ndefana mo nyaamdu, Allah yi'ni mo kaayeefi,
o yi'i asama maɓɓiti, huunde bana godoore mawnde, jogaande haa tolɗi
Nder maare woodi dabbaaji marɗi kosɗe nayi e ladooji e colli.
O nani sawtu, wi'i mo: “Piyer! Umma, hirsu, nyaam!”
Ammaa Piyer wi'i: “Aa'a, yaa Jawmiraawo, mi meeɗaay nyaamugo karamɗum malla coɓɗum.”
O nani sawtu go fahin, wi'i mo: “Ko Allah laɓɓini, taa harmin ɗum.”
Ɗum waɗi nde tati, ɓaawoɗon huunde man wiftaama haa asama.
Piyer sakli, faamaay ko wahayu man yiɗi wi'go. Wakkati man nelaaɓe Korneliyus keɓti saare Simon, ɓe ɗon ndari haa yolnde.
Ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe ƴami: “Simon coometeeɗo Piyer ɗon weeri haa ɗo na?”
Piyer ɗonno numa dow wahayu go. Ɗon nii Ruuhu Allah wi'i mo: “Ndaa, yimɓe tato ɗon ɗaɓɓite.
Umma, jippa, dillidu bee maɓɓe bilaa miijaago sam, ngam min neli ɓe.”
Nden Piyer jippi, yehi haa yimɓe man, wi'i ɓe: “Ndaa yam. Min woni mo ɗaɓɓititton. Ko waddi on?”

Ɓe njaabi: “Korneliyus, ardiiɗo dow sooje'en teemerre neli min. O adiliijo, kulɗo Allah. Yahuudu'en fuu ceedani mo ɗum. Malaa'ikaajo Allah wi'i mo o ewno ma haa saare maako, ngam haa o nana ko mbi'ata mo.”
Piyer jaɓɓi ɓe, weerni ɓe.
Jaŋngo man o ummi, o dillidi bee maɓɓe. Nuɗɗinɓe woɗɓe nder wuro Joppe njahdi bee maɓɓe.
Ɓe njotti Kaysariya faɓɓijaŋngo. Korneliyus ɗonno reena ɓe, o ewni banndiraaɓe maako e soobiraaɓe maako hoolaaɓe.
Nde Piyer yiɗi nastugo saare, Korneliyus fotti bee maako, tuggi koppi, sujidani mo.
Ammaa Piyer ummini mo, wi'i mo: “Dara, min boo mi neɗɗo.”
Piyer yeewtidi bee Korneliyus, nden nasti saare. O tawi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon mooɓti ton.
O wi'i ɓe: “Onon boo on anndi fakat, diina Yahuudu'en haɗi Yahuuduujo ɗakkotirgo bee jananno malla nastugo saare maako. Ammaa Allah holli yam taa mi laara koo moy karamɗo malla o coɓɗo.
Ngam maajum, mi jaɓi ewnaandu maaɗa bilaa waabaago. Ammaa jonta mi yiɗi anndugo daliila ewnaandu mon.”
Korneliyus jaabi: “Waɗi balɗe tati, bana wakkatiire nde'e, mi ɗonno waɗa do'a saa'a tati haa suudu am. Saa'i man goɗɗo ɓorniiɗo limce ɗelkanɗe dari yeeso am.
O wi'i: Korneliyus, Allah nani do'a ma, o yerdake sadaka ma.
Nel goɗɗo haa Joppe ngam ewnoygo Simon coometeeɗo Piyer. O ɗon weeri haa saare Simon, koppoowo lare, gonɗo kommbi mbeela.
Ngam maajum mi neli goɗɗo haa ma law, an boo a yerdake, a wari. Jonta min fuu min kawti yeeso Allah, haa min nana ko Jawmiraawo umri ma wolwugo fuu.”
Piyer fuɗɗi wolwugo, wi'i: “Jonta mi faami fakat, Allah senndindirtaa yimɓe
Kulɗo mo, kuuwanɗo kuuɗe adiliije fuu, fottanan mo, koo o goɗɗo asŋgol ngole fuu.
Allah neldi Isra'iila'en wolde mum, waazini ɓe Linjiila ngaddanka salaaman bee Yeesu Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo yimɓe fuu.
Onon on anndi ko saali haa Yahudiya fuu, ɗum fuɗɗi haa Galiili ɓaawo baptisma ka Yuhanna waazi.
On anndi habaru Yeesu mo Nasaratu, no Allah moytiri mo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, no o hokkiri mo baawɗe. O yehi koo toy, o huuwi kuuɗe booɗɗe, o yamɗitini torraaɓe Iblisa fuu, ngam Allah ɗon wondi bee maako.
Minin min seedooɓe ko o waɗi nder lesdi Yahuudu'en e nder Urusaliima. Ɓe mbari mo bee ɓilugo mo dow leggal.
Ammaa Allah ummitini mo diga maayde nyalaade tataɓre, waŋgini mo haa amin.
O waŋganaay yimɓe fuu, sey minin laatiiɓe seedooɓe ɓe Allah aarti suɓugo. Ɓaawo Allah ummitini mo diga maayde, min nyaamdi, min njardi bee maako.
O umri min min ngaazina ummaatoore, min ceedo kaŋko woni mo Allah darni ngam hiitaago yeeɗɓe e maayɓe.
Annabi'en fuu ceedi haala ka'a, ɓe mbi'i: Koo moy nuɗɗini mo, heɓan yaafuye hakkeeji muuɗum barka innde maako.”
Yaake Piyer ɗon wolwa bolle ɗe'e tawon, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippi dow nanooɓe waazu fuu.
Yahuudu'en nuɗɗinɓe warduɓe bee Piyer kayɗini ngam koo yimɓe ummaatooje boo, Allah waanji ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo!
Ngam ɓe nani ɓe ɗon mbolwa bee ɗemɗe goɗɗe, ɓe ɗon maŋgta maŋngu Allah. Piyer wi'i:
“Yimɓe ɓe'e boo keɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo bana no en keɓri ɗum. Moy haɗata ɓe jaɓugo baptisma bee ndiyam?”
Nden o umri ɓe mbaɗana ɓe baptisma bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu. Ɓe tori mo o faɓɓa bee maɓɓe balɗe seɗɗa.
Nelaaɓe e nuɗɗinɓe haa lesdi Yahudiya nani yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe boo njaɓi wolde Allah.
Nde Piyer lori Urusaliima, Yahuudu'en nuɗɗinɓe peli mo,
mbi'i: “A nasti ci'e yimɓe ɓe njuulnaaki e a nyaamdi boo bee maɓɓe!”
Ammaa Piyer yecci ɓe bee tokkindirki ko laati fuu, o wi'i:
“Mi ɗonno haa Joppe, mi ɗonno waɗa do'a. Nden Allah yi'ni yam kaayeefi, mi yi'i huunde bana godoore mawnde, jogaande haa tolɗi
Mi suti nde booɗɗum, mi yi'i dabbaaji ɗi kosɗe nayi e kuuje ladde e ladooji e colli.
Nden nanmi sawtu wi'i yam: Piyer! Umma, hirsu, nyaam!
Ammaa mbi'mi: Aa'a, yaa Jawmiraawo! Karamɗum malla coɓɗum meeɗaay nastugo hunnduko am.
Fahin sawtu man wi'i: Ko Allah laɓɓini, taa harmin ɗum.
Ɗum waɗi nde tati, nden kuuje man fuu lori haa asama.
Wakkati man nden, yimɓe tato njotti saare nde min ngonno. Goɗɗo neli ɓe haa am diga Kaysariya.
Ruuhu wi'i yam mi yahda bee maɓɓe law, taa mi miijo. Nuɗɗinɓe njoweego ɓe'e boo njahdi bee am haa Kaysariya, min fuu min nasti haa saare Korneliyus.
Korneliyus yecci min no o yi'ri malaa'ikaajo ɗon dari nder saare maako, wi'i mo: Nel goɗɗo haa Joppe ngam ewnoyaago Simon coometeeɗo Piyer.
O wi'ete bolle ɗe kisnete, an e saare ma fuu.
Nde mi fuɗɗi wolwugo, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippi dow maɓɓe bana jippori dow meeɗen haa fuɗɗam.
Nden ciftormi ko Jawmiraawo wi'no yam: Yuhanna waɗi baptisma bee ndiyam, ammaa onon on njaɓan baptisma nder Ruuhu Ceniiɗo
Nde nii Allah hokki ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo bana o hokkirno en ɗum, yaake en nuɗɗini Jawmiraawo men Yeesu Almasiihu, Kadi min mi moy haa mi dartano Allah?”
Nde ɓe nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe nde'iti, ɓe maŋgti Allah, ɓe mbi'i: “Asee, Allah holli yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe boo laawol tuubugo haa ɓe keɓa ngeendam!”
Nuɗɗinɓe caŋkitiiɓe daliila fitina ka waɗi yaake mbareeki Etiyen, njehi haa Finikiya e Kiprus e Antakiya. Walaa mo ɓe ngaazini, sey Yahuudu'en tan
Ammaa nuɗɗinɓe woɗɓe iwɓe haa Kiprus e Sirene ndilli Antakiya, ɓe ngaazi yimɓe wolwanɓe Yunaniŋkeere, ɓe ngecci ɓe Linjiila Jawmiraawo Yeesu.
Jawmiraawo wondi bee maɓɓe, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe tuubi, nuɗɗini Jawmiraawo.
Nde habaru man yotti jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Urusaliima, ɓe neli Barnabas haa Antakiya.
Nde o yotti, o yi'i no Allah barkiɗiniri yimɓe man, o seyi, o suusɗini ɓe fuu haa ɓe tokko hoolaago Jawmiraawo bee ɓernde woore,
ngam Barnabas o goɗɗo booɗɗo, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu e nuɗɗinki. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini Jawmiraawo.
Nden Barnabas yehi wuro Tarsus tefoygo Sol.
Nde o tawi mo, o yahri mo haa Antakiya. Ɓe njooɗi ton hitaande woore, ɓe njehi haa kawte jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe, ɓe ekkitini ummaatoore ɗuuɗnde. Haa Antakiya, nuɗɗinɓe aarti wi'eego Masiihiŋke'en.
Yaake man annabi'en woɗɓe ummi Urusaliima, njehi Antakiya.
Gooto maɓɓe, bi'eteeɗo Agabus, dari caka yimɓe. Bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo o wi'i weelo saatuŋgo tammi waɗugo haa duniyaaru fuu. Ɗum waɗi boo nder zamanu laamiiɗo Kalawdiyus
Pukara'en mbaɗi anniya, koo moy maɓɓe nelda ko o waawi ngam wallugo nuɗɗinɓe wonɓe lesdi Yahudiya.
Ɓe mbaɗi non. Ɓe neldi Barnabas e Sol bee dokke man, ɓe njahrani ɗe ndotti'en jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe.
Yaake man laamiiɗo Hirudus fuɗɗi torrugo yimɓe woɗɓe nder jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe.
O mbari Yaakuba, deerɗiraawo Yuhanna bee kaafahi.
Nde o yi'i ɗum fottani Yahuudu'en, o waɗi anniya naŋngugo Piyer boo. Ɗum waɗi nder nyalɗe juulde tamseeje ɗe ufnaaka.
Nde o naŋngi mo, o maɓɓi mo nder fursina
Nii non ɓe ayniri Piyer nder fursina, ammaa jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe ɗon toro Allah ngam maako bee tiinaare.
Hirudus annini hiitaago mo jaŋngo. Jemmaare man Piyer ɗon ɗaani caka sooje'en ɗiɗo. Ɓe kaɓɓi mo bee callalluuji ɗiɗi, sooje'en boo ɗon ayna haa dammuɗe saare fursina.
Ndaa, malaa'ikaajo Allah wari, annoora yayni nder suudu. Malaa'ikaajo dimmbi Piyer, findini mo, wi'i mo: “Umma law!” Ɗon nii callalluuji piisti haa juuɗe maako, njani.
Nden malaa'ikaajo wi'i: “Taada, faɗɗa paɗe ma.” Piyer waɗi non, nden malaa'ikaajo wi'i mo: “Moja mojaare ma, tokkam.”
Piyer tokki mo haa ɓe ngurti saare fursina. Ammaa o numaay nii ko malaa'ikaajo ɗonno waɗa ɗon laato bee gooŋga, o tammi ɗum koyɗol.

Ɓe caali yeɓre sooje'en aynooɓe arannde, ɓe caali boo yeɓre ɗiɗawre, nden ɓe njotti dammugal njamndi fursina tiitiiŋgal berniwol. Parewal maɓɓiti feere muuɗum. Ɓe ngurti, ɓe tokki laawol, ɗon nii malaa'ikaajo go dilli, acci Piyer haa ton.
Nde Piyer heɓti hakkiilo muuɗum, o wi'i: “Jonta mi annditi fakat Jawmiraawo neli malaa'ikaajo muuɗum, hisni yam juŋngo Hirudus e ɗum ko yimɓe Yahuudu'en anninino waɗugo yam fuu.”
Nde o faami ko waɗi, o yehi haa saare Mariyama, daada Yuhanna coometeeɗo Markus. Yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon kawti ton, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa do'a.
Piyer tappi parewal haa yolnde. Derkeejo debbo bi'eteeɗo Rode yehi laarugo ɗum moy.
Nde o annditi daande Piyer, o seyi masin, ammaa o maɓɓitaay parewal, o doggi, o lori haa jooɗiiɓe go, o wi'i: Piyer ɗon dari yaasi.
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “A ginnaaɗo na?” Ammaa o tokki wi'ugo ɓe: “Gooŋga, ɗum kaŋko.” Nden ɓe mbi'i: “Nden kam ɗum malaa'ikaajo maako.”
Piyer tokki tappugo parewal. Nde ɓe maɓɓiti, ɓe ngi'i mo, nden ɓe kayɗini.
O ɓaŋgtani ɓe juŋngo ngam haa ɓe njeeɗo, o tinndini ɓe no Jawmiraawo wurtiniri mo saare fursina. O wi'i: “Ngecce Yaakuba e deerɗiraaɓe woɗɓe haala ka'a.” Nden o dilli nokkuure feere.
Nde weeti, sooje'en cakli masin. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Noy Piyer waɗi?”
Hirudus ɗaɓɓiti mo, ammaa o heɓtaay mo. O dili sooje'en aynooɓe go, nden o umri ɓe mbara ɓe. Ɓaawoɗon Hirudus ummi Yahudiya, dilli Kaysariya, faɓɓoyi ton.

Hirudus tikkani yimɓe Tirus e yimɓe Sidon masin. Ɓe mooɓti, ɓe ngari haa maako. Ɓe aarti narrugo bee Balastus, kaliifaajo waaleteendu laamiiɗo haa o jiŋnga ɓe. Nden ɓe njehi haa Hirudus, ɓe tori mo sulhu, ngam yimɓe maɓɓe ɗon cooda nguure haa lesdi maako.
Nde nyalaade Hirudus ta'ino waɗi, o ɓorni limce laamu, o jooɗi haa leeso laamu, o wolwani ɓe.
Yimɓe kooli, mbi'i: “Ɗum Allah wolwi, naa ɗum neɗɗo!”
Ɗon nii malaa'ikaajo Jawmiraawo fiyi mo ngam o teddinaay Allah. Gilɗi nyaami mo, o maayi.
Ammaa wolde Allah tokki yahugo yeeso yeeso.
Nde Barnabas e Sol timmini kuugal maɓɓe haa Urusaliima, ɓe kootidi bee Yuhanna coometeeɗo Markus haa Antakiya.
Nder jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe Antakiya woodi annabi'en bee ekkitinooɓe. Ndaa inɗe maɓɓe: Barnabas, Simeyon coometeeɗo Ɓaleejo, Lusiyus mo Sirene, Manahen mo mawnidi bee Hirudus Antipas e Sol.
Nyannde feere nde ɓe ɗon cujidana Allah, ɓe ɗon cuumo, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i ɓe: “Cuɓaneeɗam Barnabas e Sol ngam kuugal ngal mi ewnori ɓe.”
Nden ɓe cuumi, ɓe mbaɗi do'a, ɓe mballini juuɗe dow maɓɓe, ɓe njaɓɓiti ɓe.
Bana nii Ruuhu Ceniiɗo neliri Barnabas e Sol. Ɓe njehi Selewkiya, diga ton ɓe nasti koommbowal
Nde ɓe njotti Salamis, ɓe ngaazi wolde Allah haa cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en. Yuhanna Markus ɗon bee maɓɓe, o balloowo maɓɓe.
Ɓe eeri gaɗa duunde, ɓe njotti Pafos. Ton ɓe tawi hiilaajo bi'eteeɗo Bar-Yeesu, o Yahuuduujo, pewoowo bi'anɗo o annabiijo.
O soobaajo Sergiyus Pol, lawan duunde man. Lawan oo, woodi hakkiilo. O ewni Barnabas e Sol ngam o yiɗi nanugo wolde Allah.
Ammaa Elimas - mo maana innde mum hiilaajo - dartani ɓe. O tefi haɗugo lawan nuɗɗingo.
Ammaa Sol bi'eteeɗo Pol boo, kebbinaaɗo Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, suti hiilaajo go,
wi'i: “Ɓii-Iblisa! A kebbinaaɗo faasikaare e halleende, a konneejo adilaaku fuu, tum a ɗon dartano laawol Allah gooŋgawol.
Jonta Jawmiraawo fiyete: A wuman, a yi'ataa annoora naaŋge haa neeɓa seɗɗa.” Law nyiɓre ukkani mo, o wumi. O yiili o tefi goɗɗo ngam ɗowugo mo.
Nde lawan man laari ko waɗi, o nuɗɗini, ekkitinol dow Jawmiraawo hayɗini mo masin.
Pol e wondiɗɗiraaɓe mum nasti koommbowal haa Pafos, ɓe ndilli haa Perge nder lesdi Pamfiliya. Ammaa Yuhanna Markus acci ɓe, lori Urusaliima.
Kamɓe boo ɓe ummi Perge, ɓe ngari Antakiya nder lesdi Pisidiya.
Ɓaawo jaŋnguki tawreeta Muusa e defte annabi'en, ardiiɓe suudu dewal neli haa Pol e wondiɗɗiraaɓe mum, ɓe mbi'i: “Deerɗiraaɓe, to on ngoodi bolle ngam wasaago yimɓe, mbolwe.”
Nden Pol ummi, dari, ɓaŋgti juŋngo mum, wi'i:
“Isra'iila'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe, hulɓe Allah, nananeeɗam!
Allah mo yimɓe Isra'iila, suɓi kaakiraaɓe meeɗen, mawnini ɓe yaake ɓe ɗonno haa lesdi Misra. O wurtini ɓe Misra bee baawɗe muuɗum mawɗe
Duuɓi cappanɗe nayi o munyani ɓe nder ladde
O halki laamuuji joweeɗiɗi haa lesdi Kanaana, o marni yimɓe maako lesdi man
Ɗum fuu ɗum waɗi baakin duuɓi teemeɗɗe nayi e cappanɗe jowi.
Ɓaawoɗon o hokki ɓe alkaali'en haa yotti zamanu annabi Samuyila
Nden ɓe tori mo laamiiɗo, Allah hokki ɓe Sol ɓii Kis, goɗɗo lenyol Benyamin, o laamani ɓe duuɓi cappanɗe nayi
Nde Allah ɓorti Sol laamu, o hokki ngu Daawuda, o laamani ɓe. Ndaa ko Allah seedi dow Daawuda, o wi'i: Daawuda ɓii Yessa fottani yam, o waɗan ko ngiɗmi fuu
Haa danygol Daawuda oo, Allah waɗani Isra'iila'en kisnoowo fodde iinawol muuɗum, kaŋko woni Yeesu.
Diga Yeesu siwaa wargo, Yuhanna waazini Isra'iila'en fuu, ɓe tuuba, ɓe njaɓa baptisma
Nde Yuhanna ɓadake timmingo kuugal mum, o wi'i yimɓe: On tammi min woni Almasiihu na? Aa'a, naa ɗum min. Ammaa woodi garanɗo ɓaawo am, mi he'aay fiistango mo paɗe
Yaa deerɗiraaɓe am, danygol Ibrahiima e yimɓe woɗɓe hulɓe Allah, haa meeɗen Allah neldi habaru kisndam ɗa'am!
Ammaa yimɓe Urusaliima bee mawɓe muuɗum'en paamaay kaŋko woni kisnoowo, ɓe paamaay bolle annabi'en ɗe yimɓe njaŋngata
Koo nde ɓe tawaay daliila hiitaago mo kiita mbareego, ɓe tori Pilaatu o mbara mo
Nde ɓe timmini waɗugo mo ko defte Allah mbi'no dow maako fuu, ɓe njippini mo diga leggal, nden ɓe mballini mo nder yenaande
Ammaa Allah ummitini mo diga maayde.
Balɗe ɗuuɗɗe o waŋgani yahdunooɓe bee maako diga Galiili haa Urusaliima. Jonta kamɓe ngoni seedooɓe maako haa Isra'iila'en
Minin min ɗon ngaazina on Linjiila: Ko Allah iinanino kaakiraaɓe meeɗen,
o hebbitinani en ɗum fuu, enen ɓiɓɓe maɓɓe, nde o ummitini Yeesu, bana ko winnda haa Yimre Jabuura ɗiɗawre:
An woni
hannde mi danyi ma
Allah ummitini mo diga maayde, ngam taa o meeɗa nyolugo, bana o wi'no:
Mi barkiɗinte bee barkaaji am ceniiɗi e koolniiɗi,
bana mi wi'no Daawuda
Fahin bana o wi'i nder aayaaje goɗɗe:
A accataa Ceniiɗo ma nyola
Nde Daawuda huuwi nder zamanu muuɗum bana Jawmiraawo umrino, o maayi, ɓe uwi mo kommbi kaakiraaɓe maako, o nyoli.
Ammaa mo Allah ummitini diga maayde, nyolataa.
Sey anndon deerɗiraaɓe, barka maako yaafuye hakkeeji waazinaama on. Koo nde Tawreeta Muusa waawataa adilingo on,
kaŋko o adilinan koo moy nuɗɗini mo.
Kadi, kakkile, taa ko annabi'en mbi'no heɓa on:
Ndaare, onon mawnitiiɓe!
Kayɗine, kalke!
Ngam kuugal ngal mbaɗanmi nder balɗe mooɗon,
ɗum kuugal ngal on njaɓataa nuɗɗingo,
koo to goɗɗo yecci on habaru maajum
Nde Pol bee Barnabas ɗon ngurto suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, yimɓe tori ɓe, ɓe loro
Nde yimɓe caŋkiti, Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe e jananɓe, hulɓe Allah, tokkiiɓe diina Yahuudu'en ɗuuɗɓe tokki Pol e Barnabas. Ɓe mbolwani ɓe, cuusɗini ɓe ngam haa ɓe tabita nder mo'ere Allah.
Nde
Nde Yahuudu'en ngi'i yimɓe ɗuuɗi, ɓe kaaji masin. Ɓe ngeddi wolde Pol, ɓe kuɗi mo.

Ammaa Pol e Barnabas mbolwi bee dartaare, ɓe mbi'i: “Doole min aarta wolwango on wolde Allah. Ammaa nde nii on cali jaɓugo ɗum, on kiiti ko'e mon on ke'aay heɓugo ngeendam nduumiiɗam, min accan on, min njahan haa ummaatooje goɗɗe!
Ngam kanjum woni umroore nde Jawmiraawo umri min, wi'i:
Mi waɗi ma a annoora ngam ummaatooje,
a yahra kisndam haa keeri duniyaaru
Nde yimɓe ummaatooje nani ɗum, ɓe ceyi, ɓe maŋgti wolde Jawmiraawo. Taaskitinaaɓe diga ɓooyma ngam ngeendam nduumiiɗam fuu nuɗɗini.
Wolde Allah saŋkiti koo toy haa lesdi man.
Ammaa Yahuudu'en ummini ɓerɗe mawɓe wuro e tedda-asli'en, rewɓe hulɓe Allah. Ɓe ummini fitina dow Pol e Barnabas, ɓe ngurtini ɓe lesdi maɓɓe.
Ɓe piɗɗi collaaje kosɗe maɓɓe
Ammaa pukara'en
Ɓaawo maajum Pol e Barnabas njehi Ikoniya, ɓe nasti suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, ɓe ngaazi. Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe ɗuuɗɓe nuɗɗini.
Ammaa Yahuudu'en saliiɓe nuɗɗingo, ummini ɓerɗe yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe, haa ɓe nganya nuɗɗinɓe.
Nelaaɓe ɓe'e paɓɓi ton. Ɓe mbolwi haala Jawmiraawo bee dartaare. Jawmiraawo boo gooŋgɗini waazu mo'ere muuɗum bee hokkugo ɓe baawɗe waɗugo alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji.
Yimɓe wuro cenndi geɓe ɗiɗi dow haala ka'a, woɗɓe tokki Yahuudu'en, woɗɓe boo tokki nelaaɓe.
Yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe bee Yahuudu'en e mawɓe muuɗum'en fuu mbaɗi anniya torrugo nelaaɓe bee fiɗugo ɓe bee kaa'e.
Nde nelaaɓe nani ɗum, ɓe ndoggi ɓe ndilli haa Listira e Derbe, gure haa lesdi Likoniya e haa gure taariiɗe Ikoniya.
Ton boo ɓe ngaazi Linjiila.
Haa Listira woodi goɗɗo mo kosɗe mum jiijiiɗe. O boosɗo diga danyeeki maako, o meeɗaay yahugo.
O nani waazu Pol. Nde Pol suti mo, o faami goɗɗo man woodi nuɗɗinki ngam haa o yamɗitine,
o towni sawtu, o wi'i: “Umma, dara dow kosɗe ma!” Goɗɗo man hafti, o fuɗɗi yahugo.
Nde mooɓe ngi'i ko Pol waɗi, ɓe puɗɗi hoolugo bee wolde likoniire, ɓe mbi'i: “Ɗowanteeɓe nannduɓe bee yimɓe njippake haa meeɗen!”
Barnabas, ɓe ewni ɗum Zes, Pol boo, ɓe ewni ɗum Hermes
Limanjo Zes mo suudu diina mum ɗonno yaasi wuro, waddi ga'i jaagnaaɗi bee pinndi bamaaɗi haa dammuɗe wuro. Kaŋko bee mooɓe fuu ngiɗi lii'anaago nelaaɓe kirseteeŋga.
Nde Barnabas e Pol nani ɗum, ɓe ceeki limce maɓɓe, ɓe njawɗi, ɓe njehi caka mooɓre, ɓe towni sawtu, ɓe mbi'i:

“Onon worɓe, koni mbaɗoton ɗum? Minin boo min yimɓe bana mon! Min ngari haa ɗo ngam min ngaazina on Linjiila, haa on acca kuuje meereeje ɗe'e, on nuɗɗina Allah geeto, tagɗo asama e lesdi e mbeela e ko woni nder maajum fuu.
Naane o accino ummaatooje fuu tokko laabi muuɗum'en.
Koo non fuu o ɗon waŋginira hoore maako bee kuuɗe booɗɗe. O ɗon toɓnana on iyeende diga asama, o ɗon waɗana on ƴaamnde, o ɗon ɗuuɗɗina nyaamdu mon e hayru mon.”
Ammaa koo nde ɓe mbolwi bolle ɗe'e boo, bee daker ɓe kaɗiri mooɓre lii'anango ɓe kirseteeŋga.
Yahuudu'en woɗɓe ngari diga wuro Antakiya nder lesdi Pisidiya e wuro Ikoniya. Ɓe ummini mooɓe, haa ɓe piɗi Pol bee kaa'e, ɓe ndasi mo yaasi wuro, ɓe tammi o maayi.
Ammaa nde pukara'en njehi, taari mo, o ummi, o lori wuro. Jaŋngo man o dillidi bee Barnabas haa Derbe.
Pol e Barnabas ngaazi Linjiila haa Derbe haa ɗuuɗɓe njaɓi tokkaago Yeesu. Nden ɓe lorti haa Listira e Ikoniya e Antakiya nder Pisidiya.
Ɓe tiɗɗini nuɗɗinɓe, ɓe cemmbiɗini ɓe haa ɓe tabita nder nuɗɗinki. Nden ɓe mbi'i: “Sey bee boneeji ɗuuɗɗi en nastirta laamu Allah.”
Haa jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe fuu ɓe cuɓani ɓe ndotti'en. Ɓe mbaɗi do'a, ɓe cuumi, ɓe kalfini ɓe haa Jawmiraawo mo ɓe nuɗɗini.
Nde ɓe caali Pisidiya, ɓe njotti Pamfiliya.
Ɓe ngaazini wolde Allah haa Perge, nden ɓe njehi Attaliya.
Diga ton ɓe nasti koommbowal
