Nde ɓe njotti Antakiya, ɓe mooɓti jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe, ɓe ngecci ɓe ko Allah waɗi bee juuɗe maɓɓe, no Allah maɓɓitiri laawol ngam haa ummaatooje goɗɗe nuɗɗina Yeesu.
Ɓe paɓɓi haa ton bee nuɗɗinɓe balɗe ɗuuɗɗe.
Yimɓe woɗɓe ummi Yahudiya njehi Antakiya, anndini deerɗiraaɓe, mbi'i: “On keɓataa hisugo sonaa to on njaɓi juulnaago fodde ko tawreeta Muusa umri
Pol e Barnabas kujjotiri bee maɓɓe masin dow haala ka'a. Ngam maajum ɓe ndawri, Pol e Barnabas e yimɓe Antakiya woɗɓe njaha haa Urusaliima wolwango nelaaɓe e ndotti'en dow haala man.

Nden jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe hokki ɓe ko ɓe mari haaje ngam jahaaŋgal nga'al. Nde ɓe ɗon caalo nder Finikiya e Samariya, ɓe ngecci nuɗɗinɓe: Yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe boo nuɗɗini Allah. Habaru man seyni deerɗiraaɓe masin.
Nde ɓe njotti Urusaliima, jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe e nelaaɓe e ndotti'en fuu njaɓɓi ɓe. Ɓe ngecci ɓe ko Allah waɗi bee juuɗe maɓɓe.
Ammaa nuɗɗinɓe woɗɓe nder yeɓre Farisa'en ummi, mbi'i: “Sey ɓe njaɓa juulnaago, sey ɓe tokko tawreeta Muusa.”
Nelaaɓe e ndotti'en kawti, linyi haala ka'a.
Ngeewta man wuli jaw. Nden Piyer ummi, wi'i: “Deerɗiraaɓe, on anndi diga ɓooyma Allah suɓi yam caka mooɗon haa mi waazina Linjiila haa yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe, haa ɓe nana, ɓe nuɗɗina
Allah, annduɗo ɓerɗe yimɓe fuu, seedanake ɓe nde o hokki ɓe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo bana no o hokkiri en ɗum
O waɗaay ferootiral hakkunde meeɗen e maɓɓe ngam o laɓɓini ɓerɗe maɓɓe nde ɓe nuɗɗini.
Ngam man, koni on ngiɗi foondugo Allah bee yowango ɓe doŋngal nga'al? Koo enen, koo kaakiraaɓe meeɗen fuu, en mbaawaay roondaago ngal.
Bana enen en nuɗɗini, en kisri bee mo'ere Jawmiraawo men Yeesu, non kamɓe boo ɓe kisri.”
Mooɓre fuu sirwi nde ɓe nani ko Barnabas e Pol ngecci ɓe fuu, ɓe anndini ɓe alaamaaji e kaayeefiiji ɗi Allah waɗi bee juuɗe maɓɓe caka ummaatooje goɗɗe.
Nde ɓe timmini wolwugo, Yaakuba wi'i: “Deerɗiraaɓe, nananeeɗam!
Jonta Simon yecci en bee laaɓɗum no Allah hakkilirani ummaatooje goɗɗe diga fuɗɗam, o suɓi woɗɓe maɓɓe haa ɓe laato ummaatoore maako.
Haala ka'a yahdi bee wolde annabi'en bana ko winnda:
Jawmiraawo wi'i: Ɓaawoɗon mi loroto,
mi nyiɓtoto suudu Daawuda yibbunoondu
mi nyiɓtoto bille maaru,
mi darnan ndu,
ngam haa luttuɓe fuu ngaylito haa Jawmiraawo,
non boo yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe ɗe innde am ewna dow muuɗum'en,
non Jawmiraawo wi'i,
kaŋko o waŋgini kuuje ɗe'e diga ɓooyma
Ngam maajum min, mi yerdi numo ngo'o: “Taa en cakla yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe, nuɗɗinɓe Allah.
Ndikka en mbinndana ɓe haa ɓe ndeento e kusel lii'anaaŋgel labbi e daakaareeku e ko hirsaaka e ƴiiƴam boo
Ngam diga ɓooyma ɓe ɗon ngaazina tawreeta Muusa nder berniiji fuu, ɓe ɗon njaŋnga ka nder cuuɗi dewal Yahuudu'en kala

Nden nelaaɓe e ndotti'en e jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe fuu ngerdi cuɓi woɗɓe maɓɓe, ngam ɓe nela ɓe haa Antakiya bee Pol e Barnabas. Ɓe cuɓi Yahuuda bi'eteeɗo Barsabas e Silas. Ɓe ɗiɗo fuu, ɓe ardiiɓe caka deerɗiraaɓe.
Ɓe neldi ɓe bee bataakewol ngo'ol:
“Minin nelaaɓe e ndotti'en, deerɗiraaɓe mon, min koofni on, onon deerɗiraaɓe ɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe wonɓe haa Antakiya e Siriya e Silikiya.
Min nani woɗɓe amin njehi haa mon, njiiɓi on, cakli on bee bolle muuɗum'en. Ammaa minin min nelaay ɓe.
Ngam maajum min ndawri, min narri, min cuɓi woɗɓe, min nela ɓe haa mooɗon. Ɓe njahdan bee yiɗaaɓe men Barnabas e Pol.
Yimɓe ɓe'e kasdi koo maayugo ngam innde Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu.
Ngam maajum min neldi on Yahuuda e Silas. Kamɓe ɓe ngeccan on habaru man bee kunnduɗe maɓɓe.
Ɗum fottani Ruuhu Ceniiɗo bee amin fuu taa min ɓesdana on doŋngal feere sonaa umrooje kaanduɗe ɗe'e:
Ndeente e kusel lii'anaaŋgel labbi e ƴiiƴam e ko hirsaaka e daakaareeku. On mbaɗi ko wooɗi to on kaɗi ko'e mon kuuje ɗe'e. Njooɗe jam.”
Yimɓe ɓe'e acci ɓe, njippi Antakiya. Nde ɓe njotti ton, ɓe mooɓti nuɗɗinɓe fuu, ɓe ndokki ɓe bataakewol man.
Nde ɓe njaŋngi ngol, ɓe ceyi nanugo haala maagol, ngol semmbiɗini ɓe.
Yahuuda e Silas, laatiiɓe annabi'en, mbolwani ɓe bolle ɗuuɗɗe, sembiɗini ɓe, tiɗɗini ɓe.
Nde ɓe paɓɓi haa ton seɗɗa, deerɗiraaɓe ɗofti ɓe, njaɓɓiti ɓe, torani ɓe salaaman. Nden ɓe lori haa nelɓe ɓe. [
Ammaa Silas jooɗi ton.]
Pol e Barnabas paɓɓi haa Antakiya. Kamɓe e woɗɓe ɗuuɗɓe, ɓe ekkitini yimɓe, ɓe ngaazi ɓe Linjiila, wolde Jawmiraawo.
Ɓaawo nyalɗe seɗɗa, Pol wi'i Barnabas: “En loro, en ndaara deerɗiraaɓe haa berniiji haa en ngaazino wolde Jawmiraawo fuu, haa en ndaara no ɓe mba'i.”
Barnabas yiɗi Yuhanna bi'eteeɗo Markus yahda bee maɓɓe,
ammaa Pol jaɓaay, ngam Markus senndirino bee maɓɓe diga Pamfiliya, accino kuugal, hawtanaayno ɓe fahin
Luural waɗi hakkunde maɓɓe, haa ɓe cenndiri. Barnabas hoo'i Markus, ɓe nasti koommbowal
Pol boo suɓi Silas, ɓe ndilli. Deerɗiraaɓe kalfini ɓe haa mo'ere Allah.
Pol yehi nder lesdi Siriya e Silikiya, o semmbiɗini jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe.
Pol yotti Derbe e Listira. Ton woodi pukaraajo bi'eteeɗo Timote. Daada maako, o Yahuuduujo, nuɗɗinɗo boo, ammaa baaba maako o Yunaniŋkeejo
Deerɗiraaɓe haa Listira bee Ikoniya fuu mani Timote.
Pol yiɗi Timote yahda bee maako. Nde o hoosi mo, o juulni mo ngam Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe lesɗe man fuu anndi baaba Timote, o Yunaniŋkeejo.
Haa wuro ɓe ngari fuu, ɓe ngecci nuɗɗinɓe umrooje ɗe nelaaɓe e ndotti'en haa Urusaliima ndawri, haa ɓe tokko ɗe.
Jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe cemmbiɗi nder nuɗɗinki, kala nyalaade fuu limgal nuɗɗinɓe ɗon ɓesdo.
Ɓe caali lesdi Firigiya e Galaatiya ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo haɗi ɓe waazaago haa Asiya.
Nde ɓe njotti keerol lesdi Misiya, ɓe ɗaɓɓi nastugo lesdi Bitiniya, ammaa Ruuhu Yeesu duŋanaaki ɓe.
Ngam maajum ɓe caali nder Misiya, ɓe ndiirti haa Torowas.
Bee jemma Pol yi'i wahayu, o yi'i goɗɗo Makedoniya ɗon dari, tori mo: “War haa Makedoniya, yiida min!”
Ɓaawo wahayu man, min taaski dillugo Makedoniya, ngam min paami Allah ewni min haa min ngaazo yimɓe ton Linjiila.
Min nasti koommbowal
Min ummi ton, min njehi Filippi, wuro nder yeɓre lesdi Makedoniya aranndeere,
min ngurti wuro, min njehi fomoonde maayo ngam tefugo haa pellel do'a woni. Min njooɗi, min ngeewtidi bee rewɓe mooɓtiiɓe ton.
Gooto maɓɓe, Lidiya, iwɗo wuro Tiyatira, o piloowo limce boɗeeje marɗe saman, o dewoowo Allah. Jawmiraawo maɓɓiti ɓernde maako, haa o nani ko Pol wi'i bee hakkiilo.
Kaŋko e yimɓe saare maako fuu, ɓe njaɓi baptisma. Nden o wi'i: “To on ndaari yam mi nuɗɗinɗo Jawmiraawo, ngare, mbeere haa saare am.” O dooli min weergo ton.
Nyannde feere nde min ɗon ndilla pellel do'a, paanyo debbo korɗo marɗo ginnawol, wari, fotti bee amin. Ginnawol man wartiri mo o daaroowo. Kuugal nga'al heɓani jaagorɓe maako ceede ɗuuɗɗe.
O ɗon tokko min, o ɗon wooka, o wi'a: “Yimɓe ɓe'e, ɓe jagganooɓe Allah Ɓaŋiiɗo! Ɓe ɗon ngaaza on Laawol Jawmiraawo!”
O waɗi ɗum balɗe ɗuuɗɗe. Ɗum ɓilli Pol, o wayliti, o wi'i ginnawol: “Bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu mi umri ma, wurta haa maako!” Ɗon nii ginnawol wurti.
Nde jaagorɓe korɗo go ngi'i seeɓoore keɓal maɓɓe ɗon majja, ɓe naŋngi Pol e Silas, ɓe ndasi ɓe haa luumo, yeeso mawɓe.
Ɓe njahri ɓe haa mawɓe Roma'en, ɓe mbi'i: “Yimɓe ɓe'e ɓe Yahuudu'en, ɓe ɗon ummina fitina haa wuro meeɗen.
Ɓe ɗon anndina al'aadaaji kaɗaaɗi ɗi en mbaawataa jaɓugo e tokkaago, enen Roma'en!”
Mooɓre tuurti dow maɓɓe. Mawɓe Roma'en ɓorti Pol e Silas, umri ɓe piya ɓe.
Nde ɓe piyi ɓe piyɗe ɗuuɗɗe, ɓe njahri ɓe haa fursina. Ɓe mbi'i aynoowo fursina o ayna ɓe booɗɗum.
Nde o nani umroore nde'e, o yahri ɓe haa suudu cakaaru nder saare fursina, o fali kosɗe maɓɓe bee tiggirgal.
Caka jemma Pol e Silas ɗon mbaɗa do'a, ɓe ɗon maŋgta Allah bee gime, haɓɓaaɓe woɗɓe ɗon nana.
Ɗon nii dimmbannde lesdi mawnde waɗi haa caɓɓaaje suudu fursina ndimmbi. Dammuɗe fuu maɓɓiti, callalluuji haɓɓaaɓe fuu boo njani.
Aynoowo fursina fini. Nde o yi'i dammuɗe ɗon maɓɓiti, o losi kaafahi maako haa o mbarto ngam o tammi haɓɓaaɓe ndoggi.
Ammaa Pol towni sawtu, wi'i: “Taa naawnu hoore ma. Min fuu min ɗon.”
Aynoowo fursina tefi yiite, ƴaawɗi, nasti ton, o ɗon diwna, o do'i yeeso Pol e Silas.
Nden o wurtini ɓe yaasi, o ƴami: “Moodiɓɓe, ɗume mbaɗanmi haa mi hisa?”
Ɓe mbi'i: “Nuɗɗin Jawmiraawo Yeesu, nden a hisan, an bee yimɓe saare ma fuu.”
Nden ɓe ngaazini mo wolde Jawmiraawo, kaŋko bee yimɓe saare maako fuu.
Nder saa'iire man aynoowo fursina hoo'i ɓe, looti kuuduuje maɓɓe. Ɗon nii kaŋko bee yimɓe saare maako fuu, ɓe njaɓi baptisma.
O yahri Pol bee Silas haa saare maako, o nyaamni ɓe. Kaŋko bee saare maako fuu ɓe ceyi masin, ngam ɓe nuɗɗini Allah.
Nde weeti, mawɓe Roma'en neli doogari'en haa aynoowo fursina, ɓe mbi'a mo o yoofa yimɓe ɓe'e.
Nden aynoowo fursina wi'i Pol: “Mawɓe neli, mbi'i min njoofa on. Jonta ngurte, Allah yahru on jam.”

Ammaa Pol wi'i doogari'en go: “Ɓe piyi min yeeso yimɓe fuu bilaa hiitaago min. Minin boo min Roma'en! Nden ɓe maɓɓi min haa fursina. Jonta nii ɓe ngiɗi wurtingo min bee sirri? Waɗataako! Sey mawɓe Roma'en bee ko'e maɓɓe ngara, njoofta min.”
Doogari'en lornani mawɓe Roma'en ko Pol e Silas mbi'i. Nde ɓe nani Pol e Silas ɓe Roma'en, ɓe kultori.
Mawɓe Roma'en ngari, nde'itini ɓe. Nden ɓe ngurtini ɓe fursina, ɓe tori ɓe ɓe cotta wuro maɓɓe.
Nde Pol e Silas ngurti fursina, ɓe njehi haa saare Lidiya. Ton ɓe tawi deerɗiraaɓe, ɓe cemmbiɗini ɓe, nden ɓe ndilli.
Nde ɓe caali Amfipolis e Apolloniya, ɓe njotti haa Tessaloniiki. Woodi suudu dewal Yahuudu'en ton.
Pol yehi haa suudu man bana ko woowa.
O ɗon faamtina, o ɗon holla ɓe bee laaɓɗum ko wolde Allah wi'i dow Almasiihu: Sey o yara bone, o ummito diga maayde. Pol wi'i: “Kaŋko woni
Woɗɓe maɓɓe njaɓi bolle ɗe'e, kawtani Pol e Silas. Non boo Yunaniŋke'en hulɓe Allah ɗuuɗɓe e rewɓe tedda-asli'en woɗɓe.
Ammaa Yahuudu'en kaaji ɓe, kawti buuɗaaje wonɓe haa luumo, ɓe ummini fitina nder wuro. Ɓe kippi saare Yason, ɓe ɗon ɗaɓɓita Pol e Silas haa ɓe ngurtina ɓe, ɓe ngara yeeso mooɓre.
Ammaa nde ɓe tawaay ɓe, ɓe ndasi Yason e deerɗiraaɓe woɗɓe yeeso mawɓe wuro, ɓe kooli, ɓe mbi'i: “Yimɓe ɓe'e, ummini jiiɓre nder duniyaaru fuu! Jonta ɓe ngari haa wuro meeɗen,
Yason boo weerni ɓe haa saare mum. Ɓe ngewi umrooje laamiiɗo Roma bee wi'go woodi laamiiɗo goɗɗo, bi'eteeɗo Yeesu.”
Ɓe cakli ɓerɗe yimɓe e ɓerɗe mawɓe wuro nanɓe haala ka'a.
Yason e woɗɓe ndokki ceede, nden ɓe njoofi ɓe.
Nde jemma waɗi, deerɗiraaɓe neli Pol e Silas haa Bereya. Nde ɓe njotti ton, ɓe njehi suudu dewal Yahuudu'en.
Yimɓe Bereya laataaki bana yimɓe Tessaloniiki. Kamɓe ɓe njaɓi wolde Allah law. Balɗe fuu ɓe ɗon linya defte Allah, haa ɓe ngooŋɗina ko Pol wolwi.
Ɗuuɗɓe maɓɓe nuɗɗini. Rewɓe Yunaniŋke'en
Ammaa nde Yahuudu'en iwɓe Tessaloniiki nani Pol waazi wolde Allah haa Bereya boo, ɓe ngari, ɓe njiiɓi yimɓe, ɓe ummini ɓerɗe maɓɓe.
Law deerɗiraaɓe boo ɗofti Pol haa fomoonde weendu, ammaa Silas e Timote lutti ton.
Ɗoftuɓe Pol njahdi bee maako haa yotti Ateena, nden ɓe lori Bereya. Pol neli ɓe haa Silas e Timote haa ɓe ngara haa maako law.
Yaake Pol ɗonno reena Silas e Timote haa Ateena, ɓernde mum metti nde o yi'i wuro man ɗon heewi labbi.
Ngam maajum o hujjotiri bee Yahuudu'en e Yunaniŋke'en hulɓe Allah nder suudu dewal Yahuudu'en. Nyalaade fuu o ɗon hujjotira bee yimɓe ɓe o tawi haa luumo boo.

Marɓe annde wi'eteeɓe Epikuri'en e Sitoyki'en woɗɓe boo kujjotiri bee maako. Woɗɓe mbi'i: “Ɗume ɗuuɗa-haalaajo oo yiɗi wi'go?” Woɗɓe boo mbi'i: “Teema o ɗon wolwa haala ɗowanteeɓe jananɓe.” Ɓe mbi'i ɗum ngam Pol ɗon waazina Linjiila Yeesu e ummitineeki maayɓe.
Ngam maajum ɓe naŋngi mo, ɓe njahri mo haa nokkuure wi'eteende Areyopagus, ɓe mbi'i: “Min ngiɗi ekkitinol kesol ngol a ekkitinta.
A ɗon waŋgina haala kesa ka min meeɗaay nanugo ɗum, min ngiɗi faamugo ka.”
Yimɓe Ateena e jananɓe jooɗiiɓe caka maɓɓe ɗonno cukli limtugo e nanugo haalaaji kesi.
Pol dari yeeso jama'aare haa Areyopagus, wi'i: “Yaa worɓe Ateena! Mi yi'i on ɗon tiini suklanaago haala diina mon jamum.

Ngam nde mi ɗon waanca nder wuro mon, mi yi'i kuuje ɗe on ɗon ndewa, mi tawi nokkuure diina mooɗon bee binndi ɗi'i: Ngam ɗowanteeɗo mo anndaaka. Kadi mo on ndewata, koo nde on anndaa mo, haala maako mi waazinta on.
Allah tagɗo duniyaaru e ko woni nder maaru fuu, kaŋko woni Jawmiraawo asama e lesdi, o jooɗataako nder cuuɗi diina ɗe juuɗe yimɓe mahi.
O maraay haaje yimɓe mbaɗana mo koo ɗume, ngam kaŋko hokkata koo moy yoŋki e poofɗe e koo ɗume fuu
Diga goɗɗo gooto o tagri asli yimɓe fuu haa ɓe njooɗo haa duniyaaru ndu'u fuu. O darni wakkatiiji e keeri joonde maɓɓe boo.
O waɗi ɗum haa ɓe ɗaɓɓita mo, teema ɓe maata mo ɓe tawa mo ngam bee gooŋga Allah daayaaki koo moy meeɗen,
ngam ɗum wi'a:
Yeeɗugo meeɗen, dimmbaago meeɗen, laataago meeɗen,
fuu haa maako ɗum iwi.
Bana woɗɓe haa yimooɓe mon mbi'i:
Enen boo en danygol maako.
Nde nii en danygol maako, taa en numa Allah nanndi bee suuraaji ɗi kaŋŋeeri e cardi malla hayre ko yimɓe mbaɗata bee hakkiilo e baawal muuɗum'en.
Ɓooyma Allah munyani yimɓe nde ɓe anndaano haala muuɗum, ammaa jonta o umri yimɓe koo toy fuu ɓe tuuba.
Ngam o darni nyannde nde o hiitorto duniyaaru fuu bee adilaaku, bee goɗɗo mo o suɓi. O gooŋɗiniri ɗum yeeso yimɓe fuu bee ummitingo mo diga maayde.”
Nde ɓe nani Pol ɗon wolwa haala ummitineeki diga maayde, woɗɓe njanci mo, ammaa woɗɓe mbi'i: “Min ngiɗi a wolwana min haala ka'a fahin.”
Nden Pol wurti caka maɓɓe.
Worɓe woɗɓe boo nuɗɗini, tokki mo. Ɗum Diyonisiyus, goɗɗo Areyopagus e debbo bi'eteeɗo Damaris e yimɓe feere.
Ɓaawo man Pol ummi Ateena, yehi Korintu.

Ton o tawi Yahuuduujo bi'eteeɗo Akilas, iwɗo Pontus. Ɗum neeɓaay o wari diga Italiya bee debbo maako Piriskilla, ngam laamiiɗo Roma bi'eteeɗo Kalawdiyus umri, riiwi Yahuudu'en fuu diga Roma. Pol yehi haa maɓɓe,
o jooɗodi bee maɓɓe, ɓe kuuwdi ngam sanaa'a maɓɓe ngoota: Ɓe nyootooɓe laymaaji.
fuu, o ɗon hujjotira bee Yahuudu'en e Yunaniŋke'en haa suudu dewal Yahuudu'en ngam haa ɓe nuɗɗina.
Nde Silas e Timote ngari diga Makedoniya, Pol suklani waazu tan. O seedi yeeso Yahuudu'en Yeesu woni
Ammaa ɓe ndartani mo, ɓe kuɗi mo. Pol fiɗɗi collaaje limce maako yeeso maɓɓe, wi'i: “To on kalki, annde ƴiiƴam mon ɗon dow ko'e mon, min kam mi laaɓɗo. Diga jonta mi yahan haa ummaatooje goɗɗe.”
Nden o acci ɓe, o nasti haa saare goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Titus Yustus, kulɗo Allah. Saare maako ɗon kommbi suudu dewal.
Kirispus, ardiiɗo suudu dewal man, nuɗɗini Jawmiraawo bee saare muuɗum fuu. Korintu'en ɗuuɗɓe boo nani waazu, ɓe nuɗɗini, ɓe njaɓi baptisma.
Jemmaare feere Jawmiraawo wi'i Pol nder wahayu: “Taa hul, ammaa wolwu, taa jeeɗa
ngam mi ɗon wondi bee ma. Walaa mo meemete, ngam mi woodi yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe nder berniwol ngo'ol.”
Pol jooɗi ton nduuɓu bee reeta, o ɗon ekkitina yimɓe wolde Allah.
Yaake Galliyon laati ngomna lesdi Akaya, Yahuudu'en kawti, naŋngi Pol, njahri mo haa nokkuure kiita.
Ɓe mbi'i: “Goɗɗo oo, o ɗon esta yimɓe haa ɓe ndewa Allah bee laawol ngol tokkaaki tawreeta amin!”
Pol yiɗi wolwugo, ammaa Galliyon wi'i Yahuudu'en: “To ɗum aybewol feereno malla halleende woɗnde o waɗi, mi jaɓanno wullaandu mon.
Ammaa ɗum ngaaba dow bolle, dow inɗe e dow umrooje diina mooɗon, sey onon bee ko'e mooɗon on kiito ɗum. Min mi hiitataako irin man!”
Nden o riiwi ɓe diga nokkuure kiita.
Ɓe fuu ɓe naŋngi Sostenes ardiiɗo suudu dewal, ɓe piyi mo yeeso yimɓe haa nokkuure kiita. Ammaa ɗum ɓillaay Galliyon sam.
Ɓaawoɗon boo Pol faɓɓi balɗe ɗuuɗɗe bee deerɗiraaɓe haa Korintu, nden o jaɓɓiti ɓe. O nasti koommbowal
Nde ɓe njotti berniwol Efesus, Pol jaɓɓiti Piriskilla e Akilas. Nden o yehi haa suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, o hujjotiri bee Yahuudu'en.
Ɓe tori mo o faɓɓa haa maɓɓe, ammaa o sali.
Nde o ɗon jaɓɓito ɓe, o yecci ɓe: “To Allah munyi, mi loroto haa mooɗon.” Nden o nasti koommbowal, o dilli.
Nde o yotti Kaysariya, o yehi Urusaliima ngam hoofnugo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. Nden o dilli Antakiya.
Nde o faɓɓi ton seɗɗa, o dilli. O waanci nder lesɗe Galaatiya e Firigiya, o semmbiɗini nuɗɗinɓe fuu.
Apollos, goɗɗo Yahuuduujo, iwɗo Aleksandiriya, wari haa Efesus. O baawɗo wolde, o annduɗo defte Allah.
O anndi haala Laawol Jawmiraawo booɗɗum, o pertiiɗo, o ekkitini haala Yeesu bee laaɓɗum. Ammaa sey baptisma Yuhanna tan o anndi.
O fuɗɗi waazugo bilaa kulol haa suudu dewal Yahuudu'en. Nde Piriskilla bee Akilas nani mo, njahri mo haa maɓɓe, ɓe tinndini mo Laawol Jawmiraawo bee ko ɓuri laaɓugo.
Nden Apollos waɗi anniya yahugo lesdi Akaya. Nuɗɗinɓe cuusɗini mo, mbinndani deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe wonɓe haa ton bataakewol haa ɓe njaɓɓo mo. Nde o yotti ton, o nafi nuɗɗinɓe jaɓɓe mo'ere Allah jamum.
O waŋgini laaɓɗum boofi ekkitinol Yahuudu'en yeeso yimɓe fuu. O holli ɓe haa Deftere Allah fakat Yeesu woni
Yaake Apollos ɗonno haa Korintu, Pol tokki laawol kooseeje haa o yotti Efesus. Ton o tawi nuɗɗinɓe woɗɓe,
o ƴami ɓe: “On keɓi Ruuhu Ceniiɗo nyalde on nuɗɗini na?” Ɓe njaabi: “Min meeɗaay nanugo haala Ruuhu Ceniiɗo.”
Pol ƴami: “Kadi baptisma kaye on njaɓi?” Ɓe njaabi: “Min njaɓi baptisma Yuhanna.”
Pol wi'i: “Yuhanna waɗani yimɓe baptisma ngam ɓe ngaylito, ɓe tuuba. Yuhanna wi'i ɓe boo ɓe nuɗɗina goɗɗo tammiiɗo wargo ɓaawo maako, waato Yeesu
Nde ɓe nani ɗum, ɓe njaɓi baptisma bee innde Jawmiraawo Yeesu.
Pol wallini juuɗe muuɗum dow ko'e maɓɓe, Ruuhu Ceniiɗo jippi dow maɓɓe, ɓe mbolwi ɗemɗe goɗɗe, ɓe mbaɗi annabaaku.
Limgal yimɓe man fuu waɗi baakin sappo e ɗiɗo.
Lebbi tati Pol ɗon tokki yahugo suudu dewal Yahuudu'en, o ɗon wolwana yimɓe bee dartaare, o ɗon hujjotira bee maɓɓe, o ɗon haɓda faamtingo ɓe haala laamu Allah haa ɓe njaɓa ka.

Ammaa woɗɓe maɓɓe caatini ko'e muuɗum'en, ɓe cali jaɓugo ka, ɓe mbolwi kalluka dow Laawol Jawmiraawo yeeso mooɓre. Ngam maajum Pol daayi ɓe, hawtani nuɗɗinɓe. Nyalɗe fuu o hujjotiri bee maɓɓe haa pellel jaŋngirde Tirannus.
O waɗi ɗum duuɓi ɗiɗi, haa Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe wonɓe lesdi Asiya fuu nani wolde Jawmiraawo.
Allah waɗi kaayeefiiji kayɗiniiɗi bee juŋngo Pol.
Ɓe njahrani nyawɓe leppi e limce meemɗe ɓanndu Pol, nyawuji maɓɓe timmi, ruuhuuji kalluɗi boo ngurti.
Yahuudu'en woɗɓe yiilotooɓe ngam wurtingo ruuhuuji kalluɗi, ɗaɓɓi kamɓe boo wurtingo ɗi bee innde Yeesu. Ɓe mbi'i: “Min umri on ngurta bee innde Yeesu, mo Pol waazata!”
Ɓiɓɓe hooreejo liman'en bi'eteeɗo Sikewas mbaɗata ɗum. Ɓe njoweeɗiɗo.
Ammaa ruuhuwol kalluŋgol jaabi ɓe: “Mi anndi Yeesu, Pol boo mi anndi ɗum, ammaa onon on ɓeye?”
Mo ruuhuwol kalluŋgol ɗon nder muuɗum go hippi ɓe, ɓurdi ɓe semmbe, jaali ɓe fuu. Ɓe ngurti suudu man, ɓe ndoggi ɓe temmbuɓe e naawnaaɓe.
Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe jooɗiiɓe haa Efesus fuu nani ɗum, ɓerɗe maɓɓe ta'i, nden ɓe teddini innde Jawmiraawo Yeesu.
Ɗuuɗɓe caka nuɗɗinɓe ngari, mbaŋgini kuuɗe hiila ɗe ɓe kuuwino yeeso yimɓe fuu.
Waɗooɓe hiila ɗuuɗɓe ngaddi defte maɓɓe, nguli ɗe haa yeeso yimɓe fuu. Ɓe mbaɗi lisaafi coggu defte man, ɗum waɗi ceede cardi ujine cappanɗe jowi (50.000).
Bana nii wolde Jawmiraawo tokki saŋkitaago, baawɗe maare ɓesdi yeeso yeeso.
Ɓaawo haala ka'a, Pol waɗi anniya saalaago gal Makedoniya e Akaya ngam yahugo Urusaliima. O wi'i: “To mi yehi ton, mi yahan Roma boo.”
O neli wallooɓe maako ɗiɗo Timote e Erastus haa Makedoniya, ammaa kaŋko o faɓɓi haa lesdi Asiya seɗɗa.
Yaake man fitina makka ummi haa Efesus dow Laawol Jawmiraawo.
Demetiriyus, tappoowo cardi, ɗonno waɗa irin cuuron nanndukon bee suudu lawru wi'eteendu Artemis. O heɓani waɗooɓe sanaa'a keɓal ɗuuɗŋgal.
O ewni ɓe fuu, kamɓe e tappooɓe cardi woɗɓe. O wi'i ɓe: “Onon worɓe, on anndi risku men fuu iwi diga kuugal meeɗen nga'al.

Onon bee ko'e mon on ɗon ngi'a, on ɗon nana ko Pol oo waɗata. O ɗon wi'a ɗowanteeɓe ɓe yimɓe mbaɗata laataaki ɗowanteeɓe sam, haa ɗuuɗɓe nder Efesus ɗo e ɓurna lesdi Asiya fuu njaɓi ɗum, tokki laawol maako.

To ɗum tokki bana nii, naa sanaa'a meeɗen tan yimɓe kallinta, ammaa ɓe lasbinan suudu Artemis, ɗowanteeɗo meeɗen mawɗo, ɓe accan boo samɗingo ɗowanteeɗo meeɗen mo yimɓe lesdi Asiya e duniyaaru fuu ndewata!”
Nde yimɓe nani bolle ɗe'e, ɓe ɓerni masin, ɓe puɗɗi hoolugo, ɓe mbi'i: “Artemis mo Efesus, o mawɗo! Artemis mo Efesus, o mawɗo!”
Haala ka'a nastini berniwol nder jiiɓotiral maŋngal. Ɓe naŋngi wondiɗɗiraaɓe Pol ɗiɗo, Gayus e Aristarkus iwɓe Makedoniya, law ɓe fuu ɓe njahri ɓe haa babal fijirde.
Pol boo yiɗino yahugo haa mooɓre man, ammaa nuɗɗinɓe kaɗi mo.
Mawɓe lesdi Asiya, laatiiɓe soobiraaɓe maako, neli haa maako, tori mo taa o yaha haa babal fijirde.
Jiiɓotiral ummi caka mooɓtorde. Koo moy ɗon wooka, ɗon wolwa ko o yiɗi, ngam ɓurna yimɓe anndaa daliila kaye hawti ɓe.
Yahuudu'en njahri Aleksandire yeeso. Woɗɓe maɓɓe maatini mo. Nden o ɓaŋgti juŋngo ngam waŋgingo hujja maako yeeso mooɓre.
Ammaa nde ɓe annditi o Yahuuduujo, ɓe tokki hoolugo hawtaade dow haala ngoota baakin saa'iiji ɗiɗi: “Artemis mo Efesus, o mawɗo! Artemis mo Efesus, o mawɗo!”
Bee daker binndoowo mawɗo mo berniwol de'itini mooɓre, o wi'i: “Yaa Efesu'en! Koo moy anndi berniwol Efesus ɗon ayna suudu Artemis mawɗo e suura maaru do'iindu diga asama.
Walaa baawanɗo yeddugo ɗum. Ngam maajum sey on nde'ita, taa njaawane koo ɗume.
Yimɓe ɓe on ngaddi haa ɗo ngujjaay kuuje suudu seniindu, ɓe mbolwaay boo kalluka dow ɗowanteeɗo men.
To Demetiriyus e waɗooɓe sanaa'a wonduɓe bee muuɗum ngoodi wullaandu dow goɗɗo, ndikka ɓe njaha nokkuure kiita, yeeso hiitooɓe, ɓe ngullotira.
Ammaa to woodi ko on tefata feere, mooɓtorde dagiinde laaran haala man,
ngam ɓe poti aybingo en dow ko waɗi hannde bee wi'go en mbaɗi tuurtol, ngam en ngalaa daliila mooɓtugo bana nii. Nde o timmini wolwango ɓe, o saŋkiti ɓe.”
Nde fitina man de'iti, Pol mooɓti nuɗɗinɓe, semmbiɗini ɓe. Nden o jaɓɓiti ɓe, o dilli Makedoniya.
O yiili lesdi man, o semmbiɗini yimɓe bee bolle ɗuuɗɗe. Nde o yotti Akaya,
o jooɗi ton lebbi tati. Yaake o ɗonno taasko nastugo koommbowal yahugo Siriya, o nani Yahuudu'en kaɓɓi dabare dow maako. Ngam maajum o tokkori Makedoniya fahin.
Sopater ɓii Pirrus mo Bereya, yahdi bee maako. Aristarkus e Sekundus, yimɓe Tessaloniiki e Gayus mo Derbe e Timote, non boo Tikikus e Torofimus yimɓe lesdi Asiya, ɓe fuu ɓe njahdi bee maako.
Ɓe ardi min, ɓe njehi haa Torowas, ɓe ndeeni min ton.
Min nasti koommbowal
Nyannde Alat min kawti ngam nyaamugo kiirtaari Jawmiraawo
Woodino pittirlaaji ɗuuɗɗi haa suudu dowru haa min mooɓti.
Derkeejo bi'eteeɗo Ewtikus ɗonno jooɗi haa wurdere suudu, ɗoyŋgol tedduŋgol hoo'i mo yaake Pol ɗon tokkitina waazu. Nde o ɗon ɗaani, o do'i haa lesdi diga suudu dowru tataɓru. Ɓe tawi mo, o maayi.
Nde Pol jippi, o hippi dow maako, harli mo, wi'i: “Taa cakle, o maayaay!”
Nden o lori haa suudu dowru, o yewi tamseeje, o nyaamdi bee maɓɓe. O wolidi bee maɓɓe haa baɓɓol, nden o dilli.
Ɓe kootidi bee derkeejo go, o geeto. Ɗum de'itini ɓe masin.
Min aarti Pol nastugo koommbowal, min ndilli haa Assos. O wi'no min min ardo, ngam o yiɗi yahugo bee kosɗe. Haa ton o tammi nastugo koommbowal man.
Nde o jokki min haa Assos, min nastini mo koommbowal amin, min ndilli Mitilene.
Min ummi ton bee koommbowal, jaŋngo man min tiitotiri bee Kiyos. Faɓɓijaŋngo man min njotti Samos, faɓɓitijaŋngo man boo min njotti Miletus.
Pol waɗi anniya saalaago Efesus bilaa jippaago, ngam o yiɗaa neeɓugo haa lesdi Asiya. O ɗon yaawana yottaago Urusaliima hiddeko
Diga Miletus Pol neli haa ndotti'en jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe Efesus ngam haa ɓe ngara haa maako.
Nde ɓe njotti, o wi'i ɓe: “Onon anndi no mi jooɗori bee mooɗon, diga nyannde mi wari haa lesdi Asiya.
Mi huuwani Jawmiraawo bee yaŋkinaare timmunde, bee bojji, nder boneeji keɓɗi yam ngam Yahuudu'en annini halleende dow am.
On anndi, nder waazu am mi suuɗaay on koo ɗume ko nafata on fuu. Mi ekkitini on yeeso yimɓe fuu e haa ci'e
Foroy mi wolwani Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe fuu haa ɓe tuuba, ɓe nuɗɗina Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu.
Kadi jonta mi ɗon dilla Urusaliima ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗon yerɓammi
Huunde woore anndumi: Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗon hollammi haa gure ɗe mi yaalata fuu callalluuji e boneeji ɗon ndeenammi.
Ammaa mi laaraay yoŋki am bana huunde marnde saman, ko ngiɗmi kam, mi timmitina daɗa-daɗa am e kuugal ngal Jawmiraawo Yeesu halfini yam, waato seedaago Linjiila ka mo'ere Allah
Mi yiili caka mooɗon fuu, mi waazi habaru laamu Allah. Jonta min, mi anndi on meetataa yi'ugo yam fahin.
Ngam maajum, mi seedi on hannde: To goɗɗo mooɗon halki, naa ɗum aybe am,
ngam mi waazi on muuyo Allah fuu, mi suuɗaay on koo ɗume.
Ayne ko'e mooɗon! Ayne tokkere nde Ruuhu Ceniiɗo halfini on! Bana waynaaɓe, ayne jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe Allah, nde o heɓri bee ƴiiƴam
Ngam mi anndi to mi dilli, caafaali kaaŋaaɗi nastan caka mooɗon, ɗi accataa tokkere.
Woɗɓe caka mooɗon boo ummoto, kuuwtiniran pewe ngam haa nuɗɗinɓe tokko ɓe.
Ngam maajum ayne! Ciftore no duuɓi tati, jemma bee naaŋge fuu, mi accaay barraago koo moy mooɗon bee gonɗi.
Jonta mi halfini on haa juŋngo Allah e haa habaru mo'ere maako. O waawan mawningo on nder nuɗɗinki e tabitingo ndonŋgu mooɗon, ngu o sigani senaaɓe maako fuu.
Mi suunaay cardi malla kaŋŋeeri malla limce goɗɗo.
Onon bee ko'e mooɗon on anndi juuɗe am ɗe'e kumti haaje am e haaje wondiɗɗiraaɓe am.
Nder ko mbaɗmi fuu mi holli on sey en kuuwa, en mballa tampuɓe. En ciftora boo ko Jawmiraawo Yeesu wi'i bee hoore mum: Barka dokkuɗo ɓuran ka dokkaaɗo.”
Nde Pol timmini wolwugo, fuu maɓɓe ɓe tuggi koppi, o waɗi do'a.
Ɓe fuu ɓe mboyi, ɓe karli mo, ɓe kebbi mo.
Ɓe cuni masin sakkomaa nde ɓe nani o wi'i ɓe meetataa yi'ugo mo fahin. Nden ɓe ɗofti mo haa koommbowal
Nde min njaɓɓiti ɓe, min nasti koommbowal, min njehi cir haa Kos. Jaŋngo man min njotti Rodos. Diga ton min njehi Patara.
Ton min tawi koommbowal yahugo Finikiya. Min nasti, min ndilli.
Min mbakki Kiprus, min ɗon ngi'a ɗum, ammaa min caalori fombina man, min njehi Siriya. Min njippi haa Tirus, ngam haa ɓe njippina kuuje.
Min tawi nuɗɗinɓe ton, min njooɗi bee maɓɓe asaweere woore. Bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɓe ngecci Pol taa o yaha Urusaliima.
Ammaa nde asaweere man timmi, min ummi, min ndilli. Kamɓe e rewɓe maɓɓe e ɓikkoy fuu, ɓe ɗofti min haa yaasi berniwol. Min tuggi koppi haa fomoonde mbeela, min mbaɗi do'a.
Nden min njaɓɓotiri, min nasti koommbowal, kamɓe boo ɓe kooti.
Nde min ummi Tirus, min njehi Potolemayis. Min koofni deerɗiraaɓe wonɓe ton, nden min nyallidi bee maɓɓe.
Jaŋngo man min ndilli, min njotti Kaysariya. Ton min njehi saare Filip gaazoowo, min njippi haa maako. O gooto nder suɓaaɓe njoweeɗiɗo haa Urusaliima
O woodi ɓiɓɓe rewɓe nayo ɓe te'aaka, ɓe ɗon mbaɗa annabaaku.
Nde min paɓɓi haa ton balɗe seɗɗa, annabiijo bi'eteeɗo Agabus iwi Yahudiya

wari haa amin. O hoo'i taadorgol Pol, o haɓɓi kosɗe maako e juuɗe maako bee maagol, o wi'i: “Ndaa ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wi'i: Yahuudu'en haa Urusaliima kaɓɓan marɗo taadorgol ngo'ol bana nii, ɓe ndokkan mo haa juuɗe yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe.”
Nde min nani ɗum, minin bee yimɓe ton fuu, min tori Pol, taa o yaha Urusaliima.
Ammaa Pol jaabi: “Koni on mboyata? On ngiɗi sunugo yam na? Min kam, naa haɓɓeego haa Urusaliima tan, ammaa mi ɗon taaskani maayugo maa, ngam daliila Jawmiraawo Yeesu.”
Min mbaawaay faasitingo anniya maako. Nden min acci mo, min mbi'i: “Muuyo Jawmiraawo laato.”
Ɓaawo man, min taaski, min ndilli Urusaliima.
Nuɗɗinɓe Kaysariya woɗɓe njahdi bee amin. Ɓe njahri min haa min mbeerata haa saare Manason iwɗo Kiprus, nuɗɗinɗo diga ɓooyma.
Nde min njotti Urusaliima, deerɗiraaɓe njaɓɓi min bee seyo.
Jaŋngo man Pol yahdi bee amin haa Yaakuba. Ndotti'en jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe fuu boo ngari ton.
Pol hoofni ɓe, yecci ɓe koo ɗume ko Allah waɗi bee kuugal maako caka ummaatooje goɗɗe.
Nde ɓe nani ɗum, ɓe maŋgti Allah. Nden ɓe mbi'i Pol: “Deerɗiraawo, a yi'i no Yahuudu'en ujine ɗuuɗɗe nuɗɗini, ammaa ɓe fuu ɓe ɗon tiini tokkaago tawreeta.
Ɓe nani a ɗon ekkitina Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe lesɗe ummaatooje goɗɗe fuu ɓe acca tawreeta Muusa, ɓe acca boo juulnugo
Noy mbaɗeten? Ngam fakat ɓe nanan a wari.
Ngam maajum waɗ ko min mbi'ete. Woodi yimɓe nayo haa ɗo, waɗɓe

Yahdu bee maɓɓe, sen hoore ma bee maɓɓe fodde al'aada cenki. Yoɓ ceede haa ɓe laɓa ko'e maɓɓe. To a waɗi ɗum, yimɓe fuu paaman ko ɓe nani dow ma fuu, naa ɗum gooŋga, ammaa an bee hoore ma a ɗon tokko tawreeta Muusa
Ammaa min neldi bataakewol haa yimɓe ummaatooje laatiiɓe nuɗɗinɓe, min ndawri, min mbi'i ɓe ɓe ndeenta e kusel kirsanaaŋgel labbi e ƴiiƴam e ko hirsaaka e daakaareeku
Ngam maajum Pol yahdi bee yimɓe nayo go. Jaŋngo man o hawti bee maɓɓe waɗugo al'aada cenki. Nden o nasti
Nde balɗe joweeɗiɗi ɓadake timmugo, Yahuudu'en warɓe diga lesdi Asiya ngi'i Pol haa haykaliiru. Ɓe ummini ɓerɗe mooɓre fuu, ɓe naŋngi mo.

Ɓe kooli, ɓe mbi'i: “Isra'iila'en, mballe min! Ndaa gorko oo, o ɗon hallina jama'aare Isra'iila e tawreeta Muusa e haykaliiru fuu, o ɗon anndina ɗum koo moy e koo toy. Fahin boo o nastini heefeerɓe woɗɓe nder haykaliiru, o soɓni nokkuure seniinde nde'e!”
Ɓe mbi'i ɗum ngam ɓe ngi'i Torofimus mo Efesus, bee Pol nder berniwol, ɓe tammino Pol nastini mo nder haykaliiru
Haala ka'a saŋkiti nder berniwol fuu haa yimɓe maagol fuu mooɓti. Ɓe naŋngi Pol, ɓe ndasi mo yaasi haykaliiru. Nden law ɓe maɓɓi dammuɗe maaru.
Mooɓre yiɗi mbarugo Pol, ammaa habaru man yotti ardiiɗo dow sooje'en Roma ujineere, ɓe mbi'i mo: “Berniwol Urusaliima fuu ɗon nder fitina.”
Law o hoo'i sooje'en bee ardiiɓe dow sooje'en teemerre, ɓe ndoggi, ɓe njehi haa mooɓre. Nde yimɓe ngi'i ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere e sooje'en ngari, ɓe acci fiyugo Pol.
Nden ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere go ɓaditi Pol, naŋngi mo, umri ɓe kaɓɓa mo bee callalluuji ɗiɗi. Nden o ƴami: “Ɗum moye? Ɗume o waɗi?”
Koo moy ɗon wolwa ko o yiɗi bee sawtu. Daliila haraka, ardiiɗo oo heɓaay jaawaabu laaɓŋgu, nden o umri ɓe njahra Pol haa saŋngeere sooje'en.
Nde ɓe njotti haa ba'orɗe, sooje'en efti mo ngam fitina mooɓre saati masin,
ngam yimɓe fuu ɗon tokki mo, ɓe ɗon koola: “Mbare mo! Mbare mo!”
Nde sooje'en ɓadi nastingo mo nder saŋngeere muuɗum'en, Pol wi'i ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere: “Mi foti wolwango ma na?” Ardiiɗo man ƴami: “A anndi Yunaniŋkeere
Asee! Naa an woni Misraajo tuurtuɗo, jahruɗo tuurtooɓe ujine nayo, mbarooɓe ko'e haa ladde nyalɗe ɗe'e na?”
Pol jaabi: “Min mi Yahuuduujo, danyaaɗo haa Tarsus nder Silikiya, mi ɓii berniwol maŋngol. Mi tori ma, duŋanam wolwango mooɓre.”
O duŋani mo. Nden Pol wa'i ba'orɗe, ɓaŋgti juuɗe mum ngam haa yimɓe njeeɗo. Nde ɓe njeeɗi siriw, o wolwani ɓe bee Ibraniŋkeere, o wi'i:
“Yaa ndotti'en e deerɗiraaɓe! Nane, jonta haa mi wolwa hujja am nder haala ka'a.”
Nde ɓe nani o ɗon wolwana ɓe bee Ibraniŋkeere, ɓe ɓesdi sirwaago. Nden Pol wi'i:

“Min mi Yahuuduujo, danyaaɗo haa Tarsus nder Silikiya. Mi mawni boo haa ɗo, haa berniwol Urusaliima. Gamaliyel boo ekkitini yam fodde dookaaji kaakiraaɓe. Mi tiini nder kuuɗe Allah bee semmbe am fuu bana mbaɗoton hannde
Mi toonyi tokkiiɓe Laawol Almasiihu haa woɗɓe maayi. Mi naŋngi worɓe e rewɓe, mi nastini ɓe fursina

Hooreejo liman'en e dawrooɓe Yahuudu'en ngoni seedooɓe yam. Ɓe mbinndani yam bataakeeji ngam haa mi yahra ɗi haa deerɗiraaɓe haa Damas. Mi ɗonno yaha ton haa mi naŋngoya yimɓe, mi haɓɓa ɓe, mi wadda ɓe haa Urusaliima haa dawrooɓe kiito ɓe
“Nde mi ɗon yaha Damas, mi ɓadake yottaago ton, caka nyalawma, law annoora makka iwi haa asama yaynani yam, taari yam.
Mi do'i haa lesdi, mi nani sawtu wi'i yam: Sol, Sol, koni toonyotoɗa mi?
Mi ƴami: An moy, Jawmiraawo? O wi'i yam: Min woni Yeesu mo Nasaratu, mo toonyotoɗa.
Wondiɗɗiraaɓe am ngi'i annoora, ammaa ɓe nanaay sawtu bolwanɗo yam.
Mi ƴami: Ɗume mi waɗata, Jawmiraawo? Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: Umma, yah Damas, ton ɓe ngeccete ko a tammi waɗugo fuu.
Annoora makka go ɗelki, wumni yam, ngam maajum wondiɗɗiraaɓe am ɗowi yam, njahri yam haa Damas.
Ton woodi goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas, kulɗo Allah, ɗowtaniiɗo tawreeta. Yahuudu'en jooɗiiɓe Damas fuu ɗon mana mo.
O wari haa am, o dari kommbi am, o wi'i: Sol, deerɗam, wumtu! Ɗon nii mi wumti, mi ɗon yi'a mo.
O wi'i yam: Allah kaakiraaɓe meeɗen suɓi ma diga ɓooyma haa a faama muuyo maako, a yi'a Adiliijo maako, a nana ko o ɗon wolwa.
Ngam a laatoto ceedoowo maako, a yeccan yimɓe fuu ko a yi'i e ko a nani.
Ɗume a reenata jonta? Umma, jaɓ baptisma, laaɓa e hakkeeji maaɗa bee ewnaago innde Jawmiraawo.”
“Mi lori Urusaliima. Nde mi ɗon waɗa do'a nder
ndaa Jawmiraawo ɗon wolwanammi bana ni'i: Yaawɗa law, wurta Urusaliima, ngam yimɓe ɓe'e njaɓataa seedamku maaɗa dow am.
Mi jaabi: Jawmiraawo, ɓe anndi fakat mi yehi cuuɗi dewal, mi naŋngi nuɗɗinɓe ma, mi fiyi ɓe.
Nyannde ɓe mbara ceedoowo ma Etiyen maa, min boo mi ɗon ton. Mi yerdi mbareeki maako, mi ayni limce warɓe mo
Jawmiraawo wi'i yam: Yah, ngam mi nelete daayiiɗum haa ummaatooje goɗɗe.”
Yimɓe munyani mo haa o yotti bolle man. Nde ɓe nani ɗum, ɓe kooli, ɓe mbi'i: “Mbare irin goɗɗo oo, taa acce mo o yeeɗa!”
Ɓe ɗon koola, ɓe ɗon cakkina limce maɓɓe dow, ɓe ɗon ukka collaaje.
Ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere umri yimɓe mum ɓe njahra mo nder saŋngeere maɓɓe, ɓe piya mo, ɓe ndila mo haa o heɓta daliila ɗume Yahuudu'en ɗon koola bana nii dow maako.
Ammaa nde ɓe ɗon kaɓɓa mo haa ɓe piya mo, Pol wi'i ardiiɗo dow sooje'en teemerre gonɗo ton: “On ngoodi duŋayeere fiyugo Romaajo mo hiitaaka tawon na?”
Nde ardiiɗo man nani ɗum, o yehi haa ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere go, o ƴami mo: “Ɗume a yiɗi waɗugo? Gorko oo, o Romaajo!”
Nden ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere yehi haa Pol, ƴami mo: “Yeccam, a Romaajo na?” Pol jaabi: “Ooho, mi Romaajo.”
Ardiiɗo man wi'i: “Min, bee ceede ɗuuɗɗe keɓmi laataago Romaajo.” Pol wi'i: “Min mi Romaajo diga danyeeki am.”
Law sooje'en taaskaniiɓe fiyugo e dilugo mo haa o wolwa go, acci mo. Ardiiɗo maɓɓe go boo hultori nde o faami Pol, o Romaajo. Ndaa boo, o haɓɓi mo bee callalluuji.

Jaŋngo maajum, ardiiɗo sooje'en man yiɗi anndugo bee laaɓɗum daliila hujja kaye Yahuudu'en ngullori Pol. Ngam maajum o fiisti callalluuji Pol, o umri mawɓe liman'en e dawrooɓe fuu ɓe kawta. Nden o waddi Pol, o darni mo yeeso maɓɓe.
Pol suti dawrooɓe, wi'i: “Deerɗiraaɓe am! Min mi ɗowtani Allah haa hannde bee numo ɓernde laaɓŋgo.”
Hooreejo liman'en bi'eteeɗo Ananiyas umri wonɓe kommbi Pol ɓe piya mo haa hunnduko.
Pol wi'i mo: “Fakat Allah fiyete, an naafikiijo! A ɗon jooɗi ngam hiitaago yam fodde tawreeta, ammaa a luuti tawreeta nde a ɗon umra ɓe piyammi
Wonɓe kommbi maako mbi'i mo: “A ɗon huɗa hooreejo liman'en mo Allah darni!”
Pol jaabi: “Deerɗiraaɓe am, mi anndaa o hooreejo liman'en. Ngam Deftere Allah wi'i: Taa wolwu kalluka dow ardiiɗo ummaatoore mon

Nde Pol anndi woɗɓe maɓɓe ɓe Saduki'en, woɗɓe boo Farisa'en, o wolwi nder dawriinde bee sawtu, o wi'i: “Deerɗiraaɓe am! Min mi Farisaajo, ɓii Farisaajo. Ɓe ngulli yam haa ɗo ngam mi woodi tammunde maayɓe ummititto diga maayde
Nde o wi'i ɗum, Farisa'en e Saduki'en puɗɗi ngaaba, ɓe cenndi geɓe ɗiɗi.
Ngam Saduki'en ɗon mbi'a ummitineeki diga maayde woodaa, ɓe ɗon mbi'a boo woodaa malaa'ikaajo, woodaa ruuhu. Ammaa Farisa'en ɗon mbi'a ɗum fuu ɗum ɗon
Nde hoolo man ɓesdi, woɗɓe haa moodiɓɓe tawreeta ɓe yeɓre Farisa'en ummi, ndartani mo bee caatal: “Min tawaay aybewol koo gootol haa gorko oo! Teema malaa'ikaajo malla ruuhu wolwani mo!”

Ngaaba man ummiti bee semmbe haa ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere go huli taa ɓe campita Pol. Ngam maajum o umri sooje'en maako ɓe njaha haa mooɓre, ɓe ngurtina Pol caka maɓɓe bee semmbe, ɓe njahra mo haa saŋngeere.
Jemmaare man Jawmiraawo waŋgani Pol, wi'i mo: “Tiɗɗin ɓernde ma! Bana a seedi yam haa Urusaliima, sey a seedo yam bana non haa Roma boo.”
Jaŋngo man Yahuudu'en woɗɓe kawti, kaɓɓi dabare mbarugo Pol. Ɓe mbaɗi hunayeere ɓe nyaamataa koo ɗume, ɓe njarataa koo ɗume, sey to ɓe mbari mo.
Hoocuɓe anniya ka'a ɓuri cappanɗe nayo.
Ɓe njehi haa mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en, ɓe mbi'i: “Min mbaɗi hunayeere min nyaamataa koo ɗume, sey to min mbari Pol.

Jonta, onon bee dawrooɓe, sey on nela haa ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere, o wadda Pol haa mon bana to on ngiɗno linyugo haala maako fahin. Minin boo min ɗon taaski mbarugo mo diga o yottaaki haa mooɗon.”
Ammaa ɓii deerɗiraawo Pol debbo nani anniya baaltol man. O yehi, o nasti saŋngeere sooje'en, o yecci Pol haala man.
Nden Pol ewni goɗɗo caka ardiiɓe dow sooje'en teemerre, wi'i mo: “Yahru suka oo haa ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere, woodi ko o yeccata mo.”
O yahri mo haa mawɗo maɓɓe man, o wi'i: “Pol kaɓɓaaɗo, ewni yam, o wi'i yam mi wadda suka oo haa maaɗa, ngam woodi ko o yiɗi yeccugo ma
Mawɗo man naŋngi mo juŋngo, yahri mo sera, ƴami mo: “Ɗume a yiɗi yeccugo yam?”
O jaabi: “Yahuudu'en narri ƴamugo ma jaŋngo a yahra Pol haa dawrooɓe haa ɓe linya haala maako go fahin.

Ammaa taa jaɓan ɓe, ngam worɓe ko ɓuri cappanɗe nayo ɗon mbaaltani mo, ɗon ndeena mo. Ɓe fuu ɓe mbaɗi hunayeere ɓe nyaamataa, ɓe njarataa sey to ɓe mbari mo. Ɓe taaski waɗugo ɗum, ɓe ɗon ndeena jaawaabu maaɗa
Ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere go wi'i mo: “Taa a wi'a koo moy a yecci yam haala ka'a.” Nden o jaɓɓiti mo.

Nden o ewni yimɓe ɗiɗo nder ardiiɓe dow sooje'en teemerre, o wi'i ɓe: “Mooɓe sooje'en teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e wa'iiɓe pucci cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e jogiiɓe labbe teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo, ɓe taaskano dillugo Kaysariya deydey saa'a joweenayi jemma.
Taaskane boo Pol pucci haa njahron mo jam haa Felikus, ngomnaajo.”
Nden o winndi bataakewol ngo'ol:
“Kalawdiyus Lisiyas haa Felikus, ngomnaajo tedduɗo, mi hoofni ma.
Gorko oo, Yahuudu'en naŋngi mo, ɓe ngiɗi mbarugo mo. Nde mi nani o Romaajo, mi yehi bee sooje'en, mi hisni mo.
Mi yiɗi anndugo ngam ɗume ɓe ngulli mo, ngam maajum mi yahri mo haa dawrooɓe maɓɓe.
Mi tawi o waɗaay koo ɗume ko he'i nastingo mo fursina
Nde mi nani Yahuudu'en mbaɗi anniya kaɓɓi dabare ngam mbarugo mo, mi neldi mo haa maaɗa. Mi yecci wulliiɓe mo ɓe ngullo mo haa ma.”
Nden sooje'en koo'i Pol bana hooreejo maɓɓe umri ɓe, ɓe njahri mo haa Antipatiris bee jemma.
Jaŋngo man sooje'en warnooɓe bee kosɗe kooti, ammaa wa'iiɓe pucci ndilli yeeso bee Pol.
Ɓe njahri mo Kaysariya, ɓe ndokki ngomnaajo bataakewol go, ɓe ngaddi Pol yeeso maako.
Ngomnaajo jaŋngi bataakewol. O ƴami Pol haa lesdi ndiye o iwi. Nde o tawi o Silikiyaajo,
o wi'i: “Mi nanan haala ma to wulliiɓe ma ngari.” Nden o umri sooje'en ɓe ayna Pol haa saare Hirudus.
Ɓaawo balɗe jowi, Ananiyas, mawɗo liman'en, yotti Kaysariya. O wardi bee ndotti'en woɗɓe e Tertullus, annduɗo dooka kiita Roma'en. Ɓe ngulli Pol yeeso ngomnaajo.
Nde ɓe ewni mo, Tertullus fuɗɗi haadango mo, wi'i:
“Yaa Felikus tedduɗo, ngam barka ma min njooɗi jam, lesdi amin fuu wooti ngam hikma maaɗa. Koo ndeye e koo toy fuu, min ɗon ngerdo ɗum, min ɗon ngette masin.
Bolle am ɗuuɗataa! Barka enɗam ma, mi tori ma, nanan min haala amin seɗɗa.
Min tawi gorko oo, o kalluɗo masin, o ɗon ummina tuurtol caka Yahuudu'en nder duniyaaru fuu, kaŋko woni ardiiɗo biɗu'aaku Nasaratu'en.
Nden o yiɗi soɓnugo
ammaa Lisiyas, hooreejo sooje'en wari, jaɓti mo haa juuɗe amin bee semmbe.
Nden o umri wulliiɓe mo ɓe ngara yeeso maaɗa.] To a ƴamti mo, a dili mo, a anndan ko min ngullori mo ɗum gooŋga.”
Yahuudu'en fuu mbi'i: “Ko Tertullus wolwi, ɗum gooŋga.”
Ngomnaajo sappi Pol, o wolwa. Nden Pol wi'i: “Mi anndi, duuɓi ɗuuɗɗi an woni kiitoowo lesdi ndi'i, ngam maajum mi seyi waɗugo hujja am yeeso maaɗa.
Ɓuraay balɗe sappo e ɗiɗi ko njahmi Urusaliima ngam mi sujidana Allah. To a linyi ɗum, a tawan ɗum non.
Walaa mo meeɗi tawugo yam mi ɗon waɗa ngaaba bee goɗɗo nder
Ɓe mbaawataa gooŋɗingo wullaandu ndu'u caka maɓɓe.
Ammaa ndaa ko mi waŋginante: Mi ɗon jaggano Allah kaakiraaɓe amin bee tokkaago laawol ngol ɓe ndaari bana biɗu'aaku. Ammaa min boo mi ɗon nuɗɗini ko winnda nder tawreeta Muusa e defte annabi'en fuu.
Min ɗon bee tammunde no Allah ummitinan adili'en e halluɓe fuu diga maayde bana kamɓe boo ɓe ɗon tammoro ɗum.
Ngam maajum mi ɗon haɓda jooɗaago ɓernde laaɓnde bilaa feloore yeeso Allah e yeeso yimɓe boo.
Ɓaawo yiilaago yaasi Urusaliima duuɓi seɗɗa, mi lori ton ngam mi yahrana ummaatoore am sadaka e mi waɗana Allah dokke.
Wakkati man ɓe tawi yam haa haykaliiru. Ɓe tawi yam ɓaawo mi timmini al'aada cenki, woodaa mooɓre haa am, woodaa hoolo.
Woodino Yahuudu'en iwɓe haa lesdi Asiya. Ɓe potino wargo yeeso ma ngam wullaago yam, to woodi ko ɓe mbi'ata dow am.
Malla sey yimɓe ɓe'e ngecce halleende ndeye mi waɗi yaake ɓe ndarni yam yeeso dawrooɓe,
sonaa haala ngoota mi wolwi bee sawtu yaake mi dari yeeso maɓɓe, mi wi'i: On kiiti yam hannde ngam mi nuɗɗini ummitineeki maayɓe.”
Nde Felikus anndi haala Laawol Jawmiraawo, o yerɓi haala man yeeso, o wi'i ɓe: “Mi ta'an kiita mon, to Lisiyas, ardiiɗo dow sooje'en ujineere wari.”
O umri ardiiɗo dow sooje'en teemerre, o ayna mo booɗɗum, ammaa o acca mo o feeco seɗɗa, o acca soobiraaɓe maako mballa mo.
Ɓaawo balɗe seɗɗa, Felikus wardi bee debbo mum Durusilla, Yahuuduujo. O ewni Pol, o nani ko o wolwi dow nuɗɗinki nder Yeesu Almasiihu.
Ammaa nde Pol wolwi dow adilaaku e naŋgtaare e kiita ngaranka, Felikus hultori, wi'i: “He'i jonta kam, dillu! To mi heɓi wakkati, mi ewnete fahin.”
O tammi Pol hokkan mo ceede, ngam maajum o tokki ewnaago mo tum, haa ɓe ngewta.
Ɓaawo duuɓi ɗiɗi, Porkiyus Festus laami haa pellel Felikus. Ammaa Felikus yoofaay Pol ngam o yiɗi seynugo Yahuudu'en.
Balɗe tati ɓaawo yottaago Festus haa lesdi man, o ummi Kaysariya, o yehi Urusaliima.
Ton mawɓe liman'en e mawɓe Yahuudu'en ngulliti Pol haa maako. Ɓe tori mo,
to o yerdake, o wadda Pol haa Urusaliima, ngam haa ɓe mbaaltano mo dow laawol, ɓe mbara mo.
Festus jaabi: “Ɓe ɗon njogi Pol haa Kaysariya, min boo mi loroto ton law.
Sey mawɓe mooɗon njahda bee am haa Kaysariya, ɓe ngullo mo haa ton, to woodi ko o waɗi.”
Festus faɓɓidi bee maɓɓe haa Urusaliima ton balɗe joweetati malla sappo, nden o lori Kaysariya. Jaŋngo man o jooɗi nokkuure kiita, o umri ɓe ngadda Pol.
Nde Pol yotti, Yahuudu'en warɓe diga Urusaliima taari mo, ɓe kaadi mo kaadooje ɗuuɗɗe caatuɗe, ammaa ɓe keɓaay gooŋɗingo ɗe.
Ammaa Pol wolwi hujja muuɗum, wi'i: “Mi waɗaay aybe koo haa tawreeta Yahuudu'en malla haa
Nde Festus yiɗi fottango Yahuudu'en, o ƴami Pol: “A jaɓan yahugo Urusaliima haa mi hiito ma ton dow kaadooje ɗe'e na?”
Pol wi'i: “Mi ɗon dari haa nokkuure kiita laamiiɗo Roma. Haani mi hiite haa ɗo. Mi waɗaay Yahuudu'en aybe, an boo a anndi ɗum booɗɗum.

To woodi halleende nde mbaɗmi e to mi waɗi koo ɗume ko he'i do'ugo yam kiita maayde, mi toraaki yoofeego. Ammaa to woodaa gooŋga haa kaadooje maɓɓe dow am, woodaa baawanɗo hokkugo yam haa maɓɓe. Mi yiɗi laamiiɗo Roma waɗanammi kiita.”
Festus dawri bee yimɓe faada maako, nden o wi'i: “Nde nii a yiɗi yahreego haa laamiiɗo Roma, a yahan haa maako man.”
Ɓaawo balɗe seɗɗa, laamiiɗo Agarippa e Bernike ngari haa Kaysariya ngam hoofnugo Festus.
Nde ɓe paɓɓi ton balɗe seɗɗa, Festus yeewti laamiiɗo haala Pol, o wi'i: “Woodi naŋngaaɗo haa ɗo diga zamanu Felikus.
Nde mi yehi Urusaliima, mawɓe liman'en e ndotti'en Yahuudu'en ngulli mo, ɓe tori yam mi hiito mo kiita mbareego.
Ammaa mi yecci ɓe, haa kiita Roma'en kam, sey gullaaɗo hujjotira bee wulliiɓe mo, haa o jaabano hoore maako dow wullaandu man.
Nde ɓe fuu ɓe ngari haa ɗo, mi reenaay fahin sam. Jaŋngo man mi jooɗi haa nokkuure kiita, mi umri ɓe ngadda gorko man.
Wulliiɓe mo ummi, mbolwi, ammaa ɓe ngaddaay wullaandu hallundu bana mi tammino.
Sey ngaaba tan ɓe mbaɗi bee maako dow diina maɓɓe e dow goɗɗo bi'eteeɗo Yeesu, maayɗo. Ammaa Pol wi'i o geeto.
Min boo, nde mi heɓtaay no mi linyira haala man, mbi'mi Pol: A jaɓan yahugo Urusaliima, ɓe kiito ma ton na?
Ammaa nde Pol yeli hiiteego haa laamiiɗo Roma, mi umri ɓe njogo mo hiddeko mi nelda mo haa laamiiɗo Roma.”
Agarippa wi'i Festus: “Min boo mi yiɗi nanugo haala gorko man.” Festus jaabi: “A nanan mo jaŋngo.”
Jaŋngo man yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗofti Agarippa e Bernike. Ɓe nasti nokkuure kiita bee ardiiɓe dow sooje'en ujineere e mawɓe wuro. Nden Festus umri ɓe ngadda Pol. Ɓe ngaddi mo.
Festus wi'i: “Laamiiɗo Agarippa e yimɓe tawaaɓe haa ɗo fuu: Ndaa gorko mo Yahuudu'en fuu ngulli yeeso am haa Urusaliima e haa ɗo boo. Ɓe fuu ɓe ɗon ngooka, ɓe ɗon mbi'a mi mbara mo.
Ammaa mi tawaay ko he'i do'ugo mo kiita maayde sam. Nde kaŋko bee hoore maako o yeli hiiteego haa laamiiɗo Roma, mi waɗi anniya neldugo mo haa ton.
Mi anndaa boo ko mi winndanta laamiiɗo Roma dow haala maako. Ngam maajum mi waddi mo haa mooɗon e ko ɓuri haa maaɗa, laamiiɗo Agarippa, ngam haa linya haala ka'a haa min boo mi heɓa ko mi winnda.
Ngam ɗum haandaay nelugo kaɓɓaaɗo haa kiita bilaa laɓɓingo daliila wullaandu ngonka dow maako.”
Agarippa wi'i Pol: “Mi duŋanake ma waŋgingo hujja ma jonta.” Pol ɓaŋgti juŋngo mum, wolwi hujja muuɗum, wi'i:
“Yaa laamiiɗo Agarippa! Mi seyake waŋgingo hujja am hannde yeeso ma, dow ko Yahuudu'en ngullori yam fuu.
Ko ɓuri ɗum boo, a anndi al'aadaaji Yahuudu'en e hujjaaji maɓɓe fuu. Ngam maajum mi tori ma, hoo'u munyal, nan haala am.
Yahuudu'en fuu anndi no joonde am wa'i diga mi ɓiŋngel. Ɓe anndi no mi jooɗori diga fuɗɗam caka yimɓe am e haa Urusaliima boo.
Mi tokki laawol Farisa'en, laawol diina ɓurŋgol saatugo. Ɓe anndi ɗum diga ɓooyma, ɓe ceedoto ɗum boo, to ɓe ngiɗi
Jonta mi ɗon yeeso kiita ngam mi ɗon tammoro iinawol ngol Allah waɗani kaakiraaɓe amin.
Le'i amin sappo e ɗiɗi fuu ɗon ndeena kebbitinki iinawol ngo'ol. Ngam maajum ɓe ɗon njaggano Allah bee tiinaare jemma e naaŋge. Ngam daliila tammunde nde'e Yahuudu'en ngulli yam, barkaama!
Onon Yahuudu'en, koni on nuɗɗintaa Allah ummitinan maayɓe?
Min boo, mi haɓdino wonnugo innde Yeesu mo Nasaratu bee dabareeji feere feere.
Mi waɗi ɗum haa Urusaliima. Mi maɓɓi senaaɓe ɗuuɗɓe haa fursina
Mi ukkani ɓe torraaji ɗuuɗɗi nder cuuɗi dewal maɓɓe, haa mi doola ɓe wolwugo kalluka dow Allah. Mi ɓernani ɓe masin haa mi taasni ɓe nder gure jananne, mi toonyi ɓe ton
“Ngam daliila man mi ɗonno yaha Damas bee duŋayeere e baawɗe mawɓe liman'en.
Caka nyalawma, nde mi ɗon dow laawol, mi yi'i annoora ɓurka annoora naaŋge, iwi haa asama. Ka yaynani yam, min e yahduɓe bee am fuu.
Min fuu min ndo'i haa lesdi. Nden mi nani sawtu wolwani yam bee Ibraniŋkeere: Sol, Sol, koni toonyotoɗa mi? A ɗon naawna hoore ma meere bee tuurtango yam.
Mi ƴami: An a moy, Jawmiraawo? Jawmiraawo wi'i: Min woni Yeesu mo toonyotoɗa.
Ammaa umma, dara. Mi waŋgani ma ngam mi suɓi ma haa a laato kuuwanoowo yam e ceedoowo ko mi yi'ni ma e ko mi tammi hollugo ma.
Mi hisnete juuɗe Isra'iila'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe, ɓe mi ɗon nela ma haa maɓɓe,

ngam a maɓɓita gite maɓɓe, haa ɓe ngaylita ɓaawo haa nyiɓre, ɓe nasta haa annoora, ɓe ngurto diga les baawɗe Sayɗaanu, ɓe njaha haa Allah, ɓe keɓa yaafuye hakkeeji maɓɓe e geɗal ndonŋgu maɓɓe caka senaaɓe bee nuɗɗingo yam.”
“Ngam maajum, yaa laamiiɗo Agarippa, mi accaay ɗowtanaago ko Allah holli yam diga asama.
Mi aarti waazaago haa Damas, ɓaawoɗon haa Urusaliima e haa lesdi Yahudiya fuu e haa yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe boo. Mi waazi ɓe ɓe tuuba, ɓe nuɗɗina Allah, ɓe kuuwa kuuɗe kollanɗe tuubu maɓɓe
Ngam daliila ka'a Yahuudu'en naŋngi yam nder
Ammaa Allah walli yam, haa hannde fuu mi ɗon, jonta mi ɗon dari, mi ɗon seedo mo yeeso mawɓe e leesɓe. Mi wi'aay koo ɗume, sey ko Muusa e annabi'en anndini:
Almasiihu yaran bone, o aartan ummitaago diga maayde, haa o waŋginana Yahuudu'en e yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe fuu annoora
Nde Pol ɗon wolwa hujja muuɗum bana nii, Festus hooli, wi'i mo: “Pol, a ginnaaɗo, anndal ma lugguŋgal itti ma hakkiilo!”
Pol jaabi: “Naa mi ginnaaɗo, barkaama! Ɗum gooŋga mbi'anmi, ɗum faamoto boo.
Mi wolwani laamiiɗo bee dartaare ngam o anndi kuuje ɗe'e fuu. Mi anndi fakat walaa ko o dulli nder maaje ngam ɗe laataaki nder cuuɗiiɗum.
A nuɗɗini annabi'en na, barkaama? Mi anndi a nuɗɗini.”
Agarippa wi'i Pol: “Lutti seɗɗa a laatinammi Masiihiŋkeejo!”
Pol jaabi: “Mi ɗon toro Allah naa ngam maaɗa tan ammaa ngam nananɓe yam hannde fuu, haa on laato bana am, ammaa bilaa callalluuji ɗi'i! Ɗum laato nder jaawɗum malla nder nyalɗe garanɗe.”
Nden laamiiɗo e ngomnaajo e Bernike e wonduɓe bee maɓɓe fuu ummi.
Nde ɓe ndilli, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Gorko oo waɗaay koo ɗume ko he'i mbarugo mo malla nastingo mo fursina
Nden Agarippa wi'i Festus: “En njoofanno gorko oo to o ƴamaayno hiiteego haa laamiiɗo Roma kam.”
Nde ɗum tabiti min njahan Italiya bee koommbowal
Min nasti koommbowal Adaramittenus, min mbakki gure gonɗe fomoonde mbeela e nder lesdi Asiya. Aristarkus, goɗɗo Tessaloniiki nder lesdi Makedoniya yahdi bee amin.
Jaŋngo man min njotti Sidon. Yuliyus enɗi Pol, duŋani mo yahugo haa soobiraaɓe maako haa o heɓa ballal maɓɓe.
Diga ɗon min ummi, min mbakki duunde Kiprus haa wakeere nde walaa henndu, ngam min ɗonno potta bee henndu haa wakeere feere.
Min ta'i mbeela kommbi Silikiya bee Pamfiliya, min njotti wuro Mira nder lesdi Lisiya.
Ton ardiiɗo dow sooje'en go tawi koommbowal iwŋgal Aleksandiriya, jahanŋgal Italiya, o nastini min nder maagal.
Baakin balɗe ɗuuɗɗe, koommbowal yaawaay sam, bee daker min njottori Kinidus. Nde henndu haɗi min yahugo yeeso, min mbakki Kereta haa wakeere nde walaa henndu, min caali nokkuure Salmoni.
Min mbakki fomoonde, bee daker min njottori nokkuure wi'eteende Jipporɗe-Booɗɗe, nde daayaaki wuro Laseya.
Min paɓɓi ton, wakkati man jahaaŋgal bee koommbowal saɗi masin ngam saa'i suumaye maa saalake. Ngam maajum Pol reentini yimɓe,
wi'i: “Hey yimɓe, jahaaŋgal meeɗen nga'al tammi saɗugo, kuuje e koommbowal mbonnoto. Naa kanjum tan, koo yoŋkiiji meeɗen maa kisataa.”
Ammaa ardiiɗo sooje'en yerdi ko laanyoowo e jawmu koommbowal mbi'i, o yerdaaki ko Pol wi'i.

Ɗum naawɗum jooɗaago haa jipporde man dabbunde. Ngam maajum ɓurna yimɓe man fuu ngiɗi dillugo. Ɓe ngiɗi yottaago Fenikis haa ɓe caalina dabbunde ton, to heɓoto. Fenikis woni jipporde koommbooje haa duunde Kereta tiitiinde hiirnaaŋge walaadu woyla
Nde henndu fombina fuɗɗi waɗugo, ɓe numi tokkitingo jahaaŋgal maɓɓe ngam henndu ndu'u saataay, ɓe ɗoofi tiggirɗum koommbowal, ɓe mbakki fomoonde Kereta.
Nii seɗɗa, henndu saatundu wi'eteendu Erakilon ummi.
Ndu haɗi koommbowal. Nde ngal waawaay tiitaago ndu, min acci henndu ɗon yerɓa ngal.
Nde min caali wakeere duungel bi'eteeŋgel Kawda nde walaa henndu ton, min kisni koommbowal pamaral bee daker.

Ɓe ɓaŋgti koommbowal pamaral go. Nden ɓe kaɓɓi koommbowal maɓɓe bee ɓoggi. Ɓe kuli ɗaggugo haa Sirtis. Ngam maajum ɓe njippini leggal maŋngal darnanŋgal koommbowal, ɓe njoofi koommbowal haa henndu yahra ngal
Nde henndu man ɗon tokki waɗugo bee semmbe, jaŋngo man ɓe puɗɗi wudingo doŋgle koommbowal.
Faɓɓijaŋngo man ɓe ngudini ɓoggi e ko wonno nder koommbowal bee juuɗe maɓɓe.
Balɗe ɗuuɗɗe min ngi'aay koode e naaŋge, ngam henndu tokki saatugo, haa min itti tammunde hisugo fuu.
Faɓɓi wonɓe nder koommbowal man nyaamaay koo ɗume. Nden Pol dari caka maɓɓe, wi'i: “Hey yimɓe, ndikka to on jaɓino ko mbi'mi on, on ummataano Kereta. En kisanno asar e halkere nde'e.
Ammaa jonta mi ɗon toro on, tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mon! Koo gooto caka amin maayataa, sey koommbowal tan wonnoto.
Ngam haŋki malaa'ikaajo Allah mo mi jagganto waŋgani yam,
wi'i: Pol, taa hultor! Sey a daro yeeso laamiiɗo Roma. Ndaa, Allah mo'ani ma. O hisnan wonduɓe bee ma nder koommbowal nga'al fuu.
Ngam maajum taa kultore, laate on suusɓe. Ngam mi hooli Allah, ko o wi'i yam fuu laatoto.
Ammaa henndu yahran en haa duunde feere, darnan en ton.”
Nder jemmaare sappo e nayaɓre, henndu yerɓi min nder mbeela Adiriya. Caka jemma laanyooɓe tammi min ɓadake lesdi njoordi.

Nden ɓe njippini ɓoggol bee njamndi kaɓɓaandi haa maagol, ngam foondugo luggeeŋga ndiyam. Ɓe tawi luggeeŋga man waɗi baakin meetir cappanɗe tati e joweeɗiɗi, yeeso seɗɗa nga waɗi baakin meetir noogas e joweetati.
Ɓe kuli taa henndu yahra koommbowal
Laanyooɓe ngiɗno wurtaago koommbowal, ɓe ndilla. Ɓe njippini koommbowal pamaral haa ndiyam, ɓe mbaɗi bana ɓe njippinan jamɗe tiggirɗe feere yeeso koommbowal.
Ammaa Pol wi'i sooje'en e ardiiɗo maɓɓe: “To laanyooɓe njooɗaaki haa koommbowal, on kisataa.”
Nden sooje'en ta'i ɓoggi naŋnguɗi koommbowal pamaral, ɓe njoofi ngal, ngal do'i.
Nde ɓadi weetugo, Pol tori ɓe ɓe nyaama, o wi'i: “Hannde waɗi balɗe sappo e nayi, on nyaamaay koo ɗume, on ɗon ndeena.
Ngam maajum mi tori on on nyaama to on ngiɗi hisugo. Ammaa koo gaasaawol hoore mon gootol majjataa.”
Nde o wi'i ɗum, o hoo'i tamseere, o yetti Allah yeeso maɓɓe fuu, o yewi nde, o fuɗɗi nyaamugo.
Nden hakkiilooji maɓɓe nde'iti, ɓe fuu ɓe nyaami.
Limgal yimɓe haa koommbowal waɗi teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo e cappanɗe njoweeɗiɗo e njoweego (276).
Nde ɓe kaari, ɓe cakkini alkamaari nder ndiyam ngam ustugo doŋngal.
Nde weeti, laanyooɓe anndaa toy ɓe ngoni, ammaa ɓe ngi'i pellel njaareendi haa fomoonde duunde. Ɓe ngiɗi yahrugo koommbowal haa ton, to heɓoto.

Ngam maajum ɓe ta'i ɓoggi jamɗe tiggirɗe, ɓe acci ɗe nder ndiyam. Nden ɓe piisti ɓoggi kaɓɓuɗi leɗɗe laanyirɗe. Nden ɓe ɓaŋgti leppol maŋngol gonŋgol yeeso koommbowal ngam haa henndu yahra ngal haa duunde.
Ammaa koommbowal tawi pellel haa ndiyam luggaay, dari ton. Yeeso maagal ɗaggi haa njaareendi, dimmbataako sam, ƴuuge ndiyam boo pusi ɓaawo maagal.
Sooje'en nufi mbarugo naŋngaaɓe, ngam taa ɓe ngino, ɓe ndogga.
Ammaa ardiiɗo sooje'en, nde yiɗi hisnugo Pol, haɗi ɓe waɗugo anniya maɓɓe. O umri waawɓe nginam ɓe aarta diwugo haa nder ndiyam, ɓe ngino, ɓe njotto lesdi njoorndi.
Luttuɓe boo naŋnga kaataakooje malla leɗɗe koommbowal gewɗe. Bana nii ɓe fuu ɓe njottori lesdi jam.
Nde min njotti duunde jam, min nani innde duunde man Malta.
Wonɓe haa ton kolli min mbooɗeeŋga pantuŋga. Ɓe njaɓɓi min, ɓe kuɓɓi yiite ngam iyeende fuɗɗi toɓugo e peewol boo waɗi.
Pol ɓofti leɗɗe, sakkini ɗe nder yiite. Daliila nguleeŋga yiite, mboodi ngondi nder leɗɗe man wurti, ŋati mo.
Nde yimɓe duunde man ngi'i mboodi ɗon ɓili haa juŋngo maako, ɓe mbi'mbi'tiri: “Walaa seko, gorko oo o mbaroowo yimɓe. Koo nde o hisi mbeela, ɗowanteeɗo meeɗen hiitoto mo, accataa mo o yeeɗa.”
Ammaa Pol fiɗɗi mboodi, ndi yani nder yiite. O maataay naawɗum koo seɗɗa.
Ɓe tammi juŋngo maako ɓuutan malla o maayan law. Ammaa nde haa neeɓi ɓe ngi'i walaa ko waɗi mo sam, ɓe cannji numo, ɓe mbi'i: “Asee, o ɗowanteeɗo!”
Pubiliyus, mawɗo duunde man jaɓɓi min, weerni min haa maako balɗe tati. Maral maako daayaaki bee nokkuure man.
Baaba Pubiliyus ɗon waali nyawɗo yontere e eemoral. Pol yehi haa maako, waɗi do'a, wallini juuɗe mum dow maako, yamɗitini mo.
Ɓaawoɗon nyawɓe woɗɓe boo ngari haa Pol, o yamɗitini ɓe.
Ɓe teddini min bee kuuje ɗuuɗɗe. Saa'i min ɗon ndilla boo, ɓe ndokki min ko min marno haaje.
Ɓaawo lebbi tati min ndilli bee koommbowal iwŋgal Aleksandiriya, bi'eteeŋgal Labbi-Ciwtuɗi. Ngal saalini dabbunde haa duunde man.
Min njotti wuro Sirakus, min paɓɓi ton balɗe tati.
Min ummi ton, min njotti wuro Regiyon. Jaŋngo man henndu fombina fuɗɗi waɗugo. Ɓaawo balɗe ɗiɗi, min njotti Potiyoli.
Min tawi nuɗɗinɓe ton. Ɓe tori min min paɓɓa haa maɓɓe asaweere. Bana nii min njottori Roma.
Nde deerɗiraaɓe wonɓe haa Roma nani habaru man, ɓe ngari haa Luumo-Appiyus e haa Beerle-Tati
Nde min njotti Roma, Pol heɓi duŋayeere jooɗaago feere maako, koo to soojeejo ɗon ayna mo.

Ɓaawo balɗe tati Pol ewni mawɓe Yahuudu'en wonɓe Roma. Nde ɓe kawti, o wi'i ɓe: “Deerɗiraaɓe am! Mi waɗaay koo ɗume dow ummaatoore meeɗen malla dow al'aadaaji kaakiraaɓe meeɗen, ammaa ɓe naŋngi yam, ɓe maɓɓi yam diga haa Urusaliima ɓe ndokki yam haa juuɗe Roma'en.
Nde ɓe linyi haala man, ɓe ngiɗno yoofugo yam, ngam ɓe tawi mi waɗaay koo ɗume ko he'i do'ugo yam kiita maayde.
Ammaa nde Yahuudu'en njaɓaay mi yoofe, doole mi toro mi hiite haa laamiiɗo Roma, koo nde mi walaa numo aybingo ummaatoore am boo
Ngam maajum mi ewni on haa mi yi'a on, mi wolwana on boo. Ngam daliila tammunde Isra'iila mi ɗon nder callalluwol ngo'ol.”
Ɓe mbi'i mo: “Minin kam, min keɓaay bataakewol habaru ma diga Yahudiya, walaa boo deerɗiraawo garɗo haa ɗo ngam hallingo innde ma.
Ammaa min ngiɗi nanugo ko numata dow biɗu'aaku ngu'u, ngam min anndi yimɓe koo toy ɗon ngedda ngu.”

Ɓe ndarni sarti nde ɓe kawtata fahin haa weerde maako. Nde nyannde man yotti, ɓe ngari ɓe ɗuuɗɓe. Pol nyalli faamtingo ɓe e waazaago ɓe haala laamu Allah. O haɓdi gooŋɗinango ɓe ko wi'a dow Yeesu diga tawreeta Muusa e defte annabi'en.
Woɗɓe njaɓi ko Pol wolwi, ammaa woɗɓe njaɓaay.
Nden ɓe ɗon ngaabotira, ɓe caaki. Ammaa diga ɓe caakaaki tawon, Pol ɓesdani ɓe wolde nde'e, wi'i: “Ndaa ko Ruuhu Ceniiɗo wolwani kaakiraaɓe mooɗon bee hunnduko annabi Esaaya:
Yah, wi' ummaatoore nde'e:
On nanan bee noppi mon, ammaa on paamataa sam.
On ndaaran bee gite mon, ammaa on ngi'ataa koo ɗume.
Ngam ɓerɗe yimɓe ɓe'e maatataa koo ɗume,
ɓe cukki noppi maɓɓe,
ɓe maɓɓi gite maɓɓe ngam taa ɓe ngi'a,
taa ɓe nana,
taa ɓe paama,
taa ɓe tuuba boo, ngam taa min mi yamɗitina ɓe
Pol wi'i fahin: “Kadi sey anndon, Allah neli habaru kisndam muuɗum haa yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe. Kamɓe ɓe nanan!” [
Ɓaawo bolle ɗe'e, Yahuudu'en ndilli, ɓe ɗon ngaabotira caka maɓɓe masin.]
Duuɓi ɗiɗi Pol jooɗi haa suudu ndu o hoosi haya, o ɗon jaɓɓo koo moy garɗo haa maako.
O waazi haala laamu Allah, o ekkitini yimɓe haala Yeesu Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo, o wolwi bee dartaare, walaa mo haɗi mo.
Min Pol, maccuɗo Yeesu Almasiihu, mi ɗon winndana on, onon jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe wonɓe haa Roma:
Allah ewni yam, waɗi yam nelaaɗo muuɗum, suɓi yam ngam haa mi waazina Linjiila maako.
Diga ɓooyma Allah iini Linjiila ka'a bee kunnduɗe annabi'en nder defte ceniiɗe.
Ka ɗon wolwa dow
Ammaa fodde Ruuhu Ceniiɗo, Allah tabitini mo o Ɓiɗɗo maako bee baawɗe saa'i o ummitini mo diga maayde, kaŋko woni Yeesu Almasiihu Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
Ngam barka maako min keɓi mo'ere, min laati nelaaɓe haa ummaatooje fuu nuɗɗina Linjiila, ɓe ɗowtano Allah, ɓe teddina innde maako.
Onon boo on ɗon nder yimɓe ɓe'e ngam Allah ewni on, wartiri on yimɓe Yeesu Almasiihu.
Mi ɗon hoofna yiɗaaɓe Allah wonɓe haa Roma fuu, ewnaaɓe ngam laataago senaaɓe.
Allah, Baabiraawo men e Yeesu Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo men ndokka on mo'ere e jam.
Aran, mi yetti Allah am bee innde Yeesu Almasiihu ngam mooɗon fuu, ngam koo toy nder duniyaaru yimɓe ɗon mbolwa haala nuɗɗinki mon.
Foroy mi ɗon toro ngam mooɗon: Allah woni ceedoowo yam! Kaŋko mi huuwanta bee ɓernde woore bee waazingo Linjiila
Koo ndey mi toroto mo fuu, mi ɗon toro mo haa mi heɓa laawol yahugo haa mooɗon to o muuyi.
Mi yenwi on masin, mi yiɗi yi'ugo on ngam mi sennda bee mooɗon dokkal ngal Ruuhu Allah hokki yam ngam semmbiɗingo on.
Mi yiɗi ma taweego caka mooɗon ngam haa cemmbiɗindiren nder nuɗɗinki.

Deerɗiraaɓe am, annde mi waɗi anniya nde ɗuuɗɗum yahugo haa mooɗon ammaa haa jonta mi heɓaay yahugo tawon. Mi ɗon yelo nii kuugal am waɗa nafuuda caka mooɗon boo, bana ko laati haa ummaatooje goɗɗe nder duniyaaru
Doole mi suklano yimɓe koo ɓeye: Ferɓe e ɓen peraay, jaŋnguɓe e ɓe njaŋngaay.
Ngam maajum mi yeli waazingo on Linjiila, onon wonɓe haa Roma boo.
Mi semtaay waazingo Linjiila ngam ɗum baawɗe Allah: Ka waawi hisnugo nuɗɗinɓe ka fuu, aran Yahuudu'en, nden yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe boo
Bee Linjiila ka'a, Allah ɗon waŋginana yimɓe fuu no ɓe laatorto adili'en yeeso muuɗum. Ɗum laatoto bee nuɗɗinki tan, diga fuɗɗam haa timmoode. Bana ko winnda: “Adiliijo yeeɗiran bee nuɗɗinki
Ngam tikkere Allah waŋgi diga asama dow geddal yimɓe e sooynde adilaaku maɓɓe, bee maare ɓe kaɗi yimɓe anndugo gooŋga.
Ko goɗɗo waawi anndugo dow Allah, ɗum waŋgani ɓe, ngam Allah bee hoore mum waŋginani ɓe ɗum.

Ngam koo nde neɗɗo waawataa yi'ugo Allah, o anndi bee laaɓɗum kanyum woni Allah fakat, o anndi boo baawɗe maako timmataa, ngam ɗum waŋgi nder tagdi fuu, diga Allah tagi duniyaaru. Ngam maajum ɓe ngalaa hujja sam.
Ngam ɓe anndi Allah, ammaa ɓe teddinaay mo bana no haandani mo, ɓe ngettaay mo boo. Ngam maajum numooji maɓɓe ndaayi gooŋga, faamu wurti hakkiilooji maɓɓe, nyiɓre nasti
Ɓe tammi ɓe ngoodi hikma, ammaa ɓe faataaɓe.
Ɓe acci Allah tedduɗo, duumiiɗo, ɓe ɗakkotiri bee suuraaji neɗɗo maayanɗo e colli e dabbaaji e ladooji
Ngam maajum Allah yoofi ɓe ɓe tokko suunooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe, ɓe coɓnindira ɓalli maɓɓe bee kuuɗe cemtiniiɗe.
Ɓe ngayliti gooŋga Allah bee fewre, ɓe cujidani e ɓe ndewi tagle, ɓe acci tagɗo mo haandi yetteego haa foroy. Aamiina!
Ngam maajum Allah yoofi ɓe haa suunooji cemtiniiɗi. Rewɓe maɓɓe cannji baaldal fodde ɗabiya, mbaɗi ko luuti ɗabiya.
Bana non worɓe boo acci waaldugo bee rewɓe, ɗon mbaalda bee worɓe, ɗon kuuwindira cemtiniiɗum. Bana nii ɓe keɓani ko'e maɓɓe ngeenaari daliila majjere maɓɓe.
Nde ɓe cali anndititgo Allah, Allah yoofi ɓe ɓe tokko hakkiilooji maɓɓe paataaɗi, ɓe mbaɗa ko fottaay.
Ɓe ɗon keewi sooynde adilaaku e halleende e suuno e nganyaandi e kaajal. Ɓe mbarooɓe ko'e, jokkirooɓe, waɗooɓe rikici e tufle.
Ɓe ɗon kallina woɗɓe, ɓe ɗon nganya Allah, ɓe toonyooɓe, mawnitittooɓe, jurotooɓe meere. Tum ɓe ɗon tefa laabi kesi ngam haa ɓe mbaɗa kuuɗe kalluɗe. Ɓe ɗowtantaako saaro'en maɓɓe.
Ɓe faataaɓe, ɓe kebbintaa kunayeeje maɓɓe, ɓe ngalaa yiide koo enɗam.
Ɓe anndi fakat tawreeta Allah hiiti waɗanɓe irin kuuɗe ɗe'e kiita mbareego. Bee man fuu ɓe ɗon tokko waɗgo ɗe. Ko tulliti boo, ɓe ɗon ngerdo waɗanɓe ɗe fuu.
Ngam maajum, an neɗɗo, koo a moye a walaa geldol nde a ɗon hiito goɗɗo. Ngam to a hiitake woɗɓe, ɗum hoore maaɗa a hiiti, ngam a ɗon waɗa ko ɓe mbaɗata
En anndi Allah ɗon hiito waɗanɓe kuuɗe man kiita ngooŋɗuka.
Kadi, an kiitanɗo woɗɓe, ammaa a ɗon waɗa ko a hiitoto haa maɓɓe, a tammi a hisan kiita Allah na?
Malla a ɗon yawo jeynitaaje mbooɗeeŋga maako ɗuuɗŋga e munyal maako? A anndaa no mbooɗeeŋga Allah ɗon ɗowe haa tuubu na?

Ammaa hoore ma saati, ɓernde ma sali boo tuubugo. Ngam maajum, a ɗon tokko fooɗango hoore ma tikkere Allah ɓurnde saatugo nyalaade darŋgal, nyalaade man Allah waŋginan tikkere mum e kiita mum ngooŋɗuka.
O warjoto koo moy deydey kuuɗe mum
Tiiɗɓe waɗgo ko fotti, ɗaɓɓitanɓe tedduŋgal e daraja e duumaare, o hokkan ɓe ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Ammaa tuurtuɓe dow maako, salotooɓe gooŋga, tokkotooɓe halleende, o rufan tikkere maako saatunde fuu dow maɓɓe.
Ɓillaare e bone ukkanto waɗanɓe halleende, aran Yahuudu'en, nden yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe boo.
Ammaa koo moy waɗi ko fotti, Allah hokkan mo tedduŋgal e daraja e jam, aran Yahuudu'en, nden yimɓe ummaatooje goɗɗe.
Ngam Allah senndindirtaa yimɓe
To goɗɗo mo anndaa tawreeta waɗi hakke, o halkan bilaa tawreeta. Ammaa to goɗɗo mo anndi tawreeta waɗi hakke, nden kam o kiiteteeɗo fodde tawreeta.
Goɗɗo laatataako adiliijo yeeso Allah bee nanugo tawreeta tan, sey bee ɗowtanaago ka.
Yimɓe ummaatooje ngalaa tawreeta. Ammaa to ɓe mbaɗi bee muuyo maɓɓe ko tawreeta umrata, koo nde ɓe keɓaay ka, ɓe mbaɗani ko'e maɓɓe tawreeta.
Umrooje tawreeta mbinndaama nder ɓerɗe maɓɓe, kuuɗe maɓɓe ɗon mbaŋgina ɗum. Numooji ɓerɗe maɓɓe boo ɗon mbaŋgina ɗum, ngam saa'i feere numooji maɓɓe ngulloto ɓe, saa'i feere boo ɗi ceettoto ɓe.
Nyalaade nde Allah hiitoto numooji yimɓe cuuɗiiɗi bee Yeesu Almasiihu fodde Linjiila ka ngaazanmi, koo ɗume fuu waŋgan.
Kadi noy an Yahuuduujo jonta? A ɗon seyoro ewneego Yahuuduujo, a ɗon dari dow tawreeta, a ɗon juroro Allah ma.
A anndi muuyo Allah, ngam tawreeta anndini ma suɓugo ko fotti.
A numi fakat a waawan ɗowugo wumɓe e yaynango wonɓe nder nyiɓre
e eltugo faataaɓe e jaŋngingo derke'en e a heɓi anndal e gooŋga fuu bee tawreeta boo.
A ɗon jaŋngina woɗɓe, ammaa a jaŋnginaay hoore ma. A ɗon wi'a: “Taa wujju”, ammaa an bee hoore ma a ɗon wujja.
A ɗon wi'a: “Taa waɗ njeenu”, ammaa an bee hoore ma a ɗon njeena. A ɗon wanya labbi, ammaa a ɗon wujja kuuje nder cuuɗi maaji.
A ɗon juro ngam Allah hokki ma tawreeta, ammaa a ɗon yawo mo bee luutugo ka.
Bana ko winnda: “Ngam daliila mooɗon, onon Yahuudu'en, ummaatooje goɗɗe ɗon kallina innde Allah
To a ɗowtanake tawreeta, nden juulnol
Kadi to goɗɗo mo juulnaaki ɗowtanake umrooje tawreeta, Allah laarataa mo bana o juulniiɗo na?
Ngam maajum goɗɗo mo juulnaaki, ammaa ɗowtani tawreeta, hiitete an juulniiɗo mo ɗowtanaaki tawreeta ka Allah hokki ma.
Naa ko gite ngi'ata wartirta goɗɗo Yahuuduujo gooŋgaajo. Juulnol gooŋgawol boo naa ɗum juulnol fodde ɓanndu malla ko gite ngi'ata.

Ammaa juulnol ngol yi'ataake, ngol Allah waɗi nder ɓernde goɗɗo kaŋgol laatinta mo Yahuuduujo. Juulnol ngo'ol waɗoto bee Ruuhu Allah, naa bee umroore tawreeta. Yahuuduujo gooŋgaajo heɓataa maŋgtoore mum diga yimɓe, ammaa diga Allah tan
To non kam, woodi ko Yahuudu'en ɓurdata ummaatooje goɗɗe na? Juulnol maɓɓe woodi saman na?
Fakat, ɗum woodi saman, naa seɗɗa. Aran, Allah halfini ɓe bolle mum.
To woɗɓe maɓɓe laataaki gooŋga'en, ɗum wilan gooŋgaaku Allah na?
Wilataa sam! Allah o gooŋgaajo foroy ammaa yimɓe fuu ɓe fewooɓe. Bana ko winnda:
“Sey koo moy fuu yi'a a gooŋgaajo nder bolle maaɗa fuu
e a laato jaaliiɗo to goɗɗo wullake ma
To nii sooynde adilaaku meeɗen ɗon waŋgina adilaaku Allah bee laaɓɗum, ko mbi'eten? Kadi Allah wonaay adiliijo to o ukkani en tikkere maako na? Mi ɗon ƴama bana yimɓe ƴamrata.
Woodaa sam! Ngam to Allah wonaay adiliijo, noy o hiitorto duniyaaru?
Ammaa to sooynde adilaaku am ɗuɗɗini tedduŋgal Allah, waŋgini gooŋga maako laaɓɗum, ngam ɗume o hiitoto yam ngam mi hakkeejo?
Noy to en mbi'i: “Kuuwen halleende ngam haa mbooɗeeŋga waŋga.” Woɗɓe ɗon kallinammi, ɗon mbi'a min wi'i ɗum. Kayto, ɓe keɓan kiita deydey aybe maɓɓe.
Nden kam enen Yahuudu'en en ɓuri yimɓe woɗɓe kadi na? Walaa sam! Ngam mi aarti mi wi'i hakke ɗon laamano Yahuudu'en e Yunaniŋke'en kal-kal.
Bana ko winnda nder Deftere Seniinde:
“Walaa kuuwanɗo ko fotti, walaa koo gooto.
Walaa marɗo hakkiilo, ɓaditanɗo Allah.
Ɓe fuu ɓe celi laawol gooŋga, ɓe mbonnake.
Walaa baɗanɗo ko wooɗi, walaa koo gooto
Kondondi maɓɓe nanndi bee genaale maɓɓitiiɗe,
ɗemɗe maɓɓe ɗon mbolwa bolle rikiciije,
bolle mbarooje bana tooke poosokje ɗon ngurto kunnduɗe maɓɓe
Kunnduɗe maɓɓe keewi naalooje e bolle kaaɗɗe
Kosɗe maɓɓe ɗon njaawa yahugo mbara yimɓe,
bonnonda e halkere waɗan koo toy ɓe njehi fuu.
Ɓe anndaa laawol jam
ɓe ngalaa kulol Allah sam
En anndi ko tawreeta wi'ata fuu, ɗon wolwana hokkaaɓe tawreeta, ngam taa goɗɗo heɓa geldol, ngam haa yimɓe duniyaaru fuu anndita ɓe aybuɓe yeeso Allah.
Walaa mo laatoto adiliijo yeeso Allah bee ɗowtanaago tawreeta. Neɗɗo woodi hakke, kanjum tan tawreeta anndinta en
Ammaa ko tawreeta e annabi'en ceedani en diga ɓooyma, ɗum waɗi jonta: Allah bee hoore mum waŋgini no yimɓe laatorto adili'en yeeso maako bilaa tawreeta.
Allah adilinan koo moy nuɗɗini Yeesu Almasiihu. O ɗon adilina nuɗɗinɓe fuu ngam haa maako yimɓe fuu potan kal
Ɓe fuu ɓe mbaɗi aybe, ɓe cooyi tedduŋgal Allah.
Ammaa Allah bee mo'ere muuɗum, waɗani ɓe caahu bee adilingo ɓe. O sootti ɓe bee Yeesu Almasiihu.

Allah darni Yeesu Almasiihu haa nuɗɗinɓe mo fuu keɓa yaafuye bee ƴiiƴam maako. O hiitaaki hakkeeji maɓɓe ɓooymaaji, o munyani ɓe, o yaafi ɓe. Bana nii o waŋginiri adilaaku maako jonta waato o adiliijo e o adilinanɗo nuɗɗinanɓe Yeesu fuu.
Kadi, daliila mawnitaago ɗon luttani en na? Walaa sam! Ngam ɗume? Ngam Allah limataa kuuɗe, sey nuɗɗinki.
En anndi fakat, Allah ɗon adilina goɗɗo ngam daliila nuɗɗinki, naa ngam daliila ɗowtaare heedi tawreeta.
Kadi Allah o Allah Yahuudu'en tan na? Naa o Allah ummaatooje goɗɗe boo na? Nonnon, o Allah ummaatooje fuu.
Allah o gooto, o ɗon adilina juulnotooɓe e ɓe njuulnataako fuu, to ɓe nuɗɗini Yeesu Almasiihu
To mi wi'i bana nii, mi ɗon wila tawreeta na? Naa non sam! Mi ɗon tabitina tawreeta.
Ko mbi'eten dow Ibrahiima kaaka meeɗen? Ɗume o heɓi?
To Ibrahiima heɓruno adilaaku Allah bee kuuɗe muuɗum, o mawnitittono. Ammaa naa haa yeeso Allah.
Fakat Deftere wi'i: “Ibrahiima nuɗɗini Allah, Allah boo limani mo ɗum adilaaku
Kuuwoowo fuu foti heɓugo ngeenaari mum, ngeenaari boo wonaay caahu sam ammaa ɗum dooleejum.
To goɗɗo daraaki dow kuuɗe mum, ammaa nuɗɗini Allah jaɓɗo aybuɗo, nden kam Allah limanan mo nuɗɗinki man adilaaku, adilinan mo.
Non boo, Daawuda wolwi haala seyo goɗɗo mo Allah adilini ɗum bilaa kuuɗe. O wi'i:
“Seyo laatani yimɓe,
to Allah yaafake hakke maɓɓe,
suddi boofi maɓɓe fuu.
Seyo laatani goɗɗo, to Jawmiraawo limanaay mo aybeeji
Seyo maajum laatanto juulnotooɓe tan na? Aa'a, ngo laatanto ɓe njuulnataako boo. Min ɗon mbi'a: “Ibrahiima nuɗɗini Allah, Allah boo laari mo o adiliijo.”
Noy ɗum laatori? Bee juulnol na malla bilaa juulnol? Fakat, saa'i man o siwaa juulnaago.

Ibrahiima heɓi juulnol bana alaama tabitinka adilaaku muuɗum. Allah adilini mo ngam daliila nuɗɗinki maako, diga o siwaa juulnaago. Bana nii Ibrahiima laatori baaba nuɗɗinɓe fuu, Allah adilini ɓe koo ɓe njuulnaaki boo
O laati baaba juulniiɓe fuu. Ammaa naa juulniiɓe fuu ngoni ɓiɓɓe Ibrahiima, sey tokkiiɓe nuɗɗinki maako diga o juulnaakino.
Allah wi'i Ibrahiima e danygol muuɗum, o marnan ɓe duniyaaru fuu. Ibrahiima heɓi iinawol ngo'ol naa ngam o ɗowtani tawreeta ammaa ngam Allah adilini mo daliila nuɗɗinki maako
To goɗɗo heɓi maral nga'al bee ɗowtanaago tawreeta, nden kam nuɗɗinki nafataa, iinawol Allah boo laatoto meere
Walaa ko tawreeta waddanta yimɓe, sey tikkere Allah tan. Ngam to umroore walaa, luutugo nde boo woodaa.

Ngam maajum Allah darni iinawol ngo'ol dow nuɗɗinki, haa ɗum laato dokkal mo'ere maako. Iinawol ngo'ol ɗon ngam asŋgol Ibrahiima fuu, naa ngam marɓe tawreeta tan, ammaa ngam tokkiiɓe nuɗɗinki Ibrahiima boo. Ibrahiima o baaba meeɗen en fuu
Bana ko winnda, Allah wi'i mo: “Mi darni ma baaba ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe.” Ibrahiima nuɗɗini Allah geeɗitinoowo maayɓe, umranɗo ko walaa ɗum wona
Ibrahiima nuɗɗini Allah bee tammaago huunde nde goɗɗo tammataako. Bana nii o laatori baaba ummaatooje ɗuuɗɗe fodde ko winnda: Non danygol ma laatoto
Saa'i maajum duuɓi Ibrahiima ndillani teemerre. O anndi o waawataa danyugo ɓikkoy. Debbo maako Saraatu boo naywi masin, waawataa reedugo
Bee non fuu, nuɗɗinki maako tampaay, o sekaay iinawol Allah, ammaa o teddini mo bee nuɗɗinki cemmbiɗki.
O nuɗɗini fakat Allah woodi baawɗe waɗugo ko o iini.
Ngam maajum “Allah limani mo ɗum adilaaku.”
Wolde nde'e winndaaka ngam Ibrahiima tan,
ammaa ngam meeɗen boo. To en nuɗɗini Allah ummitini Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu diga maayde, kaŋko o limanan en ɗum adilaaku.
Allah acci o maaya ngam daliila aybeeji men. O ummitini mo boo ngam haa o adilina en yeeso maako
Allah adilini en ngam en nuɗɗini mo. Jonta salaaman ɗon hakkunde maako bee meeɗen, barka Jawmiraawo men Yeesu Almasiihu.
En keɓi mo'ere Allah bee laawol nuɗɗinki, en ɗon tabiti nder mo'ere man. En keewi seyo boo, ngam fakat en ɗon bee tammunde heɓugo tedduŋgal Allah.
En ɗon ceyoro koo ɓillaaje men boo, ngam en anndi ɓillaare waddan munyal,
munyal semmbiɗinan dartaare, dartaare boo tabitinan tammunde.
Bee tammunde man en mbustataake sam, ngam Allah hokki en Ruuhu mum, mo hebbini ɓerɗe meeɗen bee yiide mum.
Saa'i en tampuɓeno waɗgo ko fotti, Almasiihu maayi ngam hakke'en nder saa'iire nde Allah darni.
Caɗɗum goɗɗo jaɓa maayugo mbattudi
Ammaa Almasiihu maayi mbattudi meeɗen yaake en hakke'en no. Bana nii Allah waŋginiri no o yiɗiri en.
Nde nii en adilinaama bee ƴiiƴam maako, o hisnan en diga tikkere Allah boo.
Saa'i en konne'en Allah no, en keɓi sulhotiral hakkunde meeɗen bee maako barka maayde Ɓiɗɗo maako. Sakkomaa jonta, ɓaawo sulhotiral nga'al, fakat en keɓan kisndam barka ngeendam Ɓiɗɗo oo.
Naa ɗu'um tan, ammaa en ɗon ceyoro kawtal bee Allah ngam daliila Yeesu Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo men mo sulhotiri en bee Allah.
Hakke nasti duniyaaru daliila neɗɗo gooto. Hakke man waddi maayde. Ngam maajum yimɓe fuu ɗon maaya, ngam ɓe mbaɗi hakke
Hakke ɗonno nder duniyaaru diga tawreeta walaano. Ammaa Allah limaayno hakkeeji ɗi yimɓe mbaɗi, ngam walaano umroore tawon.
Bee non fuu, diga Aadamu haa wargo Muusa, maayde laami dow yimɓe fuu, koo ɓe mbaɗaay hakke bana Aadamu mo luuti umroore Allah.
Aadamu wonno misaalu goɗɗo garanɗo.

Ammaa dokkal ngal Allah hokkata en bee goɗɗo oo nanndaay bee aybewol Aadamu sam. Fakat, yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe maayi ngam gooto waɗi aybe. Ammaa mo'ere Allah ɓuri mawnugo piw, non boo dokkal caahu ngal o hokkata yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe ngam daliila mo'ere neɗɗo gooto, waato Yeesu Almasiihu.
Dokkal Allah nanndaay bee aybe goɗɗo go. Kiita Allah dow gooto oo aybini yimɓe fuu. Ammaa mo'ere Allah dow aybeeji ɗuuɗɗi adilini yimɓe fuu.
Ngam daliila gooto, maayde laami dow yimɓe ngam gooto waɗi aybe. Nden kam, fakat heɓɓe mo'ere Allah ɗuuɗnde e adilaaku muuɗum caahu laamoto bee ngeendam barka gooto boo, waato Yeesu Almasiihu.
Ngam maajum, bana no aybe goɗɗo gooto, waato Aadamu jaanyani yimɓe fuu kiita, kuugal goɗɗo gooto, waato Yeesu Almasiihu waddani yimɓe fuu adilaaku e ngeendam.
Sooynde ɗowtaare goɗɗo gooto nastini yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe haa hakke. Non boo Allah adilini ɗuuɗɓe daliila ɗowtaare goɗɗo gooto.
Tawreeta waŋgi haa hakke ɓesda, ammaa haa hakke ɓesdi, mo'ere Allah boo ɓurti ɓesdaago.
Bana no hakke waŋginiri baawɗe mum bee maayde, non boo baawɗe mo'ere Allah waŋgiri bee Yeesu Almasiihu Jawmiraawo meeɗen. Barka maako en laati adili'en yeeso Allah e en keɓi ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Ko mbi'eten jonta? En tokko jooɗaago nder hakke ngam haa mo'ere Allah ɓesdo na?
Kayya, naa non sam! Heedi hakke kam, en maayɓe. Kadi noy tokkortooɗen yeeɗugo nder hakke?
Nde en njaɓi baptisma, en kawti bee Yeesu Almasiihu. On anndi booɗɗum ɗum kawtal bee maayde maako.
Nder baptisma en uwdaama bee maako. Nden bana kaŋko o ummiti diga maayde bee baawɗe Allah tedduɗe, bana non enen boo ngeeɗirten ngeendam kesam
Ngam to en maaydi bee maako, nden kam en ummititto boo bana maako.
En anndi fakat, ko laatiiɗen ɓooyma ɗum maaydi bee Almasiihu dow leggal gaafaaŋgal ngam haa ɓanndu hakkeeru natta, ngam taa en laato maccuɓe hakke fahin.
Ngam to goɗɗo maayi, hakke walaa baawɗe dow maako fahin.
To en maaydi bee Almasiihu, nden kam en nuɗɗini en ngeeɗan bee maako boo.
Fakat en anndi Almasiihu ummiti diga maayde, meetataa maayugo, maayde walaa baawɗe dow maako.
Nde woore o maayi heedi hakke, jonta nde o geeto, o ɗon yeeɗa ngam Allah.
Bana non onon boo ndaare ko'e mon on maayɓe heedi hakke, ammaa nder kawtal bee Almasiihu on yeeɗɓe ngam Allah.
Ngam maajum taa acce hakke laamo nder ɓalli mon maayanɗi, taa tokke suunooji maaji boo.
Taa lii'ane hakke terɗe mon ngam haa ɗe laato kuuwtinirɗe halleende. Ammaa lii'ane Allah ko'e mooɗon ngam haa o huuwtinira terɗe mon waɗugo kuuɗe adilaaku ngam on ngurtake maayde, on nasti ngeendam.
Hakke laamataa dow mooɗon, ngam jonta les mo'ere ngonɗon, naa les tawreeta.
Nde mo'ere ɗon laamano en, naa tawreeta kam, en tokko waɗugo hakke na? Naa non sam!
On anndaa na? Nde on lii'ani goɗɗo ko'e mon haa on ɗowtano mo, on laati maccuɓe maako. To on ɗon ɗowtano hakke, nden kam on maayan, ammaa to on ɗon ɗowtano Allah, o adilinan on.
Yettoore laatano Allah! Naane on maccuɓe hakke, ammaa jonta on ɗowtani gooŋga ekkitinol ngol on nani bee ɓernde woore.
On rimɗinaaɓe diga njeyaaŋgu hakke, on laati maccuɓe adilaaku.

Mi ɗon wolwana on bana yimɓe mboowi wolwugo ngam on tampuɓe. Naane on kuuwtiniri terɗe mon bana maccuɓe coɓki e halleende, on mbaɗi kalluɗum. Bana non jonta boo naftore terɗe mon bana maccuɓe adilaaku haa on ngeeɗa nder senaare.
Yaake on maccuɓe hakke no, on rimɓe no heedi adilaaku.
Ɗume keɓnooɗon bee kuuɗe mon? Fakat on ɗon cemtira ɗe jonta, ngam timmoode kuuɗe man wonno maayde.
Ammaa jonta on rimɗinaaɓe diga hakke, on laati maccuɓe Allah. On ɗon mbaŋgina ngeendam senaare e timmoode maajam ɗum ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Ngam ngeenaari hakke, ɗum maayde. Ammaa dokkal Allah kam, ɗum ngeendam nduumiiɗam nder kawtal bee Yeesu Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, fakat on anndi ko mi yiɗi anndingo on ngam on annduɓe tawreeta. Tawreeta mari baawɗe dow goɗɗo yaake o geeto.
Bana debbo te'aaɗo: Umroore teegal haɓɓi mo haa goriiko yaake o geeto. Ammaa to gorko maayi, debbo rimɗi e umroore nde'e.
Ngam maajum, to o wondi bee gorko feere saa'i goriiko geeto, nden kam o jeenoowo. Ammaa to goriiko maayi, o rimɗi diga umroore man, o waɗaay njeenu to o te'i bee gorko feere.

Bana non onon boo, deerɗiraaɓe am: On maaydi bee Almasiihu. Ngam maajum on maayɓe heedi tawreeta. Jonta goɗɗo feere ummitiiɗo diga maayde waato Yeesu Almasiihu mari on ngam haa en mbaawa nafugo Allah bee kuuɗe meeɗen.
Yaake en ɗonno tokko numooji ko'e men, suunooji njaali ɓalli men, nastini en nder hakke. Tawreeta umminno suunooji man, en ngaɗi ko waddani en maayde.

Ammaa jonta, en ndimɗinaama e tawreeta, en maayɓe heedi umroore nde haɓɓi no en. Ngam maajum en kuuwantaa Allah dow laawol ɓooymawol fodde tawreeta. En ɗon kuuwana mo dow laawol kesol fodde Ruuhu maako.
Ko mbi'eten jonta? Tawreeta ɗum hakke na? Naa non sam! Ammaa to tawreeta walaano, mi waawataano anndugo baawɗe hakke. To tawreeta wi'aayno: “Taa suuna”, mi anndaano ɗume woni suuno
Ammaa umroore man hokki hakke laawol ummingo suunooji koo ɗiye fuu nder am. To walaano umroore, hakke waatanno.
Naane mi geetono, mi anndaano tawreeta. Nden umroore wari, hakke boo fuɗɗi yeeɗugo.
Ammaa min mi maayi. Umroore nde hollanno yam laawol ngeendam, waddani yam maayde,
ngam hakke naftori umroore man haa nde esti yam, nde mbari yam
Caahiiɗum, tawreeta iwi diga Allah, umrooje maaka boo ɗe ceniiɗe, ɗe pottuɗe, ɗe booɗɗe.

To non kam, huunde woonde waddani yam maayde na? Naa non sam! Ammaa ɗum hakke waddani yam maayde ngam nde huuwtiniri huunde woonde nde'e haa mbarammi, ngam haa hakke waŋga ɗum hakke fakat. Ngam daliila umroore, hakke heɓi waŋgingo halleende mum fuu.
Walaa seko, tawreeta iwi haa Ruuhu Allah. Ammaa min mi neɗɗo tampuɗo, mi maccuɗo hakke.
Mi faamataa ko kuuwanmi, ngam mi huuwataa ko ngiɗmi, ammaa ko mi yiɗaa, kanjum kuuwanmi
Nde mi ɗon waɗa ko mi yiɗaa, nden kam mi gooŋɗini tawreeta ka mbooɗka.
Ngam naa ɗum min waɗata ɗum, ammaa ɗum hakkewol gonŋgol nder am.
Mi anndi, booɗɗum walaa nder ɓanndu am ngam mi neɗɗo tampuɗo, mi yiɗi waɗgo ko wooɗi, ammaa mi waawataa.
Mi waɗataa booɗɗum ko ngiɗmi, sey kalluɗum ko mi yiɗaa.
To nii mi ɗon waɗa ko mi yiɗaa, naa ɗum min waɗata ɗum, ammaa ɗum hakkewol gonŋgol nder am.
Ndaa laawol ngol kuuɗe am tokkoto: To mi yiɗi waɗgo ko wooɗi, halleende tan ɗon laato.
Nder ɓernde am, mi ɗon seyoro tawreeta Allah.
Ammaa baawɗe halleende ɗon kaɓa bee baawɗe am, min mo yerdoto tawreeta Allah nder hakkiilo am. Ɗum wartiri yam naŋngaaɗo baawɗe hakkewol gonŋgol nder terɗe am.
Kayto mi jurumɗo! Moy rimɗintammi diga ɓillaare ɓanndu maaynanndu ndu'u?
Ammaa yettoore laatano Allah ngam barka Yeesu Almasiihu, Jawmiraawo men. Nder hakkiilo am, min kam mi maccuɗo tawreeta Allah, asee nder ɓanndu am mi maccuɗo hakke.
Ngam maajum walaa kiita dow nuɗɗinɓe Yeesu Almasiihu jonta.
Ngam baawɗe Ruuhu ndokki yam ngeendam nder kawtal bee Yeesu Almasiihu. Ruuhu man rimɗini yam diga baawɗe hakke e maayde.
Allah bee hoore mum huuwi ko tawreeta waawaay huuwugo ngam en tampuɓe. O neli
ngam haa en mbaawa huuwugo kuuɗe adiliije fodde tawreeta, ngam naa suunooji neɗɗo tokkotooɗen, ammaa Ruuhu Allah.
To goɗɗo ɗon tokko suunooji mum, suunooji man laamanto hakkiilo muuɗum. Ammaa to Ruuhu Allah ɗon jooɗi nder maako, nden kam Ruuhu man laamanto hakkiilo maako.
Tokkaago suunooji mum yahran haa maayde, ammaa tokkaago Ruuhu Allah yahran haa ngeendam e jam.
Tokkiiɗo suunooji mum o konneejo Allah, ngam hakkiilo maako ɗowtantaako umroore Allah ngam ngo waawataa.
Geeɗanɗo nder suunooji mum waawataa fottango Allah.
Ammaa onon kam, on ngonaay nder suunooji mon ammaa on ɗon nder Ruuhu Allah, to fakat Ruuhu man ɗon jooɗi nder mooɗon. Mo walaa Ruuhu Almasiihu, o laataaki mo Almasiihu.
Ammaa to Almasiihu ɗon nder mooɗon, nden kam ɓalli mon maayan ngam daliila hakke, Ruuhu Allah hokkan on ngeendam, ngam Allah adilini on.
To Ruuhu maako ɗon jooɗi nder mooɗon, nden kam Allah ummitinɗo Almasiihu diga maayde yeeɗitinan boo ɓalli mon maayanɗi bee Ruuhu man
Ngam maajum deerɗiraaɓe am, walaa ko doolata en tokkaago suunooji meeɗen fahin.
Ngam to on tokkake suunooji mon, on maayan. Ammaa to on acci Ruuhu Allah mbara suunooji mon, nden kam on ngeeɗan,
ngam ɗowaaɓe Ruuhu Allah fuu ngoni ɓiɓɓe Allah.
Ngam Ruuhu Ceniiɗo mo on keɓi nastinaay on nder maccuŋgaaku haa on kula fahin. Aa'a! Ruuhu man laatini en ɓiɓɓe Allah, duŋani en ewnaago Allah: “Baaba
Ruuhu Allah bee hoore mum ɗon seedano ruuhuuji men: En ɓiɓɓe Allah fakat.
To nii en ɓiɓɓe maako, nden kam en keɓan boo ko o sigani ɓiɓɓe maako, en keɓdan ɗum bee Almasiihu. To en njaɓi geɗal torraaji Almasiihu, en keɓan geɗal tedduŋgal maako boo
Mi numi haala torraaji men nder zamanuuru jontaaru. Fakat, ɗi potaay foondeego bee tedduŋgal garanŋgal ngal Allah waŋginanta en.
Tagefo fuu ɗon yenwa masin haa Allah waŋgina ɓiɓɓe mum bee tedduŋgal.
Ngam tagefo fuu nastinaama les baawɗe majjere, naa kaŋgo yiɗi ɗum, ammaa Allah hoddirani ngo bana nii. Bee man fuu o hokki ngo tammunde
rimɗugo e njeyaaŋgu halkere, ngo hawta bee ɓiɓɓe maako nder ndimu e tedduŋgal.
En anndi haa jonta duniyaaru fuu ɗon uuma, ɗon nder luuwe bana ɓesnanɗo.
Naa duniyaaru tan, koo enen heɓɓe dokkal Allah aartuŋgal waato Ruuhu mum, en ɗon uumo. En ɗon ngenwa wondugo bee Allah, haa o timmidina laatingo en ɓiɓɓe maako waato o sootta ɓalli men
Kisndam men ɗon tabiti dow tammunde nde'e. Ammaa to en ɗon ngi'a ko tammotooɗen heɓugo, nden kam naa ɗum tammunde gooŋgaare. Moy tammoto hayru mo o heɓi?
Ammaa to en ɗon tammo heɓugo ko en ngi'aay tawon, nden kam en ndeenan ɗum bee munyal.
Non boo Ruuhu Allah ɗon walla en, ngam en tampuɓe. En anndaa koo toraago Allah bana no haani. Ammaa Ruuhu bee hoore mum ɗon torano en bee tornde nde nanataake.
Allah linyoowo ɓerɗe ɗon faama ko Ruuhu ɗaɓɓata. Ngam Ruuhu ɗon torano yimɓe Allah senaaɓe fodde ko Allah yiɗi.
