Ɗowtane ardiiɓe on, leestane ɓe. Ngam ɓe ɗon ayna yoŋkiiji mooɗon tum, ngam ɓe njaaboto Allah dow kuuɗe maɓɓe. To on mbaɗi non, ɓe kuuwan bee seyo. To naa non, ɓe kuuwan bee mone, kanjum boo ɗum nafataa on.
Tore Allah ngam amin. Ngam min anndi fakat ɓerɗe amin laaɓi, ngam foroy min ngiɗi waɗugo ko fotti.
Mi ɗon ɓesda toraago on, on toro Allah ngam am, ngam haa o lornammi haa mooɗon bee jaawal.
Allah jawmu salaaman ummitini Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu diga maayde – kaŋko o laati gaynaako baali mawɗo, o tabitini alkawal duumiiŋgal bee ƴiiƴam maako –
Allah waawna on waɗugo ko wooɗi fuu ngam haa on mbaɗa muuyo maako. O waɗa nder meeɗen ko fottanta mo, o waɗa ɗum bee Yeesu Almasiihu. Tedduŋgal laatano Almasiihu haa abada abadin. Aamiina!
Onon deerɗiraaɓe, mi ɗon toro on: Njaɓe bolle am ɗe'e bee munyal, haa ɗe tiɗɗina ɓerɗe mooɗon. Wasuyeewol am ngo'ol juutaay.
Mi yiɗi anndingo on, deerɗiraawo meeɗen Timote yoofaama diga fursina. To o yottake ɗo law, mi yahdan bee maako to mi ɗon yaha laaroygo on.
Koofne ardiiɓe on fuu, koofne senaaɓe Allah fuu. Deerɗiraaɓe haa Italiya koofni on.
Mo'ere Allah laatano on fuu.
Min, Yaakuba maccuɗo Allah e Jawmiraawo men Yeesu Almasiihu, mi hoofni le'i Isra'iila sappo e ɗiɗi caŋkitiiɗi haa duniyaaru
Deerɗiraaɓe am, ceye masin nde jarribooje feere feere keɓi on fuu.
Ngam on anndi poonduki nuɗɗinki mooɗon waddan munyal.
Ammaa sey munyal mooɗon waŋga laaɓɗum, ngam haa on laato timmuɓe, bilaa feloore, taa koo ɗume ŋakkana on.
To hikma ŋakkani gooto caka mooɗon, sey o toro Allah dokkanɗo koo moy bee caahaaki e bilaa feloore, o hokkan mo ka.
Ammaa sey o toro bee nuɗɗinki, bilaa seko sam, ngam mo ɗon seka nanndi bee ƴuuge weendu ɗe henndu dimmbinta e ɓaŋgtata.
Taa irin goɗɗo oo tammo heɓugo koo ɗume haa Jawmiraawo,
ngam tum o cakliiɗo, nuɗɗinki maako daraaki dow gootum sam.
Sey deerɗiraawo leesɗo seyo to Allah ɓaŋgti mo,
deerɗiraawo diskuɗo boo seyo to Allah leesni mo. Ngam o saaloto bana pinndi huɗo.
To naaŋge ɓaŋgti, wuli jaw, huɗo yooran, pinndi mum caaman, mbooɗirka man fuu halkan. Bana non boo diskuɗo halkirta nder kuuɗe muuɗum
Barka laatanto goɗɗo mo munyani jarribeeki, ngam ɓaawo poondol ngo'ol, o heɓan woronnde ngeendam nde Allah iinani yiɗɓe mo.
To goɗɗo jarribaama, taa o wi'a: “Allah jarribake yam.” Ngam goɗɗo waawataa jarribaago Allah haa o waɗa halleende, kaŋko boo o jarribataako goɗɗo.
Ammaa jarraba ɗon naŋnga goɗɗo to suuno mum esti ɗum, naŋngi ɗum.
Ɓaawoɗon, to suuno man mawni, riman hakke. To hakke mawni boo, riman maayde.
Deerɗiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, taa zammbe ko'e mon!
Caahu mbooɗŋgu e dokkal timmuŋgal fuu iwi diga dow, ɗum iwi haa Allah tagɗo jayli asama. O waylataako, nyiɓɓuki laatataako haa maako bana haa jayli man
Nder muuyo maako o hokki en ngeendam bee wolde maako gooŋgaare, ngam haa joonde meeɗen ɓura joole tagle maako fuu.
Deerɗiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, paame ɗu'um: Sey koo moy fuu taaskano nanugo, ammaa taa o yaawa wolwugo, taa o yaawa tikkugo boo.
Ngam tikkere neɗɗo hiɓɓintaa adilaaku Allah.
Ngam maajum, ngudine ko soɓi e kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu. Njaɓe bee yaŋkinaare wolde nde Allah aawi nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam nde waawan hisnugo on.
Taa zammbe ko'e mooɗon bee wi'go: Nanugo wolde Allah tan he'i. Ammaa mbaɗe ko nde wi'i on.
Ngam koo moy nani wolde Allah, o waɗaay ko nde wi'i, o nanndi bee daarɗo yeeso mum nder daarorgal,
o yi'i no o wa'i, o dilli, law o yejjiti no o wa'no.
Ammaa to goɗɗo ɗon lincita tawreeta Allah timmuka, dimɗinanka yimɓe, o ɗon tokka jogaago ka, o yejjitittaa ko o nani, o ɗon waɗa ko ka wi'i mo, goɗɗo oo heɓan barka nder ko o waɗata fuu.
To goɗɗo ɗon numa o goɗɗo diina, ammaa o hakkilantaa ko o wolwata, diina maako laati meere, o fewani hoore maako.
Ndaa ko hollata diina gooŋgaaha e ceniika yeeso Allah Baabiraawo: Hakkilango atiime'en e rewɓe yurumɓe nder ɓillaare maɓɓe e aynugo hoore muuɗum ngam taa duniyaaru soɓna ɗum.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, nde on nuɗɗinɓe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu tedduɗo, taa cenndindire yimɓe.
To diskuɗo ɓorniiɗo limce booɗɗe e halagaare kaŋŋeeri haa hoondu maako, nasti mooɓtorde mooɗon, nden laafuɗo ɓorniiɗo tekkaaje boo nasti,
on teddini ɓorniiɗo booɗɗe, on mbi'i mo: “Jooɗa haa babal booɗŋgal nga'al.” Ammaa on mbi'i laafuɗo boo: “Dara ɗo malla jooɗa haa lesdi yeeso am.”
To on mbaɗi non, on cenndindiraay yimɓe na? On laati hiitooɓe bee numooji kalluɗi.
Deerɗiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, keɗite booɗɗum! Naa Allah suɓi laafuɓe duniyaaru ngam haa ɓe laato riskuɓe nder nuɗɗinki e ɓe ndona laamu ngu o iinani yiɗɓe mo na?
Ammaa onon on ɗon njawo laafuɓe. Naa ɗum riskuɓe toskinta on e njahrata on yeeso hiitooɓe na?
Naa kamɓe kallinta innde woonde nde ɓe ewni dow mooɗon?
Fakat, on mbaɗi ko wooɗi to on kebbitini umroore laamu Allah, fodde ko winnda nder Deftere Seniinde: “Yiɗ keeddiɗɗiraawo ma bana no a yiɗiri hoore ma
Ammaa to on ɗon cenndindira yimɓe, on mbaɗi hakke, umroore tawreeta do'i on kiita ngam on luuti nde.
Ngam koo to goɗɗo ɗowtanake umrooje tawreeta fuu, ammaa o ɗowtanaaki woore nder maaje, o aybuɗo bana luutɗo umrooje tawreeta man fuu.
Ngam mo wi'i: “Taa waɗ njeenu” wi'i boo: “Taa mbar-hoore.” Koo to a waɗaay njeenu, ammaa a waɗi mbar-hoore, a luuti umrooje tawreeta fuu
Ngam maajum, ko on mbolwata malla ko on mbaɗata fuu, paame Allah hiitan on bee tawreeta mum dimɗinanka yimɓe.
Ngam to goɗɗo walaa enɗam, Allah hiitoto mo bilaa enɗam. Ammaa marɗo enɗam hulataa kiita Allah.
Deerɗiraaɓe am! Ɗume ɗum nafata to goɗɗo wi'i: “Mi woodi nuɗɗinki”, ammaa kuuɗe maako mbaŋginaay ki? Nuɗɗinki man hisnan mo na?
To woodi deerɗiraaɓe worɓe malla rewɓe, ɓe ngalaa limce, ɓe ngalaa nyaamdu nde weeti fuu,
goɗɗo caka mooɗon boo wi'i ɓe: “Allah hokku on saa'a! Kolte, nyaame, kaare”, o hokkaay ɓe koo ɗume ngam haaje maɓɓe, ɗume ɗum nafata?
Non nuɗɗinki boo wa'i, to ki waŋginaay kuuɗe maaki, ki baatki.
Ammaa to goɗɗo wi'i: “An a woodi nuɗɗinki, min boo mi woodi kuuɗe”, mi wi'an mo: “Hollam nuɗɗinki ma bilaa kuuɗe, min boo mi hollete nuɗɗinki am bee kuuɗe.”
A nuɗɗini Allah o gooto na? Booɗɗum! Ginnaaji boo nuɗɗini ɗum, ammaa ɗi ɗon ndiwna.
Paataaɗo! A yiɗi holleego nuɗɗinki bilaa kuuɗe nafataa sam na?
Noy Allah adiliniri kaakiraawo meeɗen Ibrahiima? Bee kuuɗe maako o heɓi ɗum, nde o lii'ani Allah Isiyaaku, ɓiyiiko haa hirsirde
A laari no nuɗɗinki maako yahdiri bee kuuɗe maako. Kuuɗe maako kebbitini nuɗɗinki maako.
Bana non ko Deftere Allah wi'no hiɓɓiri: “Ibrahiima nuɗɗini Allah, Allah boo adilini mo.” O ewnaama soobaajo Allah
Kadi na on ndaari, neɗɗo adilinaama bee kuuɗe, naa bee nuɗɗinki tan.
Non boo Rahab, daakaareejo. O adilinaama ngam daliila kuuɗe maako, nde o jaɓɓi nelaaɓe Yahuudu'en, o wurtini ɓe bee laawol goɗŋgol
Bana no goɗɗo bilaa yoŋki laatake maayɗo, non nuɗɗinki bilaa kuuɗe boo ki baatki.
Deerɗiraaɓe am! Taa ɗuuɗɓe mooɗon laato ekkitinooɓe, ngam on anndi kiita amin ɓuran saatugo dow kiita luttuɓe.
En fuu en ɗon mbaɗa aybe bee laabi feere feere. Mo waɗataa aybe nder bolle muuɗum o timmuɗo, baawɗo naŋgtugo ɓanndu mum fuu.
En ɗon nastina labaŋge haa kunnduɗe pucci ngam haa ɗi ɗowtano en, bana nii en keɓan yahrugo ɗi haa en ngiɗi fuu.
Nume boo haala koommbooje
Non boo ɗemŋgal. Ngal tergal pamaral, ammaa ngal ɗon juroro wolwugo haalaaji mawɗi.
Nume boo no yiite famare nyaamirta laynde mawnde.
Ɗemŋgal neɗɗo boo ɗon bana yiite. Ngal laati mooɓgal halleende fuu caka terɗe meeɗen. Ngal ɗon soɓna ɓanndu fuu. Ngal ɗon jamna balɗe ngeendam meeɗen fuu. Kaŋgal boo yiite jahannama jamni ngal.
Tum, neɗɗo waawi eltugo tagle fuu, waato: Kuuje ladde e colli e ladooji e liɗɗi fuu.
Ammaa ɗemŋgal, walaa mo waawi eltugo ngal. Ngal halli, ngal eltataake, ngal heewi tooke mbarooje.
Bee maagal en ɗon ngetta Jawmiraawo e Baabiraawo, bee maagal fahin en ɗon naala yimɓe tagaaɓe dow nanndal bee Allah
Diga hunnduko wooto, bolle gettooje e naalooje ngurtoto. Deerɗiraaɓe am, haanaay ɗum laato non.
Walaa seeɓoore ɓulata ndiyam mbelɗam e ndiyam kaaɗɗam haa ɓuldude woore.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, ibbi riman jaytunje na? Inabohi riman ibbe na? Non boo seeɓoore ndiyam kaaɗɗam ɓulnataa mbelɗam.
Woodi hikmaajo, marɗo faamu caka mooɗon na? Sey o waŋgina ɗum nder gikku mbooɗŋgu bee kuuɗe yaŋkiniiɗe e hikmaaje.
Ammaa to on ngoodi kaajal caatuŋgal e jokkirgol nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, nden kam taa mawnite, taa luute gooŋga bee fewre boo.
Irin hikma ka'a iwaay haa dow, ka iwi haa duniyaaru, ka iwi haa numooji neɗɗo, ka iwi haa ginnaaji.
Ngam haa kaajal e jokkirgol ngoni, ton njiiɓru e kuuɗe kalluɗe fuu ngoni boo.
Ammaa hikma iwka diga dow, aran, ka laaɓi saray. Nden ka ɗon wadda jam e sulhu e neɗɗaaku, ka ɗon heewi enɗam, ka ɗon huuwa kuuɗe booɗɗe, ka senndindirtaa yimɓe, ka walaa naafikaare.
Kuuɗe adiliije iwi haa sulhindiranɓe yimɓe, waddanɓe sulhu hakkunde yimɓe.
Haa toy kaɓe e jokkirli caka mooɗon iwata? Naa ɗum ɗon iwa haa suunooji mooɗon kaɓanɗi foroy nder terɗe mooɗon?

On ɗon cuuna kuuje goɗɗe, ammaa on keɓaay ɗe, ngam maajum on ɗon mbara ko'e, on ɗon kaaja boo, on mbaawaay heɓugo ko on ngiɗi, on ɗon kaɓa, on ɗon njokkira. On keɓaay ko on ngiɗi, ngam on toraaki ɗum haa Allah.
Koo to on ɗon toro mo, on keɓataa ngam numooji mooɗon kalli, on ɗon toro ngam humtugo suunooji ɓerɗe mooɗon tan.
Onon yewɓe umrooje Allah! On anndaa soobrugo bee duniyaaru ɗum honugo Allah na? To on coobiri bee duniyaaru, nden kam on laatake konne'en Allah
Taa nume ko Deftere Seniinde wolwi ɗum meere, nde wi'i: “Bee yiide haajunde, Allah yiɗi Ruuhu mo o waɗi nder meeɗen.”
Ammaa mo'ere nde Allah mo'ani en ɓuri ɗum. Ngam man Deftere Seniinde wi'i: “Allah ɗon dartano mawnitiiɓe, ammaa o ɗon mo'ana yaŋkiniiɓe.”
Ngam man leestine ko'e mon yeeso Allah. Ndartane Sayɗaanu, nden o doggan, o daayoto on.
Ɓadite Allah, kaŋko boo o ɓadititto on. Laɓɓine juuɗe mooɗon, onon hakke'en. Cene ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon sakliiɓe.
Cune, ngooke, mboye. Jaleeɗe mooɗon laato bojji, seyo mooɗon laato suno.
Njaŋkine ko'e mooɗon yeeso Jawmiraawo, nden kam o ɓaŋgtan on.

Deerɗiraaɓe am, taa mbolwindire kalluka. Koo moy wolwi kalluka dow deerɗum malla hiitake ɗum, o wolwi kalluka dow tawreeta, o hiiti ka. To a hiiti tawreeta, a laataaki ɗowtaniiɗo ka, ammaa a laati kiitoowo ka.
Allah feere muuɗum woni kiitoowo, kaŋko hokki en tawreeta. Kaŋko feere maako waawi hisnugo e halkugo. An a moy, haa a hiito deerɗiraawo ma?
Jonta, naneeɗam, onon wi'anɓe: “Hannde malla jaŋngo min ndillan haa berniwol kaja, min nduuma ton, min mbaɗan filu, min keɓa riba.”
Onon wolwanɓe bana nii, on anndi ko waranta ngeendam mooɗon jaŋngo na? On ɗon bana cuurɗe, ɗe mbaŋgi seɗɗa, ɓaawoɗon law ɗe caayi
Haani on mbi'a: “To Jawmiraawo muuyi, to o yahri yoŋki, min mbaɗan nii bee nii.”
Ammaa jonta on ɗon mawnito, on ɗon njuro. Irin juro ngo'o halli.
Annduɗo waɗugo mbooɗeeŋga to waɗaay ɗum, o waɗi hakke.
Naneeɗam jonta, onon riskuɓe! Sey on mboya, on ngooka ngam boneeji tammiiɗi wargo dow mooɗon.
Jawdi mooɗon nyoli, mooƴu nyaami limce mooɗon.
Peewol nyaami kaŋŋeeri e cardi mooɗon. Peewol ngo'ol laatoto seedamku dow mooɗon, ngol nyaaman ɓalli mooɗon bana yiite. On paggake jawdi nder balɗe ragareeje
On njoɓaay ngeenaari sodooɓe gese mooɗon. Nane bojji maɓɓe! Bojji sodooɓe ƴaamle mooɗon njottake haa Jawmiraawo honooɓe asama
On ngeeɗi nder jeynitaare haa duniyaaru ndu'u, on mbaɗi ko on ngiɗi, on payni ko'e mooɗon ngam nyalaade kirsol.
On kiiti adiliijo, on mbari mo. Kaŋko o dartanaaki on.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, munye haa to Jawmiraawo wari. Ndaare no demoowo munyrata, o ɗon reena haa gese maako ɓennda booɗɗum. O ɗon reena iyeende arannde e ɓaawoore.
Munye onon boo, tiɗɗine ɓerɗe mooɗon, ngam nyalaade loraaki Jawmiraawo ɓadake.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, taa ngurŋgurte hakkunde mooɗon, ngam taa Allah hiito on. Ndaa kiitoowo ɓadake wargo.
Deerɗiraaɓe am, tokke misaalu annabi'en wolwuɓe bee innde Jawmiraawo, munye, ɓuse bone bana maɓɓe.
En ɗon mbi'a ɓe barkiɗinaaɓe ngam ɓe accaay munyugo. On nani haala munyal Ayuba ɗuuɗŋgal, on anndi boo ko Allah hokki mo haa ragare. Ngam Jawmiraawo o keewɗo enɗam e mbooɗeeŋga
Ammaa ko ɓuri ɗum fuu, deerɗiraaɓe am, taa kune sam, koo bee asama malla bee lesdi. Taa kunore koo ɗume. Sey ooho mooɗon laato ooho, aa'a mooɗon boo laato aa'a. Ngam taa on ndo'o nder kiita Allah
Woodi mo ɗon yara bone caka mooɗon na? O waɗa do'a. Woodi mo ɗon seyi na? O yima gime gettooje.
Woodi nyawɗo caka mooɗon na? O ewno ndotti'en jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. Ɓe ngara ɓe toro Allah ngam maako, ɓe moyta mo bee nebbam bee innde Jawmiraawo
Tornde bee nuɗɗinki hisnan nyawɗo oo. Jawmiraawo yamɗitinan mo, to woodi hakkeeji ɗi o waɗno boo, Jawmiraawo yaafanto mo.
Ngam maajum mbaŋgine hakkeeji mooɗon hakkunde mooɗon, tore Allah ngam koo moy mooɗon, ngam haa on njamɗita. Tornde adiliijo woodi baawɗe ɗuuɗɗe, nde nafan masin.
Eliya o goɗɗo bana meeɗen. O tori Allah bee tiinaare ngam taa iyeende toɓa. Duuɓi tati bee reeta nde toɓaay
O tori mo fahin, asama yoofi iyeende, lesdi waɗi ƴaamle
Deerɗiraaɓe am! To gooto mooɗon seli laawol gooŋga, sey goɗɗo lorna mo.
Anndite ɗu'um: To goɗɗo lorni hakkeejo diga laawol majjere, o hisni mo diga maayde, o heɓnanan mo yaafuye hakkeeji ɗuuɗɗi
Min Simon Piyer, nelaaɗo Yeesu Almasiihu, mi ɗon winndana on, onon suɓaaɓe Allah, laatiiɓe jananɓe saŋkitiiɓe haa lesɗe Pontus e Galaatiya e Kappadosiya e Asiya e Bitiniya.
On laati suɓaaɓe ngam Allah Baabiraawo muuyi ɗum diga ɓooyma. Ruuhu maako seni on, haa on ɗowtano Yeesu Almasiihu, haa ƴiiƴam maako laɓɓina on.
Mo'ere e salaaman ɗuuɗana on!

Ngetten Allah, Baabiraawo Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu! O waɗani en enɗam ɗuuɗɗam, o laatini en danyaaɓe hesɓe barka ummitineeki Yeesu Almasiihu diga maayde. Ɗum hebbini ɓerɗe meeɗen bee tammunde gooŋgaare.
En ɗon tammo heɓugo ndonŋgu ngu o sigani yimɓe maako haa asama. Ngu nyolataa, ngu wonnataako, ngu ustataako boo.
On ɗon nuɗɗini mo. Ngam maajum o ɗon ayna on bee baawɗe maako. Nder balɗe ragareeje, o waŋginanan on kisndam ɗam o taaskani on.
Ceye masin, koo to ɗum kaanduɗum boneeji feere feereeji ɗon cuna on wakkati seɗɗa.

Boneeji ɗi'i poondan nuɗɗinki mooɗon to ki gooŋgahi. Koo kaŋŋeeri wonnotoondi maa ɓe ɗon poonda ndi nder yiite, sakko nuɗɗinki mooɗon. Ki ɓuri kaŋŋeeri saman piw, sey ki foonde. Ɓaawo poondol man, on keɓan manooje e tedduŋgal e maŋngu, nyannde Yeesu Almasiihu waŋganta yimɓe fuu.
Koo nde on ngi'aay mo, on ngiɗi mo. Koo nde on ngi'ataa mo jonta, on nuɗɗini mo. Ngam man on ɗon ceyo bee seyo tedduŋgo, ɗuuɗŋgo, ngo ɓuri wolweego,
ngam on keɓan ko on tammoto nder nuɗɗinki mooɗon, kanjum woni kisndam yoŋkiiji mooɗon.

Annabi'en mbaɗi annabaaku dow mo'ere nde Allah taaskitinani on diga fuɗɗam, Ruuhu Almasiihu wondi bee maɓɓe, holli ɓe Almasiihu tammi yarugo bone, ɓaawoɗon o tammi heɓugo tedduŋgal. Annabi'en go tefi faamugo haala kisndam ɗa'am masin, linyi ka bee hakkiilo ngam ɓe keɓta ndey ka waɗata e noy ka laatorto.

Allah waŋginani ɓe kubaruwol ngol o halfinani ɓe, ngol laataaki ngam maɓɓe, ammaa ngam mooɗon. Nelaaɓe waazinɓe on Linjiila ngecci on gooŋgaaji ɗi'i. Ɓe ngaazi on ɗi bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo iwɗo diga asama. Malaa'ika'en maa ngiɗi faamugo haala ka'a.
Ngam maajum, sey numooji mooɗon taaskano kuugal! Kakkile, njo'ine tammunde mooɗon fuu haa mo'ere nde keɓoton saa'i Yeesu Almasiihu waŋgata.
Bana ɓikkoy ɗowtiikoy, taa tokke suunooji mooɗon ɗi tokkinooɗon yaake on anndaano gooŋga.
Ammaa bana Allah ewniiɗo on o Ceniiɗo, laate onon boo on senaaɓe nder ko mbaɗoton fuu.
Ngam Deftere wi'i: “Laate on senaaɓe ngam min mi Ceniiɗo

To on ɗon mbaɗa do'a, on ɗon ewno Allah, “Baabiraawo”. Allah ɗon hiito yimɓe, o senndindirtaa ɓe, ammaa o ɗon hiito ɓe deydey kuuɗe maɓɓe. Nde nii on laatake hoɗɓe nder duniyaaru, timmine balɗe mooɗon luttuɗe nder kulol Allah.
On coottaama diga yahdu hallundu ndu on ndoni haa kaakiraaɓe mooɗon. On anndi on coottiraaka bee kuuje ɗe saman maaje ustoto bana kaŋŋeeri malla cardi,
ammaa on coottiraama bee ƴiiƴam caɗɗam ɗam Almasiihu, mo laati bana jawgel laaɓŋgel ngel walaa aybe
Allah suɓi mo diga duniyaaru tagaaka tawon, o waŋgini mo haa mooɗon nder balɗe ragareeje ɗe'e.
Ngam barka maako on nuɗɗini Allah mo ummitini mo diga maayde, teddini mo. Bana non nuɗɗinki mooɗon e tammunde mooɗon haa Allah tabitirta.
Jonta nde on ceni ko'e mooɗon bee ɗowtanaago gooŋga, ngiɗe deerɗiraaɓe nder nuɗɗinki bilaa naafikaare. Ngam maajum ngiɗindire bee tiinaare e ɓerɗe laaɓɗe.
On laati danyaaɓe hesɓe bee wolde Allah. Wolde nde'e laataaki bana aawdi nyolanndi, nde yeere, nde nyolataa e nde jinnataa.
Bana ko winnda:
“Yimɓe fuu ɗon bana fuɗŋgooji,
tedduŋgal maɓɓe fuu ɗon bana pinndi maaji.
Fuɗŋgooji njooran, pinndi boo caaman.
Ammaa wolde Jawmiraawo duumoto.”
Wolde nde'e woni kubaruwol ceynoowol ngol anndinaaɗon
Ngam man ngudine halleende fuu: Fewre, tufle, suuno bee nyoore fuu!
Bana no ɓikkoy keccoy ngiɗiri kosam tum, onon boo ngiɗe wolde Allah gooŋgaare bana non, haa on mawna bee maare, on keɓa kisndam.
Ngam bana Deftere wi'i: “On metti mbooɗeeŋga Jawmiraawo
Ɓadite mo. O laati hayre yeere nde yimɓe meeriɗini, ammaa nde Allah suɓi ngam nde mari saman.
Onon boo bana kaa'e geete, laate mahruɗe haykaliiru Ruuhu Ceniiɗo. Laate liman'en senaaɓe haa lii'anon Allah kirseteeɗi pottananɗi mo barka Yeesu Almasiihu.
Ngam Deftere wi'i:
“Mi jo'ini haa Siyona hayre talkumoore
koo moy nuɗɗini mo semtintaake
Hayre nde'e laatanake nuɗɗinɓe mo saman ɗuuɗɗo. Ammaa haa sooyɓe nuɗɗinki:
“Hayre nde mahooɓe ngudini,
laati hayre talkumoore ɓurnde saman
Fahin Deftere wi'i:
“Nde laatanake yimɓe hayre fergoore,
tapaare do'oore ɓe.”
Ɓe pergi dow maare ngam ɓe cali ɗowtanaago wolde Allah, kanjum Allah muuyani ɓe
Ammaa onon ngoni asŋgol cuɓaaŋgol, liman'en laamiiɗo, yimɓe ummaatoore seniinde. Allah wurtini on nyiɓre, yahri on haa annoora maako kayɗiniika. O suɓi on haa on ngaazina kuuɗe maako booɗɗe
Naane on laataaki yimɓe ummaatoore Allah, ammaa jonta on laatake yimɓe ummaatoore maako. Naane on anndaa enɗam Allah, ammaa jonta on keɓi enɗam maako
Soobiraaɓe am, on laati bana hoɗɓe e jananɓe haa duniyaaru ndu'u. Ngam maajum mi ɗon waso on taa on accana suunooji ɓanndu laawol, ngam tum ɗi ɗon kona yoŋkiiji mooɗon.
Sey joonde mooɗon caka heefeerɓe wooɗa ngam koo to ɓe ngulli on bee wi'go on halluɓe, ɓe ndaara kuuɗe mooɗon booɗɗe, nden ɓe teddina Allah nyannde loraaki maako.
Ngam daliila Jawmiraawo, leestane marɓe laamu nder duniyaaru. Ɗowtane laamiiɗo ngam o ɓuri luttuɓe maŋngu.
Ɗowtane ngomna'en, ngam ɓe nelaaɓe laamiiɗo haa ɓe kiito halluɓe, ɓe teddina wooɗɓe.
Ngam ndaa ko woni muuyo Allah: Bee kuuɗe booɗɗe ɗe on kuuwata, on nje'ina faataaɓe wolwanɓe bolle meereeje.
Jonta on rimɓe, ammaa taa cudde halleende koo ndeye bee ndimu ngu'u, laate maccuɓe Allah.
Teddine yimɓe fuu, ngiɗe deerɗiraaɓe nuɗɗinɓe, kule Allah, teddine laamiiɗo.
Onon huuwanooɓe yimɓe, leestane jaagorɓe mooɗon, teddine ɓe koo ndeye. Taa mbaɗe ɗum haa wooɗɓe e ɗelma-gikku'en tan, ammaa koo haa saatuɓe boo.
Ɗum booɗɗum to on munyi naawɗum bone ko ɓe ukkanto on meere ngam daliila Allah.
Ɗume munyal mooɗon nafata to on munyi piyɗe ɗe ɓe piyi on daliila aybeeji mooɗon? Ammaa to on munyi boneeji ɗi on njari ngam on mbaɗi ko wooɗi, ɗum fottanan Allah.
Ngam irin man Allah ewni on. Ngam Almasiihu bee hoore mum yari bone ngam mooɗon, o holli on misaalu ngam haa on tokko ngu.
O meeɗaay waɗugo hakke, fewre woodaa haa hunnduko maako
Nde ɓe kuɗi mo o huɗtaaki, nde o yari bone, o wi'aay o waatoto, ammaa o hokkiti hoore maako haa juŋngo Allah, kiitoowo adiliijo
Almasiihu bee hoore muuɗum roondi hakkeeji meeɗen haa ɓanndu muuɗum dow leggal, ngam haa en laato maayɓe heedi hakke, ammaa yeeɗɓe heedi adilaaku. Daliila kuuduuje maako en kurgaama
On laatakeno bana baali majjuɗi, ammaa on lorake haa gaynaako aynoowo yoŋkiiji mooɗon
Bana non boo onon rewɓe, leestane worɓe mooɗon. Ngam to woɗɓe maɓɓe ɗowtanaaki wolde Allah, joonde mooɗon yahran ɓe haa nuɗɗinki. Ɗum waɗan koo to on mbolwaay koo wolde
ngam ɓe ndaaran no joonde mooɗon laaɓrata, no on kulorta Allah.
Taa ŋarol mon iwa haa ko gite ngi'ata waato moorɗi caɗɗi malla pawne kaŋŋeeri malla ɓornuce booɗɗe
Ndikka ŋarol mooɗon iwa diga nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, waato gikku ɗelemŋgu, de'iiŋgu. Kanjum woni pawne ɗe njinnataa, ɗum mari saman masin haa yeeso Allah.
Bana nii rewɓe senaaɓe ɓooyma laatiniri ko'e maɓɓe ɓe ŋarniiɓe, ɓe njo'ini tammunde maɓɓe haa Allah, ɓe leestaniiɓe worɓe maɓɓe.
Saraatu waɗi ɗum, o ɗowtani Ibrahiima, o ewni mo jaagorɗo maako. On laati ɓikkoy maako hannde to on mbaɗi mbooɗeeŋga, to on kulaay koo ɗume

Onon worɓe boo: Njooɗode bee rewɓe mon, paamotire. Anndite no semmbe maɓɓe yottaaki semmbe mooɗon. Teddine ɓe, ngam kamɓe boo ɓe keɓan hawtaade bee mooɗon ngeendam caahu. Mbaɗe ɗum ngam taa koo ɗume haɗa do'aaje mooɗon
Dow ko mi wolwi fuu, mi ɗon wi'a fahin: Sey on fuu on mara numo wooto, njurmindire, ngiɗindire bana deerɗiraaɓe, enɗindire, laate yaŋkiniiɓe.
Taa lorne halleende bee halleende malla kuudi bee kuudi. Ndikka on mbarkiɗina, kanjum Allah ewnori on haa ndonon barka.
Bana Deftere wi'i:
“To goɗɗo yiɗi seyoraago ngeendam
e hayru nder balɗe mum,
sey o acca wolwugo kalluka,
o hakkilana ɗemŋgal maako,
o acca halleende, o waɗa mbooɗeeŋga,
o tiino ɗaɓɓugo salaaman.
Ngam Jawmiraawo ɗon hakkilana adili'en,
noppi maako ɗon keɗito gookaali maɓɓe.
Ammaa o ɗoylan waɗooɓe halleende
Moy waɗata on halleende to on tiinake waɗugo mbooɗeeŋga?
Ammaa to on njari bone daliila adilaaku, on barkiɗinaaɓe. Taa kule ko yimɓe kulata, taa hakkiilooji mooɗon njiiɓo
Ammaa teddine Almasiihu nder ɓerɗe mooɗon ngam o Ceniiɗo, o Jawmiraawo mooɗon. Laate taaskiiɓe koo ndey haa on mbaawa jaabaago koo moy to ƴami on haala tammunde mooɗon
Ammaa njaabe ƴamɓe on bee yaŋkinaare e ne'aare e numo ɓernde laaɓŋgo. Nden ɓe cemtan ngam ɓe ngulli on bilaa daliila, ɓe mbolwi kalluka dow joonde mooɗon woonde nder kawtal bee Almasiihu.
To ɗum laatake muuyo Allah, ndikka yarugo bone ngam kuuɗe booɗɗe dow yarugo bone ngam kuuɗe kalluɗe.

Ngam Almasiihu bee hoore muuɗum maayi nde woore ngam hakkeeji yimɓe, nafuuda man jinnataa haa foroy. O walaa hakke, ammaa o maayi ngam marɓe hakke, ngam o yahra on haa Allah. Yimɓe mbari mo, ammaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo yeeɗitini mo.
Nii non o jippiri nder Ruuhu haa yoŋkiiji maɓɓaaɗi, o waazini ɗi.
Waato yoŋkiiji ɗi ɗowtanaakino Allah, koo nde o munyani ɗi nder zamanu Nuuhu, yaake Nuuhu ɗonno waɗa koommbowal
Ndiyam ɗa'am laati misaalu baptisma, ɗam ɗon hisna on jonta, naa bee lootugo tuundi ɓanndu, ammaa bee jaabaago Allah bee numo ɓernde laaɓŋgo nder ummitineeki Yeesu Almasiihu
mo eeŋgi haa asama, jooɗi haa nyaamo Allah. O ɗon laamano malaa'ika'en e marɓe laamu e marɓe baawɗe.
On anndi Almasiihu yari bone nder ɓanndu muuɗum. Cemmbiɗine ko'e mooɗon bee numo bana ngo Almasiihu, ngam koo moy to yari bone nder ɓanndu mum seedi bee hakke.
Diga jonta, haa luttuɗum balɗe mooɗon haa duniyaaru, sey on njooɗo nder muuyo Allah, naa nder suunooji neɗɗo.
Naane on njooɗino nder joonde heefeerɓe, jonta ɗum he'i. On njooɗino nder daakaareeku, suunooji, wuykere, pijirle kalluɗe, on cujidanino labbi karminaaɗi.
Jonta heefeerɓe ɓe'e ɗon kayɗina ngam on kawtataa bee maɓɓe nder joonde maɓɓe hallunde e pijirle maɓɓe kalluɗe. Ngam man ɓe nasti huɗugo on.
Ammaa sey ɓe njaabo Allah, taaskiiɗo hiitaago yeeɗɓe e maayɓe.
Kanjum waɗi Almasiihu waazini maayɓe boo kubaruwol ceynoowol, koo to ɓe maayi daliila kiita ka yimɓe fuu kiitorte, ɓe ngeeɗa fodde Allah barka Ruuhu.
Ragare kuuje fuu ɓadake. Kakkile, naŋgte ko'e mooɗon haa on mbaawa waɗugo do'a.
Ko ɓuri fuu, ngiɗindire bee yiide gooŋgaare, ngam yiide ɗon yaafo hakkeeji ɗuuɗɗi
Njaɓɓindire, mbeernindire haa ci'e
Sey koo moy mooɗon huuwtinira dokkal ngal Allah hokki mo, nafa woɗɓe bee maagal. Bana nii on laatorto aynooɓe dokke Allah feere feereeje.

Mo waazata, sey o waazo wolde Allah. Mo huuwanta goɗɗo, sey o huuwana mo bee semmbe ɗe Allah hokkata mo. Nder ko en mbaɗata fuu, sey en teddina Allah bee Yeesu Almasiihu. Kaŋko mari tedduŋgal e baawɗe haa foroy! Aamiina.
Soobiraaɓe am, taa kayɗine boneeji naawɗi ɗi on njarata ngam foondugo on, bana to ɗum huunde kaayeefiire.
Ammaa ceye ngam on ɗon kawta nder bone Almasiihu ngam haa on keewa seyo yaake tedduŋgal maako waŋgoyi.
On barkiɗinaaɓe to ɓe kuɗi on daliila innde Almasiihu, ngam ɗum waŋgini Ruuhu Allah tedduɗo ɗon dow mooɗon!
Taa gooto mooɗon yara bone ngam o laati mbaroowo hoore malla gujjo malla ngam o waɗi kalluɗum malla karammbaaniijo.
Ammaa to on njari bone ngam on nuɗɗinɓe tokkiiɓe Almasiihu, taa cemte ɗum. Sey on ngetta Allah ngam on njogi innde Almasiihu.
Wakkati kiita yottake, Allah boo aartiran bee yimɓe muuɗum. To ka fuɗɗi haa meeɗen, noy ɗum laatorto haa ɓen njaɓaay kubaruwol ceynoowol ngol Allah?
Bana no Deftere wi'i:
“To hisugo saɗani adili'en,
ko tammi heɓugo halluɓe e marɓe hakke
Nden kam, mo ɗon yara bone ngam Allah muuyani mo ɗum, taa acca waɗugo mbooɗeeŋga, ammaa o hokkita hoore maako haa tagɗo mo ngam o koolniiɗo.

Jonta, mi ɗon waso ndotti'en jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe wonɓe caka mooɗon. Min boo mi ndottiijo bana mooɗon, mi seedi boneeji ɗi Almasiihu yari, mi nastan tedduŋgal ngal Allah tammi waŋginango en. Mi ɗon wi'a on:
Ayne tokkere nde Allah halfini on, ayne nde bana no Allah yiɗi, naa bee doole ammaa bee anniya. Kuuwe, naa ngam heɓugo ceede meere, ammaa ngam on ngiɗi ɗum
Taa ndoole yimɓe ɓe Allah halfini on, ammaa laatane ɓe misaalu haa ɓe tokko on.
To gaynaako mawɗo waŋgoyi, on keɓan meetaleewol marŋgol tedduŋgal, ngol furɗataa sam.
Onon derke'en boo, leestane mawɓe bana non. Koo moy fuu laatano deerɗum jaŋkiniiɗo ngam Deftere wi'i:
“Allah ɗon dartano mantotooɓe,
ammaa o ɗon mo'ana yaŋkiniiɓe
Ngam man njaŋkine ko'e mooɗon haa Allah baawɗo, haa o ɓaŋgta on yaake o yiɗi
Ndoonte cakle mooɗon fuu, njowe ɗe dow maako, ngam o ɗon hakkilana on.
Kakkile, ayne! Ngam konneejo mooɗon, waato Iblisa, ɗon bana mbarooga ubbanŋga tefanŋga mo o nyaama.
Ndartane mo! Tabite nder nuɗɗinki mooɗon ngam on anndi deerɗiraaɓe nuɗɗinɓe nder duniyaaru fuu ɗon njara bone bana nii.

Ammaa to on njari bone wakkati seɗɗa, marɗo mo'ere fuu, waato Allah bee hoore muuɗum laatinan on on timmuɓe, tabitɓe, semmbiɗɓe ɓe ndimmbataako. Kaŋko ewni on nder Yeesu Almasiihu haa keɓon tedduŋgal maako duumiiŋgal.
Baawɗe laatano mo haa foroy! Aamiina.
Silas deerɗiraawo men, mo kooliimi ɗum walli yam winndango on bataakewol ngo'ol. Mi yiɗi semmbiɗingo on, mi yiɗi seedaago on on ɗon tabiti nder mo'ere Allah fakat
Jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Baabila nde Allah suɓi bana o suɓiri on, hoofni on. Ɓiŋngel am Markus boo hoofni on
Koofnindire booɗɗum bana no ɗum haandani deerɗiraaɓe yiɗaaɓe.
Salaaman laatano on fuu, onon jeyaaɓe Almasiihu!
Min Simon Piyer, maccuɗo e nelaaɗo Yeesu Almasiihu, mi ɗon winndana on, onon heɓɓe nuɗɗinki marki saman bana ki amin. On keɓri ki bee adilaaku Allah meeɗen e bee Yeesu Almasiihu, kisnoowo.
Mo'ere e salaaman ɗuuɗana on ngam on anndi Allah e Yeesu, Jawmiraawo meeɗen.
Allah hokkiri en koo ɗume bee baawɗe mum haa en ngeeɗa nder ngeendam e kulol maako. O hokki en ɗum ngam en anndi ewniiɗo en nder tedduŋgal mum e nder mbooɗeeŋga mum.
Bana nii o waɗani en iinaaji ɓurɗi mawnugo e ɓurɗi saman haa on laato bana Allah wa'i nde nii on daɗi suunooji kalkooji gonɗi nder duniyaaru.
Ngam maajum, tiine ngam haa nuɗɗinki mooɗon waŋgina mbooɗeeŋga e anndal e
naŋgtaare e tiinaare e kulol Allah,
yiide deerɗiraagu e yiide.
To kuuje ɗe'e ɗon nder mooɗon, to ɗe ɗon ɓesda, ɗe laatinan on tiiɗɓe haa on njaha yeeso, on ɓesda anndugo Jawmiraawo men Yeesu Almasiihu.
Ngam mo walaa ɗe, o yi'ataa daayiiɗum, o bumɗo, o yejjiti no o laɓɓinaama diga hakkeeji maako ɓooymaaji.
Ngam maajum deerɗam'en, tiine tabitingo ewnaandu e cuɓki mooɗon. To on mbaɗi non, on pergataako sam.
Bana non on keɓan nastugo laamu nduumiiŋgu ngu Jawmiraawo e Kisnoowo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu bee feecaare.
Ngam maajum, tum mi ɗon siftinora on kuuje ɗe'e. Koo to on anndi ɗe, koo to on ndari bee semmbe nder gooŋga ka on njaɓi,
ammaa mi numi ɗum kaanduɗum mi findina on bee ciftinorki ki'i nde mi ɗon bee yoŋki tawon.
Ngam mi anndi mi ɓadake accugo ɓanndu ndu'u, bana Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu anndini yam bee laaɓɗum.
Ngam maajum mi haɓdan waɗugo ko mi waawi fuu ngam on ciftora haala ka'a ɓaawo dilluki am.
Naa bee kiccaaji ƴaggiiɗi min anndiniri on baawɗe e garki Jawmiraawo men Yeesu Almasiihu. Ammaa ngam bee gite amin min ngi'i maŋngu maako!
O heɓi diga Allah Baabiraawo tedduŋgal e maŋngu yaake sawtu marɗo tedduŋgal maŋngal wi'no mo: “Oo woni
Minin, min nani sawtu man iwi haa asama, nde min ɗonno bee maako haa hooseere seniinde

Min ɗon tabiti boo dow wolde annabi'en, min njaɓi nde bilaa seko. Onon boo kakkilane nde, ngam nde laati bana pittirla njaynanka nder nyiɓre haa nyalawma waɗa, haa jayŋgol horre fajiri yayna nder ɓerɗe mooɗon.
Aran, annde ɗu'um: Walaa passitiranɗo annabaaku gonŋgu nder defte bee numo muuɗum.
Ngam walaa annabaaku meeɗi iwugo haa muuyo neɗɗo. Ammaa Ruuhu Ceniiɗo ɗowi yimɓe, ɓe mbolwi ko iwi diga Allah.

Bana no fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en ɗon caka yimɓe naane, non fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe ekkitinooɓe ngonan caka mooɗon. Ɓe ngaddan ekkitinol fewre, kalkowol, ɓe ngeddan maa Jawmiraawo mo hisni ɓe. Ngam maajum halkere heɓan ɓe law.
Koo non, ɗuuɗɓe tokkoto daakaareeku maɓɓe. Ngam daliila maɓɓe, yimɓe mbolwan kalluka dow ekkitinol gooŋgawol.
Daliila suuno, fewooɓe ɓe'e estan on bee bolle rikiciije ngam heɓugo riba. Diga naane, kiita maɓɓe taaskaama, halkere maɓɓe neeɓataa!
Koo malaa'ika'en waɗɓe hakke maa ndaɗaay, Allah sakkini ɓe haa yiite jahannama, ɓe maɓɓaama nder nyiɓre bee callalluuji, ɓe ɗon ndeena nyannde kiita.
Yimɓe ɓe duniyaaru ɓooymaaru ndaɗaay, ammaa o waddi ilam tuufaana dow duniyaaru halluɓe. Sey Nuuhu, gaazoowo adilaaku tan hisi, non boo yimɓe muuɗum njoweeɗiɗo
Allah hiiti gure Sodoma e Gomorra, nattini ɗe e laatini ɗe doɗɗe. Ɗum laatani halluɓe ɓe'e misaalu ko tammi heɓugo ɓe
O hisni Ludu, goɗɗo adiliijo, cuniiɗo daliila gikku daakaareeku ngu yedduɓe ɓe'e
Ngam adiliijo oo ɗonno jooɗodi bee maɓɓe, halleende maɓɓe nde o yi'i e o nani ɗonno torra ɓernde maako masin.
Ammaa Jawmiraawo anndi no hisnirta hulɓe mo diga jarribeeki. O anndi boo no o aynirta halluɓe ngam haa o hiito ɓe nyannde kiita,
sakkonta yiɗɓe coɓki, tokkiiɓe suunooji ɓanndu, yawiiɓe baawɗe Allah.
Fewooɓe ɓe'e, ɓe kulataa, ɓe elewɓe, ɓe ɗon njawo tedduɓe asama, ɓe ɗon kuɗa ɓe.
Koo malaa'ika'en ɓuranɓe ɓe maŋngu e baawɗe maa ngullataako e kuuɗataa mawɓe asama yeeso Jawmiraawo.
Ammaa kamɓe ɓe nanndi bee kuuje ladde, ɗe ngalaa hakkiilo, ɗe tagaama ngam naŋngeego e mbareego, ɓe ɗon kuɗa ɗum ko ɓe paamataa. Ɓe halketeeɓe bana kuuje ladde,

ɓe torreteeɓe bana ɓe torriri woɗɓe, ɗum laatoto ngeenaari sooynde adilaaku maɓɓe. Ɓe ɗon ceyo humtugo suunooji ɓalli maɓɓe yeeso yimɓe. Ɓe ɗon nyaamda bee mooɗon nder juulɗe, ɓe ɗon ceyoro zammba maɓɓe.
Ɓe ɗon keewi suuno to ɓe ngi'i rewɓe fuu, ɓe comataa waɗugo hakke sam. Ɓe ɗon esta tampuɓe. Ɓerɗe maɓɓe keewi suuno, ɓe naalaaɓe!
Ɓe acci laawol gooŋga, ɓe majji, ɓe tokki laawol Balaama ɓii Be'or, giɗɗo ngeenaari sooynde adilaaku,
ammaa o felaama ngam boofol maako. Ngam wamnde wolwani mo bee sawtu neɗɗo koo to nde wolwataa no, nde haɗi faataare annabiijo oo
Yimɓe ɓe'e nanndi bee ɓulndu yoorndu, ɓe nanndi bee duule ɗe henndu soggata. Nyiɓre ɓurdunde nyiɓɓugo ɗon reeni ɓe.
Bee bolle meereeje, elewɗe masin e bee suunooji cemtiniiɗi, ɓe ɗon esta daɗɓe yeeɗanɓe nder majjere bee daker.
Ɓe ɗon iino ɓe ndimu, asee boo kamɓe maa ɓe maccuɓe gikkuuji kalkooji. Ngam ko jaali goɗɗo fuu, laatini ɗum maccuɗo maajum.
To yimɓe ngurtake coɓe duniyaaru ngam ɓe anndi Jawmiraawo e Kisnoowo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu, nden ɓe ndokki ɗe laawol fahin, ɗe njaali ɓe, joonde maɓɓe jontaare halli ɓuri nde naane.
Ndikkano ɓe to ɓe meeɗaayno anndugo laawol adilaaku dow anndugo ngol e accugo umroore maagol seniinde nde ɓe anndinaama!
Ko waɗi ɓe, gooŋɗini balndol ngo'ol: “Rawaandu lorake haa tuure mum” malla: “Gaduuru yiiwaandu lorake, talliti nder loope
Yiɗaaɓe am, kaŋgol woni bataakewol ɗiɗaɓol ngol mi winndani on. Nder bataakeeji ɗiɗi fuu mi yiɗi ummingo numo wooɗŋgo nder mooɗon bee ciftinorki ki'i.
Mi yiɗi on ciftora bolle ɗe annabi'en senaaɓe aarti mbolwi e umroore Jawmiraawo e Kisnoowo, nde nelaaɓe mooɗon ngaddani on.
Aran, annde ɗu'um: Nder balɗe ragareeje jaancooɓe tokkiiɓe suunooji muuɗum'en ngaran
ɓe mbi'an: “O wi'no o waran, naa non na? Toy mo? Kaakiraaɓe meeɗen maayi jonta, ammaa walaa ko sannji, koo ɗume fuu ɗon bana haa fuɗɗam tageeki!”
Ɓe ngooyti bee anniya no diga ɓooyma asama ɗon, lesdi boo iwi haa ndiyam. Allah tagri ndi diga ndiyam bee wolde maako
kadiboo o halkiri duniyaaru naane bee ndiyam, ɗam moɗi ndu
Bee wolde man nden asama e lesdi jonta ndesaama ngam yiite, nyannde nde Allah tammi waɗugo kiita e o nattina halluɓe.
Yiɗaaɓe am, taa ngejjite ɗu'um: Ngam Jawmiraawo kam, nyalaade woore ɗon bana duuɓi ujineere e duuɓi ujineere boo ɗon bana nyalaade woore
Woɗɓe ɗon numa Jawmiraawo ɗon neeɓa waɗugo ko o iinino. Ammaa o ɗon munyana on ngam o yiɗaa koo moy halka, o yiɗi yimɓe fuu tuuba.
Koo non fuu, nyalaade Jawmiraawo waran bana gujjo. Nyannde man, asamanji majjan bee hoolo kulniiŋgo, koode asama boo kalkiran bee yiite, lesdi bee ko woni ton fuu boo majjan
Nde nii kuuje ɗe'e fuu kalkan bana non, on anndi haani on njooɗo nder senaare e nder kulol Allah,
haa nyalaade Allah nde ndeenoton wara law. Nyannde man asamanji ngulete, kalkete, koode boo ɓolwan bee yiite.
Ammaa Allah iini o hokkan en asamanji kesi e lesdi kesri haa adilaaku wonata. Kanjum en ndeenata
Ngam man yiɗaaɓe am, nde nii on ɗon ndeena ɗum, kaɓde jooɗaago on laaɓɓe, bilaa aybe yeeso Allah haa on njooɗo nder salaaman bee maako.
Paame no munyal Jawmiraawo meeɗen heɓani on laawol hisugo. Pol, deerɗiraawo meeɗen giɗaaɗo, winndani on haala ka'a fodde hikma ka Allah hokki mo.

O winndi ɗum nder bataakeeji maako fuu haa o wolwi dow haala ka'a. Woodi haalaaji caɗɗi nder maaji. Sooya-faamu'en e tampuɓe ɗon ngaylita maana maaji, bana no ɓe mbaɗata aayaaje defte Allah goɗɗe. Bana nii ɓe ɗon ngaddana ko'e maɓɓe halkere.
Ammaa onon yiɗaaɓe, on ndeentinaama. Ngam man kakkile, taa pewe yedduɓe ɓe'e esta on haa on cotta diga nuɗɗinki tabitki ki on mari.
Ammaa mawne nder mo'ere e anndal Jawmiraawo e Kisnoowo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu. Tedduŋgal laatano mo diga jonta haa foroy. Aamiina!
Min ɗon mbinndana on dow Wolde hokkannde ngeendam, wonnoonde diga fuɗɗam, ko min nani, ko min ngi'i bee gite amin, ko min ndaari e ko min meemi bee juuɗe amin
Ngam ngeendam man waŋgi, min ngi'i ɗam, min ɗon ceedo ɗam, min ɗon anndina on ngeendam nduumiiɗam ngonnooɗam kommbi Baabiraawo e ɗam waŋgani min
Ko min ngi'i e ko min nani, kanjum min anndinta on, onon boo, ngam haa on kawta bee amin nder kawtal amin bee Baabiraawo e bee
Kanjum min ɗon mbinndana on ɗum ngam haa seyo meeɗen heewa.
Ndaa kubaruwol ngol min nani haa Yeesu Almasiihu, kaŋgol min anndinta on: Allah o annoora, walaa nyiɓre nder maako koo seɗɗa.
To en mbi'i en ɗon nder kawtal bee maako, ammaa en ɗon ngeeɗa nder nyiɓre, nden kam en pewi, en kuuwaay bana no gooŋga yiɗi.
Ammaa to en ɗon ngeeɗa nder annoora bana Allah bee hoore mum ɗon nder annoora, nden kam en ngoodi kawtal caka meeɗen e ƴiiƴam Yeesu,
To en mbi'i en ngalaa hakke, en pewani ko'e meeɗen, gooŋga walaa nder meeɗen.
Ammaa to en mbaŋgini hakkeeji meeɗen yeeso Allah, kaŋko o koolaaɗo, adiliijo, o yaafanto en hakkeeji meeɗen, o laɓɓinan en diga sooynde adilaaku meeɗen fuu.
To en mbi'i en mbaɗaay hakke, en pewni Allah, wolde maako walaa nder meeɗen.
Ɓikkoy am, mi ɗon winndana on ɗu'um ngam taa on mbaɗa hakke. Ammaa to goɗɗo waɗi hakke, en ngoodi ceettoowo haa kommbi Baabiraawo, ɗum Yeesu Almasiihu, kaŋko o adiliijo.
Ngam Almasiihu bee hoore mum hokki yoŋki muuɗum ngam yaafuye hakkeeji meeɗen, naa ɗi meeɗen tan, ammaa ɗi duniyaaru fuu boo.
To en ɗowtanake umrooje Allah, nden kam en paami en anndi mo fakat.
To goɗɗo wi'i: Mi anndi Allah, ammaa o ɗowtantaako umrooje maako, nden kam o pewoowo, gooŋga walaa nder maako.
Ammaa ɗowtantooɗo wolde Allah, fakat yiide Allah timmunde ɗon nder muuɗum. Bana nii anndirten en ɗon nder kawtal bee Allah.
Bi'ɗo o ɗon nder kawtal bee Allah, sey o yeeɗa bana no Yeesu Almasiihu yeeɗiri.
Yiɗaaɓe am, ko mi winndanta on, naa ɗum umroore hesre, ammaa ɗum umroore ɓooymaare nde on keɓi diga fuɗɗam. Umroore ɓooymaare nde'e, ɗum wolde nde on nani
Koo non boo, umroore nde mbinndanmi on nde hesre, ɗum laaɓani Almasiihu e ɗum laaɓani on boo. Ngam nyiɓre ɗon saalo, annoora gooŋgaha fuɗɗi yaynugo.
To goɗɗo wi'i o ɗon nder annoora, ammaa o ɗon wanya deerɗiiko, nden kam haa jonta o ɗon nder nyiɓre.
Giɗɗo deerɗum ɗon jooɗi nder annoora, walaa daliila fergere nder maako.
Ammaa ganyɗo deerɗum, ɗon nder nyiɓre, o ɗon yaha nder nyiɓre, o anndaa toy o yahata ngam nyiɓre wumni mo.
Mi ɗon winndana on, onon ɓikkoy. Ngam daliila innde Yeesu Almasiihu hakkeeji mooɗon njaafaama.
Mi ɗon winndana on, onon baabiraaɓe, ngam on anndi mo ɗon diga fuɗɗam. Mi ɗon winndana on, onon derke'en, ngam on njaalake Kalluɗo
Mi winndani on, onon ɓikkoy, ngam on anndi Baabiraawo.
Mi winndani on, onon baabiraaɓe, ngam on anndi mo ɗon diga fuɗɗam.
Mi winndani on, onon derke'en, ngam on semmbiɗɓe, wolde Allah ɗon tabiti nder mooɗon, on njaalake Kalluɗo.
Taa ngiɗe duniyaaru ndu'u e kuuje maaru fuu. To goɗɗo yiɗi duniyaaru, o walaa yiide ngam Baabiraawo nder maako.
Ngam ko woni nder duniyaaru fuu, ɗum suuno ɓanndu, suunaago ko gite ngi'ata e mawnitaago bee risku mum, ɗum fuu ɗum iwaay haa Baabiraawo, ammaa haa duniyaaru ɗum iwi.
Duniyaaru bee ko suunete nder maaru fuu caaloto. Ammaa ɗowtantooɗo muuyo Allah yeeɗan haa foroy.
Ɓikkoy am, saa'iire ragareere yottake! On nanino konneejo Almasiihu waran. Jonta ndaa konne'en Almasiihu ɗuuɗɓe ngari, ngam maajum en anndi saa'iire ragareere yottake.

Caka meeɗen yimɓe ɓe'e ngurti, ammaa ɓe laataakino ɓe meeɗen. Ngam to ɓe laatino ɓe meeɗen bee gooŋga, ɓe tokkotono jooɗodaago bee meeɗen. Ammaa ɓe acci en ngam haa ɗum waŋga laaɓɗum no fuu maɓɓe ɓe laataakino ɓe meeɗen.
Ammaa onon, on fuu on ngoodi anndal, ngam on keɓi Ruuhu diga Ceniiɗo.
Mi winndani on, naa ngam on anndaa gooŋga, ammaa ngam on anndi ka e on anndi boo fewre iwataa diga gooŋga.
Moy woni pewoowo, to naa mo yeddi Yeesu woni Almasiihu? Mo yeddi Baabiraawo e
Koo moy yeddi Ɓiɗɗo, yeddi Baabiraawo boo. Mo seedi o anndi Ɓiɗɗo, anndi Baabiraawo boo.
Ngam man, onon kam, sey on njogo ko on nani diga fuɗɗam. To ko on nani diga fuɗɗam tabiti nder ɓerɗe mooɗon, onon boo on tabitan nder kawtal bee
Ndaa iinawol ngol o iinani en: Ɗum ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Mi winndani on ɗu'um dow ɗaɓɓanɓe selnugo on.

Ammaa onon, Ruuhu mo keɓɗon diga Almasiihu ɗon jooɗi nder mooɗon, on ngalaa haaje goɗɗo ekkitina on, ngam Ruuhu go ɗon ekkitina on koo ɗume fuu, ɗon ekkitina gooŋga, naa fewre. Ngam maajum mbaɗe ko o ekkitini on, tabite nder kawtal bee Almasiihu.
Jonta, ɓikkoy am, tabite nder kawtal bee Almasiihu ngam haa en mara hoolɗinaare to o waŋgi, taa en cemta yeeso maako nyannde loraaki maako.
Nde on anndi Almasiihu o adiliijo, anndite boo, koo moy huuwi kuuɗe adiliije, laatake ɓiŋngel Allah.
Ndaare no Baabiraawo yiɗiri en, haa en mbi'aama ɓikkoy Allah! Gooŋga en ɓikkoy maako. Ngam man duniyaaru anndaa en ngam ndu anndaa Allah
Yiɗaaɓe am, jonta en laatake ɓikkoy Allah. Ko en tammi laataago waŋgaay tawon. Ammaa en anndi to Almasiihu waŋgi, en nanndan bee maako, ngam en ngi'an mo bana no o wa'i.
Koo moy tammake ɗum, laɓɓinan hoore mum bana Yeesu Almasiihu o laaɓɗo.
Baɗɗo hakke fuu tuurtani umroore Allah, ngam hakke ɗum tuurtango umroore Allah.
Ammaa on anndi Almasiihu wari ngam ittugo hakkeeji. Kaŋko, walaa hakke nder maako sam
Mo ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee Almasiihu fuu waɗataa hakke, ammaa baɗoowo hakke meeɗaay yi'ugo mo, meeɗaay anndugo mo boo.
Ɓikkoy am, taa goɗɗo selna on. Baɗoowo adilaaku, o adiliijo bana Almasiihu o adiliijo.
Baɗoowo hakke fuu laatake mo Iblisa, ngam diga fuɗɗam, Iblisa ɗon waɗa hakke. Ngam man Ɓiɗɗo Allah wari ngam nattingo kuuɗe Iblisa.
Laatiiɗo ɓiŋngel Allah fuu waɗataa hakke, ngam ko Allah aawi ɗon jooɗi nder maako. O waawataa waɗugo hakke, ngam o laati ɓiŋngel Allah.
Ammaa mo huuwataa kuuɗe adiliije, mo ɗon wanya deerɗiraawo mum fuu, o danyaakaa e Allah. Bana nii goɗɗo senndindirta ɓikkoy Allah bee koy Iblisa.
Ndaa kubaruwol ngol on nani diga fuɗɗam: “Ngiɗindiren
Taa en mbaɗa bana Kayinu mo mbari deerɗum ngam o laati mo Kalluɗo
Deerɗam'en, taa kayɗine to duniyaaru ɗon wanya on.
En anndi en ngurtake diga maayde, en nasti ngeendam, ngam en ngiɗi deerɗiraaɓe men. Ammaa mo walaa yiide, o ɗon jooɗi nder maayde tawon
Ganyɗo deerɗum fuu o mbaroowo ko'e. On anndi ngeendam nduumiiɗam wonataa nder mbaroowo ko'e.
Almasiihu hokki yoŋki muuɗum ngam meeɗen. Bee maajum en paami ko woni yiide. Enen boo, sey en ndokka yoŋkiiji meeɗen ngam deerɗiraaɓe meeɗen.
To marɗo yi'i haaje deerɗum, ammaa o sali enɗugo ɗum, bana noy yiide Allah tabitirta nder maako?
Ɓikkoy am, taa yiide meeɗen laato bee bolle tan. Ammaa nde laato yiide gooŋgaare, waŋgannde nder kuuɗe.
Bee maajum anndirten en ɗon tokki gooŋga. Kanjum waɗi ɓerɗe meeɗen nde'ititto yeeso Allah.
Ngam to ɓerɗe meeɗen aybini en, en anndi Allah ɓuri ɓerɗe meeɗen, ngam o anndi koo ɗume fuu.
Yiɗaaɓe am, to ɓerɗe meeɗen aybinaay en, en maran hoolɗinaare yeeso Allah,
en keɓan haa maako ko en toroto mo fuu, ngam en ɗon ɗowtano umrooje maako, en ɗon mbaɗa ko fottani mo.
Ndaa ko o umri: En nuɗɗina innde Yeesu Almasiihu,

Ɗowtaniiɗo umrooje ɗe'e ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee Allah, Allah boo ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee maako. Bana nii anndirten Allah ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee meeɗen, en anndi ɗum bee Ruuhu maako mo o hokki en.
Yiɗaaɓe am, taa nuɗɗine ruuhuuji koo ɗiye fuu. Sey on poonda ɗi, on paama to ɗi iwi haa Allah. Ngam fewooɓe wi'anɓe ɓe annabi'en ɗuuɗɓe ngari nder duniyaaru.
Ndaa bana nii anndirton Ruuhu Allah: To goɗɗo seedake Yeesu Almasiihu wari bee ɓanndu neɗɗo fuu, nden kam ruuhu maako iwi haa Allah.
Ammaa to o yeddi Yeesu, nden kam ruuhu maako iwaay haa Allah, ɗum ruuhu konneejo Almasiihu. On nani ngu waran, ndaa jonta ngu ɗon nder duniyaaru.
Ammaa onon ɓikkoy am, on laati yimɓe Allah, on njaalake fewooɓe go, ngam gonɗo nder mooɗon ɓuri gonɗo nder duniyaaru baawɗe.
Kamɓe, ɓe yimɓe duniyaaru, ngam maajum ɓe ɗon mbolwa haalaaji duniyaaru. Ngam man yimɓe duniyaaru ɗon nana ɓe.
Ammaa enen en yimɓe Allah. Annduɗo Allah nanan en. Mo laataaki mo Allah, nanantaa en. Bana nii en cenndindirta Ruuhu gooŋga bee ruuhu fewre.
Yiɗaaɓe am, ngiɗindiren, ngam yiide iwi haa Allah. Marɗo yiide o ɓiŋngel Allah, o anndi Allah.
Mo walaa yiide, anndaa Allah, ngam Allah o yiide.
Ndaa no yiide Allah waŋgirani en: Allah neli
Ndaa ko woni yiide: Naa enen ngiɗi Allah, ammaa kaŋko yiɗi en, o neli en Ɓiɗɗo maako ngam yaafuye hakkeeji meeɗen.
Yiɗaaɓe am, nde Allah yiɗi en bana nii, haani ngiɗindiren, enen boo.
Walaa mo meeɗi yi'ugo Allah. To en ngiɗindira, nden kam Allah wondan bee meeɗen, yiide maako laatoto timmunde nder meeɗen
Allah hokki en Ruuhu muuɗum, kanjum hollata en ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee maako, kaŋko boo o ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee meeɗen.
Minin, min ngi'i, min ɗon ceedo Baabiraawo neli
Mo seedi Yeesu woni Ɓiɗɗo Allah fuu, Allah ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee maako, kaŋko boo o ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee Allah.
Enen kam en anndi yiide Allah ngam meeɗen, en nuɗɗini ɗum.
Allah o yiide. Tabitɗo nder yiide ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee Allah, Allah boo ɗon tabiti nder kawtal bee maako.
To en ɗon bee yiide timmunde, en keɓan hoolɗinaare nyalaade kiita, bana no o wa'i, non ngoneten nder duniyaaru boo.
Marɗo yiide hulataa, ngam yiide timmunde ittan kulol. Ngam kulol ɗon hawti bee yaŋgada. Kulanɗo wonaay nder yiide timmunde.
Enen en ɗon ngiɗindira, ngam Allah aarti yiɗugo en.
To goɗɗo wi'i: Mi yiɗi Allah, ammaa ɗon wanya deerɗum, o pewoowo. Ngam to o yiɗaa deerɗiiko mo o yi'ata, noy o waawrata yiɗugo Allah mo o yi'aay?
Ndaa umroore nde Almasiihu umri en: Mo yiɗi Allah, sey o yiɗa deerɗiiko boo.
Koo moy nuɗɗini Yeesu woni
Bana nii anndirten en ngiɗi ɓikkoy Allah: To en ngiɗi Allah e to en ɗowtanake umrooje maako boo.
Ngam yiɗugo Allah, ɗum ɗowtanaago umrooje maako. Ɗowtanaago umrooje maako boo ɓurataa en semmbe
ngam ɓiŋngel Allah fuu jaalake duniyaaru. Bee nuɗɗinki meeɗen njaalortooɗen duniyaaru.
Moy woni jaaliiɗo duniyaaru? Sey nuɗɗinɗo Yeesu woni

Yeesu Almasiihu wari bee ndiyam baptisma muuɗum e bee ƴiiƴam maayde muuɗum boo. O waraay bee ndiyam tan, ammaa bee ndiyam e ƴiiƴam. Ruuhu bee hoore muuɗum ɗon seeda haala ka'a, ngam Ruuhu woni gooŋga.
Ngam woodi seedamkuuji tati:
Seedamku Ruuhu e ngu ndiyam e ngu ƴiiƴam. Seedamkuuji man tati fuu njahdi.
En ɗon njaɓa seedamku yimɓe, ammaa seedamku Allah ɓuri mawnugo. Ngam kaŋgu laati seedamku ngu Allah seedi dow
Koo moy nuɗɗini Ɓiɗɗo Allah, woodi seedamku ngu'u nder ɓernde muuɗum. Ammaa mo nuɗɗinaay Allah, o fewni Allah, ngam o nuɗɗinaay seedamku ngu Allah seedi dow Ɓiɗɗo muuɗum.
Ndaa seedamku ngu'u: Allah hokki en ngeendam nduumiiɗam, ngeendam ɗa'am ɗon nder Ɓiyiiko
Koo moy jaɓi Ɓiɗɗo Allah woodi ngeendam, mo jaɓaay Ɓiɗɗo Allah, o walaa ngeendam.
Onon nuɗɗinɓe innde
En ɗon bee hoolɗinaare haa yeeso Allah, en anndi o nanan en, to en torake mo koo ɗume fodde muuyo maako.
To nii en anndi o ɗon nana en to en torake mo koo ɗume fuu, en anndi boo en keɓi ko en tori mo.

To goɗɗo yi'i deerɗum ɗon waɗa hakkewol ngol yahrataa mo haa maayde, sey o tora Allah, Allah boo hokkan mo ngeendam. Haala ka'a laarani waɗooɓe hakkewol ngol yahrataa ɓe haa maayde. Ammaa woodi hakkewol jahranŋgol goɗɗo haa maayde. Mi wi'aay on toro Allah ngam maagol.
Kala sooynde adilaaku fuu ɗum hakke, ammaa woodi hakkewol ngol yahrataa goɗɗo haa maayde.
En anndi ɓiŋngel Allah fuu waɗataa hakke, ngam
En anndi en laati yimɓe Allah, koo nde duniyaaru fuu ɗon les baawɗe Kalluɗo.
En anndi boo
Ɓikkoy am, ndeente e labbi.
Min ndottiijo, mi ɗon winndana mayramjo
ngam gooŋga ɗon nder meeɗen e ka wondan bee meeɗen haa foroy.
Mo'ere e hinnuye e salaaman Allah Baabiraawo e Yeesu Almasiihu
Mi seyi masin nde mi tawi ɓikkoy ma ngoɗkoy ɗon tokki gooŋga fodde umroore nde en keɓi diga Baabiraawo.
Jonta mi ɗon toro ma, an mayramjo, naa bana umroore hesre mi winndani ma, ammaa ɗum umroore nde en keɓi diga fuɗɗam: Ngiɗindiren
Yeeɗugo fodde umrooje Allah, kanjum woni yiide. Ɗum umroore nde on nani diga fuɗɗam, haa ngeeɗon fodde maare.
Ngam fewooɓe ɗuuɗɓe ɗon caŋkiti nder duniyaaru. Ɓe njaɓataa wi'go Yeesu Almasiihu laati neɗɗo fakat. Irin yimɓe ɓe'e, ɓe fewooɓe e konne'en Almasiihu.
Kakkilane ko'e mooɗon, ngam taa on majjina nafuuda kuugal amin ngam mooɗon, ammaa haa on keɓa mbarjaari mooɗon fuu.
Mo jogaaki ekkitinol Almasiihu, luuti ngol, o walaa kawtal bee Allah. Ammaa mo jogi ekkitinol ngo'ol, o ɗon nder kawtal bee Baabiraawo e
To goɗɗo wari haa mooɗon e o waddanaay on ekkitinol Almasiihu, taa njaɓɓe mo haa ci'e
Ngam to goɗɗo hoofni mo, o hawti bee maako nder halleende.
Woodi kuuje ɗuuɗɗe ɗe ngiɗmi winndango on, ammaa mi yiɗaa winndugo ɗe dow ɗereewol. Mi ɗon tammo yahugo haa mooɗon e yeewtididgo bee mooɗon hunnduko bee hunnduko, ngam haa seyo hebbina ɓerɗe meeɗen.
Ɓikkoy deerɗiraawo ma cuɓaaɗo koofni ma.
Min ndottiijo, mi ɗon winndana soobaajo am Gayus mo ngiɗmi bee gooŋga bataakewol ngo'ol
Soobaajo am giɗaaɗo, mi ɗon yelano ma hayru nder koo ɗume fuu, a yamɗa bana no ɓernde ma boo ɗon ɓesdoro nder hayru.
Mi seyi masin nde deerɗiraaɓe ngari, ceedi gooŋga maaɗa, no a yeeɗiri nder gooŋga.
Walaa ko ɓuri seynugo yam bana nanugo ɓikkoy am ɗon ngeeɗa nder gooŋga.
Soobaajo am giɗaaɗo, a ɗon huuwa bee gooŋgaaku ngam wallugo deerɗiraaɓe, koo jananɓe.
Kamɓe ceedi haala yiide maaɗa yeeso jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe. Ɗum wooɗan to a walli ɓe dow haaje jahaaŋgal maɓɓe bana ko fottanta Allah.
Ngam ɓe ɗon mbaɗa jahaaŋgal nga'al ngam Almasiihu, bilaa jaɓugo koo ɗume diga tampa-diina'en.
Enen boo, sey en njaɓɓo irin yimɓe ɓe'e, ngam haa en kuuwda bee maɓɓe nder kuugal nuɗɗinki.
Woodi ko mi winndani jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe, ammaa Diyoterefes mo yiɗi laataago mawɗo nder jama'aare man, jaɓɓaaki min.

Ngam man, to mi wari, mi waŋginan kuuɗe ɗe o huuwi, waato pewe e bolle kalluɗe ɗe o wolwata dow amin. Naa kanjum tan, ammaa o jaɓɓataako deerɗiraaɓe to ɓe ngari, o ɗon haɗa yiɗɓe jaɓɓaago ɓe, o ɗon faarta ɓe diga jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe.
Soobaajo am giɗaaɗo, taa tokka halleende, ammaa tokka mbooɗeeŋga. Baɗanɗo mbooɗeeŋga woni goɗɗo Allah, baɗanɗo halleende meeɗaay anndugo Allah.
Yimɓe fuu ngerdi Demetiriyus. Koo fodde gooŋgaaku boo o booɗɗo. Nden minin boo min ɗon ceedo ɗum. A anndi seedamku amin, ɗum gooŋga.
Woodi kuuje ɗuuɗɗe ɗe mi yiɗi winndango ma, ammaa mi yiɗaa winndugo ɗe dow ɗereewol.
Mi tammi en ngiidan nii seɗɗa. En ngeewtidan hunnduko bee hunnduko.
Salaaman laatano ma!
Soobiraaɓe ma koofni ma. An boo hoofnu soobiraaɓe meeɗen haa ton gooto gooto.
Min Yahuuda, maccuɗo Yeesu Almasiihu, deerɗiraawo Yaakuba, mi ɗon winndana on onon ewnaaɓe, yiɗaaɓe Allah Baabiraawo e aynaaɓe Yeesu Almasiihu
Hinnuye e salaaman e yiide ɗuuɗana on.

Soobiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, mi yelino masin winndango on dow haala kisndam ɗam en fuu en kawti nder muuɗum. Ngam maajum, doole mi winndana on ngam suusɗingo on nder haɓre ngam nuɗɗinki ki Allah hokki yimɓe muuɗum nde woore, ki he'i haa foroy.

Ngam halluɓe corkake caka mooɗon. Kiita dow maɓɓe winndaama diga ɓooyma. Ɓe ngayli habaru mo'ere Allah ngam ɓe keɓa hujja waɗugo daakaareeku, ɓe ngeddi Yeesu Almasiihu mo woni Jawmiraawo e jaagorɗo meeɗen feere muuɗum.
Koo nde on anndi kuuje ɗe'e fuu, mi yiɗi siftinorgo on no Jawmiraawo hisniri Isra'iila'en diga lesdi Misra, ammaa ɓaawoɗon o halki ɓe ngam ɓe nuɗɗinaay mo

Ciftore haala malaa'ika'en ƴaɓɓuɓe keerol baawɗe ɗe Allah hokkuno ɓe, ɓe acci joonde maɓɓe. Allah maɓɓi ɓe nder nyiɓre les, haɓɓi ɓe bee callalluuji ɗi piistataake haa foroy. Ɓe ɗon ndeena nyannde kiita maɓɓe ton.

Bana non boo Sodoma e Gomorra bee berniiji piltuɗi. Yimɓe maaji mbaɗi bana malaa'ika'en go mbaɗi, ɓe tokki waɗugo daakaareeku, ɓe mbaɗi baaldal ngal luuti ɗabiya. Kiita yiite duumiiŋge ɗon torra ɓe, ɗum laati deentinki ngam yimɓe fuu
Bana nii boo, yimɓe sorkuɓe caka mooɗon go, nder raayu maɓɓe, ɓe ɗon coɓna ɓalli maɓɓe. Ɓe ɗon njawo baawɗe Allah, ɓe ɗon mbolwa kalluka dow tedduɓe asama.
Koo Mika'iilu, mawɗo malaa'ika'en, saa'i o waabotiri bee Sayɗaanu dow ɓanndu Muusa, o huli wolwugo kalluka dow maako, ngam maajum o wi'i mo: “Jawmiraawo telɓane
Ammaa yimɓe ɓe'e ɓe ɗon mbolwa kalluka dow ko ɓe paamaay. Ɓe ngalaa hakkiilo bana dabbaaji, ko suunooji maɓɓe anndinta ɓe, kanjum yahrata ɓe haa halkere.
Kayto! Bone laatanto ɓe ngam ɓe tokkake laawol Kayinu. Kadiboo ɓe njoofi ko'e maɓɓe nder majjere ngam heɓugo ceede bana ko Balaama waɗno. Ɓe tuurti bana Koora tuurtirno, ɓe kalki

Saa'i on ɗon nyaamda, ɓe ɗon njiiɓa kawtal mooɗon, ɓe cemtataa sam, ɓe ɗon kebbina deeɗi maɓɓe tan. Ɓe nanndi bee duule ɗe henndu soggata meere, ɗe ngalaa iyeende. Ɓe nanndi bee leɗɗe ɗe ndimataa koo to saa'i rimugo yottake. Ɓe nanndi bee leɗɗe ɗoofaaɗe, baatɗe.

Ɓe nanndi bee ƴuuge caatuɗe haa maayo, ɓe ɗon mbaŋgina kuuɗe maɓɓe cemtiniiɗe bana nguufo ƴuuge man. Ɓe nanndi bee koode majjuɗe ɗe anndaa laabi maaje. Allah taaskani ɓe nokkuure nder nyiɓre ɓurannde nyiɓɓugo haa foroy.
Anuhu mo yeeɗi nder yidere joweeɗiɗawre haa danygol Aadamu, waɗi annabaaku dow maɓɓe diga ɓooyma, o wi'i: “Ndaa, Jawmiraawo waran bee malaa'ika'en muuɗum senaaɓe ujineeje ɗuuɗɗe
ngam o hiito yimɓe fuu. O hiitoto hakke'en, yedduɓe Allah fuu fodde kuuɗe maɓɓe kalluɗe fuu, o hiitoto ɓe ngam bolle maɓɓe elewɗe ɗe ɓe mbolwi dow maako fuu!”
Yimɓe ɓe'e ɗon ngurŋgurto, ɓe ɗon ciŋka, ɓe ɗon tokko suunooji maɓɓe, kunnduɗe maɓɓe ɗon keewi bolle mawnitiiɗe, ɓe ɗon njobbito yimɓe ngam ɓe keɓa ko ɓe ngiɗi.
Ammaa onon, soobiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, ciftore ko nelaaɓe Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu ngeccuno on diga ɓooyma.
Ngam ɓe ɗonno mbi'a on: “Haa balɗe ragareeje, jancooɓe mbaŋgan, ɓe njancan on, ɓe tokkoto suunooji maɓɓe kalluɗi
Yimɓe ɓe'e mbaɗan cennduki caka yimɓe. Sey ɗabiya maɓɓe tan ɓe tokkoto, ɓe ngalaa Ruuhu Allah.
Ammaa onon, soobiraaɓe am yiɗaaɓe, cemmbiɗine ko'e mooɗon nder ekkitinol ɓurŋgol senaago ngol on ekkiti. Tore bee baawɗe Ruuhu Ceniiɗo,
tabite nder yiide Allah, nde on ɗon ndeena haa Jawmiraawo meeɗen Yeesu Almasiihu hinno on, hokka on ngeendam nduumiiɗam.
Njurmine sekanɓe.
Woɗɓe, mbifte ɓe diga yiite, kisne ɓe. Woɗɓe boo, njurmine ɓe, ammaa ndeente bee maɓɓe, taa meeme koo limce maɓɓe ngam taa coɓki maɓɓe raaɓa on.

Tedduŋgal e maŋngu e laamu e baawɗe laatano Allah gooto, kisnoowo en bee Yeesu Almasiihu Jawmiraawo meeɗen, baawɗo aynugo on ngam taa on ndo'o, haa on mbaŋga on seyiiɓe, laaɓɓe yeeso tedduŋgal maako, diga zamanuuji ciwaa, non boo jonta e haa foroy. Aamiina!
Ndaa wahayu mo Allah hokki Yeesu Almasiihu ngam anndingo jaggiiɓe mum ko ɓadi wargo bee doole. Ngam maajum Almasiihu neli malaa'ikaajo muuɗum ngam anndingo ɗum jaggiiɗo muuɗum Yuhanna.
Yuhanna seedi ko o yi'i fuu, ɗum wolde Allah e seedamku Yeesu Almasiihu.
Barka laatanto jaŋnganɗo deftere nde'e e nananɓe bolle annabaaku ngu'u, tokkiiɓe ko winnda nder maare! Ngam wakkatiire nde kuuje ɗe'e laatoto ɓadake wargo.
Min Yuhanna, mi ɗon winndana jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe joweeɗiɗi haa lesdi Asiya:
Mo'ere e salaaman laatano on diga Allah, mo ɗon, mo ɗonno ɓooyma, mo ɗon wara boo e diga ruuhuuji joweeɗiɗi gonɗi yeeso leeso laamu maako
e diga Yeesu Almasiihu, ceedoowo gooŋgaajo, ummitinaaɗo arano nder maayɓe, mawɗo laamlaamɓe duniyaaru boo.
Kaŋko o yiɗi en. O rimɗini en diga hakkeeji meeɗen bee ƴiiƴam maako
o laatini en ummaatoore laamu maako e liman'en Allah, Baabiraawo maako. Tedduŋgal e baawɗe laatano mo haa abada abadin. Aamiina
Ndaa, o ɗon warda bee duule! Koo moy fuu yi'an mo, koo yuwɓe mo boo. Yimɓe asli nder duniyaaru fuu mboyan ngam daliila maako. Nii ɗum laatorto. Aamiina
Jawmiraawo Allah wi'i: “Min woni Alfa e Omega
Min Yuhanna, deerɗiraawo mooɗon, kawtuɗo bee mooɗon nder torra e laamu Allah e tiiɗal nder Yeesu, mi ɗonno haa duunde wi'eteende Patmos ngam daliila wolde Allah e seedamku Yeesu.
Nyalaade Jawmiraawo
ɗon wi'a: “Ko ngi'ata, winndu ɗum nder deftere, neldu ɗum haa jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe joweeɗiɗi gonɗe haa Efesus e Simirna e Pergame e Tiyatira e Sardis e Filadelfiya e Lawdikiya.”
Mi wayliti haa mi laara mo ɗon wolwanammi. Nden mi yi'i jo'inirɗe pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri.
Caka jo'inirɗe ɗe'e, ngi'mi goɗɗo nannduɗo bee neɗɗo ɗon ɓorni limce juutɗe haa njotti teppe, o ɗon haɓɓi wiɓɓere maako bee taadorgol kaŋŋeeri
Hoore e gaasa hoore maako ɗon ndanwi tal bana hottollo raneeho e bana mallimallooje. Gite maako njayni bana ɗemŋgal yiite
kosɗe maako ɗelki bana njamndi mboɗeeri ɓolinaandi nder yiite. Sawtu maako nanndi bee hoolo ndiyamji diirtotooɗi haa maayo bee semmbe
O ɗon jogi koode joweeɗiɗi haa juŋngo maako nyaamo, kaafahi ceeɓki, marki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi wurti hunnduko maako. Yeeso maako ɗon yayna bana naaŋge yaynirta caka nyalawma.
Nde mi yi'i mo, mi do'i yeeso maako bana maayɗo. O wallini juŋngo maako nyaamo dow hoore am, o wi'i: “Taa hul! Min woni arano e ragareejo
Mi geeto! Mi maayino, ammaa ndaa, mi geeto haa abada abadin. Mi woodi baawɗe dow maayde e dow joonde maayɓe boo.
Ngam maajum winndu ko ngi'ɗa: Kuuje jontaaje e tammiiɗe wargo ɓaawoɗon.

Ndaa sirri koode joweeɗiɗi ɗe ngi'ɗa haa juŋngo am nyaamo e sirri jo'inirɗe pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri: Koode joweeɗiɗi ngoni malaa'ika'en jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe joweeɗiɗi. Jo'inirɗe pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi boo ngoni jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe joweeɗiɗi.”
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Efesus ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa jogiiɗo koode joweeɗiɗi haa juŋngo muuɗum nyaamo, mo ɗon yaha caka jo'inirɗe pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi ɗe kaŋŋeeri:
Mi anndi kuuɗe maaɗa e torra maaɗa e tiiɗal maaɗa. A munyantaa halluɓe. A foondi yimɓe wi'anɓe ɓe nelaaɓe, ammaa ɓe laataaki nelaaɓe, a tawi ɓe fewooɓe.
A ɗon tiiɗi, a torrake ngam daliila am, ammaa a tampaay.
Ammaa woodi ko mi felirte: A wudini yiide nde a marno haa fuɗɗam.
Siftor diga toy a do'i. Nden tuubu, huuw fahin kuuɗe ɗe a huuwino haa fuɗɗam. To naa non, mi waran, mi sottinan jo'inirɗum pittirla maaɗa to a tuubaay.
Ammaa ndaa ko mi yerdi haa maaɗa: A wanyi kuuɗe Nikolay'en
Mo woodi noppi, sey nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe!
Mi hokkan jaaliiɓe fuu baawɗe nyaamugo ɓiɓɓe lekki ngeendam gonki nder jarne Allah
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Simirna ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa bi'eteeɗo arano e ragareejo, mo maayino, ammaa mo yeeɗiti
Mi anndi torraaji e talakaaku maaɗa, ammaa haa am a diskuɗo. Mi anndi kalluka ka wi'anɓe ɓe Yahuudu'en mbolwata dow maaɗa, ammaa ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en! Ɓe rewooɓe Sayɗaanu.
Taa hul torraaji ɗi a tammi torreego! Ndaa, Sayɗaanu jarriboto on bee nastingo woɗɓe mooɗon nder fursina
Mo woodi noppi, sey o nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe!
Maayde ɗiɗawre meemataa jaaliiɗo
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Pergame ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa marɗo kaafahi ceeɓki marki mbeldiiji ɗiɗi:

Mi anndi haa njooɗiiɗa, haa leeso laamu Sayɗaanu woni. Ammaa a ɗon ɗakkotiri booɗɗum bee am, a accaay nuɗɗingo yam, koo nder zamanu Antipas, ceedoowo am gooŋgaajo mo ɓe mbari caka mooɗon, haa joonde Sayɗaanu woni.

Ammaa woodi ko mi felirte seɗɗa: Woodi tokkiiɓe ekkitinol Balaama caka mooɗon. Kaŋko o ekkitini Balak no o nastinirta Isra'iila'en nder tuuforgol haa ɓe nyaama kusel kirsaaŋgel ngam labbi, ɓe mbaɗa daakaareeku boo
Bana non, an boo a woodi tokkiiɓe ekkitinol Nikolay'en.
Tuube kadi! To naa non, mi waran law, mi honan yimɓe ɓe'e bee kaafahi gurtotooki hunnduko am.
Mo woodi noppi, sey nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe!
Mi hokkan jaaliiɗo fuu mannu suuɗiindu e hayre raneere boo. Dow hayre nde'e, innde hesre winndaama. Walaa annduɗo innde nde'e, sonaa jaɓɗo hayre man
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Tiyatira ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa
Mi anndi kuuɗe ma e yiide ma e nuɗɗinki ma e njaggu ma e tiiɗal ma. Ko a huuwata jonta ɓuri ko a huuwino haa fuɗɗam.
Ammaa woodi ko mi felirte: A ɗon acca debbo bi'eteeɗo Izabel, mo wi'i o annabiijo. O ɗon zammbo jaggiiɓe am bee ekkitinol maako haa ɓe mbaɗa daakaareeku, ɓe nyaama kusel kirsanaaŋgel labbi
Mi hokki mo wakkati haa o tuuba, ammaa o yiɗaa tuubugo dow daakaareeku maako.
Ngam maajum mi sakkinan mo haa be'itte torra. Ton o torroto masin, kaŋko e waɗooɓe njeenu bee maako fuu, sonaa to ɓe tuubi, ɓe acci huuwugo kuuɗe maako kalluɗe.
Ɓikkoy maako boo, mi mbaran koy. Jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe fuu anndan min woni linyoowo numooji e ɓerɗe yimɓe. Mi warjoto koo moy mooɗon deydey kuuɗe muuɗum
Ammaa onon nuɗɗinɓe luttuɓe haa Tiyatira, on tokkaaki ekkitinol kalluŋgol ngo'ol, on ekkitaaki ko woɗɓe mbi'ata sirriiji Sayɗaanu lugguɗi, mi roondataa on doŋngal goɗŋgal.
Ammaa sey on njogito ko marɗon bee semmbe haa to mi wari.
Jaaliiɗo, baɗɗo muuyo am haa timmoode, mi hokkan mo baawɗe dow ummaatooje,
o duran ɗe bee sawru njamndi, o fusan ɗe bana ɓe pusirta payanɗe loope
bana min boo mi heɓi baawɗe haa Baabiraawo am. Mi hokkan jaaliiɗo oo horre baɓɓol.
Mo woodi noppi, sey nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe.”
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Sardis ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa marɗo ruuhuuji Allah joweeɗiɗi e koode joweeɗiɗi: Mi anndi kuuɗe ɗe kuuwata. Yimɓe ɗon mbi'a a geeto, alhaali boo a maayɗo!
Hakkil, semmbiɗin ko lutti, ko ɓadake halkugo. Ngam mi tawi kuuɗe ma yeeso Allah am laataaki timmuɗe.
Ngam man, siftor no a jaɓri e no a naniri koŋngol Allah, ɗowtan ngol, tuubu. To a hakkilaay, mi waran bana gujjo, a anndataa saa'i nde mi warata haa ma
Ammaa a woodi yimɓe seɗɗa haa Sardis ɓe tunwinaay limce muuɗum'en. Ɓe njahdan bee am ɓe ɓorniiɓe limce daneeje, ngam ɓe ke'i ɗum.
Bana nii, jaaliiɗo fuu ɓornoto limce daneeje, mi wilataa innde maako diga deftere ngeendam. Yeeso Baabiraawo am e malaa'ika'en muuɗum boo mi wi'an fakat o goɗɗo am
Mo woodi noppi, sey nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe!”
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Filadelfiya ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa Ceniiɗo, gooŋgaajo, jogiiɗo maɓɓitirɗum Daawuda, to o maɓɓiti, walaa mo maɓɓata, to o maɓɓi boo, walaa mo maɓɓititta
Mi anndi kuuɗe ma. Ndaa mi maɓɓiti dammugal yeeso ma, walaa baawɗo maɓɓugo ngal. Ngam koo nde semmbe ma ɗuuɗaay, ammaa a ɗowtani wolde am, a yeddaay innde am.
Ndaa! Mi hokkete rewooɓe Sayɗaanu. Ɓe ɗon mbi'a ɓe Yahuudu'en, ammaa ɓe ɗon pewa, ɓe laataaki Yahuudu'en. Mi nelan ɓe haa ɓe tugga koppi, ɓe turo les kosɗe ma, haa ɓe paama mi yiɗi ma
Mi aynete jam nder wakkatiire torra ngaranka dow duniyaaru fuu ngam jarribaago jooɗiiɓe nder maaru, ngam a ɗowtani wolde nde mi umri ma bee tiiɗal.
Mi ɓadake wargo. Joga ko marɗa, ngam taa koo moy jaɓta woronnde jaalorgal ma.
Mi laatinan jaaliiɗo fuu daŋraŋgal nder
Mo woodi noppi, sey nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aaje nuɗɗinɓe!”
“Winndan malaa'ikaajo jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe haa Lawdikiya ni'i:
Ndaa koŋngol iwŋgol haa bi'eteeɗo Aamiina, ceedoowo koolaaɗo, gooŋgaajo, iwde tagefooji ɗi Allah tagi fuu
Mi anndi kuuɗe ma, a laataaki peewɗo malla gulɗo. To a laatakeno gulɗo malla peewɗo ɓuran.
Ngam a ɗon caka cak, a laataaki gulɗo malla peewɗo, mi tuutete diga hunnduko am.
Ngam a ɗon wi'a: Mi riski, mi woodi jawdi, walaa ko mi sooyi sam. Ammaa a anndaa a ɗon laalaato, a jurumɗo, a laafuɗo, a bumɗo e a temmbo.

Ngam maajum mi ɗon waso ma: Soodu haa am kaŋŋeeri laɓɓinaandi bee yiite ngam haa a riska. Soodu limce daneeje boo ngam haa a ɓorno, a sudda cemtuɗum temmbu maaɗa. Kadiboo soodu lekki ngam gite ma, ngam haa a heɓa yi'ugo.
Yimɓe ɓe ngiɗmi, mi ɗon fela ɓe, mi ɗon elta ɓe. Nden kam, waɗ tiinaare, tuubu
Ndaa, mi ɗon dari haa dammugal, mi ɗon silmino. To goɗɗo nani sawtu am, maɓɓiti dammugal, mi nastan suudu maako, min bee maako, min nyaamdan.
Mi hokkan jaaliiɗo laawol jooɗodaago bee am dow leeso laamu am, bana no min boo mi jaali, mi ɗon jooɗodi bee Baabiraawo am dow leeso laamu mum.
Mo woodi noppi, sey nana ko Ruuhu wi'ata jama'aare nuɗɗinɓe!”
Ɓaawo man mi yi'i dammugal maɓɓitaaŋgal haa asama. Sawtu bana luwal ngal mi aarti nanugo wi'i yam: “Wa'a haa ɗo, mi hollete ko tammi laataago ɓaawoɗon bee doole!”
Saa'i man nden Ruuhu naŋngi yam. Mi yi'i leeso laamu jo'inaama nder asama, goɗɗo ɗon jooɗi dow maago.
Jooɗiiɗo oo ɗon jalbita bana hayre yaspa bee hayre sardis. Timotimooŋgal bee noonde hayre imiradi taari leeso laamu man
Leese laamu noogas e nayi goɗɗe taari leeso go. Ndotti'en noogas e nayo, ɓorniiɓe limce daneeje e boroɗɗe kaŋŋeeri dow ko'e maɓɓe, ɗon njooɗi dow maaje.
Ma'e e hoolooji e pelmaali iwi haa leeso laamu go. Yeeso maago pittirlaaji joweeɗiɗi ɗon kuɓɓi, kanji ngoni ruuhuuji Allah joweeɗiɗi
Ko nanndi bee mbeela laaɓŋga, jalbitanŋga bana kiristal ɗon yeeso leeso laamu go.
Kuuje geete nayi ɗon taari ngo haa buttuli nayi fuu non boo haa caka. Ɗe keewi gite yeeso e ɓaawo fuu
Huunde arannde nanndi bee mbarooga, huunde ɗiɗawre nanndi bee gaggel, huunde tataɓre woodi yeeso bana ngo neɗɗo e huunde nayaɓre nanndi bee dutal piiranŋgal
Kuuje nayi ɗe'e, woore fuu woodi bileeji joweego, keewɗi gite haa nder e haa taarde maaje fuu. Jemma bee naaŋge fuu kuuje ɗe'e ɗon mbi'a tum bilaa siwtaare:
“Ceniiɗo, ceniiɗo, ceniiɗo woni
Jawmiraawo Allah Baawɗo dow koo ɗume fuu.
O ɗonno ɓooyma, o ɗon jonta, o tammi wargo boo
Nde kuuje geete nayi go ɗon maŋgta, ɗon ngetta jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu, geeto haa abada abadin go,
nden ndotti'en noogas e nayo go ɗon tugga koppi yeeso jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu, cujidana geeto haa abada abadin. Ɓe ɗon mballina boroɗɗe maɓɓe yeeso leeso laamu go, ɓe ɗon mbi'a:
“Yaa Jawmiraawo Allah amin,
a he'i jaɓugo tedduŋgal e daraja e baawɗe!
Ngam an tagi kuuje fuu,
bee muuyo maaɗa ɗe tagra e ɗe keɓri joonde.”
Mi yi'i deftere taggaande haa juŋngo nyaamo jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu go. Binndi keewi bakeeje maare ɗiɗi fuu, nde maɓɓaama e nde takkaama bee takkanɗe joweeɗiɗi
Mi yi'i boo malaa'ikaajo baawɗo, mo ɗon wooyna bee sawtu: “Moy he'i takkititgo takkanɗe e maɓɓititgo deftere nde'e?”
Ammaa koo haa asama, koo haa lesdi, koo haa les lesdi, walaa mo waawi maɓɓititgo deftere nde'e malla laarugo ko woni nder maare.
Mi woyi masin ngam walaa koo gooto he'i maɓɓititgo deftere malla laarugo ko woni nder maare.
Nden gooto caka ndotti'en go wi'i yam: “Taa woy. Ndaa mbarooga nder lenyol Yahuuda, iwɗo diga asŋgol Daawuda. Kaŋko o jaaliiɗo, o foti takkitugo takkanɗe joweeɗiɗi ɗe'e e maɓɓititgo deftere man

Nden mi yi'i caka leeso laamu e kuuje geete nayi e caka ndotti'en go, jawgel mbaalu ɗon dari, ngel nanndi bana ngel meeɗino mbareego. Ngel woodi luwe joweeɗiɗi e gite joweeɗiɗi, kanje ngoni ruuhuuji Allah joweeɗiɗi nelaaɗi haa duniyaaru fuu
Jawgel go yehi, jaɓi deftere man haa juŋngo nyaamo jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu go.
Nde ngel hoo'i deftere go, kuuje geete nayi e ndotti'en noogas e nayo go tuggi koppi yeeso jawgel, koo moy maɓɓe woodi moolooru e taasaaje
Ɓe ngimi yimre hesre bana ni'i:
“An a he'i hoo'ugo deftere nde'e,
a takkita takkanɗe maare.
Ngam a mbaraama,
bee ƴiiƴam maaɗa a soottani Allah yimɓe
iwɓe diga asli e ɗemɗe e jama'aaje e ummaatooje fuu
A waɗi ɓe yimɓe laamu e liman'en
ngam Allah meeɗen, ɓe laamanto duniyaaru
Nden mi yi'i, mi nani sawtu malaa'ika'en ɗuuɗɓe masin, ujine ujineeje taariiɓe leeso laamu e sawtu kuuje geete nayi e ndotti'en go
Ɓe ɗon mbolwa bee sawtu, ɓe mbi'i:
“Jawgel ngel ɓe mbarino
he'i jaɓugo baawɗe
e risku e hikma e semmbe e daraja
e tedduŋgal e maŋgtoore.”
Mi nani boo tagefooji gonɗi haa asama e haa lesdi e haa les lesdi e nder mbeela fuu, mi nani ɗi ɗon mbi'a:
“Maŋgtoore e maŋngu e tedduŋgal e baawɗe laatano
jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu e jawgel haa abada abadin!”
Kuuje geete nayi go njaabi: “Aamiina.” Ndotti'en tuggi koppi, cujidi.
Nden mi yi'i jawgel go takkiti takkannde arannde haa takkanɗe joweeɗiɗi go. Mi nani woore nder kuuje geete nayi wi'i bee sawtu bana felmaaŋgo: “War!”
Mi yi'i puccu ndaneewu. Ba'iiɗo ngu ɗon jogi lagaawal, ɓe ndokki mo woronnde. O dilli, o jaaliiɗo haa o jaalo fahin
Nde jawgel takkiti takkannde ɗiɗawre, mi nani huunde ɗiɗawre wi'i: “War!”
Puccu feere wurti, ngu mboɗeewu. Ɓe ndokki ba'iiɗo ngu kaafahi makki, ɓe ndokki mo baawɗe waddango duniyaaru konu, haa yimɓe mbarmbartira
Nde jawgel takkiti takkannde tataɓre, mi nani huunde tataɓre ɗon wi'a: “War!” Nden mi yi'i puccu ɓaleewu, ba'iiɗo ngu ɗon jogi kilo poondirɗum haa juŋngo muuɗum
Mi nani ko nanndi bee sawtu caka kuuje geete nayi wi'i: “Alkamaari agoda gootel soorra deydey ngeenaari kuugal nyalaade woore, non boo sa'iiruuri agoda tati! Ammaa taa wonnu nebbam malla inaboojam!”
Nde jawgel takkiti takkannde nayaɓre. Mi nani sawtu huunde nayaɓre ɗon wi'a: “War!”
Mi yi'i, puccu puru. Ba'iiɗo ngu wi'ete Maayde, nden bi'eteeɗo Joonde-maayɓe tokki mo. Ɓe ndokkaama baawɗe dow yeɓre duniyaaru woore nder nayi haa ɓe mbara yimɓe bee kaafahi e weelo
Nde jawgel takkiti takkannde jowaɓre, mi yi'i les hirsirde, yoŋkiiji mbaraaɓe ngam daliila wolde Allah e seedamku ngu ɓe ceedi.
Ɓe ɗon ngooka bee sawtu, ɓe ɗon mbi'a: “Yaa Jawmiraawo, ceniiɗo, gooŋgaajo! Haa ndey min ndeenata haa a hiito jooɗiiɓe haa duniyaaru, a waato ngam ɓe mbari min?”
Nden ɓe ndokki koo moy maɓɓe ngapaleewol daneewol, ɓe mbi'i ɓe ɓe munya seɗɗa tawon, haa to limgal deerɗiraaɓe maɓɓe jagganooɓe Allah, mbareteeɓe bana maɓɓe ciki.
Nde mi yi'i jawgel takkiti takkannde joweego'oore, lesdi dimmbi masin. Naaŋge ɓalwi bana limce ɓaleeje kurum, lewru wooji coy bana ƴiiƴam
koode asama ɗon caama haa lesdi bana ibbe kecce caamirta haa ibbi to henndu semmbiɗndu dimmbini ki.
Asama sotti, taggaama bana goɗɗo taggirta ɗereewol. Kooseeje e duuɗe fuu cotti diga nokkuuje maaje
Nden laamiiɓe duniyaaru e mawɓe e mawɓe sooje'en e riskuɓe e marɓe baawɗe e maccuɓe e rimɓe fuu nyukkini ko'e muuɗum'en nder lowi e caka tapaaje kooseeje
Ɓe ɗon mbi'a kooseeje e tapaaje: “Ndo'e dow amin, nyukkine min diga yeeso jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu e ɓernuki jawgel
Ngam nyalaade ɓernuki maɓɓe mawnde yottake, moy waawata dartanaago nde
Ɓaawo man mi yi'i malaa'ika'en nayo ɗon ndari haa alkibilaaji duniyaaru nayi fuu. Ɓe ɗon njogi keni duniyaaru nayi fuu ngam taa ɗi mbifa haa lesdi malla dow mbeela malla haa leɗɗe fuu
Mi yi'i malaa'ikaajo feere ɗon wara diga fuunaaŋge, o ɗon jogi haatummeere lammba Allah geeto. O wooki bee sawtu, o wolwani malaa'ika'en nayo ɓe Allah hokki baawɗe waɗugo bonnonda haa lesdi e mbeela.
Malaa'ikaajo oo wi'i: “Taa mbonne lesdi malla mbeela malla leɗɗe, haa to min mbaɗi lammba dow tiiɗe jagganooɓe Allah meeɗen
Mi nani limgal waɗanaaɓe haatummeere lammba Allah, ɓe ujine teemerre e cappanɗe nayo e nayo (144.000) iwɓe haa le'i Isra'iila'en fuu:
Lenyol Yahuuda, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Ruben, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Gada, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo.
Lenyol Aser, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Neftali, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Manassa, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo.
Lenyol Simeyon, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Lewi, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Issakar, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo.
Lenyol Zabulon, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Yusufu, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Lenyol Benyamin, ujine sappo e ɗiɗo. Fuu ɓe keɓi lammba Allah.

Ɓaawo man mi yi'i mooɓre ɗuuɗnde nde goɗɗo waawataa limugo. Ɓe iwi haa ummaatooje e asli e jama'aaje e ɗemɗe fuu. Ɓe ɗon ndari yeeso leeso laamu e yeeso jawgel, ɓe ɗon ɓorni ngapaleeji daneeji, ɓe ɗon njogi lice dibinooje.
Ɓe fuu ɓe ngooki bee sawtu, ɓe mbi'i: “Kisndam iwi haa Allah amin, jooɗiiɗo dow leeso laamu e haa jawgel!”
Malaa'ika'en fuu ɗon ndari, ɗon taari leeso laamu e ndotti'en e kuuje geete nayi go, ɓe turi yeeso leeso laamu, ɓe cujidani Allah,
ɓe mbi'i: “Aamiina! Maŋgtoore, tedduŋgal, hikma, yettoore, daraja, baawɗe e semmbe fuu laatano Allah amin haa abada abadin. Aamiina!”
Nden gooto nder ndotti'en ƴami yam: “Ɓorniiɓe ngapaleeji daneeji ɓe'e, ɗum ɓeye e diga toy ɓe iwi?”
Mi jaabi mo: “Naywa an woni annduɗo.” O wi'i yam: “Kamɓe ɓe munyani torra makka. Ɓe looti ngapaleeji maɓɓe, ɓe ndanwini ɗi bee ƴiiƴam jawgel
Ngam maajum ɓe ɗon yeeso leeso laamu Allah, ɓe ɗon mbaɗana mo dewal jemma bee naaŋge nder
Ɓe meetataa maatugo dolo malla ɗomka, naaŋge malla gulɗum meetataa torrugo ɓe
ngam jawgel gonŋgel haa caka leeso laamu laatoto gaynaako maɓɓe, yahran ɓe haa ceeɓooje ndiyam ndokkanɗam ngeendam. Allah boo woostan gonɗi fuu haa gite maɓɓe
Nde jawgel takkiti takkannde joweeɗiɗawre, asama fuu de'i siriw baakin reeta saa'a.
Nden mi yi'i ɓe ndokki malaa'ika'en njoweeɗiɗo dariiɓe yeeso Allah luwe joweeɗiɗi.

Malaa'ikaajo feere wari, dari kommbi hirsirde, o ɗon jogi taasawo kaŋŋeeri ngam wulugo uurle. Ɓe ndokki mo uurle ɗuuɗɗe haa o wula ɗe hawtaade bee do'aaje senaaɓe fuu dow hirsirde kaŋŋeeri dariinde yeeso leeso laamu
Cuurɗe uurle man ummi bee do'aaje senaaɓe diga juŋngo malaa'ikaajo dariiɗo yeeso Allah go.
Nden malaa'ikaajo hoo'i taasawo wulugo uurle go, hebbini ngo bee yiite dow hirsirde, sakkini nge haa duniyaaru. Diggaali ndiggi, hoolooji mbaɗi, ma'e ma'i, lesdi dimmbi
Nden malaa'ika'en njoweeɗiɗo marɓe luwe joweeɗiɗi go taaski fuufugo ɗe.
Malaa'ikaajo arano fuufi luwal muuɗum. Mallimallooje e yiite jillindiraaŋge bee ƴiiƴam toɓi dow lesdi. Yeɓre
Nden malaa'ikaajo ɗiɗaɓo fuufi luwal muuɗum. Ko nanndi bee hooseere mawnde jamnaande sakkinaama nder mbeela. Yeɓre mbeela woore nder tati laati ƴiiƴam,
yeɓre tagefo mbeela woore nder tati waati, yeɓre koommbooje
Nden malaa'ikaajo tataɓo fuufi luwal muuɗum. Horre mawnde jamnaande bana jamre do'i diga asama, yani dow yeɓre maaje ndiyam woore nder tati e dow ceeɓooje ndiyamji
Innde horre man, Kaaɗeeŋga. Yeɓre ndiyamji woore nder tati haaɗi rok haa yimɓe ɗuuɗɓe maayi ngam daliila ndiyamji kaaɗɗi ɗi'i

Nden malaa'ikaajo nayaɓo fuufi luwal muuɗum. Nder geɓe naaŋge tati, woore fiyaama, non boo yeɓre lewru woore e yeɓre koode woore, haa yeɓre jayŋgol man woore nder tati nyifi. Yeɓre jayŋgol nyalawma woore nder tati nyifaama, non boo jemma
Nden mi yi'i e mi nani dutal piiranŋgal nder hawa ɗon wi'a bee sawtu: “Kayto, Kayto! Kayto! Bone laatanto jooɗiiɓe haa duniyaaru ngam daliila hoolo luwe malaa'ika'en luttuɓe tato tammi fuufugo!”
Nden malaa'ikaajo njowaɓo fuufi luwal muuɗum. Mi yi'i horre do'i diga asama haa lesdi. Nde hokkaama maɓɓitirgel ngaska lugguka.
Nde maɓɓiti ngaska man. Nden cuurɗe ngurti ka bana cuurɗe ɓolinirde mawnde, naaŋge e hawa ɓalwi bee cuurɗe man
Baɓɓatti ngurti cuurɗe man, caŋkiti haa lesdi, ɗi keɓi baawɗe bana ɗe jahe
Ɗi umraama taa ɗi mbonna huɗo dow lesdi malla haako hecco koo koye e lekki koo kiye, sey yimɓe ɓe ngalaa lammba Allah haa tiiɗe muuɗum'en tan
Ɗi keɓaay duŋayeere mbarugo yimɓe man, sey torrugo ɓe lebbi jowi. Naawɗum torra baɓɓatti man nanndi bee naaweeŋga nga goɗɗo maatata to yaare fiɗi ɗum.
Nder nyalɗe ɗe'e, yimɓe ɓe'e tefan maayugo, ammaa ɓe keɓataa. Ɓe ngeloto maayugo, ammaa maayde doggan ɓe
Baɓɓatti ɗi'i nanndi bee pucci taaskaniiɗi konu. Ɗi keɓi ko nanndi bee boroɗɗe kaŋŋeeri dow ko'e maaji. Geese maaji nanndi bee geese yimɓe
gaasa ko'e maaji nanndi bee gaasa ko'e rewɓe, nyii'e maaji boo nanndi bee nyii'e mbarooga
Biɓɓe maaji cuuɗaama bee ko nanndi sulkeeji njamndi. Hoolo bileeji maaji nanndi bee hoolo mootaaji ɗi pucci ɗuuɗɗi ndasata saa'i ɗi ɗon camna yahugo konu.
Ɗi ngoodi bicce e tufirkoy bana ɗe jahe, bee bicce maaji ɗi ngoodi baawɗe naawnugo yimɓe lebbi jowi.
Ɗi ngoodi laamiiɗo, kaŋko woni malaa'ikaajo kalfinaaɗo ngaska lugguka go. Innde maako bee Ibraniŋkeere, Abaddon, bee Yunaniŋkeere
Torra arana saalake, ndaa torraaji ɗiɗi goɗɗi ɗon ngara yeeso ɗo.
Nden malaa'ikaajo njoweegoojo fuufi luwal muuɗum. Mi nani sawtu iwi haa tolɗi
Sawtu go wolwani malaa'ikaajo njoweegoojo jogiiɗo luwal, wi'i: “Fiistu malaa'ika'en nayo haɓɓaaɓe haa Efratis, maayo maŋngo!”
Ɓe piisti malaa'ika'en nayo taaskiiɓe ngam saa'iire e nyalaade e lewru e hitaande man ngam ɓe mbara yimɓe yeɓre woore nder tati.
Mi nani limgal wa'iiɓe pucci konu, ɓe miliyoŋji teemeɗɗe ɗiɗo (200.000.000).
Nder wahayu am mi yi'i pucci e wa'iiɓe ɗi. Ɓe ngoodi sulkeeji boɗeeji coy bana yiite, deenooji bana yasente, ooli bana baruudu
Yiite e cuurɗe e baruudu ngurti kunnduɗe pucci go, kanjum woni masiibooji tati. Ɗum mbari yeɓre yimɓe woore nder tati.
Ngam baawɗe pucci man ɗon nder kunnduɗe e nder bicce maaji. Bicce maaji nanndi bee boɗɗe, ɗe ngoodi ko'e. Bee maaje ɗi ɗon naawna yimɓe.

Bee non fuu yimɓe luttuɓe ɓe masiibooji ɗi'i mbaraay, tuubaay dow kuuɗe muuɗum'en. Ɓe accaay sujidango ginnaaji e labbi kuuwraaɗi bee kaŋŋeeri e cardi e njamndi mboɗeeri e kaa'e e leɗɗe, ɗi mbaawataa laarugo koo nanugo e yahugo
Yimɓe ɓe'e tuubaay, ɓe accaay waɗugo mbar-hoore e hiila e daakaareeku e nguyka.
Nden mi yi'i malaa'ikaajo feere marɗo baawɗe ɗon jippo asama. O ɗon ɓorni ruuldere, timotimooŋgal ɗon taari hoore maako, yeeso maako ɗon yayna bana naaŋge, kosɗe maako nanndi bee moosli yiite.
Nder juŋngo maako o jogi deftel maɓɓitaaŋgel. O jo'ini kosŋgal maako nyaamal dow mbeela, nanal boo dow lesdi,
o wooki bee sawtu, o wooki bana ubbaaŋgo mbarooga. Nde o wooki bana nii, pelmaali joweeɗiɗi mbaɗi hoolo.
Nde pelmaali joweeɗiɗi ɗi mbolwi, mi taaskani winndugo ɗum. Ammaa mi nani sawtu wolwani yam diga asama, wi'i: “Taa waŋgin ko pelmaali joweeɗiɗi ɗi'i mbolwi. Taa winndu ɗum.”
Nden malaa'ikaajo mo mi yi'i ɗon dari dow mbeela e dow lesdi go ɓaŋgti juŋngo muuɗum nyaamo heedi asama,
huni bee innde Allah, geeto haa abada abadin, tagɗo asama e lesdi e ko woni ton fuu, tagɗo mbeela e ko woni ton fuu, o wi'i: “Walaa wakkati fahin!
Ammaa yaake nde yimɓe tammi nanugo sawtu malaa'ikaajo njoweeɗiɗaɓo, to o fuufi luwal maako, nden Allah timmitinan anniya muuɗum sirriiha, bana o anndinno jaggiiɓe maako, annabi'en
Nden sawtu diga asama go, wolwani yam fahin, wi'i: “Yah, jaɓ deftel maɓɓitaaŋgel ngel diga juŋngo malaa'ikaajo dariiɗo dow mbeela e dow lesdi go.”
Mi yehi haa malaa'ikaajo go, mi ƴami mo o hokkammi deftel go. O wi'i yam: “Hoo'u ngel, nyaam ngel, ngel haaɗan nder reedu maaɗa, ammaa nder hunnduko maaɗa, ngel dakman bana njumri.”
Mi jaɓi deftel man diga juŋngo malaa'ikaajo go, mi nyaami ngel, ngel dakmi nder hunnduko am bana njumri. Ammaa nde mi moɗi ngel, ngel haaɗi nder reedu am
Nden goɗɗo wi'i yam: “Sey a waɗa annabaaku dow jama'aaje e ummaatooje e ɗemɗe e laamiiɓe ɗuuɗɓe fahin.”
Nden ɓe ndokki yam kewal poondirgal, ngal nanndi bee sawru. O wi'i yam: “Umma, foondu haykaliiru Allah bee hirsirde maaru, lim sujidooɓe nder maaru
Ammaa taa foondu daldal gonŋgal yaasi haykaliiru, ngam ngal hokkaama haa ummaatooje goɗɗe. Ɓe njaaɓan berniwol ceniiŋgol lebbi cappanɗe nayi e ɗiɗi (42).
Mi nelan seedooɓe am ɗiɗo, ɓorniiɓe limce buhuuje, ɓe mbaɗan annabaaku nyalɗe ujineere e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe joweego (1.260).”
Seedooɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e ngoni jaytunje ɗiɗi e pittirlaaji ɗiɗi dariiɗi yeeso Jawmu duniyaaru
To goɗɗo tefi naawnugo ɓe, yiite wurtoto kunnduɗe maɓɓe, nyaaman konne'en maɓɓe. Bana nii boo to goɗɗo tefi naawnugo ɓe, fakat o mbareteeɗo bana non.

Ɓe ngoodi baawɗe maɓɓugo asama ngam taa iyeende toɓa yaake ɓe ɗon mbaɗa annabaaku. Ɓe ngoodi baawɗe waylititgo ndiyamji laato ƴiiƴam. Nde ɓe ngiɗi fuu, ɓe ngoodi baawɗe ukkango duniyaaru masiibooji koo ɗiye fuu
To ɓe timmini seedaago, ndabbaawa wurtoto ngaska lugguka go, haɓan bee maɓɓe. Nga jaaloto ɓe, nga mbaran ɓe
Ɓalli maɓɓe mbaaloto haa daldal berniwol maŋngol, maana innde maagol Sodoma e Misra, haa ton boo ɓe ɓilno Jawmiraawo maɓɓe dow leggal gaafaaŋgal
Woɗɓe nder jama'aaje, asli, ɗemɗe e ummaatooje ngi'an ɓalli maɓɓe balɗe tati bee reeta, ɓe nduŋantaako koo moy uwa ɓe.
Jooɗiiɓe haa duniyaaru ceyorto maayde seedooɓe ɗiɗo ɓe'e. Ɓe mbaɗan juulde, ɓe nelneltiran caahuuji, ngam annabi'en ɓe'e torrino jooɗiiɓe haa duniyaaru masin.
Ɓaawo balɗe tati bee reeta, Allah lornani ɓe poofɗe, ɓe ummi, ɓe ndari. Kulol maŋngol naŋngi yi'ɓe ɓe fuu
Nden annabi'en ɗiɗo go nani sawtu mo asama ɗon wi'a ɓe: “Eeŋge haa ɗo!” Ɓe eeŋgi haa asama nder ruuldere. Konne'en maɓɓe ɗon ndaara ɓe
Saa'i man nden lesdi dimmbi masin haa yeɓre berniwol woore nder sappo yibbi. Sarru ngu halki yimɓe ujine njoweeɗiɗo (7.000). Yimɓe luttuɓe kultori, ɓe teddini Allah mo asama
Torra ɗiɗaɓa saalake, ndaa torra tataɓa ɓadake yottaago.
Nden malaa'ikaajo njoweeɗiɗaɓo fuufi luwal muuɗum. Mi nani sawtuuji cemmbiɗɗi nder asama, ɗi ɗon mbi'a: “Laamu duniyaaru laatanake Jawmiraawo meeɗen e Almasiihu muuɗum, o laamoto haa abada abadin
Nden ndotti'en noogas e nayo jooɗiiɓe dow leese laamu muuɗum'en yeeso Allah go tuggi koppi, cujidani Allah.
Ɓe mbi'i:
“Min ngetti ma, yaa Jawmiraawo Allah Baawɗo dow koo ɗume fuu,
mo ɗon, mo ɗonno ɓooyma.
A huuwi bee baawɗe ma mawɗe, a laamake!
Ummaatooje tikkani ma,
ammaa ɓernuki ma waŋgi.
Ɗum wakkati hiitaago maayɓe,
warjaago jaggiiɓe ma annabi'en e senaaɓe e hulɓe ma,
mawɓe e leesɓe fuu.
Non boo, wakkati ngam nattingo nattinooɓe lesdi
Nden
Nden alaama makka waŋgi haa asama. Woodi debbo ɓorniiɗo naaŋge, lewru ɗon les kosɗe maako, o ɗon hippi woronnde koode sappo e ɗiɗi dow hoore
O ɗon bee reedu, o ɗon wooka ngam luuwe naŋngi mo.
Nden alaama ngoɗka waŋgi haa asama. Ɗum Kuuŋga, maapinndiiwa, mboɗeewa. Nga woodi ko'e joweeɗiɗi e luwe sappo, hoore koo ndeyeere fuu ɗon bee meetaleewol
Bee wicco maaga nga doonyi yeɓre koode woore nder tati haa asama, nga rufi ɗe haa duniyaaru. Nga dari yeeso debbo ɓadiiɗo ɓesnugo go ngam haa nga nyaama ɓiŋngel, to ngel danyaama
Nden debbo go ɓesni ɓiɗɗo gorko, ɓiɗɗo oo tammi durugo ummaatooje bee sawru njamndi. Ammaa ɓiŋngel wiftaama, yahraama haa Allah e haa leeso laamu mum
Debbo doggi haa ladde hamaadaare, haa nokkuure nde Allah taaskitinani mo haa o nyaamne ton balɗe ujineere e teemeɗɗe ɗiɗi e cappanɗe joweego (1.260).
Nden konu waɗi haa asama. Mika'iilu e malaa'ika'en muuɗum kaɓi bee Kuuŋga go. Kuuŋga e malaa'ika'en maaga boo kaɓi bee maɓɓe
Ammaa Mika'iilu'en njaali nga. Kaŋga e malaa'ika'en maaga fuu keɓaay jooɗaago haa asama fahin.
Kuuŋga maapinndiiwa, waato mboodi nayeeri, nga ɓe mbi'ata Iblisa malla Sayɗaanu, zammboowo jooɗiiɓe haa duniyaaru fuu, sakkinaama haa lesdi, kaŋga e malaa'ika'en maaga fuu

Nden mi nani sawtu haa asama ɗon wi'a: “Jonta, kisndam yottake! Allah meeɗen waŋgini baawɗe e laamu muuɗum e baawɗe Almasiihu muuɗum. Ngam gulloowo deerɗiraaɓe meeɗen yeeso Allah meeɗen jemma bee naaŋge go sakkinaama diga asama
Deerɗiraaɓe meeɗen njaali mo bee ƴiiƴam jawgel e bee wolde gooŋga nde ɓe ceedi. Ɓe paalaay yoŋkiiji maɓɓe, ɓe kasdi maayugo.
Ngam maajum ceye, onon asamanji e onon jooɗiiɓe ton! Ammaa bone laatanto lesdi e mbeela! Ngam Iblisa jippanake on, o ɗon ɓerni masin ngam o anndi wakkati seɗɗa tan luttani mo.”
Nde Kuuŋga go laari nga sakkinaama haa lesdi, nga fuɗɗi taasnugo debbo ɓesnuɗo ɓiɗɗo gorko go.
Ammaa debbo go hokkaama bileeji dutal maŋngal ɗiɗi, ngam haa o fiira, o yaha haa nokkuure maako nder ladde hamaadaare, haa ɓe nyaamni mo duuɓi tati bee reeta, daayiiɗum bee mboodi go
Nden mboodi tuuti ndiyam bana maayo, ngam haa ɗam tokko debbo, ɗam ilna mo.
